1b1(rnying rgyud): na na/ myu na du /
1b2(rnying rgyud): chu kyi rgyas su 'dus pa / bani ldan 'dus dang la sum nga rgya / me pa 'di smra shA
1b3(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/ chos thams cad kyi snying po rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid chen pode/ 'og min chos nyid kyi
1b4(rnying rgyud): dbyings nyid kyi stong / chos nyid kyi gnas/ rang byung ma bsgribs pa'i zhal las khang na/ dus gsum gcig pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
1b5(rnying rgyud): mal pa'i badzin pa 'brang ba rnam ma dang / stsal gnas pa'i rgyang rgya mas dpa' rnams dang / nges pa mtha pa rnams dang/
2a1(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa'i srid dpa gsam ldan chad/ 'byed pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs 'i dbang gis skabs thig sa/ de nas ban ma ldan 'das dpal
2a2(rnying rgyud): gan tu bzang po dri la 'kho rnams kyis yongs su 'dun to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun d+ha bzeng ba das/ 'khor rnams yongs su 'dun pa gzigs nas/ yangs
2a3(rnying rgyud): su kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i chos nyid la gnus par mdzad do// mdzad nas 'khor rnams yongs su rtog pa skyes te/ yongs su sems 'grogs so// yongs su sems
2a4(rnying rgyud): 'grogs par gzigs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po des/ 'khor rnams la nyid kyi rang bzhin 'di bstan to// e ma ho byang chub sems 'di kun tu
2a5(rnying rgyud): bzang // rgyu rkyen med pa'i rang byung sems// thams cad 'byung ba'i snying po des// dga' mgu rangs pa kun 'dod na// 'dun pa ma skyes sems 'grogs nas//
2b1(rnying rgyud): rang grazhan ma mthung ste// nga ni kun gyi rang bzhin te// chos kun snying po mthong ba med// rjes gsungs so// de nas la kho donams kyang sems stobs ma pas slong mthong ste/ la la ni nyid kyi rang bden du gyur te// la la na/
2b2(rnying rgyud): ye shes skyes so// la la ni dga' bas 'dun to// lal ni skyon pas 'dud// / pA la ni mdad pa'i sems byung ngo // la li ni dga' bar gyur na yang 'byed pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rjes thabs cin no// de nas sems dpa'
2b3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje nyid kyi rang bzhin des/ kun tu bzang po lnga 'di skad ces gsol to// e mardo rje snying po khyod// byang chub sems ni kun tu bzang // yin par bdag cag yongs ma rtogs// glu rkyen med par 'byung me sems// zhes
2b4(rnying rgyud): zhus so// de nas kun tu bzang po de nyid kyis mi dmigs pa'i don la bzhugs nas/ rmugs rje ye shes 'od zer sprul pa spros pas/ dus gsum ci de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes nas sems dpa' rdo rje la dus gsum gyi
2b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer bsdus te bakhrul ba mdzad do// don gyi tshig gis kyang 'di skad bskul te/ rdo rje snying po'i sems dpa' khyor// kun gyi rang bzhin khod yin pas// sems nyid kun tu bzang po
2b6(rnying rgyud): dzi// khyod kyis kun la bstan drag so'i// zhes bskul to// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje nges// bde bar gshegs pa kun gyis bskul bar rig nas me rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgo nas/ 'od zer phyogs brda
2b7(rnying rgyud): nas spar ba sdus te/ nyid kyi sems kyi sku bzhengs nas kun pa snang bar mdzad // kun gyi rang bzhin du yang bzhugs so// rang bzhin kun la snang ngo // sems kyi rang bzhin yang snang bar mdzad do// de nas
3a1(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis/ sems dpa'i rang bzhin kun tu rdo rje la zhus pa/ e ma ho rje snying po khrod// byang chub sems ni kun bza na// nyon mongs lnga yi sdug bsngal gang /
3a2(rnying rgyud): khams gsum gnas kyi sdug bsngal gang // rgyud drug 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gang // mtho ris ngan song skrag bsngal gang // zhes zhus so// de nas sems dpa'i rang bzhin kun tu rdo rjes 'dus pa'i tshogs la/ chos
3a3(rnying rgyud): thams cad rtsa ba gcig pa las byung ba'i don bsdus pa 'di gsungs so// chos kun rtsa ba sems su gcig/ rtsa ba gcig la don gnyis ni// bde dang sdug bsngal theg pa gnyis// phun sum tshogs pa gsum tshogs pas// /
3a4(rnying rgyud): yog bzhi yis bye brag 'byed// khyad par 'phags pa'i tshe lha ston// gol sgrib drug zug skyon yon sel// gtan la rnam pa bdun gyis 'bebs// nges pa'i man ngag brgyad du ston// bden pa'i tshig dgra mthun spras nas// /
3a5(rnying rgyud): yongs su rdzogs pa'i mdo bcu ni// gcig gi rang bzhin ston par byed// gcig dang gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi// lnga dang drug dang bdun dang brgyad// dgu dang bcu yi bar gyis ni// gcig don yongs su rdzogs par
3a6(rnying rgyud): bstan// zhes gsungs so// byang chub sems kyi 'grel pa rdzogs pa chen po'i mdo bcu las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs thams cad sems dpa' rdo rje'i 'khor du 'khod de/ dad
3a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i sems kyi 'dun pas/ sems dpa' rdo rjes rtsa ba gcig pa'i don gsungs shig par rig nas bka' stsal pa/ kye 'dus pa'i tshogs chen nyon cig/ byang chub sems kyi mdo 'di la// gcig ni kun gyi rang bzhin te// chos
3b1(rnying rgyud): me byings sa na byang chub sems// yan byas ca ba'adun dugyu/ gzug pa'i'adon na 'ang // sangs rgyas su dang po shes dang // sems can nas dang ngag chags dang // wang dang srid pa'o mas rnams san// byang chung /
3b2(rnying rgyud): sems dang dbyings su 'dus// rgyu ru gcig la 'bras bur gcig/ dpe ru gcig la don du gcig/ rtsa ba byang chub sems su gcig/ rtags dang gtan tshigs mthun par gcig/ spros pa med pa'i don du bstan// rgyu
3b3(rnying rgyud): gcig byang chub sems 'di ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// mtshan mar mi gnas chos smrar gcig/ gsung ste 'gag pa med par gcig/ ma bsgribs ye shes thugs su gcig/ spros pa med pa'i don du
3b4(rnying rgyud): gcig/ sems dang lus dang bag chags dang // rgyu gcig byang chub sems las byung // rgyu dang rgya yi rnam pa gnyis// rgyu ni 'byung chen rnam pa la// 'byung lnga rgyu nyid byang chub sems// 'gro ba'i lhag bsngal byang chub
3b5(rnying rgyud): sems// sems las rang kyad grub byed pa// brkam chags lnga las 'byung lnga grub// 'byung ba lnga la sa rang byung skyes// ldang ba'i chos dang srid pa'i chos// mi rtog pa yi chu rkyen gyis// bskyed nas ji ltar 'byung na yang // don
3b6(rnying rgyud): dam skye ba med pas nA// spros pa med pa'i don du bstan// 'bras bu gcig pa'i don 'di yang // rgya gcig pa yi tshul bzhin du// chos rnams kun gyi 'bras bur gcig/ de yang ci lta bu zhe na// dper na gyi nang chos rnams can
3b7(rnying rgyud): gang rgyu de la grub pa ni// rgyu 'bras gcig pa'i don yin no// 'gro ba'i sems kyi rkyen ci yog/ brkom chags lnga yi sdug bsngal chus// 'bras bu zad med rgyud lngar 'khor// de la 'bras bur ming mi gdags// lug bsngal
4a1(rnying rgyud): kun 'byung 'gog pa'i lam// spyang dang 'gog dang sol ba dang // lam pa mngon du byed pa yang // nyon mongs lnga bcom 'bras blade// mi skye mi 'gag 'bras buman// bden pa gnyis kyi rtog
4a2(rnying rgyud): dpyod kyis// min+tag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// mdo chen bzhi yi don rtogs te// chos nyid stong pa'i 'bras bu de// rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i 'bras bu min// gyi yi tan tra sde gsum yang // byang chub yan lag kun bsgoms nas/
4a3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin dang stug po bkod// thob pa rdo rje'i 'bras bu ste// blang dor med pa'i 'bras bu min// nang pa bskyed dang rdzogs pa ni// rnam pa gsum gyi don sbyar na// rang chung dag pa'i dkyil 'khor la// bsnyen bsrub bzhi yi cho gas ni//
4a4(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid lhun gyis grub byed pa'ang // col bsgrub 'das pa'i 'bras bre min// ma skyes pa yi chos nyid ni// mi sgre mi 'gag 'bras bu yin// 'byung ba lnga la rag ma las// sku gsung thugs la ma brten pas// chu 'bras 'das
4a5(rnying rgyud): pa 'bras bu yini// ma bsgribs rang byung ye shes kyis// gang yang spang ba med par spyod// gzung 'dzin rnam rtog mi mnga' bas// blang dor med pa'i 'bras bu yin// sems nyid rang byung ye shes la// ye nus btsal zhing bsgrub med/
4a6(rnying rgyud): pras// rdo la bsrub gnyis kyi spos dang bral// lhun gyis grub pa'i 'bras bu yin// sgro skur 'das pa'i byang chub sems// spros pa med pa'i don gyis na// kun gyi snying po sangs rgyas sku// ma bsgribs ye shes chos kyi dbyings//
4a7(rnying rgyud): mi 'gag dbyings kyi byang chub sems// mi skye mi 'gag ye shes zugs// rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis ma mchis// rtsa ba gcig gi byang chub sems// thams cad kun gyi rgyu na ldang // rgyu nyid rang byung skye med pas// ming tsam mtshon
4b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'bras bur gcig/ 'bras bu zhes ni btags pa med// btags pa de ni mtshon pa ste// mtshon pa'i don gyis gdags med mtshon// de yang mtshon par bya ba'i don// mtshon du med pa'i don de yang // ma mtshon go bar
4b2(rnying rgyud): 'gyur te// mtshon du med pa'i don tshig gis// mtshon te mtshon med go bar bya// thams cad chos ni skye ba med// ma skyes pa yi chos nyid ni// skye 'gag med pa'i byang chub sems// byang chub sems la skye med par// ma
4b3(rnying rgyud): mtshon skye med de mi mthong // skye ba med pa'i don tshig gis// skye med de mtshon mthong bar bya// thams cad chos ni sgo skur bral// sgro skur bral ba'i byang chub sems// brjod du med pa'i byang chub sems// byang chub sems la
4b4(rnying rgyud): brjod mod par// ma brjod rig par mi 'gyur te// brjod du med pa'i don tshig gis// brjod dang brjod med rig par bya// thams cad chos la skye 'gag med// skye 'gag med pa'i chos nyid la// mtshon du yod par ma gsungs te//
4b5(rnying rgyud): mtshon du med pas sgo skur bral// sgo skur bral ba'i byang chub sems// byang chub sems la mtshon du med// brjod du med pa'i chos nyid la// sras kyang brjod par mi nus so// zhes gsungs so// rdzogs pa chen po byang rngub
4b6(rnying rgyud): sems kyi mdo las/ rgyu 'bras gcig pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang 'dus pa'i tshogs de dag thams cad/ sems dpa' rdo rje'i 'khor du dad pa'i sems kyis 'khod de 'dun pas/ sems dpa'
4b7(rnying rgyud): rjes rtsa ba gcig pa'i dpe dang don la 'dun par rig nas yang gsungs pa/ kye sems dpa'i tshogs chen de nyon cing // rtsa ba gcig gi don 'di la// dpe yang gcig la don yang gcig/ dngos med 'dra ba dper bstan chos kun
5a1(rnying rgyud): ni nam mkha' 'dra// nam mkha' dag las thams cad 'byung // chos can snying po byang chub sems// thams cad 'byung bas nam mkha' 'dra// med pa yi byang chub sems// maHsa pas nanam mkha' 'dra /
5a2(rnying rgyud): rkyen med pa yi byang chung sems// mi 'jig bas na nam mkha' 'dra// gnyen po med pa'i byang chub sems// thams cad 'joms pas nam mkha' 'dra// mtshon du med pa'i byang chub sems// bstan du med pas nam mkha' 'dra// mA
5a3(rnying rgyud): bsgribs pa yi byang chub sems// kun tu gsal bas nam mkha' 'dra// thams cad bskyed pa'i byang chub sems// snang srid bskyed pas nam mkha' 'dra// dang byang zab mo'i don gzhig na// don dam ma s+yai sA nam mkha' 'dra// snang dang srid
5a4(rnying rgyud): dang yod pa dang // btags shing chags pa'i chos rnams kun// don dam rang bzhin ma skyes pas/ skye med dpe ni nam mkha' 'dra// nam mkha' lta bu'i chos kun brtags// dpe de 'dra ba'i don chos ni// yin pa dag la don zhes gdags//
5a5(rnying rgyud): don ni skye ba med pa yin// skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin ni// rgyu med pa las rtse med pas// sems la rgya med sri ba med// srid pa'i chos la rgyas bskyed kyang // chos nyid dbyings la ma med pas// skye ba med pa'i don yin no// thams cad chos ni skyes
5a6(rnying rgyud): med// skye med byang chub mngon sangs rgyas// snang ba'i chos dang srid pa'i chos// de yang snang ba'i 'byung chen lnga// nam mkha' snang byed khyab pa de// sems nyid ma bsgribs kun la khyab// de bas nam mkha' byang chub sems// snang byed
5a7(rnying rgyud): khyab pas mngon sangs rgyas// 'degs par byed pa'i 'byung ba rlung // byang chub sems kyi ye shes rlung // ye shes rlung gis kun 'degs pas// byang chub sems su mngon sangs rgyas// thams cad sdud pa'i 'byung ba chu// ye shes thugs
5b1(rnying rgyud): rje'i rlan kyis srud// de bas byang chub sems kyi chu// byang chub sems su mngon sangs rgyas// mngon sum snang bsra byed pa// thams cad 'dogs pa'i byang chub sems// de bas sems kyis de la// byang chub sems su mngon sangs rgyas//
5b2(rnying rgyud): thams cad drod snyoms tsha ba'i mo// pad+ma rnam dag ye shes te// de bas sems nyid rnam dag pas// byang chub sems su mngon sangs rgyas// 'byung chen lnga yi sangs rgyas lnga// byang chub sems su mngon sangs rgyas// srid gsum lam
5b3(rnying rgyud): lnga'i chos lnga yang // byang chub sems su mngon sangs rgyas// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// parkam chags lnga yi rnam smin gyis// lam sgo ldaru zhugs phyin na// mi bde sdug bsngal lnga la sbyang // zhe sdang lam gyi sgor zhug snapas// dmyal
5b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i gnas su tsha grang spyong// snga phyi med pa'i chos spyod kyang // snga ma'i las kyi rnam smin gyis// tshe dang grang ba'i nyams myong ste// snying po byang chub sems de la// tshwa grang nyams ris bskyod pa med// de bas zhe sbyong mi gnas stong /
5b5(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems su mngon sangs rgyas// 'dod chags lam gyi sgor zhugs pas// yi dwags gnas na bkres skom spyod// bsngos pas tshim pa'i chos yod kyang // snga ma'i lus kyi rnam smin gyis// bkres dang skom pa'i nyams myong ste/
5b6(rnying rgyud): snying po byang chub sems de la// bkres dang sgom pas bskyod pa med// de bas 'dod chags mi gnas stong // byang chub sems su mngon sangs rgyas// gti mug lam gyi sgor zhugs pas// byol song gnas na glen phyugs spyod// rig
5b7(rnying rgyud): paM phra mo'i chos spyod do// snga ma'i las kyi rnam smin gyis// blun zhing lkugs pa'i nyams myong ste// snying po byang chub sems de la// blun lugs nyams des bskyod pa med// de bas gti mug mig nas stong // byang chub sems su
6a1(rnying rgyud): mngon sang+yas rgyas// phrag dog lam gyi gror zhugs pas// mi yi gnas su dag sdig spyod// dge sdig pas byams stong kyang // mi dge shas kyang rnam sbyin gyis// mi rtag 'gyur ba'i nyams song ste/ !
6a2(rnying rgyud): po byang chub sems de la// mi rtag nyams des pastod pa med// de bas phrag dog mi gnas stong // byang chub sems su med na sangs rgyas// nga rgyal po mgyo sgor zhugs pas// lce ye ga nas dang longs spyod kyis// ma rig ltung ba'i sdug bsngal
6a3(rnying rgyud): myong // bsam pas 'ju 'a dra'i chos spyod kyang // ma rig le lo'i rnam smin gyis// ltung ba'i sdug bsngal nyams myong ste// snying po byang chub sems de pa// ljang po'i mas kyis mi bstod de// des nang rgyal mi gnas skyong // byang chub sems
6a4(rnying rgyud): su mngon sangs rgyas// snang srid chos ni de pas na// khams gsum gnas kyang de 'dra ste// 'dod pa'i khams ni ma rig pa// phye ba med par kun la rmongs// mi rtog gti mug chos kyi sku// gzugs kyi khams ni chagus pa'i gnas//
6a5(rnying rgyud): rgyal chags pa mngon 'grub pas// gzugs la nga rgyal ba lta mi ngom// ltung ba chags med ye shes su// gzugs med khams ni dngos ma grub// yid yul chos la mu bzhir blta// gzung 'dzin med par rig pa'i chos// ming dang
6a6(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma yul 'das thugs// de bas snang srid snod bcud kun// byang chub spyi gsung thugs su 'das// 'das pa'i dpe ni nam mkha' 'dra// num mkha' 'das pa kun gyi gnas// snang ba'i chos dang srid pa'i chos// 'das pa'i ngang na mi
6a7(rnying rgyud): gnas med// snang bas chu me rlung bzhi// 'das pa nam mkha'i ngang la gnas// de yang snang ba'i 'byung ba rlung // nam mkha'i ngang na yang g.yo zhing // rang gi mtshan nyid rdo rje'i rtsa la// rtsal chen de yi 'byung chen chu// 'das la mi ltung
6b1(rnying rgyud): 'degs par byed// de yang nam mkha'i dang na gnas// 'byung chen snang ba'i spyad byed cha// nam mkha' dang las rang bzhin brlan// rang gi mtshan nyid rdorje'i sngal// rtsal ched de yi 'byung chenas// 'das la ma nyung 'degs par byed // de snang /
6b2(rnying rgyud): na mam pa'i ngang na gnas// 'byung chen snang ba'i cha snyoms mo// nam mkha'i ngang las rang bzhin tsha// rang gi mtshan nyid rdo rje'i tshal// rdul chen de yi 'byung chen bzhi// 'dus la mi 'jigs snyoms par byed// mi 'das 'byung chen snang ba bzhi//
6b3(rnying rgyud): 'das pa'i nam mkha'i ngang na gnas// srid pa rgyud drug snang ba yang // 'das pas nam mkha'i dngan gnas// nam mkha' 'das pa'i dpe de bzhin// snang ba 'byung chen bzhi po yang // sems nyid 'das pa'i drang na gnas// srid pa rgyud drug
6b4(rnying rgyud): sdang ba yang // 'das pa sems kyi dang na spyod// snong sprid snod bcud thams cad kun// sems nyid dbyings kyi yul che bas// thams cad sems yul di na gnas// nam mkha' bzhin du mi gnas med// de bas kun gyi gnas chen dza
6b5(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi grong chen yin// 'das pa'i sems kyi klong chen 'di// snang dang srid pa thams cad kun// snod dang bcud kyis bsdus pa dang // sangs rgyas sems can thams cad dang // bde dang sdug bsngal thams cad dang // gyi nang spro/ sa pa
6b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad kun// byang chub sems kyi bde chen las// rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid la// snang dang srid pa gnyis su med// snod dang bcud kyang gnyis su med// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis kyang med// bde dang sdug bsngal gnyis kyang med//
6b7(rnying rgyud): phyi nang spros pa'i chos kyang med// med pa'i don gyi snying po la// yod pa'i blo skur gdab mi bya// gang zhig med pa'i don ma mthong // 'di la yod pa'i sgo 'dogs pa// don gyi snying po mi shes pas// med pa'i bde ba yul ma mthong // donam
7a1(rnying rgyud): nam chos martogs// de'is byangs kyus myam mthong // do ni gtogs san 'thomanamasras mdaganas rnamamang pa 'gyur// byang chub sems gyu nga blan / sa na shu'o// da
7a2(rnying rgyud): gi sa sems de ma mthong bas// bskal pa du mar grangs bgrangs kyang // snying po rang bzhin sems ma mthong // bden pa'i don dang 'phrad mi 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// byang chub sems hU~M mdo las/ dpe gcig pa'i lazla ste gas
7a3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas yang 'dus pa'i tshogs de dag thams cad/ sems dpa' rdo rje'i 'khyor du dad pa'i sems kyis 'khod de mos pas 'dun to// de nas sems dpa rdo rje des 'khor 'dun pa de/ rtsab byang chub sems sa
7a4(rnying rgyud): gcig pa dang // rtags dang gtan tshigs la 'dun par rigs nas/ yang gsungs pa/ kye 'dus pa'i tshogs chen de nyon cig/ rtsa ba gcig pa'i chos 'dri ni// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin te// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin// thams
7a5(rnying rgyud): cad 'dus pa'i snying po yin// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad la// sku gsung thugs su bdag med kyang // bdag la snying po 'di la 'dus// stang dang srid par smos pa'i chos// thams cad mngon du snang ba yang // thams cad 'gyur ba
7a6(rnying rgyud): 'di la 'dus// 'di ni snang srid snying po yin// snying po byang chub sems 'di la// thams cad 'dus shing 'byung bas na// de phyir snying po byang chub sems// byang chub sems kyi rnam grangs ni// gcig tu yod la bgrang du med// pa grangs
7a7(rnying rgyud): na mtha' yas brjod mi 'angs// gcig la rnam pa bgrang du med// gcig gis kun gyi rnam pa 'dzin// thams cad 'dus pa'i snying po yin// de phyir snying po byang chub sems// thams cad 'byung ba rgya ru snang // des na chu gcig byang chub
7b1(rnying rgyud): sems// thams cad byang chub sems la spos// 'dus kyang byang chub sems su 'das// gnas kyang byang chub sems la gnas// bskyed kyang byang chub sems las bsgred// sangs rgyas sku dang ye shes kyang // sems kyang gzang 'dzin bral ba
7b2(rnying rgyud): yin// des na byang chub sems kyi sku// sems can lus dang bag chags kyang // sems kyi brkam chags lnga las byung // des na 'byung ba'i byang chub sems// byang chub sems ni gzung 'dzin thal// byang chub sems ni spos dang bral//
7b3(rnying rgyud): chub sems ni rnam par dag// byang chub sems 'a byibs ma mchis// byang chub sems la bdon med// byang chu sems sgyur bu'o// thams cad snang ba'i byung chub sems// chos rnams kun gyim pa dra// gcig pachos ldan mam
7b4(rnying rgyud): rtsa ba byang chub sems 'di ni// kun gyi rang bzhin 'dis byas pas// thams cad byed pa'i rgyal po yin// byed pa'i rgyal pos kun byas pas// dngos su grub pa gang yang med// gang zhig dngos su grub 'dod pas// de yis chos kun gang mi 'grub//
7b5(rnying rgyud): bas dngos med kun gyis grub// dngos med gang gis grur pa de// des ni rtsa ba sems grub ste// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba grub// byed pa'i rgyal po grub pa yin// de bas su yang rung ba des// dngos med gang gis mngon gsal ba// des ni
7b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad kun 'grub pas// mi gnas dngos med rgyal po grub// 'di yis thams cad byed pa grub// 'di yis thams cad byed par 'gyur// de las thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur// de las 'byung ba thams cad 'byung // de las srid pa thams cad
7b7(rnying rgyud): 'byung // snang ba'i chos kyang de las byung // thams cad thams cad kun 'byung bas// de khyer snying po byang chub sems// chos rnams kun gyi rtsaba'o// zhes gsungs so// byang chub sems kyi mdado las/ rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
8a1(rnying rgyud): sa nags du na/ sa ga su ba yos spyod// da su stanan slo pa skrunas ba sa/
8a2(rnying rgyud): sa // 'du / pas na
8a3(rnying rgyud): dang thob pa gsungs sa// chos nan pa gcig pa / sa nyid se ma med basbyin pa'o/ nga me ma rgya rtogs pa nal 'byur ba// tha dam ma 'i'i zhal mabasapa
8a4(rnying rgyud): bzhin// mi tig nam mkha' lta bur gnas par bya// nu med ma thong rkyen med ma skyes pa// thams cad brjong ba'i snying po zung rtsu ba las// yod pa'i slo med pa'i spang ba dang // yod med sgo slar brtags pa ge la yod// ces gsungs so//
8a5(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi mdo'i 'grel pa rtogs so// / de nas 'das pa'i tshogs la/ sems dpa' rdo rje ngas/ rtsab gcig ma dzin gnyis 'byung ba'i rnam par baglang ba'i don 'di gsungs so// 'dus pa'i tshogs
8a6(rnying rgyud): chen nyon cig/ gnyis ni nus pa'i bye thug ste// theg pa rnas pa hU~Mnyis su bsten// 'dag rten pa cig pa dang // mye ngan drangs pa'i zug pa gnyis// 'jog rten pa la thug pa ni// mud rjeg gnas pa'i sems can rkye// 'ams
8a7(rnying rgyud): gsum 'khor ba'i gnas bzung nas// ban ma chags lnga'i sbyor bseb// khams gsum 'khor ba'i tshigs sogs te// bde 'i'i don med tong par 'gyur// de 'don 'di bstan pa// mu rdzogs rtag dang \u0f7fda pa gnyis// dag sden
8b1(rnying rgyud): las kyi chas rnams la// 'bras bu yod par ma rtogs te// chad pa'i mtha' ru lhung ba ste// rdzogs chen 'di yi byin brlabs kyis// snying po byang chub sems chen la// gzung 'dzin mtshan ma mi mnga' bas// chad pa'i mtha' na ldang mi 'gyur//
8b2(rnying rgyud): rtag par blta bar sems rnams kyis// yod pa rnam pa bzhi mthong ste// nga gcong skying rtag bzhi mthong nas// blang dor med pa'i don ma shes// skye shi med pa'i don ma mthong // rtag pa'i mtha' du lgang bde// rdzogs chen 'di yi byin brlabs kyis//
8b3(rnying rgyud): snying po byang chub sems nyid la// gzung 'dzin mtshan ma mi mnga' bas// rtag pa'i mtha' ru lhung mi 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rnam par bgrang ba'i mdo las/ 'jig rten gyi theg pa bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas
8b4(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i theg pa 'di bstan to// mya ngan 'das pa'i theg pa la// rnam pa gnyis su dbye bar bya// mtshan nyid rgyu yi theg pa dang // 'bras bu rdo rje'i theg pa'o// mtshan nyid tshu la rnam pa gsum/
8b5(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal spong ba'i nyan thos dang // shes pa 'gegs pa'i rang rgyal dang // rnam rtog spyod pa'i mdo sde gsum// sdug bsngal spong ba'i nyan thos ni// brtul zhugs dag gis spong bar byed// shes pa 'gegs pa'i rang rgyal ni// ma rig rten 'brel/
8b6(rnying rgyud): bcu gnyis 'gags// rnam rtog skyong ba'i mdo sde ni// chos nyid stong pa nam mkha' ste// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin 'grub pas// sgyu ma'i dpe brgyad lta bur 'dod// 'bras bu'i theg pa la yang gsum// bya ba'i sde dang gnyis ka'i sde// rnal
8b7(rnying rgyud): 'byor rgyud dang rnam pa gsum// bya ba byed pa'i kri yA ni// yan lag bcu gcig cho ga yis// rgyal ba'i sku gsung ye shes 'dod// gnyis ka spyod pa'i u pa ya// kri ya spyod cing log bsgrub// 'brel med sgo nas bslab par 'dod// rnal 'byor
9a1(rnying rgyud): pa rnam ga nyis/ ba dang ninang pa gnyis// rgyab ma pa log na// byang napa rba 'jal ban// napa/ du bab da// rang ban la spyod rnam pa gas// bzed da migs dmigs canags
9a2(rnying rgyud): babyed pa pa m+b+ha mas ne// rnam pagasam ma // byed ma nyams 'dug brtsonan// rdul ba'i sngags legs 'dod// rdzogs pa nI mog // rje rten dge pa'i ring bdun gyis/ hU~M ba dz+ra la gags pa// sod pas yegs
9a3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'alar rdzogs/ rdzogs rjem oM ti yog ni// mu rkyen dag ladug ma lus// rtsol ba dag gis sgrub ma byed// rdzogs cani gra lam brten 'das// rnam par bgrang ba'i chos rnams sum// yongs su byin gyis rlob par byed// sun
9a4(rnying rgyud): bde ba spong bar byed// yongs su byin gyis rlob par byed// de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ sdug bskal spong ba'i nyan thos re// bden pa bzhi yi sgor zhugs nas// ye shes yul med bcu drug gis// gang zag mtshan ma'i yul 'di la// bdag rnag
9a5(rnying rgyud): byas pa med par blta// chosnga la med pa'i don ma rtogs// snying po byang chub sems don// / mi dang brel ba'i bdag nyid yin// mtha' yong mtha' rje lung mi 'gyur// shes pa 'geg pa'i rang rgyal ni// rten 'brel bcu gnyis sor zhugs ma
9a6(rnying rgyud): ni rnam pa bco lnga la// gcig la bdag po ma rtags te// gzhan la bdag med yongs martogs// snying po byang chub sems 'drin// 'argyam cad med pa'i snying po yin// yod pa'i mtha' du lhung mi 'gyur// rnam rtog slong pa'i ma/
9a7(rnying rgyud): bden pa gnyis kyi rtog dpyod kyis// chos nyid spos dang bral ba de// rang bzhin med par rtogs pa dang // chos dang gang zag gnyis ka pa// bdag med par ni rtogs pa yis// bden dang nges pa'i sa ni thob// rtog dpyod 'das pa'i sa 'di la/
9b1(rnying rgyud): bsku la gsum par du brtag cing myod // bya ba rgyad k+ta kra g+hAn// gza' dang nA sar dus tshogs dang // dag pa rnamu ga sum sbya gas nas// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// dzarje 'dzin dang rigs gsams// mA mnyam
9b2(rnying rgyud): tshul du la mazhugs nas// mche bdun kyis rigra 'dzi nas// gzung 'dzin 'angs pa'i su 'di la// mdze bdun gyis reg 'dzin spyang // gnyis ka sbed pa'i u pa y-i// kr-i ltar spod rdzing yig bsgrub// rnam pa gnyis mngan
9b3(rnying rgyud): skrod pas// rigs dang kha dog khyang pa n-i// ji ltar 'dod pa gyis la gyur kyang // gnyis su med pa'is 'di la// mnor lam gyi tshul zhugs kyang // mtsho bdun du lha stod stug// bye ba thub pa yig ni// byang chub ldad
9b4(rnying rgyud): yul ba ni// sgra dang shes 'did pa'i phyir// spyan lag rtags pa'i sgos byed pa/ hU~M lag sa b+hUm+b+ham+b+ha/ lce'i sgra dang blug sa mnan dang // dmachog zin las rnam pa bzhin// sems dang ting dzin dbang bsgyur
9b5(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma yod med gnyis spyod pa// byung dor 'das pa'i sar ma phyin// blang dor 'das pa'i sa 'di la// ma nor tshul gyis las zhugs bya// mi tshe bdun du mtshan ma stong // nang pa'i many+dzu yog ni// thabs dang shes rab sgor zhugs
9b6(rnying rgyud): nus// bdag nyid chen po'adakyil 'khor du// phyi nang gsang pos bsdus pa dang // srid phra gsum gyis bsdus pa dang // dbang po'i spyod yul gyur pa dang // dus gsum mangs rnam bzhi dngade// spyod pa'i phrin las thams cad ni// 'drag
9b7(rnying rgyud): nyid chen po gcig bsdus kyang // ye nas yin la gdong bsgrubacol// rtsol bsgru ba 'das pa'i sa 'dil// mnor tshul gyis lamathugs kyang // zhag ni bcu pa gsum phrag drug/ bcu pa gsum phrag bcu drug tu// co la zhing bsrub pa'i/
10a1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin byer// rdzogs pa ana? yog no// dbyangs dang ye shwas sgor zhugs nas// pag+h+nAn pad+ma/ ba bzhi yi las spyod pas// snang ba'i tshos ni dag pa'i chu// bskyod nams chags su sgrub par byed// sems
10a2(rnying rgyud): dang sems byung thams cad kun// ye shes tshogs su sgrub par byed// rang rgyud dag pa'i lha bskyen nas// ltos pa'i tshig gis rjod par byed// ting 'dzin ye shes rtsal chen// ye shes tshogs su 'gyur mod kyis// bsam pa'i ye
10a3(rnying rgyud): shes thams cad kun// rtsol bsgrub ma 'das bye tshoni spang // rtsol bsgrub 'das pad+ma sa d+ya de la// ma nor tshul la ma zhugs nas kyang // yid ches mngonar du gyur pa ru// ltos pa'i chos la gnas shing rtsol// des na bde chen slar zhes
10a4(rnying rgyud): bya// rdzogs pa chen po'i bya swa mA g+ha tan ni// rtsol bsgrub 'das pa'i bde ba che// 'di yi don gyi rang bzhin las// rtogs nas byin rlabs 'byung ba ni// rdzogs pa chen po'i rang bzhin ni// sangs rgyas rdzogs la sems can rdzogs// 'jig
10a5(rnying rgyud): dz+nyAn rdzogs la 'das pa rdzogs// bde dang sdug bsngal gnyis med rdzogs// theg pa rdzogs la chos nyid rdzogs// yod pa'i mtha' rdzogs med mtha' rdzogs// gcig rdzogs kun rdzogs thams cad rdzogs// yongs su rdzogs pa'i mdo 'dri
10a6(rnying rgyud): rI// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// sngar grub dgongs pa 'di yis grub// da ltar bzhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pa// mi yengs dgongs lam 'di la gnas// slad nas byon pa'i gdung 'tsho ba rnams// dgongs pa'i lung bstan 'di
10a7(rnying rgyud): yis mdzad// gang su 'di la gnas pa yi// de ni rnal 'byor chen po yin// lus ni gang zag 'jig rten yang // sems dgongs rdzogs chen sangs rgyas yin// 'di yis sems can don byas kyang // don pa nor pa nges mi 'gyur// yin
10b1(rnying rgyud): pa dag la nor ba med// nges pa dgra la the tsom med// rdzogs pa chen po'i lung 'dril// yod med tshig dang ma nges pa'i// don la 'da' ba mi mnga' bas// brjod pa'i tsho bu pas 'da' mi mngang// zhes gsungs so// rnam par bgrang ba'i mang
10b2(rnying rgyud): las/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas sems dpa' rdo rje des/ 'dus pa'i tshogs la rnam pa gnyis su bgrang ba'i don gyi mdo'i 'gril pa 'di gsungs so// kye 'dus pa'i tshogs che nad nyon cig/ phye
10b3(rnying rgyud): nang snod bcu gnyis ka snang bu'i phyir// don dam skye ba med pas phyi dang nang // ma skyes zlab mo de yi cha shas ni// dmigs pa'i yul du ma gyur rtog yul med// srid pa'i phyi nang 'di ni ming tsAm ste// don dam ma yin log pa'i stobs su snang //
10b4(rnying rgyud): des ni phyi nang rtog pa'i ting 'dzin ni// cha shas rtogs pa'i yul med mnyam dang bral// ting 'dzin smos dang bral ba'i chos nyid la// tha tshig phyi dang rlung du bgrang bya med// chos nyid bgrang du med pa'i phung po 'di// nam mkha' bgrang du med pa'i khrims
10b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin gnas// snga mad lta phyi ma dus gsum du// nam mkha' lta bu 'di dang mi 'phral bas// phyi ni 'di yin nang ni 'di yin zhes// kun rdzob ming tsam nges par bajug pa med// ces gsung sngo// rnam par bgrang ba'i mdo las/ don
10b6(rnying rgyud): gyi 'grel pa'i le'u ste gsum pa rdzogs so// / de nas sems dpa' chen po des/ 'dus pa'i tshogs pa phun sum tshogs pa lag nus nas bshad pa'i phyir/ phun sum tshogs pa'i mdo 'di bshad do// kyi 'dus pa'i tshogs chen/
10b7(rnying rgyud): danyon cig/ kun bzang rgyal ba mchog gi la// byang chub sems kyi snying po yin// kun gyi ston pa byang chub sems// ston pas bstan pa'i 'khor tshogs pas// dus dang gnas ni rang bzhin 'dus// ston pa byang chub snying po ni// chos
11a1(rnying rgyud): nyid kyangs rje gnas rten na// srung sa rgyas sems can ra cha san// ky-i du 'o/ na pa na// ra ga mnas dog par jug/ rgyag rgya pa stsa nas// sog sa sas su bad
11a2(rnying rgyud): rlung byu che shes rang bzhin dang // drug rje sprul pa'i nga bzhin no// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// mi bo nas chos kyi sun zugs// rang byung yi shes rang bzhin ni// rdzogs pa'i ljongs spyod rje ru / thugs rje thung ba'i ring bzhin
11a3(rnying rgyud): ni// rnang pa cir ya dz+wal te bar+b+hahA// ni gnas chos sna bajugs tsaman// 'khod yang byang chub sems su bcugs// byang chub sems kyi 'khor rnams la// thos pa myed pa'i don yang hrI ni// grongs myor ngogs sna thugs tsam nA/
11a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor yang byang chub sems dpad khor// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor rnams la// sgra dang ye shes rdzogs byar ston// sna tshogs sbrul srur bzhugs tsaman// 'bor yang rgyud drug sems can 'khor// chung drug sems can 'khor
11a5(rnying rgyud): rnams la// yid bzhin dbang po grang 'thad ston// zhes gsungs so// phun sum tshogs pa'i mdo las/ ston po phun sum tshigs pa bstan pa'o// / de nus sems dpa'i rdo rje rjes/ 'dus pa'i rdzogs la 'khor phun sum
11a6(rnying rgyud): tshigs pa'i rang bzhin 'di bstan to// kye 'dus pa'i tshogs chen nyon cig/ gang la 'du shing 'brel ba dang // dpa 'khor zhes btags pa phyin// dper na srid pa'i chos la yang // 'a khor dang ston pa rang bzhin tshang // nam mkha'
11a7(rnying rgyud): bu'i ston pa la// 'byung chen bzhi dang snang srid 'khor// rang bzhin thos kyis 'brel bas ni// des na snang gri dang por phun tshogs// dper na chos nyid kun bzang po// 'khor dang ston pa rang bzhin tshad// chos nyid rdzogs pa chen po la// brgyad
11b1(rnying rgyud): khribazhi stor theg par 'khor// d+ha dang 'bras bu 'gro bas na// des na thog 'khyod phun su mardzogs// dper na byung chub sems nyid la// 'khong dang ston pa rang bzhin rjod// byang chub sems kyi stong po la// rnam shes pa khor dang lce mched 'khang /
11b2(rnying rgyud): yul dang dbang po 'dus pas na// des na khams dang skye mched 'khor// de 'khor phun sum tshogs pa bzhin// ston pa'i 'khor yang de 'dra ste// ston pa chos kyi sku'i 'byor ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas bzhugs pa dang // khams kyisum rgya
11b3(rnying rgyud): drug sems can de// 'phags pa'i thugs rjes sems can la// 'brel pa phun sum tshogs par bshad// ston pa yongs spyod su'i 'khor ni// mi rtog ter 'dzin bcu stangs pa'i// sa la gnas pa'i byang chub pa// nyon mongs mi
11b4(rnying rgyud): gnas shes bya sbyangs// ye shes tshogs dang thugs rje 'brel// des na phun sum tshogs zhes bya// ston pa sprul pa'i sku'i 'khor na// sku sprul thugs rje drug snang bas// 'khor yang rgyud drug sems can no// lus dang thugs
11b5(rnying rgyud): rjes 'brel pa no// 'khor ni phun sum tshogs zhes bya// ces gsungs so// phun bum tshogs pa'i mdo las/ 'khor phun su ma tshogs pa bstan pa'o// / de nas sems dpa' chen po des/ 'dus pa'i tshogs la bstan pa
11b6(rnying rgyud): phun sum tshogs pa 'di bstan to// kye 'dus pa'i tshogs chend nyon cig/ dus gsum ston pa gang gis kyang // bstan pa'i rang bzhin 'di yin zhes// tshig dang yi ger brjod pa med// ma gsu mi gsung gsung mi 'gyur// khyed kyi rang bzhin
11b7(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'o// ye shes thugs kyi rig pa yis// rang gi rang bzhin ngo bstan te// de mthong bstan pas de 'dus pas// de la de bstan de yang mthong // de ni bstan pa zhes su bshad// rton pa chos kyi sgra yis ni// rang bzhin gzung dzin bral bar bstan// byang chung
12a1(rnying rgyud): na pa nga/ mas rgyu du na / nang na ca ngag sa// kun smras pa ma na
12a2(rnying rgyud): na rlong phyid rdzogs pa yis// yegs yi dang bzhin gyis// d+hu sneng shel la po bzhin// ma sgri rton pa ba // giseMs// gang na dang byed pa/ brnam pa gang mang brnyan// byang
12a3(rnying rgyud): ga sa ma// gyi ma rtog pa gsum dag pa// ga dzi rdo rje 'dzin du bstan// gnyis ka b+ha ba'i ga skyed de// gnyis bu med pa'i rdzi ba 'dod pa// de sno myed pas 'dzin ta// dang du ma len gyi ni// mtshan mi med pa'i gtan
12a4(rnying rgyud): tshogs dang // gzung chen phyag kya bzhigs la nas// rmugs chen bya sdig po bshan// don pa l+h+wa la sri ba rtags tsamaT+Ta// sems da da pa'i rang bahrI d-i pa rgyags ji 'jung // kabad mchags lnga li rnam sbyin na/
12a5(rnying rgyud): byang drug glanas su ngas par ston// lha dang lha min gnas ris su// che ba'i dkyil 'joms par pak+Sha tAM// shes pa mi yi gnas ris su// dbye rjeg cu 'dras sngo snod dbya da // gting ga rgyal por gnas ris pa// rig pa shes pa'i chos kyir bgyung //
12a6(rnying rgyud): saur sna li dgas gnas ris // mchags tshom chos kyang bshad// sdug bsngalang rgyal ba'i gnas ris sa// kyi dran pa'i dzin par rdo// de pa pa mos pa rgya// de rdab rtan pa zin pa mtshogs// de na pa sems dpa
12b1(rnying rgyud): sa// 'dus pan tshogs kyi 'khor rnams la// gnas kyi rang bzhin bstan pa n-i// mas dpa' byadag gis brjod par \u0f7f// snron par+g+hos sbyar ba rnags na mun// nam mkha'i mtha' klas chos kyi dbyings// mtha' drang dbus med gan
12b2(rnying rgyud): kye mchog/ smos med gnas kyis kun tu khyab// ku na bzang chos sgra'i gnas zin no// ston pa longs spyod gnas chen ni// 'og min 'og min gnas 'og min// rin chen gzhal yas bkod pa na// rin chen khang bu brtsegs gnas /
12b3(rnying rgyud): ston pa sprul sra'i gnas chen ni// gyad rtswa'i la mu dang 'gro zug gnas// khams gsum thugs rje rdul pa'i gnas// thugs rje nam mkha'i mtha dAhA matAH// gnas la 'di zhes nges pa med pa bstan// de nas 'dus pa'i tshe sgra rnams kun// dus kyi rang bzhin
12b4(rnying rgyud): bstan to// snga ma gyi mang ltar gsum// khyad par med pa'i don 'di badz+rA na// dus gsumo med de sgrub par gcig/ kun bzang ye shes mcho gzugs la// snga ma mi 'grag rtsi mi 'grib// rnam pa'i khyad par dus gcig tu// ye shes so sor gsal khyab med// skye 'gag
12b5(rnying rgyud): med par khyad par gcig/ dus gsum yod par blta ba ni// mi byang bsgribs pa'i sems can rnanus// sems ni sgrib pabag chags te// med pa'i yul la rnam rtog pas// snga ma 'grags la de mi gnas// phyi ma ma byung sgrib mi mthong // dus
12b6(rnying rgyud): gsum gcig la gsum du mthong // 'dus dang mabyon da ltar zhes// med pa'i yul la rnam rtog pas// tha snyad ming la nges pa med// ces gsungs so// phun sum tshogs pa'i mdo lngas/ brtun pa gnas dus phun sum tshogs pa
12b7(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u'o// / de nas sems dpa' chen po des/ nges pa'i tshogs la phun sum tshogs pa/ nges pa'i mdo don gyi 'grel pa 'di bshad do// skye med rdo rje 'gyur med sems dpa' de// ma bsgribs kun la khyab pas nam
13a1(rnying rgyud): myangal zla// dang byung ye shes gnon po med pas ni// gang dor med pa'i chos nyid kun bzung // bkag pa med pa'i mang b+h+yo/ bag yangs kyis// thams cad 'dra zhing 'byung bya'i dbyings na spyod/
13a2(rnying rgyud): yangs pas thams cad 'du zhing tshogs na spyod// thams cad 'du zhing nga byung ba chos kyi dbyings// rnam dag klod lam chen po der// sangs rgyas sems can khams gsum kun bsgral bas// byang chub sems la dngos po yul mi skye// rang
13a3(rnying rgyud): byang ye shes rel 'gag pa med// lte 'gag/ cir yang ting 'dzin dgongs pa med// ston pa kun bzang bstan pa byang chub sems// rdzogs tshon dag la lhag ma med par bstan// byang chub sems ni kun gyi snying po ste// chos kun lhag mu med
13a4(rnying rgyud): pas yongs su rdzogs// gnyen po med pas gzhan gyi dbang mi 'gyur// 'gyur ba med pa'i rang bzhin drang por gnas// dpe ni nam mkha' bzhin te kun lA kyad // hU~Mn med pas gzhan la ngag ma lus// zhes bstan/ kun bzang rdo rjer yi
13a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'dus pas// gang zhig skye yang rje ba de yis ni// senus nyid sangs rgya sa yin pa go ba'o// rig pa'i yul na sems nyid bde ba che// grang zhig 'di ltar rig cing rtogs pa ni// rnam par dag pa'i 'jig rten yin par bshad// ga
13a6(rnying rgyud): sus reg cing rtogs pa de la ni// chos rnams thams cad rig pa'i 'od 'bus pas// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad b+ha 'og grub pa ni// sdang srid sems can lha dang sems su grub// de la gsungs so// phun sum tshogs pa'i mdo dang
13a7(rnying rgyud): don gyi 'brel pa rdzogs so// / de nas sems dpa' chen po ngas// yongs su 'dus pa'i tshogs la/ rdzogs pa chen po ngon po gang 'dus pa'i phyir / zag 'phyad pa'i mdo dag
13b1(rnying rgyud): kye 'dus pa'i tshogs chen nyon rje/ chos can dag bzhud 'dus te/ yoga'i mam+mA ga dang // / A.a ga bzhig// la yang bzhong nar // rnamA gang dang ga nan// mag la rna lag/
13b2(rnying rgyud): yog 'i me yog drung/ ga'i yan yo / gsas s+ho zhog// maN+Dal yang bzhi rkyeste// many+dzu 'i lkog da // maN+Da loga'i ma / ma n+ta g+ho b+hUd+d+he
13b3(rnying rgyud): bzhi'o// un+d+ra la yang bzhir bye ste// mAr+tha ga'i yo gu dang // a nu yo gra'i mahA dang // swen yo ga'i una? dang // a nu yo ga'i A ti badz+ri'o// a ta~M lA yang brjid bye ste// at+to mo ga'i yo ga dad+ma// a ti lo ga'i maN+Da
13b4(rnying rgyud): dang // a d+hi yogad+h+we a r+tha dang // mA ti yo ga'i A ti bzhi'o// de yang gang gis dbye zhen// yog rnam pa re re laM// ched rnam padz+ra lnga ste// rje ba ti shur bye ba ni// yog bzhi pas rtse ba yin// de yang de myur bstan zhen// sangs
13b5(rnying rgyud): rgyas med pa'i rje ba bzhi// yog bzhi yis pa bzla'o// mngon par sangs rgyas che bzhi ni// yog bzhi yi a tI bzhi// chos dbyings sangs rgyas che bzhi ni// yog bzhi yi a nu bzhi// bdag nyid sangs rgyas che bzhi na// yog bzhi yi ma
13b6(rnying rgyud): ha ba ni// de yin sangs rgyas che brji ni// yog bzhi yi yog bzhi'o// rje ba rnam lnga m+b+hir bstan na// bzhis ni rang khar 'dzin par byed// sangs rgyas med pa'i che bzhin// yog bzhi por lnga bzla ba'o// yo ga bzhi yi bye brag ni// a ti
13b7(rnying rgyud): yoga'i a ti ni// 'dus ma byas kyi chos nyid de// skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// mtshan ma'i yul dang bral ba'o// a ti yo ga'i ar+tha nau// rang bzhin ma bcos chos nyid de// sgrib pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// dbyings dang
14a1(rnying rgyud): yags rang byur ba'o// a ti ga'i mdzag/ 'acwa zhin mchos nyid de// sran la khyab pa'i rang banan TA// thab sgra dang shes rabu dang bad+d+ho// a tI yo ga'i lag na// mA btsal grag pa tshas
14a2(rnying rgyud): nyid de// zab mo rtogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis// yul dang dbang porA rang byung ba'o// A tI yo ga'i la bzlas ni// brjod du med pa'i chos nyid de// glo sgur bral ba'i rang bzhin gyis// bde ba chen por rang byung ba'o// a n+yA yo ga'i a
14a3(rnying rgyud): ti ni// byang chub sems kyi chos nyid de// rgyu rkyen bral ba'i rang bzhin gyis// gsang ba'i ye shes rang byung ba'o// a nu yo ga'i a nu ni// dbyings dang ye shes chos nyid de// thams cad 'byung ba'i rang bzhin gyis// chos kun ye shes rang byung/
14a4(rnying rgyud): ba'o// a nu yo ga'i ma hA ni// thabs dang shes rab chos nyid de// 'du 'bral med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// gnyis med bde ba rang byung ba'o// a nu yo ga'i yo ga ni// sems la rdzogs pa'i chos nyid de// blang dor med pa'i rang bzhin gyis//
14a5(rnying rgyud): lung chen ston par ra dbyung ba'o// a nu yo gA'i la bzlas ni// 'du 'bral med pa'i chos nyid de// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang bzhin gyis// chos nyid zab mo rang byung ba'o// ma hA yo ga'i a ti nI// chags pa med pa'i chos nyid de// gzung
14a6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin bral ba'i rang bzhin gyis// bud bya'i ye shes rang byung ba'o// ma hA yo ga'i a nu ni// dus gsum gcig pa'i chos nyid de// chos sku gcig pa'i rang bzhin gyis// che ba'i bde ba rang byung ba'o// ma hA yo ga'i ma hA ni/
14a7(rnying rgyud): blang dor med pa'i chos nyid de// mi g.yo mi bskyod rang bzhin gyis// mnyam pa'i bde bar nga byung ba'o// ma hA yo ga'i yog ni// gcig tu 'das pa'i chos nyid de// ma byung ma skyes rang bzhin gyis// blo srung bral bar rang bya
14b1(rnying rgyud): pa'o// ma d+hu yo ga'i la bzlas ni// srid gsum sangs rgyas chos nyid de// sgyu mar sdang pa'i chos nyid kyis// chos nyid dag tu dang byung ba'o// yo ga'i a ti yog ni// mtshan ma med pa'i chos nyid de// mtshan ma med pa'i rang bzhin
14b2(rnying rgyud): gyis// ni zlog 'bras bu rang byung ba'o// yo g+na'i ana? yog ni// yongs sna rdzogs pa'i chos nyid de// lhun gyis grub pa'i chos nyid kyis// bud chen chos nyi du dang byur ba'o// yo ga'i mahA yo gA ni// rlud du byung ba'i chos nyid de// nam
14b3(rnying rgyud): mkha' lta bu'i cho snga nyid kyis// rmad byung rol pa'i rang byung ba'o// yog nyid kyi yog ni// kun kyang sangs rgyas chos nyid de// snying po gcig pa'i rang bzhin gyis// rnam par dag par drang byung bya'o// yo ga bzhi yi la bzlas pa// rtsol
14b4(rnying rgyud): dang bral ba'i chos nyid de// bsrub tu med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// sgyu ma lhun grub rang byung ba'o// zhes gsungs so// bye brag 'byed pa'i mdo las/ yog rnam pa bzhi bye brag tu 'byed pa'i le'u'o// / de nas yang sems
14b5(rnying rgyud): dpa' chen po de yis/ 'dus pa'i tshogs la yog rnam pa bzhi'i don mdo'i 'grel pa 'di gsungs so// kye 'dus pa'i tshogs che nad nyon cig/ yang ni yo ga rnam pa bzhi po las// rdzogs chen a ti yog la// don gyi 'grel pa 'di gsungs
14b6(rnying rgyud): so// rdzogs chen a ti yo ga'i chos 'dri ni// ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i chos nyid de// gzhan la rag ma las pa'i byang chub sems// dngos po mtshan ma gar yang mtshungs med pa'i// rgyu rkyen bral ba'i rang byur ye shes kyis// mngon du gyur pa'i
14b7(rnying rgyud): mthu yin rig pa las// ngade chen chos ni gzhan nas 'byur mi 'gyur// zhes bstan/ rdzogs pa a nu yo ga'i chos nyid na// rdo rje skye med 'byung ba'i chos nyid de// nam mkha'i rtog pa sprin dang khu rlangs 'dra// rtog pa de la mtshan ma rtse mod cing //
15a1(rnying rgyud): sems rtog mtshan ma med pa de nyid ni// dus gsum rtog pa sku gsum nam mkha' 'dra// 'dod yon lnga la mi chags nam mkhar bsgo// nam mkhang chags med lta bur bsngo ba'o// chos nyid nam mkha' lta bur kun bsam
15a2(rnying rgyud): na// rang don nam mkha' lta bur 'byung bar des// zhes bya/ bskyed pa ma hA yo ga'i chos nyid ni// sems kyi dkyil na rnam shes 'khor gyis bskor// lha yi sgra yi khro gnyer cha lugs bzhin// thams cad 'joms pa'i khro bo chen po yis// gtso
15a3(rnying rgyud): bor khro bdag ci 'drar lus bsgom te// yang nas yang du bsgoms pas mngon gyur nas// bag chags brtas pa'i yi ge mngon gyur nas// ma bcos pa yi chos nyid zhi ba de// dbang po'i mngon sum dag gis mthong ba min// zhes so// yo ga phyi ba'i
15a4(rnying rgyud): chos nyid bstan pa ni// byang chub bsgrub pa'i yan lag bcu gcig dgus// kun gyi sgo nas zhugs nas bsgom pa yang // sku mdog phyag mtshan phyag rgya rdzogs pa ru// sku yi cha lugs yid la ting 'dzin bsgom// chu zla bzhin du gsal ba yis//
15a5(rnying rgyud): gzung 'dzin mtshan ma dag gis tshur ma gos// ye shes sems dpa' dag la bdag ma chags// chags pa med pa ci ltar 'byung 'gyur yang // dper na byis pas 'dag khang brtsegs pa bzhin// yang bsgom yang bshig 'dag khang bshig
15a6(rnying rgyud): pa 'dra// zhes gsungs so// bye brag 'byed pa'i mdo las/ yo ga rnam pa bzhi'i don gyi 'grel pa bye brag 'byed pa'i mdo rdzogs so// // de nas yang sems dpa' chen po des/ 'dus pa'i tshogs la khyad par 'phags
15a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i mdo 'di bstan to// kye 'dus pa'i tshogs chen de nyon cig/ khyad par 'phags pa'i don 'di las// khyad par 'phags pa'i tshe lnga ru// chos rnams thams cad 'dus par bshad// khyad par 'phags pa'i tshe lnga ni// mngon
15b1(rnying rgyud): par sangs rgyas che ba dang // chos dbyings sangs rgyas che ba dang // bdag nyid sangs rgyas chab dang // de yin sangs rgyas che ba dang // thams cad sangs rgyas cha ba'o// de yang ji ltar 'phags zhan// chab lnga la byang chub sems// sems
15b2(rnying rgyud): sa 'phrugs// / mdadapa // 'du byas pa'i zung gra sems/ yang byedag na sa byed par zhugs par babyu ngas / A du
15b3(rnying rgyud): sems// 'byung gnas kun las khyad par 'phags// A nu yo ga'i che bar bshad// bdag nyid sangs rgyas che ba ni// lhun gyis grub pa'i byang chub sems// rtsol zhing bsgrub las khyad par 'phags// ma hA yo ga'i che bar bshad// de yin
15b4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas che ba ni// ma nor ba yi byang chub sems// gtan tshigs kun las khyad par 'phags// yo ga dag gis che bar bshad// thams cad sangs rgyas che ba ni// sgo skur 'das pa'i byang chub sems// bsam skyod kun las khyad par
15b5(rnying rgyud): 'phags// la zlos pa yi che bar bshad// khyad par 'phags pa rnam pa lnga// che ba rnam pa lnga bstan te// ston pa bstan pa 'khor gnas dus// phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa lngas// skye 'gag med pa'i khyad par gyis// snang srid kun las
15b6(rnying rgyud): khyad par 'phags// mngon par sangs rgyas yin+da par bshad// byang chub sems pa'i 'byung chen lnga// nam mkha' sa chu me rlung sems// thams cad 'byung ba'i rang bzhin gyis// 'byung gnas kun las khyad par 'phags// chos dbyings sangs
15b7(rnying rgyud): rgyas yin par bshad// bdag nyid sangs rgyas che ba ni// phung po 'byung ba'i rnam shes yul// deng las byung ba'i chos yin te// gzhan la mi ltos rang bzhin gyis// rtsol bcu bkun las khyad par 'phags// bdag nyid sangs rgyas che bar bshad//
16a1(rnying rgyud): de yin sangs rgyas che ba ni// dpe dang don dang rtags dang na// nges pa dang na gtan chags lngas// mnar pa yi rang bzhin gyis// gtan tshigs kun las khyad par 'phags// de yin sangs rgyas che bar bshad/
16a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad sangs rgyas che ba ni// 'dus ma byas dang dmigs su med// bsam du med dang spos dang bral// mtshon du med pa'i byang chub sems// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang bzhin gyis// bsam skrod kun las khyad par 'phag pa// thams
16a3(rnying rgyud): cad sangs rgyas che bar bshad// mngon par sangs rgyas che ba ni// phun sum tshogs pa rnam lta ste// ston pa kun tu bzang po ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyi mes po// glang dor med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// ston pa kun las khyad par 'phags// des
16a4(rnying rgyud): na mngon par che bar bshad// sdud pa sems dpa' chen po ni// sangs rgyas sems can 'khor rnams la// skye 'jig med pas khyad par 'khor// sdud pa kun las khyad par 'phags// 'khor de mngon par che bar bshad// bstan pa blta ba
16a5(rnying rgyud): chen 'di// chos nyid kun gyi snying po ste// thams cad kun gyi rang bzhin gyis// theg pa kun las khyad par 'phags// des na bstan pa mngon par che// dus ni dus gsum khyad par gcig/ dus la skye 'jig med pas na// gcig tu gsa'i
16a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i rang bzhin gyis// snga phyi kun las khyad par 'phags// dus de mngon par che ba bshad// yangs pa chos dbyings kun gzang gnas// thams cad 'dus pa'i gnas chen de// mtha' dbus med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// bzhug
16a7(rnying rgyud): gnas kun las khyad par 'phags// gnas de mngon par che ba bshad// des na phun sum tshogs pa lngas// mngon par sangs rgyas che bar bshad// chos dbyings sangs rgyas che ba ni// byang chub sems lnga 'brang ba chen po lnga// chos
16b1(rnying rgyud): nyid lnga ru sangs rgyas te// nam mkha' snang byed khyab pa'i dbyings// ma bsgribs pa yi byang chub sems// sgrib pa med pa'i khyad par gyis// kun la khyab pa'i bdag nyid do// sa nis byed rdo rje dbyar// skyes med pa'i byang chub sems// 'jig
16b2(rnying rgyud): pa med pa'i khyad par gyis// 'gyur ba med pa'i chos nyid do// chu ni rin chen gter gyi dbyings// thams cad sdum pa'i byang chub sems// thams cad sdud pa'i khyad par gyis// 'byed par byed pa'i chos nyid do// me ni rnam dag pad+ma'i dbyings/
16b3(rnying rgyud): gzung 'dzin dag pa'i byang chub sems// rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin gyis// skyon dang bral ba'i chos nyid do// rlung ni brtson 'grus yangs pa'i dbyings// thogs pa med pa'i byang chub sems// yang zhing g.yo ba'i khyad par gyis// 'gag
16b4(rnying rgyud): pa med pa'i chos nyid do// sa chu me rlung nam mkha' lngas// thams cad sbed par byed pas na// 'byung gnas kun las khyad par 'phags// des na chos dbyings che bar bstan// bdag nyid sangs rgyas tsha ba ni// bdag nyid lnga ru shes par
16b5(rnying rgyud): bya// phung po 'byung ba rnam shes yul// rang las 'byung ba'i chos yin te// rtsol bsgrub 'das te rang la rdzogs// 'byung ba lnga yi sangs rgyas ni// chos nyid rang gi byang chub sems// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i khyad par gyis// btsal
16b6(rnying rgyud): du med pa'i bdag nyid che// glang po lnga ni rigs lnga ru// rtsogs sgrub 'dras te rang la rdzogs// lhun gyis grub pa'i khyad kar gyis// btsal du med pa'i bdag nyid che// rnam shes brgyad ni sems dpa' ru// rtsol ba srub 'das te rang la
16b7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// sems su 'dus pa dam pa ste// btsal du med pa'i khyad par gyis// bsgrub tu med pas bdag nyid che// rnam shes brgyad kyi yul brgyad ni// sems ma brgyad du rang la rdzogs// rtog dang bral ba'i khyan par gyis// srung du
17a1(rnying rgyud): med pas bdag nyid che// rang las byung ba'i chos rnams ni// dmigs pa med pa'i byang chub sems// mi dmigs pa yis khyad par gyis// bgrod du med pa'i bdag nyid che// des na bdag nyid che bar bshad
17a2(rnying rgyud): de yin sangs rgyas che ba ni// dpe dang don dang rtags dang ni// nges pa dang ni gtan tshigs lnga// khyad par lnga yi yin pa lta'o// chos rnams thams cad ma lus pa'i// dpe ni nam mkha' yin pa ste// nam mkha' spyod yul
17a3(rnying rgyud): kun las 'das// mtshon du med pa'i khyad par gyis// nam mkha'i dpe ni khyad par che// don ni chos nyid yin pa ste// chos nyid don ni skye med las// skye ba'i cho 'phrul sangs rgyas kyi// don ni chos nyid de yin te// rtags ni sems nyid
17a4(rnying rgyud): 'gag med yin// 'gag pa med pa'i byang chub sems// mi 'gag pa yis khyad par gyis// rtags ni che ba yin par bshad// nges pa dag la rnam pa gsum// dpe ni nam mkha' yin par nges// don ni chos nyid yin par
17a5(rnying rgyud): nges// rtags ni sems nyid yin par nges// nges pa dag gis che bar bshad// gtan tshigs dag gis che ba ni// rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya// phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa lnga// mngon par che ba'i gtan tshigs so// 'byung chen lnga
17a6(rnying rgyud): dang byang chub sems// chos nyid che ba'i gtan tshigs so// phung po 'gyur ba rnam shes yul// gzhan la rag ma las pa yin// bdag nyid che ba'i gtan tshigs so// dpe don rtags dang nges pa ni// yin pa dag gis gtan tshigs so// bsam
17a7(rnying rgyud): med dmigs med spros pa med// 'dus ma byas pas mtshon med pas// thams cad sangs rgyas gtan tshigs so// gtan tshigs che ba yin par bshad// thams cad sangs rgyas che ba yang // bsam med dmigs med spros pa med// mtshon du
17b1(rnying rgyud): ma dang 'dus pa med// rnam pa lnga du shes par bya// chos nyid byang chub sams del// gzung 'dzin med pas bsam med// bsam med khyad par daphagasan d+ha// tsham nyid byang chub sems dub// yul ma mchis pas dmyigs su med/
17b2(rnying rgyud): dmigs med khyad par 'phags te mchi// chos nyid byang chub sems de la// mtshan ma med pas spros pa med// spos med khyad par 'phags te che// chos nyid byang chub sems de la// dpe ma mchis pas mtshon du med// mtshon med khyad par
17b3(rnying rgyud): 'phags te che// chos nyid byang chub sems de la// gnyis su med pas 'dus byas myed// 'dus med khyad par 'phags te mchi// thams cad sangs rgyas che bar bshad// ces gsungs so// khyad par 'phags pa'i mdo las/ khyad par
17b4(rnying rgyud): 'phags pa'i che ba lnga bstan pa'i mad do// / de nas yang 'dus pa'i tshogs la/ ldad par du 'phags pa'i mdo'i 'grel pa 'di bsan te// kye 'dus pa'i tshogs chen da nyon cig/ rdo rje sems dpa' mngon par sangs rgyas
17b5(rnying rgyud): sems kyis kun la khyab pas byams pa'i sa// chos nyid skye ba med par sbyangs pa'i phyir// thugs rje'i rang bzhin chos nyid ston pa'i bka'// 'gro la dmigs nas thugs rjes don mi mdzad// rang byung ye shes gnyen po med pas tshe// che ba'i
17b6(rnying rgyud): zab mo gzung 'dzin bral bas zab// zab mo dmigs su med pa de la ni// skyon la der du med la yon tan bsngags su med// ces bya/ rdo rje sems dpa' chos nyid byang chub sems// byang chub sems kyi sku gsung zhugs// snying po byang chub
17b7(rnying rgyud): sems kyi lam las byung // dus gsum sangs rgyas khams gsum sems can kun// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la kun spyod kyang // sangs rgyas sku dang ye shes lnga ru spyod// sems can chags sngar lnga la rang khang spyod// chos nyid
18a1(rnying rgyud): dbyings kyi rgyud ni 'dod yon lnga// byang chub sems kyi rgyan du sems dpas gsungs// des na chos nyid dbyings kyi cha bar bshad// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin bdag nyid rje// sangs rgyas sems can mtharas
18a2(rnying rgyud): ngan song gang // gang gi las dang gang gi gnas skyes nas// chud drug 'khor zhing las drug smod pa ni// bdag nyid byang chub sems las 'byung bar nges// kun gyi snying po byang chub sems 'di la// 'di ni skyes pa yin la 'di na bud med ces
18a3(rnying rgyud): kun byed mnyam pa'i rgyal pos yongs ma gsungs// des na bdag nyid chen po yin par bshad// byang chub sems 'di yin pa'i che ba ste// blo slar 'das pa'i chos nyid byang chub sems// brjod med gleng bral 'di la gnas pa las//
18a4(rnying rgyud): bcos chos nyid rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor de// las dang thugs rje 'dus pas skal ba bzang // gleng bral brjod med don la gnas pa yis// skye ba med pas bdag don bya mi dgos// brjod du med pas gzhan don me byed cing // chos nyid sgyu ma ma
18a5(rnying rgyud): btsal lhan grub pas// rang bzhin gnas pa'i chos nyid yul la rol// des na de yin che ba'i gtan tshigs so// sangs rgyas zhes bya med pa'i che ba ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas khams gsum sems can la// ma bstan mchog tu gsar ba
18a6(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems// bde gshegs ye shes snyan gyis sngar ma gsan// sems cad rna ba'i dbang pos sngar mthos// de bzhin ston pa'i ljags kyi dbang pos kyang // bder gshegs rnams la gsung gis bsgrags pa med// de bzhin gang zag rtse mi
18a7(rnying rgyud): dbang pos kyang / sems can rnams la tshig tu brjod pa med// des na sangs rgyas med pa'i che bar bshad// ces gsungs so// khyad par 'phags pa'i mdo las/ don gyi 'brel pa bstan pa ste khyad par 'phags pa'i mdo rdzogs so//
18b1(rnying rgyud): denas yang sems dpa' bya pa nas// 'dus pa'i labar chags rnams kyis/ gas pa can par dan mthas pa rnams kyis rgyan yon pas la da gyur ba bskrad par ma dang gsungs// 'dras pa rdzogs can tan cig dang /
18b2(rnying rgyud): bathob pa'i theg pa drug/ rdzogs pa chen po rnogo las ste// rdzogs chen nges thob sgrib par bshad// mardo lnga dang ni kri yA dang // u pa ya dang yo gdung // maN+Da l-i ga anu d+haka/ rdzogs pa chen po'i golas s+ho// de yang ji ltar ga la zhen// dza
18b3(rnying rgyud): sde byang chub sems dpa' ni// kun tu 'od kyis 'dod pas// bden pa gnyis kyis rtog dpyod pas// chos nyid stong pa nam mkhar rtogs// a ti yo ga'i bde chen ni// rtog dpyod 'das pa'i byang chub sems// rtog dpyod 'das la mdo sdes
18b4(rnying rgyud): bsgribs// rdzogs chen rtog dang dpyod pa ni// mdo sde dag tu gol bar bshad// kri yA rdo rje 'dzin 'dod pa// dag pa rnam gsum sgor zhugs nas// chos nyid dag pa 'dzin pa ste// gzung 'dzin dag pa'i yul la gnas// a ti yo ba'i
18b5(rnying rgyud): bde chen ni// gzung 'dzin 'das pa'i byang chub sems// gzung 'dzin 'das la kri yAs bsgribs// rdzogs chen gzung dang 'dzin byed pa// kri lA dag tu gol bar bshad// u pa ya yi lha spyod ni// kri yA spyod cing yo ga bsgrub// lha sngon
18b6(rnying rgyud): 'brel pa'i don med pas// gnyis su med pa'i don ma rtogs// a ti yi ga'i bad chen ni// gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems// gnyis su mad la u pas bsribs// rdzogs chen gnyis su byed pa ni// u pa la rugol bar bshad// ma
18b7(rnying rgyud): srug po bkod 'dod pas// mtshan ma yod med skor zhugs nas// phyag rgya bzhi la gtsor byed pa// blang dor medal 'jug ma nus// a ti yo ga'i bde chen ni// blang dor med pa'i byang chub sems// blang der med la logs bsgrib ma/
19a1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs chen zlang dang dor byed pa// yog dag tu gol bar bshad// ma hA rdo rje 'chang 'dod pa// ting 'dzin rnam gsum sgor zhugs nas// rang rgyud dag pa'i dkyil 'khor la// bsnyen bsrub rnam bzhis sgrub par
19a2(rnying rgyud): byed// a ti yo ga'i bde chen ni// rtsol bsgrub 'das pa'i byang chub sems// rtsol bsgrub 'das la ma hAs bsgribs// rdzogs chen rtsol sgrub byed pa ni// ma hA lo gar gal bar bshad// a nu dbyar rjod sa 'dod pas// dbyings
19a3(rnying rgyud): dang ye shes sgor zhugs nas// rgyu ni dag pa'i dbyings su blta// 'bras bu ye shes dkyil 'khor blta// a ta phyo ga'i byang chub sems// rgyu 'bras dag pa'i byang chub sems// chu 'bras 'das la A nus bsgribs// rdzogs chen rgyang bras
19a4(rnying rgyud): gnyis blta ni// san mo gang grol bar 'i shed // theg pa dag zhi gal sgrib po// theg pa gcigag lta ba la// go las sgrib pa badz+ra yod de// lha bdag gigol sgrib dang // dang ci ga dag gi gos sgrib dang // byin las dag gi gi la sgri ba dang // ye shes dag gi
19a5(rnying rgyud): ma stsu nga// sna nga pa rnaMm nam ba dang // lam la gnas pa'i gas skye ba dang // bdag ga gol ba dang // rlud phyogs bsnyi pa dang // grang ga ga lasab pa dang // san dag galas bya bam/ bang gang dang gang zhan/
19a6(rnying rgyud): blta bdag gi rang bzhin ni// bsgom du med de sangs rgyas blta// bsgom med sangs rgyas marigs// stabadag gi sa slob par bshed// ye nas sangs rgyas yin pa la// sangs rgyas yin par mi blta s+ho// bsgoms nas sangs rgyas
19a7(rnying rgyud): bani// rta bdag gi golas man// dam tshig dag ni srung byed// brgyad du med pa'i mchogabasrung du med par marig na// dam chog sgrib pa yin par bshad// bsrung du med pa'i dam tshig la// bsrung dum
19b1(rnying rgyud): par ma shus na// phyogs mtshams dam chog bsrung ba na// dam chogag pas yin par bshad// phrin las rang bzhin bca'aja med pa la// rtsol bsgrub 'das pa'i na las la// bcang dru dang ma rigam// srin las sgrib pa pa na ra bshad//
19b2(rnying rgyud): btsal du med pa'i rang bzhin la// btsal du med par ma rtogs te// zin las rtsol bar byed pa na// phrin las gol sa yin par bshad// ye shes dog gi rang bzhin ni// ye nas sgrib pa med par gsal// ye nas sgrib pa med pal// sgrib pa med par
19b3(rnying rgyud): ma rig na// ye shes dag gi sgrib par bshad// sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes la// sgrib pa med par ma rtogs te// mi bskyod gsal bar ma shes na// ye shes chen po gol sang bshad// sa dang pha rol rang bzhin ni// sbyangs shing bgrod du med
19b4(rnying rgyud): na// yang bathang byu ga// la sgru nga sha// snang ba bad me dgosas pam mo// sbyang sa ba pyo sa togs te// sbyangs shing rjod par snang bani// sang+yas ga sa shad// rbab dgag rang
19b5(rnying rgyud): gzung 'dzin bral ba'i chos nyid yin// gzung 'dzin bral bar ma rig na// phra ba dag gi sgrib par bshad// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i phra ba la// gzung 'dzin bral bar ma rig ste// pha ba rdul du yod blta na// phra ba'i gol sa yin par bshad//
19b6(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin bstan pa ni/ gnyis su med par 'brel// gnyis med 'brel par ma rig na// rgyud kyi sgrib pa yin par bshad// gnyis su med pa'i 'brel pa la// gnyis med 'brel par ma rtogs te// sems chos gnyis su mthong ba che//
19b7(rnying rgyud): rgyud kye gol sa yin par bshad// lung gi rang bzhin bstan pa ni// gtan la 'bebs shing nges par bstan// gtan la 'bebs par ma shes na// lung gi sgrib pa yin par bshad// gtan la 'bebs pa'i lung de la// thog tu 'bebs
20a1(rnying rgyud): par ma rtogs te// gtan la ma babs zer ba ni// lung shi ga las yin par bshad// man ngag rang bzhin bstan pa na// smos pa med par la bzla' ba'o// smras pa med par ma rig na// man ngag pa ni spang bar
20a2(rnying rgyud): bshad// sgo skar bral ba'i man drag la// glos pa med par ma rtogs te// sgo sbar yod par 'dogs pa ni// man ngag dag gi gol sar bshad// kro las sgrib pa sum cu // yog bzhi yi rang bzhin la// gong 'og blta pa'i khyad
20a3(rnying rgyud): kyis// gol rlob sum cu byung ba yin// sgrib pa sgrib pa zhes bya ba// rig shes bya ba'i yul de la// ma rig ma shes ma rtogs pas// sgrib pa sgrib pa zhes su bshad// go la sa go lu sa zhes bya ba// dper na don yod la mkhrugs
20a4(rnying rgyud): sa// shar gyi don yod nub la ma sbyin// zung phyin shar gyi don ming 'grub// spros pa med pa'i don bskor bas// mtshan ma dag gi lam la bgrod// sgo srur bral ba'i chos nyid la// tshig dngu y-i go brjod pas grol// brjod yod rtag
20a5(rnying rgyud): sgrib pa yin// snang ba dang ni srid pa'i rjes// snang srid rgyan drug dbang po la// sems 'thad yAn rim pa dgu// pri mthun blta spyod so sor bshad// des n+ya go las sgrib pa byung // chos nyid ji bzhin byang chub sems// byang chub
20a6(rnying rgyud): sems kyi theg pa 'i// gcig dang gnyis su 'greng du med// bgrangs na mtha' yas brjod me langs// thig gcig byang chung stor po la// bzang ngan blang dor ma mchis pas// gol sra sgrib pa dbyer ma mchis// bde dang sdug bsnga
20a7(rnying rgyud): dbyir ma mchis// rdza srung bral ba'i snying pos mas// gol spring nyid ni byang chub phung // thams cad lung ni byang chub sems// sems kyi lung la thams cad bstan// sems kyi rang bzhin rnam bzhi po// rnal 'byor rnam pa bzhir ban/
20b1(rnying rgyud): te// sems nyid rdzogs pa chen po ni// shin tu rnal 'byor don du bstan// sems nyid rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin ni// yongs su rnal 'byor don du bstan// sems nyid bskyed pa'i rngam pa ni// rnal 'byor chen po'i don du bstan// sems nyid kyi
20b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i rnam pa de// sems pa'i rnal 'byor don du bstan// rnal 'byor rnam bzhi'i don de la// gcig la'ang gol sgrib bcu yod de// blta ba dang ni dam tshig dang // phrin las dang ni ye shes dang // sa dang lam gyi rim pa dang // phra ba dang ni chud
20b3(rnying rgyud): dang ni// lung dang man ngag rnam pa badz+ra'o// da lta yang badz+ra bcu pA// gol sa sleb pa gnyis yod pas+ya// galas bcwa phrag bzhi bstan la// sleb pa bcu tshan rnam pa gsum// rdzogs chen shin turnapa 'byor la// sgrib pa yod par ngas ma
20b4(rnying rgyud): gsungs// rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum po la// go las sgrib pa gnyis gnyis yod// des na blta ba'i gol sgrib ni// bdun cu tham par bgrang bar bya// rdzogs chen shin tu rnal 'bor la// sgrib pa dag gis yongs ma gos// rnal 'byor rnam pa
20b5(rnying rgyud): drug po yis// sems nyid rdzogs chen skor bltas pas// sgrib pa dang ni golas byung // ston pa'i lung la go la sgrib med// gang zag blol gol sgrib byung // sems kyi rang bzhin 'di lta ste// lung chen rnam pa bcur snang ste// rdzogs chen shinatu
20b6(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor gyi// lta ba bsgom du med pa yin// dam tshig bsrung du med pa yin// phrin las btsal du med pa yin// ye shes sgrib pa med pa yin// sa la sbrang du med pa yin// lam la bgrod du med pa yin// phra ba gzung 'dzin bral ba yin//
20b7(rnying rgyud): rgyud kyi rang bzhin 'brel pa yin// lung gi rang bzhin thog tu 'bebs// man ngag dag gis la yang bzla'o// rdzogs chen shin tu rnal 'byor gyi// rang bzhin bcu ni de ltar ro// rdzogs pa yongs su rnal 'byor gyis// rang bzhin bcu bcu 'di lta ste/
21a1(rnying rgyud): rgyu ni dag pa'i dbyings la bAlta// 'bras bu ye shes dkyil lakhor blta// dam tshig dgra gi rang bzhin te/ yub snying rje skra gsung thugs// sbyor ba rnam pa bzhi ru bskrun// phrin las dag gi rang bzhin ni// zhi rgyas
21a2(rnying rgyud): dbang dang mngon spyod bzhi// ye shes dag gi rang bzhin ni// gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin yin// sa yi rang bzhin bstan pa ni// kun bzad dbye ba med pa'i sa// lam gyi rang bzhin bstan pa ni// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med lam//
21a3(rnying rgyud): phra ba drug gyi rang bzhin ni// snang la rang bzhin med pa yin// 'brel pa byad kyi rang bzhin de// rgya dang 'bras bu gnyis med 'brel// lung gi rang bzhin bstan pa ni// dbyings ni rgyu yi lung yin pas// ye shes 'bras bu'i lung du bstan
21a4(rnying rgyud): mni ngag ngag gi rang bzhin ni// rgyu ni dbyings su dag par bzlas// 'bras bu ye shes la yang bzlas// rnal 'byor chen po bskyed pa yi// rang bzhin bcu ni 'di lta ste// lta ba dag gi rang bzhin na// rang kyang dag pa'i ngo bo de
21a5(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid chen po'i dkyil 'khor lha// dam tshig dag gi rang bzhin ni// rtsa ba gsum dang yan lag lnga// phrin las ngag gi rang bzhin ni// tan dang ni dz+nyA na dang // dam rdzas lnga la spyod par byed// ye shes dag gi rang bzhon ni// dug lnga
21a6(rnying rgyud): gnas dag ye shes lnga// sa yi rang bzhin bstan pa ni// lus dang ngag dang yid dang gsum// sku gsum rdo rje 'chang gis// lam gyi rang bzhin bstan pa ni// thabs dang shes rab la ma bsgom dang // ting 'dzin rnamagasum sku gsum lam//
21a7(rnying rgyud): pa chos kyi rang bzhin ni// thabs dang shes rab ma skyes pas// skye ba med pa'i phra bar bshad// 'grol ba'i rang bzhin bstan pa ni// yang yum thags dang shes rab gnyis// bdag nyid chen po'i gzus kyis 'brel//
21b1(rnying rgyud): gabs pa'o// phung ba sa dang 'byung ba// khams dang blam tha dpa pas cas rnams// bdag tad can pa pa ra drubs// slob 'i ba dngas na// spang zhing srid pa'i sa rnams na// bdag yon gzhan tu ga ma lus// ma dang /
21b2(rnying rgyud): mchis la bzla'a'o// yA na sems dpa'i rnal 'byor gyis// rang bzhin bcu ni 'di lta ste// lta ba dag gi rang bzhin ni// byin rlabs dag las byung ba yin// chos la mtshan ma med par blta// rlung dang 'dra ba'i lha nyid do// dam
21b3(rnying rgyud): tshegA dag gi rang bzhin ni// rtsa ba bdun dang dge sdig bcu// spang zhing dang du blang bar byed// phrin las dag gi rang bzhin ni// sems dang ting 'dzin las la spyod// ye shes dag gi rang bzhin no// rigs chen dag gi ye shes pa/
21b4(rnying rgyud): sa yi rang bzhin bstan pa ni// chos dbyings stug po bkod pa yin// bgrod pa lam gyi rang bzhin ni// mtshan ma med pa'i lam du 'jug/ phra ba chos kyi zab mo ni// mtshan ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings// 'brel pa rgyad
21b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin ni// yul dang dbang po gnyis su 'brel// lung chen thog tu 'bebs pa ni// chags pa med par thog tu 'bebs// man ngag dag gi la zla ba// chu zla lta bu'i rang bzhin du// gzung du med par la bzla' ba'o// yang na gnyis
21b6(rnying rgyud): 'di la// rang bzhin bcwa ni 'di lta ste// lta ba dag gi rang bzhin ni// dmigs pa dag gi ting 'dzin gyis// rang bzhin chos la lhar byas nas// lha dpon bdag g.yog lci bar byed// dam tshig dag gi rang bzhin ni// rtsa ba bdu
21b7(rnying rgyud): yan lag ste// nyams pa med par srung bar byed// phrin las dag gi rang bzhin ni// las su lus dang bzod pa byed// ye shes dag gi rang bzhin ni// rigs bzhi phyag rgya bzhi du gsal// sa yi rang bzhin bstan pa ni// lta spyong
22a1(rnying rgyud): sar sdud pa las// dbazad lams rang bzhin no// dgu pa gsum gyis las la bzod// zab cas kyi da 'dzin// rnam par mnyan stang byas pa// 'brel brgyad kyi rang bzhin na// gnyis ka byed kyis 'gyes pa/
22a2(rnying rgyud): las// gnyis su med par 'brel pa med// thog tu 'bebs pa'i lung chen ni// nges pa med par bstan pa yin// ya bza' ba yi man ngag ni// 'di spyod nges pa ma mchis pas// sems dpa'ang yis lung ma bstan// bya ba kri yA yA
22a3(rnying rgyud): nache// rang bzhin bcu ni 'di lta ste// lta ba dag gi rang bzhin ni// rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin gyis// dmigs gsum yan lag bzhi blta ste// rje dang khol du lta bar byed// dam tshig dag gi rang bzhin re// rdzab lnga dang yan lag
22a4(rnying rgyud): drug/ mi nyams bsrung ba'i dam tshig go// phrin las dag gi rang bzhin ni// dus su khrus dang gtsang sbra spyod// ye shes rang bzhin bstan pa ni// so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin ni// rigs gsum so sor 'byed par byed// sa yi rang bzhin
22a5(rnying rgyud): rnam par mi rtog pa// gzung 'dzin shin tu phra bar blta// 'brel pa chud kyi rang bzhin ni// yan lag bcwa gcig rim par 'brel// lung chen thog tu 'bebs pa ni// ting 'dzin gzung 'dzin byed pa yis// thog tu 'bebs pa ngas ma
22a6(rnying rgyud): bstan// la slob yi man ngag ni// chos dang gzung 'dzin pa phyed pas// ting 'dzin rtog pas la yang zlos// mtshan nyid byang chub sems dpa' yi// rang bzhin bcu ni 'di lta ste// lta ba'i rang bzhin bsan pa ni// bden pa gnyis kyi rtog dpyod
22b1(rnying rgyud): gyis// chos kyi rang bzhin stong par blta// dam tshig rang bzhin sdom pa ste// lhod la 'jug dang sdom pa ni// grangs mtha' yas te cha mtsho 'dra// spyod pa'i phrin las bstan pa ni// pha rol phyin pa brdul spyod// ye shes rang bzhin bstan pa ni// brgyad khri
22b2(rnying rgyud): bzhi stong rnam grangs kyang // thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so// sa yi rang bzhin bstan pa ni// dang po sa dang rim pa bcu// kun tu 'od kyis la gnas// lam gyi rang bzhin nges 'byung ba// tshogs dang sbyor ba mthong ba dang // sa bcu'i bsgom pa
22b3(rnying rgyud): mthar phyin lnga'o// chos kyi rang bzhin phra ba ni// chos sku gzung 'dzin bral bar 'dzin// 'brel pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa ni// las dang thugs rje bden gnyis 'brel// lung chen thog tu 'bebs pa ni// don dam kun rdzob bden pas 'bebs// man ngag/
22b4(rnying rgyud): dag gis la bzla ru// 'bras bu lam gyi sgor ma zhugs// spang gzhi 'geg pa rnal gnyis la// rang bzhin 'di bcu'i ming ma bstan// nges thob ming grags rnam gsum ni// rnal 'byor bzhi yi gol sar bstan// rnal 'byor bzhi yi rim pa la// la
22b5(rnying rgyud): go las grangs mang la// la la sgrib pa grangs mang la// la la go la sgrib grangs su mnyam// yo ga bzhi yi rnal 'byor la// gol sgrib grangs su bstan pa yin// go la sa brgya dang brgyad cul// sgrib pa bcu pa drug tu dbye// rang bzhin bcu yi gol sgrib ni//
22b6(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor bzhi las phye ba ni// nyis brgya bzhi bcu grangs su 'byung // yang na bdun gyis phye ba'i tshe// rang bzhin rnam pa bcu po la// bzhi brgya dang ni bcu tshan gnyis// rang bzhin bcu pa'i ngo bo ni// snying po byang chub sems yin te// yang na bdun gyi
22b7(rnying rgyud): skabs su// rang gi rang bzhin ma shes na// sgrib pa sgrib pa zhes su bshad// rang gi rang bzhin ma shes nas// 'og ma 'og ma yin spyan// go las ko la sa zhes su bshad// rang bzhin bcu yi rang bzhin ni// snying po byang chub sems yin te// snying po
23a1(rnying rgyud): byang chub rang bzhin la// gzhan du bstsu ba'i phra ba med pas// blta ba bsgom du med pa yin// snying po byang chub sems dral// gzung 'dzin med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// dpamag srang du med pa zan//
23a2(rnying rgyud): snying po byang chub sems 'di ni// lhun gyis grub pa'i rang bzhin gyis// phrin las btsal du med pa yin// snying po byang chub sems 'di la// sgrib pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// ye nas rang byung ye shes yin// snying po byang chub
23a3(rnying rgyud): sems 'dril// thams cad 'di la gnas pa'i phyir// sa zhes bya ba spyad du med// snying po byang chub sems 'dri la// gzhan du bgrod du med pa'i phyir// lam la bgrod du med pa yin// snying po byang chub sems 'di ni// yaM nas chos
23a4(rnying rgyud): nyid yin pa'i phyir// phra ba dag gi rang bzhin yin// snying po byang chub sems 'di la// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis snang ba// 'brel pa rgyad kyi rang bzhin yin// rang byung ye shes snying po 'dis// chos kun gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir//
23a5(rnying rgyud): lung gi thog tu 'bebs pa yin// rang byung ye shes snying po 'di// sgo skur kun dang bral ba'i phyir// la zlo ba yi man ngag yin// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin 'di// ye nas rang byung ye shes su// ye nas kun bzang ye shes su// ye nas lce med
23a6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje'i sku// sku tshad 'das pas byang chub sems// 'das pa kun gyi snying po la// rang bzhin ma bcos bcu bgrangs pa// 'grangs pa ma yin ngo bor gcig/ ngo bo gcig la rang bzhin bcu// byang chub sems kyi che bar bgrangs// yon tan
23a7(rnying rgyud): bcu ru snang mod kyi// snying po byang chub sems 'di la// dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// snga rabs 'das pas skar ma bgrangs// da ltar bzhug pas bgrad mi byed// slad kyis byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// sems nyid 'di la 'brang mi byed//
23b1(rnying rgyud): bzang med sems kyi rang bzhin la// gcig sde rnam pa bgrang du med// bgrang du med pa'i snying po la// golas sgrib pa gnyis med de// sems la bgrang du med pa'o// rang bzhin bcu ru bgrangs pa ni// sems kyi cha yi bye brag ste// sems can rdzol snang bas bgrang // sems la gagrangs pas gol
23b2(rnying rgyud): srib 'gyur // bgrar du med la gol srib med// bgrangs te ma shes gol sgrib yin// bgrang yod mthong ba'i gol sgrib yin// sems gcig byang chub snying po la// lta ba'i khyad par dgu bgrangs nor// dam tshig phyogs mtshams bsrungs pas
23b3(rnying rgyud): nyams// phrin las btsal bas grub pa med// ye shes bltas pas yul ma mthong // sa zhes sbyangs pas gnas ma rnyed// bgrod pa'i lam la phyin pa med// phra ba gzung 'dzin chos nyid bral// 'bral ba gcig la gnyis su mthong // lung
23b4(rnying rgyud): chen rgyud las 'byung 'dod pas// de lung nges par yod ma yin// la zla ba yi man ngag 'dir// tshig dang yi ge sgo skur btags// gdags su med la ming btags pas// ming btags yod pa'i sgos byung la// med ces brjod pa skur pa
23b5(rnying rgyud): btab// yod med brjod pas bsgribs shing gol// med ces don la bsgribs pa yin// yod ces gang du brjod pa des// brjod yod tshig dang yi ge re gol// des na sgo skur gol sgrib 'di// yod rtog gang zag blo la snang // rtog 'das te 'dzin
23b6(rnying rgyud): bsam bral la// gol sgrib yod par ngas ma gsungs// zhes gol sgrib bstan pa'i mdo bstan pa'o// // de nas sems dpa' rdo rje des/ 'dus pa'i tshogs la gol sgrib bstan pa'i don gyi 'grel pa 'di gsungs so// kye 'dus pa'i
23b7(rnying rgyud): tshogs chen da nyon cig/ rdzogs pa chen po'i rnal 'byor lam 'di la// sangs rgyas la ma la ko 'ag rim pa med// martogs bgrod pas 'jig rten tshangs pa'i lam// ma btsal lhun gyis grub dang mthun pa med// chos nyid lhun gyis grub la bzod
24a1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur na// nam \u0f7fka ri mtha' la thug pa med pa bzhin// bgrad med lam la bgrod pas thug pa med// des na lam gyog las zhes su bshad// rdzogs pa che nang rtsol bslab las rgal ba// sangs rgyas spyod yul skra dang
24a2(rnying rgyud): shes 'di// btsal bas me rnyed rang byung ye shes yin// dbang ba drug la yul drug yod pa bzhin// sku dang ye shes rang byung rgyu med pas// btsal na po rlabs nam mkhar bsnyeg pa'ang // de yang la ma gyi go la sar ba shad// rdzogs chen phrin las
24a3(rnying rgyud): btsal du med pa la// bla ma gsum mchod 'gro la sbyin gtong ba// de bzhin tshogs gnyis 'dod pa'i bsod nams kyang // ting 'dzin ma chags mi g.yo'i stobs med na// yul la chags shing ting 'dzin g.yo ba yis// mchod sbyin byas na
24a4(rnying rgyud): 'ching ba chen por 'gyur// de yang las kyi gol sa rang yis bshad// tshogs chen lha spyod rgya 'bras 'das pa la// rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung bar ming btags na// dge ba'i rgyu yis 'bras bu mtho ris la// sdig pa'i rgyu yis 'bras bu ngan song du// 'jig
24a5(rnying rgyud): rten 'di las spang bas 'byung ngo zhes// dge ba dang len sdig pa phar 'dor ba// 'obras bu 'byung zer phod pa mchog tu bskyed// de yang lha skyod chu 'bras gol sar bshad// rdzogs chen gzung 'dzin bral ba'i grub la// gzung 'dzin byed pa'i shes
24a6(rnying rgyud): pa de dag gis// byang chub sems ni chos kyi sgo mo la// phra rags sdug bsngal sgo mor ming btags te// sems kyi dben pas lam btsal dgon pa'i gnas// yul dben sems dben phra mo bsgom// rig pa mngon du gyur pas rab brtags na/
24a7(rnying rgyud): phra mo gsum bsgom rnam par rtog gyur bsgom// phra bo chos kyi ko la sa rang yis bshad// rdzogs chen skyon yon bral ba'i bsgom pa de// gzung 'dzin rnam rtog bral ba'i chos nyid la// yon tan bcu yis bsam gtan bsgom pa ni// bsam
24a8(rnying rgyud): phre ba dul kyi yang 'a
24b1(rnying rgyud): gtan brdzu ni sgrib pa bcu yin pas// yon tan bcu po dag la bas ma med do// spros pa med pa'i chos nyid ma bsams shing // gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rig pa ma spangs pas// ston min cen min dag gi chos nyid bzhin// rang gi
24b2(rnying rgyud): rnam rtog de nyid ye shes 'dod// bsam gtan bsgom pa'i gol sa rang yis bshad// yon tan bcu ni sgrib pa bcu yin te// sgrib pa bcu ni gang dang gang zhe na// mi g.yo ba dang gsal ba dang // thim pa dang ni bde ba dang // lhan ne pa dang lhang nge ba//
24b3(rnying rgyud): sems las ye shes skye ba dang // gzhan gyi lta ba khyad gsod dang // rang gi lta ba ngom sbyin dang // mngon par shes dang ldan du re// 'di ni bla med yin zer nas// chog shes 'dzin pa 'di bcu ni// go las sgrib pa yin par bshad// yon
24b4(rnying rgyud): tan brgyad ni gang zhe na// 'gro dang 'dug dang ldang dang nyal// lto spyod lam bzhi nyams pa med/ gnas gcig g.yo ba med pa dang // sangs rgyas spyod pa mngon gyur kyang // de la re ba mi 'jog dang // phyogs bcu'i zhing khams thams cad kun// skyu ru rab zhi
24b5(rnying rgyud): mngon gsal yang // sa gzung 'dzin med pa dang // bdud kyi rgyal pos mi 'jigs dang // lha mo rnams la mchathu dang // yang dag chos lus ma nyams dang // chos nyid dbyings ni mngon rtog kyang // 'dus byas dge rtsa chun mi gcod// yon tan chen po 'di brgyad ni// bsam gtan
24b6(rnying rgyud): gyi ni yon tan no// zhes gol sgrib bstan pa'i ma rdzogs s+ho// / de nas sems dpa' rdo rje'i zhal du 'dus pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis bltas te kun gyis zhus pa/ kye kun bzang rdo rje'i snying po khyod// khyod ni gsung gi seng ge ste// rdzogs chen tshan
24b7(rnying rgyud): 'di ma mthong na// golas sgrib pa skyon yod ces// gsung gi seng ges bstan pa de// 'dus pa nged kyis ma rig pas// gsung gi seng ge khyod kyis ni// nges par gtan la dbab tu gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje des
25a1(rnying rgyud): chos thams cad gtan la dbab pa'i phyir/ gtan la 'bebs pa'i mdo 'di gsungs so// kye 'dus pa'i tshogs chen de nyon cig/ lung gsum man ngag bzhi bdun sdes// nges par gtan la 'bebs pa bshad//
25a2(rnying rgyud): de yang lung gsum gang zhe na// snyan khung brgyad pa'i lung dang gcig/ mngon du phyung ba'i lung dang gnyis// gtan la 'bebs pa'i lung gsum mo// man ngag rnam bzhi gang zhe na// nges pa bzhi yi man ngag dang // mi rigs rigs par
25a3(rnying rgyud): bshad pa gsum// skabs dang phyag rgya'i min ngag gnyis// de nyid lam gyi mni ngag go// snyan khung pa rgyud pa'i lung la yang // rnam pa gnyis su dbye bar bya// 'phags pa'i ye shes snyan khung brgyad// gang zag rna ba'i dbang po brgyad// 'phags
25a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i ye shes snyan brgyad pa// rang bzhin chos nyid gzhal yas su// ston pa kun tu bzang po yis// tshig gi rdo rje de nyid la// chos nyid rang bzhin sems nyid de// sems nyid rdzogs pa chen po'i ltung // rdo rje ye shes sman khung brgyud// /
25a5(rnying rgyud): gang zag rna bar brgyud pa ni// de las sprul pa rabs bdun dang // yang sbrul gang zag thugs kyi sras// 'khor gyi gang zag dbang po la// 'dzam gling rdo rje'i gdan stengs su// sde snod gsum pa'i rim pa drung // gang zag blo la 'thad
25a6(rnying rgyud): phyogs su// 'dul ba'i dbang gis bstan pa yang // de yang nga yis bstan pa yin// gang zag rna ba'i dbang po brgyud// snyan khung bachud pa'i lung 'di la// lo rgyas don zhes bshad pa yin// lo rgyas don pa rnam gsum ste//
25a7(rnying rgyud): phyin gyis rlabs kyis bshad pa dang // rang gi ngo bos bshad pa dang // tshig sdebs legs par bshad pa'o// byin gyis rlabs kyis bshad pa ni// rang bzhin chos kyi gzhal yas na// ston pa kun du bzang po ngas// mtshan ma'i
25b1(rnying rgyud): gsung mi mnga' yang // chos nyid bye ba med pa de// bzang ngan blang dor med pa ru// kun par nyid du khyer brlabs nas// rdo rje sems dpang thugs la brgyad// byin gyis rlabs kyis bshad ces bya// rang sa dngas bya shad par// kye med khyang
25b2(rnying rgyud): pho zar nas// ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' yang // mtshan ma'i sku gsung mi mnga' gyur// chos nyid skye ba med pa de// skye 'jig med pa'i ngo bo dang // rdo rje yi ni ngo bo ru// sprul pa gang zag skal ldan la// rig pa'i 'og min gnas su bshad /
25b3(rnying rgyud): gi ngo bos bshar ces bya// tshig sdebs legs par bshad pa ni// 'dzam gling rgyud drug gnas 'di na// sprul pa'i gang zug skal ldan der// chos nyid skye ba med pa de// spro ba med pa'i tshig brjod pas// skye ba med pa'i don rtags su// rin chen
25b4(rnying rgyud): gser gyi glegs bam la// bai DUr+ya lun ma'i rang nan gyis// tshig dang yi ger bsdebs bris nas// phyi rabras rnams kyi don du bshad// tshig sbrebs logs par bshad ces bya// des na snyan khung brgyud pa'i lung zhes bya// mngon du gyur pa'i
