25b5(rnying rgyud): lung la yang // rnam pa gnyis su dbye bar bya// de yang gang dang gang zhe na// drang ba'i lung dang nges pa'i lung // drang ba'i lung yang gang zhe na// rnam pa bdun du shes par bya// mos spyod bzod thob sar 'dren dang // 'od zer 'phro ba'i
25b6(rnying rgyud): sar 'dren dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sar 'dren dang // stug po chos nyid sar 'dren dang // sku gsung rdo rje'i sar 'dren dang // dbyer med sa ru 'dren pa'i lung // rtsol ba srub 'das par 'dren pa'i lung // rnam pa bdun du shes par bya/
25b7(rnying rgyud): de yi don ni 'di lta ste// mos spyongs ru 'dren lung ni// bden pa bzhi yi lam drangs nas// spang dang 'geg pa'i lung bstan te// bzod thob dang po'i sa ru 'dren// 'od zer 'phro sar 'dren lung ni// sa bcu dag gi lam
26a1(rnying rgyud): drangs nas// pa la byin bcu lung bstan te// rtog 'das bran tu 'dasar 'dren// nga 'dzin par 'dren lung ni// dag pa gsum kyilas drangs nang// yan lag bcu ga drug la mnangs te/
26a2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa'i sa ru 'dren// stug po'i sa ru 'dren lung ni// mtshan ma med pa'i lam drangs nas// phyag rgya bzhi yi lung brtan te// stug po chos nyid sa ru 'dren// sku gsung rdo rjer 'dran lung ni// ting 'dzin rnam gsum lam drangs
26a3(rnying rgyud): nas// rang chud dag par lung bstan te// sku gsung rdo rje'i sa ru 'dren// dbyer med sa du 'dren lung dzi// dbyings dang ye shes lam dang wA te// skad la rang bzhin lung bstan te// dbye ba med pa'i sa ru 'dren// rtsol bsgrub 'das par
26a4(rnying rgyud): 'dren phung ni// dbye ba med pa'i lam drangs nas// ye shes lhun bub lung bstan te// rtsol bsgrub 'das pa'i sa rba 'dren// rim pa dgra yi don brnyan ni// tshig dang yi ge yod bstan pas// drang ba'i lung zhes nga yis bshad// nges pa'i
26a5(rnying rgyud): lung gi don 'di ni// byang chub sems kyi chos nyid la// rdo rje sems dpa' nga yis bshad// yang dag nges pa 'di yin zhes// tshig dang yi shes mtshan du med// sgra dang tha snyad ril las 'das// sgo dang skud pa kun dang bral// kun la 'das
26a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i don 'di la// 'di nyid mtshon du med pas na// nges pa'i lung zhes ming tsam btags// nges par gdags su yod pa min// zhes gsungs so// gtan la 'bems pa'i lung 'di la// bye brag gnyis su dbye bar bya// sems can
26a7(rnying rgyud): dbang por ma dgu la// sems 'thad theg pa rim pa dgu// gtan la 'bebs te bstan pa yang // sems dang chos la dbyerd med de// rnams cad sems su gcig pa'i phyir// dgra yis gtan la 'bebs pa yin// thams cad sems
26b1(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i phyir// sems nyid rdzogs par gtan la 'bebs// sems 'thad theg pa rim pa dgu// gtan la 'bebs pa med pa ni// nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal gnyis// bden pa bzhi yi gtan tshigs kyis// rang las byung ba'i chos nyid la//
26b2(rnying rgyud): spang zhing 'gag pas gtan la 'bebs// rang las byung ba spang 'geg pas// gtan la 'bebs par ma gsungs so// theg chen byang chub sems dpa' ni// bden pa gnyis kyi gtan tshigs kyis// rang las byung ba'i chos nyid ni// mi rtag sdug
26b3(rnying rgyud): bsngal stong bdag med// sbyangs shing bgrod pas gtan la 'bebs// rang las byung ba'i chos spyod pas// gtan la 'bebs par yongs ma gsungs// 'bras bu des thob bya ba ni// dag pa gsum gyi gtan tshigs kyis// rang las byung ba'i
26b4(rnying rgyud): chos nyid ni// gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sogs// spang dang bsrung dang dag pa yis// chos de gtan la 'bebs par byed// rang chos srung bar byed pas na// gtan la 'bebs par yongs ma gsungs// phye ba thub pa'i sems la ni// mtshan
26b5(rnying rgyud): ma med pa'i gtan tshigs kyis// rang las byung ba'i chos nyid 'di// dam rdzas lnga la spang len gyis// sems nyid gtan la 'bebs 'dod pa// rang las byung ba'i chos lnga la// spang len byed pa'i rang bzhin gyis// gtan la 'bebs par
26b6(rnying rgyud): yongs ma gsungs// bskyed pa rnal 'byor chen pos ni// thabs dang shes rab gtan tshigs kyis// rang las byung ba'i chos nyid ni// phung po 'byung ba rnam shes yul// dus rnams kun la sgrub byed pas// rnal 'byor gtan la 'bebs//
26b7(rnying rgyud): phyed pa// rang byung chos la sgrub byed pas// gtan la 'bebs par yongs ma gsungs// rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor chen pos ni// dbyings dang ye shes gtan tshogs kyis// rang la byung ba'i chos nyid ni// sems dang chos dang rig
27a1(rnying rgyud): pa la// rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis 'byed pas// chos de gtan la 'bebs par byed// rang las byung ba'i sems rig la// rgyu dang 'bras bur 'byed pa yis// gtan la 'bebs par yongs ma gsungs// gtan pa
27a2(rnying rgyud): 'bebs par gsungs pa ni// sems nyid rdzogs pa chen po la// ches kun 'dus shing gsal ba yis// thams cad gtan la 'bebs par bstan// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// sems nyid rdzogs pa chen po yis// chos kun yongs su byas pa'i
27a3(rnying rgyud): phyir// gtan la 'bebs pa'i ngo bo de// chos kun gtan la 'bebs par bshad// sems nyid rdzogs pa chen po yis// rang las byung ba'i chos rnams ni// sems nyid gcig gi rang bzhin gyis// sems las gtan la dbab tu med// so sor gtan//
27a4(rnying rgyud): la 'bebs pa ni// ma rtogs theg pa dgu las byung // sems las byung ba'i chos nyid la// sdug bsngal kun 'byung yin zer ba// gtan la 'babs pa'i chos ma yin// sdug bsngal bden pa'i chos nyid la// sems nyid rdzogs pas gtan la
27a5(rnying rgyud): 'bebs// spang zhing 'geg pas yongs ma rtogs// sems las byung ba'i chos nyid la// mi rtag sdug bsngal yin zer bas// mdo sdes gtan ya 'bebs pa min// mi rtag sdug bsngal chos nyid de// 'gyur med bde chen chos nyid du// sems nyid
27a6(rnying rgyud): gas pas gtan la dbab// sems las byung ba'i chos nyid la// mtshan ma gabud 'dzin yin zer bas// kri yAs gtan la 'bebs pa min// 'geg spang dri ro chos nyid de// ye nas dag pa'i chos nyid du// sems la rdzogs par gtan la 'bebs//
27a7(rnying rgyud): sems las byung ba'i chos nyid la// dam rdzas gtsang btsog yin zer bas// yogs gtan la mi phebs te// dam rdzas lnga yi chos nyid de// rang rgyud dag pa'i chos nyid du// sems nyid rdzogs pas gtan la 'bebs// sems las byung ba'i chos
27b1(rnying rgyud): de// phung po 'byung ba rnam shes la// btsal zhing bsrub pa dgos zer ba// mthus gtan la phabs pa min// phung po rnam shes chos nyid de// ma 'gags pa pa ye shes su// sems nyid rdzogs pas gtan la 'babs// sems las zung ba tshas
27b2(rnying rgyud): da ni// sems rig rgyu 'bras yin zer bas// a nus gtan la phebs pa min// dbyings dang ye shes chos nyid de// rtsol ba srub 'das pa'i chos nyid du// sems nyid rdzogs pas gtan la phab// sems nyid rdzogs pa chen po 'dis// thams
27b3(rnying rgyud): cad gtan la 'bebs pa ni// chos kun sems su 'dus pas ni// sems kyi rang bzhin bstan pa yin// sems kyi rang bzhin bstan pa la// chos kun gtan la phab ces bya// gtan la 'bebs pa'i lung gsum bstan to// man ngag bzhi ni/
27b4(rnying rgyud): rnam pa gnyis sa thub kyi// de yang gang dadag pazhin// bzhipa gnyis kyi rnam pa te// nges pa bzhi pa man ga dang // ma rigs rigs par bshad pa gsum// gsus dang byug rgya'i man ngag gnyis// de nyid lam gyi man pags/
27b5(rnying rgyud): pa bzhi yi man ngag kyang // ye shes spang len med par nges// snying rje phyogs ris med par nges// 'byung lnga ye nas sangs rgyas nges// sems la gnyen po med par nges// mi rigs rigs pa rang shad gsum ni// sems las mgyur 'angs
27b6(rnying rgyud): rgyas ni// mi rigs rigs par bshad pa dang // rgyu las mabyung 'bras bu yang // mi rigs rigs par bshad pa dang // chud las ma byung man ngag kyang // mi rigs rigs par bshad pa yin// skabs dang phyag rgya'i man ngag ni// skabs
27b7(rnying rgyud): ni bcu gnyis bdun bstan la// phyag rgya bcu gnyis lnga yis bstan// de nyid lam gyi man ngag ni// chos nyid sems de lus mthong ba// des pa lam gyi man ngag go// rnam gcig man ngag rnam bzhin// ngo bo bzhi ni bstan pa ste// byang
28a1(rnying rgyud): chu sems kyi man ngag dang // sbyor ba med pa'i man ngag dang // dus gsum gtan tshogs man ngag dang // yung chen khungs kyi man ngag pa// ye shes spang ldan med pa na// sems nyid rdzogs pa'i la shes te/ @
28a2(rnying rgyud): rang byur ye shes la// chos la dus gsum sgrib med pas// spang dang len pa mi mnga' ste// rang byung ye shes 'gyur med la// spang dang 'geg pa yongs mi mnga'// sbreng zhing bgrod pa yongs mi mngang // gzung zhing 'dzin pa yong
28a3(rnying rgyud): mnga'// blang zhing dor ba yongs mi mnga'// btsal zhing bsgrub pa yongs mi mda'// rgyu dang 'bras bu yongs mi mnga'i// des na rang phung ye shes la// spang len med par bstan pa yin// yang na rnam pa brgyad pa'o// rang byung ye shes
28a4(rnying rgyud): yod ma yin// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis// theg pa so sor rtogs par byed// des na ye shes grangs su 'byung // grangs kyi ye shes rnam pa ni// shes dang chos shes rjes su shes// ji mi skem pa'i ye shes ni// bden par na
28a5(rnying rgyud): gcig pa la'ang // rnam pa bzhi bzhid dbye ba ni// grangs kyi ye shes bcu drug tu// bden pa bzhi las byung ba yin// des kyang sbar zhing 'geg pas na// spang len med pa'i ye shes min// mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal dang // stong
28a6(rnying rgyud): pa dang ni bdag med pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni// don dang kun rdzob shes pa ste// des kyang spangs shing bskyod dgos pas// sbyang bgrod med pa'i ye shes min// dgra pa gsum gyi ting 'dzin gyis// dri ro spangs shing
28a7(rnying rgyud): rigs gsum rtog/ des kyang gzung 'dzin spangs nas kyang // gzung 'dzin 'das pa'i ye shes min// phyag rgya bzhi 'dzin rig pa yis// rang rgyud dag pa'i chos lnga la// rtog pas blang zhing dor byed pas// glang dor med pa'i ye shes
28b1(rnying rgyud): ngab su nga gos rab kyi nyid pa// sngagasung gsu dang pa dag ga la// rang d+had dag pang sgrub cu pas// rnal bsgrub 'das pang ba shes pan// 'arjings dang banas da la// rda nas dkru dadag pa pa
28b2(rnying rgyud): de yis btsal zhing grub byed pas// rgyang zas 'das pa'i ye shes min// dang hU~M ye shes sge ga cig pa// theg pa grangs kyi pa shes kyis/ bstsal pa bskyed par ma rus // sems nyid rdzogs pa chen
28b3(rnying rgyud): yaM// 'gyur med rang byur ye shes la// ye nas sgrib pa me mdang das// spang len med pa'i ye shes so// des na spang len med par nges// zhes bstan/ snying rje phyogs ris med pa ni// rnam pa gsum du shes par bya/
28b4(rnying rgyud): cir mi mdzad pa'i snying rje dang // kun la khyab parje snying rje dang // phyogs mtshams 'dzin pa'i snying rje'o// gnyis la phyogs ris med pa ste// phyogs mtshams 'dzin la phyogs phod de// de yang gang dang gsuzhan// rnam pa gsum du shes pa
28b5(rnying rgyud): bya// cir yang me mdzad pa yi snying je ni// sems nyid rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems// spos dang bral ba'i rang bzhin gyis// dngos po mtshan ma cir mi mdzad// des na snying rje phyogs res me'o// kun la khyab pa'i snying rje ni// sems nyid rdzogs pa
28b6(rnying rgyud): chub sems// nang da srid pa'i rang bzhin gyis// sangs rgyas sems can kun la khyab// des na snying rje phyogs ris med// phyogs mtshums 'dzin pa'i steng dzini// zag pa brgyad kyi chos nyid de// rgya dang bras bur phyogs mtsha 'dzin/
28b7(rnying rgyud): tsal ba sgrub med par phyogs mtshams 'dzin// lha dang bdag tu phyogs mchoms ston// yul dang dbang por rdzogs ma tshams 'jos/ du dang mthog mam ma la tshams na pa pa me sto ba
29a1(rnying rgyud): par bshad// sems nyid rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems// thams cad rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis// sgying rje phyogs ris med par ngas// zhes bstan+d+ha/ 'byung lnga la nas sangs rgyas na// zab ma lha la sangs rgyas te//
29a2(rnying rgyud): de yang gang dang gang zhe na// sa chu me rlung nam mkha' la// gcig la rang bzhin lngalnga ste// nyi shu rtsa lnga 'byung ba'o// de yang rang bzhin rnam lda ni// sna rabs yi rang bzhin la// ldung pa chu yi rang bzhin yin// yang brlung gi rang bzhin
29a3(rnying rgyud): yin// snyoms pa me yi rang bzhin la// gsal ba nam mkha'i rang bzhin yin// de yang ye nas sangs rgyas te// sa ni skra byed rdo rje'i dbyings// skye 'jig med pa'i sangs rgyas yin// chu ni rin chen gter gyi dbyings// thams cad 'dus
29a4(rnying rgyud): ma du/ / gas
29a5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas so// des na byung chen rnam pa lnga// ye nas sangs rgyas yin pa ru// sems nyid rdzogs pa lung gis bshad// ces bskrun/ sems la gnyen po med ngas ni// rnam pa gu sum gyi gtan tshigs kyis// gnyen po med par bstan pa
29a6(rnying rgyud): yin// de yang gang dang gang zhe na// dpe la gnyen po med pa dang // don la gnyen po med pa dang // rtags la gnyen po med pa'o// dpe la gnyen po med pa ni// nam mkha'i dpe la gnyen po med// don la gnyen po med pa ni// chos nyid don la gnyen
29a7(rnying rgyud): po med// rtags la gnyen po med pa ni// byang chub sems la gnyen po med// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// dpe dang don rtags gsum po la// rgyu dang sa bon ma mchis pas// rkyen dang gnyen po kun dang bral// des na sems nyid rdzogs pa la// gnyen
29b1(rnying rgyud): po med pa zhes bya'o// nges pa bzhi yi mun ngag klo// mi rigs rigs par bshad gsum ni// sems las ma zung sangs rgyas ni// mi rigs rigs par bshad pa yin// rgyu las ma byung 'bras bu yang // mi rigs rigs par bshad pa yan/
29b2(rnying rgyud): lung las ma byung man ngag kyang // mi rigs rigs par bshad pa yin// de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ sems las ma byung sangs rgyas ni// chos nyid mkha' la dbyings nyid klong // sems las ma byung sangs rgyas yin// rgyu las ma byung 'bras bu dang //
29b3(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi 'bras bu ni// rgyu las ma byung 'bras bu yin// lung las ma byung man ngag ni// chos nyid byang chub sems kyi don// sprul pa'i gang zag skal ldan gyis// ji ltar rtogs shing rig pa de// lung las ma byung man ngag yin// mi
29b4(rnying rgyud): rigs rigs pa 'di gsum yang // man ngag dag gi rig pas bshad// mi rigs rigs par bshad pa'o// skabs dang phyag rgya'i man ngag ni// rnam pa gnyis su dbye bar bya// skabs ni bcu pa gnyis dang bdun// phyag rgya bcu gnyis lnga las med/
29b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis ni rtsol zhing sgrub par byed// skabs zhes bya ba'i man ngag ni// sems nyid sogs pa'i snying po de// sgrib med rang byung ye shes la// chos kun dus gsum su la ba sa/ gsum sleb med pas// chos nyid don la 'gag pa med// so so dag gis
29b6(rnying rgyud): go skabs 'byed// des na skabs zhes bstan pa yin// phyag rgya dag gi nges pa ni// sems nyid rdzogs pa'i snying po de// ye nas byang chub sku yin pas// skye ba med cing 'gyur ba med// ye nas ye shes chen po'i sku// 'gyur ba med pa'i rang bzhin la/
29b7(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya zhes ni bstan pa yin// sems nyid rdzogs pa chen po la// ye shes don gyi bye brag ni// skabs dang phyag rgya nyi shu lngas// so so dag gis skabs phye nas// lo ka bzhi yis don phyung ste// che ba lnga yi khyad par gyis// rim pa dgu dang 'jig rten
30a1(rnying rgyud): pa// rang dag gi bdun pa des// nges par gtan la ma khebs pa// 'ong ba da grwa bu'i na bsgyur// ye shes don gyi rje thug dadris// nges byar gtan la 'bebs par byed// de yang ji la bu zhe na// rti
30a2(rnying rgyud): snang ba'i chos rnams kun// ye nas 'dus byas ma yin pas// chos nyid dag tu gnas pa de// chos nyid skabs zhes bstan pa yin// 'dus ma byas pa'i chos nyid de// 'gro ba rnams la rang bzhin gyis// ye nus ma phye gnas pa'i
30a3(rnying rgyud): phyir// rang bzhin gnas pa'i skabs zhes bya// 'dus ma byas pa'i chos nyid de// ma bcos dang la gnas pa yis// sangs rgyas che bathob pa'i phyir// rang bzhin che bskabs kyis bstan// 'dus ma byas pa'i chos nyid de// btsal
30a4(rnying rgyud): ba med par grub pa'i phyir// btsal dang bral ba'i skabs kyis bskrun// 'dus ma byas pa'i chos nyid de// tshi ga drang yi ges brjod med phyir// brjod dang bral ba'i skabs kyis bstad// 'dus ma byas pa'i chos nyid de// skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin
30a5(rnying rgyud): gyis// khams gsum dag tu mi 'khor bas// las kyis mi 'khor skabs zhes bya// 'dus ma byas pa'i chos nyid de// byang chub sems su gcig pa'i phyir// gnyis mod skyon thal skabs zhes bya// chos kun rang gi sems la 'dus//
30a6(rnying rgyud): sems kyi rtogs pa bshad pa'i phyir// ye shes rang byung skabs zhes bya// chos kun drang gi sems la 'dur// sems dang bral ba med pa'i phyir// gzungs kyi sgor thabs skabs zhes bya// chos kun rang gi sems la 'dus// sems
30a7(rnying rgyud): la chos ku ni rdzogs pa'i phyir// yongs su rdzogs pa'i skabs zhes pa// chos kun rang gi sems la rdzogs// sems la gzung 'dzin med pa'i phyir// chags dang bral ba'i skabs zhes bya// zos kur byang chub sems la 'dus// sems
30b1(rnying rgyud): nyid lanas cheb phyir// gad nas che ba'i skabs zhes nA// chos kun byang chub sems su 'dus// sams la skyon yon med pa'i phyir// sran lam thal ba gabs nas bya// zas kun byang chub se mas su 'dus// byams la thams cad rdzogs pa phyid/
30b2(rnying rgyud): lung chen ston pa'i skabs zhes bya// chos kun byang chub sems su 'dus// sems la bzang ngan med pa'i phyir// mnyam pa nyid kyi skabs zhes bya// chos kun byang chub sems su 'dus// blang dor med par ma rtogs phyir// bde ba spang ba'i skabs
30b3(rnying rgyud): zhes bya// chos kun byang chub sems su 'dus// sems la btsal du med pa'i phyir// rtsol dang bral ba'i skabs zhes bya// chos kun byang chub sems su 'dus// sems la 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir// chos nyid mi 'gyur skabs zhes bya// chos
30b4(rnying rgyud): kun byang chub sems su 'dus// sems la gnyen po med pa'i phyir// rgyu rkyen bral ba'i skabs zhes bya// chos kun byang chub sems su gcig/ chud drug snying po sems gcig phyir// 'gro kun sangs rgyas skabs zhes bya// chos kun byar
30b5(rnying rgyud): chub sems su 'dus// sems la tshogs kun 'dus pa'i phyir// ye shes dag pa'i tshogs chen pos// tshogs chen dbul ba'i skabs zhes bya// chos kun byang chub sems su 'dus// sems de ye shes shar ba'i phyir// tshogs rkyen
30b6(rnying rgyud): lhun gyis grub pa'i skabs// chos kun byang chub sems su 'dus// sems nyid ldan gyis grub pa'i phyir// lhun gyis grub pa'i skabs zhes bya// chos kun byang chub sems su 'dus// sems la rtsol bsgrub med pa'i phyir// phrin las
30b7(rnying rgyud): rgya mtsho'i skabs zhes bya// chos kun byang chub sems su 'dus// sems nyid chos kyi khungs yin phyir// lung tshin 'brel ba'i skabs zhes bya// chos kun byang chub sems su 'dus// sems nyid btsal ba med pa la// btsal ba'i gol
31a1(rnying rgyud): sgrib bskrun pa'i phyid// btsal dang mthal skabs zhasaH// chos kun d+hang chubs pas 'dus la// sems nyid chags shing g.yos mangs// mchags man pa'i sems ma pas// 'ang brgya
31a2(rnying rgyud): po'i skabs zhes bya// sems kyi chos nyid de rnams la// ma 'gags pa yi skabs zhes bya// b+hag tu nyi shu rtsa lA ni// yi ge A li kA li gnyis// gcig tu bsdus te nyi shu lnga// bgrang ba'i don ni 'di lta ste// cung drug sems
31a3(rnying rgyud): can thams cad kun// snying po byang chub zhing yin pas// chos nyid don de shes pa dang // don de yid ches bya ba'i phyir// nyi shu rtsa ldir bgrangs mod kyis// yang dag byang chub sems la ni// tshig tu bgrangs na mahA'i las te// res
31a4(rnying rgyud): par sems la bgrang du med// nyi shu rtsa lnga 'di lta ste// mtshan ma'i yul la mi gnas te// ye shes chen po'i phyag rgya yin// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa// ye shes chen po'i phyag rgya yin// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pas//
31a5(rnying rgyud): ye shes chen po'i phyag rgya yin// yul dang dbang po gnyis med pas// ye shes chen po'i phyag rgya yin// sems nyid bde ba chen po de// ye shes chen po'i phyag rgya yin// chos nyid gsal ba'i byang chub sems// ye shes chen po'i phyag
31a6(rnying rgyud): rgya yin// thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral med// ye shes chen po'i phyag rgya yin// chos nyid dag las ye shes 'byung // ye shes chen po'i phyag rgya yin// kun bzang yab yum gnyis med pas// ye shes chen po'i phyag rgya yin// tha
31a7(rnying rgyud): cad dang la rdzogs pa yang // ye shes chen po'i phyag rgya yin// chos nyid dag la rol pa de// ye shes chen po'i phyag rgya yin// sems la dus gsum med pa'i phyir// ye shes chen po'i phyag rgya yin// sems nyid 'du 'bral med pade/
31b1(rnying rgyud): shes zan pa phyag tu yin// thams cad gcig tu 'dus pa de// ye shes chen po'i phyag rgya yin// byang chub sems las g.yos pa med// ye shes chen po'i phyag rgya yin// chos nyid dag la 'gyur ba med// ye shes men pos rgyab cu /
31b2(rnying rgyud): brjod du med pa'i yul la rol// ye shes chen po'i rgyan tu yin// dbyings dang ye shes 'dra 'bral med// ye shes chen po'i phyag rgya yin// byang chub sems las kun grul pas// ye shes chen po'i phyag tu yin// gang gis chos nyi
31b3(rnying rgyud): pa de// ye shes chen po'i phyag rgya yin// chos nyid gyen du rig pa de// ye shes chen po'i phyag rgya yin// ji ltar rtogs pa'i rig pa de// ye shes chen po'i phyag rgya yin// thams cad sangs rgyas shes pa de/ ye shes chen po'i phyag tu yin/
31b4(rnying rgyud): zin pas ldan gyis grub pa de// ye shes chen po'i phyag rtswa yin// nges par gtan lang 'dra ba yang // ye shes chen po'i phyag rgya yin// phyag tu nyi shu rtsa lnga ste// ltos pa'i chos ni thams cad kun// long bas dmig pu zin pa ltar// bdun pa
31b5(rnying rgyud): chud kyi spyi 'grel zhes// rdzogs pa chen pos bshad pa yin// phyag rgya 'di yi rang bzhin ni// rnam pa gsum du shes par bya// ming dang rang bzhin dpe gsum ste// ming ni phyag rgyar bshad pa yin// rang bzhin 'gyur ba med pa ste/
31b6(rnying rgyud): sems la 'gyur ba med// dpe ni nam mkha' lta bu ste// nam mkha'i dpel mtshon du med// ces bstan/ skabs dang phyag rgya'i man ngag go// de nyid lam gyi man dag ni// rnam pa bcu dang drug tu bgrang // de yang gang dang gang zhe na/
31b7(rnying rgyud): rnam bzhir de la// de nyid rnam pa bzhi ni de// rnam pa brgya da nga drug tu bgrang // de nyid rnam pa bcu drug ni// byang chub sems kying nyid de// sems dang chos dang ye shes de// dag gi de nyid do// sngon dang skur gyi dang // de dang 'dra
32a1(rnying rgyud): kyang // shin na rnal dbyur du da ni// rnam pa bzhi ru bsrung bar bya// sangs rgyas sems can rgyung drug can// ma brjes sems cad nga // snang srid snod brgyad rnams cad kun// ma byas chos ni denyi
32a2(rnying rgyud): dus gsum bskyod pa med pa ni// ma bsgribs ye shes de nyid do// thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ni// ngo bo dag gi de nyid do// kun tu rnal 'byor de nyid ni// rnam pa bzhi ru bgra bar bya// chos dbyings ji ltar rig pa de// de ni sems
32a3(rnying rgyud): kyi de nyid yin// dbyings nyid cir yang bcos med pas// de ni chos kyi de nyid yin// dbyings dang ye shes gsal ba ni// de ni ye shes de nyid yin// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pas// de ni ngo bo de nyid yin// rnal 'byor
32a4(rnying rgyud): chen po'i de nyid kyang // rnam pa bzhi ru shes par bya// yi ge hU~M la sogs pa ni// de las thams cad bskyed pa ni// sems kyi de nyid yin par bshad// phung po 'byung ba rnam shes yul// snang la rang bzhin med pas ni// ye nas
32a5(rnying rgyud): chos nyid de nyid yin// de ltar ma bsgribs gsal ba ni// ye shes dag gi de nyid yin// bdag nyid chen po grub pa ni// ngo bo dag gi de nyid do// sems dpa'i rnal 'byor de nyid kyang // rnam pa bzhi ru bgrang bar bya// gang zhig ting
32a6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin sdom gnas nas// sdom de yid la gang gnas pa// sems kyi de nyid yin par bshad// ting 'dzin chags pa med pa ni// chos kyi de nyid yin par bshad// rigs dang kha dog so sor gsal// ye shes dag gi de nyid yin//
32a7(rnying rgyud): rigs bzhi phyag rgya chen po bzhi// ngo bo dag gi de nyid yin// de nyid rnam pa bcu drug ni// lam gyi lung du shes par bya// ngo ba bzhi yi man ngag la// byang chub sems kyi man ngag ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang // khams
32b1(rnying rgyud): gsum sems can thams cad kun// byang chub sems las kun 'byung ste// sangs rgyas sku dang ye shes dang // sems can lus dang bag chags dang // snang zhing srid pa thams cad kun// byang chub sems la blang dor med// sangs rgyas
32b2(rnying rgyud): ye shes thugs rjes kyang // dkri bkol blang dor yongs mi mngang // sems can 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal yang // byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin te// snang srid snod bcud kun la khyab// gnyen po dag gis bskyod du med// nam mkha'i ma
32b3(rnying rgyud): ltar mnyam par gnas// de ni snying po byang chub ste// gzung 'dzin spros pa kun dang bral// sgra dang tha snyad ril las 'das// tshig dang yi ger brjod pa med// bstan du mtshan ma'i dngos po med// mngon du dmigs pa'i yul dang bral// rgyal
32b4(rnying rgyud): ma byung snying po 'di// smos kyis btags pa kun dang bral// zhes bstan/ sbyor ba byar med man ngag ni// byang chub sems kyi sku mchog 'dis// chos kun yongs su khyab pa'i phyir// gcig dang gnyis su byar med pas// de la gnyis kyis sbyor
32b5(rnying rgyud): ba med// chos kun sems las byung ba'i phyir// chos sems gnyis su sbyar du med// rgyu las 'bras bu btsal med pas// chu 'bras gnyis su sbyar du med// thabs dang shes rab yul byung bas// thabs dang shes rab myur du med// ye shes
32b6(rnying rgyud): rig la dbyings gsal bas// dbyings dang ye shes sbyar du med// dbang po dag la yul snang bas// yul dang dbang po sbyar du med// chos kun sems su gcig pa'i phyir// gcig la gnyis sbyar med par gsung ma// zhes bya/ dus gsum
32b7(rnying rgyud): gtan tshigs man ngag ni// sems nyid rdzogs pa chen po 'ad// skye dang 'gag pa med pas na// dus gsum med pa'i gtan tshigs te// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi// tha snyad ming la mi gnas te// 'das pa'i dus la 'gag pa med//
33a1(rnying rgyud): ma 'angs pa la m+bu med// b+hUk+Sha ngasags gnas med pas// dus gas ma gnag pa man dgag/ zhes bskrun/ s+yAd chen grangs kyim nu dag ni// sems nyid rdzogs pa chen po 'dis// chos kun gtan la
33a2(rnying rgyud): 'bebs pa'i phyir// lung chen khungs kyi man ngag go// zhes gsungs so// lung gsum man ngag bzhir gtan la phebs pa'i mdo'i le'u'o// // de nas yang sems dpa' chen po des/ 'dus pa'i tshogs la lung gsum man ngag
33a3(rnying rgyud): bzhis gtan la phebs pa'i mdo don gyi 'grelnga pa 'di gsungs so// kye 'dus pa'i tshogs che nang nyon cig/ snyan khang brgyud pa'i lung 'di ni// gang gis ji ltar snyan khung gang brgyud pa// kun bzang rdo rje chos nyid bgrod med do// bgrod
33a4(rnying rgyud): du med pa'i don ni de ltar la// de bzhin chos nyid gcig tu gnas pa'i phyir// gang zhig su yang rung ba de la ni// chos nyid bgrod du med de bstan pa de yang thob// byang chub sems kyi snying po de nyid ni// chos kun 'byung ba'i snying po yin pas na//
33a5(rnying rgyud): spros dang bral ba'i snying po de las ni// chos nyid spros bral de byung ngo mtshar che// zhes sman khung brgyud do// gang gis ji ltar mngon du yang bzhin/ chos nyid sems nyid mngon du bstan pa ni// a dang mdzes pa'i haM ni chos srur bshad// snying po byang chub sems
33a6(rnying rgyud): ni chos sku las// cho 'phrul phung po lnga po dag dang ni// rnam shes brgyad kyi yan lag spros pa bzhin// khams gsum 'jig rten yongs kyi spyod yul la// nyon mongs lnga ni 'dod yon rnam pa lnga// dus gsum sangs rgyas gsung gi zab mo ni// skye ba med pa'i
33a7(rnying rgyud): chos nyid gzugs sgra dri// skye ba med pa'i zab mo sangs rgyas gsungs// zhes bstan/ de bzhin gtan la 'bebs pa'i man ngag ni// sangs rgyas sems can kun gyi don rnams ni// ji bzhin mi bskyod pa yi chos nyid de// bya ba med pas grol ba'i rdzogs chen po// bya byed
33b1(rnying rgyud): col bsgrub med pas grol bar bshad// chu rgyan med pa'i rang byung ye shes te// ma btsal rang bzhin gnas pas bdag grol la// btsal du med pas grol bar gzhan la ston// ces bstan/ de bzhin man ngag rnam bzhi ni// byang chub sems kyi man dag ni// 'gro ba rigs
33b2(rnying rgyud): zug nyon mongs lnga// snying po byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin yin// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs la chub// sems can rnams kyi lus ngag yid la khyab// dus gsum sangs rgyas sku dang ye shes rol// khams gsum sems can dug lnga dang khar spyod//
33b3(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi snying po de la ni// dngos po mtshan mar spyod pa med bzhin du// dpe ni nam mkha' lta bu'i rang bzhin du// kun la khyab pas nam mkha'i mtha' ltar gnas/ zhes byang chub sems kyi man ngag go// de bzhin sbyor ba dag gi man+ta ngag ni// chos nyid skad
33b4(rnying rgyud): cig gnyis med bzung bas ni// gnyis su med pa'i sbyar ba chen po yin// rgyu rkyen med pas bde chen dag pa ste// skye ba med pas dam tshig yin par bshad// shes rab yul de rig par mngon gyur nas// thabs kyi gar thabs rig pa bskyod pa yis// chos
33b5(rnying rgyud): rnams ma skyes dag dang gnyis med sbyor// skye ba med pa'i mchod pa phul ba yin// ces sbyor ba'i man ngag go// dus gsum gtan tshigs man ngag ni// snga ma 'das dang de ltar gnas pa dang // phye ma ma 'ongs dus gsum tha snyad 'di// gsum du mi gnas/
33b6(rnying rgyud): sde phyi ba skad yin// de ltar mi gnas m+b+ha kyi skye 'gag med// dus gsum skye 'gag med pa'i don 'di ni/ sku phyi med las dus gsum mnyam par spyor// zhes dus gsum gyi man ngag go// lung chen grangs kyi man dag ni// btsal na 'ching bar 'gyur ba de bas
33b7(rnying rgyud): thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i lung 'di las// btsal du med pa de las btsal 'gyur na// tshe chad pa yis nad des sgrib par 'gyur// bya ru med pa de la da tog na// chos nyid la ni chos nyid 'grub pa med// ces gsungs so// gtan la 'bebs pa'i mdo yi 'grel pa rdzogs so//
34a1(rnying rgyud): de nas sems dpa' chen po das 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la nges par bstan pa'i mdo 'di bstan te blangs par bzhag go// kye 'dus pa'i tshogs chen da nyan cig/ nges par bstan pa'i ma 'dulas// med pa ma ma ga rnam pa brgyad
34a2(rnying rgyud): nges pa lnga dang ma nges gsum// brgyad pa gnyis kyi man ngag gis// khyod blo nges par gzhag par bya// de yang gang dang gang zhe na// sems la skye 'jig med pa dang // don la bsgom du med pa dang // spyod pa blang dor med pa dang // lam la bzod du med pa dang //
34a3(rnying rgyud): par bgrang du med pa dang // sems la nga bo med pa dang // chos nyid mtshon du med pa dang // spro slar gdags su med pa brgyad// nges pa lnga ni gang zhe na// dus la khyad par med par ras// bla ma mchod par mnyam par nges// mchod pa bsngo ru med par nges// dka' sla tshon
34a4(rnying rgyud): du med par nges// bde dang sdug bsngal rgya mthun ras// chos kyi rang bzhin ma nges dang // blo yi rang bzhin ma nges dang // ye shes rang bzhin mnges gsum// sems la skye 'jig med pa dang // snying po byang chub sems 'di la// pha zhes bya ba'i na ma mchis//
34a5(rnying rgyud): ma zhes bya ba'i rgyan ma mchis// rgya mi mchis pas skye ba med// rkyen ma mchis pas 'jig pa med// des na gyi 'jig med ces bya// don lnga bsgom du me da pa ni// don ni cho nyid skye med de// dpe pas bsgo mang med pa dang // don gyis bsgom du med pa dang /
34a6(rnying rgyud): rtags kyis bsgom du med pa'o// de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ dpe yis bsgom du med pa ni// chos kun dpe ni nam mkhang ste// nam ma'ang sbyong zhing bdag med pas// de bzhin dpal bzhom med// dod kyis sgom du med pa ni/ sa pan don dang byed med//
34a7(rnying rgyud): skye ba med pa'i chos nyid ni// bsgom du yod par mi gsungs so// rtags kyis bsgom du med pa ni// rang byung ye shes 'gag med de// yo nas ye shes rang gsal bas// mtshan ma'i yul la mi gnas pas// bsgom du yod par pa gsungs so//
34b1(rnying rgyud): spyod pa zlar drar mang pa ni// sems nyid rdzogs pa chen pa la// snang ba'i chos dang srid par chos// thams cad byang chub sams yin pas// sems nyid ma shes spyod pa pa// 'di sla du yangs su mdzes// lam la grad du med pan// pa
34b2(rnying rgyud): la rnam pa gnyis yod de// don gyi lam dang tshig lam mo// gang zag blo yi rim pa las// theg pa'i rnam grangs dgur bstan pas// theg pa 'og ma'i rnam thad+hang// lam ma brjod du yod par brtan// dpeng ji ltar bgrod cam// na rjem dang ni ba rgyal gnyid// Ang zhing
34b3(rnying rgyud): 'gegs pas lam la bgrod// byang chub sems dpa'i mod khri yis// spang zhing bsod pas lam la bzod// bya ba rnam gsum yi ga yis// gzung 'dzin dag pa'i sgronas bzod// rdul 'tshong chen po rnam pa gnyis// ting 'dzin rnam gsul rang bzhin gyis//
34b4(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs kyi lam la bgrod// sems nyid rdzogs pa chen po ni// rdzogs pa chen po'i rang bzhin gyis// chos sku sems la bgrod med phyir// sems nyid lam la bgrod med pas// bzod du med pa'i lam zhes bya// rnam pa ba mang du med pa ni/
34b5(rnying rgyud): kun rtsa ba gcig 'dus phyir// rnam pa bgrang du yongs kyis med// gang zag dbang po rib dgul// yul dgu byung bas rnam par bgrang // sems nyid rdzogs pa chen po la// yul zhes bya ba sems yin te// sems dang yul gnyis pa
34b6(rnying rgyud): med// chos kun sems su 'dus pa'i phyir// sems nyid snying por gcig pa ste// 'dus ma byas pa'i snying po la// rnam pa bgrang du ga la yod// sems la ngo bo med pa ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// sems kyi ngo bo 'di yin/
34b7(rnying rgyud): zhes// che chung mtshan ma ring po dang // dbyibs dang kha dog spyod yul du// ston pa de yis bstan pa med// nga'i yod par mi mthong bas// des na nga bo med ces bya// chos nyid mtshon du med pa ni// tshab nyid rang bzhin sems nyid de// sems
35a1(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin chos nyid la// sems nyid bcos pa med pa ni// de la chos zhes btags pa yin// bcos pa med par rang rig pas// de la sems zhes btags pa yin// de bzhin sems la dang sa med bzhin// chos nyid de yang sems yin/
35a2(rnying rgyud): pas// sems bzhin chos la mtshon med do// spro srur gdags su med pa ni// sems nyid rdzogs pa chen po yis// med pa bdun gyi rang bzhin gyis// chos kun sgo dang skur bral te// yod pa'i sgo dang med pa'i skur// tshig dang yi ge ra brjod dang bral//
35a3(rnying rgyud): de la sgo skur bral zhes bya// nges pa lnga ni gang zhe na// dus las khyad par med pa ni// 'das dang da ltar ma 'ongs la// skye 'gag med pa'i gtan tshigs kyis// dus la khyad par med par nges// bla ma mchod dang mnyam pa ni// blang dor med pa'i sems nyid
35a4(rnying rgyud): kyis// thams cad chos nyid gcig pa'i phyir// mnyam pas gong 'og rim pa med// gcig la gnyis su bya ru med// sems la blang dor bya ru med// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med la// bla ma mchod pa gnyis med mnyam// des na bla ma mchod par mnyam//
35a5(rnying rgyud): mchod pa bsngo ru med pa ni// sems nyid rdzogs pa chen po la// thams cad lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir// bsngo bar bya ba yod ma yin// ye nas bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin la// ting 'dzin dbyung bya sbyar du med// dka' sbra mtshon du med pa ni// chos nyid byang chub sems 'di la//
35a6(rnying rgyud): ngo bo ye nas med pa'i phyir// ming tsam 'di zhes bstan pa ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang // rdo rje sems dpas mtshon du med// bde dang sdug bsngal rgyu mthun ni// snying po byang chub sems 'dis ni// rgyu gnyis ye nas byas pa'i phyir// bde rang sdug
35a7(rnying rgyud): bsngal rgyargyu mthun nges// zhes bstan/ nges pa lnga zhes bya bar bshad// ma nges pa ni rnam gsum ste// de yang gang dang gang zhe na// chos kyi rang bzhin gcig pa la// ji ltar bltas pa der snang bas// de la 'di zhes nges pa med// byis pa'i blol nges med pas// rang sems
35b1(rnying rgyud): gzhan du rgyal bar byed// des na nges pa med pa yin// pa shas rang bzhin mangs pas// yAn rnam pa rab// grangs dang rnam pa'i grwa shus kyis// sams gcag yul la bamar rtogs// des na la nas nges pazad// chos gsungs sa// nga pa
35b2(rnying rgyud): mdo bstan pa'i le'u'o// / de nas yang 'dus pa'i tshogs chen de rnams la/ sems dpa' chen po des/ nges pa'i mdo dun gyi 'grel pa 'di gsungs so// kye 'dus pa'i tshogs chend nyon cig/ sems la phye 'jig med pas na// don la ban
35b3(rnying rgyud): ma mchis te// snying po byang chub sems 'di // ting 'dzin bsam pa'i yul las 'das// brjod du med pa'i ngang la gnas// de ltar snying po byang chub sems// skyon pa'i sgron mar gyur pas na// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bsngags// chos rnams can gyi snying /
35b4(rnying rgyud): bas// mkhyen dpa 'angam dpal gzhon nu nyid// bya byed rtsol bsrub mi mnga' bar // pade chen klong na ri bzhin gnas// lam la bgrong du med pa ni// tshul khrims spyos pad ma tshig dang // spong ba rgya mtsho'i gzhir gyur kyang pas// ji snyed rnam par grol ba'i lam/
35b5(rnying rgyud): de ni bde bar gshegs pa'i sum// 'gro ba kun dang mtshungs pa'i lam// tshul khrims sdom pa de med pas// bde gshegs yul yang yod ma yin// de phyir rnam grol mchog gi lam// tshul khrims sdom pa med par bshad// sems mang po med pa ni//
35b6(rnying rgyud): phra zhing shes dka' kun gyi lam// mi tog don rtog las 'das// dngos po mtshan ma dmigs su med// spos med bsam pa kun dang zab// tshig gis gtan la mi pheb ste// dbyibs dang kha dag spyod yul min// bstan cing brtags par nga
35b7(rnying rgyud): 'dod du dul tsam med// chos nyid mtshan du med pa ni// sngon gyi drang srong 'phrab la ma der// de ltar gang du 'jug pa ni// bsgom chags lam gyi nad kyis zin// ston pa'i lung gi chog rnams la//
36a1(rnying rgyud): 'dugs te// rtog pa'i lam grags sdig rgyur ba snyegs// yang dag la man 'di yin zhes// tshig dang lags mtshan men// yang dag 'a yin skyon pan// rdo rje sems dpa' nga nyid 'khrul// dag
36a2(rnying rgyud): dang ni ma dag pa// ye nas gnyis med 'dres shing mtshungs// sems nyid kun gyi gnas su'o// dag ma dag ni rnam pa ni// dbyer med ye shes gti mug dang // thogs pa med pa'i ye shes ni// bsam pa kun dang bral ba yin//
36a3(rnying rgyud): dang gis mi g.yo rmugs pa de// ting 'dzin dag gi rgyal por gnas// ting 'dzin ye shes mngon sum spyan// mthong bas dmigs pa'i yul dang bral// thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyan zhes bya// mtha' dang dbus med yangs pa ni// rang
36a4(rnying rgyud): bzhin chos kyi gzhal yas so// spro srung gdags su med pa ni// glang dor med pa'i rgyal po ni// thams cad snying po byang chub sems// sems dang bag chags 'dres mtshungs la// sems kyi dbang po sgo lnga yis// snang
36a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i chos ni rnam pa lnga// dbang po sgo lha rang rkyen gyis// sbyang zhing dor bar yongs mi byed// ci yang mi dgongs thabs kyis rol// kun dang mi mthun spang ba'i chos// nyon mongs lnga dang mtshams med lnga// de ni rnam dag chen
36a6(rnying rgyud): po ste// ga ra bzhugs mnyam pa'i rgyal po thob// bud med la sogs chags pa'i gnas// kun kyang ldang bar mi byed do// lo rgyus tshad ma'i blor bzhag nas// ting 'dzin rnam pa gsum po de// brtan nas grub pa'i mthang spyod pa// rtsol bral
36a7(rnying rgyud): lung las gol zhes bshad// bya bral bde ba'i lhun la gnas// ye nas rang byung snying po nyid// ye nas byas zin bdud rtsi yis// rtsol ba dag gi sdug bsngal 'joms// ye nas mi g.yo mi 'gyur te// 'gyur med rnyed pa kun dang bral//
36b1(rnying rgyud): bya zal zin pa'i yul de pa// bcos pa med pa ji bzhin gnas// brtags pas chos ni thams cad kun// thig le chen po'i rang bzhin pas// spob med cing bsdu ba med// sgru ba med cing 'gag pa med// 'gog pa med pa de bzhin gnas// rnam pa
36b2(rnying rgyud): rtog snying po 'di// dngos med mtshan ma zer mi gnas// nam mkha' bzhin du ye gnas pas// rtog pa'i ska bas ma yul las 'das// kun las 'das pa'i thig lo drug/ sgo dang skur pa kun dang bral// skye 'jig med pa'i rang bzhin kyis//
36b3(rnying rgyud): bsgom du med pa'i don bstan to// de nas yang spyod pa blang dor med pa 'di bstan to// kye 'dus pa'i tshogs chen de nyon cig/ snang ba'i chos ni sna tshogs te// chos nyid dag la mi gnyis kyang // snying po byang chub chas gzhig pas// mtshon du med de spos dang bral// /
36b4(rnying rgyud): ma bcos pa yi chos nyid du// ji bzhin pa zhes mi rtog kyang // sna tshogs rnam par snang mdzad la// blang dor med pas kun tu bzang // ye nas rtsol bsgrub 'das pa na// byas zin rtsol ba'i nad spangs te// lhun gyi gnas la bzhag pa yin// zhes
36b5(rnying rgyud): bstan// kye 'dus pa'i tshogs chen da nyon cig/ lam la bgrod du med pa dang // rnam par bgrang du med pa ni// byang chub sems sam chos dbyings la// rnam par bgrang du med par yod// phyi dang nang gi chos nyid 'di// 'byung chen lnga dang snang
36b6(rnying rgyud): phyi// byang chub sems dang chos nyid dang // dbye ba med par chos kyi dbyings// ye nas rnam dag spyod yul la// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med pas// de la rnam par bgrang du med// ye nas rdzogs pa'i byang chub la// bsgrub tu med pas
36b7(rnying rgyud): du med// ye nas spyan rdzogs bya ru med// snga ma bzhin to rtsol bsrub med// rtog pa dang ni dpyod pa dang // gzung 'dzin rnam par dag pa gnyis// ye nas gnyis med chos dbyings la// log rtog gyis pas bslu ba med// 'khrul pa
37a1(rnying rgyud): nang ga mam nananag/ gang ga sa byangs stan dran // ldanas gtsus pa drug pa // / las gnas mnyas pa shes pan// dum gsus sa sa smra na seM/ nga 'dun tu na
37a2(rnying rgyud): don mu stegs 'khrul pa'i lam// cha med byis pas bslus pa ni// rtog pa'i lam la btsud pa ste// bzod pas byin pa'i dus med pa// brtags pas zlog pa'i yul med pas// chos nying chos tshol rnyed mi 'gyur// sems nyid mngon dum
37a3(rnying rgyud): mthong ba'i// tshad mar ma gyur ste 'dra yis// ston pa'i lung bstan bka' bor bas// lam nor rtog pas zin ta re// sems nyid mngon du gyur mthong ba'i// phyi rabs des lung ston pa ni// gser la nAg mtshur btang bas na// de la dpag med
37a4(rnying rgyud): yon gyis bsku'o// zhes bstu na/ de nas sems dpa' chen po des/ 'dzus pa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa// gle 'dus pa'i tshogs chen nyon cig/ sems la byo med pa dang // lam la brjod med pa dang / sa nyid rtson med pa dge sung gdag sa med pa dang / macul
37a5(rnying rgyud): sems sa mchi ba dbyings la// ti yang mi gnas gzung 'dzin dmyigs pa'i sul med pas// rnam par mi rtog rgyas nyid baglang du med pa lam// gzhan du bsngo ba'i gzung 'dzin cha shas phra mo bal// yul med tsog las 'anam pa da
37a6(rnying rgyud): bya// nam tug brnam pa'i rgyas smra med par bcas pa'i don myed pas// da nga shes rnam ra mnyan 'i da bzhin gan/ nga banas yul la ma gnas pas// gzhan pa gzhan sa sa satsam
37a7(rnying rgyud): rkyen 'bral lan gargyas kyi bdan tu bya'o// byang rgya mtho mamyo kau rgya banyid rnam pa cid pa byag phral bas/ thabs cid pa' phyi drang sa badra kyang // rdza sru srung po ma ba sa dang badren byung bas na//
37b1(rnying rgyud): btsal med gzhan nas thob pa med// rdul phran don dam rang bzhin gcig pa la// tha dad brtsegs shing phyogs cha rnams dang bral// gar mi gnas pa'i don nyid ye shes legs pa che// 'dus ma byas pa'i ye shes dang las 'gyur ba skye// mngon sum rnam
37b2(rnying rgyud): par mi rtog yangs pa'i snying po 'byung // rnam par dag pa'i lam chen 'dir zhugs pas// chos nyid mnyam pa'i rgyal po btsal ba med pas thob// mi 'gyur 'gyur ba med pa ye nas gnas// bde bas chags pa'i gnas la zhen med de// de bzhin nyid la
37b3(rnying rgyud): gzung ba'i yul ni ye nas med// sems kyi gnas nyid ye nas med kyang bla// rang rig mngon sum lam gyis thob 'dod na// sgyu mar rtag tu gnas shing bsgom par bya// bsgom pa'i ro la chags pa'i dang ni bde ba'i nad// de lta bu la mnyam pa'i
37b4(rnying rgyud): don chen ye mi 'byung // byang chub sems kyi sku gcig khyab gnas pas// gzhan nas bsnan pa'i chos sku ye nas med// rang byung ye shes mtha' la thug pa med pas na// chos kyi dbyings la dbri ba dang ni 'phel ba med// chos nyid bde ba'i rol
37b5(rnying rgyud): nyams bag med// de bas lhag pa'i bde ba gnas pa'ibarten med la// rang byung che ba'i yul la ma bcos pas// dus gsum kun tu ji bzhin ye nas lhan ni gnas// ngo mtshar mthong ba'i yul med de la lhag par chags
37b6(rnying rgyud): dang bral// de phyir mthong bar bya ba'i chos med do// gang la'ang thob par mi rigs de nyid yin pas so// brjod pa tha snyad spros pa kun dang bral// chos ni snang ba'i chos med de nyid min// rtag tu 'dres pas dbyer med ces ni brjod pa la// don dam
37b7(rnying rgyud): stong pa'i chos zhes lhag par smra ba de// gang ltar bshad pa ltar ni dbyings la grub pa med// 'khrul par gyur pa'i byang chub lam de ni// rtogs par gyur pas 'bras bu thob pa med// rang byung rgyu rkyen ma bskyed sems nyid kyang //
38a1(rnying rgyud): tshig gi brjod pas mi phebs mtha' dang thal// ye nas bya btsal bral bas bdag nyid la// rang rig mngon sum ngang gis btsal med gnas kyir ro// grib ma las byung gzugs kyi dpe bzhin du// me rtog ye shes pa la
38a2(rnying rgyud): rtag pa 'byung bar zad// med de zhes ni med pa'i mthar ma yin// mthar ma yin zhes med pa'i snying po 'byung // stong pa nyid de stong pa'i mthar ma yin// stong pa'i yul zhes snang ba'i srog la gnas// dper nanam mkha'i rang bzhin
38a3(rnying rgyud): nyid las// nam mkha' de las yin no zhes pa'i dran pa bskyed// rdol ba'i bya bra la ye nas zin pa'i bde ba ste// dpung 'dod pa med pa'i tshul gyis len padu byer// gza' gtad bral ba'i ye shes yul med de// de nyid las ni ye shes gsapa ba 'gyur ba
38a4(rnying rgyud): mngon du phyung ba'i drang srong ba lta ba'i rjes su dmigs// de la bsgom pa'i dmigs pa'i yid kyang 'jog par byed// rnam rtsol 'bad pa'i gdung bas kun nas zin ta re// de ni rang bzhin lam du ma rtogs de 'khrul pas// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes spar len dang
38a5(rnying rgyud): gis med// ji bzhin pa la yin zhes rnam rtog byed pa de// phyir zhing rtog pa 'phel te bsgom pa med// bde ba chen po zhes ni gzhan nas tshol 'dod pas// de nyid chags pa'i gcod rnying nad yin te// migayo ba yi rang bzhin btsal med gnas pas na//
38a6(rnying rgyud): nyid snyun chen yin zhes rtogs par ma byas na// mtho ris lha mi tsam du bzod pa'i dge bcu'i rgyu des ni// nyon mongs gcod rnying zin pas phyin par mi 'gyur ro// de bas bgrod lam med des phyin pa med pas na// lam de gang zag rnams kyi nang du che bas
38a7(rnying rgyud): na// de nyid mya ngang 'das par phyin par 'dod pa des// re dwags smig rgya chu ru 'du shes bsnyeg pa 'dra/ de bas gang yang rnyed par 'gyur ba'i yul med de// de bzhin gang ltar bzod kyang khams gsum de las yongs mi 'byung // sa bcu gong nas
38b1(rnying rgyud): gong du ltos pa'i rten bcas kyang // byang chub chen po dag la sgrib par 'gyur ba yin// de bas shin tu thogs med gyur pa'i ye shes la// bsam pa'i rnam rtog brjod pa kun dang bral// de phyir bshes gnyen yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas te// nor
38b2(rnying rgyud): chen bzhin du spyi bo'i gtsug tu bkur// chos nyid dmigs par bya ba'i yul de mi byed cing // rang bzhin 'gyur ba med pa'i gnas la mi ltos par// rig pa nang nas rang bzhin legs par 'char// re ba thams cad bral te de nyid skong ba'o// brtags
38b3(rnying rgyud): na 'od 'dra med cing bzhag na sna tshogs 'byung ba yis// yon tan sna tshogs 'byung ba'i legs pa chen po 'di// dngos su mi snang ba ltar chags pa'i cha lugs 'chang // theg chen stod gyur kun la de ltar ston cing rtogs// bdag gzhan gzung 'dzin bral ba'i//
38b4(rnying rgyud): ston pa de// mkhan po zhes ni rin chen mdzod dang 'dra// bdag don thams cad 'grub pa'i bla ma yul yin zhes// bdag 'dzin bral ba'i snying rjes theg chen brtan// nang nas phyi mo nyid nasnga ma g.yos pas// nang du 'di'o zhes ni bcal ba'i
38b5(rnying rgyud): gnas med do// dmigs pa'i yul phyir chags shing yul la 'dzin// de phyir gzhan du bsngo bar bya ba'i dmigs pa med// mnyam pa de las mi 'byung de la mi 'jug cing // de nyid bdag nyid chen po snying rje de yin na// gzhan nas btsa
38b6(rnying rgyud): ba 'phags pa'i nor med mi 'ong bas// ye nas bdag nyid la ni gnas pa yin zhes bstan// bde ba tho par 'dod pas ri ba drag dang bcas// de phyir 'odi yis bde la rgyab kyi sa phyogs par 'dod// bde la chags pa'i nad kyis dzin te 'di
38b7(rnying rgyud): bas bde ba 'chol// byang chub logs nas 'dod pa'i 'khrul pa'i lam la gnas// des na ye rnam chos la za zhed 'chel// de lta'i yul can gzung 'dzin bcas pas na// sangs rgyas zhes ni logs nas mthong ba med// sangs rgyas zhes ni
39a1(rnying rgyud): dang gis gnas pa med// debyer sangs rgyas meng du smras pa zal// sangs rgyas zhes ni ston pas ming btags nor// sangs rgyas zhes ni gzhan nas thob zu dang // da nyi sdig rgyu na na zlar ba'i lam// 'dag kyang
39a2(rnying rgyud): kyi gzugs ni yod min pas// chos kun bshad pa rdul chatsam yang med// zin pa'i nAd dang chags pa'i sdug bsngal ye nas zhi// dngos po med la zhen pa ye nas spangs// gnyis med bdud rtsi chen po'i rang bzhin la// bza' ba'i thabs la
39a3(rnying rgyud): ye nas dag pa med// thams cad ma bzhag yangs pa che// de bas 'og ma rnams kyi gnyen po yin// gnyis med dang lnga mi dmigs mnyam pa'i ngang // che chung 'du shes dmigs pa dag dang bral// lung las gsungs pa'i man
39a4(rnying rgyud): ngag dag gi rgyal// dper na sgra mkhan ra ma' rnam pa 'dra// mnyam la 'byung 'jug ye shes byings rmugs thal// de yi dbang las ye shes skye bar 'gyur// rten dang brel pas btang zhing mnyam pa'i ngang la gnas// bde ba chen po dag la zod
39a5(rnying rgyud): pa gdung mi sgo// dper na nam mkha' g.yang sa dag la mkha' lding nyam mi nga// de phyir spro ba slu byed cing mnyam pa'i ngang la gnas// de la stong par mi lhung gza' gtad bral// rgya mtsho bzhin te thams cad mnyam par gnas// chos rnams sna tshogs
39a6(rnying rgyud): ngang gis 'byung bar byed// yon tan tshad ni nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// bsdu ba'i gnas ni 'di zhes nges pa med// byang chub snying por rtogs pa de ma zhag/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po chen po 'byung // dper na nam mkha'a'am rgya ma chen po bzhin// mi
39a7(rnying rgyud): rtog mnyam pa'i dang ste mkha' ltar yangs// kun tu bzang po mnyam pa'i spyod yul la// skye shi bral bas 'gro 'gyur ye nas med// 'dzin pa de nyid rgyu rkyen bcu gnyis yin// med pas skur ba yin te snang bas brtags pa yin// 'phral pa
39b1(rnying rgyud): snang bzhugs pa'i sgro tsam du// de nyid rtogs pa mkha' ltar shes par gyis// 'gro ba rigs drug 'khrul par snang ba yang // dang po'i las can dag tu shes par bya// 'dod yon lnga stod gzhan la thugs rngus brlan// des na gang ltar/
39b2(rnying rgyud): spyod kyang byang chub spyod pa yin// shan pa smad 'tshong mtshams med byed pa de// 'jig rten kha na ma tho spangs pa yin// de nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'i bdud rtsi ste// bde ba chen po nyid dang dbyer med phyir// rnam par mi rtog snying po zhes kyang bya// de ma/
39b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad rgyud la sbas pa med// blang dor med pa nyid du spyod rnams la// de nyid btsal ba med pa nyid du rang bzhin gnas// chos nyid yul la 'jug pa'i bsam gtan 'di// rnam par mi rtog chos rnams snying po yin// sems nyid chos nyid rtogs pa
39b4(rnying rgyud): rnams la rgyud// ces bstan to// kye 'dus pa'i tshogs chen de nyon cig/ dus la khyad par med nges pa// sdu ba da lta phye ba dus gsum ni// bder gshegs ye shes thugs la gcig tu gas pa// sems can bag chags bsags pas
39b5(rnying rgyud): gsum du gnas// gcig par snga phyi med par gdod nas byung // chos sku dus gsum gcig tu khyab pa'i phyir// che ba chos nyid chen po ye shes ni// ma bcos bde ba chen por rang bzhin gnas// des na dus la khyad par med par nges// zhes bya/ bla ma
39b6(rnying rgyud): mchod par nges pa ni// tshogs dang ye shes gang zag rnam pa gsum// sde phyi mnyam pas rim par bkod pa med// chos kun yongs su gcig pa'i gtan tshigs kyis// tshogs dang sangs rgyas gcig pa'i bsngo dang bral// tshogs kyi rgyan ni 'dod yon rnam
39b7(rnying rgyud): pa lnga// bkod pa med par rang bzhin bkram pa yang // ye nas rang bzhin gnas pas dri ma med// tsas bya/ mchod pa 'asngo du med pa ni// ye nas rang bzhin gnas pa'i tshogs chen te// ye nas lhun gyis grub pas me bcwo zhing // gzung 'dzin na
40a1(rnying rgyud): nas dgra pa'i bdud rtsi yin// dbang sna drug rgyud rnam shes drug la mchod// dbang po rnam shes bcu gnyis khyad par nga // lhag pa'i ting 'don drag gi bsdam pa las// byin gyis brlabs shing shes pas gzung du med// ces brtan
40a2(rnying rgyud): dka' sramatshon du med par nges pa ni// byang chub sems la rgya rkyen mi dgos sla// mtshon du med pas rtogs pa shin tu dka'// rgyu las ma byung bas na sla ba'i phyir// dmigs pa'i yul du ma gyur dka' bar bshad// byang chub sems ni mngon sum yul mi
40a3(rnying rgyud): gnas// snang srid kun la khyab pas nam mkha' 'dra// sems la ming dang tshig gis mtshon pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' ngas kyang mtshon du med// ces bstan/ bde dang sdug bsngal rgya mthun nges pa ni// dbang po drug ni yul la chags pa ste// yul la rang bzhin med
40a4(rnying rgyud): pas chags pa med// gnyis kar ma len tshig gi lam la gnas// brtags na ji ltar btags pa 'byung ba ni// dbum bzhin ni thag rnga'i sgra dang 'dra// bde batshul gyi sdug bsngal nyon mongs lnga// snying po byang chub sems su rgya mdzan zhes// 'gro ba'i mgon
40a5(rnying rgyud): ba rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// zhes bstan/ de nas sa ngas rnam pa gsum po bstan pa ni/ chos kyi dang bzhin ma des ni/ maud rje'i chos la nges paM med par bstan pa TI// sna mus/ chu brgyad du snang ba ni// ji ltar bltas pa de ltar ldang ba de// sems kyi
40a6(rnying rgyud): bag chags su yang des med par// snang ba de'i 'don rtsol sems byed pa ni// de la sems nyid bde ba yod ma yin// snang ba 'don cing rdol sems rgyas pa ni// de ni ma rtogs sgo/ ba dang gol gyon yin// zhes bsnyen/ grol dras pa me
40a7(rnying rgyud): pa ni// byang chub sems ni rgyud drug kun dang mtshungs// sems rtog chos nyid dpal 'gro ba'i lam// 'gro ba rigs drug kun gyi lam yin pas// byis pa'i blo la nges pa ma mchis pas// ma rig ma tshogs bskrad pas 'khrul ba'i phyir/
40b1(rnying rgyud): sems sman kyis srab dpan sman pa ma// rang sems sangs nus matogs gzhan rkyo // zhas bstan/ la shas mangs brtan d+han// da lta sa pa mdun kyil shes pan// sbom bdab cab nas la shes 'dang// snang ba ma das pa dAdan
40b2(rnying rgyud): ye shes dang // chab nas 'byung ba'i ye shes grangs byung bas// de yang ye shes rnam pa'i skyon yin pas// rang byung ye shes de la brten mi bya// zhes bya'o// nges par bstan pa'i mdo las/ man ngag rnam pa brgyad bstan pa dang / nges pa don gyi
40b3(rnying rgyud): 'grel pa'o// // de nas sems dpa' chen po dus/ 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs de rnams la/ chos thams cad rdzogs pa chen po'i byin brlab las byung ba'i phyir/ theg pa las 'bubs theg pa dgu'i mdo 'di gsungs so// kye 'dus pa'i
40b4(rnying rgyud): tshogs chen da nyon cig/ chos nyid rang bzhin sems nyid de// sems nyid rang bzhin rdzogs pa che// rdzogs chen chos nyid skye med las// skye ba'i chos phul 'byung ba'i phyir// longs spyod rdzogs sku sprul pa'i sra// sum brgyad dgu phrag rnam sprul pa// tshis
40b5(rnying rgyud): dang yi ge dgur grags te// theg pa rnam pa dgu ru bstan// de yang gang dang gang zhe na// nyan thos rang rgyal theg chen gsum// sprul pa'i sku yi gsung du bstan// gri ya yog gyi sa gsum// longs spyod rdzogs sku'i bstan par grags//
40b6(rnying rgyud): bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs chen gsum// chos kyi sgra yi gsung du bstan// sgra gsum yA na rnam pa dgu// rdzogs pa chen pos byin gyis rlobs// de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ sems nyid sku gsung thugs 'di las// sku gcig sku gsung thugs
40b7(rnying rgyud): ston te// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// sprul pa spu yi rang bzhin ni// bden pa bzhi yi chos nyid la// dbu zlas zhabs rjen brtul zhugs kyis// 'dul ba dgra bcom shAkya thub// sprul pa sku yi rang bzhin no// sprul pa gsung gi rang bzhin ni//
41a1(rnying rgyud): bca na du byung gAs ngas pa da// daH bkun 'grus gzhan pas// tis slo gsumag ngas pa// snyam paku na // rnags dang ngan du stong pa bdan/
41a2(rnying rgyud): rtog pa kun tu 'od kyis// mi dmigs ye shes mngon pazugs// sprul pa thugs kyi rang bzhin no// khyengs spyod rdzogs sku'i rang bzhin na// gza' skar dus chags bzar sgo nas// dag pa gsum stong rigs gsum bsrung // rgyan dang
41a3(rnying rgyud): lcags rdo rje 'dzin// longs spyod sku yi rang bzhin no// longs spyod gsung gi rang bzhin ni// thi pA log rkye na gsum// dam tshig bsgrub dang grub pa yis// tan sde gsum gsungs pa ni// longs spyod gsung gi rang bzhin no// longs
41a4(rnying rgyud): skyong drugs kyi rang bzhin ni// mtshan med pa comam nam thug pa stod// sngag rgyaba'i sad dang lta ba'ang// yangs sto thugs kyi nga bzhin// tshub ci sku yi rang bzhed do// chu gsum pa yi la sa sbyangs do// snang hU~M zung ba'i rtsom rna
41a5(rnying rgyud): kun// bdag nyid chen po chos skur 'dod// chos kyi sku yi rang bzhin no// chos nyid gsung gi rang bzhin ni// bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs chen gsum// su dang gsung dang zug sa kyi rgyud// chos nyid gsung gi rang bzhin no// chos nyid
41a6(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi rang bzhin ni// gzhung 'dzin med pa'i byang chub sems// sgo skur bral ba'i ye shes thugs// ye nas rang byung ye shes so// chos su thugs kyi rang ba nying ngo // chos lha'i rang bzhin byang chub sems// byang chub sems kyi 'byu
41a7(rnying rgyud): gnas 'di// theg pa dgu yi snying po ste// nga las ma byung gcig kyang med// nga ni kun gyi rang bzhin ston// thams cadang len shes par bya// sems nyid rdzogs pa chen po'o// thams cad 'byung ba'i snying po 'o// ngang las byung po
41b1(rnying rgyud): rnas nying // nA yang dag la ma zung na/ rgya 'azas dag pa'i tshab sbyi na// dbya sa dang la shes lan pa na// ma ti yog ca gang pa yid// sems las rlung // mang po khams sgyu
41b2(rnying rgyud): yenas rang rgyud dag pa ste// bdag nyid chen po yin pa'i phyir// ma hA yo gar bkod pa yin// sems las byung ba'i chos nyid ni// nang rdzas lnga sung phyi lnga spyang // mtshan med mi gos pa chags kyang // ye shes grogs su bgyub/
41b3(rnying rgyud): phyir// yo ga~M zhes su bshad pa yin// sems las byung ba'i chos nyid ni// yul dang dbang po bya sbyangs te// yid dri spangs dag gsum gyis// ye shes sems dpa' rjer blta phyir// gyi ya zhes su bkod pa yin// sems las bya
41b4(rnying rgyud): chos nyid ni// mi rtag sdug bsngal po bdag med// do ni nga ma kun rdzob badzin pa yis// sbyangs bzod rnam pa bcu spyo cir// byang chub sems dpa mad sngar bkod// sems las byung ba chos nyid ni// thug bsngal kun 'byung 'thog lam
41b5(rnying rgyud): zhing 'gegs pa'i shes pa yi// bzad pa gzeng dadzin spang 'joms phyir// nya thos pa rtul zhes su bkod// sems pas byung ba'i tshag nyid la ste// che ba'i ye shes 'thung ba'i phyir// sems nyi a nu yog rabashad// bams
41b6(rnying rgyud): las byung ba'i chos nyid pas// sangs rgyas lnga ru 'byung ba'i phyir// sems nyid ma hA yo gar bshad// sems las byung ba'i chos nyid las// phyag rgya chen po 'di 'byung phyir// sems nyid rnal 'byor rgyud ces bshad// sems las byung ba'i
41b7(rnying rgyud): chos nyid las// sku gsum rigs gsum 'byung ba'i phyir// sems nyid bya ba'i ku ces bshad// sems pas phung por chas nyi las// chos kyi spuru 'byung ba'i phyir// sems nyid rdzogs pa chen par bshad/ sams las byung ba 'tshong tid las//
42a1(rnying rgyud): dgra pa mas par byung bar bye/ du da tan nas dang rgyal bkur/ sarnams nyid dgas cas so// ga pa ga pas zung / zugs pa jugs pa rna pa bad// bsas pas bya maston pa brlabs/ brag pa drangs/
42a2(rnying rgyud): donapa pa'i tshig na / mas nga ldan pa rjo / dag pa pa nga ze shA nga/ ga pa
42a3(rnying rgyud): sems nyid rdzogs pa rgyan po sa// sems kyis maHsa tshas myed de// thams cad sems kyis byas par bstan// gnyen du med pa'i rang rje gi shi // dmigs su med pas shin tu rnyed par dgang // shes rab kyis nyid dag pathas
42a4(rnying rgyud): rtogs// chos nyid rig pa gnyis su med pas 'khrug// don dam ma yin bdwags pa'i ming tsam du// thabs dang shes rape gnyis la brten dra yang// che ba re ye shes pangon sum bde bde// d+hI byed med pa'i byang chub sems pas zung // rdzogs na dang /
42a5(rnying rgyud): gis yongs surnapa 'byor bstan// thams cad bskyed pa'i sangs rgyas zla po 'dis// rgyud drug gnas pa'i sems can phra la khrab// drilas kya ngon log pas dam tags kyang // sang sa rgyas mjugapa pa gzhan pas med// rang rtang ga pA yin par ga
42a6(rnying rgyud): na// rna'i kyang chen pa dag tu bstan pa yin// ma skyes bye ba phrul 'byung bay-i // kyi med rtogs mtshor rgya la dkar bamin// dang ye shes sbyong ba dang 'byugs pa// / dus gsus sangs da canan/
42a7(rnying rgyud): ma gyi ji ba zhin rtogs pa las// thogs me da dka' po med par thams cad byung // sems dpang rnapa 'byo pa rdzogs par bshad// rlung bri rigapas ze rin pangs su gta // gzung dzin ma dang jig pa yin par bsha
42b1(rnying rgyud): gyu pa du ga// semams mapa ma dgas sa/ gas so rnam nga ga sa pa nas// tha mad pa sa kyirgya bdun na ma nyam nagasags gas/
42b2(rnying rgyud): pa// tshu la slab 'das pa'i mas nyid rdzogs par bshad// gcig tu ma ngas khe ga gapa lda pa/ sems kyi TI zag zung bldan mas // rigs ldan ma shes khyang par snang ba yang // de bzhinas mas nyid rjes ma sa /
42b3(rnying rgyud): d+hung ye shes tshod pa snang bsan// 'dzini 'byung ba sprulas rtsol chen yin// mangs gnyis ga la rdzogs par bshad// rim pa das dang ba rji khri zhi song ni// sems can sangs rgyas lam pa 'gro ba'i lam// gang nas skyed kya nga ma 'thang rje/
42b4(rnying rgyud): nyid rdzogs ci mtshan ma med dbyung gis// 'jig rten pa ba 'dod pa'i bsti das sa/ chas nyi mtshan ma myed nga byung mi 'byur// sems nyed nags pa dag gis thabacwa bshad// sangs rgyas bad bachen po'i ma shi // sems can rten mo
42b5(rnying rgyud): sdug pa rnam pa la// snying po byung chub sems su mtshungs pa la// las kyi dbang gis ldang bar 'byung ba zhes// des maud mas rnam par btags pa pa// tsaM b+ha las de'i dbang du gyur pan// rkyen med dang byung la shas yod ma yin/ rna
42b6(rnying rgyud): no// rdzogs pa pas kyi bang 'gyur brten// byang chung sems ni tu med te// thams cad mas pa sa can byung// rlu sa pon sbed pas sgra smrasal// rkyed dang gtsun pa med papa 'dzig pazeng / ga pa
42b7(rnying rgyud): byang sa kyang 'bre'o// nga 'bral bsas sa nga chugs pas mi bskyod// rdzogs pa gtan pa dbang du 'gyur bdun/ namangs pa mchams su mi dbang gis na/ da yo ga sa ma mas sa
43a1(rnying rgyud): thubashams bya'os// ta'angamag bcang ston shing mo byung nga// rnga thathab pa dmachog nyams pa yod// sad kyis bzags 'bras thug tu chag rgya/ rnags tu ba sud dam dbang bcag dag/ gang ba bla
43a2(rnying rgyud): gtong bras bu yod par bye// rdzogs pas nyams pa'i dbang du mi 'gyur bstan// byung chub sems kyi mdong brel chen po b+hahA ma sa/ zag pa yas 'thabs kyi ma da dang don gyi 'brel pa dgu rdzogs // de nas yang semapa pa
43a3(rnying rgyud): chen po dang/ 'dres pa'i tshogs rnams cad la chos thams cad na byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po kho nar rdzogs pa'i phyir/ yongs su rdzogs pa'i mdo 'dreg spangs so// kye 'dus pa'i tshogs chen danyon cig/ ci skar blang ba'i chos
43a4(rnying rgyud): rnams ni// byang chub sems la rdzog pa'i phyir// byang chub sems dang shes par stis// byang chub sems 'di shes pa dang // ches kun rang la rdzogs par shes// rang las byung ba'i chos rnams kun// rang byung ye shes sems su shes// rang byung byang chub thems
43a5(rnying rgyud): 'dilas// ma yin pa yi chos med pas// sems ma yin gyi chos yod man// zhes gsungs pas/ 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams rab tu yi rang ste// kr-in 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis zhus pa/ e ma \u0f7f/ sems dpa' rdo rje kun tu bzang //
43a6(rnying rgyud): byung ngo chos rnapas gyun// sams ldan pams min mas snyed na// ba ga 'am pa'i tshogs kyi sems su yang // chos kun rab tu 'dus lags sas// zhes rdzas sa// de nas sems dpa chen pos don 'di gzung ba po// bya 'dus pa
43a7(rnying rgyud): tshogs can 'di rtogs pa// 'dzi ma ngan sran rig par gyis// sngang ces sbyin 'byung ca hA// 'byung la chuni byang chub sems// sems kyis chos rnams spang bar byed// sems mi snang la chos pa snang // des na ma sa sa
43b1(rnying rgyud): su 'dus// sems la gcig las yod ma yin// sems gcig kun tu khyab pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas ye shes thugs kyang sems// sems can bag chags yid kyang sems// sangs rgyas nyid la mi rtog rgyas// sems can rang rtog pag chags
43b2(rnying rgyud): bsgrib// rang byung sems de mi gnyis gcig/ gcig phyir dus gsum sangs rgyas dang // 'dus tshogs khyed sems dbyer med pas// sems nyid rdzogs pa chen po ni// yongs su rdzogs pa'i mdo zhes bya// kye 'dus pa'i tshogs
43b3(rnying rgyud): chen de nyon cig/ ci ltar snang ba'i chos rnams la// yongs su rdzogs pa'i mdo 'di la// don gyi rnam pa gnyis rdzogs te// 'jig rten yongs su rdzogs pa dang // 'das pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o// 'jig rten yongs su rdzogs pa
43b4(rnying rgyud): ni// srid gsum 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// brkam chags lnga yis lam sbyor zhing // khams gsum 'khor ba'i cho ga bskyed de// bde ba'i don med rgyud lngar 'khor// kye 'dus pa'i tshogs chen de nyon cig/ 'das pa yongs su rdzogs pa ni// man ngag bcu tshan
43b5(rnying rgyud): gsum bstan te// mdo dgu sems nyid rdzogs dang bcu// lung dgu man ngag bsdus dang bcu// tshig dbu byang chub sems dang bcu// de yang mdo dgu gang zhe na// gcig gi mdo dang gnyis kyi mdo// gsum gyi mdo dang bzhi yi
43b6(rnying rgyud): mdo// lnga yi mdo dang drug gi mdo// bdun gyi mdo dang brgyad kyi mdo// dgu yi mdo dang bcu yi mdo// thams cad rdzogs par bstan pa ni// gcig dang gnyis dang bcu bar du// grangs la mthun pa'i grangs kyis bstan// de yang
43b7(rnying rgyud): lhar bstan zhe na// gcig la gcig bstan gnyis la gnyis// gsum la gsum bstan bzhi la bzhi// lnga la lnga bstan drug la drug/ bdun la bdun bstan brgyad la brgyad// dbul dbu bstan bcu la bcu// lnga bcu rtsa ldang
44a1(rnying rgyud): phyug 'das// kun babyung dang sams dpa bkal// mdus ma/ ma sa// 'bang myu na la// thams cad pa rmugs pa ban// yad dbus pa na dag pa dang // / dang
44a2(rnying rgyud): gang zhe na// gcig mdo byang chub sems kyi mdo// gnyis mdo rnam par bzang ba'i mdo// gsum mdo phun sum tshogs pa'i mdo// bzhi mdo bye brag 'byed pa'i mdo// wa mdo byed par 'phags pa'i mang // zug mdog pa sleb bstan
44a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i mdo// bdun mdo gtan la 'bebs pa'i mdo// brgyad mdo nges par bstun pa'i mdo// dgu mdo theg pa yas phub mdo// badz+ra pa sems nyid rdzogs chen 'dis// lnga bcu rtsa lnga'i bye brag ston// de yang ji lta bu nid// gcig ni byang chub
44a4(rnying rgyud): sems yin te// byang chub sems la bzar du med// rtsa ba'i don du shes par gyis// gnyis ni rnam par bgrang ba ste// byang chub sems la gnyis bgrar bas// 'khor ba byang na 'angs pa ste// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su bzang// gsum
44a5(rnying rgyud): la don gsum bstan pa ni// ston pa bstan pa 'khor tshogs ni// dus dang gnas ni rang bzhin tshang // phun sum tshogs pa gsum du bstan// bzhi yi mdo la don bzhi skye// yo ga bzhi paM rnam pa la// rA nga la yang badz+ra bzhi sde// yog
44a6(rnying rgyud): bzhi pa bya zag 'byer// lnga yi mdo la don lnga ste// khyad par 'phags pa'i pado dag las// khyad par 'phags pa'i rtse lnga ston// drug pa'i mdo la don drug ste// gol sleb bstan pa'i mdo dag pa /
44a7(rnying rgyud): nges pa thob pa'i theg pa drug/ rdzogs pa chen po'i gol ser bstan// gol sa drug dang spring drug go// bdun pa'i mdol don bdun te// gtan la 'bebs pa'i mdo dag las// lung tshon gsum dang man dge pa'o// rnam pa bdun gyim
44b1(rnying rgyud): la 'bebs// brgyad pa ji ma da la don brgyad ste// nges par ston pa'i mdo dag las// nges pa dag ni rnam brgyad kyis// med pa brgyad dang nges pa la// ma nges rnam pa gsum dang brgyad// brgyad pa gnyis kyi rnam pa bstan// dgu pa'i mdag dan
44b2(rnying rgyud): dgu ste// theg pa yas 'bubs mdo dag las// bden pa dgu yi tshig dgu ni// yas 'thams theg pa dgu ru bstan// bcu pa'i mdol don bcu ste// yongs su rdzogs pa'i mdo dag las// lung dgu man 'ag bsdus dang bcu'o// de la mdo dku sems dang
44b3(rnying rgyud): bcud// sems dpa' nga yis bshad pa yin// lus dgu man ngag bsdus dang bcu// de don gang dang gang zhe na// rtsa ba bzhi yi rtsis 'go dang // sdud par byed pa'i thig le dang // 'gyur ba med pa'i phyag rgya dang // bgrod lam nor pa'i gol sa dang // ma shes pa
44b4(rnying rgyud): yi sgrib pa dang // 'brel pa rgyud tu bstan pa dang // gtan la 'bebs pa'i lung chen dang // la bzlang ba yi man ngag dang // nges pa dag gis yin pa dang // don bsdus pa yi gtan tshigs bcu'o// de yang gang dang gang zhe na// rtsa ba bzhi yi rtsis 'go ni// /
44b5(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// ston pa rdo rje yin te// ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' la// ming dang don dang dpe dang ni// rang bzhin dag gi che ba bstan// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// ming ni rdo rje sems dpa' la// don gyi rang bzhin skye ba med/ dpe
44b6(rnying rgyud): ni nam mkha' lta bu ste// che ba lnga ni khyad par 'phags// des na rtsa ba bzhi zhes bya// sdud par byed pa'i thig le ni// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo ni// spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// sdud par byed pa'i thig le ste// spos mod thig pa chen po
44b7(rnying rgyud): drug/ che ba'i yon tan rnam grangs te// chos nyid byang chub sems la bgrang // de yang de ltar sdud ce na// spos med chos nyid thig le ni// ma bcom pa yi byang chub sems// rang bzhin gnas pa'i thig ler bshad// byang chub sems kyi che ba
45a1(rnying rgyud): yan// spos med dbyings kyi thig ldan// thams cang srung ba'i byang chub sems// 'byed par byed pa'i thig ler sdud// byang chub sems kyi rgya ba yin// dbyings nyid dam dag thig sa ni// gzung byon drag pa'i byang chub thAn/
45a2(rnying rgyud): sapa med pa'i thig ler srung // byang chub sems kyi che ba yin// ye shes chen po'i theg le ni// ma bsgribs pa yi byang chub sem sa// 'gag pa med pa'i thig ler sdud // byang chub sems kyi che ba yin// spros med kun bzang thig
45a3(rnying rgyud): le ni// blang dor med pa'i byang chub sems// mnyam pa chen po'i thig ler sdud// byang chub sems kyi che ba yin// spros med lhun gnas thig le ni// rtsol bsgrub 'das pa'i byang chub sems// ma g.yos pa yi thig ler ldar//
45a4(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi che ba yin// thig le thig le zhes bya ba// spros pa med pa'i don yin te// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin no// 'gyur ba med pa'i phyag cha ni// rang byung ye shes spyod med pas// bcu gnyis lnga ru shes par bya// ye
45a5(rnying rgyud): shes don gyi bye brag yin// gtan la 'bebs pa'i mdo yis bstan// bgod lam nor ba'i gol sa dang // ma shes pa yi wibA prA dang // rang bzhin 'di bcu ma shes pas// go la ma dang ni sleb par 'gyur// rang bzhin btu ni 'di
45a6(rnying rgyud): lta ste// blta ba dang ni dam tshig dang // phrin las dang ni ye shes dang // sa dang lam gyi rim pa dang // phra ba chos nyid rang bzhin dang // 'brel pa chud kyi rang bzhin dang // thog tu 'bebs pa'i lung chen dang // la zlo ba yi man ngag go//
45a7(rnying rgyud): nges bathob pa'i theg padrug// sems nyid rtog pa chen po la// rang bzhin 'di bcus khyad pa'i phyir// rang bzhin 'di bcu shes par bya// de yang gang dang gang zhe na// blta ba bdun dang dam tshig bdun// phrin las bdun dang ye shes bdun// sa 'dun dang ni bgrod
45b1(rnying rgyud): lam bdun// phra ba chos bdun byur 'phel bdan// zug tu 'bebs pa'i lung bdun dang // larko pa ye man ngag bdun// brgya man bdun gyi rang bzhin 'di// rdeg pa bdun gyi rdzo ba yis// gong man nas bslab par bshad// 'og mang /
45b2(rnying rgyud): lam nor ga las ste// grol sa bcu tshan drug dang ni// sgrib pa bcu tshan drug yod do// sum pa rgya drug d+ha'i gel sgrib bzang // de yang gang zag blo la snang // rnal 'byor bzhi las phye ba ni// sdoms brgya dang brgyang tshul// khrib pa
45b3(rnying rgyud): sum cu bcu gnyis bcu// nyis brgya bzhi bcu'i go la sgrib bgrang // sum cu tham pa bgrang ba ni// rnal 'byor bzhi las bgrang ba ste// rang bzhin bcu yi gol sgrib la// gang gol gang sgri ngos ma bzung // 'di gol 'di sgri ba bstan/
45b4(rnying rgyud): pa med// 'di gol 'di sgrib bstan pa ni// rang bzhin bcu po gcig la yang // la la go la sa la la sgrib// thag pa bdun gyi ngol snang // des na gol sgrib bcu gnyis so// rang bzhin bcu po gcig la yang // ldan bdun gyi grol
45b5(rnying rgyud): bgrangs na// gol sa bcu dang sgrib pa bcu/ gcig la sgrib pa me gnas la// gcig la gcig gol yod pa man// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// rdzogs chen a ti yo ga la// sgrib pa bcu yis bslab pa med// go las drug cu tham pa yod/ theg
45b6(rnying rgyud): rkyen byang chub sems dpa' la// gol sa bcu po bgrang du med// slob pa drug dranam pa yod// rdzogs chen shin rgyarnal 'byor la// go lngas bstan pa de bzhin du// yongs su rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa// sgrib pa rnam pa brda
45b7(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin bcwa yis sgrib pa'o// gol sa bcu tshan lnga bstan te// rang bzhin bcu yis gol sa'o// rnal 'byor chen po bskyed pa la// sgrib pa bcu tshan gnyis bstan pa// gol sa bcu chen bzhi bstan te// rang bzhin bcum ga
46a1(rnying rgyud): sgrib pa// sems dpa' chen po'i rnal 'byor la// gol sgrib brgya tshan gsum gsum ste// de yang rang bzhin grol sgrib bo// gnyis ka spyod pa leswa pa ya// sgrib pa bcu tshan pa zhis bsgri zlabs// gol sa bcu tshan gnyis su
46a2(rnying rgyud): bstan// de yang rang bzhin bcwa las bstan// bya ba dag gi pri yAl// sgrib pa brda tshan lngas bsgribs la// gol sa brgya tshan gcig gis bsnun// des na sum brgya drug rngur bshad// theg pa rnam pa drug pa yis// rang gi rang bzhin ma shes na
46a3(rnying rgyud): gol sgrib gong du bstan pa 'byung // rnal 'byor rnam pa bzhi po lnga// gol sgri banyis pa rgya bzhi bcu byung // gol sgo bgrangs de 'byung ba ni// yA na rnam pa bdun po lnga// lta ba re dang dam tshig re// zin pas re dang ye shes re// sa re lam
46a4(rnying rgyud): re phra ba re// rgyud re lung rlo man ngag re// yA ni re la yod pa'i phyir// dris na gol sgrib grangs su 'byung // 'di ru mdo tsam bstan pa yin// gol sgrib bstan pa'i mdo yis bstan// 'phral pa rgyud kyi rang bzhin ni// rnam pa bcu ru
46a5(rnying rgyud): shes par bya// snang ba dang ni srid par 'bral// snong dang bzung du ye nas 'thob// 'khor ba myang 'das pa nas 'brel// rgyu dang 'bras bu yi nas 'brel// yul dang dbang po la nas 'bral// thabs dang shes rab yenas 'brel// dbyings
46a6(rnying rgyud): dang ye shes ye nas 'brel// don dam kun rdzob ye nas 'brel// sems dang chos su ye nas 'brel// des na sangs rgyas sems can 'bral// rgyud kyi rang bzhin 'brel par bshad// de yang ci lta bu zhe na// ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams ni//
46a7(rnying rgyud): sring bsnang bar 'byung ba'i phyir// 'brel po zhes su bshad ba men/ snod na ye nas bcu gnas te// snod ces bya ba bcud kyi snod// des na snang ba rgyang ye nas 'brel// rlung drug 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// ye nas mya ngan 'a
46b1(rnying rgyud): pa'izla// des na yonas rgyu yis 'bral// gang rgyas bon de las ni// gang gi 'bras bu 'byung bas// rgyu dang 'bras bur ye nas 'brel// dbang po dag la yul gsal bas// ma 'gags dang ston dag gis gsal// ngas na yul da /
46b2(rnying rgyud): dbang par 'brel// gang zhig sgyu med yul drani// rig pa thabs kyi rgyal blor rtogs// des ni thabs dang shes rang 'brel// spros dang bral ba'i chos dbyings de// ma bsgribs pa ye ye shes yin// des na dbyings dang
46b3(rnying rgyud): ye shes 'jal// bran rdzob tshig dang yi ge yis// don dam brjod du med par rtogs// des na kun rdzob don dam 'brel// sems pa chos su 'brel bani// sems de chos kyi yul la gnas// chos yul sems su ye
46b4(rnying rgyud): gsal bas// des na sems dang chos su 'brel// sangs rgyas sems can 'brel ba ni// sangs rgyas thugs rje sems can la// smon lam gcig la ya nas 'brel// des na 'brel pa bcu zhes bshad// gtan la 'bebs pa'i
46b5(rnying rgyud): lung chen ne// dper na blon pos gtam sbas la// bkra' lung zhes ni sgrogs pa med// rgyal po dag gis bka 'phrul pa// de la bka' lu zhes su gdags// de bzhin gang zag don bstan yang // lung zhes bya bar ming mi 'dogs// de
46b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin ston pa rnam gsum gyis// gang rig dbang po ma dpra'// badren pa'i tshig dbu smras pa ni// sbyin pa'i lung dbu zhes su gdags// la dz+nyA ba ya~M bAn dag ni// rnam pa bcoM rmugs par bya// de yang gang dang gang zhen/
46b7(rnying rgyud): bdang ninga'i rtseg dang // tham pas dadzin pa shes dang // sa dang la mgyi ma pa dang // phra ba chos dang rgyud de yang // min gapa ban bcung // sems pa rdzogs par bstan pa bzhin// man ngag tun shes pa bya// nges pa
47a1(rnying rgyud): ga/ sa ga na
47a2(rnying rgyud): sa
47a3(rnying rgyud): sugs la/ skyes pa da da da pa da ga sa ldan pas sa sa// rnams da
47a4(rnying rgyud): shing rdzogs pa / san su mtshogs pa pa/ nyid kyi che ba'i myi pas po'is tu phyi'ababab par bshad/ bsams kyi lung zhes bshad/
47a5(rnying rgyud): ngogs pa rdzun rjod ni// mni ga rang bzhin pa 'dis// sgo srang 'das par la bshang// da mas pa lag na// rnam pa yang bgyu pa/ dgas don lnga dang man dgra' kyang// rnam
47a6(rnying rgyud): dag sa /
47a7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs mi dgas dus/ sel pa bzhid// 'dra nan/ da ma la dang /
47b1(rnying rgyud): sbyor ba dag pa dang // 'byed pa med dang sgrol ba dang // rdzogs pa chen po'i man drug go// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// sa la spyad du med pa yin// lam la bzod du med pa yin// dkyil 'khor mtha' dbus med pa yin// las la ba du
47b2(rnying rgyud): med pa yin// sbyor ba gnyis su med pa yin// gAcig la dbye du med pa yin// rgyu rkyen ma gyis skye med bskal// rdzogs pa chen po'i man ngag ni// sems nyid rdzogs pa chen po ru// ches kun 'di ru rdzogs pa'o//
47b3(rnying rgyud): srog bzhi myan ngag gang zhe na// rnal 'byor srog ni dam tshig yin// dam tshig bzhi ni gang zhe na// bsrang du med pa rnam bzhi ste// med pa dang ni phyal pa dang // gcig pu dang ni ldan grub bo// dam tshig srog ni blta ba yin// blta
47b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i srog ni ston pa'i lung // lung gi srog ni man ngag go// de yi srog ni gsang ba'o// lnga gcig gsum gyis 'phags pa ni// de yang gang dang gang zhe na// khyad par 'phags pa'i mdo dag las// khyad par 'phags pa'i tshe
47b5(rnying rgyud): lngas 'phags// gsum 'phags phun sum tshogs mdo las// phun sum tshogs pa gsum gyis 'phags// gcig 'phags byang chub sems mdos 'phags// des na theg pa kun las 'phags// gdags su yod med
47b6(rnying rgyud): bstan pa ni// gdags su yod par bstan pa dang // gdags su med par bstan pa'o// gdags su yod par bstan pa ni// rnam par bgrang ba'i mdo dag dang // theg pa yas phub mdo dag las// bden pa tshig tu gdags su yod//
47b7(rnying rgyud): cho ga dgu ston pa'i ston pa yang // gdags su yod par bshad pa yin// gdags su med par bstan pa ni// nges pa ston pa'i mdo dag las// gdags su med pa brgyad bstan pa// byang chub sems kyi mdo dag las// byang chub
48a1(rnying rgyud): sems la mtshon du med// des na gdags su med ces b+ha// don bsdus pa yi gtan tshegs so// / de nas sems dpa' chen po ngas/ 'dus pa'i tshogs chen la chos thams cad chog dkur 'dus lnga/ chog dgu
48a2(rnying rgyud): byang chub kyi sems gcig la smras pa/ byang chub sems ni sems dpa' nga nyid yin par spras pa 'di gsungs so// kye 'dus pa'i tshogs chen da nyon cig/ tshig dgu byang chub sems bcu ni// tshig dgu sbas pa sems kyis smras
48a3(rnying rgyud): sems de bstan phyir tshig dgu byung // nga ni sems kyi chos nyid de// sems nyid ye nas 'dus ma byas// nga ni sems dpa' rdo rje zhes// kun bzung byang chub sems kyis btags// byang chub sems kyi chos nyid la// rang byung ye shes rgyu med
48a4(rnying rgyud): pas// rang byung ye shes gnyen po med// btsal du med pa'i byang chub sems// sbyar du med pa'i byang chub sems// bsam du med pa'i byang chub sems// dngos po bral ba'i byang chub sems// bstan du med pa'i byang chub sems// spos
48a5(rnying rgyud): pa med pa'i byang chub sems// brtag tu med pa'i byang chub sems// blo skur bral ba'i byang chub sems// kun las 'das pa'i sems nyid 'dir// chos kun ye nas 'dus shing gnas// sems nyid nam mkha' lta bur gnas// nam mkha'
48a6(rnying rgyud): ci la'ang mi gnas bzhin// sems nyid ci la'ang gnas pa med// sems dpang chen po nga yis ni// nga yi rang bzhin bstan pa dgu// khyed la tshig dgu bstan pa 'dis// nga yi rang bzhin shes par gyis// nga yi rang bzhin 'di shes na//
48a7(rnying rgyud): khyed kyang nga yi rang bzhin yin// nga yi chos rnams thams cad kyang // spyod yul kun las 'das pa'i phyir// sgo skur kun dang dbral lo// zhes yongs su rdzogs pa'i mdo'o// / de nas sems dpa' chen po rdo rje des/ 'dus pa'i tshogs
48b1(rnying rgyud): pa yongs su rdugs pa'i mad las don gyi mda' 'grel pa bcwa pa 'di gsungs so// kye 'dus pa'i tshogs chen da nyon cig/ yongs su rdzogs pa'i mdodzad do// rdzogs pa rnam pa gnyis su rdzogs// 'jig rten yongs su rdzogs pa dang // 'das
48b2(rnying rgyud): pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o// 'jig rten rnam pa gnyis bstan la// 'das pa rnam pa brgyad kyis bstan// 'jig rten las dang bsam pa gnyis// 'jig rten khams gsum las kyi sbyor ba yang // don dam med pa'i lha mar snang ba skye/
48b3(rnying rgyud): don dam ma yin tshig tsam snang ba ste// 'jig rten 'di na bsod nams tshogs pa yis// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i gnas thob kyang // mi rtag sgyu ma 'dra ba'i bsti gnas yin// 'jig rten 'di yi bsam pa de lta'o// sna tshogs spyod cing med pa'i
48b4(rnying rgyud): dus la ltos// las kyi dus dor 'byung bar mi 'gyur te// chags dang ma bral smon lam 'debs pas na// 'bras bu med cing stong par gsungs pa yin// des ni 'jig rten lta ba bstan pa yin// de las 'das pa yongs su rdzogs pa la brkyang
48b5(rnying rgyud): de/ nyan thos dag gi rang bzhin dang // rdzogs pa chen po bstan pa dang // lam bstan pa dang lam gyi dpe// yid la ma bsags tshogs chen dang // skra dang ye shes bstan pa dang // bsgom du med par bstan pa dang // rol pa rang las
48b6(rnying rgyud): byung bar bstan paro// de la nyan thos bstan pa ni// btsal du med pa'i chos nyid dal ni// dbang po drug brdul 'dul ba'i khrims zhugs rtsol// sdug bsngal lus kyi spyod drag gis// spyad kyang nges pa'i gnas ni med med de/
48b7(rnying rgyud): l+r-ing gi a dang ston pa'i bar ldan na// skad cig sgyu ma'i bde ba 'byung bar 'dod// ces bstan/ rdzogs po chen po'i rol pa bstan po ni// chos nyid byeng chub sems ni nam mkha' 'dra// sems la rtog pa med pa chos kyi sku//
49a1(rnying rgyud): po mtshan ma med pas bzung mo zin// dbuni chul snang ba'i zla ba 'dra// chos su ma skyes kun tu bzang po las// ral pa skye ba'i cho 'phrul 'byung ba ni// snang srid mngon du 'byung ba'i chos nyid de// don dam sbya
49a2(rnying rgyud): med pas A lir bshad// rig pa mngon du gyur pa'i sems nyid ni// chos la 'gegs pa med pa kA yir bshad// de ni rdzogs pa chen po'i rol par bshad// chos nyid lam gyi rang bzhin bstan pa ni// sngon gyi lam yang chos
49a3(rnying rgyud): nyid byang chub sems// da lta'i lam yang chos nyid chos kyi dbyings// snga ma rnams ni lam gyi dpe bzhin du// chos nyid de ni phyi lam gnas su che// de ltar snga ma sangs rgyas snga ma'i lam bzhin du// chos nyid skye ba med pa de bzhin du//
49a4(rnying rgyud): phyi ma kun gyi lam gyi rang bzhin no// kun gyi lam nyid yin par bstan pa ni// gong ma kun gyi lam dang 'dra bar ni// 'gro ba yongs kyi lam ni chos nyid do// chos nyid nam mkha'i zla ba 'dra ba la// tshig brjod mdzub mos bston dang bcas pa 'dra//
49a5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas sems can kun gyi mnyam pa ni// chos nyid bde ba chen po de yin la// snang ba med pa'i chos nyid de la ni// dbang pos bltas pas chos nyid 'grub pa med// ces bstan/ yid kyi tshogs chen bstan pa ni// snang srid yid kyis
