49a6(rnying rgyud): tshogs pa sngos yon bdag ste// dbang pos bltas pas 'dod yon bkram pa'o// dbang po'i mig gis tshogs su mthong ba ni// 'dod yon lnga ru gsal bas dngos grub po// de la ting 'dzin mnyam par bzhag pa ni// rgyu dang ye shes
49a7(rnying rgyud): tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'o// zhes bstan to// sku dang ye shes bstan pa ni// byang chub sems ni dngos po cir mi g.yo// gzung 'dzin mi mnga' chos sku phyag rgya yin// ting 'dzin mi bskyod rang byang ye shes te// chos nyid mtshan
49b1(rnying rgyud): mar me len bdag med cing // sems kyis gang yang mi spang dar ba med// be g.yo mi bskyod mi len mi 'dor bas// 'di zhes brjod med tshig bral mnyam nyin do// zhes bstan/ bsgom du med pa bstan pa ni// srid pa 'byung ba snang ba yod
49b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos// chos nyid byang chub sems la snang ba med// ma btsal rang bzhin bzhag pas bsgom pa'i mchog/ btsal med chos la yod par rnam btsal na// nam mkha' dag la khang pa phub pa 'dra// med par yod pa'i 'bras bu yongs
49b3(rnying rgyud): mi 'byung // zhes bstan/ rol pa radu las 'byung bar bstan pa ni// rgyu med rang byung sems ni ngo mtshar che// de las rkyen med ye shes rmad byung 'di// bkag pa mes par spyod pas rol pa 'di// byur med rtsol bsgrub mi mnga'
49b4(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' bzhin// dngos po cir yang mi dmigs gti mug las// thogs med rmad du byung ba de ma thag/ rgyu med rang byung ye shes rol pa 'byung // zhes byang chub sems kyi mdo yi 'grel pa las/ yongs su rdzogs pa'i don gyi
49b5(rnying rgyud): 'grel pa bcu pa rdzogs so// // de nas sems dpa' chen po des/ 'dus pa'i tshogs la chos thams cad tshig dang yi ges gtan la dbab tu med pa de/ tshig dang yi ges 'brel pa'i sgo nas/ gang zag gi blo yis
49b6(rnying rgyud): rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ don gyi 'grel pa lnga po 'di gsungs so// kye 'dus pa'i tshogs chen de nyon cig/ snga rabs 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyang // don gyi 'brel pa lnga po 'di// rtogs nas skye med sa la gshegs// da ltar
49b7(rnying rgyud): bzhugs pa'i rnal 'byor yang // don gyi 'grel pa lnga po 'dis// nga yi lung chen don rtogs nas// dgongs pa 'di yis gnas par byed// slad nas byon pa'i gdung 'tsho ba rnams// don gyi 'grol pa lnga po 'di// gtan la
50a1(rnying rgyud): nga shol ba / na nas sa na pa dag/ ba dang/
50a2(rnying rgyud): 'a me brel ba ni// srog 'do dang rang basbyin dag/ tshig dang lag shugs yin lag bdags// dbadzad lta den// lag cu gtsug skyes byol// dgas pa ldan lag bdun // mag nga yani la gcig gdu bdang//
50a3(rnying rgyud): lam 'dun pa// tshig mig 'as zhing shA na 'od// yan lag thugs kyis 'gro bar byed// yan lag shugs kyis 'gros bslangs nas// mA rgan don gyi la ma du gas// rdzogags rgyas rnams ming ngas// gdabyel rje dazugs gcod// sesas don pa
50a4(rnying rgyud): ni/ len par dbum cig dang // klubs da shepa rab zil bdang // thab pan ldan tu med pa/ sbyi panam ra bcas// rdzog ma ma kris dang sa pa jug ga byas gas shes pa da / smon pade mi gsung ngos bdug du ma
50a5(rnying rgyud): da nag ba badz+ra b+hU/ r+dz+dzag par ci ni kyil ba ngas// zhabs kyi da ma thal ba/ 'das pa ga nam mchog/ yos gsungs pa dan pa mA/ par yus chug danan// ga par phyog sug // gang sa 'i thugs na pa'i byabyas
50a6(rnying rgyud): bya na sa/ sa byus/ dus sgyum nyi sa shA shA shA ga sa du /
50a7(rnying rgyud): cigi brel bar bad/ 'an tu thus 'dzum sa turnas / rjebachog pa mcho/ ba gang sabras bu tshig ga ba 'thul bdabargyabya 'du lag sa sa byer pa rje
50b1(rnying rgyud): gsum// dpe du bstan pa'i 'brel pa'o// de bas de phyir des na gsum// gang yin don de de mthong na// gtan tshigs bstan pa'i 'grel pa'o// de nas de yang de las gsum// rgyu 'bras bstan pa'i 'grel pa'o// de yin de min yid ches na//
50b2(rnying rgyud): kyi 'grel pa yin par bshad// 'bru dang yan lag gcig la yang // dpe don de ltar yod pas na// de bzhin 'bru lag kun la brtag/ dpe don rgyu 'bras 'grel par bshad// gtan tshigs don gyi 'grel pa ni// yan lag gang gi/
50b3(rnying rgyud): don 'byung ba// tshig 'bru las ni don dbyung bya// rgyu yi tshig dang 'bras bu'i tshig/ dpe yi tshig gam don gyi tshig/ rtags sam gtan tshigs gang yin tshig/ brtags te don de dbyung bar bya// gtan tshigs dag gi 'grel par bshad//
50b4(rnying rgyud): 'byed par byed pa'i 'grel pa ni// so so dag gi ngo bstan nas// sde dang tshan dang ris su phye// 'byed par byed pa'i 'grel pa yin// chos kun rtsa ba gcig bsdus nas// spros pa med pa'i don ston na// sdud par byed pa'i 'grel pa yin// tshig
50b5(rnying rgyud): dang 'bru yi don 'di ni// tshig bar 'bru yi 'grel par bshad// 'dra dang yod min don 'di ni// dpe don rgyu 'bras 'grel par bshad// brtags te gtan tshigs don 'byin na// gtan tshigs dag gi 'grel par bshad// so so'i sde
50b6(rnying rgyud): tshan res 'byed na// sa gcod pa yi 'grel par bshad// rtsa ba gcig tu don ston na// srud par byed pa'i 'grel par bshad// tshig par 'bru yi 'grel pa yis// tshig dang 'bru dang tshig mI 'dus// 'brul lhag ma sI las
50b7(rnying rgyud): te// 'bru 'joms pa yi 'grel par bshad// dpe don rgyu 'bras 'grel pa 'dis// 'dra dang yin min don bstan nas// chos la de ni ming du 'dogs// ngo bo bstan pa'i 'grel par bshad// gtan tshigs don gyi 'grel
51a1(rnying rgyud): 'di stong chog da drug 'dun gang nga rdzas lang dbyad/
51a2(rnying rgyud): pa ni// mnor pa yi stong po babyin// nges par gtan la 'bebs pas na// don 'byin pa lo 'grol par bshad// 'byod par byed pa'i 'grel po ni// saM m+b+ha dag gang bstan nas// b+h+rUM dang rgyan dang
51a3(rnying rgyud): 'byed pas// sa gcod pa yi 'phel par bshad// sma par rnyed pa'i 'phrul pa de// rdos kun \u0f7fba gcig bsdus nas// smras pa med pa'i don du ston// don bsdus pa yi 'grel pAr bshad// don kyi 'grel palta
51a4(rnying rgyud): ma bshad ston phyeng lnga yod+hid// tsog par y-i bral mengan// mug pa nga chungs chog sa spobs// 'bru ma chems pa'i sbyin du gyur// dpe den byas phrul med na// mas pa mi gas mi thogs te// mtshon du ma
51a5(rnying rgyud): skyon 'gyur// gtan tshigs dag gi 'grel me na// don g+ha~M rba ba mi rnyid de// dan ma rkyen pa'i skyo du 'gyur// 'byud par byed pa'i ts+tsha medan// tha dad dzini maud byis te// sri sa tsa zag mi skyed// sa mdzod pa'i na
51a6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// sdud par byed pa'i dpel med na// rtsu ba gcig tu mi 'gyur te// mtha' yas pa yi sbyin du 'gyur// des na 'grel pa lnga po 'di// dus gsum bzhugs pa sangs rgyas kyis// gsung gi tshig tungs smras pa// 'ongs pa'i
51a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor tshogs khyed rnams kyis// kun bzang rdo rje nga yi lung // byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// rtogs phyir 'grel pa lnga po 'di// nga yis khyud la bstan pa yin// zhes gsungs so// yongs su rdzogs pa'i mdo dang don gyi 'grel
51a8(rnying rgyud): pa lnga pa rdzogs so// / de nas sems dpa' chen po dang / byang chub sems kyi bstan pa gtad pa 'di gsungs so// kye 'dus pa'i tshogs chen 'dazur zhig/ byang chub sems kyi mdo bcu 'di// snang srid sdod bcu
51b1(rnying rgyud): thams cad dang // 'khor 'das sangs rgyas sems can dang // ston pa kun bzang byang chub dang // ston pa sems nyid rdzogs chen rnams// ye nas gnyis med gcig pa'i phyir// gcig la gnyis su bgrang du med// bgrang du med pa'i
51b2(rnying rgyud): bden tshig dgu// gcig don spros pa med pa de// nga yis khyod la bstan pa yang // spang 'geg sbyar zhing bgrod pa dang // gzung 'dzin blang dor bya ba dang // lha skyong rtsol bsgrub byar med de// lAm dang gnyen pos bcos med par//
51b3(rnying rgyud): byung sems kun bzang rang bzhin du// nga yis bstan pa'i don 'di ni// byang chub sems kyi lung chen yin// rgyud dang mdo sde'i spyi 'grel yin// man ngag kun gyi rtsa ba yin// gsung rab kun gyi snying po yin// bstan pa kun gyi yang
51b4(rnying rgyud): rtse yin// theg pa kun gyi nying khu yin// ma rig pa yi mun sel yin// rtog pa'i dra ba 'di yis sel// nyon mo nges 'phreng theg 'di yis gcod// ye shes chen po'i snang ba 'dis// lhag mA med pa'i rdzogs chen te// snad srid snod
51b5(rnying rgyud): bcud thams cad dang // sangs rgyas sems can thams cad dang // bstan pa'i theg pa thams cad kun// sems nyid rdzogs chen 'di la 'dus// 'di la gnas shing 'di don ston// 'di ni kun bzang nga yin te// sangs rgyas
51b6(rnying rgyud): kun gyi ston pa yin// 'dus pa'i tshogs la 'di gtad do// zhes bka' stsal to// bstan pa yongs su gtad pa'i le'u'o// // byang chub sems kyi mdo theg pa kun gyi 'grel pa 'bum sde bzhug pa las byang chub sems kyi mdo 'grel chen po bcu pa rdzogs s+ho// //
51b7(rnying rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ sarba d+harmA ma hA sad+d+he bo d+he tset+ta saM sa ra mU la ts+tshed A ka sha sa pA na k+Sha ra tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po 'khor brtsad nas gcod pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i yi ge med pa'i rgyud
51b8(rnying rgyud): par 'dir la zlo gsang ba'i 'khor lo 'dzud//
52a1(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kun rig rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad rtogs pa'i dus gcig na// mkha' klong rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// kun bzang yangs pa skye med klong // ye shes lnga rdzogs 'od zer 'gro// rdo rjes ma
52a2(rnying rgyud): dpang 'dus ma byas// e ma do mtshar rmang byung gtsug/ de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// kun gzhi rtsad nas ci ltar gcad// shes bya'i sras thag gcad pa ci// rig pa'i gnad ni gang du
52a3(rnying rgyud): bsdu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gdod nas ma skyes snying po a// 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas// ma rig las dang rlung gis 'khor// rtogs na rdzogs sangs rgyas su nges// e ma rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// brgya
52a4(rnying rgyud): bas phyi rgya rlabs kyis gcad// ting nge 'dzin la 'byung 'jug med// gnyis med rjong na yangs pa'i chu// kun tu bzang po bde chenas// e mra sems dpa' rdo rje che// thams cad dang rig byang chub sems// nam mkha' bzhin du
52a5(rnying rgyud): spros dang bral// sna tshogs rang bzhin mi gnyis tshe// thig ler rdzogs pas mtshon du med// e ma kun bzang bcom ldan che// skye ba med pa'i chos nyid la// skye ba'i cho 'phrul ci ste 'ong // kun la de bzhin nyid yod na// 'bad pa
52a6(rnying rgyud): med par grol bar rigs// 'khrul pas 'khor ba ji lta bu// rtogs pa'i thabs su gang che lags// lha bsgom spyong rabs bye zag gang // thams cad sems nyid shar ba la// bar do zhes pa yod dam med// rig pa
52a7(rnying rgyud): spos dang bral ba la// bsgom du yod pa yin nam min// sna tshogs rang bzhin gnyis med la// 'bras bu thob tu yod dam med// mtshon med thig le'i ye shes la// thugs rje 'byung ngam mi 'byung lags// nam mkha' dang
52b1(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa yi ge med pa'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi ri le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa// skye ba med las thams cad skyes// skyes tsam nyid nAng pos skyong // de nyid kye med snying po yin// gdod nas ma skyes
52b2(rnying rgyud): tshig las 'das// spos bral brjod med kho na nyid// mtha' bral gnyis med don dam klong // dgag bya ba sgrub bya rnam par dag/ ma skyes rdo rje gnyis med dang // yid la mi byed bya btsal bral// ma bcos spros med chos nyid dbyangs//
52b3(rnying rgyud): mtha' bral mi dmigs rang bzhin dag/ bgrod med lhun grub yangs pa che// kun grol nyag gcig bde ba che// dmigs med ye shes rang snang dang // brdal khyab mkha' gsal dag pa'i chos// spros med byang chub snying po'i rdzong // bsam
52b4(rnying rgyud): 'das brjod med rang sar grol// mi 'gyur mnyam nyid dopa dang thal// dpe bral ye shes mtshon bu med// gnyis med rdzogs pas mtha' bral rjo dA// mi skye mi 'gag cir mi dgongs// 'gag med A li kA lir rol// dgag
52b5(rnying rgyud): bsgrub med pa'i ye shes ni// rgyu yis ma bskyed rkyen dang bral// stong gsal dbyer med ye shes can// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yi ge med pa'i rgyud las/ skye med rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom
52b6(rnying rgyud): lhan bka' stsal pa// rnam par mi rtog snying po 'di// yongs kyi rgyud la sbas pa med// don dam chos nyid snying po 'di// kun la ti la mang bzhin du khyab// za ma tog gi nor bu bzhin// sbyin gyis grub cing tshang ba'o// mi 'gyur kun
52b7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs nam mkha' che// khya ba gang la 'ub chub thig le gcig/ brjod thal rang thol gnas su dag/ rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs dang ni// sems can rnams kyi rgyud la yang // snying po ye shes yongs la khyab// ma lus ye shes chen por
53a1(rnying rgyud): gnas// ya shas chen po dgang 'a da // rang gi sems la brnas par brtse// sems kyi chos nyid sgru bzad // chos can rnams na dang pas byung // mnags par du shes pa 'thur// yang dag bang pa stong nga/
53a2(rnying rgyud): 'di// rtogs ldan 'ga' yi spyod yul yin// sems nyid ye nas rnam par dag/ e ma rang la gnas bzhin du// gzhan nas thob 'dod nor ba'i lam// rtogs par gyur na de bzhin nyid// ma rtogs mun pa'i mtsho la spyod//
53a3(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yi ge med pa'i rgyud las/ kun khyab yangs pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa// 'khor ba thog mtha' med pa nas// lhan cig skyes pa'i ma reg pas// kun nas slong //
53a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i sa bon byas// las dang nyon mongs rkyen byas nas// kun brtags ma rig pa yis 'khor// grib ma gzugs kyi dpe bzhin no// spyod byed las kyi rlung gis brlabs// zhe sdang dmyal ba'i tsha grang 'khor// ser sna bkres skom yi dgas
53a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor// gte mug glen lkugs byol song 'khor// phrag drog/ 'gyur ba mi ru 'khor// nga rgyal 'thab rjod lha min 'khor// 'dod chags lhung ba lta ru 'khon// 'khor bzo chu'i khyud mo 'dra// lha mi gtsang ma'i lus thob kyang // ma
53a6(rnying rgyud): rtogs par du 'khor bar 'khams// thog mtha' med kyang rtogs na yod// e ma kun bzang bde ba che// gzhi dang 'khrul pa gang las byung // gcig pa yin na mtha dang yin/ sangs rgyas sems can gang ba lags// kun rig
53a7(rnying rgyud): rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// gyen snga dag thar sman drug tshul// gsar kye nya mo bags nyal// nam mkha' spen gyi dpe yis mtshan// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yi ga med pa'i byung las/ 'jal dz+wal gnang kyil la ste bzhi pa'o//
53b1(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa// chos nyid rnam par dag pa la// ma rig 'khrul pa'i grib mas bsgribs// bsgribs kyang chos nyid spos dang bral// khyab gdal don 'di sus rtogs pa// rgyal sras bzhin du dbul ba saras/
53b2(rnying rgyud): 'du 'bral gnyis med kun tu bzang // mtshan mam spangs rang sar grol// 'khor ba ma bkag gnas su dag/ 'khrul pam pas la rtsung nas chod// dug lnga ma bsgyur chos nyid grong // rtsol bsrub med par ye sangs
53b3(rnying rgyud): rgyas// yin pa'i don la yin par shes// dper na gser la gser mthong bzhin// yid kyi rnam rtog zad pa'o// nam mkha' chen po'i klong chen bzhin// khyab gdal mi 'gyur kun rdzogs grol// nyi ma sprin med snying
53b4(rnying rgyud): po bzhin// dus gsum sgrib med de bzhin nyid// brgya byin gtsug gi nor bu bzhin// 'dod dgu 'byung pa 'gran zla med// ma gi ta yi sman bzhin du// gang la reg pa sman du 'gyur// dgra btsem rgyal sras mi lus mchog
53b5(rnying rgyud): rtogs na khyad par yod pa'o// rtogs pa'i thabs su thams cad shwar// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yi ge med pa'i rgyud las/ rtogs ldan mchog gi le'u lte lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa// chos nyid rang bzhin
53b6(rnying rgyud): 'od gsal ba// sgo skur lta ba kun dang bral// thams cad gcig gi rang bzhin la// spang 'gregs byin pas bslad pa med// dbyer med ye shes lnga ldan la// sbyang bgrod gnyis blta rang sar grol// skye 'gag gnyis su med pa la
53b7(rnying rgyud): bsgyur dang spyod lnga rnam par dag/ dag pa'i klong na bsrung mtshams med// mnyam pas rim par bkod pa med// rtogs pas blta ba'i yul las 'das// gsal bas bsam gtan spos dang bral// yul las 'das pa
54a1(rnying rgyud): spyod du med// lhun gyis grub pas rdol bskyab med// ma yengs dran pas skyes drang bral// sngags dang phyag rgya rnam par dag/ stong nyid 'angal mchod pashugs mang// 'khor 'das khyab gdul chen po la/
54a2(rnying rgyud): zin las rnam bzhag dod nas rdzogs// 'gro ba mu stegs rim dgu rdzogs// lam lnga pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs// 'khor 'das byang chub sems su rdzogs// snang srid thig le gcig tu rdzogs// dran pa gzhi bzhengs yongs
54a3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// rgyu chung gyig sa lta med pa'o// nam khai'ad mnyam pa srog meng pa'i rgyud las/ nam mkha' mdzad kyi phreng d+hag pa rda// de nas bcom ldan bkur su bya ba/ ra / bde mnu ba la// bsgom
54a4(rnying rgyud): yod bsgom med gnyis su med// tshig tsam don dam bde chen dang // ma bcos ma yangs dang sar grol// dran pa rang grol bde chen klong // som lhag pa gyin 'da' tsam// ming tsam bsgom zhes de la bya// dran rig shes pa ma
54a5(rnying rgyud): 'gags la// 'dzin rig yul las rnam par grol// ma byung ma skyes g.yos pa med// spros bral bsam 'das brjod med rdzong // mnyam nyid rnam dag brdal ba'i klong // mkha' 'dra ye shes lhun gyis grub// ma btsal
54a6(rnying rgyud): rang bzhag rtog pa med// lhan grub rtog pas bya btsal bral// ye nas rang byung ye shes la// 'khrul dang ma 'khrul rtog las 'das// rtog 'das don gyi ye shes la// bsgom bya chos nyid gud na med// bsgom pa ming du
54a7(rnying rgyud): btags pas nor// ci ste spo bsam brjod las 'das// rnam rtog gnyen por mi rtog bsgom// re ka rtog pa chen po yin// mthong tshor de nyid klong du shad// yid la mi byed bde ba che// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yi ge med pa'i
54b1(rnying rgyud): rgyud las/ bad chen gsal ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa// blang dor med pa'i ye shes ni// skye med 'gag med chos nyid klung// b+ha bral lhun rdzogs blolas 'das// e ma rang sa
54b2(rnying rgyud): gnas bzhin du// spyad pas thob 'dod ye ma 'khrul// spyod byed bral ba'i ye shes la// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med de// lam gyis bcos su ga la yod// ci phyir dgag bgrub med pa la// rgyal sreg smod chags re
54b3(rnying rgyud): dogs med// ngo mtshar rmad byang rol pa 'di// rtag na bde ba chen por rtag/ chad na 'khor ba rtsad nas chad// byi na chos nyid dbyings su bying // rgod na ye shes rol par rgod// mnyam na mi mnyam mnyam nyid blong // thim na 'khrul
54b4(rnying rgyud): sdang chos nyid thim// skye med don te yi ge gcig/ bya bral mkha' ltar yi ge med// yi ge med pa rgyud kun mchog/ e ma rnam dag bya btsal bral// bya bral dang las rnam par rol// ce spyod don las ma g.yos shing // tha tra
54b5(rnying rgyud): rang grol rtses zin na// ming tsam skrod ces de la bya// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yi ge med pa'i rgyud las/ rnam rtog ye shes su 'bar ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa// gdod nas ma skyes
54b6(rnying rgyud): don gyis// thob bslab kun gyi yul las 'das// re dog gro las rnam par grol// go bo'i yul ni bde ba che// dang dngas rang bzhin bdag nyid klong // rang bzhin rnam par dag pa la// rol pa dgug pa med par shar// mtsha
54b7(rnying rgyud): dbyang ma bya pa'o// gams nyid dbyings su thob// tog me mnyam nyid kyis kyi hU~M// bde ba chen po mangs srung sa/ 'du shar bskul pa'i // 'du'abab med 'ardom dra// tshig gi pa snyed ma lags sa pa/
55a1(rnying rgyud): gnod nas skyeng po byang chub la// btsal ma'i bsam pas dbyings mi bskyod// sku dang yA shes tshig las grol// grol nas thob pa'i lam yang ston// snying po klong nas grol ba la// mngon sum rjes dpag log par rtog/
55a2(rnying rgyud): zlog ge'i ltod yul ma yin no// tsaM ste bya btsal bral ba'i phyir// byas pa skye med thalas 'das sgra dang tshig gi mtha' las grol// stong pa ye shes snying por shar// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yi ge med pa'i rgyud las/ de khod nyid rje la
55a3(rnying rgyud): ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa// thams cad byang chub sems yin te// 'dzin par shes pa yod pa'i phyir// tshor ba nyams su myong ba'o// spang ba sems nyid rgyan shar bas// snang ba'i bar dri stong rgya zab// bsam gtan gnyid
55a4(rnying rgyud): gnyis ro mnyam phyir// rmi lam par de rnam par dag/ skye shi med pa'i don rtogs pas// tshig bar do bde chen klong // phyi ma bde ba mchog thob pas// srid pa'i bar dor lus mau len/ lhas med lus twe lus kyi mchog/ sprul pa'i sku ste rnam par dag/ ma rtogs mos pa'i
55a5(rnying rgyud): rdul 'byor kyang // ci sta las kyi dbang gyur na// bde ban tshig gi las 'gro mthung// las pas grol na thar pa'i mchog/ ji tsam pa yi tshig brjod kyang // sems las gud na yod ma yin// pho mo ma yin ma ning min// khe dog dbyibs dang mtshan ma med// 'das dang ma
55a6(rnying rgyud): 'ongs da ltar med// gcig dang tha dad las grol ba// dran pa dngos med rig pa'i rgyan// rlung las brten cing rgyun mi chad// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yi ge med pa'i rgyud las/ byang chub sems kyi le'u sde bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa// chos rnam
55a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad stong pa nyid// gzhag kyang rang bzhin rnam par dag/ rnam par mi rtog spos bral mkha'// ra ba gzugs med tshor ba med/ 'du shes 'du byed rnam shes spyod// dbang po lnga dang yul yang spong // skye mched khams dang rten 'brel spong // bded pa'i ba
55b1(rnying rgyud): dang spros bral stong // lha dang phyag rgya sngags kyang med// thabs dang shes rab bde sgong/ dbus mtha' gnyis mang tshig kyang med// sad de med pa'i snying po can// yod de rtog pa'i mtha' las 'das// maza' bral po gyi chos su 'di// phyogs med byin rnams kun dang bral// rang sngang
55b2(rnying rgyud): thabs kyi ye shes rol// shes pa shes byar rnam par dag/ spos bral bsam 'das smra ru med// mtha' bral tshig gis mi phebs la// bsgom yod blo yi rtog pa yin// bsgom med skur 'debs blta ba la// des na gnyis med bde chen grong //
55b3(rnying rgyud): spang bya blang bya gnyis med rdzong // btang snyoms mngon gyur med pa nyid// mi rtog nam mkha'i mtha' ltar yangs// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yi ge med pa'i rgyud las/ chos nyid stong po nyid kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom
55b4(rnying rgyud): ldan bka' stsal pa// chos rnams 'od gsal gnyis med la// bdag tu mi rtog gzhan mi rtog/ ma rtog rtog las rnam par grol// gnyis med bde ba chen po la// dper na glang chen lcags kyu bzhin// ma yengs dran pas rang sar grol//
55b5(rnying rgyud): gser bum til gyi sgron ma bzhin// 'gyur med rig pa nang na gsal// rdzogs chen rtog pa'i rnal 'byor ni// gser gling brdal ba'i klung chen bzhin// gang bltas rdzogs pa chen po'i klong // dug sbrul 'bar ba'i mdud pa bzhin// rtsol
55b6(rnying rgyud): bsgrub med par rang sar grol// gnyis med gnyis su med pa'i phyir// sku gsung thugs la rten mi 'cha'// 'byung ba lnga la rig ma lus// srid gsum ye nas rnam par dag/ 'dod yin ye shes lnga ru rol// dug lnga skra lnga'i ngang du
55b7(rnying rgyud): the ma// sdug bsngal chos nyid dbyings kyi rgyan// rnam rtog ye shes chen po 'bar// 'khrul pa'i 'gro 'ong zad pa dang // 'bras bu thob ces re ba med// med nas don med ma yin te// yongs su gnyis med thams cad rdzogs//
56a1(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' dang mnyam pa la ge med pa'i na las/ 'od gsal gnyis myed kyi leng rgya bcu gnyis par// dadas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa// ma mag/ las 'das che// mya bsgrubs kun las ma pa na mkhas/
56a2(rnying rgyud): bsams skye ba med pas a// ma bsgoms dbyings su thim pas hi// yo ga rdzogs chen chos kyi rtse// shin tu rnal 'byor lha yi lha// rdzong bzhi gnyis med tshig gcig lha// 'phrang bzhi dbyer med tshig chod lha// klong bzhi zung 'jug 'das kha'i lha// dbul
56a3(rnying rgyud): ge ter phrad sku bzhi'i gdeng // rdzogs pa chen po sa gcig pa// gang gis de rtog de yis sa// yongs su rdzogs pas chos kyi ci// bde ba che las gzhan med do// spa bsam brjod med chos kyi sku// gnyis med bde ba chen po'i klong // sprul pa rgyan dang rol par
56a4(rnying rgyud): shar// sku lnga ye shes thig ler rdzogs// ma skyes pa yi dbyings nyid du// mi g.yos pa chu yid gnas pas// ma bsgrubs pa yi 'bras bu ster// ma bsams pa ru re ba bskang // ye shes chen po'i ros gang bas// mtshon du yod pa ma yin te// ye shes
56a5(rnying rgyud): rol pas 'gro don rdzogs// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yi ge med pa'i rgyud las/ sku gsum thig ler rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'di skad gsungs// cir snang de bzhin nyid du gcig/ 'di la
56a6(rnying rgyud): bcos bslad ma byed cig/ ma bcos mnyam pa'i rgyal po de// mi rtog chos su'i dgongs par gnas// skye med lta ba stong pa nyid// kun khyab sgom pa gnyis su med// 'khrul spyod sems kyi rgyan du rol// rtogs pa'i 'bras bu thig ler
56a7(rnying rgyud): gcig/ dus gsum gcig ste khyad par med// gtan tshigs bzhi ru gcig po'i phyir// nga las byung zhing ra ru thim// nga yi rang bzhin 'od gsal lo// e ma sems dpa' rdo rje che// nam mkha'i mtha' ltar longs spyod pas// chos dbyings
56b1(rnying rgyud): 'dam shAs/ 'i dgas pa rnas no// mad na gas// nas pas sa/ gag nga // u myur ldanan na / drug man
56b2(rnying rgyud): bya/ nam na pa mdzags ma // nam t+pal/ kyi chud tsun pa// ma cig sa pa medapa pa/ maldan dun ba 'thal ga/ du med pa
56b3(rnying rgyud): la / na/ da gtad / lags / gas
56b4(rnying rgyud): pa pa / kyi ba rnam par ma// sa pa mapa yang ga// ngan tshig sa na mam pa yi na/ brnapa na / na rgyam pa dogs so/
56b5(rnying rgyud): sarnams la sa sa/ nga
56b6(rnying rgyud): shA kyad na kyi sgru sa/
56b7(rnying rgyud): du/ na nga pa kyi rgyas sa'o// sa pasu myi ma sa sa sus sa/ denan ma du rjes bas ldan la su
57a1(rnying rgyud): shA // sa // du/ sa/ /
57a2(rnying rgyud): sa pa sa pa/ na byaskas pa sgyu s+ho// la gi/ la
57a3(rnying rgyud): rgyags bas/ ma 'a lang ba / bab 'a tang bas rab tu / tA@ byed dgapa byed pas ya / 'dis du bya gas tha
57a4(rnying rgyud): chos nyid rgya mtsho nyid du sol// sems dpa' rdo rjes yang zhub pa// long cha bcug suM ma // zab mo bcwa gsumadzad dbyung // ma tsho ma kyil bas+thAs Na sa~M rbe// 'gro drug 'khor ba g.yangs gcad// bzhi nor gus ma la gtan chog
57a5(rnying rgyud): dam+b+hi// bdud rnas pa ba dang sbyar// byas par bdag la bzhang du gsal// rgya mtsho da mnyam pa rtog pazang bya byu pas/ blang bya'i ya byung / danapa bcom ldan bka' stsal pa/ tshogs chags
57a6(rnying rgyud): bsgreng // sbyin pas dz+nyAn gyis bzhag pa yin// chos dang sems ni bstan du med// chos dang sems na maM bsgom mo// rnam par rtog pa chos kyi dbyings/ del nga skar nyid las su// thugs rje sems can bsgo mngon // byang chub tsa/
57a7(rnying rgyud): pa ma dag yin// rkyen rnam sa sangs rgyas lam// bsgrub na ra nga chos dbyings la// mig tan ga nyis zang sa bras pa meng // dang bdun banyam par shes pas // ngang gathos papa chog zhes/ pa
57b1(rnying rgyud): byas zer// de bas slob dpon mkhas pa thu// mi gnas blos med pade chen 'byung // zin pas bdud rtsi bzang po yin// che chung gsungs pa 'thung 'gyur gnas// 'dod pas phrod pa mi skye shing // khrung bzhin spro baspu dgos pa med// rgyam gyi
57b2(rnying rgyud): chos rnams yon tan mnyam// byang chub ting 'dzin rgya mtsho 'byung // rgya mtsho mi rtog kun tu ste// rgya rkyen skur bsgo tsam du// mkhas pa 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya// 'dod skyong gang du shan pa sogs// kho na yongs rdzogs bde ba che// yang ni de ltar/
57b3(rnying rgyud): chos yin te// chos kyis chos btsal nam mkha' 'tshol// ltos pa mo 'dra rnyed dka'o// snying po yongs kyi byang chub gnas// rdo rje kun bzang rnam dag phyir// mi gri byams pas snying rje che// yon tan don rnams bya ba med// rang byung grol
57b4(rnying rgyud): nas lam yang ston// 'byung ba 'gro ba phyin cis kyang // rang byung ye shes grub yang 'byung // cho 'phrul yon tan ji bzhin de// sdang ba ming btsal btsal na med// chos nyid rna dbang lce brjod med// no// kun de la gnas pa la// las so ci ste rang
57b5(rnying rgyud): byung bral// ma skyes gdod nas btsal mi bskyod// yon tan bsam gtan ma bsams skye// phra zhing bsgom zhing sems zhes bskyed// lam 'dra zhes gsungs gti mug kyang / byang chub kun spyod chos nyid rgyan// nam mkha' rtog pa'i mi
57b6(rnying rgyud): chags 'byung // rtog med bzung bas kun tu a// de ni sa dang 'jig rten sangs// 'di btsal yul med nam mkha' bzhin/ tshangs lam mthun min bgrod pa med// de ltar de bstan de bas che// sngon gyi de bzhin de ltar rang // de la kun
57b7(rnying rgyud): bltas grub pa med// bde 'byung de yang mi bya'o// dus gsum gdod nas chos skur bde// srid ming 'khor sgyu bsti gnas yin// rnam spyod 'byung mi smin pas bzhin// ci ste nam mkha' mi skye chos// phyi nang zab mo srid pa de// de la rang
58a1(rnying rgyud): bzhin dus gsum med// g.yo bskyed len dor mnyam nyid do// gang du kun 'khor bdag las 'byung // 'di mnyam 'di gnas a de bzhin// snang de byang chub chu zla bzhin// ma bsgoms dkyil 'khor yi ge med// rnam
58a2(rnying rgyud): grangs gang ltar me tog ste// mtshan ma mi 'gyur gnas pa bzang // mi phyed rol par gnas mnyam zhing // ma yin gnas pas ye shes rang // mi 'gyur mi gnas bstan du med// rmad byung bya bral cir yang 'byung // 'di 'gro 'khrul pa sman pas
58a3(rnying rgyud): tshul// go banyid ni de la phyogs// ma nges rigs kyi de bzhin 'byung // 'das dang ma 'ongs pa snyad de// skye 'gag de nyid mnyam pas gcig/ tshogs kyi rang bzhin lhan gyis dag/ 'du byed lhag pa yud kyis bltas// mthong ba de ni yung tsam
58a4(rnying rgyud): yin// dam tshig sbyor ba gtor ma las// bgegs bsal sngags tshig mchod dang gtor// thams cad rtog med chen por 'gyur// nyid la sgrib par rtogs na med// rgya mtsho dang mnyam pa rnyog pa med pa'i rgyud las// lhun gyis grub pa'i
58a5(rnying rgyud): le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa// gdod nas ma gyes sgo srung bral// srang 'geg spyod pa rang sar grol// bsgyur dang spyod lnga rnam par dag/ 'di ni 'gro kun byang chub sems// rnam dag nam
58a6(rnying rgyud): mkha' bzhin du gsal// skye 'gag yod med mtha' lus 'das// dngos bral rig gsal phyogs ma ldang // srang byung btang snyoms mngon gyur med// brjod bral ma bcos lhun gyis grub// don dam pade chen mtha' las 'das/
58a7(rnying rgyud): dus gsum yang dag a ti ni// 'du 'bral rtog med lhun gyis grub// mi 'gyur ba yi blta ba la// g.yos pa med pa'i rtsi yis bzung // g.yos pa med pa'i ting 'dzin la// ma 'gags pa yi rtsi yis bzung // ma 'gags pa yi
58b1(rnying rgyud): spyod pa la// lhun gyis grub pa'i rtsi yis bzung // don gyi rtsi bzhi gang gnas pa// blta ba'i don la gnas pa yin// des na srid gsum rnam par dag/ 'byung ba dug lnga 'dod yon lnga// thams cad mi 'gyur blta bar sangs// blta/
58b2(rnying rgyud): ba mi zad nor bu bzhin// lhun grub kun rdzogs nam mkha' che// thig le brjod bral mtshon du med// gnyis su med pa'i snying po a// ma bkag ma spangs rang sar grol// ma bsal ma bsgyur rtsol ba sgrub med// yin pa'i don la yin
58b3(rnying rgyud): par shes// zab mo'i mdzod bzhin don rnams 'byung // snying po kun khyab sus rtogs pa// rgyal sras bzhin du dbul ba sangs// mkha' klong kun bzang ye shes 'od// rdo rje sems dpa' dag pa'i klong // bsrung mtshams rim par bkod
58b4(rnying rgyud): pa med// lta ba bsam gtan spros dang bral// spyad du med pas pa grub tu med// rang grol sngags dang phyag rgya dag/ mchod bshags phrin las gdod nas rdzogs// lam lnga pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs// 'gro ba mu stegs rim dgu rdzogs//
58b5(rnying rgyud): snang srid 'khor 'das thams cad rdzogs// dad dang rang bzhin bdag nyid gsum// dbyings dang klong dang rdzogs chen no// gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu gsum// ma skyes ma 'gags lhun gyis grub// lhun grub ma nor dag pa'i rdzong// phyog
58b6(rnying rgyud): mid rang grol dong sbugs dbyings// gsal khyab gnyis med bde chen klong // sku gsum lhun grub snying po a// rgya mtsho dang mnyam pa rnyog pa med pa'i rgyud las/ lta ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa//
58b7(rnying rgyud): gdod nas gsal bas bying rgod bral// bsgom bya chos nyid gun na med// 'di ni don dam bde chen dang // ma bcos ma yengs rang sar grol// dran pa rang grol don dam dbyings// so ma lkug pa gyi na tsam// ming tsam bsgom zhes de la bya// dran
59a1(rnying rgyud): 'dzi ma skyes smos bral dang // mnyam nyid mkha' 'dra rtog pa med// spyan grub rtog pas b+ha bcal bral// dang bzhi gnas dus su ni// dran pa shes bzhin rtsi yis bzung // dper na glang chen ljags kyu bzhin// ma yengs
59a2(rnying rgyud): dran pas rang sar grol// gnyis pa mnyam gzhag dus su ni// shes bya chos nyid bum par gzhug/ gser bu ma til gyi sgron ma bzhin// 'gyur med rig pa nang na gsal// gsum pa rjes thob dus su na// dbang po ma dgag rang yan bzhag
59a3(rnying rgyud): gser gling brdal ba'i klung chen bzhin// gang bltas rdzogs pa chen po'i klong // tha ma lhag mthong dus su ni// mtshan ma reng grol bros ma reg/ dug sbrul 'bar ba'i mdud pa bzhin// rtsol ba sgrub med par rang sar grol// de ltar dus bzhi bsgom pa
59a4(rnying rgyud): la// bying ba brgyang dang rgod pa lnga// byang rgod skyon du gtang mi bya// bying la gseng la rgod na bsku// de ltar zla ba drug bsgoms na// g.yo dang goms pa thob dang brtan// gsal ba nam mkha' lta bu 'byung // nam mkha' dngas pa'i zla ba bzhin/
59a5(rnying rgyud): kun la snyoms la rtog sgrib med// kha skom zas dang bral byas kyang / mdangs dang dbang po gting nas gsal// bzod thob chos brgyad spang len med// 'dod yon lnga las rnam par grol// nyon mongs zhan 'dzin rtog pa zad// lus ni shing bal lta bur
59a6(rnying rgyud): yang // dbugs ni 'byung 'jug med pa'i nyams// grub pa'i rtags rnams 'char ba dang // mngon shes la sogs mtshan ma mthong // mkha' 'gros lung bstan la sogs 'byung // de la dag 'brod mi bya zhing // med kyang ji mi snyams pa'i nyams//
59a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis med gsal khyab khrung chen rgyas// kun gzhi bye med snying po la// bsgom dang mi bsgom rtog las 'das// rtog 'das don gyi ye shes la// bsgom bya chos nyid gud na med// bsgom pa mengad du btags pas nor// ci phyer brjod pa kun
59b1(rnying rgyud): dngas/ gnanan mnyan brdas// dug paranabya'o// rnag pa'i maman zhes tu // dom tsa na pon pam// das pa ldan dugs pa ban/ nan sa pa gas// gsasapa rtag zung na
59b2(rnying rgyud): ngan btsunas kya sa pa dang / na/ nang kya dang bzhi jug// ma ma rdung bar gas// dz+nyAn kyis gnas pa shAm/ tshu migs na ga sa ma
59b3(rnying rgyud): byung // na lag sargyu // das sna nan gas shA ca da na pa / na btsu na sa smra pa
59b4(rnying rgyud): nga nga na dang nam// b+ha ming don mams nyan mong // skrod pa'i dam pa ldan no// 'gro'achagazhal dang 'dug pa rnams// ci rgyad dan masam ga thos shing // don dam pade pa'i gyis byin na// khyod pa zhes ni la rtse// rkyen gsung bapon
59b5(rnying rgyud): rgyabad+hA hU~M/ ni gagags bying ma paste// gsung na lan kyil// lam sa ma / 'dus sa// dz+wal lags 'gyis/ la thags sa /
59b6(rnying rgyud): ni na/ ma can pacwam/ ma ga sa da mas// tan shA ci gas byung// dbang da/ gad pa gag myed kyis sa pa za// dang 'a
59b7(rnying rgyud): kyang// sem na yan rnam par nga // ni ma dang rjem rgyan dasring// 'di dang sa gnas byer // nga pa 'dis 'jug// da kyang bris pa'i rgyamatshan// da ma 'i sa // za par byu
60a1(rnying rgyud): dang // srad bur b+ha ba sems can gnyis// byang chub sems su ro gcig pas// lam pas bcos su ga la yod// tsi phyir dgag bsgrub med pa la// rtsal sbugs ro dogs yul las 'das// mtho ris 'dren pa'i/
60a2(rnying rgyud): dge ba dang // 'khor bar ltung ba'i sdig pa gnyis// chos kyi dbyings su yod mnyam pas// rdzogs chen ris med chos chen po// zod rgal blo yi bdud rtsi 'di// skal med mongs pa'i bdud du 'gyur// dper na dug gi rang bzhin la// rdza bye dag la
60a3(rnying rgyud): rgyan gyis mdzes// gzhan rnams la ni dug gis 'jigs// thams cad rdzogs pa'i bde chen po// skye 'gag med par lhun gyis grub// khyab gdal ma bcos ye sangs rgyas// spros bral gnyis med kho na'o// don 'di nges par rtogs na ni// rgyal
60a4(rnying rgyud): ba rnams dang mnyam pa yin// sems nyid don gyi ye shes la// spyad par bya ba'i gnas dang bral// bya thal dang la rnam par rol// ming tsam spyod ces de la bya// 'da' ka ma yi spyod pa ni// cir snang byang chub sems su myod// sems nyid chos kyi su ru
60a5(rnying rgyud): bya// sku nyid sbrang bya spyod byed bral// bya bral ba la gang gnas pa// skye med don gyi rnal 'byor ro// rgya mtsho dang mnyam pa rtog pa med pa'i rgyud las/ spyod pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal ba// gdod nas maM skyes
60a6(rnying rgyud): thob bsgrub 'das// ri dogs blo las rnam par grol// skye med brjod med kho na nyid// mtha' bral gnyis med don dmathong // dgag bya ba sgrub bya rnam par dag/ ma skyes bya bral chos nyid klong // cir yang mi dmigs khyab gdal la// bgrod
60a7(rnying rgyud): du med par ldan gyis grub// skye med gnyis med spos dang bral// sku lnga ye shes lnga yi dang // rtog bral dmigs med khyab gdal klong // blos med byang chub snying po'i dbyings// 'bras bu blta bsgom spyod pa bstan// rang snang gnyug ma la ma las
60b1(rnying rgyud): bol// khyang gang la dus rgyubamargyan non// rgyal ba brgyan dung zung pa dang // bdud ci'i thags pa sgyel bzhag/ gangs tsanas bsgril ba ste// sh-i na'i gabyang lagagacad par bya// tog ma mnam nyi rgyas kyi ma// zer yang ma 'gags zlab
60b2(rnying rgyud): skye// gnyis su med pas rdzogs pa'i sra// gru gsum rdzogs pas thig le gcig/ bsam 'das brjod med rangs dgrol// kun bzang dbyer med skye medas// thob bsgrub med par thams cad rdzogs// snang srid byang chub sems su rdzogs// 'khor 'das
60b3(rnying rgyud): chos kyi dbyings su rdzogs// sku gsum thig la gcig tu rdzogs// lhag ma med par yongs su rdzogs// mi 'gyur mnyam nyid ngape dang bral// dpe bral lo zhes mtshon du med// ci phyir bas ma brjod dmigs pa med// dmigs med tho 'das rang sa
60b4(rnying rgyud): grol// mi rtse mi 'gag lhun gyis grub// go ba'i yul na bgrod du med// bgrod du med pas sa la ma rdzogs// gnyis med rdzogs pas mtha' bral rdzong // dmigs med ma skyes de nyid dang // 'gag med A li kA mir rol// byar med ma btsal
60b5(rnying rgyud): lhun gyis grub// smra bas ma brjod med tshig las 'das// dngos su mi snang kun la khyab// khyab gdal ma bcos yi sangs rgyas// rang bzhin 'od gsal rnam par dag/ dgag pa sgrub med pa'i ye shes ni// chu yis me bskyed rkyen dang bral// stong
60b6(rnying rgyud): gsal dbyer med ye shes can// kye 'gag med par rnam par dag/ khyab gdal gnyis med ye gdal klong // kun rdzogs bla med theg kun gtso// sa rnams kun gyi ngo bo'o// khyab gdal yangs pa nam mkha'i klong // rgya mtsho bde chen kun rdzog
60b7(rnying rgyud): grol// nyi ma dus gsum de bzhin nyid// nor bu 'od 'byung 'gran bla med// phye med rtog med lhun gyis grub// 'gyur med rang gsal rnam par dag/ mtha' bral ra grol mtshon du med// de nyid shes kyis rtogs na grol// rgyal sras bzhin du ri dogs
61a1(rnying rgyud): dang// mdang mnam mas ma bya snang dan/ 'bras du du chu na// danas btsu na / sa// byung sa
61a2(rnying rgyud): 'jam dpal pad+ma la danaci// thar ba zla ma chags 'dag rten rdzogs// mang byung thegano tshogs bstan// bden pazhi yang dbyen ma gdon// bden nyis gsu mjig nyid pa// theg 'i chos dbyung shis// blad pad
61a3(rnying rgyud): byu teng sangs rgyas// ngo mtshar stsal ye shes rdzogs// gnyis med dgrangs su 'bras bu'i bla // me bskyed don pa rdzogs pa bde// dodan dum rang bzhin 'gyur ba ri// mongs pa sangs kyis thig pa'i grong // byang chu rig pa pade rje ga /
61a4(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba nis dang rgyas yongs rdzogs sems// snying po nam mkha 'dzugs pa'i theg/ 'khod pa ma lus don la sems// rang byung 'di rtogs dmigs dang bral// sems can rnal 'byor thugs rjes bsngal// babaca don ma grub pa'i grong /
61a5(rnying rgyud): gsum dbang po thams cad gsal// thams cad ye brdal spro bsku 'chings// zla med srid pa'i 'chi bdag med// dngos pade rig pa logs na med// gzhiH bral bas phye med steng // myur lung sems ni mi nub sra// skang srid thams cad me dbangang /
61a6(rnying rgyud): skyed gsum skye 'gro bde ba nyid// rdo btsan ngas bshad skyon med mchog/ 'gro kun mi 'gyur dang gnas mdzad// bde chen ya mtshan sla bsam 'das// dmigs med snang ba g.yos pa med// rtog pa nyams te bde chen sems// 'khor ba ji ltar
61a7(rnying rgyud): chos kyi su// nam mkha' kun bskyed dran med ni// rtse mo de nyid 'bras bu sra// masor 'bral med dus gsum bsrung // dam tshig spyod pa ma spangs 'grub// rig pa gang yang bdag don snang // 'du 'thal kun la sdang srid kyi// tshogs mchod
61b1(rnying rgyud): bstod rnams dus gsu mamanyam// 'du 'bral med pa' sa rba brtags// rnatshogs 'byung ba nam mkhar bya// kun 'dus blta ba'i zag pa cang 'dus// pad+mal ma mas pa gdang // ma 'gyur bar dag pa// bras thas
61b2(rnying rgyud): brjod// dpal ldan sangs rgyas skye med krol// thams cad gcig pa'i ye shes rje// blta ba 'gro drug thams cad khyab// ye nas byas nas ma bslabs te// gnas lam byas kun legs la// ma lus rag lus gzhan bcos med//
61b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgya mtsho ngang du 'dus// ma bcos 'di la kun nas srog/ dus gsum 'tsho gyur srog gi slong // 'di du sangs rgyas skye dgag med// 'gro rnams 'dzi med skye shi srid// srog gi yul la sems kyis dngon// rtse med dus gsum cu
61b4(rnying rgyud): skye med sri med zab mode// dug gsum cu dgacod 'khor bskol// rin chen lam ston mi 'gyur gnas// yags la snying po kun bzang grub// rtag chen bde la longs spyod rdzogs// 'di shes drang srong spyod yul gsungs// bdeb 'gro 'o
61b5(rnying rgyud): byang chub ste// klong rdzogs khyab pas rdzogs pas zung // gzhal yas ye shes skye dgag dang // don du nam mkha' bde sangs rgyas// byang chub shin tu bde chen klong // thog pa skyi gcod 'di la ni// rtsal gas ma rdzogs pa g.yangs gcod/
62a1(rnying rgyud): bcos kyang mi mnyam yog gsum// ci ltar skad kyang rgyal dz+wal// a ta yongs patshul bsgrubathal// rin chen byang chub rangs mas so// 'ag mas chas spyod 'bras bu dang // sang rdzogs dan lan //
62a2(rnying rgyud): ma btsun 'gyur ma rgyas nyid // byang rngu dus gas pa sa dza// dasang ba gsu ba krims pa // zhenas mtshugs pa ga// byang chub pag pa zag sa// gsuM na la sadul sa thal// yo
62a3(rnying rgyud): gsus kyi da 'du/ ma // 'am stsagasamamanas pa / yinas so// da dam nga bzhi // mi ge song sa / legs la pas rgyal/
62a4(rnying rgyud): dmag yos rang bzhin ma khas// bod chen sgron mas thAgs rdo rdzogs// rgyu mdzo da nga mnyam pa rtog pa med pa'i rgyud las// rnaMs nyid 'gyur ba med pa'i laSh+Tha ste bdun pa'o// / de nas bco maldan 'di skad gsungs/
62a5(rnying rgyud): ma ho sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// chos kyi dbyings ni yi ge med// rang bzhin 'di gsal yongs su dag/ nam mkha'i dbyings bzhin dri ma med// bdud rtsi dri med brgyad ldan mtsho// mkha' la nyi shar 'od zer lnga// dbus na nam mkha' bzhi yi
62a6(rnying rgyud): mthongs// skyeng na rin chen bcu gsum ste// bde gshegs mi mchod dang sems mchod// rang sems sangs rgyas yin pa las// sangs rgyas gzhan du mi btsal te// rig pa dang grol bya ba tsal thal// rang snang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'di// dpar
62a7(rnying rgyud): na rmi lam lta bu ste// rmi lam pa de sngag sna tshogs kyang // gnyid sa dbus na chos kyi sku// tshangs pa khyab 'jug pa sogs bsgom// log pa'i lam du zhugs pa'o// nam mkha' lha bur sems 'gags pa// nyi cho ba yi stong par zung // mig
62b1(rnying rgyud): gas sa/ 'a du na/ nanamamams nam pa dang// rnam zhi sa ba da/ gsug gas/ du sa pangs// sa rgyan dang /
62b2(rnying rgyud): pa mas pa yin/ par ba // rdzogs la na pa rdzus/ byed nags// da kyi byi na sa dpa du 'a bya da/
62b3(rnying rgyud): gdu ma // gas pa shems// sman das ma pan rnamapa// sa pa sa nams bya la/ / ga
62b4(rnying rgyud): si nga da// mas da chen pa TI ga na nas gzug/ ma na pa sa rnags sa sa/ ma bsad pas zus rdzugapa// zhabs mya na
62b5(rnying rgyud): rna na gas b+h+yAM/ ba sa pa chags pa s+ho/ bya la khams gamadzug// 'jus ga tu stan sa/ lasu rtsu pa byams so//
62b6(rnying rgyud): rdzu bya / da/
62b7(rnying rgyud): mig ma 'as sa sams/ dings byung/ thams byaba'i / bang ba 'dru na sa nga // khangs ga pam la ra 'drim pas/ da
63a1(rnying rgyud): dad sems dpa' yis// chang ngu brjod pa 'di brjod do// kun ri gzugs kyi dpal be'u nas// zab mo bdud rtsi lta bu'i chos// rjes nyid byin gyis brlabs pa las// zlog mang rgya mtshur klong ston pa// mnyam nyid
63a2(rnying rgyud): mtsho bu li// kun tu bzang la mngon bstod do// chos thams cad rgya mtsho'i mtha' dang mnyam pa rtog pa med pa'i byed/ bcom ldan 'das kun rig rgyal pos gsungs pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sid+d+ha dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba po rdo tsan
63a3(rnying rgyud): basbyang ba'o// / rgya gang skad du// sarba d+ha rmA ma hA sad+d+hi bo d+hi tsid+ha saM sA rA mA la d+hod na sU r+ya tsan+da sa mA ma la tan+da/ bo skad du/ chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po 'khor ba rgyang nas gcod pa nyi zla dang mnyam pa dri ma med
63a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das kun rig rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig no/ chos nyid kyi mkha'/ dbyings nyid kyi klong / ye shes dri ma med par dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal
63a5(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang po/ yangs pa nam mkha' lta bu/ skye med bya btsal bral ba/ spos bral ye shes kyi grong na bzhugs so// nyid kyi rang snang reg pa'i 'khor ni/ sku gsum dang / ye shes lnga dang / khams gsum dang / 'gyed ba lnga dang / dus
63a6(rnying rgyud): gsum dang / nyon mongs pa lnga dang / spang tshul bcu bdun la sogs te/ gzugs nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar thams cad 'khor ro// de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes gsol pa/ e ma ho bcom ldan 'das// ye shes kyi spyi'i snying po la/
63a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba'i 'dri ma yod dam med// gzung 'dzin blo yi dra ba 'di// rtsad nas gcod na ci ltar gcad// sna tshogs snang ba'i chos rnams kun// bsrun rnam pa duru 'dus// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// nam
63b1(rnying rgyud): gzung bal// ngas mang pan kya ngas gzhing// can dbadags snga pa'adra// gdong nas dri me dam pa dang // gagasams dpa 'dad do// gajun dngag na // 'dug thag rgya// 'a gang yar babyu
63b2(rnying rgyud): bzad// snyoms shes sems dpa' rdo sgoms// chos can sna tshogs snang bkun// chos nyi dang dung gcag pas// gdal khyab kyikyi chub thig por 'dus// sems dpa' rdo rjes slar gsol ba// sem bcom ldan kun byeng che// thog mthang gcod par
63b3(rnying rgyud): yis 'tshal// badz+ras dang rgyas dang rnam par byas// shin tu rgyas dang yongs su rgyas// drug chan lnga yis bshad pa ni// thugs rje thabs kyi rol pa las// stod pas bdag la bshad du gsol// nyi zla dang mnyam pa dri ma med pa'i gyad las/ gleng
63b4(rnying rgyud): gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa// sna tshogs rang bzhin mi gnyis kyang // cha shas nyid du spros dang bral// ji bzhin pa zhes mi rtog kyang // rnam par snang mdzad kun tu bzang // zin pos rtsol ba'i nang
63b5(rnying rgyud): spangs te// ldan gyis gnas pas bzhag pa yin// nyi zla dang mnyam pa dri ma med pa'i rgyud las/ rdo rje'i tshig drug gi le'u ste gnyis pa / de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa// chos dang sems ni y-i nas gnyis su med// sems
63b6(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin btsal yang mi rnyed na// gzhan pa 'di 'dra zhes ni bstan du med// chos dang sems ni ci yang ma yin pas// bsgom pa'i tshen ce yang mi bsgom mo// rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan maci zung yang // rtog pa de nyid chos nyid yid shes na/
63b7(rnying rgyud): chos kyi dbyings nyid gzhan nas btsal mi dgos// de la gnyen pos bcom zhing dgag tu med// da ltar dus gsum rnam pa thams cad kun// nyid las ma yengs pa ni chos kyi sku// stobs su gyur na 'jig rten rang bzhin med// thugs spa
64a1(rnying rgyud): kun la khyab mdzad cing // sems can rnamasal thams pa'i char chen 'brubs// phan ma dang parnam par dbya gnas ma dang// don dam ngang la ba par gnas pa na// byang chub sems pa skam zhes kyang da ldaH/
64a2(rnying rgyud): ldanam yeng sadon ldan na// rnam dag byang chub sems kyi 'gos pa yin// ha~M nga mnyam pa dri mamed pa'i gyun pas/ zab ma dang dgag pa'u segasem pa'o// / de nas bcomA ldan ka' phrulang // dri dang nA
64a3(rnying rgyud): kyi dbyings// rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul lnga// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med// lam gyis bcos drig la yid// brlab ma rtsal sngags sngon med pa'i// bar med ldan rdzogs sngam na nyid de// d+hog yod rnam dag gnyis medas
64a4(rnying rgyud): dbyings las// mig rtog byis pa'i sdod pas ci zhig bslus// gnyis med bde chen sems can kun spyod la// 'khrul pas nor pa'i lam du bstan pa yang // gang bstan lam chen de las mi gnyis par// mnyam par shes pa skye sangs rgyas can
64a5(rnying rgyud): dbadag 'dzin pas mu stegs 'khrul pa'i lam// byis pas bslus pa'i chos spyod spyod pa yang // rnam por rtog pa 'i la ma du btsud pa ni// phyin pa'i lam med rtog dus med pa'o// chos nyi tshal rnyed par ga la 'gyur// slob dpon tshang mar
64a6(rnying rgyud): gyur spre'u 'dra'i lung // brten nas la mnor rtog pas zin ta re// de bas gser la nag tshur btang 'dra yi// slob dpon rin chen lta bu mkhas pade// rin thang dpag tu med pa'i rin gyis bsla'o// nyi zla dang mnyam pa dri ma med pa'i bud las/
64a7(rnying rgyud): rgyal drug gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan bka' chu pa// mi gnas dmigs med chos kyi // spos mi byang chub rnying po 'don// bde chen sul pa gnyis su med// gzhan nas mi brtsal dang
64b1(rnying rgyud): dang tha bzhan// dadam pa ma dpas rnam par blangs// bdu maldan pa nga gag// bab 'byu babs pa dag padang// blangs tha sa dag// rgyud durasas nang pa yod// rnabang gas sa banyanas dang// rlung dang /
64b2(rnying rgyud): rnams dmigs dang bral// gsungs de rgyas dang dmigs dang snang // sgyu mkhan ni mo'i rnam pa bzhin// 'byung 'jug ye shes bying rmugs dag// da yi dbang las skye bar 'gyur// btang ngogazhag gi rang bzhin gnas// 'dod pa med cing min
64b3(rnying rgyud): pa med// thod pardal tsam mi skye dong // khyung chen nam mkhar ldang pa bzhin// sprob med cing bsdub med// spyod par yi dgos papa'ab med// bzla pa'i yul bral dogs med// rgya mtsho 'dra bar phye gnas la// chos rnams na tshogs
64b4(rnying rgyud): 'byung bar byed// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// bsdu ba'i gnas spangs pa med// byang chub snying pod mthag/ ting 'dzin rgyam po chen po 'byung // spang ba mamatsho chen po bzhin// mi tog nam mkha'i mtha' ltar yangs/
64b5(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang po'i spyod tshul lA// rgya shing nga' ba'i gnas med de// rgyu man yan lag bcu gnyis kyang // skur pa btub sti bshad pa yin// 'khrul ba rnams kyi tsa mdu// mkhas pa sa bzhin gas par gyis// 'gro brgyad
64b6(rnying rgyud): bstan pa yang // dad pa'i lam du shes par bya// 'did sring snying rjes padz+nyAn panA// gang du dga' bas byang chub stod// shan pa blang tshang sa rnam sa daH// khanam thong gan nayas rdzogs pas chos shAH// ba
64b7(rnying rgyud): las gzhan mad do// yang ni chos rnams de ltar na// chos kyi rang bzhin yin te// chos kyis ches ni bcal dun// nam mkhas rnams pa rgya // snyas pa'i tsha la brten pa ni// mi las ma'i bas 'ju// shem ra
65a1(rnying rgyud): ba na / nga /
65a2(rnying rgyud): badz+raman pa'o// / denas pacom ldan pa gang sal ba// rdo rjem pas dpa rnam mkha// kun bzang yangs pa rgyas kyi dbyings// na dgal mchen na // me ma 'gag ci pa dgongasathams pa sna
65a3(rnying rgyud): ra// snying rje ma po cing ma mdzad// chebs ba'i ba po yang // gyi yang bajugs pa pa // don rnams pa'i po btid nga// thab mid pas grol bas pa/ rang byung la shes pabargyal med pas// grob nas grol ba'i
65a4(rnying rgyud): na// ti rma dang mnyas pa dri ma med pa'i rgyu pas/ da gnyisas zan pa theg pa ba sa drug sas// / de nas bcom da sha rnal pa// 'byung bzed pa bcom ldan 'das// 'gro kun pa rang ba den gnas//
65a5(rnying rgyud): bags // gro ba 'angos pan/ legs te shing sa skyeb bya pas bya'o// zong ci ma byedang pa nyi dang/ bdod pa ma nga dpe nga las / la bar/
65a6(rnying rgyud): ga 'i she / / ga na pa/ las pa na
65a7(rnying rgyud): na du
65b1(rnying rgyud): slob dag padu 'byang chubasapas/ bAn rnab pasanas par dang// dal ba sru pa ma pazhanas// rnamam bdun pa brnyan mnas sa// khyad pa nga satshangs byab// ma na gas// bang 'dan/
65b2(rnying rgyud): rang byung yi shes yang ma yin// rgyu nad rdo rje mun dang bral// ma gyes pas na dreg pa med// gdod nas snying po byang chub la// btsal pa'i bsam pas dkyis mi bskyod// yon tan chen po bas ma garten no// bas mugatan da pas pas padu med/
65b3(rnying rgyud): ma bsams ma spangs chos nyid du// rnam rtog nyid las ye shes skye// phra ba'i sgo mor ming btags nas// sems kyis dben pa'i lam tshol zhing // dgon pa'i rgyud du dben 'dzin pas/ brtag nas rnam par rtog 'gyur bsgom// rgyan 'bras bur mi
65b4(rnying rgyud): btags shing // dge sdig gnyis ka rnam par sel// 'jig rten 'di las 'byung ngo zhes// blang dor brod pa mchog tu bskyed// chags dang ma chags tshig gi lam// dbu ma bzhin te brag ca 'dra// pa dang sdug bskul chu mthun zhes// 'gro ba'i
65b5(rnying rgyud): mgon po chen pos gsungs// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug kyang // byang chub chen po'i lam las byung // kun spyod yon tan rnam lnga yang // chos nyid dbyings kyi rgyan zhes gsungs// nam mkha' rtog pa skye med cing // rtog pa de nyid nam mkhang 'dra
65b6(rnying rgyud): mi chags nam mkha' rdzob la// rang 'od chen pos nam mkha' byung // nyi zla dang mnyam pa dri ma med pa'i rgyud las/ rnam par rtog pa dag pa'i thig le'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa// rtog med mnyam pa'i chos kyi lnga// ba
65b7(rnying rgyud): bas mi zin chu zla 'dra// kun tu bzang po'i rol pa yi// A le kA li zab tu bstan// de ni a dang mdzes pa'i te// sa dang yan lag spros pa bzhin// 'jig rten yongs kyi spyod yul las// sangs rgyas gsung ni zab mo 'byung // e ma sangs rgyas spyad
66a1(rnying rgyud): yul 'di// brtsal bas rnyed pa'i gnas med de// drug gi chos bzhin yul med pas// rmongs pas nam mkhar bzlog pa bzhin// gong nas gong du tshangs pA'i lam// byab la chos dang mthun pa man// TIswa pha ma pa bgran/
66a2(rnying rgyud): gyur na// nam mkha'i mtha' ltar thug pa med// de ltar de bzhin de yi phyir// de la de brten de yang thob// de ni snying po de bas na// de las de byung ngo mtshar che// sngon gyi de dang da lha yi// de bzhin de yi gnas su che// de ltar de yi lam 'dra ba//
66a3(rnying rgyud): de ni de yi rang bzhin no// de dang 'dra ba yongs kyi lam// b+h+rUM bAl+mas byung rten dang bcas// kun gyi mnyam nyid yin pa la// phyogs su bltas pas grub pa med// da lta'i ba dang phyi ma'i bde// mngon sum pa dang rgyab nas byung // de yang rnam
66a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i skyon yin pas// de la brten par mi bya'o// dus gsum gcig ste khyad par med// sngon med phyis med gdod nas byung // chos spus khyab pa gcig pa'i phyir// bde ba chen por rang bzhin gnas// srid pa gsum na sbyong ba yang // ming
66a5(rnying rgyud): tsam sgra mar snang bste// 'khor los sgyur ba'i gnas chen yang // sgyu ma skyong ba'i bsti gnas yin// rnam dpor dus la ltos pa'i gnas// de dus der ni 'byung mi 'gyur// mabral smon pa spyod pas na// rnyeng pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa bzhin/
66a6(rnying rgyud): gcig ste rnam pa yongs kyis med// rna ba 'byor nam mkha'i bye lam gnas// ma byung ma skyes snying po la// sgo btags chos ku nag la yod// gyi nang gnyis ga kyi nyid nang // zab mo'i cha shas rtogs yul med// srid pa ming tsam log pa'i stobs/
66a7(rnying rgyud): bas ting 'dzin mnyam dang bral// de la tha tshig phyi dang nang // rang bzhin phung po khams bzhin gnas// dus gsum de yang mi 'bral bas// tha tshig ming du btags pa med// nyi zla dang mnyam pa dri ma med pa'i rgyud las/ chos su kun tu bzang po
66b1(rnying rgyud): thig po'i pa skye dgu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa// migayob ni sgra yiH// mi brgyad pa ni ye shes te// mi len pas na bdag med cing // mi 'dor tshig bral mnyam nyid do// gang dang gang gis gang du yang // kun/
66b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor kun spyod bdag las byung // 'di la skyes pa bud med ces// mnyam pa'i rgyal pos yongs ma gsungs// 'di la brtul zhugs drag shul g+hi// gnas su bya ba'i ming med de// a dang par ni rnam ldan na// sgyu ma'i bde ba 'byung bar
66b3(rnying rgyud): 'dod// rang bzhin gcig tu ma nges pas// ji ltar bltas pas de ltar snang // snang 'dod rtsol sems bde ba yang // de ni de sgrib ston chen yin// byang chub yan lag kun gyi sgo// cha lugs bsgoms pas chu zla bzhin// mgos pa
66b4(rnying rgyud): chags 'byung 'gyur yang // bsgoms pas byis pa'i spyod yul bzhin// dkyil khor khro gnyer cha lugs kyis// khro bdag chen po'i lus bzung nas// yi ge mngon du phyung na yang // zhibs de nyid mthong ba med// rnam grangs
66b5(rnying rgyud): brgyad khri bzhi stong phrag yas kyang // gang ltar spyad kyang mi rtog skye// mtshan ma med pa'i dbang gis ni// bsti gnas 'di las 'byung mi 'gyur// gleng bral 'di la gang gnas pa// rnal 'byor de ni skal ba bzang // bdag dang gzhan don
66b6(rnying rgyud): mi byed kyang // sgyu ma lhun grub yul la rol// lhag ma med par yongs su rdzogs// 'gyur ba ma yin drang por gnas// nam mkha' bzhin te mtha' mnyam zhing // gzhan la ltos 'gyur chos ma yin// lhun gyis gnas pas bde ba che//
66b7(rnying rgyud): mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis// rang gi mthu yis reg pa las// chos ni gzhan nas 'byung mi 'gyur// sla zhing dka' la dka' phyir sba// mngon sum mi gnas kun la khyab// ming tsam 'di zhes bstan pa ni// sems dpa' rdo rjes mtshon du med
67a1(rnying rgyud): ngo mtshar gyad byung rol pa 'di// bya bral nam mkha' di bzhin te// cir yang mi dmigs gti mug las// de ma thag tu rang pas 'byung // 'di ni thams cad mtshungs pa'i lam// 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnang // gyis pa bas
67a2(rnying rgyud): pas 'khrul pa yis// sman nyid sman pas tshol ba bzhin// go bo'i yul na bde ba che// de nyid rnam dag 'jig rten yin// de la phyogs kyi 'od 'dus pas// phyogs bzhi mtshams dang blo 'og 'grung // mangs 'ja' tshon kha dog las// rigs
67a3(rnying rgyud): khyad par mngon par snang // de bzhin ga yo rdul mi g.yo ba// 'byung ba lnga ngag tso chen yin// nyi dang mnyam pa dri ma med pa'i rgyud las/ thugs rje ye shes theg pa'i le'u sgrib pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi/
67a4(rnying rgyud): tha snyad ming la mi gnas te// skye 'gag med par rnam brtags te// de nyid dus gsum chen por sbyor// mnyam pas rim par bkod pa med// gcig pas phyogs bcu bsngo dang bral// tshogs kyi rgyan rnams bkram pa yang // rang bzhin gnas pas
67a5(rnying rgyud): 'grob pa med// lhun gyis gnas pas mi 'arjod de// gdong nas da sa du rje yin// 'di byed bganyis ca pa nga // lhag pa'i bsam pas gtung du med// phyed kyis bsdam pas yang dag kyi// bkres pa stongs da rgya mama'o// mtha
67a6(rnying rgyud): par gyur pas dngos grub la// de ni mnyam bzhag rdzogs pa'o// yud tsam bzung bas sbyor ba yin// dga' bar gyur pa dam tshig ste// thabs kyi gar thabs bskyod pa yis// gnyis med myong ba phul ba yin// mi gzung gtong bas gtor ma ste//
67a7(rnying rgyud): byab med pa'i las rnams so// mi rtog ye shes bgegs bsal nas// mi gsung ma tam pa zhag sngags tshig go// bla ma mchod dang gtong ba dang // de bzhin bsod nams thams cad kyang // ma chags me ga ya stobs med na// byas na 'ching
67b1(rnying rgyud): da// du dam kyang tho pa gyu// dgan/ du du gyu// ma rlon ma na du du na mngad kyang /
67b2(rnying rgyud): 'di da gsung// rnam mapa da yangs bdal pa'i dngas / shes te bras khong pag cod// ma rgyasasgom kyad 'bras dang // drug pa chen po ldan gyis thub// rig pa mnga' dang mnyam pa'i khyad// nyin lta bar drim dang /
67b3(rnying rgyud): blon mdabang pas gti mug sa le// drug gis 'gro gag pangs bcu// ston pa bstan pa 'khyod gnas dus// dang snang sems la smos pa yin// sgom spyod 'bras pa zhi'i kluhA// gdul ba'iska pas dang rtswa bar bya// kha gas
67b4(rnying rgyud): bu'i// dan madrim med pa'i // kun da cig gi thal po nyid// sems dpa' dam khyod lagautid// de nam sems pa'i dadi yis// bcom ldan 'das pa 'das da brji// mnyim pa rgal pa yo// mi nga byung bar
67b5(rnying rgyud): nga // mkha' dadu ye shes pa la po'i gang // dus gas maN+Dal bkun gyi yag// thams cad mkhyen lngaphrag 'tshal bskyed// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje de// sngagasu ma la shes phral sogs// dang snang rig pa'i 'khor thams //
67b6(rnying rgyud): dag ding mgrang sarjes su mi gyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bskrad do// chos thams cad rig pa nyina'i mtha' dang mnyam pa drim med pa'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das kun ga sul pa sa gsungs pardzogs so// shrIs
67b7(rnying rgyud): tsanas pasgyu / rgyag dang/ bya rdzas ma ma rje/ yid sa dang / spyod pate byang nga mnyam pa'i rgyud byed/ 'grob/ mthal rig pa'i skyel rdzag 'tshal lo// mi mchud du nags mdzub da
68a1(rnying rgyud): zhag rnam par dag pad/ na da// ran yangs nga // ng+gAg nasas pasad pa / mchags dang rnam pa na// than sa chags pa sa da du// gagags
68a2(rnying rgyud): bstan bzhi yis gnas// bzhi yis bstan pa dgu yis 'khor// gcig gis sdud pa gnyis su bstan// zhus lan la ni gsum yin te// sems dpas zhus dang ston pas lan// shin tu rgyas par zhus pa'o// de yi dang po drug don gsum// chags
68a3(rnying rgyud): bshad brgyad la sbyar te bshad// ston pa'i lan ni gsum yin te// thos bsam bsgom gsum tshigs bshad ni// bcu bzhing gal sbyar te bshad// rgyas dar zhus pa tha ma'i brgyad// cho ga lnga dag tu shes par bya// de nas yang dag bshad par bya//
68a4(rnying rgyud): rgyud kyi dngos po drug tshan lnga// bsdus dang rgyas dang rnam par rgyas// yongs su shes dang shin tu rgyas// de las bsdus pa tshig drug ste// lha sgom spyod 'brag thugs rje dang // gzhi ma'i tshig dang rnam pa drug/ ri ma dang rim par sbyar la bshad// de nas
68a5(rnying rgyud): yang dag bshad par bya// rgyas pa la ni don drug ste// lta ba'i don dang sgom pa'i don// spyod pa'i don dang 'bras bu'i don// nges tshig don dang ldang tshad do// / gsum dang gnyis dang bzhi dang lnga// gsum dang gnyis la rim gyis sbyar// bzhi pa
68a6(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu gnyis su bstan// lam 'bras gnyis kyi chos skye dang // thugs rje sprul pa 'char ba'o// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// rnam par byas pa paM drug ste// lta ba'i rtsal dang sgom pa'i rtsal// spod pa'i rtsal dang 'bras bu'i rtsal/
68a7(rnying rgyud): galas dang ni slob dpon rgyal// dang po zug ma gzhi yin to// gnyis pa bzhi 'das pa'i yin no// gsum pa gsum pa'i gnyis yin te// bde pagashes pa gnyis yin no// rdza pa'i wab wa yan te// drug pa dag
68b1(rnying rgyud): bzang ngan skyon yon gnyis// mkhas pas cag rdar shes par bya// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// yongs su rgyas pa drug tu bshad// lba ba l+h+wam lta bur che// bsgom pa rgya mtsho ga blar tshwa// spyod pa khyad chen lta bar tshwa// 'bras bu kun brdang lha
68b2(rnying rgyud): bur che// go las nam mkha' lha bur che// kun gzhi snang ba lta bur che// dang po la ni gsum du bshad// theg pa drug gi la bzla dang // a ti yo ga'i 'dug tshul dang // zab mo chos kyi 'char sgo'o// dang po gzhi min gzhi tshad gsum// gsung
68b3(rnying rgyud): po rim gyis sbyar bar bya// de 'og bdun gyis spyod pa ste// de bzhin brgyad pa bsgom par bya// 'bras bu la ni gnyis su bshad// dang po gzhi bzhag sku bzhi pa// kun bzang man chad bcu bzhi ni// thugs rjer bstan te dbyen gsum// rten
68b4(rnying rgyud): 'brel chos dang 'gro ba'i chos// 'jig rten chos dang bzhi tshe gsum// rim gyis ster te kun bzang gnyis// gsum po'i mgo la rnam par brgyan// golas de 'og bdun yin te// kun gyi tha ma'i gzhing bkral// de nas yang dge bshad par
68b5(rnying rgyud): bya// shin tu rgyas pa drug yin te// blta ba chos nyid thig le dang // bsgom pa dbyings kyi thig le dang // spyod pa rnam dag thig le dang // 'bras bu kun bzang thig le dang // thugs rje ye shes thig le dang // kun gzhi lhan grub thig le'o// de la
68b6(rnying rgyud): blta ba gnyis su bshad// sku gsum rang chas blta ba dang // thugs rje rang byung blta ba'o// dang po bzhi ste gnyis pa brgyad// ri ma dang rim gyis sbyar la bshad// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// bsgom pa la ni lngas bshad do// rang bzhin
68b7(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i ye shes dang // bla mas bstan pa'i rtogs pa dang // rtog pa'i yon tan rang las byung // ma bcos rang bzhag bsgom pa'i mchog/ de la brjod du med pa'o// de lnga bzhi tshan lnga pa ni// rim dang rim gyis sbyar la bshad// de nas yang
69a1(rnying rgyud): dag bshad par bya// stod pa rnam pa bzhin bshad de// sdug bsngal gyis nyid spyod pa dang // las las grol ba'i// dpa dang // rnamaN+Dag ye shes spyod pa dang // thag pa la bka'i spyod pa'o// bzhi dang brgyad dang
69a2(rnying rgyud): yang ni bzhi// nyi shu dag la rim gyis sbyar// theg pa la ba ste khyod la gzhi// rnam rtog bsgom pa'i nyan thos dang // dge sdig sel ba'i nga rgyal dang // stong par 'dod pa'i dbum dang // dug lngam spangs gsang sngags rnams// bzhi
69a3(rnying rgyud): gsum dang brgyad la ni// rim gyis sbyar te bshad par bya// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// 'bras bu la ni gsum du bshad// chos sku bya btsal bral pa dang // longs sgra yongs su rdzogs pa dang // skul pa kun la khyab pa'o// de la chos
69a4(rnying rgyud): sku gsum du bshad// sku gsum thugs rje'i gzugs dang ni// radwa las gzhan nas 'byung ba min// bya bral bgrod du med pa'o// brgyad dang bzhi dpa bzhi las bkral// yongs su rdzogs pa dang gzhir bshad de// sangs rgyas rang las 'brang ba dang /
69a5(rnying rgyud): dus gsum rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas dang // mnyam nyid phyogs chas mi 'grub pas// bde bar 'dod na grol ba'o// bzhi tshan bzhi la rim gyis sbyar// kun la khyab pa bzhir bstan te// dus gsum chos slar gdod nas gcig/ rang bzhin gnas
69a6(rnying rgyud): pa bde ba'i sku// skul skya snya ma lta bur 'char// thugs rje thabs kyi rol pa'o// gsum dang bzhi dang gcig dang bzhi dang ni// bcu drug dag dang sbyar te bshad// de la thugs rje bzhir bshad/ de smon drang don thugs rje dang // gcig chos
69a7(rnying rgyud): srur bral ba dang // zab mo chos la rtog pagol// dus gsum de nyid za tshig go// bzhi tshan bzhi la sbyar te bshad// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// thugs rjel ne lngar bstan te// mnyan nyid thugs rje'i sprul pa dang // gol sgrib bstan pa'i rdza
69b1(rnying rgyud): dang // ya shAs su ma thugs rnga dang // dpe rbad byung thugs dang // mdang las zhugs 'o// matA byed sgyul badrug ba da// mnyam pa ras mad zugs dang // ngas pa pung bya 'byung gnas dang / dranya rtsal thal ba dang /
69b2(rnying rgyud): shes rang thabs kyi kyi ma rtogs// mangs skal pa 'gyud pa dang / dgrornams da gi/ sgrub pa'o// bzhi tshan pa nyis dang gnyis rgyan pa ni/ rin gyis rgya la rnam par bshA/ ng+tha pa rnam ga sum du ga // kyai ba gro pa dang nang par gos/
69b3(rnying rgyud): 'bras chos ni bkag pa med// ba dz+nyAn ma la 'tshal ba bkral// ye shes skye ma gnyis sa bshad// rtogs na thugs na 'byung dang // snyan pa dang la 'byung ba'o// bzhi ba zhig thog mthang bzhi pani phyin// dbo dbyung gnyis sra bstan/
69b4(rnying rgyud): rgyas nyid mtshon du med pa dang // zab mo bzhi yi gdams ngag go// bzhi bzhi la ni sbru rol bshad// mdzad pa phrin las bzhir bshad de// dag pa'i la ma chen kun la khyab// ma shes bskrad pas 'gro ba 'a bral// rtogs te shes na mngon sangs rgyas/
69b5(rnying rgyud): ye yon tan phrin las rdzogs// gnyis dang gcig ste gsum dang drung // gro rim bzhin du sbyar te bshad// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// kun gzhi rnam pa gsum du bskrun// gnas pa gzhi li kun gzhi dang // sbyor ba don gyi kun gzhi dang // rdzog
69b6(rnying rgyud): pajus kyi srin gzhod// gnas pa gzhi la bcug tsug ste// dkyil 'khor dgod du med pa dang // rim pa bsgyur du med pa dang // mchod pa ba sro dri med pa dang // tshogs pa bsag tu med pa dang // sngon la mapo rdo dra med pa dang // bdung
69b7(rnying rgyud): dru med pa da // rgyal bsgom du med pa dang // sdig pa bshag tu med pa dang // thang spya gram du me pa dang // dngos grub bsgrub tu med pa dang // thams cad mnyam nyid rdzogs pa'o// 'dis ni bcu la rnam par brgyan// dang po gnyis nas
70a1(rnying rgyud): 'angan// da 'gag Na zung nas gnyis// smyenas gnyis nyi ral// yang di nyi nyad dang // rim gyis kya la ba shad par bya// rdor ba gzhi lagasum du bshad// dus gsum kya rkyor ba dang // shes ba ma sa
70a2(rnying rgyud): dang // thabs kyi gnyis med sbyor ba'o// dus gsum chos nyid thog ma'i gzhi// gnas pa gzhi yi gang nas de sgreng // byor ba gnyis pa bcu ga cig 'og/ gnyis gnyis dag la sbar te bshad// ldog pa'i kun gzhi bdun du bshad// gtor ma gtang du med pa
70a3(rnying rgyud): dang // phrin las btsal du med pa dang // mtshams la gcad du med pa dang // bzlas brjod bye ru med pa dang // bskabs zin ma zin gyi khyad// rtogs pa lung gI ma nang ga dang // chos nyid 'gyur ba med pa'o// gzhi la bzhir bstan
70a4(rnying rgyud): gcig la bzhi// de ni gcig le bzhir bstan gcig gi gzhi// thugs rje gzhir bzhag 'di ru blangs// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// mthar phyin yongs su gtad pa ni// rnam pa gnyis su bshad par bya// ston pas 'khor la gtad
70a5(rnying rgyud): pa dang // 'khor gyis rjes su yi rang ngo // de yi dang po gsum du bshad// rgyud kyi yon tan bstan pa dang // rgyud kyi rnam grangs bstan pa dang // che ba dang ldan gtad pa'o// dang po dang po'i rnam pa brgyad// gnyis pa de 'og bzhi yin te/
70a6(rnying rgyud): gsum pa de yi yang ni bzhi// rim gyis sbyar te bshad par bya// rjes su yi rang gnyis su bshad// sems dpas gtso la bstod pa dang // 'khor gyis rjes su yi rang ngo // dang po la ni bdun yin te// tha ma la ni drug tu bshad// ri ma dang rim par
70a7(rnying rgyud): sbyar byas la// yang dgas ru bshad par bya// de las lus na sid+d+hi ka na// spyod pa nyi zla dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel/ rin po che snang ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba/ slob dpon dga' ra ba rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
70b1(rnying rgyud): kya ga ga dadu / sarba d+harmA ma hA sa rban+ta d+hiHsa sngar mA la rgya da na trA sa rbarbA \u0f89\u0fa4r+m+mA/ bad skad du/ chas thams cad byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa can pa 'khor ba cad nas gtsang pa napa cha dang mnyam pa slab med pa'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das tha ga
70b2(rnying rgyud): rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong du me dang thabs cig tu
70b3(rnying rgyud): bzhugs te/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpas gnyis med mchog gi mchod pa phul nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de zhus pa'o// e ma ho bcom ldan kun tu bzang // rang snang rig pa'i ye shes la// sna tshogs snang ba'i chos rnams kun// 'di yi mtshan
70b4(rnying rgyud): ci ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rang rig blo yi snang ba las// snang tshul bcu bdun sdang ba 'di// 'di yi mtshan nyid glo bur ba// rgyu rkyen dbang gis snang ba yin// dper nag pur sman dug tshul// sems dpa' rdo rjes yang
70b5(rnying rgyud): gsol pa// e ma bcom ldan kun rig lags// 'khor ba 'khrul pa'i snang ba 'di// rtsad nas gcad na ci ltar gcad// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khams gsum 'khor ba'i 'khrul snang 'di// rmad byung bde 'byams nam mkha' nyid/
70b6(rnying rgyud): rje btsan rtse mo kun 'dus pa// srog dang myu gu rin po che// bde ba spyi gcod sems kyi tig/ rin chen lte bu'i sgron ma yis// 'khor brtsad nas gcad par bya// de skad gsungs pa'i tshig rjes la// sems dpa' rdo rjes yang zhus pa// e ma bcom
70b7(rnying rgyud): ldan pade gshegs yab// 'khor brgyad nas gcad pa'i phyir// rmad byung bcu gsum rin po che// yang dag gyes par bshad du gsol// rin po che dang mnyam po skye ba med pa'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas
71a1(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan bka' stsal pa// da ni med byang rin chen mdzod// skye med thams cad las byung // dpad pa' sngon ro pa na// sangs rgyas sems can gnyi sa me de// gzugs nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar// thams
71a2(rnying rgyud): cadang las byung ba yin// 'jam dpal ye shes rdo rje'i sku// nyon mongs drug po rnamathar sgo// po dra dkar po dri ma med// 'di don rtog pa sems kyi dbang // yang dag grub pa jig ler gcig/ 'di ni la 'byor bde ba'i mcho// gdan nas dri ma da
71a3(rnying rgyud): che// skrag bsngal nad kyi zug rngu 'jil// rmed byang rdo rjes zhe sdang 'joms// ye shes phur dbus brjod bzhi bskal// thams cad yum gyi b+ha ga'i klong // nga las 'byung zhi dang du ni// da ni srid las thob pa'i sngags// de nyid las su rung ba na na/
71a4(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten gsum yang da ru rdzogs// gtsug tor chen po rmad byung gtsung // theg pa sna rdzogs rnon pa po// bden pa bzhin ston pa po// yan lag bcu gnyis srang rgya ba ton// rnam rig ste tshogs gzugs don can// bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas// gsum
71a5(rnying rgyud): rig gtsang ma dag pa ste// de nyid rnam pa bzhi yi tshul// sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can// bcu drug phyed byed thig le can// chos dbyings dam pa zad mi shes// rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub// rmad kyang rdo rje 'di rtogs na// rdo rje sems dpa'
71a6(rnying rgyud): nyid kyang ni// rdo rje'i gdan la yang sangs rgya// ngo mtshar rmad byung kun gyi gtsug/ sku lnga ye shes thig lo'i rdzong// rmad byung thugs rjes 'gro don rdzogs// rin po che dang mnyam pa skyes med pa'i rgyud las/ byang chub kyi semasapa'i le'u ste gnyis
71a7(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa// gnyis su med las bde ba che// dbyings su thim pas kun la byams// 'bras bu med pas bde ba'i sgo// ngang du grol bas bde ba'i klong // ma dmags rdzogs chen 'a
71b1(rnying rgyud): brjod// zla 'gag mad pas ma da nas dag/ ngan la ma bcas dam pa par// rdzogs pa rdzogs ste dang bden gnas// bad thams su bu'i nam mrayang ba// dan dang nyid du sa dang byul// rang bzhin lus dgra da byed// 'argya med
71b2(rnying rgyud): pas bde chen rdzogs// rmod pa'i mun pa sel ba'i don// sangs rgyas 'byung bas bde 'byams yin// thig le bde khyab rdzogs chen po// thig le rang byung don dam klong // byang chub sems chen bde 'byams 'di// rig pa spos med rgyal por rdzogs//
71b3(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal po bde chen po// mnyam pa'i dngal thabs kyis rdzogs// rin po che dang mnyam pa skye ba med pa'i rgyud las/ bde 'byams yangs pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa// 'byung bzhi las rgyal nam
71b4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i don du bzhag pa yin// sems nyid nam mkha' chen po la// snying po 'khor ba las sgrol bas// nam mkha'i rgyal po yin par bya//
71b5(rnying rgyud): ma' badzin// sa snrums kya la snyi rdzugs// gangs pas ca ba ga rkyen/
71b6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i rdzogs chen a ti ni// thig pa kun rdzogs nam mkha'i dang // 'khor ba gcod pa'i grul po 'di// ma lus yi sangs rgyas par gsal// donal btsal med rgyal po yin// sems la dogs me gan gyi // rang byung gdod nas rnam par dag
71b7(rnying rgyud): 'di rtogs mnyam pa'i rgyal po thob// dmigs dang bral bas bsgom pa yin// las las byed pa'i sems can de// dus la bab pa'i rnal 'byor pas// las nyid thugs rjer shes par bya// thugs rje chen po'i thabs kyis bsgral// ma btsal dbyings
71b8(rnying rgyud): su thim pa yis// don dam smos thag nam mkha' de// gzhan las mi 'byung thabs kyis 'grub// thams cad dmigs med bde ba'i klung // srid gsum non pas drug gsum chod// dbang po yul las 'phros pa rnams// thams
72a1(rnying rgyud): ga / chu / du// sa sun/ sa du gsu sa//
72a2(rnying rgyud): bdud zhe btsanapas 'ab bamed// dngas nyid dag par gyu / khang nga ga rje ba dang// ga gas pa 'gas pa ngabs te// zhugs nasu 'gyung bar chu pa/ rad da
72a3(rnying rgyud): byeng/ rdzubyud pa'i ba rtsu ma// rnams da kyi bang banas nga// rdulas ma dang ba bzung // chud pa ni byang nags// mas sa/ ji ma
72a4(rnying rgyud): kun byab ma rdzas d+ha// ma / 'dzin // thun gyi mardzogs// skye dgasun ma sanapas 'a dgasagrub
72a5(rnying rgyud): nga ba ba nyid// mnyam pa sgrub med pa las rnam rgyu mad+ma'i rdzog pagyi'o// / da nas rnam ldan pa phru / pas pas pa

72a7(rnying rgyud): ma sa rdzogs / mtshangs 'a b.rig pa'i sa// skyangs sa tung / gas pa zhe su ga nga/
72b1(rnying rgyud): g.yos pa med// yi ge 'bru la rtog pa rnams// rje bcan don pas nyams te dman// phyi nang gnyis ka bde chen po// rje btsan dam pa byang chub sems// 'khor ba mang 'das gnyis med de// ji ltar bltas pas byang chub sems//
72b2(rnying rgyud): yi sangs rgyas pas chos kyi sku// rin po che dang mnyam pa skye ba med pa'i rgyud las/ dzaM btsan dam pa'i le'u ste zla pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa// nam mkha' 'greng ba kun d+hi n+te// kun bza chos rnams kun gyi rtse// skye ga
72b3(rnying rgyud): med pas 'khor ba kun gyi rgyu// dran rtog med pas bsgom pa'i rtse// thams cad yongs las rgyal ba ni// rtse mo byung rgyal zhes bshad do// de nyid byang chub sems yin te// 'bras bu rang la rdzogs pa'i phyir// rtse mo phyung kyam dang nyid smra// ma
72b4(rnying rgyud): song gnas byin lam gyi rtse// 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang nyid las// dus gsum mi 'bralas ru ga nas// bsrung mtshams kun las rgyal bas na// dam tshig kun gyi rtse mor bshad// blang dor med pa'i spyod pa ni// rgyal chen gang yang ma
72b5(rnying rgyud): spangs rtse// mi 'gyur lhan grub blta ba ni// rig pa spos bral mnyam pa'i rgyal// gang yang 'byed pa med pas na// gdags pa'i tha snyad kun las 'das// don la dbyer med brda ba'i rgyu// snang srid gsal ba'i byang chub sems// 'du 'bral med pas
72b6(rnying rgyud): yongs su khyab// kun lags la bas bkag pa med// snang srid ma 'gags ye shes rtse// chu 'bras gnyis med dbye ba yis// tshogs mchog dmapa chen po ste// bsod nams dam pa'i gzhir 'gyur ro// dus gsum rtsal ba thams cad kun// mnyam
72b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbyings su bkod pas ni// 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang la gnas// ma lus sangs rgyas sa ru brtags// rin po che dang mnyam pa skye ba med pa'i rgyud pas/ rtse mo byung rgyal gyi le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa// sna tshogs
73a1(rnying rgyud): ga // mam pa dus// rnamam pa dab na khyabs sa// glang gas na/ nan bsnangs// na na 'du /
73a2(rnying rgyud): pa gcig blangs par 'dus// yid lam yangs brjod pang bzhug// ma thas sangs rgyas sems su 'das// rtsa bajal ba'i sems nyid de// sras kyang mi gyis yinas gnas// 'an lhan gyis thab pa 'i// yang ga chos nyid dbyings kyi thong /
73a3(rnying rgyud): yul rag ma lus pa'i sems// pad can 'du 'phral myed pa'i spyan+ta// dbras bu dang 'jigs pas s+ho// mang srid thams cad kyis sanas// bdag dang byung bas khar badzad// dpal ldan cugs ma rang byung ba // sangs rgyas mthas dbying sa
73a4(rnying rgyud): sagacig/ sgyu med don la thabs kyis 'dus// ma thos dang du grol bas na// thams cad thugs rje thabs kyis bkral// gcig las med pa 'don chen da// gan dzin grangs pas mnyam rgya// ye shes rnam pas gtsogazugs pa/
73a5(rnying rgyud): rje medapar gsod pa dang // bzlab med pa za ba yis// 'gro ga yenas sangs rgyas te// thams cad lhag mdzad par bskul// tsaM skar snang bkun na zab// mnas gcigag dang dru/ ngas// byas na 'ching ba'i la m+b+ha yin la// ma bskabs 'du /
73a6(rnying rgyud): med par bstan// lA nas yin pas pade chen te// gnas la chags pa med pas na// 'dus las ma gyis snang ba ste// kun la khyam pas sgrib cu med// gang yang mngagagasams gas la// ma lus 'dus pa'i rgyun du cha// ngag ma lus pa
73a7(rnying rgyud): mdud de// gzhan gyis bcos su med pa yis// sprul pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad kun// gzhi rtsa med pa'i ngang du bzhag/ sus kyang ma byas nyid la 'dus// rin po che dang mnyam pa skye ba med pa'i rgyud las/ kun 'dus rig pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//
73b1(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa// ma bcos bde ba chen po'i don// 'di la su shi med pas srog/ kun nas ma bsgribs byang chub sems// sdang srid 'du 'bral med pas srog/ thos gsum ma bslabs byang chub sems// 'pho 'gyur gnyi
73b2(rnying rgyud): su med pa'i srog/ srog gi 'khor lo srid gsum bskor// 'byung lnga yum gyi b+ha ga'i klong // 'di ru snang srid rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyid la skye sha med// phye 'gag med pas srog ces bya// 'gyur ba med pas a ti ru// 'gro
73b3(rnying rgyud): rnams skye shi med par bsgral// de phyir 'chi med srog ces bya// kye shi med pas sems nyid srog/ srid gsum 'khor lo bskor bas na// srog gi 'khor lo zhes su grags// yul la nges pa med pas na// sems kyi de dogs rnam par med//
73b4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin chags med pas 'ching ba med// skye med de la srog ces bya// dus gsum rdo rje 'dus ma byas// snang srid ye sangs rgyas pas srog/ 'phags pa'i don la dbye ba med// dus gsum 'gyur ba med pas na// gar yang 'pho ba med pas
73b5(rnying rgyud): grong // bsam du med pa'i chos nyid la// brjod du med pa'i rig pa bzhag/ chags med 'du 'bral med pas srog/ s+ye shi bral bas rang byung klong // ma yengs gsal bas srog gdon// kun la khyab pas byang chub don// 'gyur med lhun gyis
73b6(rnying rgyud): grub pas na// spabs ma yul las 'das pa'o// gang la chags med byang chub lam// spos bral srog gi 'khor lo'o// rin po che dang mnyam pa skye ba med pa'i rgyud las/ srog gi 'khor lo'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan
73b7(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa// kye rkyen tshogs pa'i sdod bu las// myu gu don gyis 'byung ba ltar// ma btsas dang la rang bzhin gnas// gnas pas dmigs med myu gu 'byung // spos med byang chub sems nyid las// rin chen sangs rgyas b+ha gu 'byung // rgyal lus
74a1(rnying rgyud): ldan na kun nan du na/ la pa dgas pa na sa na/ ma su smra/
74a2(rnying rgyud): b+haklu byung bar nges// de la 'jog me skol bar brtag/ dus gsupa 'gyur ba byang chub sams/ ma bcos smin grub la sangs rgyas// bsrung ma dam tshig rten pas// le bsrungs gdang tshad smra 'byung // 'dos pa dadamigs pa
74a3(rnying rgyud): lo// ma yengs mnyam pa chen por bzhag/ rtog mi mos bral byang chub sems// gzung 'dzin med pa'i dang nyid las// bla na med pa'i lhagu 'byung // rgyal rag nod byang chub sems// sbyin bral yon tan mya gu 'a gyung // 'byung bayis ngas
74a4(rnying rgyud): kyus pa la// snang srid spyad la mugu byung // nga chub sems chen rgyal po 'di// thams nad seMsangs rgyas pa yis// khyed dag gnas sbyin ma dge pas// bA rba pazhi bsam pa bskyed pa med// lung la coM po pa med+ma pas na// zang yodon kyi
74a5(rnying rgyud): glu sa/ sa ni ma // dgags dag kyang chu mas// ga ga gangs cad nga phral dang // nganang rlung kyi nyan pa dang dang masabyung chubs pas smras pa
74a6(rnying rgyud): dI nas ba com ldan dka' stsal pa// khams gsum las 'das den chen dag/ bgrod med rnam gro la maston pa// gzhan nas rnyed par mi 'gyur te// thig gi chen kun kya gnas// rang byung mo bcos y-i nas gas pa// tshol bas btsal me
74a7(rnying rgyud): sbyong po 'don// rnam nga rtag par kun tu dang / gnyis mengad po ma myog tun gyis ga// gachen dang / // rkyenapangs kya gas ni// kris pa bying spyod dul to// drang srong chen pa rnams can// grong ma
