75a1(rnying rgyud): 'thug// la dur brtsub pa rgyal mdangs// bsasu par byabang ma ga dang brag/ du da gang dgas dbu byung// byung na/ sams pangal yangs pa' byung // rang sems man bar nacan ga tar// 'acas
75a2(rnying rgyud): ngas gradas ga/ 'gam 'a bzhi dzin da de// sa kya ba bayin pa dadapa bar byed/ dgi kyig par gnas pa 'am/ gas pa ga pa la pang sa// don pom gnas pa mam
75a3(rnying rgyud): nas smras pang don ma spyang// rang gzung rnathag pacad pa yang // gas chen pa pa// nam za mnapa pa rgyab dang pa'i du pas// ga pa sdug cad sdel stong thag nyis pa'o// de nas pacomaldan pa
75a4(rnying rgyud): la pa// ma bcas da bzhin gas labs na// 'gyur ma tsun kyimadzub pa'i ti// chos nyid padi sbyin thong yangs brdal// rang byung 'gur med sbom bral ga/ byang chu sems zin kun tu bang // dus gas pa gcig tu gnas pas rta/
75a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba yang bskal a ti la// sdang srid kun sangs rgyas pa'i tig/ 'khor bkun chung byung sems mchog/ drug gsum gnas tshal gragasu ma rtog/ drug ldan bsgribs mya ngan 'das// ye shes lnga drags la pa'i tig/ thugs pa brtol ba bstan

77a1(rnying rgyud): blo tog byis pa'i spyod pas ca zhig bslu// rgyu bras dbyer med sangs rgyas sems can dang // phan gyi spyod yul gzhin med pal// 'khrul pas no pa'i lam du brtags pa yang // bstan pa ra sam chen po las gzhan med pas// mnyam par
77a2(rnying rgyud): sa pa spangs kyis kun gyi rje// nga dang bdag tu brtags pas rabazhi pa'i// mchog tu rmad byung phyi dang nang kun dbyings// ya~M nas rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul la// sems can sangs rgyas gnyis med skal can dbang // bdag gzhan brtags pas mu steg 'khrul pa'i
77a3(rnying rgyud): lam/ byis pas bslus pas chos khyod lam la btsud// phyin pa'i dus med rtogs pa'i dus med pas// gnyis med chos ni rnyed par ga la 'gyur// byang chub sems rtsal chen spags pa'i rgyud las/ gling gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan
77a4(rnying rgyud): 'das dpa' rdo rje sems dpas yang phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po/ bdag med gnyis med rnam par dag pa'i lam// gang la brten te bsgrub par bya// yang dag pa yi gtso bos bshad du gsol// zhes bcom ldan 'das la zhus pas/ bcom ldan
77a5(rnying rgyud): 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos don thugs su chud nas bka' stsal pa/ dam pa'i dge bshes la brten te dngad sems bskyed/ rgyu lam de bgrod rim zhugs 'bras rnyed tshe// gnyis med bde bar phyin phyir de bzhin no// mig yo'i rang bzhin gnas pa'i chos nyid de// stong pa
77a6(rnying rgyud): nyid de stong pa'i yul la gnas// brtags na mngon sum mi gnas rnyed mtha' med// lam la ltos pa'i gnas med pas ma dang bral// rang bzhin nyid las yid mi 'jog pa ni// bdag med sman chen gtong ba'i slob dpon de// dge bshes kun las
77a7(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba'i rin po che// bdag dang gzhan du bral ba'i ston mkhan nyid// gzhan nas ma byung ranga' jig byang chub sems// dpe' mtshan mas gzhig su yod ma yin// ye shes 'byur 'jug zad pa'i thugs pa nyid// dad pa'i dad pa sems bskyed yin par ni// dri med de bzhin gshegs
77b1(rnying rgyud): darnams chos ga du// na pa badzad pa da ba dang pa sa// nAm shA rnams sa snang ba yang // ba rtag pa la ga khrus pa dgas rung // dad pa'i'amasas dam san// mtsham mthong ma dgazugs pa gags pa/ du ga
77b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis med yongs su grus pa'i chos sa ces// byang chub tshogs rdzogs chos las gzhan minan// dngos med chos kyi rang bzhin yin pa san// gzugs smra drir dag thal sags kyang // tha zang ldan grub tha me bzhin gas// gdan yang gam lan bdag nyid rje//
77b3(rnying rgyud): snyi byang chub mchog ste rtag par bzhugs// byang chub sems rtsal chen sngags pa'i rgyud las/ chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rtogs pa byub la rim gyis rtogs par bya ba dang / de nyid kyi na la cig char 'jug pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan
77b4(rnying rgyud): 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos brjod par bya ba tshad du brjod pa/ bya ba don la mi gnas gnyen pos bcos su med// maltung mi rtog kun tu ji bzhin gnas// gzung ba'i yul med sems kyi gnas kyang med// gnyis med bde chen sangs rgyas kun spyod la// theg gsum
77b5(rnying rgyud): 'khrul par btag pas ci zhig bsnyad// ye shes gzhir kyang mi rtog ting 'dzin 'das// rnam pa cir me rtog pas byang chub snying po la// bzhugs pas gnyis med ting 'dzin chal po thob// mi dmigs dmigs pa med pas chags gnas med// mngon sum nyid du brtag med
77b6(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med chu 'bras med// lam gyis bcos su 'di lag la yod// thams cad mnyam gnas snying po'i rang bzhin las// gza' gtad yul la drang srong bsgom yid 'jog/ bsgom las ma 'khrul rang bzhin bral chen
77b7(rnying rgyud): sdug sa// byang chung sems cal chen sngags pa'i spyod las/ don la blo gzhag pa'i thabs bstan pa'i ma'u lhagasu ma pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang pas brjod par byab 'don nyid kyis brjod pa/ bdag med ma bcos kyi nang rnam
78a1(rnying rgyud): pa dag/ ji bzhin me brjo pa s+t+rai gang+gA yadang // dmigs pa sal bras pas pa da pags padak+ta/ sangs sus tsun med pas sangs rgyas yod// nam 'du la dam chog chags pa nad yin te// 'ang 'du sa 'ang 'a mtshogasas
78a2(rnying rgyud): bangs dang // bsnangs kyang ba la chu brdzogs nyams // sa sa brjeg kyang ma ga tshul/ phyogs pa la ga nga med/ 'thupa po'i slong pos nas // ye thag gnas nam rnamaHsa na// mtshangs bzang
78a3(rnying rgyud): pa dan des thaM pa hU~M// zar pa'i dus med mtshol dus ta sa dzA/ skyes pa'i tshos bral bdag me gajig pa// ma yin ma drang kun tu rang bzhin gnas// btsal bas rnying pa'i yul mde stong par stong // rtsol 'a ra dwags klag rgya bamyigs pa 'du ldan
78a4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs dang byung che ba'i yul lag nas// med pa la yin med pa'i snying po 'byung // gnyis med nyid byeng tshig gisatha' dang dral// snong pa las 'das mal tshal kun las 'phags/ byang chub sems rtsal rkyen lpags pa da las/ sprin gyis gnas par ma/
78a5(rnying rgyud): gola' skye bzhi pa'o// / da nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzung bas/ ting nga 'dzin don brjod pa shA ched 'arjod pa/ byas pa 'das pasam mngon rna la bas pa par bya// mdzub mos thams mtshan mthong rje bzhin // med pa'i snying po las ni yod par bya /
78a6(rnying rgyud): 'dugs pa rnam pa sa sa pa'i ga nyidade// thos pa yod song gas palam/ ba'i 'ong ri dgas/ nyid kyimanya la 'ad pa mtshan/ da da nga bzhi byinas// ngangs 'bras ba
78a7(rnying rgyud): gas su gas sa da ga // sa pa song ba yin ma da pa dang // gang sagasas ma 'a mang po' ba / ma sa tshan 'ad
78b1(rnying rgyud): mi dmigs rtsol ba las ni 'das pa yi// rang bzhin der mi bzhag ste 'dres par bya// ma 'thungs chu yis skom la mi phan bzhin// lce yi tshig de don du ma shes na// nad gang phan pa'i sman dang nad pa dag/ 'grogs kyang khong du ma btang mi 'tsho 'da'// byang chub
78b2(rnying rgyud): sems rtsal chen skyugs pa'i rgyud las/ bsam gtan ting nge 'dzin dang rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin dang / de shes par bya dgos pa'i le'u stel pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po la thal mo gdong
78b3(rnying rgyud): du bzung nas cing mi smra bar pus bcug tu 'dug pas// bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos nyid la nyid brjod pa/ ngo bo nyid kyi gzhi rtogs ma nod lam// ci yang mi mnos pa li chos spyad nas// bdag gzhan med pa'i 'bras thob ste// rtag tu bdag gzhan
78b4(rnying rgyud): med pa'i 'bras bu thob// bdag gzhan thams cad cing yang mi mthong ngo // dra bas me mtshon bzhin du de yang bral// bden pa bzhin du rnam shes mi g.yo zhing // sems rgyun skye ba med pa'i zag chen po// mi bden pa nyid ma skyes par shes na// mi bden rgyan//
78b5(rnying rgyud): bcad bden pa nyid la gnas// sems la sems med par ni shes gyur na// sems de la ni gcad du ci'ang med// da ltar gyi ni rnam shes me skye zhing // sems la sems med par ni shes 'gyur te// chos la chos med par yang shes pa ni// sangs rgyas
78b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad dam pa de gsum spyod// snying po 'byung bas chos sgra gzhan na med// spyod med khyud las 'das pas spyod pa'i mchog/ de la snying po 'gyur ste chos kyi lha'o// gzhan du don smra muM stegs 'khrul pa'i lam// skom pa chus gdungs smig rgya bsnyeg pa
78b7(rnying rgyud): 'dra// byang chub sems thal tshon gyi rgyud las/ spyod pa'i rnam grangs so sor bstan pa'i lel ste dag pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tra bzang po nyid kyis ched du brjod pa 'od brjod do// mi gnas mi dmigs mi 'gyur byang chub sems/
79a1(rnying rgyud): mngon sum mi gnas rlabs kyis de la rol// ston pas bshad pa don gnyer rung ma yin// zos par mi rigs mnyan pa'i tha skad bral// chos dang chos man 'dres pa'i thig la 'di// lhag pa 'don yin pas na bshad du med// ji ltar grib ma bzung bar
79a2(rnying rgyud): 'dod pas kyang // lcags kyus bzung ngam snod du byas nas kyang // gzugs brtan grib ma gzugs la dag pa bzhin// spu'i phyag rgya slobaskyugs la 'gyur ba// ting 'dzin brtan pas ji ltar bzung gyur kyang // chos kyi dbyings la/ ye nas rnam par dag/ rtog dpyod skyes pang
79a3(rnying rgyud): chos las 'dzin pa de// 'khrul te byang chub rtog pas thob pa med// sangs rgyas ston pas chos rnams bshad pa ni// so so 'don rnams ji ltar 'dzin gyur kyang // de nyid mi 'thob don chen nyid la ngag/ depyi don 'di rnyed par ma gyur na// ston pas bshad pas 'di yi gting mi rnyed//
79a4(rnying rgyud): kun tu 'ongs mi non 'tshang mi D+ha// sgyu ma mkham gyis sgra ma sprul byas kyang // skad cig tsam yang yod ma myong ba ltar// na gsung tsheg las sangs rgyas myi 'byung ba'o// sku bzhin skad cig tsam yang 'grub mi srid// byang chub don la 'khrul ba de dag ni// don med tshig bsrung
79a5(rnying rgyud): pa sa du sa / da na
79a6(rnying rgyud): med pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos nyid kyis nyid la ched du brjod pa// e ma ho chen po lnga nga dge ba'i chos// bdag gzhan mi 'byed rgyu 'bras yongs kyis rdzogs// tshig gi don gser nor bu rin po che// gzhan nas
79a7(rnying rgyud): btsal bas me rnyed rang la gnas// yangs so che'i chos rnams gyen gyi rtse// bzang ngo zhes sems nyid rnam par dag/ theg pa'i 'bras bu nyid de rtsab 'ang yin// skad med chos kyis mazen gang yang med// blang dor bzang ngan mi 'byed bzang po'i mchog/ da
79b1(rnying rgyud): migs paH Sh+Tar+tha// sdig steng byang chub can pa'i stan la dag/ tshogs chen gnyis ral bsod rnams byas pa'i slar// 'di ma mthong bar sangs rgyas 'dod pa na// dmigs bla med par long bas na bgrod kyang // gnas sum san grags bya 'a cha bzhin no// byung rgya
79b2(rnying rgyud): sems rtsal chen gyi myed las/ nyid kyi bshad pa'i rgyud kyi dngos po la rngams pa'i lab ste brkyang ba'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje kun tu bzang po nyid cang mi gsung bar bzhugs pa la// rdo rje 'dzin pas bstod pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snying pong
79b3(rnying rgyud): med su// rnam grol zag pa med pa zla gas la 'dra// mgon po mchog nyad dpa' ba de ni ston pa'i// dpe med don 'dzin khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lam med lam dang bral ba'i snying po'i mchog/ ye nas dag pa'i chos la phyag kyang 'tshal// 'di don gus pas mang
79b4(rnying rgyud): rgyas skyes rnams la'ang // don 'dzin dpa' ba bzhin te phyag kyang 'tshal// chos la med pa'i dgas laba'ang ba zhin phyag 'tshal// 'chad dang 'dri dang ldanyan na pas ma thong // 'dus shing 'don pala'ang bzhin phyag 'tshal// don pa dpa' bas dang gtad
79b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i don/ bdag dang dbyer med rgyal ba kun gyi thugs// de bzhin mchog gis ma la bzhugs pa la// snying po sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed mdzad pa'i// gsang ba'i thig pa 'di ni bshad bya'i phyir// de bzhin mchog gi snang chen bzer bar mdzod// byung
79b6(rnying rgyud): chub sems rtsal tshan gyi rgyud las/ rgyud kyi bdag po la bstod pa dang / rgyud la bstod pa dang / gtad pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // byang chub sems thigs pa ltar spyod pa dam tshig dang ting nge 'dzin rtsal sbags pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// shrI sid+ha dang ba ro'i
79b7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams kyis shin tu gus pas phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po rnam par grol ba'i lam la bzhugs so// bde pa gshegs pa lags so zhes bstod de/ cang
79b8(rnying rgyud): 'di mi gnas su ma gyi le nye gnyis pa khyung chen gyi rgyung yin
80a1(rnying rgyud): mi smra bar 'khor rnams 'dus te 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po nyid kyis nyed che ba'i lhan la bzhugs te brjod pa/ dmigs pa'i yul med mi rtog chos kyi lam// mi gnas thig le ji bzhin nyid kyi dang // rang byung ye shes
80a2(rnying rgyud): kun tA ji bzhin gnas// yul la maM gnas gnyen pos bcos su med// stong bzhi don chol khyad par don med pas// gzugs med kyis kun bsgom drug la yod// sems ni gzhi ste chos rnams sna rdzogs la/ mchog tu stong pa de bzhin la gnas// rdzas
80a3(rnying rgyud): dang mi gnas rang bzhin nyid kyi lam// ji bzhin nyid du bsgoms pas rnyed mi 'gyur// chags pas grol ba 'di la 'dod pa min// dbang po rno brtul chos lam 'dzin pas kyang // rnying pa'i yul ming snying po mi 'byung zhing // dpag cing gzhal bas 'di la dpogs pa min//
80a4(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i mtha' bzhin gang yang thog pa med// stong pa'i stong pa nor bu rin chen bzhin// dmigs pa med cing 'gyur bar mi byed par// rang bzhin gnas pas re ba thams cad skong // brtag med bzhag na legs pa'i 'byung ba che// dran dang zhi ba 'byed med snying rjes bstan/
80a5(rnying rgyud): bla med byang chub snying por 'gro ba'i lam// de lta'i yul med sanas rgyas mthong ba med// sangs rgyas med pas sangs rgyas ming yang med// sangs rgyas ston pas ming du btags pas nor// sangs kyis gzhan nas thob byed nor ba'i lam// rang rig byang chub sems
80a6(rnying rgyud): nyid sangs rgyas sgra// gzhan gyis nor min yo nas gnas pa da// bde ba 'dod pas 'di la rgyab kyis phyogs// ma g.yog nang du bcol ba'i rigs med de// yul phyir chags/ nying yul la bsngo ba'i dmigs pa med// khrung chen nam mkhang lding rtse 'gro ba
80a7(rnying rgyud): bzhin// rang bzhin slob med cing bsdub med// rgya mtsho chen po bzhin du ye gnas la// chos rnams sna tshogs ma lus babyeng bar byed// kun tu bzang po'i spyod yul dgang la// zhing 'jo ba'i gnang med de bzhin nyid// bshad pa bzhin du brtags pa
80b1(rnying rgyud): chos dran las// rnyed par ma 'gyur nang gi sems las brtul// 'phral pan rang gyis tsam nyid du na// tshig dang yig bston pas bshad pa yin// rang rig byang chub snying po chos kyi dbyings// chos dbyings gzhan nas mdzad de bzhin nyid// mkhas pa rnams gyung/
80b2(rnying rgyud): de bzhin shes par gyis// byang chub kyi sems khrung chen ste rlu las/ sems ldas phyug togs pa'i chos pa na bstan du med pa'i la na b+ha #// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos nyid brjod pa/ m-ig nas gas pa
80b3(rnying rgyud): yul mang mi d+hog rgyas kyi lam// badz+ra pa'i cha shrIs phram bral las byung ba ste// d+ho shAm mtshas ky-i khyad par doni med pas// rang byung ye shas te zlog kun bzhin gan pa// bya bral yul la mo gnas gargyan pos bangos su med// lhag pa namang 'das
80b4(rnying rgyud): ra / nga po nga bzhin blang bas rgyas su gnas// ma nasam ldan ma ga ngas byung ba la// rtagatu 'dug pa 'dod pa'i da// m-i gal mi gas sang 'argyal po 'dzag// gang la nas pa kyi gas brtad pa ldan dpa
80b5(rnying rgyud): thal// rjes dang sa ldan 'das shing dbyer ma dal/ do na ma chis las rmug pa gnas nas pa shad pa 'ang // da' byung ba la ya rtog pa stsu 'i pa nga rang na thogago na mas das// 'di dang sangs rgyas nyi da
80b6(rnying rgyud): mthun// mi byed rtag pa partags phyir bsam pa ldan dang bral// da cid da bzhin stod la rtag tu bzags pa yin// lam mang la yang 'dug pa la ngal ba'i nang chabs// bcol bar 'dod pas ri dgas smyig su brtag pa 'dra/ rnyed pa'i yul med btsal bas bcu
80b7(rnying rgyud): kyang // gang pa'ang mchags lags dbyings 'das phyir// sa brjid rgyas pa'i gnas kyi byang chubardzob pa yin// dpyir byang chub nyid la rtag tu gnyim par bya// migatang byang chung byid kyi na pa shin tu brgyad// min la ring bzhi gnas pas sman chanam
81a1(rnying rgyud): thAs na// mthangs bsad par byedas tan mangs dran par 'gyur// lam med lam du 'dug pas lam 'a ma da de// chus gardungs snang be na TIg tu bzlog pa'ang// bangal pang bgrod kyang rnyed par rabatu dka'// byung rngub kyi sams drung rjen bad/
81a2(rnying rgyud): las/ yang dag pa'i don 'dis ma zin na sangs rna bar bya ba'i thabs med pa le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yad bcom ldan 'das kyis tha~Mng la nyid kyis brjod pa// dkyil 'khor snying po'i byin lha rnams pa'i// phyag tu dkyil 'khor sku la yaM na mardzos
81a3(rnying rgyud): thams cad ma ma rdzogs pa'i blo chen di// bsdu pa'i rgyal med bya zlal mya ngan 'das// rnam ma par bzhis rdzub tu rdzogs// ye zhes sbyang pa 'dis chos rnams ma ma rmugs// pra dang yi shes yon tan byer ba rnams// hr-id las byung ba ga brnyan
81a4(rnying rgyud): gang byu ba ga'as gsung // tham pa jig sa da shang bzhin pa// bsu mig sangs me migs dngapan nyid// dam par migasu de bzhin ba // brjod pas martakA pa'i nubs pasams// ba ma ba
81a5(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid// mthar mang yang dag mtha' lta mtha' las 'das// rdzam dumi bstu de bzhin de bzhin gal/ gzhag pa'i sems kyang ma btar btar snyoms gzha// phyag rgya steng gal bsgo/ ma gol ba yin// mi gnas gnas pa'i tha meng phyag tu'i mchog
81a6(rnying rgyud): yul med ji bzhin pa la brtson par bzhag/ blun pa'i tshul du ci yang bsam pa med// kun tu bzung po'i bkyil 'khor snying po nyid// thams cad ma lus sbyor ba'i thig la che// bral po'i tshul du che ba'i ngang la gnas// gzhan gyi 'khor ldan kun rdzob 'bu rnal
81a7(rnying rgyud): med// byi ma che'i tshul du sdud 'byung gtid dngag med// mya ngan 'das la bangar rgyur rdzogs nga gis 'byung // dpa ma dang pag tu ma da shin tu zag/ de rje'i tshuladu me ga zul med// ya shes dkyil lakhor ba de bzhin gnas// 'da' ma
81b1(rnying rgyud): tha'adu ga kunas// nad kyad po rgyas pa ba ga ya ra ba mas/ zhun d+hags gas sa pas ba sa// thug sa ga na // pa sa gan ldan / sa ma
81b2(rnying rgyud): gdus gas ma mi pa med pa lam// rgyu'abasu ma byed mnyam pa pa'idi// 'khor ba snan 'das pa nyid po yin/ gnyen snyom pasungs sa gtan gyi gnas// 'phreng rjen pa no bcas ma ba'al 'dra// lung sa nags pags
81b3(rnying rgyud): mtshan med bya'o// ha lam par rdzogs bya bra la rgan rdzogs s+ho// 'dug tshu la ma la ma swA rgyas smin// skad rmAn+ta ga shog nas la 'ang la myi rgyag sus // thig pa / yang+ga med yangs ste// lo gnams la ma chags bad+mod rgyun gyi 'jog
81b4(rnying rgyud): ljang phug sgo ba'i nang dus lus rgyas ltar// skye ma bzhin byed cing dang shAzhin 'di// de bzhin cig pa'i gling nas de bzhin gyis// bu blad med pa chos 'dri ra 'ong na/ kun 'das bskal par mthong mi meng// byang chub kyisems byung chen gyi skad las bcwo
81b5(rnying rgyud): phyi'i thabs de bzhin nyid dang mtshan nyid bstan pa'i len ste gsum pa'o// nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun chu bzang po nyid kyis nyid la brjod pa// nga na ni la khar mi gnasas la mig na gyur// kun 'dus kun slong kun gyi yi bzhan
81b6(rnying rgyud): nor// mi dmyigs ma skye mo 'gag snang ba med// sangs rgyas 'tshal bar mi byed de bzhin nyid// thams cad lhun gyis grub pas bya byed bral// sa bcu mthar phyin pa nyid nga dzin rdo rtogs pas// de la'ang mi gnas gnas pa'i gnas dang bral// lam ma/
81b7(rnying rgyud): lam du 'dod pas 'gros 'khrul// 'bras bu thob de 'jigs pas don mi mthong // yang dag mtha' la bsnyeg pas lung dang bral// de bzhin dbyings su 'dod pas bde mi rnyed// 'dod yon nyon mongs spangs pas byang mi chub// 'khor ba rgyang
82a1(rnying rgyud): rgyags mya na yang smras 'dang// sa dang par la rdzun lam+b+ha zad mtha' bad// sa byug garnams bas spangs soH// byang chub sems phung yang dgadum pa'i phung // lung rdul pas gtan pa ma sa ban// chags
82a2(rnying rgyud): ba na mi da// gang la'ang ma gnas mi gnas nyid bang 'das// zlog d+hA'i chur bskyeg pas da// bden pa gnyis 'dzin migs den pa // byu sa rgyal po gyur// kha gyis snying da ma rnas /
82a3(rnying rgyud): gzhig lung gi tshod ma yin// 'khrul pa'i tshad gsum rtog pa'i tshig lam phab// byis pas bsres pa'i chos la de yod pas// bla med lam 'dir don 'di mi dgos tshad med lung // shes rab chung bas 'di la dpog cing lam pamed byed// 'di 'dod pa
82a4(rnying rgyud): 'di la gnas te rtog pa'i khyung // yang dag mi srid byang chub gting nas med// kun b+hab yi sangs rgyas twa go zhag med// tshig gis phabs par mi 'gyur 'bras thob med// khyeng chen lus rgyas 'dab gtog rdzogs pade// gzhan nas ma btsal yin rdzogs pa ltar//
82a5(rnying rgyud): ngad+hi myo 'jig med par rtogs pa pon// 'dug tul du 'dzin gyi rdzogs rdzogs cing // rgyag rgya'i dkyil la por su ma mdzugs pa dang // rang bzhin nyid kyis men rdzogs pa las// btsam da pardzus te sngags pa ma yin pas// yun rdzogs pa snyed med
82a6(rnying rgyud): po'i byang chub ste// gzugs su'i ltad rnang yang dang bzhin rdzogs// bun rdzob zhing po 'don nor m+b+hi'i tshul// 'di ma mthong bas mdza pa d+ha ya~M// 'gram na 'jug pa ma bzhin no// rnam par mi rtog yinapa snying po 'di// theg pa mdzes kyi chos man thos ti /
82a7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas gdung ga chu la klas pa med// mgrod col lam la byangs pas rnyed mi 'gyur// mi lan mo spang byang chub pyod rnams la// rnami pa kun cu rang bzhin bzhin gnas// me tog legs dbyings las 'das pas na// kun mnyam dbyer med dang bzhin snying po la/
82b1(rnying rgyud): dA ye shes ting 'dzin brtag mi bya// dmigs pa'i gza' gtad zhi ba'i byang chub la// ye shes rol pas chos nyid bsgom mi bya/ ting 'dzin rol chags med thig ser dag/ gar sta bas rol mo sna tshogs bad+ma rab yang // lus las mgos gzhan gyi yid ldang ltar/ thabs/
82b2(rnying rgyud): kyirgyal po lung gi snying po 'di// ngo bo nyid las ma g.yos kun gyi 'bras// bsgrubs pas grub pa'i 'bras bu kun yini tshim// byang chub kyi sems khyung chen gyi rgyud las// ngo bo bstan pa dang / tshad mas gzhig du mi rung ba bstan pa dang / lhun gyis rdzogs par bstan pa dang / rtag tu mengs pa
82b3(rnying rgyud): ba dang / kun gyi 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos/ nyid dang dbyer med pa'i 'khor rmad du gyung ba la nyid kyis brjod pa// sgrib pa sgod dang chos ldang las kyi sgrib pa rags// rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas 'di yi gta
82b4(rnying rgyud): rmed// mtshan nyid gsum ldan chos kyi tshogs kyang dag par 'gyur// bdag med rnam pa gnyis kyi tshig gnyis ye nas zhi// snying rje'i rgyun chad sems can ma mthong sems can med// thams cad mnyam pa nyid yin rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi sku// gnyis med de bzhin nyid du gcig pa'i chos
82b5(rnying rgyud): nyid yin// rdos pa can gyi chos nyid gnyen pos bcos su med// ting 'dzin brtan pas gzung ba'i bsgom yul bral// shes rab gsum gyis spyang du 'di lag la yod// thams cad mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor kun gyi rang bzhin la// rang byung ye shes de la 'phyo ba yin pa ni// so so ma yin gcig
82b6(rnying rgyud): gi dang ste rgyu 'bras rnam par dag/ zhugs rje bzhin du byin gyis rlabs chen nyid gyur pas// thams cad byang chub chen po mchog tu ma gyur med// sdom rtsol 'dul dang dam tshig pas ma yas pa// mi shes byis pas bslad pas 'khrul pa yin pa'i phyir// ci yang mi dgos gsung ba
82b7(rnying rgyud): me dgos bsgom me dgos// 'di la spyod pa mi dgos 'di las gzhan mi dgos// stong nyid bdag med yem khyen rang ri gzugs nyid de// thams cad nad gso mdzad pa sman pa'i rgyal po yin// mtho ras bgrod pa'i chud des byang chub lam mi rnyed// dug gsum dug lnga yin sa da
83a1(rnying rgyud): // pa'i spyan chen po// ji bzhin rang bzhin gnas pa'i sman chen ma byas na// 'khrul rtog lam la gnas pa'i thag dman rnams// drag gsum dug lnga'i nad kyis 'tshe ba'i glags yongs med// ye nas su rdzogs lam gyi 'gros gdod nas dang // gdod nas
83a2(rnying rgyud): thob zin thob par bya ba ci yang med// tshig gis mi phebs dbyibs dang kha dog dbang po'i spyod yul min// bstan cing brtag par dka' la brjod du rdul tsam med// mi dmigs mi gnas bsam pa kun dang bral ba ni// 'di las bstan pa'i lam med gcig dang du ma
83a3(rnying rgyud): med// bdag dang gzhan du bral ba'i ston mkhan rin chen mdzod// gcig tu lhun gyis grub pa'i dbang phyug rdo rje nyid// dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtso bo bdag nyid 'di// rlabs chen khams gsum 'gul ba kun bsad kyang // rang kyang mkha' klong dag pa'i dbyings su rnam
83a4(rnying rgyud): par dag/ srog med srog bcad dbyings kyi nam mkhar gcig pas na// nam mkha'i dbyings la dbyings nyid rol pa mdzad// khams gsum kun bsad me bskyod zhing du dag pa yi// srog dang sdig tu mthong ba'i chos lam gang spyod pa'i// chos lam de yi byang chub bskal pa'i
83a5(rnying rgyud): mthar yang ni// rnyed par mi 'gyur bya rjes tshol ba 'dra ba yin// byang chub kyi sems khyud chen gyi rgyud las/ ci'ang thob par byang med pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang
83a6(rnying rgyud): nyid la spyan gzigs te cang mi smra bar bzhugs pas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po nyid kyis nyid pa brjod pa// sku yi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'gyur// de bzhin nyid du 'dus bsam ngo bo nyid// mchod pastod spyan drangs phyag rgya bzlas pa dang // phyag rgya'i
83a7(rnying rgyud): skur ni 'di la bsgom mi dgos// sgyu ma'i gzugs brnyan 'di las 'byung bas na// lo ma mi bsnyad shes pas 'bras thob min// skya 'dra'i phyag rgya lug ma'i phyag rgyal// 'bras bu rnam par grol ba'i lam mi gnas// de yis rnam grol dag pa'i lam chen rnyed 'gyur na// mthong thos
83b1(rnying rgyud): lcags cas gyung ba gargyas// chags pa ma na gnas pa la pa pan// rnan byas sas ldan nga rgya 'bas// thams cad mnas dran ba ba dang // la shes nga po thog tu rnams ca chu/ shAng dang ma dpa' grus mjug sa mdas// 'da' na
83b2(rnying rgyud): nyidabyis pas mi shes phyi// ci yang mi dmigs gti mugang nyid 'd-i// 'khrul po'i chos la ma dag pa yongs mi gnas// zangs lags kyis gsar nga kya chags// nangs cigs du bsgyur du yod ma yin// 'di yi tsa yis gzhan gyi 'bras rang gis gzhan rkyen gyis da don
83b3(rnying rgyud): 'di ni gang dang bstan du yod pa ma yin pas// byang chub pade chen rgyal pa'i yum zhes bya// rin chen sgom zla zab rgyas btab pa bzhin// nga bzhin gdus pas 'din bstan par dka'// srid gsu mad bang bsgyur de bzhin nyid du gnas// 'ang mched lhag par gnas pa'i dbang yang rdzogs/
83b4(rnying rgyud): dka' thub mi dgos stong po ma thag pa nyid// sdug bsngal des ni bud+ha'i lam mi rnyed// sdom sung la sogs rtsab byang chub ring // gang yang ma yin rang rig de lnga yin// dka' thub spyod pa yis ni don 'tshol ba// glang bzhin nas glang rjes gcod dang 'anga'o// nang nas mi bcol na
83b5(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin nyid// phyi nas mi btsal gyi yi rang bzhin nyid// gti ga mi gnas gnas ming gnas pa gnas// gnas mchog stsal ba'i dkyil 'khor na tad ni// byang chub snying po'ang bar thams cad gcig/ gang du'ang ma song gar yang me 'gro dang // yul na mi gnas phyogs na
83b6(rnying rgyud): gnas smin te// 'di 'drar bstan du med pa'i rang rig de// byang chub snying po nyid na pa'in nyid// gang du 'ang ma song rang pa rab tu gnas// bya bral nam mkha' ji bzhin d+ha na gnas pas// 'jig dbyibs kyis mtshon drag la yod// yig rgyud med pasgom du med pa yin
83b7(rnying rgyud): byang chub kyi sems byung chen gyi gyad las/ byang chub sems kyi btsal thabs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dngapa la kun tu bzang pos nyid po nyid kyis brjod pa/ bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'odong bar dngos 'byung bas// thams cad kun g.yas nga
84a1(rnying rgyud): gsum la sogs grags// 'byung ba lnga sogs thams cad kun tu g.yos// gsum shar gsum gyis sna tshog ma lus sdud// dkyil khor 'do' bar gsum du bsam yas te// yi ge'i 'khor lo dkyil 'khor phyag rgyar bstan// sna tshogs 'dod yon
84a2(rnying rgyud): mchog tu rmad grags pa// byed pa gtso bor dmigs pa de la 'dud// med la yod par brtags pa'i rtogs pa'i rgyan// bskal par byang chub thob dka' 'khrul ba'i lam// byis pa'i lam bzhin 'bras bur gyur par dka'// mtshan ma'i yul la chags pas yang dag don// rnyed pa'i
84a3(rnying rgyud): yul med chags phyir chags la gnas// snang min byang chub sems kyi theg le 'di// ces kyang bshig tu myong pa rdo rje'i lha// 'khor lo rab ba skor thig le gcig tu bskums// gang yang mi 'byed mnyam pa chen po'i ngang // mnyam nyid snying po rtog pa las 'das pas/
84a4(rnying rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi snying po rtog mi byed// rang bzhin 'od gsal yi ge'i rnam par zhi/ dbyings la dbyings kyi 'od ni rnam gsal bas// yi ge meng tshig 'das pa'i yi ge mchog/ stong gsum rgya chad stong nyid rnam par dag/ gang la'ang mi gnas sus kyang dngos grub
84a5(rnying rgyud): smos sa
84a6(rnying rgyud): ltos rang bzhin pa// mnyam nyid snying po rang gi ji bzhin la// bskyed pa'i phyag rgya mi dgos bskyed mi dgos// mi gsung mnyam gzhag gsang sngag bzlas pa'i gsung // ma chag pa la shin tu chags pa dang // chags pa nyid na de la chag med pa// de ni chags pa'i rgyal
84a7(rnying rgyud): po chen po ste// shin tu chags pa chen po yin par grags// ci la'ang mi gnas bsam pa pas 'das pa// ting 'dzin bde ba'i rol chags pa med// gzhi na med pa'i byang chub sems nyid 'di// chos rnams ma lus kun gyi rtsa ba yin/
84b1(rnying rgyud): na sngags / pa spyan ga tu sa // nga sa dug sa// 5 ma dug mas das// na pa la sa/
84b2(rnying rgyud): mnga'adra // mang can gzhog nas mkha' la ma chags rdul// bso nam rdzogs pa'o thog ler chu 'bras med// rang bzhin ldan gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor dzad dgasal bas// rigs kyi phyag rgyags la ba bsgom mi dgos// mchog gsum tshas
84b3(rnying rgyud): sku dkyil 'khor bdag yin pas// ng+yas kyis sas tshugs pa rnas pathug pa ts+tsha// shes ma dpa ta ma khang bdagagi byad// khams gas ma sri dgas ma pra las kun pas gas pas// phrin pas rnam pan bzag
84b4(rnying rgyud): pA'i las mi dgas// sgra med thig las 'khor bkun pas dang // ye shes snying pos 'khor ba kun sbyangs nas// rgyu 'bras med pa'i ngang du ro gcig pas// gnyis med sbyor ba 'di la bya mi dgos// phyogs bcur rgya ched stong gre su ma yi nas mad//
84b5(rnying rgyud): srid gsum ma thas lenas dag pa'i zhing // ji bzhin btsan pa'i yegs kun la btab// kun bzang brtul ba'i zhal bzang yangs pa yin// khams gsum stong po chud malus dus gcig gsil// 'khor ba'i ming med dpa ma
84b6(rnying rgyud): rgyun pas brtul// sangs rgyas sems can byang chub tsun par 'grel// thams cad kun bsgre grol ba'i ma gnas pas// gnas bye dz+ha sgrom phrin mas pa mi ga // byang chub kyi sems byung chen gyi rgyun pas/ ma hA las
84b7(rnying rgyud): da mi dge / sa sus/ sa /
85a1(rnying rgyud): na su smra pa na na nu da sa
85a2(rnying rgyud): ma da rnam/
85a3(rnying rgyud): sang bya
85a4(rnying rgyud): nas byu
85a5(rnying rgyud): rnam dun du su gyu byasu du su su su ma na /
85b1(rnying rgyud): nga// na du smra na/ dran ga / du sus sa
85b2(rnying rgyud): mi sa su sa su/
85b3(rnying rgyud): sa /
85b4(rnying rgyud): dngas kyi pa di sto bganas spyod// sa kyi nyi pa' 'dzin pa su myong // da sangs nam gyis minin mabyung // bam gtan sa mar michog ga du ci'adi// nga'agyis mi ba sa pa da ba // dbang
85b5(rnying rgyud): ma/ gas/ 'das ma/ da na/ sa du
85b6(rnying rgyud): gas pa ma sa na mjug na/ srid par sna bye kyi mnyid sa/ ma pa pa na gyi sa pa da dgas sbyid ma mas napa stod
85b7(rnying rgyud): thethung bas pang na men men// sa sa skrag par byas pa ldan man// meng ge spang kyis nas la gnan pa dang // rnam mapa la khams nas thams cad 'byung ba bzhin// ma mnanam byung nga gis rang bzhin 'byung // byang chub kyise mas gyi
86a1(rnying rgyud): theg pa chenapa pa 'dug pa'i thabs dang / zhugs pa la skyon med pa dang / bdud rtsi bstan pa'i ladus brkyarang ba'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po nyid kyis te la brjod pa/ skye za mos par nyan mongs de nyi ni// sa ma gyu
86a2(rnying rgyud): khrims yin pa dang smra zhing // chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid kyang de nyid yin// gzhan na med don nyid de lha'i ngang // sems can sangs rgyas gnyis kyi ngo bo nyid// gcig min tha dad min te brtag par dka'// nyon mongs lnga nyid byang chub chen po'i lam// gzhan gyis ma bslang de nyid de ltar yin//
86a3(rnying rgyud): shes rab thabs med shes rab thabs bsam yas// ci 'ang ma yin thams cad kun gyi sku// ngo mtshar rmad byung e ma ho khyad mar can// nyid la nyid kyis yang dag dor bshad pa// sems can don du ma gsungs sangs rgyas cir bstan to// e maho sangs rgyas dam pa nyid la rol
86a4(rnying rgyud): pas kyang // ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos 'di gtang mi bya// rtag pa chen po rtogs par rol pa che// 'di la gnas pa'i skal ldan legs pa che// 'di la spyod pa'i skal ldan spyod pa bzang // 'di la bsdu ba'i skal ldan blta ba bzang // 'di la gnas pa'i skal ldan 'dun
86a5(rnying rgyud): sa bzang // lam 'dir 'gro ba rnams kyis rnams rdzogs// pha rol phyin bcus rnams ye nas dag/ 'dug sar 'dug pas sangs rgyas pa la gnas// gang du'ang mabyin de bzhin nyid kyi dang // ti lam 'di las bde ba'i nye ba med// gang yang ma bslabs 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid// de mdzes
86a6(rnying rgyud): ngo mtshar che ba'i gnas chen 'di// bdag nyid chen po zhal ldan nyag gcig las// sus kyang 'di nyid rig par dka' ba'i phyir// nyid la nyid kyis bstan pa ngo mtshar che// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rgyas pa'i sgo/ byang chub kyi sems kyang chen gyi rgyud las/ chos nyid kyi 'on bstan par dkar/
86a7(rnying rgyud): ba dang / nyid la joms pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das chen po rgyud kyi don bshad pas mnyes par gyur to// mnyes nas rgyud kyi bdag po la bstod pa/ dpal gyi sku mda' bcom ldan tag gcigs ni/ gang po gyi med chen po'i don mdzad pa/ don chen khyad par
86b1(rnying rgyud): 'phags pa rgyud kya don// nyid kyis nyid la bshad byas mdzas mchog/ yang gnyid kyis yang dag nyang gsungs pa// yang dag nyid la snang ba'i mchog gidon// rtsal ba nub pa khyod la zag kyang 'tshal// dpa' ba zar lam stan mdzangad kyang
86b2(rnying rgyud): la// yang nis yang du 'dud cing phyag kyang 'tshal// e mahor mdzes ngo mchor che ba 'dor// sangs rgyas gsungs pa ma yin bdag med chos// chu 'bras gnyis zang rnam grol dag pa'i sku// zla rgyas sru 'dra'i sku la 'dud pa rabakyid// dam chos bdag
86b3(rnying rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i chos// dpal gyi thugs las gsung du rab tu bsgrags pa yi// dri med gsung mchog khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// 'di 'chang zlog dang kha ton sems pa yi// rgyal sras 'khor bcas gang yang dadi 'dzin pa'i// skal ldan nyag gcig das
86b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin phyag 'tshal// da rjes blta zhing de bzhin gang 'chang pa'o// mang bas thams pa la sangs rgyas su// bas zhing blta zhing de bzhin phyag kyang 'tshal// 'di la gang mos khwa dang khye la sogs// de yang sangs rgyas nyid de kun las 'phags// 'phags rtsal byed
86b5(rnying rgyud): rnams la ni de bzhin bzhin phyag 'tshal// mchog gsum mchog tu gyur pa'i rgyal po la// khyad par bstod pa re mdzes don dang ldan// de nas rgyud kyi bdag po la gtad pa// chos 'phags chos rgyal bla med snying po 'di// yongs la khyab pa'i khyad par mdzes pas na//
86b6(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi gzer bskyed dam pa rnams kyi don// yang dag bstan pa de la ye nas gnas// sangs rgyas sa la rtag par bzhugs pa yi// sman grub mchog la 'di yis bzhag par byas// byang chub sems kyi gabu klong chen du// sangs rgyas sems can ma lus bsrel
86b7(rnying rgyud): zhig/ byang chub kyis pas rgyang chen gyi chung las/ bdag po la bstod pa dang / chos la bstod pa dang / de 'dzin pa mchog gsum gyi tshupa du sto pa dang / lung gtang ba'i 'dra panang // lus rtsod po byang chub sems rje chen gyi rgyang rdzogs so// gling d+hang rje rang du
87a1(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che rgyas pa yi ge med pa'i chud/ rgyal po'i rgyud du gsungs pa/ yi ge med pa 'di gsungs pa'i chon/ nyid dang tha mi dad pa rnams/ sngon ma thos pa 'di thos pas skrag par gyur te/ de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa 'a yo
87a2(rnying rgyud): pa 'dus pa rnams dang / sems dpa' dang / sems pa dang / sgo ba dang / sgro ma dang / dam pa'i sgo spang gshin rje gshed po la sogs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dpal mi bskyod pa la sogs pa dang / btsun mo rnams dper na til gyi gong bu bzhin du khyab par
87a3(rnying rgyud): gnas so// de nas 'khor rnams kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyag gcig gi// thugs su chud pa'i don mchog de// gzu bo chen pos bshad du gsol// mtshan ma rnams ni spangs pa yi// thabs mchog dam pa bshad du gsol// yi ge med pa bshad du
87a4(rnying rgyud): gsol// yi ge med pa las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bdag po'i mchog rnam par sngar mdzad kyi skur gyur nas/ bkag par ma mdzad 'dzum par mdzad// 'khor gyi don dbugs chung nas// rigs kyi bu khyod ces gsungs te// khyed rnams legs
87a5(rnying rgyud): par mnyan 'dod na// rgyud 'di shin tu brtag dka' ste// mtshan ma kun dang bral bas so// dpa' bo chen po 'joms pa ni// shin tu bzlog par dka' na yang // red pa'i tshul gyis rnam par sbyang // 'dun pa dang po skyes pa yang // shin tu bzlog par rab tu dka'// de nas 'khor
87a6(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu don zhus pa/ bde bar gshegs pa'i don rtogs pa// mtshan ma med pa don gyi mchog/ yi ge med pa'i don ma 'tshal// bde bar gshegs pa yi ge med// gang zag nod pa yi ge can// bdag cag mtshan ma las ldog pa// rtags rnams lnga
87a7(rnying rgyud): nas grol bar chad// de nas thams cadade mkhyen pa des// bka' yi don dam yi ge med// gsungs pa las ni ma log pa// dang por rgyud la blo sbyangs pa// bar du bsam pa thag chod pa// yang na yang rab blo mo rtsa la// don nam mgo smos go ba dang // thabs mnor
87b1(rnying rgyud): dang bslab pa dang // re ta kyi nyid du sgru // lags pa te sgra chags pa'o// don ma rig paslob ma la// grol pa bdag nyid rin chen rags// bdag po rab tu mnyes pa ste 'a gnyis pa'o// / nga nas bdag po sachagags/ ye nas te rig
87b2(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa// ye shes ma bskyed dbyingasang bskyed// rang sems rang gis mthong ba ni// mtshan ma yin te don dam med// bkag pa za ma byung bar// sems bcos thabs ni de la ring // spyod pa chos dbyings zad mi shes// sde sdong gsum yang ma bkag ste// chos
87b3(rnying rgyud): gcig ngo bo de pa med// gal te mtshan ma snang ba las// ting nge 'dzin de da na ni// ma rig pa dang thar pa thob// byang chub lam dang dmigs pa gnyis// ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par ro// bde bar gshegs pa yi ge med pa las/ ye shes rim pa'i le'u ste gsum
87b4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas bdag po'i mchog la bde bar gshegs pa'i 'khor gyis zhus pa/ kye ma bde ba gshegs pa'i gtso// dam pa yi ge med pa ni// nam yang mkhums di ring khums// dogs rnams kyang cher g.yos pa// 'khor kyang sngo
87b5(rnying rgyud): ma thos pas dang ngas// yi ge med pa 'di yi don// shes rab khyad par ji ltar lags// gtso bo dam pas bka' stsal pa// yi ge med pa'i shes rab ni// dmigs pa med pa'i shes rab ste// chos dbyings zad ma ma bcos la// ye shes spyi blugs skad ceg mas//
87b6(rnying rgyud): rang byung rig pa de ye bcad// dbyings dang ye shes ngo ta phrad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin/ ye shes yi ge med pa'i rgyud mchog las/ shes rab dmigs pa med par bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas khyad par du zhus pa/
87b7(rnying rgyud): brjod med rnam par me rtog pa// yi ge med pa'i gsung mchog 'di// sgra yi rnam pa spang spad du// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 'tshal// yang ched du brjod pa bka' stsal pa/ rang bzhin gnas pa'i chos nyid de// zhe bablang dor brang ba'o// chos kyi rang
88a1(rnying rgyud): bzhin kyang nga // / sangs thas kyis kyang ma gzigs te// mngang sum mthang bag la ldan// gang yang mthong nga med pan// ngani 'arjod ba chen po'o// A yis dag pa ches dbyangs so// rdzas kyang khang ga bskong ba yang // da dru
88a2(rnying rgyud): ma yang byas pa med// de don rtogs pa migs med do// yi ge med pa'i rgyud mchog 'di// dper na rgyal po lta bu ste// nu dargyal yi ge med pa las/ rang bzhin gnas pa'i le'u ste lta pa'o// / de nas yi ge med pa'i gtsomachag des// 'ab
88a3(rnying rgyud): zhubazugs chud nas// theg chen 'di ni ston pa'i gnas// byang chub snying po che yis kyang // rin chen rigs su gang ldan pas// bla ma'i kha nas shes par bya'o// lam gyi nang nas nye la ma // thabs kyi mchog tu gyur pas na// yi ge med par grags pa'o// rnam pa
88a4(rnying rgyud): dang ni rma dgrags pa// theg pa kun las 'das pa de// yi ge med par grags pa'o// 'di yi rgol ni ma shes na// yi ge med pa dbye ba med// 'di yi don dang gang ldan pa// de yis theg chen 'bras bu thob// rgyal po chen po yi ge med pa las/ bdag po mnyes pa'i
88a5(rnying rgyud): le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas bdag po'i mchog la byang chub sems dpa' dgyes pa la sogs pa'i/ 'khor rnams mgrin gcig tu zhus pa/ dpal chen 'khrul pa'i rnam tog 'joms// rmongs pa'i mdud las thar pa'i mchog/ nyag gcig
88a6(rnying rgyud): dregs rgyu de nad mde// khyod kyis bla med bshad du gsol// de nas sems dpa' dgyes pa la sogs pa'i/ rnam par rtag pa mkhyen nas bkang sbal la/ khyed cag lags par nyan tan// nyag gcig zugs kyi dgongs pa de// bshad kyis sems nyid ldan
88a7(rnying rgyud): par gyis// dbyer med pa yi nam mkhang de// dang po tshig nanam mkha' kun// babam pa yin chad rung ba // tham pa ni mi dmigs la// nam ma khang gzhan ni bkag pa'o// don ma dbyar med nam mkhang de// gang la bkag pa med pa ste// bkag pa
88b1(rnying rgyud): ming pa gtan chagasas/ na yodan pa // da pas rnam shug d+hag/ rgas pa' da/ man ma da/ 'du / dadam padag pa /
88b2(rnying rgyud): na ma nga / ya sa 'phru ga sa / sa ng+ya ga ma ga
88b3(rnying rgyud): mnyan par gyis/ gro sa dzi nagacang byu b+ha// de das da dgoms de// yi ga med pa'i yan lcag yod// mdza ga tud rgya dang bcas pa// rang gis gang sa byas pa// bka' yi snang ri gas pa la// skad de rim pa bzhi na
88b4(rnying rgyud): ge med pabral po chen po pas/ 'khor la gta dpa le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas mtshangal gdams ngag tu gnang ba/ bsgom bsgrubakun dang brang ba yi// ting 'dzin 'a cal ba dang // dang po'i 'dra brdung ma thob// bar byas ma pa zag cid
88b5(rnying rgyud): pa// tha mar sems chos shes pa ste// me dmigs pa la ga gnas pa// de ni btsal dang bral bya'o// bang ba gshegapas gtad rgya dang bcas pa rdzogs so// / bod kyi dge slon por can dang / rgyag gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na ga nas bskur cing khrus te gtan
88b6(rnying rgyud): laphab pa'o// // ga chen de byams// bde 'brums dbyings grug byug pa// dbyer med spyan rdzogs zig po'i dbyings nyid che// bskyed pa mi mnga' ye shes rin po che/ bya ba med pa lhan rdzogs theg po che// thams cad mo bkag dbyer med bdag nyid rje//
88b7(rnying rgyud): skye med dbyings las thams cad skyes// donang ma nyid du sems dpang ci// bsgrub tu med pas yinas gnas// btsal dra med pas mngon su ma dbyings// snod du med pas rang 'ardzogs// tha rnyed med pas rnal 'byor bdag/ go 'pha ga dngas can gyi kyi//
89a1(rnying rgyud): lam rnams thams cad pa snang byung // thig pa nyid pas sbrang du med// 'dod chags pa sngang gti mug rdung // spang du med pas bdag gi nu// gti mug med pas bas ma du med// rnam grangs med pas dbyings nyid klong // gzugs rnams med pas kyang ru d+ha/
89a2(rnying rgyud): dreg lce med pas ye nas dam tshig pas// de mchog ming du btags pa med// 'chi ba med pas bdud rtsi'i dbyings// khyad par nyid las ye shes che// ri rab rtse la nyi ma stor shar bas// ye shes thugs kyi nyi ma gcig shar rdo// shar bting nas nub pa med//
89a3(rnying rgyud): bsgom pa nyid nas bsgom du med// bsgom pa'i dmigs pa med pa'o// bsgrubs pas gzhan nas chos mi rnyed// rdo rje chen 'bar bltar// thams cad kun kyang de bzhin no// 'gyur ba med pas bal nag bzhin// 'gyur du btub pa'ang dkar bzhin// brtags
89a4(rnying rgyud): pa b.lanag nyid kyi dbyings// lhun gyis gnas pas go 'phar gcod// gdod nas dag pas pad+ma bzhin// 'gyur pa med pa thig le bar// byab med pas thig la bde// dus gsum med pas thig le bde// btsal du med pas thig le bde// rtsol bar 'dod
89a5(rnying rgyud): dbyings mi bskyod// dra ba med pas mu khyud med// thig le med pas thig phran pa de// rtse rgyal rtogs na gnas chen bde// thogs med yongs su spangs pa'i b+ha ga la// dbyer med lhan rdzogs thig le'i dbyings nyid che// snga gsung bugs
89a6(rnying rgyud): shar mu khyud 'a bye ba// rnam par dag pas byang chub sa// 'gro ba'i lam chen byang chub sku// thig le ye nas rdo rje dbyings// rdo rje nyid la 'du 'bral med// de las thig le bajal ba'i dbyings// brda sa ba nyid la nu'apa
89a7(rnying rgyud): byang chub kyi sems klong yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs so// / nam ma'a'i byer ro// / bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'i rgyal po ye shes
89b1(rnying rgyud): kyi skal ba dang ldan pa pa/ sems chos nyid du dgyur par tshogs su bca dang gsungs pa/ chos nyid bsam du med pa nam mkha' che// nam mkha'i bsam pa de dag kun dang bral// pasam du med pas nam mkha' de dag nyid// nam mkhar mi dmigs par yang
89b2(rnying rgyud): dmigs su med// nam mkha'i mtshan nyid kun la ba 'das pa// med pas nam mkhang pa yang nam mkhang med/ dam mkha' de nyer bsgom du med pa ni// brjod med nam mkha' bsgom du med las 'das// 'das pa brjod du med de mi gnas na// rngam mnga'i lus
89b3(rnying rgyud): med nam mkha' sa m+ba dang bral// mnyam dang mi mnyam nam khang las 'das pa/ nam mkha' med pas nam mkha' khyab pa med// de tid mtshon par 'di zhes mi nus so// cog med kun khyabasgra med tshig dang bral// dge sdig snying po med cing dbus mthang med// dang
89b4(rnying rgyud): po rang gi bla med spyod yul bral// yul med yul la sgyu mar spyod pa'ang 'khrul// chos nyid med de tshig phyir 'brang ba'ang med// gang zag sgyu mas bkri don bden gnyis med// bag tsam gtong sems de dag g.yangs chod// don bral de la sems med chad pa dang med//
89b5(rnying rgyud): tinge 'dzin chaba'i lung de nges don che// skye 'gag med pa de nyid nyan pa yin// sems med ma skyes don med bral ba yin// don la brtson par rgyal bas gang gsungs pa// mtshon zhing rtogs par bya ba de nyid ni// tshod mar gzung phyir 'dzin pa de skyes te// de bas
89b6(rnying rgyud): mtshon byeng sems kyi klung kha 'khor// ting 'dzin bde ba'i rol chags gnas pa// yod mod tshul ma ltos chos nyid yin// de bas chags pa'i gnas la ting 'dzin na// zhi ba'i sa de mya ngan de mi 'da'// rang sems ma bcos ma sbyangs chos nyid de// ting 'dzin
89b7(rnying rgyud): skyabs spyod na su ma'i nad// rang byung ye shes dbang la mi brten pas/ re zhing dgas pa'i mtha' kun rnab par ma// rnam pa'a'i mthang kun mdang phyogs mangs/ zhi dang mad med ngo chos rnams thal// yenas dag dang ma dag zhaba'ang med// zhibs dgra med
90a1(rnying rgyud): thog mi mtha' las 'das/ dmang nub ma dadags pa mthang ba dmad// dag dang mdag pa shas chog mtha'athal// thog tu 'don med la nas la gas pa dang / ga dang ma na nga
90a2(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin med// 'di zos me sngangs gang mos nam mkha' che// dngos po me phyir zhibs chags pa'ang med// kun tu khyab pas rtag par bo bral// rtag chad dbyer med snang thos kun med de// skye 'jig 'byung phyir bdag
90a3(rnying rgyud): mtha' ye nas med// gsung thugs dang bral bas bde ba'i mchog/ sngags dang lhag rdza bral bas nyams pa med/ gyi nang sgo phrag bral bas rgya che nyid// dbus mtha' kun dang bral bas snying po nyid// bod dang pa
90a4(rnying rgyud): mnyam nyid ye nas med// 'dzin med smon gang du'ang me sten// bral dang mabral dngos med gzung du med// sems ted tshos pas sems la sku mi mnga'// sba las 'das pas sgra nyid ye shes te// zhi ba'i 'od gsal gdod
90a5(rnying rgyud): nas lhun gyis grub// byang chub sems can don ni bcos su med// mi gnas 'gyur ba chags pa'i yul med de// mi 'gyur sangs rgyas pa shes ngo bo med// mi 'gyur mi 'jug phul med dbang po ste// mtshan ma 'jil
90a6(rnying rgyud): u me dgra bsnyen stong // ro gcig bden dbyings su rol pa yang // dbyer med bde la chags dang ma bral ni// dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyang 'byung 'jug go// len med 'dzin dang yongs subral bas na// dus gsum
90a7(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' che// kun gyi bdag nyid dus gsum dbyings mig 'o// lta ba 'di med lhod pa'i sgyu ma 'ching // lta ba 'dis mazin na khong ba las mi 'da'// byinaHlog dang ma yig byang chub ste// byang chub
90b1(rnying rgyud): tid pa la ba dang ma lag mad// bas pa dang thal pa'as mas dran pa mkhar tan// rnam mkha' 'duba'as bas ba dang dgal// yang med da bu ma'ang ma dmags brjod pa dan/ nam mkha' mag rna pa brdzad du med las 'angs/
90b2(rnying rgyud): sems la tshig tu brjod med sgra yang med// sems nyid tshig las 'das pas sbyong bas na// mngon sum mi gnas ma 'brang stong pas dber// ye shes de nyid bsam pas 'angs zhes 'byung // ye shes rnam par dag pas gcig/
90b3(rnying rgyud): phyir te// grol ba'i lam na mtshan nyid yod ma yin// gcig dang dri ma'i mtha' bas 'das pa ni// chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid bkra ba med// gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med na bkri ba gang // skra dang rtog pa'i ngang du ma
90b4(rnying rgyud): grub na// zos pa lam gyi smon lam de gang la// mi rtog chos sku gcig pas ci zhes bya// 'ja' tshon sgyu mar 'phags pa'i sgrar bskyed kyang // bsod nams bskyed kyang sgyu ma mi rtag na// rnam dag la mtshan lhun gyis grub pa
90b5(rnying rgyud): la// bsod nams med kyang grub ces rgyal bas gsungs// chos kyi dbyings nam pa skyed gcig che ba// kun tu khyab pa'i sgra mod nyid las 'das// sprul pa bye ba brgya ming tshogs chen yang // bya byed ngang la 'dul bar mi
90b6(rnying rgyud): nus bzhin// zhi ba lta ste mngon sum rnyed dkar ba// rtog ge'i yul min 'khrul pas shes mi nus// spyod par mi spyod sgyu ma mi rtag yin// mtshan nyid nam mkha' las kyang 'das pa'o// ye nas lhun ces grub
90b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i thabs chen la/ spyi bcos spyod pa thabs chen ma yin te// sgyu 'chang thabs kyis bcos dang mthal na// mi thig thabs chen de yis ci zhig bya// mtshan nyid med pa'i chos nyid chen po 'angadi // rjes kya bya
91a1(rnying rgyud): lam+b+ha pa'i gar bstar kyang // smra bar la ma dumyal bas ma bsngags kyang // me gnas chas sru brjid med pas 'das kyang // dbu ma'ang brjod du med de don dang bral// yid bas
91a2(rnying rgyud): ye shes dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa// snong mer brjod pa med pa las 'das pa'o// chos kyi dbyings las yang dag don bstan te// ye shes nam mkha'i rgyal po 'di bstan pas// the tshom med pa'i blo mchog rnams kyis ni//
91a3(rnying rgyud): gnyis med byang chub snying po rdzogs gyur cheg/ rdzogs so// chos kyi byi dus las bkrus te rnam pasha la/ gal ldan rjes bu'i rtsom me pas btung // grol 'i brtags pa'i blo ldan rnams kyis brtson pa
91a4(rnying rgyud): na// yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi dbyings las/ bde ba chen por rol pa a ti yo ga'i mdze'o// 'a dzu pa ba / pa// bcom ldan 'das dpal 'da'i chen po kun tu bzang po la phyas
91a5(rnying rgyud): 'tshal lo// thams cad mkhyen pa bde ba chen po'i thugs// sna tshogs kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems// dbyings dang ye shes 'du gal med pa'i phra// dam dag byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// sngon gyi 'das pa'i
91a6(rnying rgyud): bskal pa'i mtha' ring nas// 'khrul 'khor thun myongs mdongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams// dadang bdag bcas mtshan mas bcings pa yis// khams gsum chung las 'khor ba'i 'gro don du// snyigs ma'i don la
91a7(rnying rgyud): gdams pa'i gsung 'arjod 'di// rgya la sas gang 'dod dbang phyug sal ldan la// thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor rmang byung bsam yas pa// rnal 'gyur gyi rabs rin du gsungs// skas bzang sdod ldan shin tu rnal
91b1(rnying rgyud): nga don// lhan gru' byung chu 'ardzogs te dbang dam nan// tham ma dngag snyan thags pagyung pa 'ang// ngang can thal rigs thugs dang 'dran mas khyer// smra nga gsung thugs yon tan min las bya// rnams kya rtsala'ang dzin can
91b2(rnying rgyud): skye nas// bde gshegs dpal gri mgur nas gsung bsgrags pa// gsang sngags rmil 'phyo radabang phyug rgyal po yin// mnyam stor kun tu bzang po nyid kyi dbyings// rnam dgral ma man kun grol dgongs pa'i thugs//
91b3(rnying rgyud): bgrod med rnal 'byor rdzogs pa chen po'i lam// byar med lhan rdzogs kyi med chos kyi dbyings// theg pa'i rnam grangs gral thabs ma snyoms pa// ma 'dres chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyan// smrar yangs// mchor chu po'i 'gro 'du bzhir//
91b4(rnying rgyud): rgyal thabs spyi thugs dbang phyug rnams kyis mdzad// shes bya shes byed kun gyi gzhir gyur la// kun gzhi gnas gyur rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ rnam shes ga yeng ka'i nam mkha'i chus mnyam pa// rtse mo bud rgyal ba ba chen po'i darjingang// lde rgyud ya
91b5(rnying rgyud): bla na med pa yis// kun tu bzang po rang byung bcom ldan 'das// gtsug tu rab tu mim mchog chos kyi sku// lhun rdzogs sku gsu thugs kyi phyag rgya che// bla na med pa'i go 'phang mchog la gnas// chos dbyings mi skyes sems can med pa'i phyir// dri'i
91b6(rnying rgyud): rnams ye nus lhun gyis grub// de lta lha rdzogs byang chub sems kyi dbyings// mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa'i 'bras bur gnas// zla rgyas bzhin du spras pa mi mnga' ba// ye nas rgya mtsho 'khyil ba'i dbyings dang mtshungs// spos kyang de bzhin bsdus kyang de bzhin
91b7(rnying rgyud): pa// bsod nams ye nas sku gsung rdzogs pa rdzogs// lta ba nam mkha'i rgyal po'i 'phang gcod pa// btang snyoms chen po sran rdzogs chos kyi dbyings// ma skyes mi gnas nas mkha'i rang bzhin pas// thugs rje tshe phral ma mjed chen po tsug// chen/ rgos
92a1(rnying rgyud): ma 'arnye ba zhes/ sacang bas can nanyam mang / bgang nam sa pa ya dmas dran par dubya/ gangang bags papas ba gcod par byung // ngabs namanas gaspangs da pa bya thugs// kyang thubam ma thab sa
92a2(rnying rgyud): yi// sangs rgyas mngon du grub pa'i man ngag can// byang chub sems rtogs yon tan khyad par 'phags// bdag dang gzhan don lhan grub ma spangs pa// spyod pa rgya mtsho sna tshogs ci bder spyod// pad+ma skye ba'i rgyun 'ang ma yin te// pad+ma la yang 'dam gyis gos pa
92a3(rnying rgyud): med// chos nyid chags pa med par rtogs gyur na// ye shes chags med nyams pa rdul tsam med// thugs rje sprod pa bsam yas ji snyed pa// rnal 'byor thabs kyis spyod 'ji bzhin spyod// rnam rtog spos bral ga zung 'dzin mi mnga' ba// mkha' mnyam rgyal pos 'dod
92a4(rnying rgyud): dgra'i dag skong // skye med nga rmongs las skye ba'i cho 'phrul rnams// rnam dag byang chub sems kyi dbyings nas 'gro/ mkha' dbyings rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// lhan grub yid bzhin rin chen gzhal yas khang // phyogs dus kun nas 'khyil ba'i rgyal
92a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshogs// rgyal ba nyid la rgyal pa'i skur ston pa// rgyal tshogs rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor rnams// 'gro don rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir// 'gro 'dul rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor 'gro// sprin med mkha' la skar tshogs rgyas pa bzhin
92a6(rnying rgyud): bkrag gsal longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor dang bcas// kun bzang rdo rje sems dpa' dpal spor ba// shes rab dbyings nas thabs kyi phyag rgya gsal// sang nges le mnyam sa pa 'dres pa// phung po khams dang skye mched rnal 'byor tshogs// kun tu bzang po rang
92a7(rnying rgyud): thung bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu rab tu che mchog chos kyi sku// lhan rdzogs sgra gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya che// pheM nas spu gru ba byang chub skyed par ni// bla mang rgyal ba ga 'phang mchog la bzhugs// bdag dang gzhan du rtogs ma mnga'ang // 'jag gan rdo nu
92b1(rnying rgyud): nyi mA shar ba btin// lhan de lham mer ldan pa'i dkyipa 'khor can// rnam par thar pa'i zhal gsam phyag drug ni// sku gsum ye shes drug dang chos kyi dbyings// ji ltar skar tshogs bzhin du ma 'phros kyang // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bar bas zil gyis gnon/
92b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin kun bzang rdo rje sems dpa' yang // nyi ma stong gi gzi brjid 'bar bas brjid// rgyal pa'i tshogs chen 'dus po'i gtso bo ste// phyi nang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor kun gyi bdag/ rnam par shes pa'i gtso bo kun gyi gzhi// rang byung ye shes dbyings pas ma
92b3(rnying rgyud): g.yos kyang // stong khams yongs su snyoms pa'i thugs rje can// 'gro ba'i dpal mgon sna tshogs kun tu bzang // dbye bas la blang ngor gnyis med don du gcig/ phyi dang nang kun thams cad chos kyi dbyings// rnam par thar pa'i spyod yul thams cad na//
92b4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas sems can blang do // nyis med de// lam dang gnyen pas bcos su ga la yod// bsgrag med rtsal spags smon pa med pa yi// byad med lhun rdzogs bde gshegs de bzhin te// rtog dpyod rnam dag gnyis med chos dbyings la// log rtog 'khrul pa 'idabang
92b5(rnying rgyud): dug la 'gyur// rtog dang mi rtog ye shes chos kyi sku// mthar thug med cing dbyings la bri ba med// skye med dbyings las skye ba'i cho 'phrul rnams// gang yang ma yin sna tshogs chos kyi dbyings// khams gsum rnam dag ma zung ma skyes na// dbus mtha' mi
92b6(rnying rgyud): gzigs rnam par rtog las 'das// rnam rtog gnyen pos rnam par mi rtog pa// mi rtog 'dod pas rtog pa chen po yin// chos kyi dbyings nyid mi rtog mtha' las 'das// rtog dang mi rtog gnyis ga tshig gi mtha'// rnam rtog spros med byang chub snying po ni// kun gzhi
92b7(rnying rgyud): rnam dag rnam shes rnam par dag/ ye shes rnam dag chos dbyings rnam par dag/ bdag nyid rnam dag gzhan yang rnam par dag/ blta ba rnam dag spyod pa rnam par dag/ sems can rnam dag sangs rgyas rnam par dag/ rgyu rnams rnam dag 'bras bu rnam par dag/ rten
93a1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur rnam dag 'brel pa rnam par dag/ bdag med gnyis med byang chub snying po las// dbyings dang ye shes mnyam sbyor ma rtogs pa// chos nyid ches tshol chos rnams gzhan na med// rgyu 'bras don rtogs thabs dang shes rab ste//
93a2(rnying rgyud): mkhyen pa phu na sel byang chub sems dang mnyam// dkyil 'khor byang chub sems las rang kyang ba// ske med 'gag med cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung // mthun 'jug 'joms pa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho ni// bdag dang gzhan don ye nas lhun grub kyang // thugs rje che
93a3(rnying rgyud): pos 'gro don rdzogs par mdzad// ming tshig sgron mas don gyi gser mtshon pa/ tshig gi rnam grangs gsung gi 'khor lo can// yod med mtha' las 'das pa'i kun gzhi ni// ming tshogs tshig gi rnam grangs sdud pa'i bdag // yid kyang ma yin de bzhin mar ma
93a4(rnying rgyud): yin// rtag pa ma yin chad pa'i mtha' du min// bdag tu ma yin mtshan mar 'dzin pa med// phyi nang gzung 'dzin dngos por gang rtog la// mi mkhas rmongs pa mu stegs lha la zhe na// sna tshogs rang bzhin med par gang sla ba// med par mthong bas mu stegs//
93a5(rnying rgyud): zad pa'i lam// rtag chang gnyis kar gang gi blo zhen pa// don gyi snying po'i bzhed las go las ragasungs// gang yang ma yi na sna tshogs chos kyi dbyings// bde ga sheg rigs can byang chub snying po ni// gnyis med don rtogs rdzogs chen rnal 'byor pa'i/
93a6(rnying rgyud): ye shes rnam dang ldan spyor grub pa'i mtha'// de dogs med pas dbyings las dbyings nyid gsal// sangs rgyal gzhan nas tshol ba'i grub mtha' med// bu gzi rnam shes ye nas chos kyi dbyings// ye nas ldan grub sangs rgyas mngon sum na// gang
93a7(rnying rgyud): nas su la sangs rgyas gso leb 'debs// 'khrul 'khor nyam thag dgas sdig su bzhen// sangs rgyas nyid kyis sangs rgyas nying 'chos pa/ bra mthong dbyings nas sdig rgyur brtags pa bzan// de ltabs na sangs rgyas thob 'dod na/ rke heng 'dzin num
93b1(rnying rgyud): po byang chub sems la gsal// rtogs na bdag nyid sangs rgyas mngon sum ste// mnyam pa'i rgyal po gnyis med chos kyi snga// gsang dang gsang chen dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rtogs pa nyid la 'dus// 'khor ldan bsod nams ye
93b2(rnying rgyud): shes tshogs rdzogs pa// mngon sum mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa yin// chos nyid 'dul dang snying rje chen po yi// dbang phyug rdzogs pa chen po'i dam tshig la// ye nas rnam dag byang chub snying po ni// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyam dang mi gnyis gcig/ mnyes
93b3(rnying rgyud): ldan dngos grub blang med thob par nges// 'jig rten gsal byed nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// grags ldan stong khams yongs su 'byung bar 'gyur// rgya mtsho u dum wa ra'i dpe bzhin du// byang chub sems ldan brgya'am lan cig na// mi dmigs ting
93b4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin goms na 'grub par 'gyur// gal te chags sdang blang dor blo skyes te// 'khrul sems skad cig rkyen gyis khros 'gyur na// bla med byang chub don las 'gal ba'i phyir// skad cig ma las grub gyur sems 'di la// log rtog gsog zugs
93b5(rnying rgyud): khros pa'i dbang gis brlag/ 'ben thag chad 'gyur nye bar 'grub mi 'gyur// blo ldan nam zhig 'gyod pa drag skyes nas// rang sems dpang du btsug nas mi gtong ba// byang chub sems mchog blo la shar ba yin// bskal par bsags pa'i mun nag thibs
93b6(rnying rgyud): yoyo yang // rigs pa'i rgyal po ye shes nyi zer gyis// skad cig yud tsam nyid la gsal bar 'gyur// mi shes blan rmongs skal med skye bo rnams// bdag dang gzhan du 'dzin pa'i sems rkyang kun// rang bzhin rgyal ba'i chos skur gcig pa las// 'khrul
93b7(rnying rgyud): pas so sor brtags te mthong bas nor// ye shes sku la rgyal ba rgya mtsho dang // lag rtog sgyu ma rgyud lnga'i sems can rnams// kun rdzob sgyu mar khyad par bsam yas kyang // don dam dbyings sa rang bzhin yongs kyis mnyam// chos rnams thams cad
94a1(rnying rgyud): mnapa spong ba'i phyir// nga tsam nyed pa'ang meg nas byung na 'das// sems can thams cad byang chub snyeng po la/ rang gisems nying sangs nas mngon sa man// gzhan nas bsgrubs pa la brdapa tsam med/ 'gro bzhal ldan rnams kyi don tsam du// bskor dang /
94a2(rnying rgyud): bsrub pa'i tha snyad lung du bstan// de lta bas na mi 'grub pa yang med// de ltar de bzhin chos kyi dbyings rig na// ma rig rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed// snying rje skyes nas sgyu ma'i ting 'dzin gyis// 'gro don thabs la spyod pa sna tshogs ston// bdag dang gzhan du rtog pa
94a3(rnying rgyud): med pa'i phyir// ye nas gnyis med don gcig chos kyi sku// chos sku skye med rtogs nas 'gro don du// skye ba'i cho 'phrul yang nas yang du bstan// mdzad pa bcu gnyis 'gro don mthar phyin pa// cir yang 'gyur ba'i gzugs can sprul pa'i sku// grags
94a4(rnying rgyud): rje cho 'phrul sna tshogs cir yang gsal// thugs rje ba sprul pas gdul bya kun 'dul bas// sgyu ma'i blo ldan rlom sems rdul tsom med// sangs rgyas rnams kyi dgongs kyang ji lta bu// rang gi mtshon nyid ma bcos de bzhin nyid// chos rnams lha mar mngon sum
94a5(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i phyir/ ting 'dzi spru la'i rdo 'phrul sna tshogs rnams// hr-ir yar mi dmigs ga yang nges pa med// rang zung rmang grags byang chub snying po 'di// b+h+rUM 'gro gyi nang gzugs rnams thams cad ni// skra mchog me zar rten
94a6(rnying rgyud): kyi 'khor lo rtogs// sgra skr-ing tha ma rab 'bring ma lus pa// gsung byangs mi zad kyar gyi 'khor lo zab// thabs cad mi lus dbyings su ngogacig byur// thugs mchog mi zad can kyi 'khor lor 'dus// mnyam spong thil 'khrur gas 'anas sa mngon ci
94a7(rnying rgyud): chos kyi sku mchog byang chub snying por them// gsang sngags dbang phyug go 'phang chen po 'dir// phyi nang gsang ba'i don dang mi ldan par// la la mkhas 'dod dregs pa'i nga rgyal can// rang gi lta ba ya rabs mthong bzhed de// gti mug dbang gis bag zon ma chags
94b1(rnying rgyud): sa / sgru smra
94b2(rnying rgyud): thong ma rje sanas ba byang du nyam par 'jugs/ ngatum pa brgyal pa'o// sa nam che / gas rjes thang pa chags/ myong rabs parnam cing // ngangam brtsam
94b3(rnying rgyud): rmang byu mams spangs ngas// dorjem thar gling byangs pas 'di la// mig rgyan mag pan pa mag sa rgya // 'khyi pa ma ma shing rdzog da / gsang sngags rgya ma yo sr-in yangs pan// 'dug 'ang rgyam pa
94b4(rnying rgyud): sa la pag /
94b5(rnying rgyud): sa // rta ga nga brgyugs / sa d+ha byung chu sa sa byas / na ma garag ngas nga ga / sa
94b6(rnying rgyud): zu pa sasadag na da ba ba mi ba thobaste/ 'de shAs / sa myod kyi hU~M byangs 'alogasapa pa bya bar/ ga/
94b7(rnying rgyud): ma gam sa/ / sa 'i sa ma
95a1(rnying rgyud): rnal 'gyir grub pa'i phrin las rgya mtsho rnams// skye la dang nadam kun rdo ba rnam par spangs// theg rkyen ste thugs rang bzhin rnal 'gyur ran// sun grub chags chenas rnams kun kyang // da ltar shas ldan bdud pa'i rnam par spangs// sdig 'jam chang brjed/
95a2(rnying rgyud): bsod nams khri phrag yas// lta ba dgongs pa'i 'bras bu mthar phyin par// lung dang man ngag nges don gsal bar bya// rdzogs so// // / par 'dir rin chen kun 'dus rbaM/ srog gi 'khor po// bcom ldan 'das ta ma lus kun gyi dpal// thug rje thabs kyi 'gro don mthar phyin pa// bde ba
95a3(rnying rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi da'o// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin chos kyi dbyibs// byang chub sems kyi srog gi 'khor lo 'di// mnyam nyid 'dus pa'i gter la phyag 'tshal lo// lus ngag yid gsum sku gsang thugs sbyor ba// rgyal ba rnams kyi gas pa chen 'khor/
95a4(rnying rgyud): bzlog pa// mya ngan 'das po'i dam tshig lu gu rgyud// chos dbyings rnal 'byor yongs kyi gter chen pas// rna brgyad thugs kyi gter chen skal ldan la// mi nub yongs kyi btsas su bzhag pa yin// sku gsung thugs las bsdus pa'i snying po 'di// dus gsum rgyal ba'i/
95a5(rnying rgyud): chos dbyings sku gsung mugs// mnyam nyid 'gro don man ngag kun gyi gter// skal ldan tshad ma rang 'ig dbang phyug gis// de yi rjes so gzugs kyi sras mchog la// tsit+ta'i dkyil 'khor yangs par gsal gyur cing // chos dbyings sde med mi gnas mya ngan 'das med dag/ mi skye me
95a6(rnying rgyud): 'gag 'khor bskyed len med// de med bdag dang bral ba rgyal ba'i thug// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i snying po bsam yas pa// den chen gter 'dus rgyal bas brjod me lang // ma spangs ma bsgrubs nam mkha'i de 'dug nas// khams gsum brdag na 'khor ba mya ngan med// phyogs char bcas na bde
95a7(rnying rgyud): gshegs snying po min// kun gyi rang bzhin 'ja' tshon snang bzhin med// de la med bzhin 'byung ba tu mtsho 'ang // chos dbyings skye ba med pa yum gyi dang // rgyal ba'i phyag rgya rgyal ba'i tshe 'phrul can// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das la dgod pa'i phyir// rang byung ye shes dbyings las ma g.yos
95b1(rnying rgyud): kyang // stong khams yongs la snyoms pa'i thugs rje 'byung // nga med bdag dang bral ba'i snying po rdzogs// don dam ye shes dbyings 'di rdzogs pa che// snying po nyi ma bzhin te 'od kyi mchog/ sde 'gro phye nang gzugs rnams thams cad ni// sku
95b2(rnying rgyud): mchog mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor rdzogs// sgra skad tha ma rab 'bring ma lus pa// gsung mchog mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor rdzogs// dbyer med don dam dbyings su ro gcig pas// thugs mchog mi zad rgyan 'khor yongs su rdzogs// thams cad sku gsung
95b3(rnying rgyud): thugs te dbyer med pa// lce med nam mkha'i klong yangs rgya mtsho bzhin// 'du 'bral med pa'i dbyings mchog rab 'byams na// chen po bzhi yi cho 'phrul grangs med pa// brtags sam rtogs na 'byung ba'i 'bras bur 'dus// 'chi ba med pa'i sman chen
95b4(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi 'di// ye nas rdzogs pas gzhan nas btsal mi dgos// kun kyang rgyu gcig chos dbyings dang du mnyam// gzhan nas 'ongs med gar yang 'gro mo srid// thams cad rang bzhin byang chub sems su gsal// snang srid thabs kyi rang bzhin rgyal ba'i
95b5(rnying rgyud): yang// de la rang bzhin med pa yum gyi dbyings// thabs dang shes rab ldan par ma 'dus med// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa'i rang bzhin pas// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhi ma sa na mi khyab// chos dbyings chu gcig rang bzhin cir snang yang // byang chub rnam
95b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis dang du thams cad 'dus// mkha' ngadabyings rnam dag yangs pa'i rgya mtsho la// 'byung ba'i skar tshogs mang po bsam mi khyab// de bzhin mkha' mnyam dbang phyug chen po'i thugs// yon tan rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kun gyi dang // bdag med
95b7(rnying rgyud): phyogs bral chos dbyings mkha' dang mnyam// sems can kun 'dren byang chub dbyings la 'god// sde snod rgyud dang gal po thugs la rdzogs// mtho dmar phyogs mtshams byang chub sems dang ldan// chos dbyings dri med rgya mtsho dngas 'dra ba// srid
96a1(rnying rgyud): gsum 'gran zla mi mnga' dbang phyug che// yongs kyi srog 'dus chos kyi 'khor lo 'di// rang rig dbang phyug rdo rje legs rtsal gyis// rnal 'byor yongs kyi don du bsgrags pa dag/ gnyis med man ngag srog gi 'khor lo zhes// gra
96a2(rnying rgyud): phyung ba 'gro ba phongs la bsngo/ rdzogs so// / byangs mas rgyas// / bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i sdong bu la// myu gu don gyis 'byung ba ltar// ma bcos dang du rang bzhin gnas// gnas pas migs
96a3(rnying rgyud): med myu gu 'byung // spros med byang chub sems la myu gu 'byung // rgyu la ltos pa med pas rkyen gyis gzhig tu med// skye 'gag med pa'i myu gu de// yul la dmigs pa med pas sems la 'pho 'gyur med// yul sems 'du 'bral med pa'i sbyor bas mu
96a4(rnying rgyud): sa la na skye nga sa so// smra
96a5(rnying rgyud): gu 'byung // bsgom du med pa'i dmigs pa chen po las// ngang las ma yengs mnyam pa chen por bzhag/ rnam rtog spros bral byang chub chen po la// gzung 'dzin med pa'i bla med myu gu 'byung // rgyal dag ma lus pa'i myu gu chen po la// rkyen du bral ba'i
96a6(rnying rgyud): yon tan myug 'byung // 'byung ba lnga nyid ye nas sangs rgyas la// snang srid lha yi 'khor lo'i myu gu 'byung // byang chub sems can man ngag rgyal po 'di// thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i// rgyud drug gnas su dag pas bcol ba'i bsam pa de// lung
96a7(rnying rgyud): la sgrib pa med pas man ngag myu gu yin// sems la dogs pa med pas sangs rgyas kun gyi gzhi// dug gsum rtsad nas bcad pas byang chub sems// 'khor ba thams cad sgrol ba'o// byang chub sems kyi myu gu rdzogs so// // de sa bshod// / bcom ldan 'das
96b1(rnying rgyud): dpapa kun tu bzang ba la phyag 'jol po// sems la mtha' da thus med pas kyi nang ma thul te// sems la spang lan ma bas padal bkod pang // ma btsal ldan gyis thub pa danar yang // b+hU mang dang las gnas pas bde la phra bkod pa'o// gleng ra
96b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i byang chub sems can pa// rdzogs pa yongs rdzogs bde pa'i gling na 'gyo// rten pa'i gnas med chags pa'i yul dang bral// 'khor ba med pa'i don de phra bkod pa'o// bsrung du med pas 'bras bu lhun gyis grub// bslab tu med pas lha rnams mya ngan rangs//
96b3(rnying rgyud): mtshon du med pas ye ges bkre ru med// bdag bskyed kun dang bral na bde ba rang la snang // mi skye de ru chung pas 'du 'bral ye nas med// mtha' dang dbus med bangal pa'i phra bkod pa'o// gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin phra bkod pa'o// snang med rig pa shes
96b4(rnying rgyud): pas dngos po kun dang bral// skye med dbyings su phug pas spang len med pa yin// ma bcos lhun gyis grub pas rang la shar// brtan pa'i gnas su 'byung ba lnga nyid chos// grub pa sde mchog chos sku brdal ba che// yin pa'i rtags su chags dang
96b5(rnying rgyud): bral bas na// 'pho 'gyur med pas mi skye gdeng du kur// dug lnga spangs pas sku lnga phra bkod pa'o// spyod pas spyad du med de chags sdang yul las 'das// bslabs pas bsgrub tu med de lha la rten mi 'cha'// bsgoms pas bsgom du med de sgom pa'i yul
96b6(rnying rgyud): dang bral/ bsrung ba'i tshul khrims bya ba ye med de// mi bsrung gded dang ldan nas phrin las btsal du med de 'khor ba mya ngan 'das// sems la skye shi med pas bde ba phra bkod pa'o// mgayos dbyings na gnas pas gar yang 'gyur ba med// snar srid kun la
96b7(rnying rgyud): khyab pas mtha' dang dbus med yin// gang yang bkag pa med pas gsal pa'i phra bkong ba'o// pad ba'i klong na gnas pas sdug bsngal bral ba yin// 'bras bu chos slar grub pas mtshon pa mya ngan 'das// ye brdal 'bras bu yin pas tshes srung dbrub// blta bar bsnyen pas mnas
97a1(rnying rgyud): gos pa med// snang ba dang la shar bas sa bas la nas pa meng// seM nu N+Dal byaman bya byin na ltung ba med// dmigs pa phral med rten pa'i gzhi dang bral// chags sang med na thug pasal bral ba yin// mi 'gyur lhun gyis grub pa'i bde ba'i stod na ga nas// ma
97a2(rnying rgyud): nyid don du rtogs pas pra bkod pa'o// mi ste dbyings nas rig pa rang la shar// don dam ngas brtogs nas mnyam pa'i grong na tso// bsgom bsgrub mtha' las 'das pas mnyam pa'i grong naganos// nga bzhin spyan gyis grub pas rgyud nga 'bras bu med// snang pa rang la shar pas nyin dang mamam
97a3(rnying rgyud): med// ma bkag kun la khyab pas ye brdal phra bkod pa'o// mi skye dbyings nas rig pa dang la shar// don dam nges brtogs nas mnyam pa'i grong na 'a sgo// mnyam pa'i dang la bzhag na dus gsum gcig tu ngas// byung rtsir byang chags thar lam ma 'thob mnyam par bzhag pa'o// rgya med
97a4(rnying rgyud): nas rig pa'i bcud shar ba'o// dngos po kun dang bral bas snang ba dang la shar// gzung 'dzin rnam rtog bral bas bde ba dang la snang // chags dang bral bas rtog pa'i mthar thug pa'o// sems la bsgom du med pas tshig gi mtha' las 'das// bslab tu med pas yi ge skra dang bral// bsung du med des
97a5(rnying rgyud): bsrungs phra bkod pa'o// // byang chub kyi sems tig// chos rnams ma lus dbyings su rgyu gcig pas// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa gnyis med de// ji ltar bltas pa kun tu bzang po'i klong // dbyer med klong las ma nyams bde ba'i sku// snang srid ma lus ye nas dag pas na// sems can sems nyid
97a6(rnying rgyud): tshul ba sangs rgyas yin// rdzogs bye med// rdo rje sems dpa' dbyer med ye sangs rgyas// ye nas dag pas chos sgra bde ba'i mchog/ btsal du med pas bsgom pa'i tshig dang bral// tshig las 'das pas brjod pa'i tha snyad med// ye sangs rgyas pas blta ba'i dmig med de// snying po byang chub
97a7(rnying rgyud): dgongs su med pa'o// rnal 'byor ba nyid mi gra tshol bdon las nyams// mi balha mi tshe mdon nyid yin pas// ngan la me blte ba ltar med 'bral pa med// bde ba chen po gang zhig tshol ba 'khrul// rnal 'byor song bsgom lcags nas bkrol ba yin/ rdzogs so// da nga
97b1(rnying rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ tan+t+ra rA dza swad+hak+Shar+N+Na badz+ra phan sU la tar+tha/ bod skad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po gser gyi rus sbal rdo rje theg partsa ba'i rgyud/ mkhyen ldan ston pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad gsungs pa'i dus gcig na// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ston pa des// thugs rje che mnga' 'gro ba'i don
97b2(rnying rgyud): bya'i phyir// skye ba med las skye ba'i cho 'phrul bstan// nam mkha' lta bu'i chos sku mtshon bral bas// gzugs skur bzhengs nas 'gro don mthar dbyung phyir// ye sangs gnas su shes rab blo rtsal bskyed// 'og min gnas su 'gro 'dul chos lung mnos// sum cu rtsa gsum 'khor rnams
97b3(rnying rgyud): kun la bshad// 'od gsal gnas su blo yi rtsal rnams 'byongs// 'dul ba'i dus la bab pa thugs kyis mkhyen// yab kyi blta bas phab cing yum gyi lhu mas su zhugs// zla dgu do bcu skye ba bzhes tshul bstan// shin tu mtshan bzang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang // dpe byad bzang po brgyad cur yongs su bstan/
97b4(rnying rgyud): da ltar sems can yongs su spro bskyed phyir// dgung lo rim pas mdzad pa mtha' ru phyin// 'gro ba sems can gang gis gang 'dul ba// chos sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong phye ste bstan// de bstan gnas ni rnam pa gsum du bshad// kha cig lto bla ldan blo gsal dang che la// kun brag rgya rkyenA yongs su 'phel ta bsgra
97b5(rnying rgyud): kha rtsig 'phro can snod dang ldan pa la// mdo yi don rnams nges par bsdus la bstan// gcig dang mos nges par 'dzin 'chang la// rtsa ba'i man ngag lhag pa nyid du bstan// spyir ni 'di la 'di ltar bshad mi lang // bye ma'i le bzhin grangs las 'das pa ste// bag phye la so gso sbyi shi rje bzhin snang //
97b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i don phyir dgos tshad dngas bstan to// gang zhig gson gshin 'gro don byed pa la// gnam 'gred phreng nyal kha sbab don rnams yang // nges par thar cha gra la shan gyi ste bstan// gang zhig bstan pa 'dzin spyong dang ba la// rgyud lung bye brag mang du bstan pa yang // la ma ki la mdo yis kye skye bsnyen// ga
97b7(rnying rgyud): zhig dag bcu spyod cing 'dul khrims bsrung dang la// 'dul khrims sdom pa mang du bstan pa yang // nyan thos byang chub sems dpa'i mdo yis kye ste bstan// gang zhig spyi rgyud gsang sngags la dad par// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor ming du bstan pa pang// bya ba gnyis kanal 'byor rgyud kyi khyi ste bstan// ga
98a1(rnying rgyud): zhig gsang sa ga nang la dad pa la// bstad sgrub rim pa mang du bstan pa yang // brgyar rdzogs rnam pa gnyis su hUM ste bstan// gang zhig theg chen nyir la mos pa la// sems thog the brag mang du bstan pa la// a ta yog 'a mang yis kye b+ha bstan// da ltar bya brag mang du bstan kur bya/
98a2(rnying rgyud): dade na de las de nyid shin tu 'byung ba dka'// 'byung ba dkon phyir thug kyi dkyil 'khor nas// nges pa'i snying po rgya ba'i rgyung dang ni// zud kyi rnam pa yongs su bstan pa yang // rgyud dang pe ma ka lpa du mthar bstan// rin chen ragA can bum pa'i blo can la// rgyung 'di rgyud kyi myur da dus sbal rtsa ba'i rgyud/
98a3(rnying rgyud): bas thag pa cad spyod pas la dor gyi ru bstan// tsanadan rag can bad+ma'i blo can la// byang sems theg ba phyi ma'i rgyud// shes pa nges pa gcig la gzhag phyir bstan// ma~M nges pa dad so so'i blo can la// bkol ba so so'i chung chung bcu gnyis po// gang zag mtshan rtags myur
98a4(rnying rgyud): gyi mtshan rnams bstan// gang zhig rdzogs chen la zlos shan ma phyed pa la// rdzogs pa spyi gcod chud nyid bstan par bya// gang zhig snying po'i don bral lo ma'i tshogs phyogs la// rtsa ba bsdus pa'i rgyud rnams bstan par bya// gang zhig rtog 'dzin gnyis
98a5(rnying rgyud): su blta ba la// nyag gcig dgongs pa'i chung nyid bstan par bya// gang zhig mtshon pi tshags don byed la// yi ge med pa'i rgyud nyid bstan par bya// gang zhig zag chad gzur 'dzin gnyis su blta ba la// mtha' ru sel ba'i rgyud nyid bstan par bya/
98a6(rnying rgyud): gang zhig gser dang phong nyid rtog can la// dri med dag pa'i rgyud nyid bstan par bya// gang zhig snying po'i don la 'gyur ba'i blo can la// lta gardo rje'i rgyud nyid bstan par bya// gang zhig dgongs pa'i don go la sgyu ma'i lus la bde ba can// bsam ga tan
98a7(rnying rgyud): tsog pu'i rgyud nyid bstan par bya// gang zhig pa lta ba'i lta ba ma rtogs la// thugs kyi yang gter rgyud nyid bstan par bya// gang zhig man ngag gis mnangag ma rdzogs pa la// gsang ba yang gter rgyud nyid bstan par bya/ gang zhig 'khrul pa'i yid
98b1(rnying rgyud): phyogs bral ba la// mu tog phreng bathabs kyi d+hA cing bsan par bya// gang zhig da pa thal gyung bal// rjes 'jug gang pa na kyang bstan par \u0f7f// dab pa rnaMm chang b.rasas la/ man dag ji ji theg pa gca tub bas// gas ston pa
98b2(rnying rgyud): sku che ba'i yan tan dang ldan nas thugs rdzas phyi rabs kyi don du bstan pa/ gleng ga de'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas ston pa nyed sra rdo rje lta bu 'ango bor bzhugs te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor rnams kyi nang nas/ sems dpa' rdo rjes zhus pa/ kham
98b3(rnying rgyud): gsum 'khor ba'i sems can ste dang 'che la brtag/ zo nu'i 'khyud mo shing rta'i 'phang lo 'dra// sdug bsngal bzhi las thar pa'i dus mtha' med// 'khor ba 'di las thar pa thob thabs shig/ thugs kyi dkyil nas nges pa'i bzud phyung ba// phyi rabs don du
98b4(rnying rgyud): pa gzhag tu gsol/ zhes zhus pa dang // de yi skyon pas bka' stsal pa// sems dpa' rdo rje la sogs kun// shin tu lus rbad dbang po brtan par nyon// phyi rabs don du gser gyi rus sbal 'di// rdo rje theg pa rtsa ba'i chud// tshigs su
98b5(rnying rgyud): bca dang yongs su drangs pa'ang// khams gsum 'khor pa'i sems can rnams// skye dang 'chil brtag cing 'khor bar bachud pa yang // ji bzhin de bzhin mchogs pas su brgyad pa yin// khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems cad thang ba 'thob bya'i phyir/
98b6(rnying rgyud): brgya khrib 'i spyong grangs mang yang // thugs kyi dkyil nas nges pa'i brdung phyu la/ rdzab yongs su bsdus nas pasan pa 'di/ mno ngas pa thugs kyi dkyil ba zhog/ ngas par ma bzhan khams gsumar khor bar 'thur// khams gsum
98b7(rnying rgyud): pa'imams can gyi dang 'chas bdag pa yang / ji bzhin pa lang bzhin ma bzheg par// de dang mi mthur rdepa par rtog par 'gyur// de bdag chu sags khas pa gsum 'khor bar 'gyur/ rnam tos mi nu byed pa rkang po yang // bag chags pa
99a1(rnying rgyud): sogs spu shang gtor bzhin snang // da yo nu can pa don sdang mi 'gyur// ma brtags rnga bzhin gnas pa de bzhin nyid// martog mi rtag brtag pa'i yul las 'das// bzug med yul las 'das pa mkha' gsal nam
99a2(rnying rgyud): mkha'i sbyor// nam mkha' gling ni ga nas de bzhin nyid// brtags pas dngos po dbyibs dang kha dog ste// 'di la dbyibs dang kha dog ma 'grub ngas med nam mkha'i klong // cir yang bsgyur du med pa de bzhin nyid// de bzhin nyid ni mtshon pa yongs dang tha//
99a3(rnying rgyud): mdzub khrid zla ba lta bur bstan pade// de bstan zla mdzub mi gcig zag ring 'gyur// de bzhin de dang de gnyis thag ring yang // ji bzhin pa nyid nges par rang la 'char// de bzhin rtogs pa sangs rgyas nyag gcig ma// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas
99a4(rnying rgyud): gyis// de bstan de nyid yongs su shes par gyis// theg pa'i bye brag grangs su mang bstan kyang // bsdus pas sgo bzhi spyi ti yid dang lnga// sgo bzhi 'di ni drang don tsam du ngas bstan te// 'dir zhugs rnam rtog nyid dang 'grogs par 'gyur// rnam rtog
99a5(rnying rgyud): de las de nyid 'thung bar dka'// skye ba brgyud nas 'bras bu 'byung bar bshad// phyi dang sde snod yongs rgya spyi te 'di// nges pa'i don du ngas bstan kun rdzogs te// gdul bya chung zos mgo la bstan par bka'// 'di nyid ye nas tshogs gnyis rdzogs phyir
99a6(rnying rgyud): sgrib gnyis dag/ dag pa'i don nyid ya nas de bzhin nyid// de bzhin nyid ni dbu mar yang dag bshad// mi dmigs bde ba gnyis las 'das// cing yang brtag dka' brtags pas rtogs par dka'// lcags kyi sgom pa 'theb rgyas btab pa bzhin// de bzhin
99a7(rnying rgyud): da don 'di zhes bstan par dka'// gting dpag bcad dka' man ngag rgya mtsho'i tshul// gces pas btsal dka' shel sgong dag pa'i tshul// dkon la bcol dka' bsam 'phe ba nor bu'i tshul// 'di rtogs gang zag u dum wA ra'i tshul// 'di mthor dka'
99b1(rnying rgyud): ba gser gyi rus sbal tshul// 'di don mthong ba rnams kyis 'di mi mthong // ma mthong mthong ba ye nas de bzhin nyid// ma bskrad ji bzhin gnas pa de bzhin la// gnyis med sangs rgyas gnas pa bsgom pa'i klong// bsrub tshol smon pa rtog go byas pa
99b2(rnying rgyud): sal ma gnyis med bgrod du zhugs mtha' med/ sgo laka gnyis med thams cad de bzhin nyid// lam med lam 'dod glang chen rig bskyeg 'dra// bskal bcom bgrod 'ad thob rab tu dka'// thams cad de bzhin nyid nga dar gnas pa// rdo krung tha mas
99b3(rnying rgyud): cad ye sangs rgyas// 'di don sgra dang tshad mas gzhag pas brda mi 'phrad// gnyis 'dzin mu stegs rtag chad bgrod du 'gyur// 'di don 'di la su brjod rtog pa'i rgyun// rnam tho ga de la bla med phyogs na med// ma btags ma rtogs rtog med de bzhin nyid// dngon
