99b4(rnying rgyud): shin tu gting dpag bcad par dka'// tshad mas mo shigs dpes kyang mtshon du med// bden pa gnyis med tshig med yi ge med// bsgrib med btsal med sprin du rdul tsam med// lung la me tog theg pa mi 'tshol ba'i// ye khyag ya nas ye sangs rgyas pa
99b5(rnying rgyud): rtogs ma thag tu sangs rgyas yin par bshad// ces rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ thams cad de bzhin nyid du bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas ston pas 'khor rnams la// rdzogs chen la nyid bzlas te bstan// rang bzhin lhan rdzogs rdzogs
99b6(rnying rgyud): tshan nyid// rdzogs pa chen por le nas gnas// thams cad rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin la// bzang dan blang do gnyis su med// theg pa lam dang bsgom bsgrub brtson// rdzogs chen 'di las 'gal bar bshad// rgyu 'bras gnyis med rdo rje'i sku// sla
99b7(rnying rgyud): shi med par lhun gyis gnas// gnas pa'i don la gnyis su med// dper na chos dang sangs rgyas med// lta bas bltas pas 'khrul par snang // rgyu 'bras theg pa brtags pas nor// lam gyi rim pa gting nas med// lam ni nye la ma rdzogs pa'o// dbu/
100a1(rnying rgyud): dang blta dang stong bsrung rnams// ma bcol ye nas lhun gyis rdzogs// bsgom dang blo yi mtshom med pas rdzogs chen nam mkha'i klong // nam mkha' klong la bsung dang bsgom 'jug lha spad bya ma dgas// ces kyang dpag
100a2(rnying rgyud): tu med pa rdzogs chen klong // klor chen 'di ni yid bzhin nor bu'i tshul// 'di tshol rnams kyis gzhan nas 'bi ma btsal// rang la gnas shing gzhan nas 'di 'tshol na// bskal pa gsum du 'di btsal rnyed mi 'gyur// gang zhig sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'dem
100a3(rnying rgyud): btsapa// de bzhin sems can 'di tshul btsal mi rnyed// mi tshul ngo bo nyid du thams cad gnas// rtsol bsgrub lam la gnas pa'i gang zag rnams// dngul la gser zhun byas kyang gser mi btub// mtshon pa tshig tu ston pa lam pas nyams// rdzogs
100a4(rnying rgyud): 'ab jus pa ra/ 'dun ba'i ba sa tang ba/ de thas ya rjes sa pazabazer 'gyur/ bsas pa sa kyi lags/ 'gang ga sa na / sang sa cas
100a5(rnying rgyud): mtshon du med// de bzhin skabs bral dri med// ma bltas bzhag na lta ba yin// rang bzhin de la mi 'jog na// de dag byang chub rdzogs chen nyid// mngon sa pa me gnas rdzogs chen 'di// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mtshon du med// btsal nas rtsol nang
100a6(rnying rgyud): sangs mi srid/ mA btsal bzhag na rdzogs chen nyid// sgo phug med cing bltar med mi gnas don// mdzad stod rnam par dag pa'i rjeg chen la// 'dug pa lta bsung brjod gnyis ni 'khrul ba ste// ni 'dug pa pa lha mi bsrung ste// bsku 'jol lam la mi gnas ma// de yi rang bzhi
100a7(rnying rgyud): rdzog chen nyid// gang la mi bsad me bsgos cing yang mi bcol btsal du med// thams cad lhan rdzogs ben pa rdzogs che pas// sangs rgyas nyid kyis rol pa gcig tu bshad // martsa pa'i rgyung las/ rdzogs na rnaMm pazla nang rtsol bsgrub mas 'das par
100b1(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i 'du ste gsum pa'o// / de nas smon pas 'khor rnams la// lam gyi ho dang bstan pa'i// ci spyad cibakra ci bsgoms kyang // lam mdal ma la bgrod pas grol// rdzogs chen 'di la sgro phrag med/ thams cad nyug brgyag
100b2(rnying rgyud): sku// gnyis med mi 'gyur yang dag lam// lam gyis bgrod par 'dod rnams dag/ lam med lam 'jug 'khrul pa s+ho// swa bcur brtol yang byang chub nyid la bsgrib// mi bgrod rang bzhin gnas pa'i don med na// mtho ris bgrod pa'i rgyu la to
100b3(rnying rgyud): mongs min par 'gyur// lam med lam du zhugs pas yul rnyed rab tu dka'// chus gdung glang chen smig rgyu bsnyeg pa ltar// bskal par bgrod kyang mi thon rab tu dka'// theg pa gcig gi snying po 'di// rtog gis theg lam mang du lce// mang du rtsi ba 'di
100b4(rnying rgyud): nyid yin// 'di min par ni pha ma mi rnyed// lam rnyed gyur kyang 'khrul pa'i lam// glang chen rdzab tu chud pa 'dra// lam bgrong dag nas thob byed pa// bya bral chos dang mi mthun te// 'de zhes mthong ba byang med pas// lam gyi phul du gyen pa med//
100b5(rnying rgyud): gang du ma gyi de bzhin nyid kyi dang // nges lam 'di las bde ba'i lam med yin// zhes rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ theg pagong 'og gi lam gyi nye ring bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas ston pas 'khor rnams pa// 'jus byas lus ngag gi
100b6(rnying rgyud): las kyis// byang chub 'bras bu thob dkar bstan// de bzhin de don ye nas 'dus ma byas// dus gsum 'jig bral med pas rdo rje re sku// rgyud las bstan pa 'di yis 'bras me 'grub// ji ste phrugs ma la sogs phyag rgyal// rnam pa grol ba nyid kyi lam ni mi gnas
100b7(rnying rgyud): pas// gzhings dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyis lam rnyed na// thams cad chos nyid phyag rgya'i ngo bor gnas// sgyu mo'i phyag che lugs ma'i phyag rgyar ngul// 'bras bu rnam par grol ba'i lam la gnas// de bzhin rnam par dag pa'i lamadzadas/
101a1(rnying rgyud): ma na
101a2(rnying rgyud): maung yang ba byed// rnam pa dzu dus/ ba da nga dang / gsang dus gyi lags dang / rus mim ngas dang / 'di ba k+ta nga / 'a.uthas thams cad kyis pa shes tha'athe pa dka'abyung ba srid pa bathums pa'o/
101a3(rnying rgyud): sa so dpas ba rnams la// dag pa gapa 'ad labs/ rlung ca bas shAng bsgyud/ ga ga kyigs grus bya 'phru gi seM ma bas das// theg pa 'du ba// rdzas pa rjid kyi shA
101a4(rnying rgyud): d+h+r-i ga grI ba mi gnas ngan la gnyis su med// dky-i dka' thab sdom pa 'aspangs pa rdzogs ched don las gol// dkar thabang khrod tsa lang bang rtsol gyis// ya ga sangs rgyas pa pa mi da// dz+nyAm pas rbab byang chub dang // thebazung mi mdzas
101a5(rnying rgyud): na mchog gi lAm// rdzogs la ma 'di la spang byung med pa'i pham// gnyis med thams cad ma spangs pa yi lam// dge skrag gnyis med spang thang med par nyag gcig sangs rgyas pam// dag sdig gnyis sring gsi ngang bong ba'i rnams// 'gyu
101a6(rnying rgyud): nga rdzogs ma 'jung/ rdzogs ga dzarje sa gra sa bang bad// gnyis zed patshogashel med ning rdzogs pa'i// nyan pa dang dzarje' ga pas/ nidrugag nyi sa ma banag zas /
101a7(rnying rgyud): da kyi'i zhes sa/ ma / du su sa
101b1(rnying rgyud): cung // byang chubar thas bu'atha par dka' bar bstan// gzugs bral gag gcig rdzam drug gig// rdol ba// ba mtha' pas 'das pa rdzogs can mtha' ba phyin// ba nag nyas gang la gnas pa 'bru dang thal// bla nan zung 'jug pa yis 'dimi mthong /
101b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis med smos brab rdzogs chen bde pa'i dang // gzung 'dzin mtshan ma pa la 'di don dang // ci phyir ye shes 'khor par gzhal yas khang // gzugs sku gdan dang mchod par gnas// dam pa de mthong mchod byas kyang // ting nge 'dzid gyis gsal 'gyur gyu
101b3(rnying rgyud): dang rag mnyam pa de dang rnog che// zhib ma yin nam rtog sgom// rnam par rtog te 'khrul pa ste// yang dag sangs rgyas lam mi rnyed// ye shes sems dngang mchog sems// lam gyis khyad par byin brlabs shing // spyan drangs bzhugs gsol ma
101b4(rnying rgyud): byas kyang // ma yi na ngon rtog 'phrul pa ste// shin tu byis pa'i spyod yul 'dra// mnyam 'i don gyi ngo bo la// gzugs med gzugs su 'dzin pa med// rdzam rtog nyid kyang ye shes la// lha sku nyid kyang de bzhin nyid// blan po rtog ge'i spyod yul min
101b5(rnying rgyud): mchod dang mchod par bya ba med// de rnams ni mchog 'khor ba'i ste// yang dag sangs rgyas las 'dod rnams// rtog pa la tag gcig na rje las// de bzhin nyid du gnas par bya// zhes rtsa ba'i spyad las/ sngags lce nang ga nyis kyis byang chub 'thob par dka
101b6(rnying rgyud): bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas ston pas 'khor rnams la// rdzogs chen 'di do na dgos par bstan// dug ldand sal bla med rdzogs pa'i don// 'di don martogs gsal bas dam par bcings// bcings pa 'don na nyom
101b7(rnying rgyud): mongs brgyad khri ste// gnyen po rdzogs chen 'di yis grol bar 'gyur// 'khong pa gnyis las mi thar thar pa med pa yang // rdzogs pa ma 'di nyid rnyed nas thar bar 'gyur// rdzogs chen pa ma ni kun gyi nang sel sman// ma g.yos g.yos pa med pa thams cad
102a1(rnying rgyud): na tu na da
102a2(rnying rgyud): ma na du
102b1(rnying rgyud): 'asod nams ma bsag par// gang pang mi 'grub chad par 'gyur// bla mang rdzogs can ngan 'ad la// brnam du mang ches brjod pa yang // kha chag chag ngas nabyung pa// don su sngags lta ba'i mchog/ rtag chang gnyis ldan chad pa' mchag
102b2(rnying rgyud): bden par bsal pa khA ra btags kyang // 'dzin pa'i dbang gis sdug bsngal zhing // chang pa'i dbang gnas mchog smin te// sdig ma bskyed pa'i bya ba yang // ji tsam bsag kya ga ba bla ga sumag rdzas// zhes rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ theg pa gzhan gyi go dgag par
102b3(rnying rgyud): chog tu ma btang zhing kha chog tu ma bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa la// / de nas ston papa 'khor rnams la// bsgom pa'i bsam pa dgos par bstan// snying po 'di dang ma 'brel pa'i// cho ga ge drang srong dgon pa mkhan// nyams de med par byed
102b4(rnying rgyud): po nyid// ma bsgoms par ni mthong mi srid// mthong snyam pa ni go las yin// mthong med dag gi ye shes de// byin gyi rlabs kyis bsgom par bya// rtog 'dzin sems la mi gnas par// yang dag don nyid ma bsgoms na// bla med thar pa thob de srid//
102b5(rnying rgyud): dgon pa dben zung de don bsgom// dra med dag pa'i ye shes kyis// brjed du med pa'i don nyid sgoms// bla med thar pa thob par 'gyur// nges pa'i don nyid ma bsgoms na// yang dag sangs rgyas lam ring bas// byang chub nyid la thog mtha' med//
102b6(rnying rgyud): dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang // gnyis med ye shes don bsgoms nas// sangs rgyas sa la gnas pa yin// bde ba'i 'bras bu ga dang dod par// gnyis su med pa'i snying po bsgom// zhes rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bsgom dgos par bstan pa'i
102b7(rnying rgyud): le'u ste bcu ba'o// / de nas ston pas 'khor rnams la// bsgom pa dag gi thabs rnams bstan// bla med thar pa thob dganga' ba// shes rab thabs la brten pas 'grub// ming tsam thabs la brten nas su// bde ba'i don nyid rang las byung //
103a1(rnying rgyud): babs med shes rab dang dpab// glang can da sdig pargyag d+haH// dad mas 'phras na ldan la// gang zag sa tshan chags gzang thabs pa da// nasdang dag ga sha stad+ha pa// ngang pa dkang thun ma mams 'dzin bdun
103a2(rnying rgyud): gaN+DI ga dag gi sham rmel// skangags la sman gro ba sems 'dzi bsan// ngakyil dag gi shas chel// zhabs yis pas 'dzin bstan// 'dod chags dag ga shas che ba// 'dzud rje tham pa sems 'dzin bstan// phrag dag dgag shas chal
103a3(rnying rgyud): page bcwa la sems mdzin pastan// rnam rje 'dil bsnyen nas kyang // dzab ny-ir tshugan tu bsgom// byang chub ba bsangasam pa rang gisangs rdzogs grog ba'i na rang gyi na pa dag/ bas mas cing tha~Ms ma 'asum pa phral las 'das/
103a4(rnying rgyud): na na sa sa
103a5(rnying rgyud): bkro pa'i yul las 'das/ de nyid nga rig nga byu nga 'ing gzhag/ bzhag pa'i ngas pa sangs rgyas ted byi thugs// 'di gas baspyad du sangs rgyas nyid kyis zad// rnas rtsa ba'i chung ba sa/ bsgo ma pa'i thabs bstan pa'i le'u sa bcwa gcig pad+ma/
103a6(rnying rgyud): dam byas pa bang ma/ sa padz+ran kyi babams/ rdzogs parjo 'dadag/ rtog pa / sto ma rigs pa stod/ dbugs lani gags par// zhab rnamangs ngags pa ma
103a7(rnying rgyud): sa mardzogs pas// tog pamed 'i sa bya// nalas gsas sa su 'das par 'dzum gang pa sems cing zhin nyid// gang bang 'a migs nying yangs bsla ma sa ngas pa// seM sa kyis dmags
103b1(rnying rgyud): brnam pa ma lus rdzogs pa yin// rtog dpyod med pas bde '-i'i mchog/ shes pa gzung 'dzin dang bral ba// bstan pa ngo bo nyid kyi sku// de la dmigs bya rdul phran med// de phyir dmigs su cizhig yod// dmigs su ma #
103b2(rnying rgyud): dmigs// de la nga bzhag de gnas pa// pad+ma spyan de des mthong 'gyur// shes pa med pa shes rab mchog/ gsal ba med pa ye shes dang // 'dzin pa med pa ti ni rlung // rtsol ba med na spel khrims rdzogs// shes nas ma bya gti mug
103b3(rnying rgyud): dang // mi bsgom bsgom pa 'du 'bral med// mi shes pas ni shes rab bstan// mi 'dzin 'dzin pa'i gting nas bstan// mi blta ba de snyam par nges bstan no// snang ba med na dngos med pas// de nyid nyag gcig mchog gi sku// de bzhin sku la mtshan du
103b4(rnying rgyud): med// de nyid dbyings te mtshon du med/ mi mthong ba nyid mthong ba yin// cir yang mi dmigs gti mug ste// ma rig pa ni ye shes gsal// reg pa'i ye shes gang ldan pas// yi ge med pa'i don la bal// 'dzin yang rtog dang dmigs dang za pa/
103b5(rnying rgyud): gang la mo brten bsgom pa'i mchog/ nyon mongs nyid kyang byang chub gzhi// gzhi de tsam yang bsam du med// gang la rtag tu med pa'i byang chub sems kyi lam// don pa 'jug tu med pa'i rdzogs chen blta ba'i klong // 'di ltar dran med stobs ldan dgongs pa'i
103b6(rnying rgyud): mchog/ ba de dang mi bde sems la gnyis med de// ston pa skyon du mthong ba gang lags pa// bden pa'i don la ma nyams dgongs pa'i mchog/ shes rab chen po yul dang dbang por blta ste mthong na blta mi b+h+ya/ dang po shes rab rnam gsam gyis/
103b7(rnying rgyud): chos nyid nyams su blangs pa'i mis// blta ba nam mkha'i dbyings nyid la// de bzhin sems ni dang 'dra// de la bsgom zhing red pa dang // mkhang la mkha' nyid rnam par bsgom// bsgom pa'i dul ni mthong ba ni// cung zad tsam yang mthong du med// ngas
104a1(rnying rgyud): gan tha pa / gapa ma dang mthabad// thab pa na pa / ma sa sa zung ba dang / sa dubs ngas nga bya bangs na
104a2(rnying rgyud): ga
104a3(rnying rgyud): sa
104a4(rnying rgyud): ga nga 'an pa / dag
104a5(rnying rgyud): su
104a6(rnying rgyud): su rna bya kyi
104b1(rnying rgyud): ming byed pa 'chang / 'thung ba rnam mkha' dang ha las// spyan dang blarnangs 'byung ba pang // dang byung rapa zhen ma mkha' klong // de bzhin rang gzung chubs mas// ngag pas ma yin pa tha da gsun// rang brang rab zhamams sa dang /
104b2(rnying rgyud): byung mo bsam gtan tshad// bde bar rtsol na de bzhin nyid// mtshan mdag pa bsam gtan mod// gdong sems ldan zhing 'gyur ba med// de ltar gyur tshabasam ga tan tshad// de min langs pa'i se mas gyur na// phyim ci lag gi rna mchogs/
104b3(rnying rgyud): de dag de la de don med// blta ba med pa'i lta ba ni// lta ba mtha' du phyin pa'i tshad// shin tu bla na pa mi gsal ba// dran po'i 'thung 'jug nyams pa ste// rtog rtsod pag la nyal ba'i tshad// blun po dam du zin pa ni// ting rnams don la zhen
104b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshad// gang la chags pa'i sems med na// bsam gtan lhun gyis grub pa'i tshad// rtag tu 'di ltar gang gnas pa// sangs rgyas sa la gnas pa yin// zhes rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bsam gtan mthar phyin pa bstan pa'i be'u te bcu bzhi pa'o//
104b5(rnying rgyud): denas ston pas 'khor rnams la// bsgom zhugs cad rnams bsal te bstan// de bzhin nyid ni mi gnyis thig le gzeg/ dmigs pa'i phu la'i du ba nga 'dra// 'drab rtog pa byung ched rnam// gnas med gnas la stong zags bsgom pa gal//
104b6(rnying rgyud): rtog cal 'ang chags med pas// ting rnams ril chags mi bya// de bzhin nyid la gzugs med pas// dmigs bya'i yul ni ci zhig yod// gnyis su med pa'i dmigs pa ni// bsgom chags nang de 'khor ba'i rgyu// dam pa nyid mdzang de la zhen pa ni//
104b7(rnying rgyud): badripa chags dkyipa'i dpe'as byang // don mthong zhes pa yang lung na// des nim mthong bsgom chags dang// menag zab mo nyams byung na// myong ba nyid ces bsgom chags dang // rtag cing golasar mnod gyung na// dras gsum dug dang dang ldang/
105a1(rnying rgyud): mngan tho ba chags gas// gang gtas pa 'a'an la/ 'dus pa yangs sa/ 'jugs da nga // nga ngas/ nas kyang bas ba sa ma na
105a2(rnying rgyud): rangs so pas khar rnams 'o// 'gas pad du dngas padun/ da sa pa ba da/ sa pang 'di drag grangs pa mas// radu sa bstan ngas ngas rgyas kyid kyi nga
105a3(rnying rgyud): smra sasu su
105a4(rnying rgyud): pa du la mi / deb sa shA 'ang darnas
105a5(rnying rgyud): 'das parnying pa mardzog/ tsha yang bkun med dpa ma pa nga // dpa da pang dgas bstan du med// yod zeng brdang bral ngan ga/ cir yang bad ming dmamapa' dag pa'i dag/ rang rnyed du pa nga 'am bcun du med/
105a6(rnying rgyud): bangs/ dis spya pa das na ga / sa ma dzug// ngag pa das sas cang
105a7(rnying rgyud): ces thab migs 'du // dang 'dred pa sangs la / 'i 'byin ga 'a nga/ na ma ma sa sa
105b1(rnying rgyud): bsnyen pas sangs rgyas la ma mi rted// me long gzug brnyan tshul du tshur snang 'gyur// yang dag byang chub shin tu rnyed par dka'// khyad par can gyi thabs la brten pas 'grub// ming gi tha snyad tsam du bden mod kyi// mngon sum bde ba'i don la rang chas
105b2(rnying rgyud): 'char bar 'gyur// mtshon pa tshig tu ci tsam pa stan gyur kyang // mtshon pa de dang de nyid mi mthun te// yang dag rig pa khong nas ma shar na// de bzhin nyid kyi don de gal dpog/ yang nga gdon gyi rig pa shar ba'i tshe// thams cad ma bsgribs ngo bo nyid du gnas// gang
105b3(rnying rgyud): zhig sangs rgyas 'bras bu la ma 'dod pas// dgon pa dben gzung gzung 'dzin gnyis spangs la// rang rig gsal ba'i ye shes bcol bar bya// zhes rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ yang dag pa'i don pa rig pa tshur 'char dgos par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// /
105b4(rnying rgyud): de nas ston pas 'khor rnams la// 'khor thar gnyis su med par bstan// thams cad snying po de bzhin theg le gcig/ 'khor 'das gnyis med bde ba chen po'i dang // gnyis mthar gser bong sus kyang gsung pa min// thams cad thig le gcig
105b5(rnying rgyud): ste dbye ba'i tha snyad med// bla med nges pa'i snying po'i don tshol na// 'khor bar gnyis med bzung ste de bzhin nyid du shes par bya// kha cig dmyal 'jigs rna brgyad thos ma thag/ de 'jigs shin tu skrag gyur nas// bsam phyir dge ba'i tshogs sbed kyang /
105b6(rnying rgyud): bsam la brten phyir thar mi 'gyur/ dmyal 'jigs bla med thob pa'i bsam med na// tsha grang dmyal srung shal ma re// bsam pa ji ltar bsam pa ltar// mi bzod sdug bsngal de yis mthong// 'jigs pa gang bas ma de yis bshed// des
105b7(rnying rgyud): na 'khor thar gnyis su med// ma bcos theg le gcig gi dang // mnyam pa nyid yang sangs rgyas la// 'jigs pa med pa lam gyi mchog/ ma spangs mi spang mchog gis// thams cad rang bzhin lhun gyis rdzogs// gnyis mthar mi 'byung
106a1(rnying rgyud): gzugag dang // ma' nas thug sa ga gal ba dag/ 'asus pa rgyud pas// 'ang ga gabyas sa da du stan pa'i la'an pa pa'o// / danas ngas rnams pa/ dad shA nga/
106a2(rnying rgyud): par bstan// de bzhin nyid kyi don 'dil// cis kyang bsgrib pa mi 'gyu ra bas// ga ltar snyid kya bzhin nyid// ci yang mI spyod zla mang sprod pa'i mchog/ ci sad mi rtog ba 'di mngon// spyad pa bzang ste glang chen chur lugs bzhin// tsal mi spyod
106a3(rnying rgyud): de bzhin mad par gnas// thams cad de bzhin nyid du yang gnas pas// gang spyod ci spyod thams cad spyod pa'i mchog/ ma 'gags mi 'gag thams cad de bzhin nyid// rigs drug bdud dang mu stegs san po rjo/ rdzogs chen sbed par ma gyur gang yang med
106a4(rnying rgyud): tse mi spyod pa'i spyod pa che// shin tu mtshogs dag tu bshad// ces rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ spyod pasang byung med par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// de nas ston pas 'khor rnams la// gnyis su dbye ba med par bstan// de bzhin nyid don
106a5(rnying rgyud): snying po thig legacig/ gnyis med ye shes khyab ga la yongs su 'dus// gnyis med mthong ba'i lta ba ma rabs gus pa ltar// rang gi shes pa dam par byas te de bsnyem+ba pa// chags sdang zhe sdang bskyed na gti mug yin te de mi mthong // brjod du yod pa
106a6(rnying rgyud): thams cad rtog pa'i rgyun// rnam rtog de la bla med phyogs na med// mang slang ji bzhin gnas pa'i rang nyid la// thams cad rdzogs pas gnyis su med// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su 'dzin pa yang // de na smis pa'i skyon chen yin// gling dor 'ang
106a7(rnying rgyud): la rab gnas pa// byang chub mchog tu 'gro ma 'gyur// na dbang gzhan nas nas mi 'gyur// ngag gis brjod du med pa'i phyir// ye shes dbyings su mthong ba med// 'khrul pa'i lam la gnyis blta mod// do ni mu stegs ltab ga/
106b1(rnying rgyud): ngadag sangs rgyas lam nyid la// gnyis su mang ba bde ba'i lam// ma bcos thig la gcig gi ngar // gtan la mi phebs sems nyid de// bsdus med spros med rang byung nyud// da la dran dang ma dran dang // rtag dang chad dang bslab
106b2(rnying rgyud): bsgrub dang // spa brjod 'khrul pa'i 'khrul pa de// stong gsum sems can bas dpa bas// sdig pa'i mchog tu 'gro bar 'gyur// zhes rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gnyis su dbyer med pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas ston pas
106b3(rnying rgyud): 'khang rnams la// shin tu tsal bsgrub dgos par bstan// bla med 'bras bu gang 'dod pa// shin tu las rnams 'du 'dzi spangs// mchod na mgron du bye ba med// lus langs rtog pa langs pa ste// rdul 'byor yang rab blo ldan la// shin tu
106b4(rnying rgyud): tsob bsgrub dgos par bstan// bla ming 'bras bu gar 'dod pa// shin tu las rnams 'du 'dzi spangs// gsang chen mnyam pa'i snying po 'di// thol pa'i skal ba bya tshon// bgrod dang 'dug dang shal ba dang // mnyam pa de yi rang du gnas/
106b5(rnying rgyud): dus med rtag tu ma yengs bsgom// chu srin rdzas zin tshul du ma btang na// khyad par bdud rtsi mchog tu de nyid 'grub// mthong bas bltar med tshol 'dod na// mgo la me shor lta bu'i brtson 'grus pa skyed// de min nyal 'dug de nyid 'di dang mi ldanan//
106b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i blo 'chal mu stegs yin// rang bzhin med pa'i don nyid 'di// blun pos rdzogs pa'i dus ma yin// de bzhin nyid la rnam rtog med// yang dag sangs rgyal lam 'dod pas// shin tu brtson dgus don bsgoms na// bla med 'bras bu 'thob pa
106b7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// zhes rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ brtson 'grus bskyed par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// de nas ston pas 'khor rnams la// bla med theg chen 'di rtogs na// yon tan shugs kyis 'thung bar bstan// sems ni
107a1(rnying rgyud): ye nas de bzhin nyid du bzhin// gang du yang mthong ba med pa mi 'gyung bas// drang ba myo gas bdud ba'ang ba// de bzhin nyid thams cad gnas// nyan mongs maspangs byang chub nyid// spang blang mdang la shes dang /
107a2(rnying rgyud): spyan rdzogs tha snyad med par 'gyur// thams cad byang chub ngo bo nyid// ngo bo nyid gsapa red pa des// rgyal po nyid du dmangs grogs 'gyur// sangs rgyas sems can mi byed gang yang dbyer med na// bla med sangs rgyas dang ngam shugs kyis 'char//
107a3(rnying rgyud): bung bas me tog 'jings kyang sbrang rtsi'i snying po 'byung ba ltar// sems nyid ji ltar dag kyang martogs sprul pa'i snying po 'byung // 'byung ba nam mkha'i ngang las ni// sprin dang khu rlangs 'byung ba bzhin// de bzhin gnyis med dang las ni// bla med sangs rgyas
107a4(rnying rgyud): kyis 'byung // kun 'byung snying po theg mchog 'di ni yid bzhin nor bu'i tshul// dgos 'dod re bo dang ngam shugs kyis 'byung // yon tan kun 'gyung yid bzhin nor bu'i sku// sku nyid 'di rtog thams cad shugs kyis 'byung // zhes rtsa ba'i rgyud las//
107a5(rnying rgyud): theg mchog 'di dang ldan na yon tan shugs kyis 'byung ba bstan pa'i le'u ste nyinye shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas ston pas 'khor rnams la// gnyis med ye shes rtogs gyur na// rig pa rang dbang thob par bstan// de bzhin nyid don gang gnas pa/
107a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis med ye shes thob pa'i dbang // thams cad kun la dbang bskur nas// rig par nga dbang thob pa'i don// rang rig ci la mi gnas pa// blang ngor mi mnyam sems mdan// thams cad kun la dbang bskur ba'i// rig pa dang dbang thob pa'i dbang //
107a7(rnying rgyud): mnyid du nyid gnas pa// nga spun gyis rdzogs pa'i dbang // gnyis med ye shes 'o dgas par// mi 'gyur rdo rje nyag gcig sgra// mi gyur rig pa rang dbang tho// tsi la mi se mas rtag bral na// de bzhin nyid du lhan rdzogs pas/ @
107b1(rnying rgyud): dab pa shas chags pa'i dbang // skang pa ji bzhin da bzhin du// rdol bsgrub mtha' las 'das gyur ra// rig pa'i ye shes rang dbang thob// rdzas bya ba'i rgyud pas/ gnyis med bye rtogs na rlig pu dbang bang zab par bstan pa badz+ra sh+ya ti bu rbag sum
107b2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas ston pas 'khor rnams la// nga bzhin nyid kyi don rtags na/ chog ga ngos grub 'jab par bstan// de bzhin nyid nong ngas po kun dang bral// 'bral mngadun 'di mtshon du meng pa bya// ring dag pa shes rangogs
107b3(rnying rgyud): ni// dngos po dngos su ngag pa dngos gru/ mchog/ byang chub ngo bo nyid du kun gnas pas// rtog pa'i dbang gis kun dang 'brel ma yin// mi rtog rtog pa'i yul las 'das// gzung 'dzin rtog mthanga' las 'das na// mchog gi dngos grub zung
107b4(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// gzung 'dzin gnyis lha bu stegs 'khrul pa'i sku// dngas po nyid rngu gnas pas dngos me 'grub// me 'dzin mi tog gnyis med dod gsal na// dngos po'i gnas lugs dag pas dngos grub mchog/ rang byung 'od gsal bdud
107b5(rnying rgyud): po'ang / swa yis rtogs na dngos grub chen po mchog/ yang dag nges pa'i snying po 'di rtogs na// rgyal mchog sman gyis grub pa'i dngos grub pas// 'jig rten mthu chen rnams kyis srog tu med// snying ma na mchog dngos grub rang gi sems/
107b6(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten dngos grub mtshan ma'i rnam pa ste// dngos grub de la bdud rtsi med par bshad// ces rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rdzogs chen nyid kyi don rtogs na/ mchog gi dngos grub yin par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas ston pas
107b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor rnams la// theg chen 'di dang ldan gyur na// sdig pa kun las rnam par grol bar bstan// mnyam pa'i ngang la gnas pa tsho// rang byung ye shes 'odags pa na// dge sdig gnyis ka rnam par sel// gnyis med ye shes khya ba gdal pas/
108a1(rnying rgyud): jug pa gan pasarnas pa byu // ga da pas bsgrags na// rdzogapa na pa sangs ma// nga 'dang bsas nas // 1ma nga nas sgrub dpapas// ma byu dag dgan na
108a2(rnying rgyud): mnga'// bdag gzhan mi mthong ma 'dzin na// nyon mongs kun la dbyel tog kyang // rnam grol lam la bsgrub mi 'gyur// theg chen 'di dang ldan gyur na// dge dang sdig pa gnyis med de// sdig pa kun las nges par grol// bla med 'bras bu
108a3(rnying rgyud): 'thob par 'gyur// 'di don de bzhin nyid rtogs na// thams cad ngo bo de nyid pas// sdig pa kun las nges par grol/ zhes rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ theg pa chen po'i don dang ldan na sdig pa kun las nges par go'i par brtan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//
108a4(rnying rgyud): denas ston pas 'khor rnams la// theg chen 'di dang ldan gyur nas// phra mob myur du rung bar bstan// bla med theg chen 'di rtogs na// thams cad de bzhin nyid gnas pas// theg pa thams cad 'di ru 'dus// theg pa phra mo 'di ru 'dus rung gis//
108a5(rnying rgyud): theg pa 'di nyid phra mor shong mi 'gyur// zangs la gser rtsis gser du bsgyur rung gis// zangs rtsis gser du bsgyur du 'dod pa med// 'di yi don gyis gzhan gyi 'bras rung gis// gzhan gyi don gyis 'di yi don mi rung // snying po don mchog khyad par 'di
108a6(rnying rgyud): nyid ni// bla med theg chen phra mo gdong nas med// thams cad ji bzhin de bzhin nyid du gnas// 'di la yon tan thams cad shugs kyis 'gyur // lam ni nye lam bgrod med 'de bar rdzogs// lam gyi mchog tu gyur pa'i mir so 'das// stong pa nyid
108a7(rnying rgyud): kyisems de gzugs yod med// shes rab mos la dzang tshol rab tu bla// zhes rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ theg chen 'di dang ldanan phram bsgyur du bathub pa bstan pa'i le'u sa nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// / de nas ston pas 'khor rnams pa// rtseng po shes
108b1(rnying rgyud): las bcad par bstan// rdzogs chen 'di yi rang bzhin no// snying po shes pas ma bcad na// phra mo'i shes pas grangs rlabs mchod// don kun grol ma snang bar // smra m+b+hir 'bring ba ngan med pas// d+ha tshe d+hipa po 'dra bcad la// pha mo bag la
108b2(rnying rgyud): nyal ba dbab// gtan tshigs kyis ni ma yin no// phra mo'i shes pa grangs las 'das// don kun so so rang rang ba'o// de bzhin pa lta ba so sor blta// rdzogs chen 'di ni rab cing ste// don 'di cha rim nyag gcig tu// thams cad kyis nam bus
108b3(rnying rgyud): chub bo// rtsing po 'di dang ma spyad ma ldan na// lam med la ma zhugs so sor dgol// 'jug dang blta dang srung ma dang // de bzhin 'jug sgo so so la// 'khrul pa'i lam yin mtha' las go la// nye la ma rtsol bral nad 'dis sel// rab tu rtsing ste
108b4(rnying rgyud): gcig ste bstan// nye lam nyeg gcig yongs su rdzogs// thams cad drig le gcig tu gnas// zhes rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rtsong po shes pas bcad pang bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas ston pas 'khor rnams la/
108b5(rnying rgyud): 'di la mos pa'i gang zag la// phyogs dang ris su med par bstan// de bzhin nyid kyi snying po nyid// 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas// rkyen gyis mi btsal gzhan las min// thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pas// 'gro ba kun la phyogs ris
108b6(rnying rgyud): med// 'di 'dzin 'di 'chad 'di 'bon na// gang goms sangs rgyas sa la gnas// 'dre la mos pa tha dad kyis// mu stegs srin po'i rigs drug rnams// phyogs dang ris su ba chad de// gang goms de yis dbras bu thob// thams cad dang bzhin
108b7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid// rang gi de nyid ma rtogs na// 'khrul par gyur te so sor snang // 'khor ba nyid las zar mtha' med// rang sangs rgyas pade rtogs na// rig pa ye shes ldan pas na// bla med shes rab nyag gcig lam// des ni rga med zar pa pob//
109a1(rnying rgyud): nas byam rgyad las/ thag can 'di la rnam pa shang byag la phyogs ngas ma par bstan pa'i 'jas nyi shA ba dpag/
109a2(rnying rgyud): de nas stod pas 'khor rnams pa// kun gyi zun mong min par bstar// bla med rdzogs pa ca
109a3(rnying rgyud): da/ ga sa me// gas sa gnamapa na// byu pa ga/ 'di
109a4(rnying rgyud): gcig med da rgyal yod srid na// bde gshegs sras kyi thu bo yin// 'dingon 'don pa na ce
109a5(rnying rgyud): ya sa/ sa da
109a6(rnying rgyud): 'di zhes nyid du de nyid med// yang dag sangs rgyas sras 'dod pa// bcol med dang yang bzhin
109a7(rnying rgyud): padan 'am cher la la / dag tsun mags pa gan/ ting pa nga jas/ dbang gsar ba ba / sa cag na ya / zhes ltu ngas
109a8(rnying rgyud): ba dzin nga nipa tsun nyi rgyu bab nas tshu pas 'khyod rnams/ pa ga pa dpang bsus sa da sa
109a9(rnying rgyud): debanyin rnanam pa pa ba dzin// slab mang bcur ma sasmin mthig sa pazhin/ zad pa bad pa ban/ rin sa da/ ngad rjed porjedag gnams/
109a10(rnying rgyud): na/ mas 'as sa
109b1(rnying rgyud): pA'o// / khrad kyi rgyal po gsar gyi rus sbal re rje zag pa ca ba'i rgyud kyis ma/ sems rgyags bya phya ma/ b+ha ba thams cad kyi phug dgongs pa'i gdang chags na/ sa ma mas phag shes zam/ nor 'di du ma dag spang ba dag
109b2(rnying rgyud): yis// rin chen sna lnga'i snying po gser khyer nas// rin chen srog la ma 'jom dka' ba'i lam rnams brgal// nges pa'i snying po byang sems chud smad rtsi gnyis btsal// 'jam dpal bshes gnyen bla ma dang / bdag 'dra ba ngo tsa na yis/
109b3(rnying rgyud): skad bstan te mtshan la pheb nas kyang / bod kyi yul du rmongs pa tshan gsum 'gyur ba cha mchis nas// 'dir drangs mnga' bdag rgyal po nyid kyi phyag tu phul// rmongs po chen gsum dus na dar bar shog/ rim po bo ro ce nas pasgyur/ de nas sgo brag nas
109b4(rnying rgyud): zu graglai kyis gter nas bton pa'o// / pang rje rjes nga nam ma na rje rgyas pa dang / byang chub kyi sems ca du byung ba le 'u nas nyes pa dzad// bod skad du/ byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba'o mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
109b5(rnying rgyud): 'das babye ba chen po de/ thams cad chos nyid zab mo la gzud par dgongs nas/ chos dgyengs gting dpag dka' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang bzhin gyi 'khor nyid dang tha mi dad pa rnams la/ rang bzhin gsung du med pa
109b6(rnying rgyud): 'di bka' sbal ba de yi tshe na thams cad chos nyid spod pa'i ngang du gyur/ byang chub sems kyi ngo bo ni// bsam med dran med mi g.yo ba// bsam pa bstan du med pa'o// tha snyed gdags sug la yod// 'di ni brjod med spros pas 'das// dig/
109b7(rnying rgyud): ma'i rmi lam lta bu'o// rnal dakhyor dam pa lam zhes bya// grub mtha' ma nyams yongs su dag/ sangs rgyas sa la rang bzhin gnas// rdzogs pa chen po'i don zhes bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin las/ rang bzhin bsang du
110a1(rnying rgyud): ma padzanan gsungs pa' smras// 'dang mchogagapa shes gsus du da bka' stsal ga dang nanang dang / khrul nga dang byang // sems kyi yang cigadangapal// lum thos sa nas pa la
110a2(rnying rgyud): dadus pabyung tshong shes 'dug da // 'gazugs rgyun chad nga drung shad// sanas ming skad cig pa/ de bzhin byings kya na dag nga di kris bya dang // don nun chags thams cang mdus// shes pa mags tang du
110a3(rnying rgyud): de bzhin sbyar ba'i lam pa yi// yaM shes la reg mi rnams la// rang rgyud du ni bdud bzhi byung // 'jigs pa gzugs dang grags pasgra// 'od kyi bdud dang bsgrub rnams// drung zing la reg byas la// mi zhin mi chags la mtshan pas mu/
110a4(rnying rgyud): 'ong 'gro ba de nyid lam// shes pa khyad par can zhes bya// ye shes gzung nga med pa'i skabs// de nam yang bde ba'i mchog ngas dbyings zad ma bka' stsal po/ zhi ba'i dkris te 'dus mabyas// rang bzhin bzang dang rab 'dres pa// btsal med tshul
110a5(rnying rgyud): du rung ba ste// gang gis ma bskad rang bzhin dbyings// thog mtha' med pa'i rgyal pa'o// skad cig tu 'bras med par dbyangs// chud cad rig pa'i dbyings ma yin// bzol na rtsol nang sangs mi srid// 'atsal ba 'ad pa phyis cig to// deg zum rdzing /
110a6(rnying rgyud): das// de thum sa shes dpag// yang dbab dang mi pa med// shes rig rag tugs rdzu ra pad/ nan po'i srirnas mi ga cing // zhin gi rtogs gyur pa// de yis gachags dang bzhin dpa// radu ba bsum pan yul// dngag
110a7(rnying rgyud): yang bde ba gshegs// gcig tu gzung ba rangs ma ba nad// yi shes da yang bas mepa'i dbang // bsam pa rang ba mayinan// dbyings dang khregs rab 'byor na// gang can gyis ca btung ste// rim pa med pa'i na ni// yang dag pa
110b1(rnying rgyud): dam blang // byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa las dbyings zar ma skabs// / de nas rang bzhin mthong du mdapa bka' stsal pa// rang bzhin rang gi rtogs pa ni// phradag med pa thab mo ste// drang kha'i tshon yod mad na// bsam pa mtshan ma
110b2(rnying rgyud): can gyis ni// de la ma dpog gya gru can// gsal ba med par rang bzhin gas la// gsal ba nyid ni grub mtha skyon// rang bzhin mkha' la rang bzhin sems// bsam pa rang bzhin rang bzhin gnas// shes gyun du yang rang babyinas pa/
110b3(rnying rgyud): na nyams med nyams zhes bya// lta ba rim pa ma yin la// / sgom pa rim pa ma yin pa// lta spyod gnyis ka rang bzhin tsam// khyad par 'phags pa'i rang bzhin no// byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa las rang bzhin gyis mtshan du med pa'i rlabs/
110b4(rnying rgyud): nas dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med yin pa 'di bka' stsal pa/ thams cad dbyings las phyed yin pas// dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med ste// ye nas ma bcos dbyings// de la// ma bcos rig pa klong du yan// rang bzhin don dang ldan byas te/
110b5(rnying rgyud): ga'i spyod yul ma yin pas// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med de// gnyis med bde ba'i mchog rgyal po// de ltar ma yin rtog ge bas// bsam pa de la gnas pa na// gal te sems la gtad yod pas// btang ba mi mthong 'ching ba bya// sa
110b6(rnying rgyud): mi dgas pa'i skyes bu yis// nam mkha' bzhin du nang du bsdus// dang po'i tshe na 'di gnyis sgrims// dbang po yul la 'phros pa yang // de kha dbyings zang shes rab mod// kha cig rdzogs chen don 'dod pa// rang bzhin bde ba nyams su blang // bde
110b7(rnying rgyud): bsgoms te mchir 'tshor// de bas chad pa zhi bar bzhag/ der bzhag gser 'dod bor pa bzhin// dbyings dang ye shes skad cig la// med pa shes rab thabs rdzogs pa/ de ni sangs rgyas sa la gnas// gnyis su med par mi blta bar// de ni sangs
111a1(rnying rgyud): rgyams pas / na da// ga bad ngas gas tan dumad ma na byag yu na
111a2(rnying rgyud): bltar bang bya// dum gra na pa zhid/ dam lang nga mang pa'i// mtsha ma gan da gal bsan/ ga 'di la / ya dang thal pa'ang+yas rgyanaH/ yang migs skyel bgar ma du/ ma migs sa
111a3(rnying rgyud): sa de bzhid med// ma mthong bas na mthong ba rje// thabs kyithabs ti dngos grang chad // shen cung mtshar rdzogs can po// sangs rgyas thugs la myi dngang ba// 'di rtogag babargya dngang/ gzig ma 'ang bar byed rdu grags// lu
111a4(rnying rgyud): brnam bzla ba kunang zal// khyababs pa can do dgas pa// bzang mang bas ma pas thams cad mthong // dani ngas pa sgom pachog cad ga// sadang pa ro labyin las 'das// del snang bar dang bzhin med// rang bzhin med pa mabs su/
111a5(rnying rgyud): rlabs ma thal las 'das par// sems kyi 'byung tsho Sh+TA ba // de ka rang bzhin dang sher// ngas dan snying po skad ring // rda rtog pas gas pa'i rgyags kyis// log zhog me bdam pa maH// badz+rag dgang gtan pos badzug
111a6(rnying rgyud): med// rgyal las dmangs byung tha bar sprul// rgyal po thub ma yi btson// rgyal bzung bral khams tsam pa // rnam par bas pas thun dza// 'di ni sa ma shin can pa// mkhas pas rgyal po ba sang dur na/
111a7(rnying rgyud): rgyal 'khor bzang bar 'od// lug bzlog pade chen sa la 'das// byang chub sems bsgom pa las mthong ba bltang med pa'i skabs// de nas chos nyid rje bzhin pa'i don bka' stsab pa/ sems mig yo ba sangs rgyas sa// gang yang ma bskyed da
111b1(rnying rgyud): la// gang gnas chos nyid yin par bshad// gnas dang mi gnas gnyis med do// de phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen// 'di ni sku yi dngos grub yin// rdzas nyid cing yang ma mthong ba// drags pa yang dag don ma log/ bzlas
111b2(rnying rgyud): shing gsal bar ma gyur pa// gsung gi dngos grub shin tu yin// sa la mi brten lhun gyis grub// 'di ni lam rgan kun 'ong 'gro// thams cad 'dus pa'i dngos grub yin// rang bzhin dang la rang bzhin yan// rang byang rig pa zhes bya'o//
111b3(rnying rgyud): 'de me sdang ba gzhan snang med// gal te blo la snang ba de// don snar ma yin mtshan ma'o// de ni ngang gyur rig pa min// byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa las// chos nyid ji bzhin pa'i skabs// de nas rmad du byung ba 'di bkang stsal pa/ sems mi
111b4(rnying rgyud): g.yo ba bde ba ste// sems kyi sems 'ching mi 'tshong bas// sems la zhib pas brtag dpud bya// shes bzhin gyis ni brang bcad de// sems kyi sems la bltas pas na// cing yang ma mthong ma yengs pa// bsgoms na ma bsgomasas bla
111b5(rnying rgyud): nyams// de bas 'byung tshor ci gyur yang // rang byung deng zhi bsgom pa'i gtso// radabyung rang zhe tsom mi gdags// sems kyi spyod 'jug thams cad kyang // yi ge med pa'i ngang du bzhag/ de ni rgyal po'i rgyalas 'o// man ngag snying po gyur
111b6(rnying rgyud): sa bya// bde gshegs nyag gcig dgongs pa la// phyir bas rnal 'byor don pa ni// yang rab bsam pa'i ting nge 'dzin// rab kyi rab kyis don la dpyad// byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa yi ge med pa las/ rmang du byung ba bstan pa'i skabs//
111b7(rnying rgyud): de nas sku gsung thugs su 'khor rnams rang bzhin du bton nas bkang stsal pa/ byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa yi ge med pa'i rgyud 'di mthong ngam/ thos sa ma nyams su blangs sam/ don chags sam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa las/ 'khor
112a1(rnying rgyud): na na su kla TA
112a2(rnying rgyud): ma sa
112a3(rnying rgyud): sa
112a4(rnying rgyud): sa sa
112b1(rnying rgyud): btsug kun bzang dang // rang nyam pa rang bzhin yang // bag chags kun bzang ldan gyis grub// gsar me dbong ba med pa'i sems// dran rtog bag chags ci zung yang // de nyid rang bzhin yig med dang // mtshan pa las 'das dpa
112b2(rnying rgyud): rang ba// des na sgrub pa can pa'o// yi ge med pa'i skabs// gang yang mi bas ma cing mi brtags// mtshar bas ma nyams te chagasan 'khor// byang chub sems su gdags pa med// 'di ltar smad pa'i khyang par la// sems dang
112b3(rnying rgyud): dra rnam med rje/ rtsibs chags pa'i mtshan mni// 'di zhes gang langang gnas mi thA// bsgom chags sngon du ting 'dzin 'gro// yig med pa'i skabs// snyan gyis grub pa'i ye shes te// ye shes kun stsob ba yin// ches spang dus
112b4(rnying rgyud): mchog yin pas// nam mkha' ze'i ting 'dzi nag ci// yi ge med pa'i skabs// rigs kyi bde bar gshegs pa rnams// ting 'dzin 'bum sde'i don 'dzin// rab tu rtogs dang dpyad dka' bas// rgya chen rdzing por rab dpyang la// phra mo
112b5(rnying rgyud): zazhal nyal ba bab// gtan rdzogs kyis ni ma yin// byang chub gyi se mas bsgom pa me ste med pa las/ bsdu ba gsungs pa'i skabs rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ rba ha tsa d+ha ma hA sar+b+ba dz+nyA nasap+pa ka ra k+Sha/ bod skad du/ byang
112b6(rnying rgyud): chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po ye shes bdun 'byung ba'i rgyud/ dpal ye shes rdzogs pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin ye shes rdzogs pa chen sa/ gsang ba'i 'od gsal ba
112b7(rnying rgyud): bde ba'i ngang nyid/ lhun gyis grub pa'i bdag nyid/ maM lus pa gcig gi rang bzhin thig le chen po nyid/ 'og min gyi gnas/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i de bzhin nyid/ rig pa 'pho 'gyur med pa'i gzhal yas khang / cing
113a1(rnying rgyud): yang gsal ba'i rgan gyis bsgrubs pa na/ bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen por/ rang bzhin gyi 'khor dang / rang bzhin pa lta ba'i 'khor dang / rang bzhin nyid la gnas pa'i 'khor dang / rang bzhin mngon dug
113a2(rnying rgyud): bar gyur pa'i 'khor dang thabs cig go// de'i tshon brgya byin lha'i dbang pos/ gdul bu'i don shes nas/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba la 'di skad ces bskul to// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi// thun mong bya ba mthar bton nas// gang la
113a3(rnying rgyud): bar mdzes pa yi// dam pa'i gsang ba gsung du gsol// col bral rig pa'i khyad par la// gnyis pa'i don demi gnas te// de nyid snang ba'i byin d+hangs las/ ji ltar 'dod pa so sor gsal// zhes bskyal to// de nas phyogs
113a4(rnying rgyud): bcu'i rgyaya ba thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpa' la mgrin gcig tu 'di skad bskul lo// rang gsal rig pa mchog gi sku// rtsol bral bstan pa thugs la rdzogs// 'dod daglang 'bar ba'i nor bu ltar// gdod nas kun
113a5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs bdag tu gsal// rig pa lhun rdzogs dbyings la bzhugs// bdag gzhan mi mnga' phyogs ris bral// nam mkha' mi 'gyur rtag par blta// rang gsal lhun grub rig pa khyod// gang la rkyen gyis bskul ba ltar// thugs rjes sems
113a6(rnying rgyud): dpar bstan du gsol// zhus so// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' la bskul pas/ lha'i dbang po'i ngo la gsang ba'i bdag por snang bar gyur to// de nas lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// rgyal ba kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs// kun dus byang chub sems kyi dang /
113a7(rnying rgyud): rangags pa nyig gcig dri med pa// bde che na byed kyi sku mchog gis// brjod bral gsang ba'i chos nyid 'di// tshig dang la ge kun bral yang // de nyid brjod pas go bya'i phyir// ye shes gsal bar gsung du gsol// zhes lus so// de nas
113b1(rnying rgyud): gam dzad kying jug pa shes ga pab zhes thab la snyoms par dathugs/ rang nyi ma zung sa nga rnam par bkod pa pas/ rnam par yangs nas 'ang skang ces bskul te// rang byung dag pa'i 'dra 'bang bas// spyan gas pa nyams myong thub padzan// 'a
113b2(rnying rgyud): med rig pa'i don gonas// col thal don pa dgod du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas skyes bu ma brnaMs/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dang byung rig pa mchog gdon// rang rig 'ong gsalags ba'i nyams// 'dzin pa'i dri mdun gyis
113b3(rnying rgyud): dben// brjod bral rig pa dbyings la bzhugs// 'bar ba 'thong kyi rnam pa ltar// kun tugs la zhing nyid du gnas// rang gas pa rig pa chos dbyings la// cho 'phrul bdag rdzogs gnyis pa med// rnab d+hA da dag gi sgra tshig gis/
113b4(rnying rgyud): bathur rtsu ba 'ang de zhanas// gzhan me btsal dayang 'ardzogs// ci meng ma med ci ming gangs// bas ma med rig sa mchog gi phung // ji bzhin nyid lang bzhinags pa// rkyen tha' bar yang ngos kyi phreng // thed mang kris nga nyams
113b5(rnying rgyud): mas// rang thung mchog gsung ba la// yangs pa med pa'i sems kyis gnas// rang gas la dmigs bral ca ba dgongs// shes mdags ba par 'altar// yin na gang du 'angasams pa med// 'khrur mang ca kyig zung
113b6(rnying rgyud): la// the dgang bzhig dasags med lung // yul mang bas mthul s+thA m+b+ha nan/ ta nga bye pa 'a mayin// gagachags 'dzin pa rnam par gtsang // rnam ma kha gsal ba'i bar pa ltar// gas pa la dmigs pa rnam par
113b7(rnying rgyud): bcad// 'byung 'jug med pa 'jog le yis// gsang ba rig pa'i 'khor log // ma gagasal ba'i mo long gis// khyab pas nam mkhang rdzas sra blta// rang byung rig par nga gsal skyes// klu rkyen bral ba'i dbyings la rdzogs
114a1(rnying rgyud): bsam pa sangs ta thangs la gungs// ma 'byung ba 'jugasanyas ma dang / skad me dang ltung rung bab dga'ag/ btsal thab rgyapo dang na kyar// mar byu nga bcag dan gyis gsapa/ ma ma
114a2(rnying rgyud): 'di ni// bsam gyis mi bya 'dus nas shis// mtshol drod kyi snying po ltar// 'du 'bral med par yen sa rdzog sa// dakha na nyid yul med pa// gnyis med rig pa gcig tu bar// gti mug sgo nas bde brgyas// kun 'ang mas ba'i
114a3(rnying rgyud): po 'dra// mtha' bral mngon par mtho ba la// mtshan thal mi rgyud gcig pas med// des na rang bzhag dgongs pas gnas// kun labs la te gtsug la son// 'gyung med sems kyi dgongs pa'o// ye shes bdun 'drang gi rkang las
114a4(rnying rgyud): gleng gzhigs dbang po'u skye dang po'o// / kyi sems dpang can pa/ rang bzhin thams cad nyams rjes ni// bo rdzas te theg pa gcig tugs pa// rang gas pa 'drang zeng ma shes kyis// ji gzhin gling dregs la ba gnas
114a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba dang gsal nyid du bde// nam pakhang khyab pa'i 'od dang ldan// gsal ba dam mkha'i snying po ltar// khyab pa kun gyi rjes su song // sdang ba nam mkha'i mtha' ltar yangs// 'phrul gyi me long gsapa ba'i 'od// phyogs ris med par sa
114a6(rnying rgyud): la 'char// rgya mtshogs la bas med brtags pas// khyab par gsal bas dbyings pa bsdu// ma bcos rang blang snying ba la// sgo slong dag pa'i dbyings pa ngas// bsam pa med pa'i 'du shes can// thuba'o yu ba rnam par bcang
114a7(rnying rgyud): kun snang 'odags la nyag gcig pa// ci yang yin no gang yang rung // ma bsag yon tan de ltar gis pa// rang rig yul med chos kyi dbying // rang gsal ye shes kun tu bzang // rang byung rgyan thal 'jig pa mad// ye shes snang 'ang

114b2(rnying rgyud): sa sgyu

114b4(rnying rgyud): san na// / byang bags

114b6(rnying rgyud): ga na ma gungs da sag

115a1(rnying rgyud): gas byu du sngags pa nyid masasang bas gas / / / da/
115a2(rnying rgyud): smrasapa pabs sadu ma sa cing dag pa gas dza// thams ga pas mang dang shes/ ma parnam nga pa dang sdu sargya
115a3(rnying rgyud): pangs bya thub meng // bas mas pasgrubs pa mdan ma nas/ gang 'du ra bas ma ma snang ba// dag ga pa byas gas / de 'i sa ma 'byung ba da/
115a4(rnying rgyud): rgyal sa pa// yang tham su ma / mtha dadus da cing mi bya// da zhi nyid nga nga ba nagasasu// kun kyang dgas ban sa nyid/ ma sa / sa dang ma 'dis chos du kyag
115a5(rnying rgyud): sa ga nga bas/ ga te ma na te// rig pa dag su pa dbyungs lag/ rang la ng+gA shi dbyings pa 'dra/ nyi ma gsas pa rnyed pa ni// gang lalam 'angs sbyin gyi mardzogs// dar kyang she
115a6(rnying rgyud): gang sang ma ponas d+hagacug // maman pa kyang pas+ho/ dag pas pam ga pan/ mas brnags pa tshig rnam pa na pa gapas / 'dzin pa gnas rigs pa/ nga 'di nga
115a7(rnying rgyud): sa/ ga 'i mig zugs kyang // rgyal byam pa sams / ga du da me / gas padi kyi ngas/ mams
115b1(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / kye sems dpa' chen po/ rang gsal ye shes mnyam nyid la// sgra cho ga badzad pa'i rig pa yis// rdzogs pa'i ye shes mngon gyur na// ye shes 'dags pa nyid du nges// ma bslad rkyen bral nyag gcig pa/
115b2(rnying rgyud): rim pa ma yin dus gcig gsapa// rtsol bral rig pa cir mi dgongs// cir snang rang gsal nyid kyi dbyings// ma btsal ma sbyangs ye nas grub// rig pa ma btsal mngon sum dbyings// smon du med pa rang la rdzogs// dus med pa
115b3(rnying rgyud): rig gsal ba'i lung // bskyod med chos dbyings dam pa nyid/ kun kyang rig pa nyams su skyes// 'byung 'dug mi ga nus cir mau dgrongs// ma bslad ma bcos ye nas 'byung // brgya byin nor bu tso bzhin du// ma btsal gdong nas
115b4(rnying rgyud): lhun gyis grub// rig pa ye shes 'od gsal du// mnyam dang me mnyam chos mi gnas// mtha' dang dbus med ye shes klong // phye dang nad med chos kyi dbyings// ma skyes pa dang mi gnas pas// ma chags pa dang ldan gyis grub// gdod
115b5(rnying rgyud): nas dag pa chen po la// sbyang zhing bgrod pag la yod// dus gsum rgyal ba'i snying po ni// rig pa'i ye shes rang gsal yin// zab mo gsang ba'i des don la// phyogs dang phyogs min chos mi gnas// rig pa rang gas la ye
115b6(rnying rgyud): shes nyid// sbyang pa ma yin gdod nas grub// gnyen pos ma btsal de bzhin nyid// ma bcos mi ga nas rang bzhag pas// ji bzhin rang byung gnas pas gsal// sdang srid 'khor dang 'das pa kun// rang byung rig par rang gsal bas/
115b7(rnying rgyud): sgo dang sbar pa'i chos mi gnas// btsal med ye shes gsal ba ni// khyab par gsal ba'i dmigs dang bral// 'du 'bral med par ye nas 'byung // dmigs bas ma mi spyad rang byung nyid// rang gsal rdzogs pa nyag gcig po// du ma'i chos
116a1(rnying rgyud): bran rdzogs pa'i dang // rnga rlung med par yenas mnyam// rang byung dbyings pas ma g.yos par// kun la snyoms pa 'thugs rnga 'jar// ci yang yinan gang yang rung // bsal med rig pa ma nga la
116a2(rnying rgyud): bzhugs// brjod bral mig nas tshig dang bral// de rtogs sku yi 'khor lo yis// rig pa'i ye shes dad du 'bar// gsal 'dzin mtha' ye zag pa bcad// rang gsal ban yis gsal bar byed// skad med shes rab rnamags
116a3(rnying rgyud): gyis// rig pa bde mchog gsal bar shes// gang zhig de yi rjes 'brangs na// rig pa rang gsal don mi mthong // ye shes gsang pa'i don las gol// bde mchog gsang ba'i lam dang bral// mtshan ma 'khor po'i lam du brgyad
116a4(rnying rgyud): radabyung gsal ba'i lam ma shes/ rang bzhag rig pa'i rgyung tshig gis// ji bzhin ma bco so bo la// brjod bral rang bzhag dgongs pa yin// rang byung dbyings las gsal bar byed// ma bcos gsang yang dgongs pa la/
116a5(rnying rgyud): ma'i rnal 'byor log pa'i lam// mdzun rgal bcos med snying po la// 'dzin pa'i rnam tog log pa'i lung // gang dag rang 'di phyogs na yes// 'dzin pa so sor mthong ba yis// phyogs bral ye shes chen po la// btsal zhing spang pas
116a6(rnying rgyud): don mi mthong// ra snang gcig gi bo la// yengs pa med pas kun tu gsal// nyams myong brjod bral bsal 'dzin mer// 'di la phyogs ris gdod nas med// rang bzhag drag pa shugs kyis so// sa brjod brda mes gsal
116a7(rnying rgyud): sa/ a gcig ye shes radags pa pas// gnyis 'dzin tha dgas pa gyis na/ 'dzin med pa' la nyi shing kAr// gas pa la thong ba 'du shes me // gang yang migs pa 'bring bar srung // mabs mdzeg pa par po
116b1(rnying rgyud): gangs// rang bzhag dgongs pa bsam me khyab// yul bral shes pa 'dzin rdol med// ma yengs pas ma med brjod bral lung // rang gi nyams kyis gsal bar shes// dbus mtha' med pa rig pa la// ma 'jug bsam pa' sems rgyas
116b2(rnying rgyud): gnas// gang dudang mi bzhag rten bral bas// gzhag tu med pa'i don 'di la// de bzhin nyid la goms pa yis// dus gsum ma bcos dgongs pas gzhag/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dgongs pa'i don// mang cos rig pas gsal bar
116b3(rnying rgyud): shes// tshig min don du mnyam sbyar nas/ gang ltar bltas pas de ltar bzhag/ 'di ni rig pa'i nyams su brjod// gdod nas ma bcos ldan grub pa// mtshan ma'i brda yis mnyam sbar nas// sangs medar nga gsal bde chen pa// yenas
116b4(rnying rgyud): ltar gnas bzhin bya// bde ba de yi do nag na// btsal med 'di ni rang la shar// rgyal ba'i 'gongs pa dbyings pa gzugs// spyod la ma gang ltar bde ba bzhin// rang rigags pa la mnyan par bsgom// ma spangs ma btsab shugs kyis gsal/
116b5(rnying rgyud): bral pa'i dran ltar de bzhin nu// ma btsal reg pas 'grub par 'gyur// btsal na 'dzam chu rdo gzugs ltar// 'od gsal 'khor ba'i khams su 'gyur// bebs ma mi dpyang dgongs pa'i gling // yengs med mtshan ma'i sgo spang bcas/
116b6(rnying rgyud): gcig gis kun gyi rang bzhin gsal// dang po de nyid rang nyams rdzogs// ma bcos nyams myong ting 'dzin te// 'khor ba dgas pa snying por grub// thams cad gsal ba'i maN+Dal// gsal pa 'dzin med rang bzhag b+h+yo// ma bcos mnyam
116b7(rnying rgyud): par gnas par bya// ye shes bdun 'byung gi rgyud las/ rang bzhag rig pa'i ye shes mnyam par rtogs pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / kye sems dpa' chen mo/ ye shes goms dang rtags nyid dang // tshul dang blo yi tshul nyi dang / @
117a1(rnying rgyud): bzhag zug phrad mnyam nyi dang // ra 'byung rang gi nyams pa shes// rang gsal ba yin gzhan las min// gnyis kas ma min khyad par gsal// rang rig yul med dus gcig gsal// yin dang /
117a2(rnying rgyud): ma yin phyogs med klong // kun gas pa rig pa'i sgo phye nas// yengs med ma bcos don la zhugs// snying rje bsam med phyogs su brdal// yul med ma bcos de bzhin nyid// ma bsams mi gnas khyad par 'gro// ye nas rig pa'i
117a3(rnying rgyud): thags/ du smrig sma pa gtu bgyusmra ba dag pas sa pan pa sa/ sa byugs pa zhu pa// drin papa ga
117a4(rnying rgyud): kyang // bya bral rig pa cir mi 'dzin// bsam pa'i blo yis zer mi spyad// rang bzhin 'khor lo rim par bskor// 'jug med 'jug bral dgongs pas gnas// bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi dbyings// mtshon pa lam gyi rgyad dang bral// gas
117a5(rnying rgyud): par shes te nu babral// cir yang mi 'dzin de bzhin nyid// gdod nas lhun gyis grub pa'i dang // rang byung 'od gsal gcig la rdzogs// mi gnas rig pa'i dkyil 'khor la// ma bsal ma bsgrubs gdod nas gsal// 'gyung 'jug
117a6(rnying rgyud): med pa'i ye shes kyis// yengs med dbyings pa thabs kyis 'jug/ 'khor ba pa nas sangs rgyas pas// 'od gsal dag pa nyid du gas la// ma bsgribs kun la khyab pa'i 'od// thams cad gsol bar rang bzhin 'chang // 'di la spang brjod
117a7(rnying rgyud): yul dang bral// 'di la bas ma dpyod mtha' dang bral// 'di la rtsol bsgrub mtha' dang bral// 'di la dgag bsgrub kyad las 'das// kun gyi snying po rang phyub la// rig pa gsal bar nyams myong la// kun kyang rangags pa mnyam par
117b1(rnying rgyud): D+yan/ bya pad+ma rangags pa gcig gi phyang // du ma gcag tu gsal bar shes// kun kyang spyan grub snying po nyid// du mar 'dzin pa'i chos mi gnas// mi bsam mi dpyad dang bzhin gzhag/ nam mkhang rdodzarnal dpyor pas// snang sring
117b2(rnying rgyud): theg ler mnyam spor zhing // nam mkha' 'od gsal mnyam par mkhyen// chags pa mi mda' zhen pa dag/ mi 'phro rang gsal gnas pa dang // 'khor ba lhan grub snying po rigs la// ma bcos gsang ba'i sgo gyi nas// dam pa phyir dang
117b3(rnying rgyud): rigs pa 'phrad// rgyal thabs rig pa gdeng gis 'phags// snying rje phyogs ris med par 'char// ting 'dzin rig pa klong du son// ma chags dag pa'i spyod pa yis// kun bzang mdzad pa'i nges pa can// khams gsum sku gsung thugs gsal bas//
117b4(rnying rgyud): sku gsum zhing du rig pas sbyor// ye shes rol pa rang 'char bas// phyogs ris med pa kun las 'byung // rdzogs pa'i 'od gsal mnyam sbyor bas// thugs ze'i dkyil 'khor rang bzhin 'char// byin rlabs ye shes 'od 'chang bas// ma
117b5(rnying rgyud): lus snying po nyid du mthong // gdod nas ma bcos 'od gsal bas// ma yengs gsal ba'i gdeng gis bzhag/ dpal ldan nam mkha' rgyal ba'i sku// ma bcos nyi ma'i snying po ltar// drod rtags cho 'phrul rang bzhin thob// dmigs med spyan
117b6(rnying rgyud): gru rol pa ni// mdzad pa'i gar thabs sna tshogs pa// rig pa gsal bar thabs kyis shes// nyams myong mi sel bsam pa spangs// sku gsung rang bzhin du sa gcig rdzogs// snying po rang bzhin khyab pa ni// gcig gis kun gyi rnam pa
117b7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin// bsam gyis mi khyab dus gci ga 'brel// tshul ni gang du'ang mi spyod pa// yengs pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// bsam gyis mi khyob dbyings la gsal// bdag men gzhan men gang yang min// ma 'phos tshul chu bzhag ltar/
118a1(rnying rgyud): sa sa sgrub pan// rgyag rgyas / dag// mab sngags na gas na rnams
118a2(rnying rgyud): dpa pa ba gnas// tshig thal bstan pa rgya mtsha'i mdzod// dbyings pas dbyings gas la sgrib pa med// mabac+doM sa rdzogs pa'i rnam zung la// 'di yin 'di ma phyogs rnas med// tham rang bzhin ma chis pa// ris pa ldan
118a3(rnying rgyud): sem dang bral// bye dang nad med bde ba'i klong // gsal la dmigs 'jug ma gnas pa// zag med mkhyen pa nyid kyi dang // ma yengs ma badzal sems kyi gnas// 'di ni dang rig sems kyi phung // brjod thal rig pa nyams kyis
118a4(rnying rgyud): la/ drug ca rje tshig meng pa gsapa// byags pa cu byung gi d+hA las/ ye shes dngags su rgya pa Ta pa pa // kyi sems dpa' ldan pa/ gang gi rang bzhin gas yang pa// lag pa rgyags
118a5(rnying rgyud): bsgrib pan// rang gas la badzad daphrad pa yis// ba tsal bral reg pa dzar par 'gyur// bran 'byung snying po brang chub rje// rnam par mi rtog tu ze zab// dmigs bral rig pa'i klung du 'das// zugs chos dbyings phul meng pa/
118a6(rnying rgyud): ra tung snying po gcig pa rdzogs// ye shes mkha' mnyam ska na mang // gsang ba'i ye shes rig pa'i grang // blo sbyar med pa nyid du bstan// phyogs med ye shes khyad par gsal// kun 'thung sgra brjod bral ba la// mig mo lnga bral
118a7(rnying rgyud): mkhar lhor dag/ rang byung dag gi snying po la// gang ltar brtags pa byin ci log/ zhen dug phog pa'i rtsol brgyad kyis// mabacos gsang ba'i dgongs pa bslang// 'dzin sems phog pa'i sngags kyis bcings// mtshan ma 'khor bar
118b1(rnying rgyud): du du// chags / mang dpas rdzumarnags zugs sa / pag sums pa // ma pa bang rdam gyu // ma ga chu/ pa ldag
118b2(rnying rgyud): nam rtog 'khor ba'i khams sa brtags// dang las dpor 'dzin pa ltar// dngos la gnas pa ma yin kyang // log par mngon par len pa'i mthas// rang snang ma bcos ni par brtags// yod med mthor ba khrul pa'i 'am//
118b3(rnying rgyud): sa grol bar 'gyur// srang 'gag 'khrul pa dpa pa lam// ma tshos d+haskapas grol bar 'gyur// gzung 'dzin lta ba gnyis kyi chos// gnyis 'dzin bral bas grol ba bgyur// gnyis kyis gcig pa'i nyos mad lam/ ga
118b4(rnying rgyud): rtog pas rgyal pa lam/ ya ba mthong ba ma la// gas ba sa ng+yas ga ga gis rdul/ snyen bsgru dag pas dag pa rgyal// bdas pas gcing dzum/ la khyod cig sa thal ba gyur/
118b5(rnying rgyud): paganyis kyi lam// gnyis med rig pa 'grub par 'gyur// brda don phrad pa'i rim pa yis// rig pa gsal ba'i don rtogs na// mi rtig rnam grol bde bar gshegs// gsal la nyams myong gang yang min// 'du shes kun bral dbyings
118b6(rnying rgyud): dadu// rig pa mkha' ltar gnas par bya// tshad ma mngon sum chen pa la// rjes dpag shes pa phyin ci log/ mngon 'byung rang gas pa reg pa la// rjes 'jug mtshan mthir mi dgongs// gnyel med gsal bar rtogs pa la/
118b7(rnying rgyud): mabasam mi spyad gnas na grol// ji ltar gnas pas bzhag pa bde// rang bzhag rig pa chen pa la// yengs pa med pas yang sangs rgyas// ye shes gsal bar gnas pa yis// cha mchog blan med pa'as// ngas rtogs grang nas
119a1(rnying rgyud): dem thag/ rang byung sbyin rlabasar mamyor // gsang ba'i ma long thabs kyi tshul// 'ju shas zla la pas rab cadang / pa shes bdun byung ga/ zung bas/ ye shes gsang ba'i nga
119a2(rnying rgyud): lngab // / kyis mas dpa' chen po/ rang byer rig pa mchog nyon cig/ rdo rdzogs par dbyung ba// chu med byed tham chos kyi / rig pa'i 'kha sa bsem ma// gas ba 'a bar martogs par dag /
119a3(rnying rgyud): shes 'khor logs ba da/ ting 'a nags pa pa'i yang mal/ bsam pa'i 'dzin pa ngas pa// kun lagadas thang bas shul// dbang gas ba tu dag pa //
119a4(rnying rgyud): zla ga yas/ gsal la dmigs pa da pas na// bsam med dran med meg yob// rnam par mi tog mchog gi sa // da la marnam pa gyid mi gnas pas// mchog ye shes ra bdags pa// snang ba rnam ga
119a5(rnying rgyud): mab hU~M/ rdzun 'byung rtog pa'i rjes mye byung // ma bskal mardzogs rbab thaMdang/ ma sapa bzhag pa pasgrub pa rtog pa' sa gas papa'// ye shes nyi ma thogs brdal ngas/
119a6(rnying rgyud): bzhin rang bzhin rnam par dag/ rgya mdzeg mo med de bzhin du// rnam chog meg po tshar ming dgongs// rang byung gsapa ba nam mkha' // masras gsu pa nyid pa 'dus// gsang ba kun 'dus men pa'i gtad// mtha
119a7(rnying rgyud): khyab rig pa'i mangs nyid ni// khyab par gas pa la 'dzin pa men// rang byung rig pa rang shar ba// khyab pa gas pa padangs po med// rang gags pa 'ji ma nas cis// ra brjongs gas pa po nyid du ma khyen// tog ma dgas
119b1(rnying rgyud): rims kyi dbyangs// gsang ba rang thang rig pa'i klong // rdzogs chen theg le ji bzhin la// mnyam par dgongs med rig pas gzhag/ byung zing g.yo dgoga'i skyed pa// gsal med reg pa nyid kyi gsal// rdzogs chen ma bcos dgos
119b2(rnying rgyud): pa la// gang ltar bcos pa log pa'i lam// ma bcos rig pa mnyam sbyar na// sgo bral rig pa'i 'khor lo las// thugs rje reg pa'i byin dra bas ni// ma btsal nyi ma'i 'od ldang 'byung // gsal ba mtha' dbus med pa pa// rigs mnyam
119b3(rnying rgyud): de sems kyis blta// gtan 'dzin med pa'i rig pa yis// rang byung lhag par gzhag par bya// rang byung rig pa cing mi dgongs// rang gsal 'khor lo rgyun mi gcad/ ye shes bdun 'byung gi klud las/ ye shes 'khor lo'i le'u sa drug
119b4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / kye sems dpa' chen po/ rang bzhag rig pa'i dgongs pa ni// ji bzhin mngon du gsal byas nas// rin chen 'bang ba' 'od gsal bas// sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'bar bar byed// 'dzin phral rig pa'i cha
119b5(rnying rgyud): dbyings la// bsam med 'gyur med mkha' ltar gnas// bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi dbyings// gang dag byis pa'i 'du shes kyis// rang byar rig pa'i ye shes la// bsam bral rig pa'i mtshan nyid de// bstan pa don gyis go bar zad// dngos
119b6(rnying rgyud): grub rin chen 'od ltar 'byung // zag med phra bkod mkha' dkyil pa/ nyi zla gzang skar bkram pa ltar// ma 'dres rig pa dbyings la gsal// de nyid mi gnas rang bzhin ni// kun 'byung rin chen phyogs med shar// 'phel 'gro ba rtog pa mi gnas
119b7(rnying rgyud): pas// nyi mang 'od ltar lhun thub pa// kun pa ji ltar 'dod par 'char// mkha' ltar khyab la gsal ba che// me tog dbyings kyi rang lags la// 'od dngo 'od can je bzhin du// ma bcol lhun gyis grub pa'o// ma yengs ya la bzhag da
120a1(rnying rgyud): pado// bsam ma rig pa'i gdang gis ni// spangs pa ma pan gtod nam sa// ma grod bla ma'is mchog na// dus gcig gnas pas brgyad du med// phyag rgya mi 'chid sngags mnas// tshogs pa
120a2(rnying rgyud): ma byed de// kha dog bre dang mchod pa yang // mthus dngos brab mchog tu gyur// ji phreng rtsol ba'i rnamathangs dge'o// dam ga nga grong byur te// la btsal ma spangs gang nas dge/ blang po dag pa'i phyag rgya can// gas
120a3(rnying rgyud): 'ogs pa krong la 'jug/ brjod thal sgra yi dkyil 'khor ba// nyan bra la rig pa'i tshul gyis gsal// gsapa pa nyid rna mi dmigs pas// rtog zal nam mkharang rnyings kyi grong // 'di zhes bya zhing dmigs pa mar// ji ltar gnasapa
120a4(rnying rgyud): debazhin gnas// rang bzhag rig pa yangs med klong // phyogs med ye shes khyab par gsal// gnyis med nam mkha'i dbyangs par gsal// ye shes bdun 'thung gi chung las/ ye shes grub pa'i le'u sa bdud pa'o//
120a5(rnying rgyud): sa gas pa ba gnas/ 'ab stan ba / rnamams yin pas te/ stsa wa shes bying sa tshul ba ba nga// 'gro me nga bathul pa
120a6(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa dam pa mchog/ ci yang me bas ma bsam pa rtogs pa'i rgyun// dgongs pa rang byung ldan grub khyong phyag 'tshal// bltar med sbyang med mthong mang yi nas de bzhin nyid// lnga pa'i rgyal sor phyag 'tshal gnyis med khyod pa 'dud// mthong bar mings
120a7(rnying rgyud): ba cig kun dang bral// ma byas ma thungs ma btsal rkun gyis thub pa'i dang // rang gisil pa bcos rig pa gang yang med// theg pa 'gro 'dra ma yin bdag nyid ldan gyis thub// phyogs thal lung grub 'od gas pa rig par dbyung dbyang sa/ chom
120b1(rnying rgyud): 'jig mi gnas gsal bar mar me 'dra// bstan pa'i rgyal po yang gsang rig pa'i gter la 'dud// de nas nas pa'i yang gter 'di// rin chen gsapa pa'i glegs pa ma 'di// ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' yis// gsal ba'i rig pa rgyas btab
120b2(rnying rgyud): nas// mkha' dkyil sbas pa lha dbang gi// spyis blang yang dag dbang thob nas// sprul pa nyid la rab tu bshad// de nas rdo rje'i gdan stengs su// yang sprul thugs kyi sras rnams la// rgyal thabs spyi glags dbang bskur nas// ma bgrod
120b3(rnying rgyud): rtog pa'i 'jig las bsgral// rnam gro la sa la bde bar gshegs// de bzhin 'od gsol rnal 'byor la// shes rab dag pas mnyam sbyar na// rdzogs chen lhun grubs la sbyor// gang zhig dad pas 'dzin klog la// bsod nams brjod par
120b4(rnying rgyud): nus te// skal ba dman pa'i yul min la// srog dang bral ba'i kha bzhin bya// rgyal tshab nges pa gcig la gtad// sbas pa thugs kyi nyi ma 'di// yang gseng rig pa'i gter du gzhag/ gnas kyang sbom du nges par sra// ye shes bdun
120b5(rnying rgyud): gyi rgyang las/ rjes su yi ring ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / ye shes bdun 'byung ba'i rgyud sems kyi me long chen po rdzogs so// di la pos brgya sa patsas// rgyag skad du/ ma hA san+ni d+harma tA bo d+hi tsit+ta marga la ni yA mA pra ka Ta k+Shi ta ta n+yan ma/ bod skad
120b6(rnying rgyud): du/ rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid byang chub kyi sems bkra shis mi 'gyur bar gsal bar gnas pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa'i dus gcig na/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang chen las/ bde
120b7(rnying rgyud): bar gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das// sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po dpal// rdo na cu gsung thugs kyi bdag/ bde chen lhun gyis rdzogs pa yis// phyogs bus bde gshegs kun bdag nyid// dkyil 'khor chen pos mdzes par brgyan// sngang
121a1(rnying rgyud): ba rnam par 'phrul pa yis// ma 'gags cha bar rab tu bkod// dkyi 'khor kun 'byung bzang po'i mkha'// kun bzang tsho 'phrul ma 'gags par// sna tshogs bdog rnam gsal zhing // snga chags dbyings brgyan
121a2(rnying rgyud): da dpa// ma ma'i byaN+Da la 'gag med dzes/ skri ba med no/ 'i mngangs swAhA/ thams cad ming lag+sa gang 'i/ de ting gsusungs d+ha mas zer/ bab po'i mtshan nyid 'arjod pa tshog/ rnams das pa la 'ang gcang
121a3(rnying rgyud): chos rnams thams cad de lta bu// dpe yi tha snyad kun tu bral// rang nyid ngo bos ston byed pa'i// mthar thug chos kun rgyal ba'i gsung // theg pa'i bye brag rgya chen po// ma lus lus pa med par sgrogs// so so'i mtshan nyid gsal ston cing /
121a4(rnying rgyud): zabs mkhas 'gro ba'i rgyud smin mdzod// thams cad gzod nas zhi ba'i chos// nam mkha' lta bur skye 'gag bral// rang bzhin lhan grub 'gyur ba med// gcig tu ma nges sna tshogs dngos// ma bdes yongs rdzogs gsal ba yi// yul
121a5(rnying rgyud): sems gnyis med me long ltar// gnyis can dngos can ma lus pa// mtha' rnams kun pas grol ba yis// zung 'jug gnyis med gnyis su gsal// bdag don rdzogs pa'i stobs rdzogs pa'o// gdul ba'i dbang po khams rnams dang //
121a6(rnying rgyud): mched bye brag ci lta ba// dus phyogs rgyud kun bsdus pa rnams// so sor rtogs gsal chu 'bras bzhin// rdzogs pa'i rtsal gyis kun don slong // bya ba mthar phyin sbyong ba med// bdag nyid chen po'i rang bzhin la// spros med snying po byang chub su//
121a7(rnying rgyud): sems yul bapa bde chen rgyal// thams cad mkhyen pa lha yi lha// gzhal yas khyad par 'phags pa'i tshul// mtshan mchog sum thu rtsa gnyis dang // dpe byad brgyad cu'i bdag nyid can// bde ba'i ye shes kun 'gyung gnas// stobs bcu
121b1(rnying rgyud): pa gung / dus dru' las 'bras 'dums par byad/ yang ngags na byung ga sa// du sa das ngas// ngang dun ma nga na kyang/ dab gas ba thangs canas/
121b2(rnying rgyud): narnas pa bsgra bral bzhin// tshogs chos layongs sngon rdzogs// byang shing rol bar / phyogs batha~Mng yang ba 'a yas las/ 'dag kyi pa byor tshul banan kya/ klan mangs lakhyi pa kun thA nga /
121b3(rnying rgyud): ngas sa / depe 'a mal / ltu ba na
121b4(rnying rgyud): kyang chu byarnabs nga mang can// ma tshogs 'jug pa byed pa gro// rdo rje rje btsul rten pas// phyog sa rnams kun nas bskul ma dang // 'brum ma rgyal mjug shes// rang gnas yang 'ams dkyil 'khor byur// mdzes
121b5(rnying rgyud): gang bya sa sa/ nga / 'ang// / rnams nga ma dpal lazugs pa/
121b6(rnying rgyud): su/ la / 'a gas smra /
121b7(rnying rgyud): dzag// nga dgegs batham pa'o// ti dzin pa rnams can da rnapas su gyung shi nga// sngagasung grags la pang ba ma du/ 'ag shebs thugs kyi gas mchag nas/ dmapa ma
122a1(rnying rgyud): gzung dan / thangs rgyan nyas mang pa// rlung 'di bstan par drabang byung ban/ rnam chog tung rlabs sa das dag/ ra/ du gags ma byang/
122a2(rnying rgyud): sbyin nam snyan du grags// d+ha mngon pa gnas mchog por// khyad par rgyud kyi tshul 'byung bste// dus ldan sngar na tshad mete// phran su mtshogs pa'i rtsar gyur ba'i// rtogs la chen po chos nyid byang chub kyi sems papa shis mi 'gyur bags pa dang
122a3(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i rgyang las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u sa dang po // bde rje dkun tu bzang po nyid// rang 'dzin gnas bzhugs ni// 'khor tshogs sun dza ma du mdzad// 'di dag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor che// yon tan kun 'byangs
122a4(rnying rgyud): ga pa sa/ sngags du shA / dag zug gyur chubs nga / byas pa sa migs mas dang / mas ra
122a5(rnying rgyud): stan par mdzad// da tsha ska las 'od rdo dang // 'dzum mdangs byin nas phyag rgya'i tshogs// ral pa'i zin las kun tu bzang // slo gsums pa zhing gsal bar mjed// slong brgyad sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // kun nas 'dun pas phyag
122a6(rnying rgyud): zhing // bde gshegs byin rlabs rol pa'i rgyan// sna tshogs yon tan gsal bar snang // rdo rje sems mchog gtso bo yis// mi gnyis ye shes kun brtags te// rang gi gnas las bzhengs mdzad nas// zhu mjog mi 'jigs tshul gzigs
122a7(rnying rgyud): shing // chos kun 'gas bu'i bor bzhugs// rol po'i byin rlabs pas pa me che ba// phrin las sna tshogs rnam dun spyod// drag po'i gtumatshogs ni mdang cing // tshong bang 'byor rnams rgyas pa'i tshul// gzhan dag 'dod ngan dbang gi las/
122b1(rnying rgyud): mdu gnas kun gsad pas 'dul// las tshogs phrin las mtha' yas pa// skad cig yud la grub par mdzad// bya ba rdzogs pa'i mdzad pa yis// yul las grol ba'i phrin sras bdag// sangs sras kun 'dus ston pa gaH// rngub
122b2(rnying rgyud): mnga' brnyes tshul gyis brgyan// kun tu chos sku 'du 'bral med// kun tu longs spyod gnas su rtags// kun tu sprul spu'i rgyun ldan pa// kun tu 'khor ba mya ngan 'das// chos dbyings grong khyer nyams dga' ba// 'og minan 'don par mtho ba'i
122b3(rnying rgyud): zhing // gnas mchog stug po bkod pa'i khams// gnas kun zil gyis gnon gyid pa'i// rnam par 'phags pa'i zag pas bstod// yon tan ma 'gags pa ye brgyan// dus gsum sangs rgyas bzhugs pa yi// gnas mang 'dus pa'i
122b4(rnying rgyud): mchog klan can// dam pa rin chen tshogs kyis sbas// 'dod longs bsam pas 'grub pa dang // dkyil 'khor lha mo'i rgyan bcas pa'i// khang pa gru bzhi sgo khyud can// sgo khang rtababs rgyan gyis mdzes// tA ra Na bzhi'i tshogs bkod pa/
122b5(rnying rgyud): rje 'khor lo rin chen gzugs// pad+ma sna tshogs mtshan ma yis// ka gdung phreng ba steng 'og logs// pa tra'i phreng ba phyogs dang mtshams// rnam gsal shar bu do sha la dang // 'phan gdugs rgyal mtshan rnga yab dril// rin chen 'bar ba'i khri steng
122b6(rnying rgyud): la// zla ba nyi ma pad+ma'i gdan// stobs mchog mi 'jigs rdzu 'phrul dang // thogs med shes bya'i gang chen mtsho// rang gi de bzhin nyid la bzhugs// de tshe 'khor tshogs rgya chen po// gnyis med mnyam par 'khor pa yi// rang bzhin
122b7(rnying rgyud): nam dag ngo bo nyid// dmigs med gsal ba'i yul 'dug pa// mnyam nyid zung 'jug gnyis su med// ku nags la rtogs pa sna tshogs rgyung // mdzad pas don kun mtha phyi dul// sangs rgyas phun pa po nying / du rnaMs mi blod thugs kyi dngos
123a1(rnying rgyud): tshul bzhin snang mdzad sku yi mchog/ kun 'byung phung po yon tan che// rnam dag dri med chags mdzod gsung // kun tu phrin las don yod pa// bde gshegs thams cad tshul 'jug pa'o// chos dbyings kun tu skyon dang
123a2(rnying rgyud): bral// gnas kun rnam dag gzigs pa'i spyan// 'dod pas sdud byed yon tan bskyed// dri med na bza' smin pa'i sku// kun spyod drugs rjes sgrol bar byed// bcom ldan gnyis med 'brel pa'i gzungs// pha rol gyin 'i gro' ba'i zla// yon
123a3(rnying rgyud): har bkod des rgyal po dpal// pad+ma rnam dug 'jig rten spyan// rnga sgra sgrogs byed stobs mchog las// byams chen mya ngan dri ma med// yon tan kun 'byung spobs pa brtsegs// dpal gyi seng ge bdud dpung 'joms// gzi byin phung po
123a4(rnying rgyud): rin chen mdzod// pad+mo'i mtshan mchog rgya mtsho mchog/ 'khor tshogs gzhan dag bskul bar byed// thams cad blo gros gcig par gyur// gsung gcig tshul gyis gsol 'debs shing // sna tshogs mchod pa ra dral 'bul// phyag 'tshal
123a5(rnying rgyud): yang yang gsol ba 'debs// gus pas thal sbyar rtse gcig pa'o// rgyal ba kun gyi de bzhin nyid// ye shes snying po'i gnas bzhugs pa// sku gsung thugs las sprul pa'i tshogs// rgyu rkyen med par ston mi mdzad// bde bar bsten gtso bo
123a6(rnying rgyud): mchog/ thugs rje dri med dngos po'i don// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor kun snang ba// rgyu rkyen gang las byung ba yin// 'gog pa mi mnga' thugs rje can// pad+me 'i spyan ring kun tu gzigs// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i dgongs do na gsang // dus
123a7(rnying rgyud): 'dir snang ba'i skabs la sogs so// de nas kun bzang bde chen dpal// thams cad chos kyi don mnga' bas// rang gnas ma g.yos kun tu sdang // phyogs bzur ston pa'i tshul bzhugs shing // pad+ma'i gar gyis gdul bya'i tshogs// kur
123b1(rnying rgyud): 'dus ma gas bsnad par mdzad // thams cad gsang pa'i dkyil 'khong dadang / byangasams pa pas dbang bskur zhing // dmachog can po'i gnas bstan tu// gros stod gyi byung bar bzhin/ rdzogs can byang chub sams kyang na// drang
123b2(rnying rgyud): mdzeskaras bstan par dgongs// 'di dag thams cad spangs rgyas nyid// byang sems bde ba'i snying po can// ye nas gnas te 'gyur ba med// yon tan tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i gzhi// chu tid dag su rkyen 'bras bu// rnam ngag 'ji ga shegs
123b3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor las// glo bur 'khrul pa'i rigs rnams kyis// byang chub sems las rtogs pa'i chos// chu yi rlabs kyis rgya mtsho bzhin// ma g.yos rang sar gnas ma rtogs/ rgya rten 'bras bu'i gnas las gzhan// byang chub po chen don
123b4(rnying rgyud): bral ba// dus 'dir thugs rje chen po'i dugs// thabs mang theg bsdus nges mchog don// ston pa'i tshul ldan khyed rnams kyis// legs par bzung byos bdag gzhan don// sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka'// dgongs pa'i don mchog
123b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis med pa// da lta ma 'ongs rlabs pa'i lam// gnyis med 'bras bu theg pa'i mchog/ nges par chos kun sngon gyi gnas// bde gshegs 'byung gnas tshul kun ldan// de las lhag pa'i gnas med de/ rang byung ye shes gsal ba'i
123b6(rnying rgyud): klang// zhes gsungs so// rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid byang chub kyi sems bkra shes mi 'gyur bkasal bar gnas pa'i rgyud pas/ gleng slong ba'i la'u ste gnyis pa // de nas rdo rje sems dpa' la// rigs paning rgyal ba
123b7(rnying rgyud): bdagashegs bcas// yu mtshogs 'grel bas bstod pas te// mchod cing phyag 'tshal 'dun pas gnas// a mai ho bde gshegs kun gyi sgra// mtshan bzang dpe byad phun su ma tshogs// kun 'byung snang ba dgag med pa'i// yon tan
124a1(rnying rgyud): na sa// 'don byar bzhi grangs las 'das// dza tha ra byam/ zhugs rdzogs pa pas ldan las gzub pa sal/ sa na da
124a2(rnying rgyud): martog ye shes kun nas gsal// dus kun bdud rtsod tshogs bral zhing // thams cad mdzad par rnam par rol// khyod mig ye shes dri ma med// kun 'byung rgya mtshog nas mkhyen pas// thams cad chos kying bzhin nyid// zung rngu gas
124a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i sngags don mchog/ ston pa ji ltar sangs rgyas pa'i// rnam grol gsang 'gyur lam 'bras bu/ byin rlabs rang gi ngo bo sra// dzal 'byung gleng gzhi ji ltar chags// gsang gsum ma tshig gtso bo ma// dkyil 'khor nyams dga'
124a4(rnying rgyud): mthong ba las// rab tu grol ba'i sangs rgyas gang // rim par gyur ba tshul ji ltar// ya nas lhun gyis grub pa'i dbyings// rang bzhin gnas pa'i rgyal ba mchog/ de las rab tu gsal byas pa'i// byin rlangs che 'bru ba de ltar snang /
124a5(rnying rgyud): sa dang da dang ba / bdag nyi nas ma dmigs // masar btags pa'i chashes nyid/ da mir ba gdams pa na pa'i thal/ chol thal da bzhin togs pa'i/ ngam byang sa pa sa// ga
124a6(rnying rgyud): rtag je bzhin nyid// bsgom bya 'jug pa bdag nyid che// pe rtog gnas pa ma 'gags chos// gsal bar drong rtags rnam sngangasu// kun tu bzang po 'byung ba med/ yon tan ma 'gags slo ba bral chos// ngong po ning sod pa'i rkyen gyis
124a7(rnying rgyud): la 'bras pa byeng chub lam// zag pa'i tshu kun pas pags pa'o// byab rgya latshul pa'i cheng medapa/ kyi bang phyag zus ga // rjes bu gras ca pa phra/ khye rba dngangs/
124b1(rnying rgyud): par gnas la bzugs// kun gyi dran mong ma yin pa'o// dpe yi 'thad pa ci lta bus// don gyi snying po bcol bar bya// bdag gzhanang po ji ltar 'tshal// thams cad sku mchog ye shes che// bkun rdzas gtan la dbab pa cha// dus 'dra
124b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo gnas kun la// dri med 'bras bu theg pa'i mchog/ rigs mchog shes rab nam mkha'i dbyings// byang chub sems nyid bshad par mdzod// rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid bkra shes ni chur pa gsal bar gnas pa'i rgyud las/ de kho na nyid zhus pa'i le'u
124b3(rnying rgyud): ste gsum pa'o// / sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos grub mchog/ rdzogs che byang chub sems kyi dbyings// shes rab chen pos brtags dka' ba'i// gnyis med ting 'dzin dam pa las// stobs mchog gtso bo zhi mdzad de// chos
124b4(rnying rgyud): kun snang gsal ston par mdzad// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa'i gzugs// ma skyes skye ba cho 'phrul sgo// ma 'gags phyag rgya chen po'i chos// snang med dkyil 'khor sna tshogs byung // brjod med zab mo rgya chen sogs// rang byung
124b5(rnying rgyud): ye shes kun gsal gzhi// yon tan rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor las// mdzad pa sna tshogs kun tu snang // de nas kun tu bzang po dpal// shes rab gzings dang 'khril sbyor zhing // phyogs dus kun tu gzigs dgongs nas// chos
124b6(rnying rgyud): kun ji ltar sangs rgyas pa// rang gi ngo bo bshad par mdzad// ston pa'i bye brag grangs med med// gnyis snang thun mong khyad par tshul// spyi yi sangs rgyas snang srid dngos// khyad par rgyud tshul rtogs pa'i don// chu 'bras gdul bya'i
124b7(rnying rgyud): snang ba bzhin// rigs mchog dkyil 'khor bla na med// dngos por byung ba'i tshul gyis ni// bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor reg pa'i mchog/ stong gsal rdo rje thugs kyi dngos// sra brtan bde gshegs sku yi mchog/ bsreg smin pad+mar
124b8(rnying rgyud): ngam/
125a1(rnying rgyud): rnam dag gsungs gsheng su byam pa na byas/ 'ayang bas rabaldan pas// mnas rgyan pa'i rnam 'thul bas/ na pa spyong babyang rnas na/ ma byang chung sams kyis brgyan
125a2(rnying rgyud): kun snang stong pa go snyoms skyes// zung du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can// de dag so sor ma 'gags pa'i// dkyil 'khor gsang pa'i thig le nyid// 'gro 'di ye nas sangs rgyas te// kun snang rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal// 'dod
125a3(rnying rgyud): gsum dbang mdo gsungs// zhe sdang thugs rje rdo rje'i yul// gti mug mi 'byed chos sku gshegs// nga myal ba dag bral yon tan rin// phrag dong / nog bral las nyid du// ye mes rnam dag ldan gyis grub// gzugs phung bar
125a4(rnying rgyud): gshegs sangs rgyas su// tshor ba rin chen bkod pa'i tshogs// 'du shes mtha' yas sna tshogs rgyun// 'du byed don grub tshogs pa'i bdag/ rnam shes rdo rje 'gyur ba med// snang ba rang rgyud mtha' bral ba'i// rigs mchog lha mo gnyis
125a5(rnying rgyud): med snor// zung 'jug gsang ba'i sngags ldan pa// bskyed pa'i dus na skye med cing // thig med ye shes lhag pa'i rgun// lbu bzos mtshungs chu bur bzhin// smig rgyu chu shing snying po nyid// sngar grag dri rgyun ro yi rdzas// reg bya
125a6(rnying rgyud): bde batshes rnams kun// s+yam gyur lce sgo stong pa nyid// gnyis med lhan thub chos rnams kun// bde chen ldan med pa'i sgra// thub mo gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ze// rang po zhan spun grub par chen dbyings// ye shes lhan rdzab rtogs gas
125a7(rnying rgyud): pa// dam pa'i bo rlung rim dgongs pa'i don// gnyis med rdzogs pa byang chub sems// dus gsum gcig par rtag ba zhugs pa'i// bcom ldan bdud bzhis mi shigs pas// rnam dag dkyil 'khor kun 'thung spu// mtshan bzang dang /
125b1(rnying rgyud): t+yang ga 'khor ldan// gsang gsum nga mjug 'da' ma byang // thams cad kun ma byan sle babral ste// rigs mchag bkod pa'i grong ldar thas// gnyis mang gzugs sbal bral ba las// dbang chags zhang khams bkod pa dang / byang rngub par/
125b2(rnying rgyud): dpa'i 'khor slong zhing // mi gnyis ye shes che lnga ldan// sprul sku'i mdzad pa rgyun mi gcad// rang gi yon tan longs spyod rdzogs// thugs rjes gzhan la kun ston cing // stong gsum til gyi gong bu ltar// thams cad ma lus med par snang //
125b3(rnying rgyud): dag gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// dbang bskur byan rlabs sngags kyi mthus// rang gi dam tshig mchog la gnas// thams cad chos kyi de bzhin nyid// dam pa'i bka' thob 'jigs las grol// grong khyer gsang pa'i gnas mthong nas/
125b4(rnying rgyud): shes rab chen po nges par gnas// phung po khams sogs skye mched rgyun// thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid du// byang chub sems kyis gcod byed cing // de yi rang bzhin de nyid de// gnyis med zung du 'jug pa'i tshul// gsang ba bzhi las lam 'bras
125b5(rnying rgyud): ris kyi dmigs pa'i dus na snang / rgya rkyen 'bras bu me 'dogs shing // mtshon byed lam gyi rim par byung // bde gshegs su lnga ye shes lnga// 'bras bu gsang chen ye nas gnas// ma rdog rtogs pa'i thabs ston kyang // khyad par zos la
125b6(rnying rgyud): gzhan na med// des na rgyal ba kun gyis kyang // byang chub sems las 'da' ba med// 'di nyid kun gyi yum gyur yum// chos mdzod kun gyi gzhir gyur pa'o// de rtogs gnas las 'gyur med cing // chos kun byang chub chen po'i lam// srin
125b7(rnying rgyud): cing grol ba'i thabs dam pa// theg pa kun gyi rtse mo mchog/ gsang ba bdud rtsi 'azung byed pa// rgyal ba kun gyi sras mchog yin// rang gi rang bzhin gas rab las// bde gshegs sgra dang ye shes la// nyon mongs rnam dag byang chub
126a1(rnying rgyud): sems// chos lnga ldan pa'i sangs rgyas ni// gzhan nas 'byung zhing thob min te// bsod nams ye shes gter las skyes// thams cad drang gi pos spyod // dngas gcig sgyu mchen po'i dngos// ya mtshan
126a2(rnying rgyud): rang du byung ba las// sangs rgyas rnams ni gzings mo mdzad// dbang po drug la brten bya ste// nang gi rnam shes skad cig rgyun// gzugs kyi chos sku snang srid stong // ske yi chos skra grags su stong // dri yi chos nyid tshor ba stong // ro yi
126a3(rnying rgyud): chos kun myong bas stong // reg bya'i chos kun reg pas stong // chos kun bsam pas rnam par stong // rab 'bring tha ma'i dngos kun gang // bde chen ye shes nyid kyi dngos// sangs rgyas kun gyi byin rlabs kyis// nam mkha'i mthar thug/
126a4(rnying rgyud): khyab par gnas// kha dog dbyibs rgyan yon tan tshogs// dus gsum rang gi mtshan nyid ston// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi// rang bzhin ro bo rnam par 'phrul// theg chen chos kyi 'khor lo nyid// rtag tu rang gi gnas nags pa//
