126a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad dang // sras bcas byang chub sems kun gyis// rgyal ba'i bka' la yi rang nas// mngon par bstod rje mchod pa mdzad// e maM ho sangs rgyas bcom ldan sku// yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// kun tu chos 'khor rgyun mi 'chad//
126a6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor sna tshogs 'khor lo mdzes// zhes so// rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid byang chub kyi sems bkra shis mi 'gyur bar gsal bar gnas pa'i rgyud las/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs ston pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / gzhan du
126b1(rnying rgyud): rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo// grangs mang kun gyis gzigs pa dag/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bkod pa de// byin rlabs yon tan gung las byung // de dag 'khor gyis rno tshom las// ston pa'i snang bsgo dbye mdzad// thams cad mkhyen par ye shes/
126b2(rnying rgyud): kyis// dus gsum snang ba'i lung bstan mchog/ stong gsum 'jig rten mtha' yas pa// rdul snyed bgrang ba'i mtha' las 'das// dbyibs rgyan snang ba sna tshogs kun// brtan g.yo sangs rgyas zhing khams mchog/ rin chen bkor ba'i
126b3(rnying rgyud): gnas 'di yi// phyogs bcu rab 'byams bskal pa'i dus// bgrang 'das gsum gyi bar mtshams su// smon pa ji ltar sangs rgyas zhing // bstan pa'i 'dul ba'i snod ji ltar// byung tshul gsang ba'i khyad par don// 'di yi thog ma grangs
126b4(rnying rgyud): med nas// stobs pa can gyis sbyin pa'i klong // gang zag 'phags pa'i rigs mtshungs pa'i// chos skyod rgyal po'i blo gros dang // chos kyi sems dpa' sems bskyed do// yun ring sbyin sogs 'gro ba'i don// re zhig na yang rang sangs
126b5(rnying rgyud): rgyas// rdzu 'phrul mgyogs pa zhes bya bas// grong khyer kun tu rnam 'phrul ston// mya ngan 'das pa'i sku gdung la// 'od byung rkyen gyis sems kyi don// chos nyid snying po 'du 'bral med// rtogs tshig sgrogs shing gnas byas te// dus kun
126b6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur med gsal ba las// thams cad mkhyen pa'i yum sbyor to// sgrib tshogs bag chags gnas su dag/ bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs// phyogs btsa'i dkyil 'khor sa le bar// chu byin 'dra bar 'bras bu'i chos// stobs
126b7(rnying rgyud): bcu mi 'jigs bzhir bcas pa'i// mtshon dpe rgyan sogs spyod yul dang // zhing khams yongs su dag par 'gyur// de yi tshe na stong gsum 'di// lan grangs du mar g.yo zhing bskyod// lha yi rol chen me tog chang // 'od bcas phyogs
127a1(rnying rgyud): bzang 'alags par 'dang / ngartan sa da'angagatan bams// byangs nas byung// rag 'a byung chub pam pa bka// drud bdugs chung dra blags// zag pa byas pa 'dus
127a2(rnying rgyud): shes rab snying rje'i bdag nyid can// 'gro rnams gas pa'i gnas chog 'dir// dbang gaslar ngamadzeg sbyin par mdzad// gsang mchogadam par thar pa'i to// za cings rje theg pa'i mchog/ 'dun banyis kyang du 'jug pa tha
127a3(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu lam du ston pa'o// rba shing ri ngos soklas pas// byang chub sems nyid mazo dbyed pa// rnas pa'i rnams son byed par/ thams cad bde na byung chub sems// rdzogs pa'i chos nyid ste 'gag med// dade rdza sa nu na sa
127a4(rnying rgyud): yon tad dkyil 'khor pa 'gags pa'o// nyi dam jug rje nga bras// drings pang 'gyur ba med/ ra ba rgyas tshogs pa gags pate// ye shes che por thal snang ba/ mum par gyun sa dang /
127a5(rnying rgyud): da pa rjes// thams cad mtsha cas blo tha ga/ nyid de kyi mya 'gyur bzing // dge mdzanas na byas sngags tshal nyid 'dzang pa dkar// rang bzhin ngan pa'i gta tshogs byas/
127a6(rnying rgyud): da 'dun pa/ gas pa gagasang pa dang da// sangs kyis nga mis mau pa d+hA/ des ragyul zhen parjo ma pag 'grol ba sa bcas pa/ ba gsheg
127a7(rnying rgyud): shems pa la 'a kyi ga/ pa gas sa rgyas/ sa ngas sa
127b1(rnying rgyud): gad+har gyi 'byung gnas la// sngon dang byang chub mtshag sems brgyur// gsang rdza sa dkyil 'khor 'jug pa'i thabs// dbang bskur nga ma chog dri ma med// shes rab rnam dag rgyas pa'i mthus// mthong ba 'tshal rnam par grol/ spring
127b2(rnying rgyud): tshogs bag chags gnas ngan len// rang byung bde chen rdzogs pa'i sku// sku mchog mtshan dang dpe byad gas la// gsung mchog sprul pa'i yi ger ldan// thugs mchog skye med dbyings su rtogs// yon tan ma 'gags phrin las rdzogs//
127b3(rnying rgyud): dus mtshungs sku gsum ye shes kyis// zhing khams bcu drug sbyor bar mdzad// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs// grangs med bkod pa kun tu gsal// ri rab rgya mtsho grags pa'i gling // mu khyud mtha' can gser gling dang //
127b4(rnying rgyud): gshog mtha' mtshon cha zhi ba'i gnas// 'od bkad sA la'i 'byung gnas ste// don mchog ut+pal bzang po can// dpal ldan pad+ma'i phreng bas mdzes// lha yi bkod pa yan lag skyes// mkhas rtse yon tan lha yi rigs// sangs rgyas
127b5(rnying rgyud): gser can me tog can// dbang phyug drag po rdo rje'i snying // rin chen phyag rgya yon mchog lha// thugs rje chen pos sa gsung mdzad// seng ge bde gsal 'gugs byed dbang // zhi ba'i bshes gnyen kun tu brgyan// grol te dpal gyi zla ba'i
127b6(rnying rgyud): 'ong // rang gi wang khams grangs med par// theg pa sna tshogs 'jug pa'i thabs// 'khor gyi gtso bo gsang ba'i snod// sprin mdzad grol ba'i dbang mchog bstan// thams cad gdod nas ma skyes la// snad pa'i dngos kun ga dang ma 'gang//
127b7(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin byang chub sems kyis brgyan// ye shes chen po'i gnas la skyes// man ngag snying po de bzhin nyid// chos kun 'byung ba'i rtsabs te// dus gsum gcig par 'gyur med par// gsang ba'i rgyud du 'brel pa'o// de nas byang chub
128a1(rnying rgyud): bams dpa' snag/ yegs thams ba za thAg// thus brgyang rnarlapas blangs nas te// 'phrul la khyor gzung mdu dang // byang rngub pa mas caganas 'dug pa'o// rtsal sangs rgyas dag
128a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyud// mi gnyis rim bzhin brgyud pa'o// de las bskal pa lnga yi dus// zhing khams seng ge'i rtsal zhes par// kun mtshungs sngon 'phags grags pa can// gdul bya khyad par 'phags pa'i rigs// sangs rgyas kyis 'jigs seng
128a3(rnying rgyud): ge 'dzegs// mar me sngon 'phags rgyal po'i sprin// tsan+dan pakod pa'i sde bcas pa'i// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// rang rig spang ba'i zhing khams kun// 'od bcas theg pa'i 'khor lo spyod// grangs med bskal par tshogs
128a4(rnying rgyud): bsags shing // yun dang theg pas rgyung sbyangs pa'i// dpal gyi snying po'i 'od zer can// skar ma stobs bskyed dra ba'i sde// rang gi ston pa'i zhal nas su// nges pa'i snying rje chen po yis// gsang sngags zab mo la ma gnyer zhing // rtse gcig
128a5(rnying rgyud): brtson pas 'dud par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor gsang bar dbang bskur te// theg chen dam tshig mchog la bzhag/ nges pa'i phyag rgya gsang ba yis// bskal pa mang po sgrib spangs shing // 'bras bu byang chub sems la skor// yon tan kun 'byung
128a6(rnying rgyud): bdag por 'gyur// rdo rje lta bus kun bcom nas// kun tu 'od bzang ma chags spyan// yi ge 'khor lo bla med gnas// sku lha yi shes che rgyud sbyor// rim bzhin de 'og bskal pa lngar// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur zhing // byang chub
128a7(rnying rgyud): sems dpa'i 'khor rnams la// gsang mchog theg pa ston par byed// byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i bshes// rab bdag 'od zer sdang ba'i sgo// bstan pa'i chud chen bzung byed cing // rnal 'byor dbang phyug 'khor bcas skyong // 'di ltar sdang
128b1(rnying rgyud): za srid pa'i chos// rgyal pa'i bstan pa dgongs pa'i don// ma 'gags gsal bsru dang gsung // thugs kyi sgo nas drang tshul ston// ya mtshan bde gshegs dkyil 'khor las// dngos po'i rigs kun snga tshogs la// rtogs pa
128b2(rnying rgyud): rgyud kyis gnyis su brtags// mi rtog ye shes mi 'gag pa'o// 'bras bu ye nas gnas pa'i chos// thams cad don gyi rang bzhin yin// gsang mchog byang chub sems kyi dbyings// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa nyid// skal ldan byang chub
128b3(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' la// thabs med phyag rgya'i sgo nas sten// de 'og bskal pa drug cun// skar ma 'tshogs pa'i 'jig rten du// mya ngan mun 'joms chos kyi grong // sangs rgyas mi thub zla ba 'gyur// rgyal sras 'bar ba'i blo gros kyis//
128b4(rnying rgyud): theg chen gsang ba'i glo skyes nas// bsam pa brtan pos gsol btab cing // tshad med go cha bgos pa'i mthus// dkyil 'khor gsang bar dbang bskur cing // rgyud ring / dam tshig 'bogs par mdzad// gnyis med mnyam par bzhag
128b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i mthas// kun gyi chos nyid don gsum la// bde chen rtogs pa'i byin rlabs shar// sgrib bral sangs rgyas rgyan gyis brgyan// dus gzhan spros dad ldan pa yi// gnas su 'gro ba'i don la gshegs// thub pa chen po phyogs bcu
128b6(rnying rgyud): yi// sangs rgyas kun gyo na dbang bskur 'gyur// 'khor gyi sangs rgyas byang chub sems// 'khor bcas kun la theg pa'i gzhung // dus gsum gsad pa'i gdams ngag mchog/ chos kyi zhing khams skyod par mdzod// byang chub sems dpa'
128b7(rnying rgyud): blo gros mdzad// gang phyir dngos 'di sna tshogs pa// thams cad chos kyi de bzhin nyid// smig rgyu chu zla'i dkyil 'khor dang // sprul pa dri za'i grong khyer tshogs// sgyu ma rmi lam sna tshogs yul// mig yor me long bzhin lta bur// brag chaskra
129a1(rnying rgyud): snyan gzhan gyi dbang // nam mkha'i me tog mog sham bu// cho ga dbang don yang ma sbas// kun sdang nam mkha'i lbu ba bzhin// rtsa ba med pa'i byang chub sems// chags med dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor na// kun bzang
129a2(rnying rgyud): ye shes rnam par 'gro// 'khor ba nyid na mya ngan 'das// nyon mongs tog tshogs byang chub lam// 'khor ba nyid na mya ngan 'das// de bzhin rnam par drar pa'i theg/ dad ldan mchog pa ston par mdzad// de 'ag bskal pa nyi shu na// grangs spyod
129a3(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten mngon rgyu bar// sangs rgyas mi g.yo gtsug tor can// snyan pa kun grags 'khor dang bcas// dus der dga' ba chen po'i shugs// 'bad pa chen po brtse ba can// khyim bdag skyabs mgon mya ngan med// bka' nas gzhon nu snying
129a4(rnying rgyud): stobs can// bzhi po dus mtshungs theg chen byang chub sems// sngon nas 'gro ba mang la brgyud// dkyil 'khor gsang bar dbang thob cing // snying po 'da' dka' 'jigs med gnyis// dka' spyod grags pa mtha' yas dus// mya ngan gnas
129a5(rnying rgyud): bra par bgyun// slongs ba'i rgyal ma // des pa sangs rgyas rje 'gyu // stong gsum 'jig rte gnas banas / spangs nas zung drab sam pa dang thamags/ chos pani ga dang sa rje ma par// byang chub sams
129a6(rnying rgyud): dpa'i rgyan gyis mtshon// rgyud chen gsang ba'i don rnams kun// skal ldan mos pa'i rim bzhin bstan// de las byang chub sems dpa'i sde// rdo rje rgyal mtshan la sogs kyis// byin rlabs yon tan ces su grol// bsam 'das dri med gzung
129a7(rnying rgyud): par byed// de ltar dpal de chos kyi gdugs// dad sgrol 'od zer phreng ba can// rgyal ba kun gyi grogs mdzad cing // thar pa'i grong khyer bdag por 'gyur// dmigs med yul tshogs gnyis med sems// rdzogs chen byang chub chen po'i
129b1(rnying rgyud): dbyangs// sangs rgyas kun gyis gzigs pa'i yul// ba chen snying po rang bzhin nyid// phyogs bcu dus tshogs bas ma yas par// thams cad thams cad 'dud pa'i gnas// nyon mongs sdug bsngal rgyud rnams kun// glo bar nying
129b2(rnying rgyud): bde ba'i zhing // sprul pa ma 'gags dkyil 'khor kun// sku gsung thugs yon phrin las thugs// rgya mtsho gsal ba'i nyi zla bzhin// phyogs bcu khyad par mtshungs pa'i mdos// kun rtogs rlung gis mi 'gyur ba'i// mtsho gting gsal
129b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i rin po che// ji ltar gnas par lta bu// sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs par mdzad// slad kyi 'gro gzhan gzhug pa dri phyir// mtshon rgyud tshig gis gtan la dbab/ yuni ring brtan pa'i gzugs brnyan gyis// rgyal ba'i dgongs spod
129b4(rnying rgyud): ston par byed// mthang gnas bskal pa bcu gcig na// mchod 'os bde ba'i zhing khams der// rgyal po yon can lag gi gnas// bkod kyi pa gnas srung nyi shu gcig/ grogs mtshungs yun ring tshangs par spod// byang chub snying po
129b5(rnying rgyud): sems bskyed pas// sangs rgyas 'brug sgra'i bstan pa la// dang brtson cig char rab tu byung / dkyil 'khor gsang bar dbang thob nas// zung 'jug theg pa dam tshig gnas// shes rab ting 'dzin 'gyur med par// sangs
129b6(rnying rgyud): rgyas sa mchog sgrib med gnas// dusA nas 'gro gzhan don gyi phyir// mthong dga' mthong ba la sogs pa// yon tan kun gyis mngon 'phags pa'i// ston pa'i mchog chen la sogs byung // yon tan dus ring sbyangs pa yi// 'khor
129b7(rnying rgyud): tshogs kun la gsar pa'i rgyud// rim bzhin bstan pas grol bar mdzad// mnyam nyid gsung bral sngags kyi tshig/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i shugs// rang gi sde dang dpung 'khor bcas// rgyal ba'i bstan pa gzung byed cing /
130a1(rnying rgyud): ded dpon bzang po la sogs pas// rab bstod gsang ba mtshon par byed// rang bzhin gsung chog brjod pa'i rgyud// de tshe rgyal ba'i byin rlabs kyis// 'gyur tshogs phyi rol rdzu 'phral pa'o// rgyang chen gnyis med du
130a2(rnying rgyud): 'jug pa'i// me po dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi// chos 'byung mtshan bcas ma gags pa// bu tshogs rang bde byang chub sems// gzungs sogs ngo bor gang brdad pa ni// nga na sdang ma bcos rig pa tshogs/ gyur la dz+wal 'jang
130a3(rnying rgyud): ye shes nang // goms pa'i mthu las sdang ba'o// dengo gsum rdu 'phro ba'o// slang byer gnas kyi gzhon nu sde// rgyal po smra ba'i mchog 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas pi nur tshul ba blang // bram ze'i reg byed gtso bo mchog/ drang seng gcan
130a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i ston pa yis// dang po theg pa bu cher tshul// dga' bas gong ma'i gnas bgrod kyang // nges pa'i ting 'dzin yul ma rtogs// dus 'das sems kyi de bzhin nyid// chags med sgeb rdzogs kun dang bral// bsod nams ye shes
130a5(rnying rgyud): las skyes// thams cad mkhyen pas chos kun gzigs// rang bung ston pa matso bo la// sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs la sogs pas// dbang bskur mngon par bstod cing mchod// 'jug sel khyab pa'i gtso bo dus// mi 'jugs dpal
130a6(rnying rgyud): tog tu 'gyur// rdzas gsum bzhin gshegs bun dang // sras pazas dgangs pa 'gro bar byar// mal ldan sa 'byo gas babyan// sems ga ste gsang pa'i gladams ngag mnas// tshogs mang rtogs pas gos rnams kun/ rba
130a7(rnying rgyud): cing rgya che 'du 'bral med// ye shes chen pos yul kun spang // yon tan kun nas 'byung ba'i sku// thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnyis med sgo// sku gsung thugs mchog rgyan gyis sbas// de tsha nang khams thams cad nas// rang bzhin ma tog zeng
130b1(rnying rgyud): bsgos// rol mos par snang gang gyur cid // dgyur pa'i lhas chan ba cu drug byung // thams cad la mtshon ngo mdzor gyis// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags// 'di ltar rnam 'phrul gang lags su// 'jig tan mgon gyis grang bstan
130b2(rnying rgyud): mdzod// 'di ni nal 'byor sbrel ldan dpal// nye 'od zla ba'i gzi brdad 'bral// ri rgyal bkra shis mdzes pa can// sor phra mu tig dpal rab 'byor// chos rgyal mchen bzang dpa' bo myos// grogs byed brtse ba'i yid gzhungs brtsegs//
130b3(rnying rgyud): dus mtshungs bco lnga phyogs gcig tu// mnyam grol kyal ra'i yum la sbyor// phyi dus stobs 'phel dag byed gnas// rim bzhin 'gro ba'i tshogs la gshegs// kun gyis pa dag gi bstan pa 'di// 'gro ba kun la gsang bar ston// ma mra
130b4(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten 'dir snang ba'i// 'byung chen phung khams skye mched dang // nyon mongs 'gro ba'i tshogs bcas kun// ye nas ma bcos 'gyur ba med// rigs mchog lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil// ye shes chen po mngon gsal ba// phyogs
130b5(rnying rgyud): mtshams dus kyi rnam phye yang // rgyan gyi bkod pa gnyis med pa// 'chi 'pho 'du 'bral rnam pa'i yul// byang chub bde chen dbyings su ni// dmigs pa'i yul la ye shes rje// gsang rgyad gsang chen gas ba'i mchog/ sems nyid chos
130b6(rnying rgyud): swarnam bcas kun// gzugs spyan pa mkha'i mtshan nyid can// nam gsum gsang ba'i sngags brjod pas// don gcig ro mnyam sbyor ba'i rgyu// ye shes dbyings kyi bdag nyid la// ye shes rgyan tshogs gsal bar 'byung // de las de
130b7(rnying rgyud): de gnas pa// de nyid de bzhin de kun dngos// zung du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ni// chog bral dpo yis smon par dka'// rang klung dag pa'i ye shes de// rtogs pa'i dus na grol ba yin// de la bdun gyi dus chen po// gzhan dag ga sa
131a1(rnying rgyud): bzang na 'ab ga// zhing khams bcu ldan grags pa can// man+ta slobs gzhan gyis pa 'dzin pang // sa spangs kyal pa sa bas// bags skangs sangasasas dan can pang // mdang 'a sgonas 'dug zung ba//
131a2(rnying rgyud): babags gcig pa gcig bskul zhing // theg pa chen por sems bskyed pas// sngon chad rtogs pa'i bka' dren gyis// mngon par shes pa ljags la gyur// 'gro kun las rgyu gang las byung // bral ba'i bstan padri med don// gnyis
131a3(rnying rgyud): med chos la 'dun par gnas// dus gzhan dge ba'i bshes gnyen la// dbang thob gdams ngag ji lta bar// mngon gas la dag cing dri ma med// ye shes chen po'i stobs rdzogs nas// rdzogs ldan rin chen yod pa'i gnas// phyogs
131a4(rnying rgyud): bcu'i sangs rgyas mtshan mthun par// rgyal ba'i dgongs pa mar me mdzad// zhing khams dag par rdzogs longs spyod// sprul sku rdzogs par tshul 'dzin par// 'khor gyi sangs rgyas byang chub sems// gdul bya dag pa sna tshogs la//
131a5(rnying rgyud): byin rlabs bkod don rol pa'i tshul// bde gshegs kun gyis dbang bskur te// thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor 'phrul par mdzad// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs pas// gsang ba bla na med pa'i chud// phyogs rnams kun tu rnam spos te/
131a6(rnying rgyud): skal ldan 'jug pa'i don bzhin bshad// rdo rje me dmigs 'jigs pa med/ bdud bzhi la sogs tshogs kun 'joms// rnam dag chos kun snang ba'i gzhi// phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin gnas// 'di dag rmad byung spu rang gsung // thugs
131a7(rnying rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor rnam snang ba// byin rlabs cho 'phrul 'dus ma byas// rnam stong stong nyid bde ba'i mchog/ gnyis su rtog pas gang spyod pa// der 'don mtha' la ltung bar 'gyur// gcig pur btags pas 'ching zhing grol// gnyis
131b1(rnying rgyud): chos gsum pad bzhin te// bzhi nas grangs med mtha' yi bar// gol sgrib byang chub sems dpa'i lam// phyogs bltas 'dzin pa'i sdug bsngal nad// chags bral bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho nyid// dus gzhan 'dus pa brgyad /
131b2(rnying rgyud): gnas grol 'od can du// byang chub sems dpa gsang sdong gis// dpe bcas 'jig rten sgron ma'i dus// sbyin bdag dus kyi phreng ba can// dam pa'i theg chen blo skyes te// dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa las// byang chub sems kyi
131b3(rnying rgyud): rnam pa blangs// dgon pa'i phyogs su gnas bcas te// rtse gcig shes rab ting nge 'dzin// chu bo rgya mtsho kun las brgal// chos kun sems nyid 'od gsal bar// nges yar sangs rgyas dam pa dang // legs phrad gsol 'debs ji lta
131b4(rnying rgyud): par// dbang bskur dam pas zung 'jug tsul// gsang ba dam pa'i rgyud 'dzin pa'i// zhing khams bkod pa gzugs mdzes su// 'khor lo rgyun du sangs rgyas bskor// yid bzhin rgyal po chos skyong 'khor// rgyal ba sras bcas mang po
131b5(rnying rgyud): kun// rnam grol phung po mtsho chen gyis// yang dag dngos bcas gtan pa phab// rin chen mdzod kyi sgo 'byed cing // dang dgu'i nor bu snang bar mdzad// gang 'di rnam par 'phrul par mdzad// chos nyid byang chub sems rdzogs par//
131b6(rnying rgyud): rang krung sku mchog dgag med par// byin rlabs kun tu bzang po'i rtsa la// dus 'dir rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu ni// rang bzhin ngo bo dbyings na gnas// rtsol bral 'bad pa'i shugs las skyes// sku gsum gnyis med gnas pa'i tshul//
131b7(rnying rgyud): spor pa~M maM las kyi stobs gnon pa'i// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes che// go ba'i dus nyid grol ba'i tshul// yon tan 'bras bu gzhan kyang thal// slad ma dus 'gyur gzhi che ba// rol pa chen po 'gyur ba'i skabs// zhing khams
132a1(rnying rgyud): mchod sdong chen po dru// sangs rgyas smon gsal stobs mchog ldan// rigs ni bzog nas la spyod pa// reg pa'i rgyung spangs gzhon nu badran// sngon gyi bya ba dran pa mdzan// phyogs gcig stan lam btang
132a2(rnying rgyud): nas gsol// dpal gyi rir gnas sems bskyed pas// bde gshegs thugs rjes bzung bar mdzad// dkyil 'khor chen por rang zhugs nas// dbang thob dam tshig la gnas shing // thams cad chos kyi de nyid gsapa// rang byung ye shes kun la
132a3(rnying rgyud): gsal// rnam grol gsang ba bla med sgo// sa bcu'i dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs// tshe gcig sngon sbyangs 'bras bu'i mchog/ sku gsung ye shes mnga' brnyes pa'i// dus 'dir 'jig rten ngo mtshar ches// 'jig stongs chags shing gnas pa
132a4(rnying rgyud): dag/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ba de bas khyab// kun gyi mngon shes zag pa med// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kun byon te// ya mtshan dgongs pa bgro bar byed// e ma khyed rnams rang byung sku// dang brtson snying rje che las gyur // rim gyis brgyud rim
132a5(rnying rgyud): ma brten par// sems kyi dkyil 'khor gsang bar gyur// thams cad chos kyi de nyid mchog/ rgyal ba kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// rnam thar 'di la nged kyang grol// rang byung sbyangs pa'i stobs las 'khrungs// don 'di gdul bya
132a6(rnying rgyud): gzhan gyi phyir// yun ring gnas pa bstan pa legs// de dag mchod spong zhing khams mchog/ bde gshegs dpal gyi rgyal mtshan dang // blo rtsal sman chen mun pa sel// rgyal ba'i sdom pa dpag med stobs// de ma bzhin gdul
132a7(rnying rgyud): ba yid 'ong ba'i// zhing khams bkod pa 'khor tshogs dang // bstan pa thams cad rnam grol zhing // snying po mchog gi ting 'dzin gnas// gsang sngags chud pas rnam spros te// thugs rje ye shes gnyis med tshul// sna tshogs rnam par spros
132b1(rnying rgyud): byas kyang // zab ma byang chub sams nyid bcan// bran 'byung 'dod pa'i yon tan kun// ma bgad kyil 'khor rol bya gnas// rang bzhin dbyangs ma ldan chags kun// zhan pa gnyis 'dzad chags pa'i lam// dngas rgyal bral par zad
132b2(rnying rgyud): sra// 'gro kun rang grung yin mor kyang // rnal 'byor gsum gyis gtan la dbab// de nyid 'brel tshugs theg pa'i mchog/ ces gsungs so// rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid byang chub kyi sems bkra shis mi 'gyur bar gas pa par gnas pa'i rgyung las
132b3(rnying rgyud): 'das pa'i dus su byung ba ste lnga pa'o// / de nas kun bzang bde gshegs nyid// bzang mo'i yum dang sgor mdzod cing // rgyal ba'i thugs nas brgyad pa dag/ byin gyi rlabs kyis bshad pa'i phyir// dpa' bo rigs kyi dkyil
132b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor tshogs// kun la tshul 'di ston cing gdams/ bzang mo me tog phrang ba grags// zla chos rgyal po'i sras bcas par// bcu bzhi'i phyogs dus gnas bcas te// smon lam snang ba bzhi bzhir byung // de dag snga ma'i sangs rgyas mchog/
132b5(rnying rgyud): yun ring mnyes par rim gro byas// phyogs bcu'i dge ba'i bshes bzung zhing // 'gro kun gnas su sems bskyed do// bsod nams tshogs mchog rgya chen po// rnam grol ye shes tshogs bskyed mdzad// bar skabs gsang ba'i theg par zhugs//
132b6(rnying rgyud): dbang thob dam tshig la gnas shed// bstan pa'i gdams ngag bzung bar byed// 'bras bu'i lam de de 'bras bu// de stobs dus der sangs rgyas mchog/ mang po phyogs bcur bzhugs kun la// so sor sems bskyed smon lam btab// phyogs
132b7(rnying rgyud): gabu'i de bzhin gshegs kun gyis// dbang bsrur gdams ngag je lta bar// rnam grol ye shes zag pa med// sku gsung ye shes chen por tshul// yon tan phrin las kun tu gnas// gdul gyi'i don 'gyung sangs rgyas pa// zhing khams chen
133a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i snang ba phrul// shang shuras da 'ang mar byan// rnam dngam 'dong bzhin don can drang // sangs thas dam pa dri mangs// gzug dang 'og pan gnas bya bdag/ ra 'gyu ngamang dang / zab pa rna ma
133a2(rnying rgyud): tshogs// yon tan bkod pa pa d+ma'i gdung // dpal gyi rgyal po las rabaston// bde gshegs chos dbyings sdang ba yi// yo tan rgyal po'i sde dpur bzhen// sangs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs// ye shes men po'i rnam stsa la las
133a3(rnying rgyud): 'dres rnam par grangs pa yi// rang bzhin bden gnyis chos kyi bya// dus dngas yi rgyal po ba// bdag dang yul de'i 'jigs byed nas// deb skyong dka' thug khru pa'i gnas// rgol ba'i dbang phyug re bcas pas// 'dul byed rgyal
133a4(rnying rgyud): rten du// dag pa bzhi ldan dgongs pa bzhi// theg pa gsang ba'i sgo 'byed cing // rnal 'gyor dbang phyug bskyed par mdzad// phun sum tshogs pa kun rdzogs te// de nyid yon tan gzhan pa sngar// thig ca na gsang bskor ba yis// pa las
133a5(rnying rgyud): rguchud kyi don// shar lho dga' dbyungs dgod byed snang // sa yi me tog 'gog pa'i tshal// pad+ma rnam dag 'jig rten spyan// rang byung gsang sngags sgo nas 'khrungs// rnga sgra sgrog byed stobs mchog pas// mdzod tshal rgya chen meg pa'i
133a6(rnying rgyud): tshul/ byang chub sems nyid don la snang // 'du gnyis mdza sogs gang dgrang// 'dags pa nangan/ sa rdo rjems/ gas de ban pa sa//
133a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'khor tshogs bdag shegs sogs// rang sngang gzhan las 'ongs pa rnangs/ gnyis sra me kyibs shes gzung/ rjong pa 'angs sa kyis ge thabs can dga' ba dpal// 'a las byu
133b1(rnying rgyud): sa chen pa'i dpung byas par// de 'dral zag pa mchog bstan cing // rdzogs ca byang chub sems su sbyor// de yi bstan pa mchog 'dzin pa'i// sgrub mang pa gyes par 'gyur// yu rang gnas pa'i rgyud lnga kun// byin rlabs rang gi chos
133b2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// lho phyogs rin chen yod pa'i tshol// nyi 'od kun khyab dpo 'od bzhin// snang ba'i pad+mo yid 'ong mchog/ thams cad rin chen rgyan gyis mdzes// byams pa'i rgyal por rini chen mchog/ mya ngan dri ma rnam par sel// yon tan du
133b3(rnying rgyud): 'grung 'dod pa'i tshul// spobs pa brtsegs pa'i ri lo mchog/ mnyam nyid nga ni chen sdigs las skyes// rdo rje bde gshegs pad+ma las// tshul chen snang bas sde dpung 'joms// bde gshegs byang sems rigs kun 'joms//
133b4(rnying rgyud): yul bdag rgyal po dgyes mchod dang // lag bdang 'gros mdzes le mcho'i rgyal// btsun mo gnas kun longs spyod cing // rin chen zhing khams rgyan dang bcas// phyi rol gzhan du mi 'dzin par// thabs mchog nang gi gnas kun spyod// bstan
133b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyud sde don zhibs// dam pa'i gnas kun gsal bar ston// byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi mchog/ shes rab snying rje che mnga' ba'i/ blo gros rgya mtsho grangs med kun// phyag rgya gsang sngags stobs kyis 'phags// rgyal po gadrug
133b6(rnying rgyud): can gangs ri mchog/ yid 'od tsa n+dan sbyin pa'i lha// sder bcas theg pa chen po'i lam// 'bras bu gsang ba'i gnas la bkod// lho rngub 'od gsal can gyi gnas// gya nam dbang po'i grong khyer mtsho// 'gog pa'i 'khor lo byang chub shing //
133b7(rnying rgyud): 'od bzar dpal 'byung lha mo'i grong // dpal gyi seng ge 'jigs pa sel// bdud dpung 'joms pa'i stobs mchog rgyal// gzi brjid phung po rin chen mchog/ rin chen mdzod gnas gdung ba sel// zhing khams bzod pa'i mchog dag tu/
134a1(rnying rgyud): yongs su dag pa'i 'khor dang bcas// yun ring 'gro ba'i don la dgongs// bstan pa'i gsang sngags sna tshogs mchog/ slar yang sprul pa 'gro ba'i tshul// zag pang lam kun rnam par sbyor// gnyis med gnyis su
134a2(rnying rgyud): med pa'i sgo// bya bral bya bas bgrod pa'i lam// rang bzhin byang chub sems kyis brgyan// 'byung ba chen po'i gzugs rtsal can// me mnyam mnyam nyid sngags kyi rgyun// bstan pa'i dus mtshungs snang ba'o// nub phyogs bde sgo 'jig rten rba/
134a3(rnying rgyud): phyogs bzhi steng bas bde gshegs gnas// rgyun 'byung drag pa spang ba'i yul// 'od byed nyi ma 'bras bu'i zhing // pad+ma'i mtshan mchog gnas kun mdzes// rgyal mtshan brtsegs pa bdud dpung 'joms// dgu sadzes 'khor lo'i 'od kyi
134a4(rnying rgyud): phreng // kun 'gyung zhi ba snying po'i chos// pad+ma'i rigs mchog 'khor kun kyang // de bzhin byang chub bden pa'i gnas// ye shes stobs mchog 'jigs pa med// khams gsum khyab par mdzad pa'i tshul// grong khyer mchog tu yang sangs
134a5(rnying rgyud): rgyas// snying po gser ldan dpung bzhi dag/ 'bar 'od ldan pa'i phyogs 'dzin la// myang bar rab tu bdud rtsi can// khams rnams mdzad par rab tu brtson// rgyas par mdzad pa'i tshul ston pa'o// rgyal pos spangs khro byed sde// gzhi
134a6(rnying rgyud): 'byung gnyen po med 'byed skyes// rab brtson brtul zhugs 'khor lo'i bdag/ theg chen gsang ba'i tshul 'dzin pa'o// sems dpa' chen po ye shes blos// rang bzhin gsal ba'i rgyud 'dzin cing // sprul pa'i snang bas kun khyar par// yun
134a7(rnying rgyud): rang snang bston par byed// chub byang grong khyer kun grags brtsegs// lha mong dbang po 'phrul pa'i yul// mdangs chen rab gras rtse mo dang // gdugs mdzes pa d+ma phreng ba can// sangs rgyas rab bzhad matog can// yul dag slong pa'i rtsa
134b1(rnying rgyud): 'i rlabs// 'od zer sdang ba gtsug tor car// byams pa'i seng ge sprin gyi shugs// bde gshegs byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor// rdzu 'phrul grags pa cher ldan pa// rang gi zhing khams sdang mdzad cing // sna tshogs theg pas 'dul ba
134b2(rnying rgyud): tshul// dgongs pas gzhan pargyud zhi ba khams mchog/ mang por bkur ba yum chen por// thub pa chen po'i 'od dpal la// sngon gyi bya ba ji lta bar// bde sbyin bdud rtsi grong mchog dang // dpa' bo rtser gnas rdal zhi bar// dus mtshungs 'dra
134b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i ston pa mchog/ stobs mchog gsung bcus 'khor los sgyur// thams cad theg pa chen po yis// byang chub sems kyis tshim par mdzad// de yi bstan pa yun reng du// skal ldan rnams kyis 'dzin par 'gyur// bu 'phyogs
134b4(rnying rgyud): sgra sgrog byed pa'o// chos rgyal rab tu zhi pa'i 'phrul// bsti sdug rin chen glang po ri// ri skyabs me tog spangs pa'i zhing // las rab rdo rje kun spyod pa// mche ba'i sde bcas phyogs pas rgyal// go rnga sra bsdug par byed// theg mchog
134b5(rnying rgyud): na chen 'od kyi phreng // las kyi rigs mchog che las byung // bya grab phrin las kun gyi bdag/ brtson 'grus gzhan gyi sde gnon pa'o// mthun byed rig pa'i dpung tshogs kyang // sangs rgyas kun gyis rjod byed cing // byang chub sems dpa' kun
134b6(rnying rgyud): gyis bkur// grong khyer chen po ji lta bar// dpung ba cas theg pas yang dag bgrod// thugs rjod med sdod lam bcas// grul po'i rab kyis grong gnas byon// zla gshegs 'od zer lhun pos brgya// gsal rgyal ka la'i grong mchog 'dag/
134b7(rnying rgyud): yul 'khor bcu drug bcu drug sbyong // 'dod pa'i yon tan longs spyod brgyan// dpung tshogs sde bcas rab tu snang // gzhan nas 'joms byed gzhon nu'i sde// dri med sangs rgyas rnam bzhi'i bdag/ gsang ba'i mdzad pas chos kur myong // 'dzo
135a1(rnying rgyud): gye pa 'byor dbang phyug kun// pra ya snang bas 'jal 'gyur zhing // nas rab chan pas danam thar rgyan// ya shas drim med par gyur// sun car ma 'gags bkod pa nyid// zab mang dbying sa las gzhan mang mags//
135a2(rnying rgyud): brtan par chos kyis gzhan skyong zhing // phyi na rang bzhin rnam par grol// yun ri nges par sbyangs pa yis// blo ldan dag gis gzung bar byed// byang shar 'du rgyun bkod pa yis// thu ba dka' 'jigs pa'i phyogs kun las// glo gzod zung
135a3(rnying rgyud): bzang po'i gnas// bsil khang rgya mtsho me thung mgon// phyogs rnams kun la gzi brjid can// bkra shis rdzas kyis smras pa ru// dpal g+ha nam mkhang snyed stobs mchog/ dra ba'i 'od zer sgyu ma'i bdag/ ye shes 'od zer 'dod pa'i bla/
135a4(rnying rgyud): bla blangs seng ge de rtsal 'chang ba// rang byung ye shes chen po'i sku// chos kun bde ba chen po'i dbyings// longs spyod yongs rdzogs sprul pa'i sku// gnyis med chos kyi dbyings su sbyor// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs rnams dang // byang
135a5(rnying rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// zab mo gsang ba'i sngags la ma rdzogs// thams cad yongs su dag pa'i 'khor// 'don pa gnyis su med pa yis// rdzogs chen byang chub sems kyis brgyan// rang bzhin dngos po'i bye rlabs kyis/
135a6(rnying rgyud): yul dus reg mtha' kun tu ston// chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das// bya bral rtsol bas mi g.yo ba'i// snying po'i grong khyer phyag rgya che// kun tu mi 'gyur rang bzhin gnas// bla na med pa'i theg pa 'di// gsang don gsang mchog gsang
135a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i gnas// 'da' dka' rgyal ba mi shigs pa'i// sku gsung gnyis su med pa'i mchog/ thugs rje sprul pas ston mdzad pa// gzhan snang sangs rgyas gnyis pa'i tshul// mu tig dpal sbas gru mo mdangs// mi 'jigs sgrol ba'i
135b1(rnying rgyud): dang / tha
135b2(rnying rgyud): sa gas nga / na bu lag tu gyus/ pa dang cag na nas/ u pa ba tu rgyas // /
135b3(rnying rgyud): da/ tsug pa / rkyen nidang 'tshul kyam dzin// dag ga nan ni// na pa ma gnas par 'gyur/ phyogs sa pas pa ma pa'i las rmugs/ gsapa ba byed pang 'dra thamams
135b4(rnying rgyud): mas byed par dga' ba stsal// 'dun pa ma rnags pa 'dug// mya ka bang rjemeng pams// meng dgas sanas can 'dren pa kyil// thal za nas sbyor gror lams sa// rin can rdzogs nam smras pa// chub pa blags
135b5(rnying rgyud): yim chog// byed bu mam pa laganas rjes// gzhanang ngoms dad dben 'kho bsgyur// pakra sha rin rje gnas pan da// phyogs gnon 'grob ban sgrubs// gzi brji phreng bathal pa 'o// byang chub sems paskyed bcigs
135b6(rnying rgyud): dpapa// mkha' mdzad mo zhes snying po'i mchog/ bdud dpung 'dolas pa'i mthu mnga' ba'i// bya tshogs min las kun g+h+r-i // sangs kyis grangs med gas la mdzod cing // byang chubs mas dbang gakhor byong ba// rnam par yang dag gsapa
135b7(rnying rgyud): las byung // gang thathams cad byed 'das da'i// bcu ba 'di dge shes pas// ma 'ang gzugs cig dus/ du nus ngathalasangs pas spyod// nga gyur can po gzhan byung / 'a mi nyi ga zugs parji
135b8(rnying rgyud): gzugs can dang spyod dbyung ba dong // grags pa mtshan ldar napa po'i khab// sa spangs lag na kyi byas// dpal po phreng brgyam tshang khrob// de bzhin ba cung pog yog 'khong dag/ 'jig shegs ga mchog sa pa
136a1(rnying rgyud): dpal gyi sang ga sgru byung gnag/ yongs su bkud kyi sras kun dang // gsang ba'i byung mchog ston par byed// spobs pa zin pa mdzes pa 'gyis// dngas mchog kun tu rnam par spel// rgyal ba sna ngan 'das
136a2(rnying rgyud): 'jigs pa'i// tshul dka'i gzhan gyi rgyun gcod pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' grags kun gyis// bstan pa'i snying po rgyas par bzung // mi bskyod byang chub bde ba'i rgya// chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid yin// 'og gi 'khor lo kun ldan
136a3(rnying rgyud): gsal// tshul mi ri po brtsegs pa yis// bum pa'i gzugs byed gdugs khyab pa// rnam spyod mang po mtha' yas pa'i// brtson 'grus bla ma de 'byung bar// rang gi yul 'khor gnas rnams skyong // bram ze'i rigs kyi phyogs rgyas dag
136a4(rnying rgyud): chos kyi rgyal po gdan la bzhugs// dus kun dga' ba'i longs spyod dang // sde dpung rus su 'dzin med par// sA la'i shing chen rgyas pa'i mchog/ rin chen tshogs la longs spyod gnas// rgyal po nam mkha'i blo gros dpal// sa yi dpang
136a5(rnying rgyud): po skyabs sbyin mchog/ zas bzang bdud rtsi bdag po'i bdag/ bdun rgyud kha lo'i las kun spyod// las tshogs 'jug pa'i rgyu yi stobs// thar pa'i gru bo gnas dag pa// rdo rje snang ba thabs chen mchog/ tshul kun myang ba gnon pa nyid//
136a6(rnying rgyud): 'di dag rang gi ngang tshul bzang // thog mtha' phyogs rgyas bden pa'i don// bde gshegs byang chub me tog phreng // sras kyi dmapas 'dud pa'i gnas// zhing khams chen po kun gsal ba// rdzu 'phrul 'jigs med gci ba'i tshul// dam
136a7(rnying rgyud): chos gnas la legs bzhugs te// 'od zer snang bas thams cad bskul// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor tshogs chen kun// ting 'dzin rab tu zhi bas gnas// byang chub sems dpar 'dus pa che// mi 'byed rgyud kyi snying po stod// de yi bstan
136b1(rnying rgyud): ngan tha'apar// mag cha gas sngags zas par mdzad// sbyin pa chen po yang 'amadzang ba// byang chub yan lag 'bral pa gnas// bsod rnams pa shes tshogs pas zlas/ gsum sa shes dazung ba zheng rgya chu
136b2(rnying rgyud): gnas rba sha'i zhing // mdangs gas la nye bar spyod pa na// zar pa'i bdag po rigs mchog stobs// rgyal rigs sA la'i dbang byed gnas// yul myong bzang po phan pa'i gzhung // nya mo ngas la bzags pa'i stobs// 'jar
136b3(rnying rgyud): sbyar ba'i gleng kun dang // den chen kun sogs nye bar spod// skyes bu chos kyi grong slong ba'i// gang nas nyid la bdi gshegs mchog/ rgyal pa sgrub pa'i mthu mang 'bras// rnam dag ye shes 'bral par byed// dbang po nyi ma sa
136b4(rnying rgyud): gnan// snang 'a khyab pa zhi bar gnyen// sangs rgyas byang chub sems kun dang // ming khams can po rgyas par mdzad// rdo ldan rnal 'byor la ma brtson dag/ gsang ba'i theg pas grol bar mdzad// nga rgyasangs rgyas thams cad kyis/
136b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis med yul dang lhod mdzad cing // rtag tu zhugs rdo 'a'akhor lo nyid // chos rnams kun nas spyod pa'o// ma gnyis po shes zin par bya// ye shes sgrib pa med pa mdangs// gsang ba dzi na mchog ston pa'i rgyud// gsung gcas
136b6(rnying rgyud): sgonas stsal ba'o// a ma ho ya mtshan drad du byung // thams cad byang chub sems nyid la// ya shes chen po dang sdang bas// dkyi 'khor gsang pa'i 'khor la nyid// bu sbyin bras thal sogs chos// ming tsam 'di bachen pa'i dbyings/
136b7(rnying rgyud): thams cad snying po 'bras bu'i mchog/ ye shes ma skyes 'jig med gnas// rnga ltad 'dzin pa'i chos gnyis kun// ma byung ma skyes rang gi dngos// 'pho 'gyur 'jig pa'i rkyen dang bral// rdo rje snying po rgyan ldan pa// gang gis gang la
137a1(rnying rgyud): gang du gnas// gang phyir gang zhig gang brtan cing // 'dzag chags rdul lam gnas par// lhanaHsa grub par chos 'don// byang chub sems kyi chos nyid de// thams cad rdzogs pa yon tan kyal/
137a2(rnying rgyud): e ma pa mtshan rmad byung chos// de las sna tshogs cing yang snang // shes pa rgyun chags 'khor lo'i gzhi// mi mthun gnas ris gcig pa dang // bde sdug longs spyod bdag gzhan kun// cha mnyam mi mnyam stobs rgyas pa/
137a3(rnying rgyud): gnyis gcig sna tshogs sdar ba'i tshul// yan ring goms shugs las skyes kyang // des na rgya mtsho'i za rlabs bzhin// 'od gsal kun snang ye shes rgyan// slar nyid rol pa ma dgag pas// kha dog dbyibs bcas 'byung ba'i thal
137a4(rnying rgyud): yul dus bye brag phun su ma tshigs// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor snyoms zhugs pa'i// zhing khams spyod yul yongs su dag/ dgag bslab med pa'i mthu las snang // skye med bzang mo'i b+ha ga las// kun 'byung skye 'gag la sogs rgyun//
137a5(rnying rgyud): gnyis med de bzhin nyid kyi sla// zung 'jug bde ba chen por sbyor// zhen pa'i mtha' rnams dgag pa'i phyir// mtshon dang tha snyad dpag med cing // de bzhin nyid sgra chog dang bral// kun 'byung kun gyi mtha' bral ba'o// khams gsum
137a6(rnying rgyud): gro'i gnas rnams kyis// srung khams skye zed phye nang tshogs// ye shes don sdang sangs grus pa// rang byung ldan gyis grub par gnas// ye shes chen po gas pa byas pa'i// phyogs bzung bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas sku// dus
137a7(rnying rgyud): sgring pa med mkhyen pa// rim bzhin yon tan phrin las rgyal// thams cad byang chub mchog gi dbyings// sems nyid bde bzan po'i sde// chos can rje snyed ma 'gags pa'i// chos nyid zab ma dan snang ba'o// rang nyid rtogs
137b1(rnying rgyud): pa bye brag gis// rdzas dbyings ma long lta bu dang // mnyam nyid so sor kun rtog pa// byab grub pa'i ye shes sgra// mi gnyis so sor gsal ba yis// nyi shu rtsa lnga la sogs rgyan// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ngalta bar// gnas ma dag nyis su rnam par ldar/
137b2(rnying rgyud): shes bya'i dkyil 'khor ji snyed kun// gsang chen de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings// rnam pa spros pa kun spyod pa'i// tha snyad yul las brtags pa yi// de ltar rang rig gsal ba ni// rang bzhin mkha' la snang ba'o// ma bcol yon tan rgyan snang ba'i
137b3(rnying rgyud): bde gshegs rgyal ba kun gyi dngos// gcig dang gnyis mi nad kyil 'khor tshul// sna tshogs rnam par nges pa'o// gti mug chen po rnam snang mdzad// 'dod chags chen po mtha' yas sku// zhe sdang chen po mi bskyod pa// dmyal
137b4(rnying rgyud): thub chen ren 'gyung ste// phrag dog chen po don yod grub// thams cad rigs kyi dkyil 'khor che// de dag 'khor lo pad+ma dang // rdo rje rin chen sna tshogs kyis// rigs mchog gtso dang sprul par bcas// thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa'o//
137b5(rnying rgyud): gang du dmigs par bya ba'i yul// phyi rol 'byung chen mthu rtsal stobs// thams cad nang gi snang ba'i tsho gas// rgyu nyid zab mo'i byang chub sems// de dag la brten 'gro kun dang // spyod yul ye shes chen po'i rgya// rang bzhin
137b6(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang mo'i mkha'// rang gi cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'char// kun bzang bkod pa rol pa'i chos// rgyu rkyen don bzhin rnam dag pas// gnyis med 'bras bu bdag nyid che// 'das dus la sogs 'gyur pa med// thams cad mi tshi/
137b7(rnying rgyud): rtag pa'i chos// de dag tha snyad las 'das te// lus rtogs phyi rol don gyi rgyan// phyogs chas snang ba ris ma grub// rtogs dus brtags pa ri bo'i mchog/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zer dang bcas// bar snang gsal bar khyab pa yis//
138a1(rnying rgyud): sa kun padeng ldan pa dbyengs// snang pa mchog gi mchog d+ha byu// ye shes 'jug pa med bang ngan// rab kram gnas sangs rgyas kun// sgyum la bur chags pa// ma shegs snang ba 'bras thabam/
138a2(rnying rgyud): rnam grol ye shes zag pa med// de dag ste 'chi gyur 'byung ba'i// glo bur chos la dben pa'i don// rang byung rgyan gyi 'khor lo che// ming tsam za snyad gdags pa'i gzhi// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun gyis kyang / snying po'i don las 'ad ma
138a3(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid byang chub kyi sems bkra shis mi 'gyur bar gsal bar gnas pa'i rgyud las/ da ltar gyi dus su byung ba ste le'u drug pa'o// / de nas kun bzang ye shes mchog/ thams cad
138a4(rnying rgyud): snang ba rnam rtog cing // zab mo byang chub dkyil 'khor rdzogs// gnyis med 'khril ba skyong ba las// gdul bya'i rtog tshogs lhun grub sku// rmang gyur bkra shis mi 'gyur pa'i// ngo mtshar yul do ston par byed// ma 'ongs bskal pa gzi
138a5(rnying rgyud): rgyun b+hi// dus bdun mthong ba bar ba can// lha mdzes mig yo nyi shu lnga// rgyal po grags pa khang bzangs su// 'dod pa'i yul kun spyod pas rgyas// sngon tshe rigs tshogs don brtson pa'i// dpa' bo me tog gzugs 'dzin pas//
138a6(rnying rgyud): dang por rgyal ba 'byung byed cing // tshul gnyis sprul pa sangs rgyas pa// mi mchog seng ge yang dag skyes// las kun rnam par 'byed byed cing // bde ba'i bde chen rgyud gsal ba// yon tan phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyis// sangs rgyas
138a7(rnying rgyud): nye 'dzin mnga' ba nyid par// dam de gshegs rigs kun dang / byang thubs ngas dpa' grags che gyon// nga ge snang ba'i lta bar/ rgyas kyi nyams dga' mongs sbyar mdzad// blo gros gral par mkhas pa dag/ bstan pa'i gzug
138b1(rnying rgyud): napa // dag pa rgyasas/ 'a// sha 'angs sa
138b2(rnying rgyud): ngo bo ny-ing sbyi na don pa// theg pa chen po gas pa'i rgyud// dus dong bsnyen pa'i glags bam pas// snong ldan rnams kyis don 'byung 'a gyur// byang chub sems dpa' mkhang khyab pas// de dag pa ga tung byer //
138b3(rnying rgyud): kun pakod pa'i mdzong pa dang / se dus byas pad 'i d+has// tshogs sa rgyam pa pa'i ste// bye ba thams cad ma pa// 'anal 'phrums ngas ma// sbal pa kun sa rnamasang // gas
138b4(rnying rgyud): panyer dag rgyang po'i khab// ro lo thams cad tshogs pa'i dus// sngon ldan snying po la paras so// bai deg shegs grong khyeng zhib la// sems pa skyed tshogs mang bsags pa / khrims kyis ba ga rtag sa/
138b5(rnying rgyud): na can btsun ma la sogs stongs/ tshogs bcas dkang dru tshan pas gnas/ de tso ma lda pas dza // rnal ba 'dzin rlapas ston par 'dzud// thams cad bye rtsen las drug// ye shes mying zug pa med/
138b6(rnying rgyud): gnas kyi rgya mtshalas// 'bras thang na bu rnam pa / nyid dpapa sla byas/ ngas cas cas gtsatshig pa badzi rtsal ba tha rtson pa/ ba dang 'byung brid pa gnas/
139a1(rnying rgyud): rkyen po chos nyid rtswa// byang chub sems mya na smon pa'o// gsang ba'i rgyu sgom gnyis mchog/ skyu gsu zugs kyi tshul kun sdang // zab zan snying po la dga' bas// bsan pa yun ring gzung bar byed// skad
139a2(rnying rgyud): ga gcig la rnam grol mchog/ thams cad mtshungs par sa mchog sbyor// slad kyi bskal pa gnyis 'das par// gyad kyi rgyal po dmag ldan pa'o// stobs sde yul mchog 'jigs med rgyal// sangs rgyas bstan pa'i gzhung med
139a3(rnying rgyud): ra// dpa' bo gzhu 'dzin ral pa can// sngon dus yun ring spangs pa'i mthus// snying rje chen po shes rab stobs// g.yul ngo'i 'jigs su mtshungs par dran// rang bzhin mtshan nyid rnam brtags te// thugs rnaM ya shes nyi shar ljang /
139a4(rnying rgyud): byang chubasams nyid zlanga'i zer// nges par 'thung ba'i dang rdul brtags// gang du phyogs 'drin mtha'abral pa'o// gnyis rgyur bde bags la po'i mthus// skad cigs ngas rgyasas min 'dzin mtshar la mtshan gyis kun 'brang / ga
139a5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub thams// kun gyis ngo mtshar mdzod cing bsgod// rngang dpon bzang po zhes bya ba'i// skyes bu mchog des theg chen rgyud// zab cing rgya cha sgra kun ras// 'dzin cing nges pa'i don la 'dzud// zungasems
139a6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// rnam de'i rjes su 'jug par 'gyur// de las bskal bajug gi mthar// drang gnas bkod pa ma 'jigadus// dbang pa po gzugs canasas kyi mchogabadug na can mdzes pa/ don gyi dam bcas storna papa mdzu
139a7(rnying rgyud): byang chub bor chog bskyed pas// sangs nas dkyil 'khor kun gsal bde// mams kyi chos nyid rtags par 'gyur// rgal mdun ldang babasam mi khyab// 'jig nan lams kun g.yo ga 'bar // bdag shegs pang khams kun gas pa bdag
139b1(rnying rgyud): stod bka' bzhin 'brang bar byed// snod ldan byang chub sems dpa' la// gsang ba'i rgyud chen 'di bstan cing // byin rlabs mtha' yis grol ba dag/ mi shigs rdo rje'i gnas su sbyor// don rab yul 'khor skyong pa yis// phyi ma'i rnal
139b2(rnying rgyud): 'byor bskang ba'i phyir// smon lam thugs rje chen po'i shugs// gsang sngags snying po'i rgyud ston pa// de dag rnal 'byor don ldan pa// bla na med pas bzung byed cing // ma 'dres pa yi sgo kun gyis// mya ngan 'das pa'i theg pa mchog/ slar yang rnyog med
139b3(rnying rgyud): gzhi yi 'og/ sa mung gnas 'dzin grong khyer mchog/ gsang ba 'phel ba'i dus lnga ru// rim pas mtshungs pa'i ston pa mchog/ rgyal ba mya ngan med stobs dpal// rdo rje snying po gsang ba'i sde// snang ba rab stoni dri ma med// ye shes dbang phyug rgyal ba shes//
139b4(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa'i dra ba yon tan legs// lha yi dbang po rnon po'i mdangs// sa srung rgyal po char 'bebs dang // bzed dka' thub pa'i bla ma nyid// phyag rgya'i 'khor lo shugs chen po// gsang bdag sbas pa rab kyi rtsal// klu las rgyal bgo cha'i mchog/ zhing khams dag pa
139b5(rnying rgyud): chos kun skyong // gzi brjid gtso bo zhes grags pa'i// sangs rgyas ston mchog kha lo 'dren// phyogs dbus gsal byed skyes bu mchog/ nyi shu rtsa lnga 'byung bar 'gyur// de dag de bzhin gnas 'di na// rgyal b+ha bzang po nye gnas pa'i// khyim bdag 'jig
139b6(rnying rgyud): rnams de// sngon du phyogs gcig las sbyangs shing // sangs rgyas tshogs bcas bsnyen bskur byas// rnam grol dge sogs mtha' yas sgo// de ltar sangs rgyas sras tshogs kyis// bya bral tshul dag rab tu bsngags// mi mnyam mnyam pa'i sngags kun las// /
139b7(rnying rgyud): brtse ba'i theg pa mchog/ bsod nams ye shes gnyis med pa'i// rgyal bas lung bstan mtha' las 'das// dkyil 'khor chen po gsang thob cing // gdams pas rjes su grol bar 'gyur// las kyi stobs kun dag mdzad pa'i// 'jig rten sgron ma de dag gis/
140a1(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa du mthun 'dug par tshe// gnas kun 'bral ldagags par thub// phyog bcu' sangs kyis thar 'das pas// sa sang dpal ni rdzogs bsta // ldan lam yangs su dag pa las// zhang kham dag pa
140a2(rnying rgyud): nas// thugs rje chen po mi gnyis pas// thams cad thams cad rnam par sbyor// byang chub sems dpa' mthu ldan pa'i// zab mo rgya chen gnas pa'i don// gsang ba gsar chen gsang ba'i mchog/ thams cad glan chen ston byed pa'o// rnam par thar pa de 'dzin
140a3(rnying rgyud): rnam pa sa pan na do nga ni// sa sa pa'i// bdag dag ragags/
140a4(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' spyod// theg pa'i mchog 'di zab mo nyid// yul kun skye zhing 'gag med rgyun/ de dag de las de 'bras bu// gang zhig gang gis gang bden 'dug/ de las ma byung chos med phyir// kun 'byung rgyu yi ye shes dngos// phyogs chos ris su ma
140a5(rnying rgyud): grub pa'i// bde ba byang chub sems kyi rgyud// rgya che sdang ba'i bye brag kun// dang snang der 'jug de yi chos// ji srid thog mtha'i bar gnas tshogs// nyid las 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor na// ldegasgra/ snang ba'i dus bzhin du// ma bcos gdong nas dngos ma
140a6(rnying rgyud): grub// zla ba'i gzugs kyis khyab pa'i dngos// ma 'igags sngon du gsal ba'i don// rgyu rkyen las grub rgya med pa// sgyu ma'i tshogs la zhen pa med// de dag 'ja' tshon ris kyi chos// so sor ma gagis dbyer med cing // rnam gsal de la brten pa'i mthas/
140a7(rnying rgyud): thongagasache ba'i yul las 'das// res 'jug dri za'i grong khyer rgyun// rang bzhin mi gnas 'gyur ba'i dngos/ mig yod snga chags dngos gcig bdag/ mtshon kyid brag cha'i rgyu las byung // gnas skabs dgos tshod las skyes pas// me mthun ris rnams 'dag dzu pa'i
140b1(rnying rgyud): su ma rnams da dang // ma parnams 'gas rgyan lang// mal sa rna pa'i thugs kyis gsal// gas na pa mdon gzhal yas// 'brel mad babyung bas bsgrub shad/ ma ba'ang dul sa ma byags/ ra sa
140b2(rnying rgyud): pa bachen po ye shes ldan// dbang po drug gisadus su 'jud // de dag nang gi rnal 'byor gyis// lhan cig skyes pa'i skyabs rgyas shing // khams gsum chos kyi phyag rgya rnams// gnyis maud bsgrub pa'i don 'jug pas// rab tu zhib 'dag med pa'i// gnyis med
140b3(rnying rgyud): shugs kyis gsal bar 'gyur// chos kun rang gi dngos 'dzing ba'i// chos nyid dngos bral byang chub sems// ji ltar gnas pa'i 'don bzhag pas// nam mkha'i khams dngos thob pa med// gar dag phyag rgya gzhan nas 'jug/ spa bras ltos pas rnam par dben/
140b4(rnying rgyud): bzhag pas bdag nyid rab tu rtogs// rdzu mtha' mi 'dzin 'gog pa med// ma lus spyod pa'i rgyun 'jug pa'i// pas ma mtha'i rgya mtsho khron pa'i chu// ji ltar 'byung chen na mkha'i dbyings// snying po ma 'gags rtsa la rdzogs pa'i// rnam par rtog tshogs
140b5(rnying rgyud): ye shes rgyun// de mtha' de rgyun de yi chos// ma lus byang chub sems kyi rgyan// nyon mongs sdug bsngal kun tu bzang // de nas 'jug pa'i yan lag bzung // A li kA li la spyod cing // bdud rtsi bcud rgyas de dag las// rtag tu me gnyis
140b6(rnying rgyud): mkhas pa'i sgo// kun spyod tshul mang bdag spyod pa'i// ma lus de don sdang brgya// spang blang med pa 'dzin chags bral// ro dogs bcad pa'i skyon brab pa'o// thams cad dkyil 'khor snang ba'o// sku mchog ye shes bzang po nyid/
140b7(rnying rgyud): stobs kyi yan lag bun// ma 'dres chos kyi tshulas byung // don kun gsal pa'i bdag nyid kyis// phyag rgya chen po kun ston cing // gser 'gyur rtsi yi rnam pa ltar// stong gsum rin chen rgyan gyis mchos// rnal 'byor rdzogs
141a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyud can 'ang // sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad pa mang// thams cad de las byung ba dang // yang dag gnas pa nyid kyi phyir// mchog tu bajugs pa'i dbang bya kun// bla na med pa nga bzhin nyid// rgyal bas rba
141a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'khor lo 'di// bskal par skal ldan rnams kyi don// zhes gsungs so// rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid byang chub kyi sems bkra shis mi 'gyur ba gsal bar gnas pa'i rgyud las/ ma byung ba'i dus su 'byung ba ste le'u bdun pa'o// / de nas
141a3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid// gnyis med sbyor ba'i snyoms 'dug las// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal mdzad cing // thams cad dbyings kyi rgyan du ston// byin rlabs sku gsung thugs nyid las// rang sdang byang chub sems kyi don// ma byung skye ba kun nyon cing //
141a4(rnying rgyud): ma 'gags gnyis med nam mkha'i ngos// bde gshegs snying po sems kyi dbyings// rtag tu mi 'gyur dngos nyi dpral// stong pa'i mtshan nyid gdod nas dang // phyogs 'dzin rigs kyi chos kun gsil// 'gro ba sna tshogs 'khor ba'i rgyun// zab ma
141a5(rnying rgyud): rang snang dkyil 'khor che// 'dod yon spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor las// kun bzang chos sku'i rnam par 'phrul// skye ba bzhi rdzogs bcud myos shing // nang gi chos kun rab tu gsal// phyogs bcu dus gsum nas bkod pa'i// sgrib tshogs de nyid
141a6(rnying rgyud): shes pa grol// bsod nams ye shes tshogs mtha' yas// rang bzhin stobs kyis grogs rgyas pa'i// rtogs mchog kun bzang zung 'dug blo// thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas brgyas spyod// chos kun snang ba ma 'dres gas la// theg
141a7(rnying rgyud): mchog tshul mang 'jug pa'i don// 'byung chen gyi nang ma 'gags pa'i// snang ba'i yon tan drin las tshogs// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor kun 'dus te// kun tu bzang po rol ston dang // kun 'dus byang chub sems kyi gzhi// stong pa'i ra
141b1(rnying rgyud): mam / nas rgyangs rgya da/ gci ga byanapa da ban / na pa pas // ma ma/ dag tan du /
141b2(rnying rgyud): shes sangs rgyas par// khyad par bstan pa ye shes tshul// sgra rgyun bsam don 'brel ba'i chos// bya ba rab tu rtog pa'i sgron// shes rab rnam gsum rgyu 'bras don// thams cad gnyis med bdag nyid che// rang bzhin rgyun gyi yon tan las// cha shas
141b3(rnying rgyud): so sor brtags pas dben// gdams ngag mngon sum gnang ba yis// nyams su myong nga skye bar 'gyur// bstan par yid ches mtha' bral ba'i// ma 'gags sku gsum khyab pa'i dngos// gang du bsgrub pa'i phyogs bral ba'i// de dag zhen
141b4(rnying rgyud): chags yul las 'das// 'di dag ye shes chen po'i rgya// byang chub sems nyid rol pa'i dbyings// gsang sngags ngo bo brtag dka' ba// shes 'jug rnam pa'i don ston byed// rnam shes brgyad rtogs ye shes nyid// spros pa'i don
141b5(rnying rgyud): 'jug tshogs kun bral// de bzhin nyid dbyings rtogs pa las// dam pa'i shes pa skye bar 'gyur// gang gis gang la gang ltar 'jug/ de dag de nyid de mtshungs chos// med dang yod rtogs tha snyad rgyud// ri bzhin pa yi don 'dug pa'i// dam
141b6(rnying rgyud): pa sangs rgyas de bzhin nyid// mi rtog dmigs pa'i mtha' yangs pa'i// spyi nyid snang bkod nam mkha'i chos// mi rtog 'jug pa'i yul ma yin// gnyis can gnyis su mi gdas pa'i// sems nyid chos nyid la gnas pa'o// de ltar de bzhin
141b7(rnying rgyud): nyid bzhag pas// don gsal byang chub yan lag go// phyi rol snang srid zhig rgya'i dngos// stong 'dzin dran gsal yul kun grol// phyi nang sgyu 'phrul rnam par dben// rnam par snang mdzad rgyal ba'i drod// de las der snang rnam pa'i chos// rgyan nyid rang las mi gzhan pa// pha rol
142a1(rnying rgyud): byin par rdzu shes rdzogs// kun tubazung po'i maman nyid can// sngon zlus 'gags slob sags thab// dus can 'thar bu zang ba mchag/ kaun byagasas pa gyur ba'am thas// ngab nyid kyi tsha 'phral 'tham// da
142a2(rnying rgyud): lam mnyam nyid las 'jug pa// zin rgyags lta ba rkom 'brel pa'i rgyan// theg pa'i bye brag byin gis// gol sgrib byang chub chen po'i lam// dang pa'i lam la gnas pa yis// mtshan bcas rnam par dkar ba'i chos// lus dga' bad pa la
142a3(rnying rgyud): byung bas// sems te da pag med gnas spyor bya// don byin pastod pa'i sto pa nyid// snang ba rnam pa'i rgyun rnams pas// thams cad pral drar spyod byed pa// des ni ning bachang ba 'gyur// rang rnams kyi/ dzin// sa nams
142a4(rnying rgyud): tshogs 'gyur ba'i// gzung bral mtha' las nam grol mchog/ bya ba kun gyis yang dag nyid// gang phying dngos kun ma gyes pas// der gnas bya ba kun bral // spang gzhi dor bas dgagu bslab med// gzhan gyi gnas kun stobs kyis 'dug/ rnam
142a5(rnying rgyud): 'byor chen po'i chos kun du// bin pa'i yul togs grol ba'i thabs// gnyis spong gnyis su med pa'i gnas// ri ma k+Shas cig char 'bru 'i chos// theg mtshig gzhan las 'phags pa'i don// mi dmigs ti 'dzin mo shes rgya// bkam
142a6(rnying rgyud): dbug bslab gza' gtid med// dkyil 'khor bdag sogs bkod pa med// rang rig pan chen dbang rdzogs pas// dam tshig gnyis med sbyin gyis thA ba// rtag tung gi don ba sgrub cing // yon tan chos kun ma 'gags pas// sna chags phyin las spyan
142a7(rnying rgyud): ra la// mnyam nyid spyad pa 'dobs mchog dang / ny+dza chod pa'i hrI kyis mnyes// de dag mnas nyid thas ci sras// rang bzhin ldan thapa rtse// ye shes spun chub zung drug gis // bdan nyad kyis kun 'bras tho mchog/ mangs spyong thams cang rdzogs /
142b1(rnying rgyud): rgya'/ yul bas gams can gas sa byas la// thams cang mkhyen pa 'das can tan/ ga sa rnams sanyis sum da pa gal// rnam mapa'i dkyil 'khor dbus pa zag/ rnams rgyas pa 'ad nga// rung ba rta
142b2(rnying rgyud): dris thobape ba ma rigs pa'o// ma rgas rnam pa dkyi la 'chog/ kyi chen pa dang byu sa/ rgyami rgyal ba gyis 'dasadzu'o// ng+yas rgyas bran gyi theg pa'i ga/ rnal 'byor dang brag gangs 'do/ sa
142b3(rnying rgyud): kyang // cha nas nyid du smras dang bral// de bzhin pa nas mi rtog pas// rnam par snang mdza kun tu bzang // zin pas rtsol ba'i nad spangs te// lhan gyis gnas pas bzhag payin// zhes gsungs so// rdzogs pa chen po byeng kyise byas pad+ma
142b4(rnying rgyud): par gsal bar banas bye rgyud pas/ chos rnams cad pa ni nying ldan pa'i len nyi brgyad pado// / de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// sa sarkyang bas mtshan bya nas// phyag 'tshal gyib TIgaston pa'ichog/ kun btang ltal gsal ba 'dabs
142b5(rnying rgyud): e matadan can gsang pa'i rgyud // thams cad kyang yin togs dga' ba// bsdu ba gtan pa dbang pa'i chul// dpe bcus chos 'byung rgyal nyi nga // de drug dgangs pa'i don bzhin du// byin rlabs thugs kyi gsang ba mchog/ rang bzhin gnas kyi zug tu \u0f7f/
142b6(rnying rgyud): mjug gsang ba'i spod sbrul nyid// sna tshogs rnam tshigam ba shan kyang // ma ljin banin nyid kyi dang // rnal 'byor blo mchog 'dug dran du// ye ge brjodon rnam pa gsum// ye nas gnas pa de bzhin nyid// rnam par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid// rang bzhin gas pa
142b7(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid// gcig gi gcig don gsal bar byed// ngo mtshar don kun mad byung ba'i// mi tshogs rgya mtsho'i gnas bgrod pa// dgongs pa'i dngos 'dug thams cad bdag/ thun mong khyad par sna tshogs pa'i// bcom ldan yon tan bsngags pa'i gnas// byang chub sems dkyi
143a1(rnying rgyud): ShA sa brgyad// subaldan 'ad chags gad du chun dran sa sapas// 'a
143a2(rnying rgyud): 'gyur gsal bar gnas// dpe yis dgongs don gsal byed cing // des ni sangs rgyas rnam par 'byed// rgya mtsho'i 'ams pas kun gyi rdo// rang bzhin dbyer med gnas pa'i chos// rigs gcing gdangs snyan skyon med pa'i// cha shas spros bral dmigs pa'i thabs
143a3(rnying rgyud): ldan pa pa rigs mtshungs mi 'gyur ba'i// rtse gcig bstan pas 'jug byed gnas// dus bzhin bla ba mi 'dor bas// gsal pa'i yon tamam 'gags pa'o// dab pa dbugs 'byir ma 'dzo ba rgyad dan rtson// sgrol dan bzhin 'phags pa'i
143a4(rnying rgyud): las kun phun sum tshogs pa'i gzhi// 'bras bu bya ba spangs pa'i chos// de dag khyad par mtshan nyid kyis// gsang ba bla na med pa'i rgyud// dus gzhan rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che// thams cad gsang sngags theg pa'i don// de nyid snying po byang chub
143a5(rnying rgyud): sems// bA dgra gzhan ro bo las skyes pa// gcig las du mar 'char ba dang // du ma gcig tu snang ba'i dngos// nyi ma mar me'i chos bzhin du// gzhi rtsa med de kun gsal ba'o// de'i phyir thams cad 'bras bu'i chos// ye shes yang dag rnam par rgyal/
143a6(rnying rgyud): dron kun 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor che// ma btsal ldan gyis rgyud tshogs ston// rdzogs pa tshon bcos nyid byang chub kyi sems bkra shis mi 'gyur bar gsal bar gnas pa'i hud las/ chos thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i lde'u ste dgu pa'o// de nas
143a7(rnying rgyud): gas tshogs sa rgyas kyis// bstan pa'i rgyud zhig ma // ji snyed 'dres pa mgrol chog// byin rlabs snang zer daphags pa'is/ ga rabs ngan ston pa// thams cad nyi rlo myal pa nga bzhin// ma lus rgyan ched kyarang dumab/
143b1(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' tshan kya byas dru// sadagags na sam rnadu nga pa// thabs da sa / ga / dang ga 'thub//
143b2(rnying rgyud): 'tshal 'dud// mchod pa rgya med rnam bkod pa// ma lus mnyes pa chen por sbyor// dam tshig chen po gsang sngags rtse// gsang ba'i sgo kun g.yo bi'i tshul// sprul pa'i bka' gzhan gzung byed cing // dam pa'i yi ge/ ma gsum bsrel// \u0f7f3
143b3(rnying rgyud): ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i gtso// bkra shis yi ge bzang po'i gnas// don kun phyag rgya'i tshogs bcas ston// rnam grol ye shes 'gyur ba med// thabs mchog rigs kun grangs med pa nig/ byang chub sems nyid bstod pa'i byanas// rtag tu ra
143b4(rnying rgyud): gnas yongs spyod// skul ba grangs mar gyur gzugs mchog/ thog ma'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzung // khyod kyi mtshan nyid mtshon par dkar// rtogs pas thams cad thol ba'i 'bras// rdo ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyi du can// bstod pa kun du zhi /
143b5(rnying rgyud): bdi gshegs yon tan bsngags pa'i mchog/ don rab 'byed pa'i gsal ba yis// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ston par byed// phyogs thal rdo rdzogasang ba'i sngags// nam mkha'i mna' bzhin brjod pa'i tshul// mdze ni rab dpag pa'i dka' ba'imag
143b6(rnying rgyud): gas partson pa chos nyid byed rgyab kyi sems/ bkra shis mi 'gyur bar byas la bar gnas pa'i lhad las/ bstan pa gtad bying rjes su sto pa'i leng ste cu // rdzogs pa sa nyid byang chub kyi sems bkra shis mi 'gyur bar gas
143b7(rnying rgyud): par gnas pa'i rgyud ces byang rdzogs so// / rgya gang gyi mkhan po'i ma la mi tra dang / spa sgyur gyi lo rje bachen po g.yu sgra snying pos bcu 'i theb pa dang bcas pa ba nas kyi 'ogs pa dang lung /
144a1(rnying rgyud): rtag shA ngang/ tas pa \u0f7f/ nak+Sha Sh+Ta ban+d+ha b+h+yad+hAm/ bdan dang / byang chub sems kyiman nganathon pa 'i phreng ba ba dam da phrar gyi rloms mam na/ bcomaldan 'das dpa' kun d+habang ba byab
144a2(rnying rgyud): lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ 'og min gyi gnas/ chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang / mkha' klong yangs pa'i gnas/ rgya yongs su ma chad pa na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po des/ 'khor sangs rgyas dang sems can yi dgas
144a3(rnying rgyud): dang / 'dre srin la sogs pa 'byed pa med pa'i 'khor gyis bskor te/ byang chub kyi sems rnam par 'grel cing / dus gsum du ci bzhin par bzhugs so// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje la sogs pa 'dus pa'i 'khor tshegs rnams/ dang ba'i sems kyis lus btud de/
144a4(rnying rgyud): kyis 'khod pa de// 'dod pa'i don ni sgo sol cig/ ces gsungs so// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje 'khor gyi nang nas langs nas/ gsang ba'i bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// chos nyid byang chub sems kyi don// bdag cag rnams la
144a5(rnying rgyud): bstan du gsol// zhes gsol to// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ chos tid don gying ba de// chag dang yi ge las 'das shing // brjod pas thob tu ni pheb ste// rang ni dab brjod med kyang // mthun pa'i tshig gis mamatshon na//
144a6(rnying rgyud): ngong rtags mi 'gyur// chos rnams thams cad brdar bstan gyis// yid kyi dbang po rna par chug// rnaba'i dbang ngos sprul ton// dper na me nyid 'dod pas kyang // ma 'dod cheg tu ma bzod na// me dang phrad pa zhin tu dka'// me 'dod tshib tu brjod pas na// me pa
144b1(rnying rgyud): bcom med// du na tu nyung rtogs 'do pas// na na ma par byas nyid la// ra bzhin mang pas mtshan te bstan// brjod mang du gyis nyid de// brjod mar rnyog gis mtshan te bstan// dmyigs su ma da tshang nyid// dbyed pa rje ga gis mjo rtag
144b2(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' lta bu'i chos nyid do// nam mapa'i dpe yis mtshan te bstan// zhes gsungs so// bar mdzod 'phrul gyi lde mig las/ gleng gzhi dang gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad rjes gsol to// rtse gsang ba'i bdag
144b3(rnying rgyud): lags// chos nyid rang gi bod// ma bshad go bar mi 'gyur te// dri 'i bzhad lugs ci ltar lags// gsung ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa// skye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ man gdon gyi bad lugs ni// don ci bshad khrag
144b4(rnying rgyud): lnga yis bshad// lorgyas don gyis bshad lugs dang // rtsa ba'i don gyis bshad lugs dang // yo ga'i don gyis bshad lugs dang // dgos ched don gyis bshad lugs dang // tshig gi don dang lnga yis bshad// ces gsungs so// yang zhus pa// kye kye gsang ba'i
144b5(rnying rgyud): po legs// gtan tshigs don gyi bshad lugs smras// ma bzhing skyon ni ni ltar lags// bshad pa'i yon tan ci ltar 'gras// gsang ba'i bdan ngas bskrun du gsol// zhes rgyas s+ho// gsang ba'i bdag pos bsrungs pa/ kye sems dpa' chen po ston cig
144b6(rnying rgyud): po rgyus don gyis ma bshad na// yid 'i rgyas pa'i skyon du 'gyur// rtsi ba'i don gyis ma bshad na// chos rnams sems su mi 'dubyas// mtha' yas pa'i sbyin du 'gyur// yo ga don gyis ma bshad na// theg pa'i shan zang mi byed pas// khyad mi rnyed pa'i myo du
144b7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// dgos ched don gyis ma bshad na// rtsol bsgrub bya btsal ma byas par// sangs rgyas sa la don med 'gyur// tshig gi don gyis ma bshad na// tshig dang don du mi bsdeb pas// 'bru yi tshom pa'i skyon du 'gyur// de bzlog bshad pa'i yon tan yin
145a1(rnying rgyud): gas smra bad+mad// na nas nga// 'am da ldan
145a2(rnying rgyud): byas pa'ang da / bshadang bla nI/ des 'did ladag sus dngas mi byin pas kyis shang pa yi/ de'i sa skyes/ ci byangs nas bcar/ mas dpas
145a3(rnying rgyud): nas tas// jongs mad pas nam mang nyid kyil nas bshad// das kyi sa nas / na ma byan pa/ nga bzhis gtud de 'dun su mnyam// 'damadapal bshes pa byen ma na
145a4(rnying rgyud): sa sa na ni/ ngas pa // rna sa sa
145a5(rnying rgyud): mas shAng stsal nyon/ nga
145a6(rnying rgyud): byed kyang di nis / 'ad kyi todad/ shi phyi// zlas na mam da/
145b1(rnying rgyud): da sa / sma // ma byas/ ga nas zhugs// gzugs sa bsgrubs sa gan// su /
145b2(rnying rgyud): rigs lta bu'i blos// mi 'tshams pa ni tsham par bshad// rig babrum thun lta bu'i blos// bsgom pa'i dmigs ni brtul te bshad// rgyal po'i bang mdzod lta bu'i blos// dgos dbye rang 'i tshong bar bshad// dang mo gzhi ba 'gros wu byi'i blos// sa rgya'i tshig sa
145b3(rnying rgyud): don brel bshad// pho rog mo tog lta bu'i bros// g+hol sgrib gad r+ya sha bcad nas bshad// spa gri so 'debs lta bu'i blos// theg pa'i shan thang kyis te bshad// glang chen zur 'dug lta bu'i blos// spyong dbyung dor med par bshad// mi stsol par yang mi bshad cing //
145b4(rnying rgyud): lagrags pa phyung ba 'du 'i bya// zhes gsu ma'i mamasapa mdu pa dbang ngas na'adren pas btu dug mang// gas pa'i 'das pas gsangs pa// sems dpa' 'a nyon ma/
145b5(rnying rgyud): po yang rab gyu rab yi// shes rab can la 'chad tsam na// rgyud dang lung dang man ngag gsum// don gyi spyi khog phub ste bshad// chos nyid nyams su len pa yi// rnal 'byor ba la 'chad tsam na// lha bsgom spyod pa 'bras bu bzhi// rang rang mtshan nyid ngos bzung nas//
145b6(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba'i ltung dang po skad de// byang chub sems dang don sbyar nas// dgongs pa mchog bsde ba dag tu bshad// thun mong tshogs la bshad tsam na// dkyus 'gros bsrang zhing chog 'bru gnyer// khyad par slob mar khrid tsam na// man drag gnang bsgeg zigs su bshad// ces
145b7(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// bang mdzod 'argyal gyi lde'u mig las/ byang chub sems bshad pa'i be'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas sems dpa'ardo rjes yang gsol pa/ kye gsang pa'i bdag po lags// rang sems bla ma snang ba'i don// de don bdag la bstan du gsol/
145b8(rnying rgyud): dgongs mchog rdzab badrug tu yang //
146a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ gsarang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa// rang sems bla mar snang ba la// de la rnam pa gsum yod de// sems nyid tu'i blam dang // 'bras bu sems kyi bla ma dang // rang snang chos kyi dam ma// sems nyid rtswa yi bla ma na// rtog ge skam po rigs chad pa/
146a2(rnying rgyud): log sred can ni ma yin te// rtog pa ye shes blo dman gyi// 'khor 'das gnyis la birtags byas pas// bde dang sdug bsngal gnyis su mthong // 'de sdug gnyis la brtags byas pas// dge sdig gnyis las byung bar dran// dran pa'i sems kyis dad pa bskul/
146a3(rnying rgyud): dad pa'i sems kyis brtson 'grus bskul// brtson 'grus chen po'i bla ma des// shes rab rnam gsum blo byas te// ting 'dzin don la nan tan bsgom// ting 'dzin mthu brta sa ye shes rgyas// ye shes mngon gyur chos kyi sku// de las gzugs sku rnam pa gnyis/
146a4(rnying rgyud): ti zla'i 'od dang gzugs brnyan bzhin// thogs pa med par shugs kyis 'byung // bstan pa theg pa dkur bkod nas// gang 'thad yul la 'debs su gzhug/ 'bras bu sems kyi bla ma ni// shes pa so ma ma bcos pa// 'bras bu rang snang lu gsum tshul//
146a5(rnying rgyud): chos kyi sku ru sdang // ngo bo longs spyod rdzogs skur snang // thugs rje sprul pa'i sladra snang // sems rgyud gcig gi ngo bo la// ston pa sku gsum rang bzhin gnas// rang snang chos kyi bla ma ni// 'byung chen lnga yi bla ma dag// 'dod yon lnga sogs bla ma yis// tshig dang
146a6(rnying rgyud): ges mi ston par// rang gi ngo bos chos ston pa// bdag gzhan gnyis su mi rtog pa// rang snang ngo bos chos ston to// zhes gsungs so// bang mdzod 'phrul gyi lde'u mig las/ rang sems ston par byung ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas sems dpa
146a7(rnying rgyud): yang gsol pa/ kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// sbas pa ga' ba'i don ci lags// gsing ba'i bdag pos bsnyen du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa// rtse kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ chos can mtshan ma rgya mtsho'i klong dkyil na// chos nyid gas
146b1(rnying rgyud): nya mo gab nas bag la nyal// kun rdzob sgyu ma rgya mtsho'i klong dkyil na// don dam gser gyi nya mo gab nas bag la nyal// 'khor ba rgya mtsho sems kyi klong dkyil na// sangs rgyas gser gyi nya mo gab nas bag la nyal// 'gro drug sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i klong
146b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil na// bde chen gser gyi nya mo gab nas bag la nyal// ma rig 'khrul pa'i rgya mtsho'i klong dkyil na// ye shes gser gyi nya mo gab nas bag la nyal// rgyal ba'i mdo rgyud rgya mtsho'i klong dkyil na// dgongs pa gser gyi nya mo gab nas bag la nyal// rdo rje slob dpon
146b3(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi klong dkyil na// gdams ngag gser gyi nya mo gab nas bag la nyal// zhes gsungs so// bang mdzod 'phrul gyi lde'u mig las/ gser gyi nya mo gab nas bag la nyal ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas sems dpang rdo rje des/ gsang ba'i bdab
146b4(rnying rgyud): po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye rtse gsang pa'i bdag po lags// gab pa ngos bzung ci ltar bzung // gsang ba'i bdage pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan pa/ chos can mtshan mar snang ba la/ chom nyin da pogapa ni// dper na'ang 'tshon rgyu
146b5(rnying rgyud): 'dra// kun rdzob sgyu ma'i bde ba la// don dam bde ba gab pa ni// dper na rmi lam gzugs dang 'dra// khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can la// dus gsum sangs rgyas gab pa ni// dper na mar dang 'o ma 'dra// khams gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la// bde ba
146b6(rnying rgyud): chen po gab pa ni// dper na dug dang dug sman 'dra// ma rig pa yi 'khrul rtog la// rang byung ye shes ga bab ni// rin chen 'dam gyis g.yogs pa 'dra// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i mdo rgyud la// dgongs pa zab mo gab pa ni// dper na me shel chu shel 'dra// bla ma
146b7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje'i thugs mdzod la// gdams ngag zab mo gab pa ni// bum pa'i nang gi mar me 'dra// zhes gsungs so// bang mdzod 'phrul gyi lde'u mig las/ gab pa ngos bzung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes yang gsol pa//
147a1(rnying rgyud): ru gsang bar bdag pa lags// rtsa ba'i don ni ci ltar bshad// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos bsungs pa// byang chub sems kyi chos nyid de// yod ni gcig las med pa la// byung na snang
147a2(rnying rgyud): kri dkan dbyung // khyab ni snod brgyad kun la khya// bstan ni theg pa dgu ru bstan// 'dus ni byang chub sems su 'dus// yi ni ni chos kyi sgra yin te// bstan du med pas dngos po med// gzung du med pa'i yul las 'das// mtshon du mtshungs pa gang yang med// cis
147a3(rnying rgyud): so// bang mdzod 'phrul gyi lde'u mig las/ lha gdon gyi bshad lugs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// / yang gsol pa/ kyi kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// yo ga'i don ni ji ltar bshad// rnal 'byor bzhi 'i bye brag ci// gsang pa'i bdag pos bstan du gsol/
147a4(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa/ sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ yul dang dbang po rnam par mi rtog sems// de ni sems dpa'i rnal 'byor yin// byang chub yan lag cho 'phrul 'byin pa ni// de ni rnal 'byor chen po yin// phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa ni// de ni yongs su rnal 'byor yin// ye shes dam/
147a5(rnying rgyud): garang bzhin med blta ba// de ni gan d+ha rnal 'byor yin// zhes gsungs so// yang gsungs pa/ rang rgyud dag pa'i ye shes de ni sems dpa'i rnal 'byor yin// ting 'dzin nam gsum rim gyis smras bsgom pa// do ni rnal 'byor chen po yin// bsnyen bslab ba zhi'i 'grong
147a6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs byed pa// de ni yongs su rnal 'byor yin// sarba bdag nyid chen por blta ba ni// de ni shin tu rnal 'byor yin// zhes gsungs so// yang gsungs pa/ ting 'dzin rnam gsum rim gyis mi bsgom par// rang rgyud dag pas ye shes brta byed pa// de ni sems dpa'
147a7(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor yin// yab yum thabs dang shes rab mi bsgom par// snying po tsam gyis dkyil 'khor rdzogs byed pa// de ni rnal 'byor chen po yin// rgya dbyings 'bras bu ye shes lta byed pa// de ni yongs su rnal 'byor yin// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pa// de ni shin tu
147b1(rnying rgyud): nalung ra yin// nas gsungs pa// yang gsangs pa// shAng dang ma dang byung chub sams// de ni sems dpa'i rnapa 'gro las// tshol babrub 'das pa'i byang chub sems// donan pa 'byor chen po yin// d+hu 'bras 'das pa byang chub sams// dan 'ongs su
147b2(rnying rgyud): 'byor yin// sgo bur 'das pa'i byang chub sems// de ni shin tu rnal 'byor yin// zhes gsungs so// bangar dzod 'phrul kyi ldeng mig las/ lo ga'i don gyi bshad lugs las/ rnal 'tsher rnam bzhi'i bye brag bstan po'i le'u ste bdun pa 'o// / yang gsol pa// kye kye gas /
147b3(rnying rgyud): bdag po lags// dngos dang bsam gyi bye brag ni// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ kye kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ brtags pa thams cad blo yis brtags// bzung ba thams cad blo yis bzung // phye ba
147b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad blo yis bya// brjod pa thams cad sngo yis brjod// sdang ba thams cad grol snang // grub pa thams cad tho las grub// sku dang ye shes don dam bden// bsam dbang phyogs na grags pa las// dngos dbang phyogs na de mi grag/ ci snang ci srid thams
147b5(rnying rgyud): cad kun// bsam dbang 'khrul pa'i ngos la sdang // sangs rgyas sgra dang ye shes dang // sems can lus dang bag chags ni// 'khrul pa rang gi ngo bo yin// de brtags blo la snang ba ni// 'khrul pa 'khrul nas 'khrul pa'i phul du snang // tho mi thag yul smrig rgyu
147b6(rnying rgyud): chur// log pa'i kun rdzob gsum 'khrul yin// de bzlog pa ni dngos kyi dbang // yin min tha snyad sgo sbyar kun dang bral// zhes gsungs so// bang mdzod 'phrul gyi lde'u mig las/ dngos bsam gyi khyad par 'byed pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//
147b7(rnying rgyud): gsol pa// kye phyogs pa'i bdag pa lags// sem nyid tshig le nyag gcig la// theg pa dgu byeb yi// de yi gtan tshigs ci ltar lags// gsang ba'i bdage ngos gsungs pa// sems dpa' chen mo nyon cig/ sems kyi rang bzhin gcig mod kyang //
148a1(rnying rgyud): sems sas ngas na// yang ba ba dgas sa // dbas spyod du// na bar bsgyud rdugasapasnam du bsas// dab ga nga na rnaM ga shA ta// dang
148a2(rnying rgyud): dani/ snod gsum mi theg pa bsnam// zhes gsungs so// ba mngod su kyi byig sa/ theg par byu btu rdzogs bstan pa'i 'idzisti dbupa / yang nasosos thugs nga bdig labs dgas
148a3(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid dgi zla brtan pa cimi lags// nang ba thugs kyi theg dul// 'bras bu rdu kyi ltar btags// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan dus sol// gsungs pa/ sems dpang rjen to cig/ mthan te kyi 'i jig pa ni// dag ga las kyis thas dang // 'dra
148a4(rnying rgyud): bde dang thug bsngal 'dod// zlos skyong dge bas rgyu byed nas// de nyid la mad 'byor ba'i phyir// rgyu 'i theg par bstan pa yin// 'bas bya 'i theg pani// drug tu'i dkyil 'khor lam byas nas// 'bras dung tha~Md lam du rjer// rang gi lus dag pa gang sa ni// phyag nga
148a5(rnying rgyud): gsang pa'i bangadag ngos pakun du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag thos gsungs pa/ sems dbang man nyon cig/ thug pa'i dun rno ban pong de// na bdag gi 'phar na dang // spyod pa'i rung na dang gnyis// thabang tu byor to dang gargyang// nges pa'i gsong rnyed par ma/
148a6(rnying rgyud): dran pa'i dbar na bye'o// nyin mangs drug gsu ma'im sacang // nyon mongs drag gsum no byebs// kun na ni sems kyi bar gyi/ dang podza pe na po// gci cho ma mthog ma rnamam byas// rno 'i che du tshu/ da yang bani
148b1(rnying rgyud): par ngan gsum// brjod pasum bya rna yis brnad // blod bsum byas+ho nas// chos spyod dus pang rnamigags// mnan nyid cig sa d+hAts+tshata// mal bdan pani gnas ru // lamanan pa'adun sa 'dug lal ba nu tas na 'ang
148b2(rnying rgyud): nas// kun gzhi sems kyi 'ang bu na// nor bu rin chen yod pa de// phra rags shes pa'i sgrib bas bsgribs// nor bu rin chen den stor// thabs kyi sbyor ba'i sgo gyibs// dag pa gsum gyi sbyor zhugs te// kun gzhi sems kyi khang blan// nor tha ri rje pon
148b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i// gzung 'dzin phra mo'i rtog pas bsgribs// nor bu rin chen de ru sbyor// lta skyod gnyis kyi sgor zhugs nas// kun gzhi sems kyi khang bu na// nor bu rin chen yod pa de// ye rnams chos kyi sgrib pas bslabs// nor bu rin chen der stor// phyag rgya bzhi yi sgor
148b4(rnying rgyud): gas nas// banag ni sems kyi khyang ben// nor ba sngon pa/ khang daM ga nyis ga pas pa sa// tsan can ts+tsha// thabs dang gas rab dz+nyAnas// kun ga'i se rgyas kyi kha thun// rdo rtson 'ad pade// rgyal zhing bsgrub
148b5(rnying rgyud): sa bsgribs// nor bu rin chen de ru snor// dbyings dang ye shes sbyor zhugs nas// kun gzhi sems kyi khang bun// nor bu rin rtsen yod pa de// rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs// nor bu rin chen de ru stor// rim pa brgyad kyi blta ba yis// rang la yod pa'i
148b6(rnying rgyud): che// rang rang lha spyod rtsol bas bsgribs// nor bri rin chen mthong ba med// nges pa'i gsang rdo byes nas ni// gnyis med ye shes sgor zhugs te// rang phreng ye shos chen po yis// ma bcos mnyam bzhag mig gis bltas// sdang med sems kyi don mthong
148b7(rnying rgyud): bas// ma mthong ba yi mthong ba'i ming// brgyad kyis ma mthong rin po che// shin tun la 'byor chen po'i mig gis mthong // mthang yang de la rjes gzung med// theg pa rim pa brgyad po yis// rang shig mdu bzhag nas gzhan du btsal// bskal par btsal yang
149a1(rnying rgyud): bya mi rnye pas// mdangs pas namamakha 'artsegs pa'adra// zhes gsungs so// bar mdzad 'phrul gyi the'atshig las/ theg pa'i 'dug no bstan pa'i 'dus bcu rtag pa // pang gsul ba/
149a2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag po lags// theg pa'i bsrung mtshams ji ltar lags// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ kye kye sems dpa' chen po ton cig/ nyan thos rang rgyal bsrung mtshams ni// nyis brgya lnga bcu'i 'dul khrims
149a3(rnying rgyud): rnams// dka' thub drag pos bsrung bar byed// mdo sde'i thog pa'i bsrung mtshams ni// rtsa ba'i sdom pa bzhi rdo la// gye bas sdom pa nyi shu bsrung // bya ba'i rgyud kyi theg pa ni// mi ta mas yan lag bdun po srung // yo ga pa'i theg pa ni// rtsa ba gsum dang phan lag bdun/
149a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i srung ba bcu pa ni bzung// maN+Da ho ga rbaglang ni// Ni ba gsum dang yan lag lnga// bye bas nyi sh+tsaHbrgyad baphreng // ar+d+ha dI'i thog pa ni// snang srid rgyab rgya'i dkyil 'khor ni// ming dang rgyan tso dam tshig bsrung // ma d+hi yo na'i thug pa ni// med pa ni rgyal ba dang /
149a5(rnying rgyud): gcig pa dang ldan gyig / yo ba dpa tshog// depas 'das na gru / nags cags margyad ni// bzung na dun kyis mthab te// sa ma ni shun rje 'du ma nyid la// mabacos pa tha shan ste// gtas sam
149a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i ye shes te// mnyam nyid g.yo ba med pa ni// dam chog thams cad bsrung ba yin// nyams pa'i cha dang byung ba las// mgon rgyabs de las che ba med// ces gsungs so/ bang mdzod 'phru gyi rjewa mig las/ theg pa ma sa'i bsrung mtshams dang / gso zangs bstan pa
149a7(rnying rgyud): le'u bcu gnyis pan// rang gsol pa/ kye rtsegs pa'i 'dzin pa gas// rab rtan pa theg pa dag// ga tan 'theg pa'o// spyod pa'i dzin la ci steng lags// gsang ba'i bdag ngos brtan dugasong // gas
149b1(rnying rgyud): pos gsungs pa/ sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ chad par lta ba'i spyod pa ni// rgyu yod 'bras bu med brtags nas// dge ba bcu spang mi dge bzla// gang la thogs pa med par spyod// rtag par lta ba'i spyod pa ni// mi dge brgya spang dge ba brgya// dka'
149b2(rnying rgyud): thab chen pos spyod par byed// nyan thos dag bcom pyodang pa ni// dge babargya dang mi dag btso// bde sdug lngas d+hA stegs nas// mi dge bang+gA srang babang// nga gdon du spyod pa byed// rang rtsal gnyis ka'i da na du rkyod// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod bu ni//
149b3(rnying rgyud): yi dge bcu spang dge ba brgya// gzhan gyi don du rtsod par byed// pha rol phyin pa bcu dag ni// bdagra gzhan gnyis ka'i don du spyod// bya ba'i rgyud dang gnyis ka'i rgyud// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod bzhi// bdag gzhan gnyis kA'i don du spyod// rnal 'byor rgyud kyi theg
149b4(rnying rgyud): pa ni// snying rje la sosrogs tshad med bzhi// gzhan gyi don du spyod par byed// bskyed pa ma hA yog ni// ta na dang ni g+han dang // dam rdzas bdud rtsi lnga po la// thabs chen blta ba'i spyod pas spyod// rdzogs pa A nu yo ga ni// dbyings dang ye shes ljongs khyod rdzogs//
149b5(rnying rgyud): At+yai yo ga'i spyod pa ni// lta bsgom srog dang ldan pa yi// shugs las byung ba'i spyod pa ni// ci ltar smyon pa'i spyod pa bzhin// gang la'ang thogs pa med par spyod// ces gsungs so// bang mdzod 'phrul gyi lde'u mig las/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
149b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcwa gsum pa'o// / yang gsol ba/ kyai kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// theg pa'i gol sgrib ci ltar lags// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ sems dpa' chen po nyod kyig
149b7(rnying rgyud): gang sgribar zhing po ni// 'og ma 'og ma'i blta bas ni// gong ma ma mthong sgrib pa yin// gong ma gang mas spyod pa ni// 'di ltar spyad pes galas byung // phyid nagol sgrib dbye ni/ blta ba'i gopa sgrib dbye ba dang // theg pa'i gol sgrib bstan pa ni// rgol
150a1(rnying rgyud): phyir na co brgyad de// sgrib slong gsum phyir brgyaganyis// bsgoms pas sum du tham pa'o// nya ba gal N+DI ba bstan pag// sbyang dang ning mthag dang / bran las dang ni lags dang // sa dang 'a byangs pa dang / ba
150a2(rnying rgyud): rgyud dang ni// lung dang man ngag rnam pa bcu// de las byi bas gol sgri ba ni// sum cu drug cu'i grangs su mod// la la dag la go las mang // la la gol sgrib mnyam par 'dod// rdzogs chen a ti yo ga la// gol dang mgo la gnyis su med// ces gsungs so// bang
150a3(rnying rgyud): mdzod 'phrul gyi lde'u mig las// gol sgrib rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // yang gsol pa/ kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// 'jig rten pa yi theg pa dang // 'jig rten 'das pa'i theg pa yi// lta ba'i khyad par ji ltar lags// gsang
