150a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// yang gsungs pa/ sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ 'jig rten pa yi theg pa ni// sum brgya drug cu'i grangs snyed yod// de la lta ba bsdus pa ni// 'jig tshogs drug cu'i grangs snyed yod// sngon gyi mthar gtogs bco brgyad dang // phyi
150a5(rnying rgyud): ma'i mtha' la gtogs pa ni// bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi'i grangs su yod// bsdoms pas drug cu rtsa gnyis yod// de las bsdus na nyi shu yod// de las bsdus pas rnam pa bzhi// blta ba de dag rgyas pa ni// tshangs pa'i dra ba'i mdo las gsal// de las bsdus pa rnam pa gnyis//
150a6(rnying rgyud): rtag pa dang ni chad pa'o// mu stegs chad pa'i lta ba ni// rgyu yod 'bras bu med pa ni// lung dang rig pa gnyis kyis 'dod// rtag par lta ba'i lta ba ni// rgya yod 'bras bu yod par blta// sems can kun gyi snying dkyil na// bdag ces bya ba'i dngos po zhi / che ste chen mtho
150a7(rnying rgyud): por tsam// chung ste drung na yungs 'bru tsam// yang chung sgra yi rtse mo tsam// lus kyi phongs dang sbyar te yod// pha li rgya las ma byung zhing // ma yi rkyen gyis ma bskyed de// shes shing rig pa'i ngo bo ru// dus gsum 'phe 'gyur med pa ni// bdag nyid rtag pa chen por 'dong //
150b1(rnying rgyud): ces gsungs so// bar mdzod 'phrul gyi rjen mig las/ 'jig rten pa'i bsgru ba bstan pa 'i bya ste pa ca pa'o// / yang gsol pa/ kye kye gsang ba'i bdag pa lags// nyan thos lta 'arda ltar lags// gsang bar bdag pas pa na
150b2(rnying rgyud): gsol// gsung ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ kye kye sems dpa' chen po nyon// nyan thos sgru ba rnam gnyis te// bye brag pa dang mardo rje'o// bye brag don dam rdul phran cha// cha med rdzogs dang bcas par 'dod// mdo sde g.yag rnga ni seng tshul// kun rdzob
150b3(rnying rgyud): sgyu ma'i tshul du 'dod pa yin// rang rgyal phyogs gcig de dang mthun// de las khyad par 'phags pa ni// rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i// gzugs la bdag med khyad par 'phags// nang gi shes pa skad cig ma// skye 'gag can rdo rgyu 'bras med// rjes gsungs
150b4(rnying rgyud): ping mdzod 'phrul gyi lde'u mig las/ nyan thos rang rgyal gyi lta ba mdor bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // yang gsol pa/ kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// mdo sde byang chub sems dpa' yi// de yi lta ba ci ltar 'gas// gsang ba'i bdag pos
150b5(rnying rgyud): bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ mdo rje'i lta ba gsum yod de// sems tsam yod pa'i dbu ma dang // mdo sde spyod pa'i dbu ma'o// rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dbu ma'o// sems tsam la yang gnyis yod/
150b6(rnying rgyud): de// rnam bcas dang ni rnam med do// rnam bcas la yang gnyis yod de// rnam pa bden rdzun gnyis su 'dod// rnam pa bden pa'i lta ba na// gyi yi yul dang nang gi sems// don dam du ni 'brel med kyang // kun rdzob tu ni 'brel bar 'dod// nang gi shes
150b7(rnying rgyud): paskad cig ma// skad cig cha yis mi rtag ste// de nyid rgyun gyis rtag pa'o// snga ma snga mas rgya bas nas// khyim gyi ma 'bras bur 'dod// rnam par rtsan pa'i blta ba ni// shes pa bden te rnam pardzun// rnam par shes dang mgo snyoms pa// yang dag
151a1(rnying rgyud): na/ ban na// ngan da mdam cang nas/ rdzu / yang bral dzad dang / nas pa gags pa ca// dbus nanams nga da// rgyu' bdu nan gyub// gnas mang la gas shel sas//

151a3(rnying rgyud): sas du
151a4(rnying rgyud): yaM wal ltar snang ba ni// kun rdzob rgyu ma'i tshul tsaman+t+ra// 'a 'tshon bu la'i rdul du sdang // bang mdzod 'phre rje ldi ga las/ mngodzo rji kyis lci ba bstan par 'ang+ga haM bcu bdun pa // / yang gsol pa/ kyai rtsi gsang ba'i bdag po lcags/
151a5(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags sta ba ci skar lags// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsungs pa/ sems dpa' chen po nyo cig/ gsang sngags thun maung lta ba ni// bden pa gnyis kyis mu bzung ste// don dam skye 'gag med par 'dod// kun rngubargyag

151a7(rnying rgyud): bas ni// byang chub rje dang cotsho 'phrul bzhis// longs su btags nas rung // dayang thun dang grags ngab rgyar// daspyod pa ba sa ga na/ dgasum dang de stan bsgrub bzhis// rang sa sa brtags nas su 'dzid// pa shes ngam
151b1(rnying rgyud): mi'adzin// rdzogs pa anu log ni// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// lha dang lha ma dkyi' 'khor du// mab kyed rdzogs pa'i tshul du 'dod// ces gsungs so// bang mdza da phral gyi rdziT mig pas/ sngags thun mang gi blta ba bstan par 'du bca btun
151b2(rnying rgyud): 'dod / yang gsopa bya/ the rjegasang pa'i bdug pa lags// rdzogs chen ma N+Da yog pa// kye gdan pa bye ba pas// dang yo ba N+DI ba 'dod btsun pang// rang ga po cag lags// gsang ba'i 'dag pos bzhad du gsol// gsungs pa/
151b3(rnying rgyud): dpa' chen po nyon cig/ rdzogs brjen po'i lta ba ni// ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pa yin// dun bral rdzi ma spangs pa yin// rgya chang phyogs lhung med pa yin// yin tshwal nges pa med pa la// sngang tshul cing yang snang ba yin// rang bzhin gcig tu mnges pa// blta bangs
151b4(rnying rgyud): bzung med pa yin// zhes gsungs so// yang gsol ba/ kye rtsegs pa'i 'dug lags// ngami gtan nags kyi gang lags// gseng ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsapa// gsungs pa// sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ brgyad kyi lha srung ma 'thus pa// rdzogs
151b5(rnying rgyud): rgyal cher yang snang ba'i rdul// gang yang rnam chad pa yin// zhes gsungs so// bang mdzod 'phrul gyi lderje mig las/ lta ba mdor bstan pa'i 'ji ste bcu dgra pa // / yang sems dpa' rdo rjes gsol pa// de yi snang tshul ci ltar lags// gsang
151b6(rnying rgyud): bdag pas bsnyen du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ byang chub sems la kun brten pas// byang chub sems nis sbyar snang // byang chub sems kyis kun sngang bas// byang chub sems ni chu skar snang // kun la d+ha
152a1(rnying rgyud): shing sman byed pas// byang chub sems ni ma ltar sna// gzugs med mkha' la byung byed// byang chub sems ni rlung ltar sdung// thang me kun la khyab pa m+b+hi// byung chub mkha' ltar snang nas gsungs/
152a2(rnying rgyud): kun gzhi sems ni nam mkha' la// rang byung ye zhes rang shar bas// byang chub sems nI shar phyogs yin// chos skya rang la yod pa ste// ma bcos mnyam par bzhag pas blo// byang chub sems ni lho phyogs yin// mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa kum
152a3(rnying rgyud): gnyis med ye shes dang dra nub// byang chub sems ni nub phyogs yin// byang chub sems kyi chos nyid la// nyon mongs sbyin gyis mgos pas// byang chub sems ni byung phyogs yin// chos rnams cab sems su 'dus// byang chub sems ni da bras kyang
152a4(rnying rgyud): sa dan nas yin/ mirtag pa'i bzhis das// sa ma rnaM la marnan sa/ ngan sa/ sa gzu mas/
152a5(rnying rgyud): gcig byang sgrub sems// zla bzhing rnam pam 'phros pas// byang chub sems ni zlum pa yin// nam ma pa'i mthang ltar kun khyab pas// byang chub sems ni zla ba zhi yin// byang chub sems kyi chos nyid ni// chos rnams ma lus dbang du spyad// byung chub sems
152a6(rnying rgyud): ni zla ga ma yin// byang chub sems kyi chos nyid do// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid kyis// byang chub sems ni zur gsum yin// zhes so// yang gsungs pa/ byang chub sems kyi chos nyid la// nyon mongs byo gyis ma gos pas// byang chub sems ni dkar po
152a7(rnying rgyud): yin// che ba'i yon tan 'byung ba'i phyir// byang chub sems ni ser po yin// thugs rje kun la chags pa'i phyir// byang chub sems ni dmar poyin// gang 'jogs med spyod pa'i phyir// byang chub sems ni ljang bu yin// tshogs ci yang sdang ba'i bya//
152b1(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems mthu bu yin// gzhan gyis bskur dum btababyer// byang chub sams ni nagru pa phyin// zhes so// yang gsungs // byang chub pamang du sa nyid na// ma thus stong bsgrub med// de na gzugs med khams yin no// rgya ba na cha bya
152b2(rnying rgyud): gzugs snang ba// de ni gzugs kyi khams yin te// 'dod spyod snying rjes kun 'dus pa// de ni 'dod pa'i khams su yin// zhes so// yang gsungs pa// snang ba thams cad sems la snang // des na sems nyid gzugs kyang yin// grag pa sarba sems
152b3(rnying rgyud): la grag/ des na sems nyid sgra yang yin// dri mchogs rba sems lA mnam// des na sems nyid dri yang yin// ro mchog sarba sems la bro// des na sems nyid ro yang yin// reg byas na sems la tshor// des na sems nyid reg kyang yin// zhes so// yang
152b4(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa// 'dod pa srid gsum sangs rgyas 'dod// thugs rje dang gis de la chags// sems ni 'dod chags yin par 'dod// zhi ba byang chub sems la zhe// rdza ba 'khor ba'i chos la snang // sems ni zhe sdang yin par 'dod// gtib chos kyi don la

159a4(rnying rgyud): bzlas dbyangs dang bstod pa rdzogs// yid kyi ting 'dzin phyag rgya dkyil 'khor rdzogs// de phyir dgos ched don gyis bshad pa yin// zhes so// bang mdzod 'phrul gyi lde'u mig las/ lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i le'u ste so gsum pa'o// / ya
159a5(rnying rgyud): gsol pa/ kye ste gsang ba'i bdag po lags// rdzogs pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pas// spyod pa ci ltar spyad par bgyi// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsungs pa/ ston cig/ bcos pa'i spyod pa ma yin pa// srog ldan shugs las byung
159a6(rnying rgyud): yi// dgag dbye med pa'i spyod pa spyad// ro dogs bcas pa'i sems phral bas// blang dor med par kun spyad na// spyod pa glang chen chur zhugs yin// ci ltar nam mkha'i mdung bskor bzhin// dpe gas mngon dang mthun spyad na// kun tu bzang po
159a7(rnying rgyud): spyad pa yin// mnyam pa'i nga nas mi g.yo zhing // lus ngag yid gsum rtsol spangs pa// shin tu rnal 'byor spyod pa yin// zhes gsungs so// bang mdzod 'phrul gyi lde mig las/ shin tarnal 'byor gyi spyod pa bstan pa'i khri na mas bzhi pa'o//
159b1(rnying rgyud): yang gsal pa/ n+ya bya gsang bar bdag pa lugs// rdzogs can spyod pa'i rnal 'byur bas// bla med byang rgyab chen po 'ad// bcas pas grub bamam bcos grub// bcal bas grub bsam brtsal grub// bsod nams chags la brten mi brtan// snyib d+hA dza/
159b2(rnying rgyud): ma bkra mi bkru// lam la bgrod pas phyin mi byin// 'dod pas 'grub bam mi 'dod 'grub// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ bla med byang chub chen po de// bcos pas grub pa ma yin te// ma bcos rnal du bzhag
159b3(rnying rgyud): pas 'grub// de la gang zhig 'chos byed pa// mi shes smig rgyu 'chos pa 'dra// btsal bas grub pa ma yin te// ma btsal mnyam par bzhag pas grub// de la gang zhig rtsol byed pa// mdongs pas nam mkha' bskyab pa 'dra// bsod nams tshogs
159b4(rnying rgyud): bsag mi dgos te// gang zhig bsod nams tshogs gsog pa// byis pas rtsed mo byed pa 'dra// sbyangs pas 'byongs par mi 'gyur te// sol ba byi dor byed pa 'dra// bkrus pas dag par mi 'gyur te// dri chus lag pa bkru ba 'dra// bgrod
159b5(rnying rgyud): pas phyin par mi 'gyur te// khyung chen nam mkha'i mtha' 'tsho la 'dra// 'dod pas rnyed par mi 'gyur te// ri dwags smig rgyu bsnyeg pa 'dra// des na shin tu rnal 'byor pas// rgyal po bzhin du tsan ni sdong // bang mdzod 'phrul gyi lde'u mig las/ spyod pa
159b6(rnying rgyud): bla na med pa'i le'u ste so lnga pa'o// / yang gsol pa/ kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// skad cig dus kyis gang rnams bsdu// dngos po gzhi yis gang rnams bsdu// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ sems
159b7(rnying rgyud): dpa' chen po nyon cig/ chos rnams mtshan mar snang ba dang // chos nyid don gyi ngo bo la// dngos po gzhi la tha dad med// dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// gzhi pa tha dad bye brag med// ma rig
160a1(rnying rgyud): pa yi 'khrul pa dang // rang byung ye shes chen po gnyis// gzhi la tha dad bye brag med// khams gsum rgyud drug sdug bsngal dang // dus gsum sangs rgyas bde ba gnyis// sems kyi gzhil tha dad med// chos can
160a2(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma'i kun rdob dang // don dam mtshan ma med pa gnyis// chos nyid gzhi la tha dad med// ces dang / sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ rang sems rtogs pas spyod pa dang // marig 'khrul pa byung ba la// dus la skad cig bye brag med// ma rig 'khrul
160a3(rnying rgyud): pa 'byung ba dang // khams gsum 'khor ba blangs pa gnyis// skad cig dus la swa phyi med// ma rig 'khrul pa log pa dang // rang byung ye shes shang ba la// skad cig dus la snga rtsi med// rang byung ye shes shar ba dang // 'khrul pa chos nyid mthong ba la/
160a4(rnying rgyud): skad cig dus la snga phyi med// ye shes mngon du gyur pa dang // 'bras bu chos sku thob pa la// skad cig dus la snga gyi med// 'bras bu chos sku thob pa dang // gzugs sku rnam gnyis 'byung ba la// skad cig dus la sku phyi med// bang mdzod 'phrul gyi
160a5(rnying rgyud): lde'u mig las/ skad cig ma'i dus dang gzhi bsdu ba'i le'u ste so drug pa'o// / yang gsol pa/ kye rtse gsang ba'i bdag po lags// rdzogs chen a ti yo ga ni// che balnga yis khyad par 'phags// de yi 'phags lugs ci ltar lags/
160a6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ mngon par sangs rgyas che ba ni// spros pa med pa'i byang chub sems// snang srid kun las khyad par 'phags// a ti yo ga'i che bar bshad// chos kyi dbyings las che ba ni// thams
160a7(rnying rgyud): cad 'byung ba'i byang chub sems// 'byung gnas kun las khyad par 'phags// a ti yo ga'i che ba yin// bdag nyid sangs rgyas che ba ni// rgyun gyis grub pa'i byang chub sems// rtsol bsgrub kun las byed par 'phags// a ti yo ga'i che ba yin//
160b1(rnying rgyud): de nyid sangs rgyas cha ba ni// ma nor pa yi byang chub sems// gtan tshogs kun las khyad par 'phags// a te yo ga'i che ba yin// sangs rgyas med pa'i che bde// blo srang bral ba'i byang chub sems// bsam brjod kun las khyad par 'phags
160b2(rnying rgyud): la bzla ba yi che ba yin// zhes gsungs so// bang mdzod 'phrul gyi lde'u mig las/ khyad par 'phags pa'i le'u ste so bdun pa'o// / yang gsol pa/ kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// rjes nyid don gyi ngo bo de// stong pa yang dag lag+sa
160b3(rnying rgyud): ma lags// stong pa nyid kyi khyad bye ba// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ chos nyid don gyi ngo bo de// blos brtags chos kyis spyong pa las// rang snang ngo bos tor ma
160b4(rnying rgyud): chos nyid rang gi ngo bo la// stong dang mi stong gnyis su med// rdzogs gcig spang ba'i stong pa dang // phyogs bral stong pa chen po gnyis// stong pa'i ming du 'dra mod kyang // mi mthun khyad par shin+d+ra t+ya che// phyogs gcig spang ba'i stong pa de//
160b5(rnying rgyud): gcig yin te phyogs gcig min// thams cad ma lus kun ldan pa'i// phyogs bral stong pa chen po ni// kun bral dri ma spangs pa dang // rgya chang phyogs lhung med pa'i phyir// ci yang min la ci yang yin// zhes gsungs so// bar mdzod 'phrul gyi lda
160b6(rnying rgyud): mig las/ stong pa nyid kyi khyad par dbye ba'i le'u ste so brgyad pa'o// / yang gsol pa/ kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// rdzogs chen gsang ba'i nges tshig ci ltar lags// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ sems dpa'
160b7(rnying rgyud): chen po nyon cig/ ci ltar nam mkha'i mtshan nyid du// snang srid thams cad shong ba bzhin// sems nyid theg pa chen po 'dir// yod pa'i chos dang med pa'i chos// de bzhin srid dang mi srid dang // sangs rgyas sems can bde sdug bsngal// bzang
161a1(rnying rgyud): ngan che chung skyon yon tan// lhag ma med par yongs rdzogs pas// de phyir de la rdzogs zhes na// rin pa cha yi gser gling na// thams cad gser las med pa'i phyir// dor du rung ba 'od ma yin// rdzogs pa chen po'i
161a2(rnying rgyud): chos nyid la// spang ba gang yang med pa'i phyir// dor du rung ba yod ma yin// ngos gzung med pa'i lta ba la// blang du rung ba yod ma yin// des na blang dor yod ma yin// zhes gsungs so// bang mdzod 'phrul gyi lde'u mig las/ rdzogs pa chen po'i nges tshig
161a3(rnying rgyud): la gzhi rdzogs pa chen por lhag ma med par la bzla ba'i le'u ste so dgu pa'o// / yang gsol pa/ kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// rdzogs chen spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// phyogs cha spyod pa'i lta ba la// de la brten par mi bya zhes// bder
161a4(rnying rgyud): gshegs gsang ba'i bdag po yis// phyogs cha can du gsungs pa de// nges don lags sam dgongs bshad lags// sems kyis sems la blta mi blta// ye sangs rgyas pa lags ma lags// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ sems dpa' chen
161a5(rnying rgyud): po nyon cig/ phyogs gcig spangs nas phyogs gcig blag// phyogs mthun phyogs la thug pa med/ blta ba ngan pa'i mtha' yin pas// de la brten par mi bya'o// khyod la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// bsregs bcad brdar ba'i gser bzhin du//
161a6(rnying rgyud): mtha' dgrol spos bral bshad// smos bral dgrol gyir brjod med bshad// brjod med dgrol phyir khong 'byams bshad// lta ba 'phrul gyi khong 'byams kyi// ci ltar nam mkha'i mdung bsor bzhin// gang ltar banor yang dog pa med// ci ltar 'ang
161b1(rnying rgyud): phrar ba zhin// gang ltar bsgral kyang bsngal du 'byub// pags brlan pa mtha' bzhin du// gang ltar then yang bldan du btug// ci ltar ljon pa'i chog bdan du// gang ltar ska pang spad bang ste// bas gas ga sa pa/ 'dra ba'i sems cud gnyis med pas// ma
161b2(rnying rgyud): kyis sems la blta ru med// bltas kyang mi mthongs mi dmigs// byang chub sems kyi chos nyid de// rgyu rkyen gzhan gyis ma bskyed cing // chol bsgrub dag gis mi 'byung bas// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa yin// de la dgongs nas ston pas kyang // ye
161b3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas par ming du btags// sems nyid rang gi ngo bo la// sangs rgyas dang ni sems can gnyis// gang du yang ni sems med do// zhes gsungs so// bang mdzod 'phrul gyi lde'u mig las/ blta ba'i dugA bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// / yang
161b4(rnying rgyud): mam/
161b5(rnying rgyud): thug pa med pa thug pa'i mchog/ ces gsungs so// bang mdzod 'phrul gyi lde'u mig las/ rdzogs pa chen po'i lta ba mthar thug pa'i le'u ste zhe gcig pa'o// / yang gsol pa/ kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// theg pa'i rim par phye ba ni/
161b6(rnying rgyud): de yi snang tshul ci ltar lags// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ rdzogs chen a ti'i snang tshul ni// ci snang ci srid thams cad kun// kun tu bzang po'i rol par snang // rang snang ye shes rgyan du sdang // thun mong sngags kyi
161b7(rnying rgyud): snang tshul ni// rang rang mthun pa'i ye shes snang // theg chen dbu ma'i sngang tshul ni// kun rdzob dbu ma'i tshul du sdang // rnam rig tsam gyi sngang tshul ni// rang rang 'khrul pa'i ngo bor sdang // nyan thos rang rgyal ba'i tshul ni// kun gying rdul gyi phung por sngang //
162a1(rnying rgyud): 'gadugasams gyuldan/ mas 'alas dang ngagazugs / la mag nga pas 'das grangs ca rgyam
162a2(rnying rgyud): zhe gnyis pa'o// / yang gsol pa/ kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// theg pa rim par phye ba ni// ting 'dzin sgom thabs ci ltar lags// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsol pa/ sems dpa' chen po nyon cig
162a3(rnying rgyud): nyan thos tha ma'i dmigs pa ni// sems kyi chags pa spang pa'i phyir// keng rus la sogs bsgom par byed// nyan thos 'bring gi dmigs pa ni// dbugs dang rtsol ba bgrang bar byed// nyan thos rab kyi dmigs pa ni// 'du shes med
162a4(rnying rgyud): par snyoms zhugs nas// zhi ba gyogs gcig mu la gnas// nyan thos mdo sde'i bsgom pa ni// rang sems sna rtser gtad byas nas// ma yengs rtag tu gnas par byed// rang rgyal dag gi ting 'dzin ni// 'khor lo sems su bsdus byas nas//
162a5(rnying rgyud): sems nyid la ni gnas par byed// rnam rig tsam gyi dmigs pa ni// shes pa rang rig gsal ba la// gzung 'dzin rtog pa bral bur gnas// theg chen dbu ma'i bzhag thabs ni// sgo lnga gsal ba'i ye shes las// yid ni rtog pa
162a6(rnying rgyud): med par gnas// bya ba rgyud kyi theg pa ni// yan lag bcu gcig cho ga yis// byin gyis brlabs nas lha ru 'dod// khyod myad chad pa yin nas// rnal 'byor yo ga'i theg pa ni// byang chub lnga dang cho 'phrul bzhis// yongs su brtags nas lha du bsgom//
162a7(rnying rgyud): mahA yo gi'i jig pa ni// ting 'dzin gsum dang bsnyen bsgrub bzhis// rang byung dag pa'i lha ru bsgom// mnu mo ga'i theg pa ni// snying po tsa ma zhig brjod byas nas// ma bskyed pa yi lha ru bsgom// zhes gsungs so// bang mdzod 'phral
162b1(rnying rgyud): mig pas/ dag brnya ma gagams kya shAg tungs ma na thug gsum das/ yangasas bya/ kya gsung bu'i bdag pa lags// rdzogs paman pa 'amam tha banag thabs brtan dun ma// gsang
162b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i dag pas gsu mas// mnas da byas ga'an pa// / mas ma kyis cananarjod// yanas yin gyis gad mtshal// phrag na drug gis mer ma byed// parlung ba zhes thabla nas nga byung sa

162b5(rnying rgyud): ma // gyis thub kyis byan pa rin// phyogs nyung med na pa tab bang ba yin// kyi gyi mas dpang can ba na/ rtsom nyi nga bzhin pa'i/ ba ci bzhin pa bzhin / dbang rgya pan/ rig pa thab gdang / rdzas ma
162b6(rnying rgyud): bcos pa med par gnag pa rtse// dbang po bral ma man pa bcu ma gyi// yul dang dbang pa mi bye stug par bzhag/ chos nyid pa yis mi bzung rang snang bar bzhag/ ma 'angs mnyam par bzhag cing rjes job ta ltar bcag// zhes gsungs so//
162b7(rnying rgyud): su gyu gangs/ byang chub sams bya zhigathapas basbyin pa'i mi sbyin nan// pang gam la pa tsigs pa'i bdag pa 'grus/ rdzogs chen pas kyi dgangs pag/ sa
163a1(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa/ sems dpa' chen ba nyon cig/ sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga na// shes rab rnam gsum sgo smyung 'tshal// snang ba med pa'i chos nyid la// rang byung ye shes gzhi bcwal 'tshal/
163a2(rnying rgyud): phyogs lcang med pa'i lta ba la// rnal 'byor blo yis rgyab brten 'tshal// gsal la mi rtog rnam gnyis kyis// g.yas g.yon gnyis nA gzhog skor 'tshal// mtshan ma sgo ru mi gzhug 'tshal// nyaM rta bu shi ma bzhin du// sems nyid thub par
163a3(rnying rgyud): btsal yang 'tshal// rnam tog mtshan ma 'phro srid na// mkha' dang mkha' yi sprin bzhin du// rang byung rang zhing bzhag kyang 'tshal// ting 'dzin las su rang ba yi// drod rtags mtshan ma byung yang 'tshal// bar chad cho 'phrul bzlog pa'i phyir//
163a4(rnying rgyud): bdud kyi gcod yul shes kyang 'tshal/ blta ba rlom srog ldan shugs byung ba'i// dgag bgrub med pa'i spyod pa 'tshal// pa na se maM 'bras tha bzhin// 'bras bu gzhi nas srin yang 'tshal// zhes gsungs so// bang mdzod 'phrul gyi wen
163a5(rnying rgyud): mig las/ rdzogs chen lam gyi dgongs pa mdor bsdus pa'i le'u ste zhe lnga pa'o// / yang gsol pa/ kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// theg pa rim par phye ba yi// 'bras bu thob dus ci ltar lags// gsang ba'i bdag
163a6(rnying rgyud): pos gsungs pa/ kye nyon cig/ dug gsum spangs pa'i nyan thos dang // ma rig 'geg pa'i rang rgyal dang // nam tog sbyang ba'i mdo sde gsum// bskal pa gsum gyis sangs rgyas sa la sbyor// las dang bya ba gtsor byed pa'i// bya ba
163a7(rnying rgyud): rgyud kyi theg pas ni// mi tshe bdun gyis rig 'dzin sbyor// phyag rgya bzhi la gtsor bsgrub pa'i// rnal 'byor rgyud kyi thog pas ni// mitshe gsum gyis sangs rgyas sa la sbyor// ma hA mo gang theg pas ni// cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing /
163b1(rnying rgyud): spyad mang dasathas da/ gas bya 'ad gsung gsas/ naganas byagadun/ sa dbang ba'ang sa thang dran/ nas rgyas na rnam dra rdzogs pa'i rnam bzu sa/ da sungarnas pa/

163b3(rnying rgyud): ma bcos pa 'i blo ban gau ste// zhes pa samam bcos par// 'bras bu rang bzhag sra gsung thugs// zhes gsungs so// byang mdzod 'phral gyi lde'u mig las/ theg pa'i 'bras bu 'thob dus bstan pa'i'i 'u nye zhe drug pa'o//

164a1(rnying rgyud): mas gas ca pamadugs na/ rang nan rnamam pa gnas pa'ang// theg pa rnam pa bshes na/ bca mig nyi nam ma'arta ba gnam sa'

164a4(rnying rgyud): dbyings dang ye shes mi 'jug ste// shes bya shes byed gnyis su med// cog bya rtog byeng gnyis su med// mthong bya mthong byed gnyis su med// bslab bya grub byed gnyis su med// thob tu 'jo byed gnyis ma med// ces gsungs so// bang

164a6(rnying rgyud): ma bskyed pa'i/ ye shes zhes ni gang la bgyi// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsungs pa/ kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ rang byung chu rten med pa yin// ye shes sgrib pa med pa yin// rang thung ye shes chen po de// chu rkyen gzhan gyis
164a7(rnying rgyud): bskyed cing // rtsol brngub dag las mi 'byung bas// rang byung gzhan la rag ma lus// yul las byung ba'i ye shes de// yul las byung bas ra byu min// yul la 'phel 'gris yod pa'i phyir// ye shes de yang shes la 'dzi ba bcas/ 3
164b1(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// bang mdzad 'phrul gyi lce'u mig las// rang thung ye shes ngos bzung ba'i ledra ste zhe dgu par// / yang gsol pa/ kye phyogs pa'i 'jag pa lags// rang byung la shrIs chen po dang // ma rig pa 'i pad+ma
164b2(rnying rgyud): go gnyis// kun gzhi sems kyi gzhi mo la// gang gi ngo bor nges ma nges// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa// sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ ma rig pa dang ye shes gnyis// kun gzhi sems kyi gzhi mo la// gang
164b3(rnying rgyud): nges pa med pa la// rkyen gyis so sor bskrad nas ni// ma rig ye shes gnyis kyi tshul// shes rab thabs sam lung dag la// brten nus ye shes kye ba'i tshul// gyi nang rtogs pa'i rkyen bzhi dang // yul dus bskal pa gsum po la/

164b5(rnying rgyud): lnga bcu pa'o// / yang gsol pa/ kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// rtogs pa can gyis gang zag la// mi rtog ye shes 'char mi 'char// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsungs pa/ nyon cig/ nyi mdzon

164b8(rnying rgyud): sa kyang /
165a1(rnying rgyud): zod kyi sgra dang longs spyod rdzogs// yul pa'i sku dang rnam pa gsum// tshul gyis bskrun gang gis bsdu// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa// sems
165a2(rnying rgyud): dpang chen po nyon cig/ ston pa sku gsum tshul bsdu na// rgyu yi dus na byang chub sems su kun kyang gcig/ 'bras bu'i dus na sangs rgyas yin par kun kyang gcig/ 'dus pa'i dus na snga phyi med par kun kyang gcig/ chos sku'i rang bzhin ngo bor rang
165a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin med par gcig/ ces gsungs so// bang mdzod 'phrul gyi lde'u mig las/ sku gsum gyi tshul bsdu ba'i le'u steng nga gnyis pa'o// / yang gsol pa/ kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// phyag rgya bzhugs tshul ci ltar lags
165a4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsungs pa nyon cig/ byang chub sems kyi chos nyid ni// 'khrul pa'i blo ru gnas tsam na// ci ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun// bden rngun blo yis bzung nas bzhugs// byang chub sems su bzhugs tsam na//
165a5(rnying rgyud): ci ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun// mi snang ba la mngon du 'byin nus pas// chos rnams kun gyi snying por bzhugs// chos kyi sku ru bzhugs tsam na// mi rtog mnyam pa'i ngo bor bzhugs// longs spyod rdzogs skur bzhugs tsam na// sna tshogs chos la
165a6(rnying rgyud): yongs spyod cig// ma spangs ye shes rkyen du bzhugs// yul ba'i sgra ru bcugs tsam na// gang lagang dag pa deng phral das// dgongs pa ldan sum tshogs par bzugs// rjes gsungs so// bang mdzod 'phrul gyi lde'u mig las/ phyag
165a7(rnying rgyud): kya bzhugs tshul gyi le'u steng gsum pa'o// / yang gsol pa/ kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags/ chos skus khyab pa'i khyab tshul gyi// khyad par bye brag ce ltar lags// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol/
165b1(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa// sems dpanga' zan pa nyan cag/ chom su khrig lanyag gcig gis// yabartul ba'i dasngal 'khor nas// mnar med dmyal ba yan chad du// til lamar gyis khyab pa dzin// kun la thab par gnas mar kyang // seM
165b2(rnying rgyud): khyad par shin tu che// sangs rgyas dbus na bzugs tsam na// ji med chos kyi phun bgrags// ming yang kun gini byang chub sems// nam dag de bzhin gshegs pa la// kun bkri ming ldang mi grags pa// 'gro drug bus na bzhugs
165b3(rnying rgyud): tsa man// drir bcas chos kyi su ru bzhugs// med yang kun pazhi byung chub sems// yod kyang rang gi ngom shes// dbul mngo nor dang gyad nor 'dra// zhes gsungs so// bang mdzod 'phrul gyi lde'u mig las/ chos su'i khyab tshul bstan pa
165b4(rnying rgyud): le'u steng bzhi pa'o// / yang gsol pa/ kye sde gsang ba'i bdag po lags// byang med byang chub sems chen ni// bcos pas grub bam ma bcos 'grub// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa// sems dpa' chen bam
165b5(rnying rgyud): cig/ byung med byang chub chen po de// bcos pas grub pa ma yin te// mu bcos rnal du bzhag pas grub// sngar 'das sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// ci bzhin pa las bcos ma byas// da lta'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // ci bzhin pa
165b6(rnying rgyud): las bcos mi mdzad// ma 'ongs sang+yas rgyas thams cad kyang // ci bzhin pa la bcos mi 'gyur// gsang ba'i bdag po nga yis kyang // ci bzhin pa la bcos mamyong // sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis kyang // ci bzhin pa la bcos ma
165b7(rnying rgyud): byed// rgya byamams dpa ca brgyan cig/ rgya ma gas nadang / sems sa bcos dgas pa/ lamam btsun na/ rabras tham dmigs na na/ rang byams bcos sum pa/ ma ma ga dang bras
166a1(rnying rgyud): 'chos/ ting 'dzin na kyad sems ma 'chas// bcos pas rgyal du myor ba med// rnal du ma byung don mi 'grug/ rgya sems dpa' chen mnyan cig tu ltar snang ba chos rnams dbazhin
166a2(rnying rgyud): dadu gcig/ de la sra pang 'chos par mu byed cig/ ma bcos mnyam pa'i rgyal po de la ni// mi rtan chos kyi dgongs pa de la ldan// ci bzhin pa la sus 'chos pa// de bzhin kya ngan mi 'dang ste// de ni 'khor po'i snying por 'grub// ces
166a3(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// 'ang mdzod 'phrul gyi lde'u mig las/ byang chub sems bcos su med pa badz+ra steng lnga pa po// / yang gsol pa/ kye gsang ba'i bdag pa lags// blo mo byang chub chen po 'di// btsal bas thub
166a4(rnying rgyud): bsum btsal 'brub// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsungs pa/ sems dpang chen po nyon cig/ bla med byang chub chen po 'ong // btsal bas 'brung pa ma yin te// ma brdal rnal du bzhag pas grag
166a5(rnying rgyud): gdod nas snying po byang chub pa// btsal byang dbyings las ba byung pa med// btsam na com pa'i nang du 'byu// zhes gsungs ka/ bad mdzor 'phrul gyi waM mig las/ byang chub sems pa btsal gyi med pa'i ladu steng drug pa'o//
166a6(rnying rgyud): yang gsol pa/ kyekye gsang 'di bdag po lags// rdzogs pa chen po'i chos grags kyis// bsod nams tshogs la brtan mi brten// gsang ba'i bdag thos bstan du gsol// gsungs pa/ kyi sems dpa' chen po nyon cig
166a7(rnying rgyud): gdang nas skyong bzang chub / rnams tshogs bsag me tho te// mabs gas 'bras ci ba'i pasnyen// depe dir bsod nams chags bsags sa/ khyim 'bras bu rnab dang // byam pa'i ma
166b1(rnying rgyud): shes rab chen pos ma zin na// bsags kyang sleb pa nyid du 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// bang mdzod 'phrul gyi lde'u mig las/ bsod nams tshogs bsag pa la rag ma lus par bstan par madz+ra steng bdun pa'o//
166b2(rnying rgyud): gsal pa/ sde kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// rdzogs chen lam gyi rnal 'byor pa// lam la bgrod du yod dam med// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa// sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ chos nyid nam mkha' lta bu la// bzod pas
166b3(rnying rgyud): ldan par 'dod pa ni// d+hang rten rnam pa 'a mtha tshi la dz+dza // brtsod pas 'bras padzub 'a ga/ mdangs pas rnamam par bsgrags pa \u0f88\u0f90// sa dang lam la bathong byed pa// b+ha la dan dang mthun pa me// rang bzhin ga nas
166b4(rnying rgyud): phyir// sa dang lam la bgrod mi dgos// zhes gsungs so// bang mdzod 'phrul gyi lde'u mig las/ lam bgrod du med pa'i le'u steng brgyad pa'o// / yang gsol pa/ kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// rdzogs
166b5(rnying rgyud): chen spyod pa'i rnal 'byor la// sgo skur 'debs pa 'byung srid na// rgol rtsed the tshom man ngag ni// smra ba'i mtshon cha bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ thog mar rtsod pa 'cha' dus su//
166b6(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa mi gnyis spyi bor bzhag/ rdo rje rig pa'i gtan tshigs rnams// rang gi rgyal sa 'dzin du gzhug/ dri ba gsum po brtag bya ste// 'dri na 'phrang bsku gzur gyis sgra// bzlog na brdzus te slar la 'dri// grub mtha' ma 'o/ sa
166b7(rnying rgyud): lan mi gdab// blon na myur mgyogs mtshon cha brdeg/ yang na 'gal 'brel g.yul ngor 'dug/ dman pa'i theg par khas len na// dpe yis brtags shing spyi nas 'dri// rdzogs chen lta bar khas len na// dgos pa dri ste gan N+Da la
167a1(rnying rgyud): gnas rnags can lhab kha byam san/ sbrul gtsugadus gtsun ngagacag/ gzugs su na gas sogs bdag chubs bas pa // lags sa gas can da /
167a2(rnying rgyud): pas// de la rdzogs chen la mi 'byam// rgyu mtshan mi ldan dam mi bca'// chos nyid don gyi ngo bod// yin tshul nges pa med pa la// mi mthun bsam ngo so so la// snang tshul cir yang snang ba'i phyir// lung med bsnyon pa rang gi ni//
167a3(rnying rgyud): grub mtha' dag la skyon yod nas// gzhan n+ya ni 'ong ba shes ni 'byams// khongs nas spangs pa'i rjes shul du// rlung gis sa bon bskur nas ni// dbang gas ma tshul gsum yul dang dus// spyi dang bye zag shes par dkyi// 'ag
167a4(rnying rgyud): 'brel yan lag rnam bzhi pos// rang gzhung bsgrub cing gzhan sran 'dod// 'brel pa grub na 'gal bldog/ gal te 'brel pa mgrub na// 'gal ba'i ri bo mthong bar 'gyur// rdzogs chen lto ba kha 'byams yang // yang nang
167a5(rnying rgyud): gsum tshul gyis 'byams// yang na pe don gnyis ka'i 'byams// yang na phan tshun bltas pas 'byams// yang na ro ga'i sdang tshul 'byams// des ni gnyis 'geg 'brang mi ltung // phyir rgol dag gis tshug mi 'gyur// gal
167a6(rnying rgyud): te 'bros sar mthar na// don de bzlog ste slar la 'dri// yang na bla ma'i bka' rgyas gdab// rdo rje rig pa'i gtan tshigs la// chos nyid rig pa'i rtsa yis gdab// mthun par snang ba'i chos gcig la// mi 'dra ba yi nad 'dri na/
167a7(rnying rgyud): chos nyid yin par lan yang gdab// des kyang bden pa ma mthun na// mi mthun mgo bsgris slar la bzlog/ mi rigs pa gcig 'di byed na// de yang de ltar gong ma bzhin// 'drin sun dbyung gus phyag 'tshal// bzlog na bcus
167b1(rnying rgyud): te 'brang sdod \u0f7f// brtus te grub mtha' gtanal dbang// gal te rnam par 'dad pa na// b+h+yon gnyis chang bar chag gcig la// rdzogs chen thub mtha' 'cha' du gzhug/ g.yas gdon 'bras pa'i 'brang ba cad nga/
167b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis 'gag 'brang du bzung de bdag/ gang du slob par 'byug pas btags// 'og nu'i blta ba'i rnachog btsal lnga// mgo bsgrims te g.yang du bsgyur// mthun par sdang ba'i rgyus gcig sa// sI ba yin dka' dri// chos
167b3(rnying rgyud): gcig yod par khas blangs nas// smra bar mi byed gsang byed na// de ye gsang khur bru ba'i phyir// mi rigs pa gcig khas blangs lnga// ma ga bsngo dr-i dang bstun par bya// zhes so// bang mdzod 'phrul gyi lde'u mig las/ rgo la rjod
167b4(rnying rgyud): tshom gyi man ngag bstan pa'i le'u ste nga dgu pa'o// / yang gsol pa/ kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// tshig gi don gyis ci ltar bshad// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// kye sems dpa' chen
167b5(rnying rgyud): po nyon cig/ tshig gi don gyi bshad lugs ni// gong gi shugs dang 'og gi shugs// tsheg mig bgrang zhing shad rta zhon// yan lag shugs kyis 'bru rnams brda'// tshig 'bru gar 'gro yan lag dbang // rtsod pa grogs kye yi ge
167b6(rnying rgyud): ni// gtso la cung zad tsam zhig yod// grogs la ched du 'bod par byed// yan lag shugs kyi 'bru rnams// yan lag grogs kyi dbang du'o// sde dron lA yi klad rgyas ni// rang rang za mar shes par bya// 'bru dgu dang po'i tha mar ro//
167b7(rnying rgyud): de ltar de bzhin de 'dra gsum// dpe ru bstan pa'i yi ge yin// ci phyir gang phyir de phyir gsum// dmigs kyis gtan tshigs dris pa las// gcig gis gtan tshigs bstan pa'o// de ni 'di ni da ni gsum// de ni zhes pa'i yi ge
167b8(rnying rgyud): btu mi btang ba dang
168a1(rnying rgyud): ni// 'og tu gtan la phab ste ston// 'di ni zhes pa'i yi ge ni// gong las bzlog pa'i chos shig ston// da ni zhes pa'i yi ge ni// don gcig gong du rdzogs nas ni// gnyis pa ston pa'i rgyan zhes bya
168a2(rnying rgyud): de yang zhes pa'i yi ge ni// gong du bstan pa'i yi ge'i don// 'og gis gtan la phab te ston// 'di yar zhes pa'i yi ge ni// gong dang 'og dag mthun par ston// thar na par na mdor na gsum// la bcad pa yi yi ger bshad// de la zhes pa'i yi ge ni/
168a3(rnying rgyud): gzhi la dgar ba'i yi ge ste// dang gis rnam grangs bshad pa la// sogs pa rnams kyis sde tshan pas// thams cad kun ni lhag med pa'o// bang mdzod 'phrul gyi lde'u mig las/ tshig gi don gyi bshad lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu
168a4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// // de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos/ sems dpa' rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ man ngag 'di yi mtshan zung zhig/ man ngag 'di yi mtshan bzung na// chos rnams thams
168a5(rnying rgyud): cad bzung dang mtshungs// zhes/ de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes gsol pa// kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// man ngag dam pa'i yi ge 'di// mtshan zung zhig par bsgo ba de// mtshan ni ci ltar gzung bar bgyi// gsang ba'i bdag
168a6(rnying rgyud): bos bstan du gsol// gsungs pa// sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ man ngag 'di yi mtshan nyid ni// rgyal po'i bang mdzod dang 'dra ba'i phyir// bang mdzod 'phrul gyi lde'u mig ces bya bar zung zhig/ theg pa thams cad kyi don rton pa'i
168a7(rnying rgyud): phyir// theg pa'i spyi 'og ces bya bar yang zung zhig/ man ngag gzhung bsdebs nas bstan pa'i phyir// rin po che gser gyi phreng ba zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ dgos dbu rang la tshang ba'i phyir// rin po che spangs pa'i man ngag ces bya bar yang
168b1(rnying rgyud): zung zhig/ mdo rje rnams kyi mi gsal ba'i phyir/ ri nang che mi gsel zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ thams cad byang chub sems kyi snang bar shar ba'i phyir/ rang bzhin don ldan gyi snang ba bkod pa zhes bya bar yang rung zhig/ man ngag gi dgra'
168b2(rnying rgyud): ba bsdus te bshad pa'i phyir/ rin po che rgya mdud bkrol ba zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ ces gsungs so// bar mdzod 'phrul gyi lde'u mig las/ man ngag gi don yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste re gcig pa'o// // blta ba thams cad kyi
168b3(rnying rgyud): gnad/ man ngag thams cad kyi the ma/ bstan pa thams cad kyi bcud bzlas pa/ don man ngag la sdebs pa/ bang mdzod 'phrul gyi lde'u mig ces bya ba/ gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje sems dpa' la/ nang ga rim par bkod pa'i mdo rdzogs
168b4(rnying rgyud): so// le'u drug cu gnyis pa'o// rgyal po'i mdzod na gang yod pa// rgyal po nyid las gzhan gyis min// bang mdzod nyid las ci bstan pa// lde'u mig nyid las gzhan gyis min// zhes gsungs so// rdzogs so// /
168b5(rnying rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ a ti b+hed nirma Na kuny+dzi kA nA ma/ bod skad du/ yang 'byed 'phrul gyi lde'u mig ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po de/ chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang mkha' klong dag
168b6(rnying rgyud): rgya yongs su ma chad pa na/ 'byed pa med pa'i 'khor gyis bskor/ byang chub sems kyi don rnam par 'grel zhing dus gsum ci bzhin par bzhugs so// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje 'khor gyi nang nas langs te/ 'di skad ces gsol to//
168b7(rnying rgyud): kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po 'dis// 'gro ba kun la khyab ces pa// 'gro kun ma grol ji ltar lags// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa// kye sems
169a1(rnying rgyud): dpa' chen ma nyan cig/ bde bar gshegs brang steng pa yis// 'gro ba kun la khyab mo kyang // rang rang bag chags sgrib pas bsgribs// skyes bu'i lus dang byad 'grogs 'dra mod kyang // rang gi byad ma mthong bzhin du//
169a2(rnying rgyud): snying po rang la yod mod kyang // rang gi rnam par rtog pas bsgribs// de yi khams gsum 'khor bar 'khor// kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ nges pa'i gsang mdzod chen po na// mi zad rin chen gter yod kyang // ma rig tha ra ma sngon po dam// de 'byed
169a3(rnying rgyud): mi zad rin chen gter chen len// thob med 'bras bu rang la smin// zhes gsungs so// yang 'byed 'phrul gyi lce mig las/ gleng gzhi dang gleng slong ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
169a4(rnying rgyud): to/ kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// chos nyid byang chub sems kyi don// ma bshad go bar mi 'gyur na// de yi bshad lugs ci ltar lags// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ kye sems dpa'
169a5(rnying rgyud): chen po nyon cig/ khyung chen gshog rdzogs lta bu'i blos// don gyi spyi khog phub ste bshad// rtag gi mchongs stabs lta bu'i blos// dkyus kyi sa rnams bcad ste bshad// rus sbal nur 'gros lta bu'i blos// yi ge'i 'bru rnams choms par bshad/
169a6(rnying rgyud): ces gsungs so// yang gsol pa/ kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// don gyi skye khog ci ltar dbub// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ don gyi spyi khog dbub pa ni// sngon du 'gro ba'i yan lag
169b1(rnying rgyud): na du na ga du
169b2(rnying rgyud): sa ma ram dang shA bas // gas ba ga
169b3(rnying rgyud): kyi bye pa nga na gyisems bshad pa sa kyi'i byu nyis pa'o/ nga gsol pa/ gas pa'i bdag pa lags/ thob pa'i drug na gang da gang // gsang ba'i bdag pas bstan na
169b4(rnying rgyud): gsu ma// gsang po'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ kye sems dpa' tshen ba nyon cig/ nyan thos bden pazhing rgo nas 'jug/ rang rgyal te nang zel sgo nas 'dug/ mdo bden gnyis sgo nas 'jug/ gri ya dag gsum sgo nas 'drug
169b5(rnying rgyud): pa ya mdzes pa med// ma ga drug gi 'jug ston// mngon par byang chub sgonas// ma hA la gi'i 'dun rnon// nye 'idin rnam gsum chonas 'jug/ rdzogs pa a na lo ga na// dacings dang po zhes go nas 'dug/ rdzogs chen ma yo nA~M/
170a1(rnying rgyud): dang gas dag pa nas / sa// bangag na na zugs dang ga/ nam bdag sas/ nanan
170a2(rnying rgyud): gsang pa'i bdag ros gsungs pa/ cesems dpa' chen rten cig/ nyan rdzas rang rgyal bskang mtshams ni// nyis bca bci'i 'dral khrims yin// gcan me byur babrang na byams // ba'i rjo mA hrI tha bcu// tha ba'i
170a3(rnying rgyud): bsrung mtsham swA ni// rba ba dang ni yan lag bsrung // de pa'i ci ltar bsgrang zhen// dkon 'chog gsum dang byang chub sems// thugs dang drug tu mi sring zhi // rdo rdo dril bu spang minra// hu dang bla ma de bzhin no// de ni yan la bu dmachog
170a4(rnying rgyud): yin// rtsa ba'i dam tshig lnga po ni// khri la nyal bar mi bya zhing // sha ma~M bza' zhing chang mi btung // srog pa la phrag para' miH// rnal 'byor rgyung gyi bsrung mdzums ni// gong gi bsung mthams stong drin// lung gcig rdul mi btung zhig
170a5(rnying rgyud): nyams dang kha mi bsre ba bsrung // rnal 'byor chen po'i bsrung mtshams ni// rtsa ba'i dam tshig gsum po dang // yan lag nyi shu rtsa lnga bsrug/ yan lag dam tshig bstan pa ni// srang dang mi srang dang du blang // zhes dang bsgrub par bya ba'o// a nu
170a6(rnying rgyud): loga'i bskyang mtshams ni// dbyings las mi 'ad 'dam tshig bsrung // a ti yo ga'i dam tshig ni// med pa dang ni rgyal pa dang // gcig tha dang ni ldan gyis grub// de yi don las 'da' mi rtsa// zhes gsungs so// yang gsol pa/
170a7(rnying rgyud): gsang pa'i bdag po lags// theg pa'i bgrod lam ci ltar lags// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag mos gsungs pa// kye sems dpa' chen panyan cig/ thag pa'i bgrod lam bstan pa ni// srang 'gag
170b1(rnying rgyud): skyong dang bsgyur ra'i lam// shes par byang bar lam dang la// zhus gsungs pa// yang gsol pa/ gya gyi gsang ba'i bdag pa lags// thag pa rnams kyi balnga ba gang // gsang ba'i bdag pas bstan drugs la// gsang bar bdag pas gsung /
170b2(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' chen po nyan cig/ nyan thos theg pa'i lta ni// mas la bdag med martogs te// dan dam tha ba dul zan \u0f7f// kun rdzob gapag rngan du me tshul// sde pa gnyis kyi 'dod gzhung yin// gang zag la ni bdag med rtogs/
170b3(rnying rgyud): gzung 'dzin gnyis su 'dod// rang rgyal 'dzin pa'i sems su 'jod// sems rnam lta ba gnyis yod do// sems tsam rnam bcas sna ngani/ rol dkar dmar la sogs pa// dab nga'i thal du snang ba kun// sems pas mnapa bcig
170b4(rnying rgyud): ma yin ning // shes pa'i bdag nyid bden par 'dod// rnam med dag pa'aM lta ni// rnam par shes dang mgomanyam du// yang dag yad pa ma yi// zhes pa 'dzin rternam brdzun par 'dod// dbu mo'i lta ba ni mthun \u0f7f// pal ba
170b5(rnying rgyud): nyis su 'dod // phal rang rigang rigs pa 'dang// la la dag gi blta pa ni// chom nyid stong pa nam mkha dag// pa sti ra tu mi gnas par// sems dang sems pas byung ba'i rjes// 9 zhes sbyin chad skye ba // gsang chags
170b6(rnying rgyud): ji ltar ni// dran dam mye 'gag/ med par mthun// cung zad kun rdzob mi mthun na// dam rdzogs shes sems dpa' gnyis// lal rje dang zan gyi chung // lal dron dang g.yog gi tshul// lal srin dang thogs kyi rgyal// babyed pa mamachog
170b7(rnying rgyud): ni// maM nas dmi tshig tshul mi dzin// rang byung dag pa 'dzod// rdzogs pa sa na 'ozhen// mang byer rdzogs pa'i mya da// rdzogs pa chen po mnyis ga'i// kun thal tsam spangs pa dag/ rgya tshad phyogs spang med pa dag//
171a1(rnying rgyud): byangangs pa gas / sa dbu na pan bya 'ang ba dun pamanas// sadangs pa ma byad/ gas ba' bdan pas bstan du gsan// gsang ba'i bdag dra
171a2(rnying rgyud): gang ngas pa// byamams dpa chen pa ston cig/ mngon nyid rdzo gsams panig/ brgyad nga cu ma 'i byung banas // bcu ga cigs b+his// thun mang lags kyis bstan pa/ gas/ jigs
171a3(rnying rgyud): da// da din mun thub mngon du Sh+Ta/ nyi mi'i ma ci pa chod pad da/ ga mis du ba// TI gsang ba'i bdad lags marnas par byu // dathas
171a4(rnying rgyud): san skye du sa / smras/
171a5(rnying rgyud): na
171a6(rnying rgyud): sa / sa
171b1(rnying rgyud): las 'das nang zag par 'gyu// ma thAng ka bas g.yogs 'ad na// da nyid g.yogs par gnas langs// rkang mthil gang gi ko Ta las// sa stang g.yags dang tsam 'dra// sbom dang dam chog bsrung mtshams kun// thams cad
171b2(rnying rgyud): bsrung bar gnas langs// ci bzhin pa yi chos nyid la// ma bcos pa yi blo bzhag ste// de yi dang la ma yengs na// dam tshig thams cad bsrung ba yin// nyams kyi chad pa byung ba la// gso ba'i thabs su de nyid che// dman pa'i theg pa
171b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyis// bsrung du med la bsrungs pas nyams// mnyam rdzogs a ti yo ga la// nyams dang ma nyams gnyis med pas// ma yengs gsal ba'i ngang du brdal// zhes gsungs so// yang 'byed 'phrul gyi lde mig las/ dam tshig
171b4(rnying rgyud): 'phrul gyi yan lag bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / yang gsol pa/ rtse kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// brda mthun don gyi khyad par ci// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa// kye sems
171b5(rnying rgyud): dpa' chen po nyon cig/ ye shes sna tshogs lus can dang // 'khrul pa sna tshogs lus can gnyis// sna tshogs lus su 'dra mod kyang // mi mthun khyad par shin tu che// ye shes sgyu mar snang ba'i sangs rgyas dang // log rtog sgyu mar snang ba'i sems
171b6(rnying rgyud): can gnyis// sgyu ma tsam du ming du 'dra mod kyang // mi mthun khyad par shin tu che// 'gro drug lus dang bag chags ngan 'khrul dang // sngags lam sku dang ye shes bzang 'khrul gnyis// 'khrul pa tsam gyi ming du 'dra mod kyang // mi mthun khyad
171b7(rnying rgyud): par shin tu che// bzang rtog ngan rtog log rtog gsum// ngo bo nyid kyi rtog pa bzhi// rtog pas bsdus par 'dra mod kyang // mi mthun khyad par shin tu che// rdzogs chen shugs 'byung spyod pa dang // theg dman byas pa'i spyod pa gnyis// spyod pa
172a1(rnying rgyud): tsam du 'dra mod dkyang // ma man+dan khyad par shin tuH// chags chen rang byung ya shas dang // thag dman gnas 'gyur la shas gnyis// ye shes tsam du 'dra mod kyang // mi mthun byed par zhen d+har+the// rdzogs
172a2(rnying rgyud): chen lhun grub 'bras bu dang // theg dman tshogs bsags 'bras bu gnyis// 'bras bu tsam gyis 'dra mod kyang // pra sran 'bras kyi dpe bzhin nam// ro nye dang ni gser skya bzhin// sku gzugs tsam du 'dra mod kyang // mi mthun khyad par shin tu che//
172a3(rnying rgyud): ngos bzung tsam gyi lta ba dang // ngos gzung med pa'i lta ba gnyis// lta ba tsam du 'dra mod kyang // mi mthun khyad par shin tu che// phyogs mtshams 'dzin pa'i snying rje dang // phyogs ris med pa'i snying rje gnyis// snying rje tsam du 'dra mod kyang // mi
172a4(rnying rgyud): mthun khyad par shin tu che// zhes gsungs so// yang 'byed 'phrul gyi lde mig las/ brda mthun don 'phags kyi yan lag bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / yang gsol pa/ kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// sangs rgyas
172a5(rnying rgyud): sems can gzigs mi gzigs// 'gro don ched du mdzad mi mdzad// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ sangs rgyas sems can so so ru// ye shes chen pos yongs
172a6(rnying rgyud): mi gzigs// des na snying rje cir mi mdzad// chos sku mngon du gyur tsam na// gzugs sku rnam gnyis shugs byung nas// grol nas grol ba'i lam yang ston// zhes gsungs so// yang gsol pa/ kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// sangs
172a7(rnying rgyud): rgyas sems can mi gzigs na// kun tu bde gshegs skal bzang gis// 'gro rnams sna tshogs sna tshogs la// sprul pa sna tshogs sna tshogs pas// 'dul ba sna tshogs ci ltar lags// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang
172b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ kun tu bde gshegs skal bzang gis// 'gro ba sna tshogs 'dul ba yang // sna tshogs 'gro rnams rang rang gi// las 'gro'i dbang gis snang bar zad// bde gshegs
172b2(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba thams cad kyis// dngos po rdul yang mi gzigs pas// ched du rnam par mi sprul yang // sems can lta spyod tha dad pas// bde gshegs sku yang snang mtha' yas// des na gdul bya sna tshogs dang // bde gshegs sgyu 'phrul sna
172b3(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyang // 'khrul pa'i dbang gis snang bar mdzad// ces gsungs so// yang gsol pa/ kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// theg pa thun mong 'bras bu dang // rdzogs pa chen po'i 'bras bu la// don la khyad par yod dam med// gsang
172b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa// kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ theg pa thun mong sangs rgyas dang // rdzogs chen 'bras bu'i sangs rgyas gnyis// thun mo ngo mchog gi dngos grub ste// mi
172b5(rnying rgyud): mthun khyad par shin tu che// thun mong bsti gnas sa la gnas// rdzogs chen lhun grub sa la gnas// zhes gsungs so// yang gsol pa/ kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// dus gsum sangs rgyas gcig mi gcig/ gsang ba'i
172b6(rnying rgyud): bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ dper na gzugs rnams sna tshogs kyang // ri rab ngos la phyin tsam na// kun kyang gser gyi mdog tu gcig/ dper na chu rnams thams
172b7(rnying rgyud): cad kyang // rgya mtsho chen por phyin tsam na// kun kyang lan tshwa'i ro ru gcig/ de bzhin dus gsum sangs rgyas kyang // ma bcos sems kyi lam zhugs nas// chos sku nam mkha' lta bur gcig/ ces gsungs so// yang gsol pa// kye kye gsang
173a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i bdag po lags// rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par ci// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa// kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad
173a2(rnying rgyud): par ni// dmus long dang ni glang chen bzhin// phyogs rtogs ci bzhin nyid ma rtogs// mig can rnams kyis ci bzhin rtogs// ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs// phyogs tsam rtogs dang ci bzhin pa// log par rtog pa mu stegs te// nyan thos
173a3(rnying rgyud): rang rgyal ma rtogs pa// theg pa drug gis phyogs tsam rtogs// rdzogs chen rtogs pa ji bzhin rtogs// zhes gsungs so// yang gsol pa/ kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// 'khrul dang ye shes bde sdug bsngal// rgyun dang dum bu ci ltar
173a4(rnying rgyud): lags// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa// kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad la// ye shes rgyun du gnas pa yin// 'gro drug sems can thams cad la//
173a5(rnying rgyud): 'khrul pa rgyun du gnas pa yin// lam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor la// 'khrul dang ye shes dum bur gnas// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad la// bde ba rgyan du gnas pa yin// ngan song rnam pa gsum po la// sdug bsngal rgyun du gnas
173a6(rnying rgyud): pa yin// mtho ris mi dang lhar bcas pa// bde dang sdug bsngal dum bur gnas// chos nyid rang gi ngo bo la// bde dang sdug bsngal dbyed med mnyam// zhes gsungs so// yang gsol pa// kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// lha zhes
173a7(rnying rgyud): bya ba gang la bgyi// 'dre zhes bya ba gang la bgyi// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa// kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ ya ma dam sri la sogs pa// ma rtogs log pa'i 'dre'i nakyang /
173b1(rnying rgyud): bangag sa rtags pa dang tu// sangs rgyas kyang chub sam su nga du/ rtogs pa rnams kyi na// gang gis mnyags dang // tsha nyid gang dang // / gas sa nagasuganyis du med// sags//
173b2(rnying rgyud): gyi gsang ba'i bdag po lags// 'khor 'das gnyis kyi thog mthanga' gang // gsang ba'i bdag thos bstan du gsol// gsang byi'i bdag ngos gsungs pa/ kye sems dpa' chen po nyan cig/ ji bzhin pa la thog ldan med// 'a
173b3(rnying rgyud): thog mtha' med// bya ngan 'das la thog mtha' med// ma rig 'khrul ba log pa dang // rang byung ye shis shang ba dang // 'khor 'das gnyis kyi chog mthar gcig/ ces gsungs so// yang 'byed 'phrul ci ste mig las/ gnang bsdu pa
173b4(rnying rgyud): le'u ste drug pa'o// / yang gsol pa/ rtsekye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// sdang brgyan gyi yan lag gis// gang dang gang gi rgya rkyen byed// gsang ba'i bdag pas brtan du gsol// gsang ba'i 'dzin pos
173b5(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa/ gyi sems dpa' chen pa nyon cig/ snang brten 'brel 'khor lo gnyis// bla ma'i gdams dag dran tsam ma// rang byung yaM zhes r+b+ba rkyen byed// r-i sh+tha lo zhes chen po des// rtogs pa mngon du gyur ba yis// bde chen chos sur
173b6(rnying rgyud): hUM rkyen byeng // bla ma'i gdams ngag mi dz+nyAnan// marig 'khrul pa'i rkyen byed// ma rig pa'i 'khrul TIg gis// khams gsum 'khor ba'i kyi byed// chos nyid rang ni bo la// sgyonas dang rtogs bye par las// sangs rgyas sems
173b7(rnying rgyud): rkyen nyis su ma // ces gsungs so// yang byed tshul gyi rdzotshog las/ snang brtson gyi yan lag brtan pa'i ledra ste bdun pa // yang gas pa pa/ kyai phyogs ci bdag po lags// dran brgyan gyi zag pa yis//
174a1(rnying rgyud): la ci ltar bsdam par bya// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsung ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ rdza sems dpa' rgya rnam nyon cig// lta bas rtags par byed dus su// bla ma'i gdams ngag dran byas nas/
174a2(rnying rgyud): rang byung ye shes gsal 'phang bstod// bsgom pa nyams su len dus su// lta ba'i srog dang ma bral bar// de yi rlan dang ldan par bya// mar me 'bar ba'i rtse mo 'am// chu bo 'bab pa'i rgyun bzhin du// ting 'dzin 'byung 'dug med pa yi// rgyun mi chad pa'i bsam
174a3(rnying rgyud): gtanaH// rjes shes pa yi dus nyid du// bsta ba rnom grogs dang ldan pa yis// dran pa'i theg pas gdags par bya// zhes gsungs so// yang byed 'phrul gyi mug las/ dran pa dz+nyA nAHyan lag bstan pa'i leng+ga sde brgyad pa// yang gsol
174a4(rnying rgyud): pa/ kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// drod rtags tshad kyi yan lag gang // gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa// kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ rtags ni rnam pa bzhi yin te// chu bo dag las brgal ba dang //
174a5(rnying rgyud): rdzing chen dag 'a khrus byed dang // gzhan gyis bum pas khrus byed rnams// bag chags sbyangs pa'i snga lngas yin// mas yang gyen du 'gro ba dang // rin chen skas la 'dzeg pa dang // phal ba'i skas pa 'jog pa ni/ sa na d-i lta yin/ tog dkar
174a6(rnying rgyud): rtsel phyin pa dang // ri bo'i rtse la 'dug pa dang // nyi zla gdan la bting ba ni// sa rnams non pa'i snga ltas yin// gnyid kyi rtog pa choms pa dang // shig dang srin bu med pa dang // khams kyi zas dang bral mod kyang // dbang po'i gzi mdangs mi nyams shing // gang la
174a7(rnying rgyud): zhen chags mi skyen// nang rtags kyi ru byung ba yin// snga rtags de dag byung ba yang // re ba ma bskyed shugs las byung // ting 'dzin tshad du brtan pa ni// mtshan mar g.yo ba med pa ni// rgya mtsho'i gting gi chu bzhin no// rnam rtog g.yo mi 'byung ba// skyes bu snying phyung/
174b1(rnying rgyud): ltadrug/ ting dngon brtan par gyur ban// rus sbal 'khar gzhong bcug pa 'dra// rnal 'byor nyams kyi drod bstan pa// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'o// lus kyang ras pa la 'dab mngam// shing ba la 'dab ma bzhin 'byur te// shin tu pang zhing 'ad michod/
174b2(rnying rgyud): 'gro na g.yang sar ltung snyam byed// de ni phyi yi drod du bstan// phyi nang rgyu ba'i dbugs dag kyang // rgyu bar rang gis ma tshor na// de ni nang gi drod du bstan// dper na rig ma'i 'dod chags bzhin// brjod du med pa'i bde ba gcig/ pags kyi nyams su myong bar
174b3(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// de ni gsang ba'i drod du bstan// zhes gsungs so// yang 'byed 'phrul gyi lde mig las/ drod rtags yan lag gi le'u ste dgu pa'o// // yang gsol ba/ kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// chos nyid don gyi ngo bo de/
174b4(rnying rgyud): gang gi ngo bor nges pa lags// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa// kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ chos nyid don gyi ngo bo de// ye nas rang la yod par nges// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub par nges// dus
174b5(rnying rgyud): gsum 'dus ma byas par nges// 'pho zhing 'gyur ba med par nges// skye zhing 'gag pa med par nges// gnyen pos gzhig tu med par des// shes shing rig pa'i ngo bor nges// snang tshul cing yang snang bar nges// yin tshul nges pa med par nges// rgya chad
174b6(rnying rgyud): phyogs lhung med par nges// kun bral ci ma spangs par nges// kun gyi 'byung gnas yin par nges// don la gol ba med par nges// lta ba ngos gzung med par nges// sgom pa dmigs gtad med par nges// spyod pa blang dor med par nges// 'bras
174b7(rnying rgyud): bu sbeng thob med par nges// nyams su len du med par nges// dam tshig bsrung du med par nges// phrin las btsal du med par nges// sa la sbyang du med par nges/ kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ cir snang cir srid thams cad kun// byang chub
175a1(rnying rgyud): sems na // bams las ma gtags pas gdun da// num rnams na// byang rgyab sams pas da// thas kyang kyang chub sems kyis byas// sna da bya
175a2(rnying rgyud): la sdang // 'dus kyang byang chub sems su 'dus// rdzogs kyang byang chub sems 'jogs// yin kyang byang chub sems nyid yin// byang chub sems kyi chos nyid de// snang ba med par kun la khyab// btsal ba med par ldan gyis grub// bgrod pa med
175a3(rnying rgyud): par sa rnams non// byas pa med par las rnams smin// zhes gsungs so// yang byed 'phrul gyi lde mig las/ nges bdon gyi yan lag bstan pa'i lergya bye brgya ba'o// / yang gsol pa/ kye gsang pa'i 'dug po lags
175a4(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi chos nyid de// mthun pa'i dpe yis ma mtshon na// don gyi ngo ba rtogs mi 'gyur// de la mthun dpe rtogs mi 'gyur// de la mthun dpe ci ltar lags// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs
175a5(rnying rgyud): pa/ kye sems dpa' rtson mo nyon cig/ byang chub sems kyi mthun dpe ni// nam mkha' ro rje'i napo na// ma 'i ni ste// brda' btags ming ladzes pa med// nam mkha'i dpe yang mdzes te// depe yang don dung slob yod// 'byung ba namam
175a6(rnying rgyud): dkriyin te// chos nyid nam mkha' dren phung // rgya mthong ba ladun // 'byung ba'i rnaman/ sa nyid 'dun rtsu // no tsur ba yang ma pa te// 'jig rten nor phyi'i pa yin te// mami nyid nor bu'i dong du gro//
175a7(rnying rgyud): dpa'ang mang te/ las sa su myed/ sa gapas / de'i gra / // byung ba'i bang pa'i/
175b1(rnying rgyud): ri bo'i don du 'phro// dper na nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ni// pho mo ma yin ma ning min// kha dog ma yin dbyibs ma yin// phyogs bzhi dbus dang bla 'og min// gyi nang ma yin snang mun min// gcig pa ma yin tha dad med// bye 'gag med cing 'phel 'grib pa
175b2(rnying rgyud): snang ba med par kun la khyab// dus gsum 'dus ma byas pa yin// med pa yod pas 'gog mi byed// thams cad kun gyi gzhi ma yin// byang chub sems kyang dpe dang mtshungs// kun nas 'dra ba'i dpe med pas// gyo gla cha 'dra ba'i dpe ru blangs// nam mkha' rig
175b3(rnying rgyud): med stong pa yin// sems ni rig bcas stong pa ste// don la khyad par shin tu che// rdo rje dpe ru bstan pa yang // dus gsum 'pho 'gyur med pa dang // gnyen pos bshig par dka' ba yin// byang chub sems kyang de dang mtshungs// de yang phyogs cha 'dra ba'i dpe// thams
175b4(rnying rgyud): cad kun tu mi 'dra ste// khyi lung lan tshwar gzhob rkyen// 'dus shing shin tu 'jig par sla// byang chub sems la 'jig rkyen med// de phyir don la khyad par che// rgya mtsho dpe ru blangs pa yang // dper na rgya mtsho chen po las// chu bran rnam pa mang po yang //
175b5(rnying rgyud): byung yang rgya mtsho nyid las byung // byung yang rgya mtsho 'grib pa med// 'dus yang rgya mtsho nyid du 'dus// 'dus kyang de la 'phel ba med// de bzhin byang chub sems nyid la// chos rnams sna tshogs byung ba yang // byung yang byang chub sems las byung // byung yang
175b6(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems la 'grib pa med// 'dus kyang byang chub sems su 'dus// 'dus kyang byang chub sems la 'phel ba med// de yang phyogs cha 'dra ba'i dpe// dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni// bskal pa'i cha 'gyur byung tsam na// rgya mtsho gting nas bskam par 'gyur//
175b7(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi chos nyid ni// bskal par dkrugs kyang med mi 'gyur// de phyir mi mthun khyad par che// nor bu dpe ru blangs pa yang // dgos 'dod zad med de las byung 'gyur kyang // 'dam gyis g.yogs nas snang mi nus// legs par byi dor byas tsam na//
176a1(rnying rgyud): dgos 'dod de bzad med byung // byang chub sems ca chos bral// rje de'i yon tan 'byung med kyang // nam rtag mtshan mas bsgribs rna man// rdza ba don tan byung rje nas// ngar gyur pa shes chen po yin/
176a2(rnying rgyud): sems kyi byi dor legs byas nas// rnam rtog ye shes langs tsam na// che ba'i yon tan zad med 'gyur// de yang phyogs cha 'dra ba'i dpe// thams cad kun tu mi 'dra ste// de bzhin nor bu rin chen la// 'jig rten dgos 'dod 'byung mod kyang // sangs
176a3(rnying rgyud): rgyas che yon 'byung mi srid// sems nyid yid bzhin nor bu la// sangs rgyas che yon tshun chad med// don la khyad par shin tu che// ri bo dpe ru bstan pa yang // ri bo mi 'gyur brtan pa bzhin// byang chub sems kyang 'gyur ba med// de yang phyogs cha 'dra
176a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i dpe// thams cad kun tu mi 'dra ste// ri bo shin tu brtan pa yang // bskal pa'i rlung gis 'jig par 'gyur// byang chub sems kyi chos nyid ni// dus gsum 'gyur pa med par gnas// zhes gsungs so// yang gsol pa/ kye kye gsang ba'i
176a5(rnying rgyud): bdag po lags// chos tsam mtshan mar snang ba dang // chos nyid rang gi ngo bo gnyis// de yi mthun dpe ci ltar lags// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa// kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ dung
176a6(rnying rgyud): mthong du nga la bltas dus su// dung gi dkar po 'dzin pa las// gser 'dzin ser po skye mi srid// gser mthong gser la bltas dus su// gser gyi nyer po 'dzin pa las// dung gi dkar po 'dzin mi srid// ma rig 'khrul pa shar tsam na// chos can
176a7(rnying rgyud): mtshan mar 'dzin pa las// chos nyid zab mo rtogs mi srid// lhag mthong shes rab shar tsam na// chos nyid zab mo rtogs pa las// chos can mtshan mar 'dzin mi srid// ces gsungs so// yang gsol pa/ kye rtse gsang ba'i bdag po lags//
176b1(rnying rgyud): kun gzhi zhes ni gang yang rtse// da la mthun dpo ca ltar lags// ci lang sems can thams cad pa// mas sbas khyab par gnas pal// de la kun gzhi zhes brdze'am// ma rig la khrul par gnas pal// da la kun gzhigs pagyings
176b2(rnying rgyud): na de dag 'dres pa gyi// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa// kye sems dpa' zan po nyin cig/ kun gzhi kun gzhi zhes bgyi ba// thams cad kun gyi gzhir gyur pas// dpyir kun
176b3(rnying rgyud): gzhi ming du btags// dper nas lazlog ste zer// de bzhin rgyal rtod mi zed// sa cung rnaMs maston mar btags// de bzhin sems can thams cad la/ myos ng+yas khyab par gnas pa ste// de la kun gzhin ming ma brtags// nam ga
176b4(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma gnas pa la// de la kun gzhor ming ma brtags// chos b+ha rgya dang 'dra bras// bgachags sa 'dras bslang bal// bran gzhi nas ni ming du btags// zhes gsungs so// yang gsol pa/ kyai rtse gsang ba'i bdag po lags/
176b5(rnying rgyud): sku dri med long sa na// kun gAzhi rnam shes yod dam med// phrin ga ni dam zhes yongs na// rgyasa~M r+b+ba dri ming mad dam zer// gsung ba'i bdag pas bstan du gsol// gsang bar bdag pos gsungs pa/ kye sems dpa' chen ba tsan cid
176b6(rnying rgyud): dperan dung shing yod pa na// de bzhin dkar po yod par nges// de zhin da shA ma mongs na// du ched seM par nges pa med// kun gzhi rnam shes 'das ni// kun gzhi chos kyi sgra yang med// rjes dri med yongs na// kun gno'i rnam shes
176b7(rnying rgyud): mayin// rnam dag de bzhin gshegs pa la// kun gzhi'i meng par mi grags/ nas gsungs ga/ yang na / glegs pa pa ba dag labs// chos kyi spang sa/ sa gang 'grub pa
177a1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang pa'i bdag pas gsungs pa/ gya sems dpa' tshan panyan nag/ dkar pos drang la khyum mod kyang // drungags dkar la khyab pa med// chos sus
177a2(rnying rgyud): spyan bzhi la khyab kyang // kun gzhinyis chos smra zab pa med// ces gsungs so// yang gsol pa/ kyai rtse gsang po'i bdag po lags// chos kyi sku dang kun gzhi gnyis// gcig ldog gcig ldog mi rdzog/ gsung ri'i bdag pos bstan du gso
177a3(rnying rgyud): gsang byi'i bdag pas gsungs pa/ kye sems dpa' med nyon cig/ dper na dkang ba 'og tsaman// de bzhin dung yang phog par gyur// dung lag tsam na ga myi rdzo/ cho rgya logapas pan gA'i sngo/ kun gzhi'i rnam shes 'og gyur pas//
177a4(rnying rgyud): bzhin chos rtswa ldog mi 'gyur// zhes gsungs // yang gsol pa/ kyai gas 'i 'dag gas// ra ga gan ma ma gyi// gsang ba'i bdag pas bstan drugs la// gsang nga gzos gsungs pa/ sems dpa'
177a5(rnying rgyud): cig/ ci ltar grong gang byis pa dag/ sbyin 'dus pa yi phung po la// kha yi dbugs kyis dngas par 'dzod// 'gyur chen rlung gis ma gtod na// de nyid dengs par ga la 'gyur// de bzhin rnal 'byor gyis pa'i blos// gzung 'dzin nam tog sman 'dra ba// mi rtog
177a6(rnying rgyud): gnyen pos dngas par 'dod// rnam rtog yo shes mA sharA \u0f7f// me rtog gnyen pos gtan mini// zhes gsungs so// yang 'byed 'phrul gyi khri mig mas/ mtshon dpe'i yan lag bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya gcig par// yang gsol pa/

177b1(rnying rgyud): byung ban// ! grAm spyo nga bral lasags pa// nga dag gtan la dbab par bya// lta ba gtan la lab nas na// gdang dang yid mas ldan par bya// sgom pa gtan la pabanas ni// zla rnams sems kyis thun 'bar bya// spyod pa gtan
177b2(rnying rgyud): la pab nas ni// gang la rdzogs pa med par spyod// 'bras bu gtan la pab nas ni// rdzogs chen lhun bu bcol ba yang // rtogs par byed pa'i lha ci ni// rin chen gter khungs rnyed pa 'dra// nyams su blangs pa'i skom pa ni// rin chemazin khru bzlam
177b3(rnying rgyud): pa 'dra// ting 'dzin nyams kyi man ngag ni// zhun gyi drod tshad snyoms pa 'dra// mngon du gyur pa'i 'bras bu ni// rin chen yang zhun sgyum bu 'dra// rnal 'byor pa yi spyod pa ni// glang chen rgya mtshor 'dug pa 'dra// lta ba gtan lam phebs na// tshor pa
177b4(rnying rgyud): pa ma rgyas med pa 'dra// skom pa gtan la ma lebs na// lag dum thag la 'dzegs pa 'dra// spyod pa gtan la maphebs na// don gnyer the tsham za ba 'dra// 'bras bu gtan la ma phebs na// sgo ngargal ba'i bye'u phrag 'dra// lta ba gtan la thabs cam
177b5(rnying rgyud): gang la yang ni rtog mi skye// skom pa gtan la phebs tsam nA// blo dngos mi 'bral tha dang med// myod pa gtan la sebs tsam na// re dang dogs pa'i blo mi kye// 'bras bu gtan la phebs tsam na// rang rig sems kyi snying po// rtsol zhing bslab/

177b7(rnying rgyud): sen// nang rtags kyi ru byung ba yin// rtogs la brtan nas lam gyi bar chad sel// rang gi sems la gsog me na// dmachog shes d+har byis pa yin// zhes gsungs so// yang 'byed 'phrul gyi sde mig las/ don dam gtan la
178a1(rnying rgyud): dba' pa'i ladum bcu gnyis pas// yang gsol pa/ kye rtse gsang ba'i bdag nga lags// gnas pa cad kyi yan lag nang/ tang bangan dran lacwa wAr bsgom// gsang ba'i bdan ngas

178a3(rnying rgyud): tshang bstan pa// nam langs nyi ma shar ba dang // nyi nub mun pas mnon pa// de lta bu yis tshad du sbyin// rab kyi tshad du sbyin pa la// gdams ngag myur dra dbrog par bya// ting 'dzin rab la lung bstan pa// gser rig yu yis brgyan pa 'dra// ye
178a4(rnying rgyud): shes gsol la gdugs brdal 'dra// rdo rje sems dpar de ma thag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi snying por 'gyur// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po yin// 'bring gi don du gyur pa la// khams dang sbyar la gdams pa dpog/ yang nas yang du bstan du gzhu
178a5(rnying rgyud): snyoms dang rab kyi ched du gro// ting 'dzin bring la lung bsten pa// rin chen gser gleng rkyen pa 'gro// ting 'dzin na mar gyur ba'o// lung bstan gdams ngag da bog na ni// gser ci rtag gAzin pa 'dra// 'dren pa'i gnas suta ma med/
