182a7(rnying rgyud): na zhi'i // 'a ni sa me// kyigs nga bdad da // zhis kyi bab da kyis bgyi ba gangs gyi// gsang pa'i 'dag ngas btu drug sung/ sa
182b1(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa/ bsams dpang bya ston cig/ ji ltar snang ba chos rnams la// rgyas nas meng du 'atags pa phen// rang bzhin mad pa chos nyid rig/ thos nas yirnams nyid sa pa sachos na rgya yin mas nyid dag ba
182b2(rnying rgyud): chos ni me yin chos nyid tsha ba yin// de la sogs pa gzhan yang brtse bar bya// chos ni byang chub sems yin te// chos nyid rig cing gsal ba'o// de sags bshad pa'i don rnams ni// chos dang chos nyid gtan la drab pa// ces gsungs
182b3(rnying rgyud): so// bar mchod 'phrul gyi ma thong las/ chos dang chos nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / yang gsol pa/ sde k+She gsang ba'i bdag po lags// nyan pas ma bsgom pa'i khyad par ci// gsung ba'i 'dug pos bstan du
182b4(rnying rgyud): gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa// kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cin// don nyid nyams sum blangs na// ci tsam zab mo'i tshig brjod kyang // don dang mthun par de mi 'gyur// bshad pa tshig gi zan pa yin// thar ka'i
182b5(rnying rgyud): 'dag ma 'phyang ba 'dra// bsgoms pas chos nyid don dang ldan// tshig tu brjod nas bshad pa ni// bu ma'o rgyas bshad pa 'dra// bsgoms pa'i gdams ngagazhog pa ni// bur ma lag tu gtad pa'ang// don nyid nyams su blangs
182b6(rnying rgyud): pani// dza~M rAm khar bcug myong bdan// zhes gsungs so// yang gsungs pa/ ting 'dzin don dang mi ldan na// thos pa mang de'i tshig bsags kyang // byis pas kyis sogs byed pa'ang// de yang yen ma chos la ba// mam nyid
182b7(rnying rgyud): dpe byar bzad// mnyin pas sun nanabagyi// bsams ngas myod ba'i shes bya/ brnams pa so can / dbye nyams sa byung ba 'byog// zhes gsang so// bang ma drul gyi ma 'ongasas/
183a1(rnying rgyud): bsam brnam pa'i khyad par bstan 'ang 'dras 'dun pa'o// / yang gsal pa/ rgya gas bar 'dan pa lags// thams can rang byung la shes dang // 'aro rgyan drug 'a ltar 'dus
183a2(rnying rgyud): gnas lhag ma ji lta pa das/ zin las rnam pang sngar 'dus// sgra gdung ring 'bre 'di ltung 'dus// sngags kyi rlonam kyi // thabs dang shes byan gyug// btsun 'phreb rnam pa dulta jus// gso nga
183a3(rnying rgyud): pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa// kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ rig pa khya gtal la snyoms pa ni// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa 'dus// chos nyid rang las ma yengs pas// tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa 'dus// mtshan
183a4(rnying rgyud): ma'i chos la mi skrag pas// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa 'dus// shes rig dran pa ma nyams pas// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa 'dus// mi g.yo brtan par gnas pas na// bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa 'das// dmigs med bsam dang bral
183a5(rnying rgyud): bas na// shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'dus// zhes gsungs so// yang gsungs pa/ sems kyi rang byung ye shes de// rig pa phyi nang gsal bas lhag mthong yin// gsal ba don lam yengs zhi gnas yin// zhes gsungs so// yang gsungs
183a6(rnying rgyud): pa/ sems kyi rang byung ye shes de// gzung 'dzin med pas zhi ba yin// kun la grub pas rgyas pa yin// sems la dbang thob dbang yin te// rnam rtog 'joms pas drag po yin// zhes gsungs so// yang gsungs pa/ sku ni ston bsgra
183a7(rnying rgyud): gsum ste// nga yi rang bzhin chos sku yin// nga yi ngo bo longs spyod rdzogs// nga yi thugs rje sprul pa'i sgra// gdung ni sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs// ma yengs gnas pa ring bsrel yin// zhes gsungs so// yang gsungs pa/ sngags ni
183b1(rnying rgyud): rnam pa gsum yin te// rig sngags gsang sngags gzung sngags sa// sems kyis kun la sgrub ma kyang // kun gyis rtogs par dga' ba'i phyir// gsang sngags zhes su btags pa yin// dadon rkyen nam lag pa// rig pags
183b2(rnying rgyud): zhes su btags pa yin// rtogs pa'i ngang las ma yangs pa// gzung sngags zhes su btags pa yin// de phyir sems ni sngags kyang yin// zhes gsungs so// yang gsungs pa/ snang ba lam du khyer ba thabs yin te// zhen cing chags pa
183b3(rnying rgyud): med pa shes rab min// sems ni thabs dang shes rab tshul du gnas// zhes gsungs so// yang gsungs pa// byang chub sems ni bsnyen pa ste// rtogs pa'i blta ba nye bsnyen byin// nyams su blangs pa slab pa yin// mngon du gyur pa sgrub chen
183b4(rnying rgyud): yin// de ni bsnyen smra ba tshul dang ldan// zhes gsungs so// yang gsol pa/ kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// byang chub sems kyi chos nyid // slob dben don dang ji ltar ldan// slob tu don de ji ltar ldan// dkyil 'khor dam
183b5(rnying rgyud): dang ji ltar ldan// gzhal yas khang dang ji ltar ldan// bag chags tshul du ji ltar gnas// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa// kyo sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ slob dpon ma mthong sems
183b6(rnying rgyud): nyid mthong // rang sems bla mar gnas pas na// kun gyi slob dpon skal pa bzang // gnyis med slob dpon dam pa ste// log sred can la bka' mi stsol// bsam gyis mi khyab yul slob bu// rdo rje sems dpa'i spyan yin pas/
183b7(rnying rgyud): rgyal bas sras kyi dam par gsungs// rang rig sems kyi slob bur gnas// zhes gsungs so// yang gsungs pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems// bla na med par thugs chud pa// de ni dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs/
184a1(rnying rgyud): mas tang byang chub sems dkyil na// dang rig po zhes 'khor gyis bsgyur// rdorje rad nga blangs dkyil 'amar yin// kun gzhi pral ze maN+Dal la// rnam shes zad byas thag can bcad// mang ba
184a2(rnying rgyud): dz+nyAn mi 'thad// ces gsungs so// yang gsungs pa// mA ba cos de bzhinas gzhig// gas par sul gyi nang mang // snang srings rdor srungs pa la// dran thun gyi rtsig pa brtags// dran pa rang dag themasas brgyad// bsdu ba rnam thar zad med
184a3(rnying rgyud): kr-I// rdzu 'phrul rta babs dag gis brgyan// yang dag brgyad sdig pa bcug/ mi 'jigs rig pa'i gdung sbyin zes// rang byung la shes dbu rtsa 'babs// ye zhes ldang / ramathong nas btsal// theg chen gsang sngags sil stan thogs// bAdin
184a4(rnying rgyud): gnyis khyams kyis nges par mdzes// blo yi rim dang sbyar nas ni// 'og khang par khang gsum thog rtse// phyi dang nang med kun tu nang // rang byung sems kyi gzhal med khang // zhes gsungs so// yang gsungs pa// bag chags d+ha ru bstan pa ni//
184a5(rnying rgyud): lhan cig byas pa'i ma rig pa// rkyen ni 'dod yon rnam pa lnga// nga tsa lus ngag yid kyi las// dbyem dge sdig dkar nag chos// gsog pa'i gnoni kun gzhil// dgor pa'i bdag po yang gnyis te// 'bras bu 'gro ba drug tu sbyin// zhes gsungs
184a6(rnying rgyud): so// bang mdzod 'phrul gyi me long las/ don rnam par brtse ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / yang gsol pa/ rtse gsang ba'i bdag po lags// rdzogs chen spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// chos rnams kun gyi bo la// rgyu gzu
184a7(rnying rgyud): yis ji ltar btab// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa// kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ rdzogs chen spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// don gyi ngo bo rtogs 'dod na// bas sbom gsum pa'i lde mig gis/
184b1(rnying rgyud): nges pa'i gsang sgo thu bar bya// nges pa'i gas sgo phye nas ni// kun gan sems kyi nam mkha' la// rang byung ya nas 'odagang ga// dam pa'i gsang mdzad can pan// mi thang gter chan rang pa mthong // sems kyi rang byung la zhes pa/
184b2(rnying rgyud): chos rnams kun gyi ngo bor shar// dper na zangs srang brgya dag la// gser srang gcig gi rtse btang bas// thams cad gser du 'gyur ba bzhin// chos rnams kun ni ngo bo la// byang chub sems kyi rtsi btang bas// rang byung ye shes chen po 'am/
184b3(rnying rgyud): chos nyid min pa gang yang med// dper na rin chen gser gling na// thams cad gser las med pa'i phyir// sa rdo btsal kyang mi rnyed 'gyur// de bzhin rdzogs chen rnal 'byor pas// snang srid sems su thag chod na// byang chub sems las ma gtog
184b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i// chos rnams gzhan nas 'tshol ba ni// rgyal bas btsal yang mi rnyed do// kyu 'bras snang stong la sogs pa// gcig la gcig gis rgya yis gdab// byang chub sems kyi don rtogs na// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med mnyam// bde dang
184b5(rnying rgyud): bsngal gnyis med mnyam// bzang ngan che chung gnyis med mnyam// skyon dang yon tan gnyis med mnyam// chos dang chos nyid gnyis med mnyam// don dam kun rdzob gnyis med mnyam// phyi nang yul sems gnyis med mnyam// mnyam pas rim pa
184b6(rnying rgyud): bkod pa med// ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun// byang chub sems su gsal thebs na// rang rgyud 'dzin pa'i zhen pa ldog/ chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo la// tshad gsum gtan la phebs pa na// gdeng dang yid ches de la skye// de ni mi 'gyur brtan pa
184b7(rnying rgyud): gze// zhes gsungs so// bang mdzod 'phrul gyi me long las/ don gnyis gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / yang gsol pa/ kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i gsung
185a1(rnying rgyud): rnam bye brag ji ltar lags// gas pa'i'i bdag pas bskrun dru gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pas gsungs pa// byamams dpa ldan pa stod cig/ snyan par smra brdzangs pa'i dbyangs kyi gsung // bdud kyi bu mo
185a2(rnying rgyud): sogs pa// kun kyang chags pa skye bar byed// blo ldan skyes bu gang dag gis// gsung bzhin gtan la phebs gyur na// sla ba'i gtan tshigs rmongs mi 'gyur// bde gshegs rgyal ba sangs rgyas kyis// blo yi rim par dgongs nas ni// rang rang
185a3(rnying rgyud): mthun pa'i tshig dgu skyes// gang 'thad yul la ldem du bcug/ bde gshegs rgyal ba sangs rgyas kyis// sru drug rnam par skul nas ni// gsung drug brjod nas 'gro drug 'den// ked gshegs rgyal ba sangs rgyas kyis// gsung drug dgongs pa'i
185a4(rnying rgyud): bshad pa ni// ci bzhon ma yin dgongs pa bshad// dgongs bshad ma yi nI ci bzhin pa// nges dang ma nges rnam pa can// zhal nas bslangs shig gleng sangs la// 'bra bas don rnams so sor go// gong nas gong gi zhon rdo rjog// bde gshegs rgyal ba
185a5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi// thugs nyid zhi las ma g.yos kyang // 'jigs tshul rngam pa'i skur sprul nas// 'drar 'brel 'jigs skrag dang ngas par byed// snang srid sdod brgyad thams cad kyi// sgra skad bsam gyis ni khyab pa// kun kyang gsang sngags gsang ba'i
185a6(rnying rgyud): tshig/ 'jig rten yongs kyi spyod yul la// sangs rgyas gsung gi zab mo 'byung // tshogs chen a ti yo ga'i gsung // mchog tu gsung ba'i chos nyid ni// mi gsung mnyam bzhag brjod pa ste// yi go med pa don gyi gsung // tshig tu brjod pa spangs
185a7(rnying rgyud): mang na ma/ tshig gdang che ga zhi'adu/ da/ sa du
185b1(rnying rgyud): ba mang 'gyung bya ma 'ong las// gsung g.yan lag rnam par bya ba'i ladra sgra brgyapa'o// / bang mdzod 'phrul bye ma long las// rgyud kyi ma'i phyi mar byas pa/ mtshang ba kha skang brdzogs so// / dngam dpal bshes gnyen shrIs// dang/
185b2(rnying rgyud): ma la/ nges gas spa snying po// des d+hA na ku mA ra/ des sangs rgyas ye shes rin po che/ des sbags kyi yang rjod du/ sul yang ma spel bar thugs kyi dgongs pa de la mdzad do// tha ma gar sras la yang thugs ma ches par/ man dag 'azhag pa'i rjod marjod nas/ dang
185b3(rnying rgyud): dril bu tshigs su bcad nas blas so// las 'phro can dang 'phrad par shog/ bar 'di garing ba thong ma mapa dang nyam pa tshad/ rgya gar skad du/ tsakra badro/ bod skad du/ 'khor lo rdo rje/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// yang
185b4(rnying rgyud): dag gsang ba chen po sum gyi mkha' na/ snying po'i rdo rje'i 'od zer rab 'bar ro// kun tu bzang po dang / rdo rje sems dpa' rnams kyang 'od zer 'bar ro// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor na/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor shin tu dag par rol to// yang dag par
185b5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i bcom ldan 'das ni/ dgyes pa chen po'i rol pa'i ldan la 'du bral med do// ye shes thig lo snying po la// sangs rgyas sems can yongs kyi med// rtog pas brtags pa las byung ba// chos so cog pa mtha' yas mchog/ rnam shes kyi nang yul
185b6(rnying rgyud): rolanra// lam zas bsdus pa zag pa'i chos// brjod kyi sde mi langs rtog pa'i dral// de bzhin dbyings las bas ma yas 'char// snod bzhi pa'i rnam nyes kyis// chos rnams ma lus thams cad bsdus// rtog pa'i dbang dang mthu nyid la// stong
185b7(rnying rgyud): las byu da gyur bzhin lam mchog // spyod bral zhing drang bdag med pas// ngasngar brtags pas grub pa sa sa pa'i ra chags zang mtha ma/ ma da pa/ kyang sa sa pa
186a1(rnying rgyud): saH// ye shes dbyings las ma bskyed na// bde chen 'khor lo drug tu bskod// byung drug 'khor pa rnams sems nyid// a yis a spyad a la rol// rdo rje zhe sdang rdodzagacad//
186a2(rnying rgyud): yi ge'i tshogs dang bral bya'i phyir// yi ge la ni yi ge med// yi ge dang ni yi ge'i rgyu// gnyi ga yod pa ma yin te// shes rab thabs la brtan pa yis// yi ge 'dod la sdang bar zad// mi dpog pa yi chos mchog la// dbang
186a3(rnying rgyud): bsgyur chen po'i rdo rje rol// rdo rje'i lte bar yin pa ste// 'brel te gcig tu gyur pa ni// kA li'i snying por gyur pa de// yi ge med pa'i yi ge yin// shes pa shes bzhin ma 'khyams par// rang gi ngo bor gnas pa ni// rang rig
186a4(rnying rgyud): shes zhes brjod do// shes kun der 'khyil phur pa dam// drang po de ni byang chub sems// rdo rje khros pas lnga gnyis btul// yi ge'i snying po nyid du gsal// zhe sdang gsal ba'i rdo rje yis// rdo rje khrag 'thung rnal 'byor spyad//
186a5(rnying rgyud): ye shes gti mug yi ger dag/ gti mug 'khor lo dag pa'i klong // snying po rdo rje rtsan pa'i gnas// dur khrod chen po brdal ba ni// ye shes rol mo gzigs shing dpyod// ye shes chen po khros pa yis// dgyes pa'i rol mo
186a6(rnying rgyud): dbyings nyid rol// rnam pa nyid du mi gnas pa// chos su bzung ba gang yang med// shes pa'i gti mug sna tshogs pa// mi shes rdo rje shes pa ni// sbyin pargya chen shes rab gter// ye byas btab pa'i phyag rgya yin// rnam
186a7(rnying rgyud): sems rtog dpyod bral ba ni// byang chub snying po thig le yin// gal te 'dod pas ma btang na// rten med rang byung ye shes bsam// de ni 'dzin pa'i nad yod pas// bsam las 'das pa'i shes rab bskyed// shes rab
186b1(rnying rgyud): pag gas kya / ga sa padam nas thams dpa 'angam nan dunasemams dag su
186b2(rnying rgyud): rang byung ye shes nyid// btsal bas rnyed par mi 'gyur te// ma btsal ba na ye shes nyid// sems mi shes la rtag tu gnas// thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ rang byung ye shes nyid las med// ye shes de las gzhan pa'i chos//
186b3(rnying rgyud): ye shes nyid kyis mi rnyed do// gal te mthong chos sna tshogs pa// rtog pa'i rgyun gyis mthong bar zad// ci ste mthong ba bden gyur na// sangs rgyas rgyun 'byung 'byung mi srid// khams gsum ye sangs rgyas pa la// stong
186b4(rnying rgyud): pas stong pa'i sbyin pa gtong // ye shes chen po'i sbyin pa gtong // ye shes chen po'i thig le la// chos kyi dbyings kyis brgyan pa yin// 'dud byed med pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// shin tu ye shes rngam pa'i zhal// mi rtog pa las
186b5(rnying rgyud): byung ba'i gsung // gsung gi 'brug ni kAn d+ha grags// bltas pas sreg pa rdo rje'i spyan// ye shes chen po spyan gdangs pas// gsang ba rgya mtsho'i rdo rje'i b+ha// mdangs ldan ma yis spyan khengs pa// drang ngo mtshugs
186b6(rnying rgyud): rje'is// ye shes spyan de btsun// phyo ga zong tshogs 'od zer tshul// gsang ba mchog gi rol mo yis// zag med ye shes tshams gyur ba// thams cad byang chub snying po'i sgra// kun tu bzang po rdo rdzongs// rdo rje ming gi
186b7(rnying rgyud): tshogs bcom nas// a la sogs pa'i tshogs zad pa// seng ge lta bu'i chos chen mo// chung ngu sna tshogs nyid la rdzogs// nyid las chos sum gyur pa// gsang mchog rmad byung snang ba med// sdang med snang ba dngos
187a1(rnying rgyud): runamadudran/ snang dang mi snang me dmigs na// thams nad byang chub phra bas btag/ gsang ba rdo rdulas/ 'angs par bstan pa brang gzhi 'du ste dang nga// / dan
187a2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje shin tu brtan pa'i chos// 'dod chags rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// nyid la nyid kyi ngo mtshar ba bka' stsal pa/ e mdo// rdo rje dngos grub rdo rje'i las// spyod la gyur pa med bzhin du// bdag dang gzhan du rtog pa
187a3(rnying rgyud): las// nyes dmigs la sogs sna tshogs 'byung // khams gsum 'khor lo chu 'bab bzhin// rgyun chags nyid du 'bab par 'gyur// byang chub snying po rdo rje las// bag chags 'khor lo'i rtog pas 'khrul// sna tshogs
187a4(rnying rgyud): pa yi chos rnams dang // sangs rgyas sems can so sor 'dzin// rnam rtog mdud pas bsdams pa las// yang dag dbyings las g.yos pa med// ma g.yos pa las byung rnams kyang // bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od kyi tshul//
187a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo rdo rje bsdus pa yang // rang byung ye shes thig le'i dang // ye shes gti mug mi 'byed pa// chos kyi dbyings su ga la mthong // ming du btags pa 'khrul pas na// de bzhin nyid la gnyis pa yin// sngon du sangs rgyas byung
187a6(rnying rgyud): med pas// sangs rgyas sna tshogs 'khrul pA'i wa// chos kyi snying po gsung du med// de stir brjod du rdul tsam med// gsang mchog dgyes pa zhes bya ba// rdo rje chen pa de la brjod// sku gsung thugs dang mnyam pa nyid/
187a7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa'i dbang las phyag rgya min// chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya ni// ma brtags lhun gyis grub par gnas// lam rgan bya bral byar med lam// rtsa ba med pa'i snying po'o// ma byung mi skye'i snying po la// ming gis brgyan pa d+mo
187b1(rnying rgyud): grur sbyin// tshig tu brjod pa rnam sems dbang // rnam sems sgyu mas bzung ba'i chos// ye shes sgyu mas bsgyur shes nas// sgyu ma smig lha'i dran dbang ni// dmigs kyi dmigs par dran dbang bsgyur// thabs kyi rgyal po rgyu
187b2(rnying rgyud): ma'i stong // shes pa gang yang mi 'byung zhing // snang ba gang yang ma mthong ba// de bzhin bde ba chen po'i sa// ye shes dbyings la mi brtson pa// dran med ye shes krung gnas pa// mnyam dang mi mnyam don las 'das// pha rol
187b3(rnying rgyud): na pa bcu yi mtsho// zab mo zab pas brgyan par ni// shes pa snying por thim pas na// ye shes snying po yin pa'i phyir// yon tan ci yang bsngag pa med// stobs chen stobs kyi dbang bsgyur la// stobs bral stobs mchog 'di
187b4(rnying rgyud): ldan par// yang dag mkhyen pas stobs po che// mi 'dzin stong pas sdug bsngal dag/ chos slu bde ba chen po yang // bsag pa med na rang byung sku// pad+ma dag pas snang ba med// mi snang ba yi don de la// bsgom pa med na bsgom pa yin//
187b5(rnying rgyud): sapa gang la mi 'jug pa// ye shes snying po'i thig le yin// rgyal ba kun gyi gshegs shul bde// byang chub nyid kyang mi snang bas// byang chub nyid kyang mthong ba min// chos las rgyu'i chos gnas pa// 'bras bu'i rgyu dang chu'i rgyud// med
187b6(rnying rgyud): dang yod pa gnyis kar 'brel// de la mnyam dang mi mnyam mnyam// bshad pas thos med bya bral chos// yang dag chos las byung ba med// 'khrul ba'i sangs rgyas chos kyis byed// byas pa'i gnas dang bya ma yin// 'byor 'dus
187b7(rnying rgyud): med pas yis// snying po'i don la mnyam pa'o// 'dod chags nyid la 'dod chags kyi// mtshan ma ci yang ma thob cing // 'dod chags nyid kyi chos mthong ba// sdug bsngal nyid la sdug bsngal gyis// mtshan ma rdul tsam ma mthong zhing //
188a1(rnying rgyud): mug sa pang ga// byangan pa ma gtan // ga pam ma nyad bshad// sa da// samaman ga 'dag// bsam kyi mi thad mtha' mas
188a2(rnying rgyud): ci thod ma'o// bya sa kyims kyi me ma / sems kyi nyin ma cig/ rtenam ny-id mim pa nyi pa// sa rnamams tu// ca med kyi tha'o// 'a ga mangs dza pa// nga ma na
188a3(rnying rgyud): ma kyidabazla sa
188a4(rnying rgyud): min thal// 'das pa med pa'i myang na 'das// byang chub rnamam pa'i mi byabs// rnamam pa'i byang rje bcab cid/ dpar bdas ni pa ming nam// dang cing 'i shes gcig tha/ yonam bya mamed pa ni// sams can ma ma
188a5(rnying rgyud): dam par drug bya mang bsam// migs byed pa'i gnas te// min gyi rnam par martsams pa// rjes rnams car kyi bya mar bsangs// thams ca nin ma kyir shes na// byang zla pa mas pa ma yis bcam/ rnam pa
188a6(rnying rgyud): blon zur rgyam minang za'o// phran nyid chi med kyang chu // / phyogs su 'byams parjorje dbrel// phyogs kyi 'brel ba med par// skye ba'i skye skye bas rtse// sa myal na me da ta'o// sprin po'i le zhes gti mug dang // stong pa'i sem nyid bu med ci/
188a7(rnying rgyud): ni nyid kyang bya dag/ byang chu bongs sum te// seMn sa na pa drang ba / nga / las gra ngas rgya na byeng // do ma thal ba tu
188b1(rnying rgyud): rdo rgyal ba nyam la// dza can pa 'dapa ca// dnganan nyid kyi dang marol// kun tu bzang po rang b+ha dbyings// cig le gcig pus bslang pa med// shes rab sul med shes rab zla// dadza draro med pa// ra da cig gi tu// dam pas ming dang
188b2(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma med// mya ngan 'das pa za gnyid pa// sems kyi dmigs pa bsdus ma yin// yang dag nyid kyang mi mnga' bas// ngag gi bshad pa rdul tsam med// g.yos te mtshan ma byung ba na// mtshan mi'i rgyu las ming btags te// dngos po nyid dang 'brel pa'i phyir//
188b3(rnying rgyud): ming dang mtshan ma zhes su bshad// rnam par rtog pas lan chags nas// sgyu ma mi bden bslu ba'i lam// ming dang mtshan ma gang yang ni// med par rtog pa de kho na// yang dag dag pa'i ye shes yin// gzugs sgra dri'o tshul sna tshogs// rang gi sems nyid las
188b4(rnying rgyud): snang bar// tsho ni shes nimi bdedun pa'i// 'dri shes 'dun mi b+h+yog// mi bden 'du zhes maskyes na// de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngad// nga ti nyid kyi chos nyid pa// yang dag nyid kyang skyo med cing// ming dang na tsanams gyesra pa// dbyed de bzhin nyid
188b5(rnying rgyud): ces gsungs// phye med yang dag nyid mkhyen nas// mi bden pa yi chos sna tshogs// ming dang mtshan ma tshigs bcad dang // bral ba yang dag ye shes snod// don dam pa yi bden pa nyid// rnam par shes pa mi g.yo zhing // sems kyi rgyun gyis skye ba med//
188b6(rnying rgyud): ye shes dbyings kyi zag pa chad// rdo rje phur pa mi 'gul na// theg pa chen po kun gyi rgyu// mi badren pa na mtshan sna tshogs// mi bden chos rnams skye med na// mtshan ma'i tshogs dang 'brel pa bas// mi bden rgyun ni bcad du med// sems la sems ni
188b7(rnying rgyud): mkhyen na// sems zhes bya bar gcad du med// de ni rang byung ye shes nyid// rnam shes yul la mi skye ba// rnam par rtog pa med pa ste// chos kyi mig ni pad+ma'i spyan// sems la sems med par shes shing // chos la chos med par shes te// ming dang
189a1(rnying rgyud): gzugs thargyas tshogs pa// de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas spyod// rdo rdzang rgya 'jig paze 'o// zab ma yangs brgyad kyi dbyings/ rnam du bya gangs// chag tu brjod pa rdul las 'das// byang chub nyid ni
189a2(rnying rgyud): de byang chub// ye sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin no// sems zhes bya ba gzugs med la// shes pa yod pa nyid yin te// sems la shes pa yod pa yin// chos la gzugs ni med pa ste// shes pa mi shes med par gsungs// byang chub thig le nyid med 'brel//
189a3(rnying rgyud): rang rig ye shes nyid dbyings ni// yin dang ma yin mi rtog pas// thams cad ye shes snying po nyid// sdig tu mthong ba med pas na// thams cad bsad pa kyang chu 'phya// thams cad chos ni mi skye zhing // thams cad gang la'ang mi skye zhing // gang la'ang mi
189a4(rnying rgyud): 'gog mi btsal te// ci byed g.yo bar ma mthong na// spyod pa khyad pa yongs mi dgos// ce spyad pa ni byang chub nyid// sangs rgyas thig le yangs pa'i spyan// byang chub kyi sems 'khor lo rdo rje las/ sgo sna tshogs gleng gzhi'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//
189a5(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje kun tu bzang pos// shin tu rngam pa'i tshig gsang ba// mi 'byung mi 'jug pa yi sems// rdo rje khrag 'thud rngams pa'i zhal// yang dag pa yi chos lam drangs// pho mo khyim pa la sogs dang // pha rol phyin bcu mi 'byed pa// tshul khrims
189a6(rnying rgyud): med pa'i tshul khrims mchog/ nam mkha' stong pa sems yod na// chos rnams skye 'gag med pa yin// byang chub nyid kyang skye med pas// byang chub nyid las gzhan yod min// mya ngan 'das dang 'phags pa dang // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'
189a7(rnying rgyud): gang // ming btags don du 'dod pa ni// skur btab sangs rgyas mthong mi srid// yang dag brtan pa drangs gyur na// rmi lam rmi bsad 'dra ste// dngos po'i chos ni ci mthong ba// mthong ba nyid ni rmi lam tshul// sems can de bzhin yin pa las// srog
189b1(rnying rgyud): garjod pa yis sdig pa thob// mamathong rmi la ma lta bu dang // gal te mthong ba bsad pa med// yang dag nyid la rdul med na// yang dag nyid las yang dag med// mi la byas sems nyid du// rdul ma langs na grol ba'i lam// sems can sangs rgyas dal med// mnya/
189b2(rnying rgyud): dang mi mnyam mnyam mi 'dzin// grol dang ma grol ye nas grol// rtsol bsgrub gnyer bas de mi mthong // ci yang mi dgos spyad byas na// bdag dang gzhan med 'bras bu thob// ngo bo nyid kyi gzhi rtogs na// ma nor pa yi lam na gnas// mthong thos dag bzhi pa'i
189b3(rnying rgyud): chos// bsgom pa med na bsgom pa yin// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid la// ma btsal bzhag pa bsgom pa yin// de la de bzhin nyid 'dzin na// de la de bzhin nyid mi gnas// bde ba chen po'i chos dbyings ni// mthong bar rung ba ma yin zhing // mi mthong bar yang
189b4(rnying rgyud): rung ma yin// de bzhin nyid du sems byed pa// rang byung nyid las g.yo ba yin// 'dzin pa g.yos pa min pa na// phal pa'i rnam shes dag dang mtshungs// byang chub nam mkha' yod ma yin// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis// dngos po mthong ba yod mod kyi// dngos
189b5(rnying rgyud): po yang dag ma yin par// stong pa nyid du stong par shes// ye shes sangs rgyas de la med// ming tsam 'dzin pa'i stobs bral na// shes rab gang du'ang mi 'gro ba// de ni byang chub snying po nyid// log pa'i stobs kyis g.yeng ba che// rtog pa'i dbang gis 'byung
189b6(rnying rgyud): pa las// chags pa'i stobs bral thig le'i sku// bde ba chen po g.yos pa med// rdo rje khrag 'thung rol pa'i sku// rdo rje byang chub dbang phyug mar// sbyar te dgyes pa'i lhun mnyam pa// rdo rje kun tu 'od kyis// de yang 'dzin pa'i skyon yin par// rig
189b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i byin rlabs chen po 'byung // rdo rje byed pa po yid kyis// yang dag pa yi sems shes na// g.yo dang mi g.yo mi 'byung zhing // thob dang ma tho ba mi mthong ngo // de tshe mtshams med la sogs dang // nyan thos bsad dang chos la srung // sangs rgyas kun kyang
190a1(rnying rgyud): dang/ sa blang bas ma patan 'dog cang tun// byang chu stong banyi pa d+hags nyams pa man/ rnams sto rdzun
190b1(rnying rgyud): bdag dang gzhan du ma 'byed pas// lan ba gzhan pa pa ba gyu// drang srongs byu yul gad// na macang sa shing gas pa/ sla ma nas pa myong ba dang// rgyal ba byas la na// / rgyas mags dang tha ba dang// thugs
190b2(rnying rgyud): sbed pas na// lan btab pan chos nyams te// shes pa mthong bar yod par 'gyur// yang dag yang dag yin pas na// sa na yang dag nyid ma yin// rgyal 'bras bu'i rten byed pa// 'khrul pa byis pa rnams kyi las// stong pa mthar gtugs rgya la chos// stong par
190b3(rnying rgyud): zhi bzhibs bcings// tshor ba yang dag mtshor ba// zhwa 'i chos lan na med// yang dag nyid dang 'brel bya dgas// darjes po rnam pa mthong na ya // rnam pa cir yang mi dmyigs na// dngas pa dngas med pasgo mapal// da mthag tu d+hA na// dbas yang dag
190b4(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' 'byung // dgongs pa mchog tu gyur ba'o// ben pa'i ltabs stan// lce bathal bar 'gyur ba te// skye 'i 'du shes nad pas na// byung rtsub bcog tu la theg/ sems sa spyod pas pa ma N+Dal dang // gzugs sma rjes yang bltar chung na// btod
190b5(rnying rgyud): dang spad pa'i bded med pas// bsgom bya'i gza' gta dang thal ba// drang srong grol ba'i shul lam ste// rnal 'byor pa ni rtag tu bsten// byang chub snying po mo len cing // byang chub sangs rgyas mi 'tshol na// mi len pas na mnyam pa nyid// ma bsgrubs par ni rang bzhin drug//
190b6(rnying rgyud): chos rnams gang yang mi 'dzin cing // shes pas gang yang mi shes pa// mi tog ye zhes phur bu ni// mi 'gyur 'od gsal mkha' na ma// de tshe phur pa bskal miH// drang po les ni las rlung bsad// sangs rgyas thams cad de la gnas// byang chub kyi sems 'khor lo rdo rje las/ gsang ba man
190b7(rnying rgyud): dag gi lab ste bzhi pa'o// / 'khor lo ngoH zhes kyab byed// rgyag ta dz+nyAn garta dang // sod byed na slong ba tsonas 'byar ni shus te gtan la phab brdzogs so// kyis tha gas rabacad kyis kyang masgribs btsas so//
191a1(rnying rgyud): na tun dang na
191a2(rnying rgyud): ses su
191b1(rnying rgyud): gsal// rtsol ba'i sems bral mngon sangs rgyas// rgyu 'bras gnyis mad 'gyur ba zal// rnam snang shes pa dang gnas pa// byed pa gnyis kyis mthong bar gyis// shes pa'i rnam grangs gang skyes kyang // rnam kyang nyid las gnam yin// bsam
191b2(rnying rgyud): kyis mi khyab dus na shes// 'khor ba'i shes pa glo bur ba// rang bzhin ma yin rkyen gyis snang // brjod pa'i snyan pa nyid dang mtshungs// rnam par brtags pa'i sems nyid ni// gang ltar btags pa de bzhin mthong // du ma'i rigs kyi rtog pa dag
191b3(rnying rgyud): sgo rnams kun tu rgyu ba ste// mi gcig skar khung du ma bzhin// don gyi rnam byang du ma min// rig pa dbyer med dkyil 'khor 'dir// mtha' bral lta ba'i don ldan gyis// rang bzhag dgengs pas gnas par bya// rang byung thugs rje g.yo med kyis//
191b4(rnying rgyud): 'gro don ma lus rdzogs par mdzad// sku gsum lhun grub 'bras bu ni// gzhan ma yin te de nyid rdzogs// rigs drug dbang po tshig chod dam// sbyangs pa'i 'pho can gang yang rung // sems kyi rnam grangs gang sgo nas// spyi thugs dbang la gnas byas te/
191b5(rnying rgyud): brgyad gdams ngag nod par bya// bgrod med lam la gnas byas la// sbyang med pa yi yon tan spel// rim med cig car 'jug pa yi// rang byung ye shes bla ma yis// rab tu che mchog chos kyi sku// btsal med rtag pa mngon sangs rgyas// 'gro ba
191b6(rnying rgyud): rig pa gang dag 'ong // bsam bral nyid du 'dug par bya// shes pa rang lugs thal byung ba// dus gsum mi g.yo gnas gyur na// rgyal ba'i ye shes gsal mthar phyin// zhes gsungs so// byang chub kyi sems rin chen 'khor lo las/ gleng gzhi'i
191b7(rnying rgyud): le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas rig pa'i rgyal pos sems dpa' rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sna tshogs 'khor ba'i rtog pa dang // rdzogs pa'i ye shes rang bzhin gcig/ rdzogs pa'i ye shes rtog pa nyid// rtogs pa gang yin ye shes
192a1(rnying rgyud): nyid// tha dad yod pa ma yin te// ye shes rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin ni// kun spangs kun gyi dngos gzhi nan// 'dzin pa du ma 'i rtog pa 'di// byang chub sems su brjod pa yin// brjod med sems kyi rang bzhan la// ma brjod/
192a2(rnying rgyud): go bar mi 'gyur bas// brjod med don gyis mtshon par bya// kun bzang sems kyi rnam dag la// mtshon bya mtshon byed gang yang med// btsal med rang bzhin nyid kyis mtshon// tha mal snang ba'i shes pa dang // bka' yi shes pas dran byas te// gtong 'dzin
192a3(rnying rgyud): da pa'i ngang la bzhag/ yid la mi byed bya ba btang // blo yis ma dpyad rang bzhin gsal// 'dzin pa'i rgyu 'bras gang yang min// 'bras bu nyid kyis 'bras bu grub// re 'dod rtsol bas mtha' du 'gyur// 'dzin med rang bzhin sman chen gyis// 'khor ba'i
192a4(rnying rgyud): gcod rnying kun dang bral// rnam rtog ye shes 'od gsal nyid// rang gnas ye shes ye nas dag/ rin chen dag pa'i gling bzhin du// sems kyi ye shes ye nas dag/ rim med sems kyi rang bzhin la// bgrod pa'i lam gyis thob pa med// rnam grol
192a5(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu rang byung nyid// bgrod med rnam grol rdzogs pa'i lam// 'dod dang rtsol med lhun gyis grub// ye shes nyi ma'i snying por shar// ma lus gzung 'dzin mi g.yo ba// chu dang 'bras bur rtog 'dzin cing // ye shes sgyu ma'i 'dzin pas bcings//
192a6(rnying rgyud): sems nyid mkha' 'dra lta ba'i klong // ye shes yangs pa brdal ba che// blang dor gnyis med rtsol dang bral// byang chub sems kyi lta zag bcad// ting 'dzin zhi bas nyams su blangs// byang chub sems kyi lta ba ni// gang ltar ci yang ma yin
192a7(rnying rgyud): pas// rang byung ye shes mtshan nyid gsal// mi bsam gyi nang bzhag pa'o// bsam gyis me khyab ye shes mthong // rang byung rdzogs pa'i lta ba ni// mtha' gsum bral la ye sangs rgyas// rtsol bral dbu ma drang po'i lam// 'ching bral lta ba
192b1(rnying rgyud): gza' gtad med// rin chen 'khor lo kun bzang 'dis// rang sems gnyis med rtogs par gyis// btang snyoms lta ba blang dor med// khyud chan mkha' la lding ba bzhin// sgo bsgra gnyis med btang bzhag bral// rang bzhin gnas pas radogs bral//
192b2(rnying rgyud): spyod yul ma lus sems su shes// sna tshogs 'khor ba'i rang bzhin dang // ye nas rang bzhin gnyis su med// gnyis las gzhan sems grub pa med// rig pa ci yang ma yin pas// 'dod pa'i sems pa kun dang bral// shes pa mtha' bral sto
192b3(rnying rgyud): pa nyid// ye shes 'od gas la rang gnas pa// yid la 'dzin med la zhes gsal// rol pa snang yang thug pa med// sgyu ma'i ye shes rtsal du 'gro// ma bcos snam lhan thub la// 'dzin pa'i sems dang ngos gzung med// ye zhes rgyal ba rnam par dag
192b4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa'i sems thal rig panas la// sems nyid rnam mkha'i ltan 'o// rnam mkha' lta zur bas ma du med// nam mkha' bas mdu med pa bzhin// yaM shes byas ma du med pa'ang yin// cir yang mi dzA ga ngas rang bzhag pa// dus gsum rgyal
192b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i lta ba yin// lta med rang gzhag blta ba ni// dus gsum gang yang ma yin te// 'gyur med dbyings kyi lta ba yin// 'dod pa'i bya ba gang yang min// ngo bo nyid la yang sa dog med// sems nyid dri ma ka dag la// 'gyur med rin
192b6(rnying rgyud): chen gser bzhin no// 'dzin pa'i rlung gis g.yos gyur kyang // rig pa'i ngo bo 'gyur ba med// rgya mtsho chen po'i snang ba bzhin// gyi nang mi mnga' ye shes gsal// mtha' dbus mi mnga' phyogs dang bral// ye shes sems nyid lta ba la//
192b7(rnying rgyud): rgyu dang rkyen gyis rtsol ba med// rdo rje nyid 'dra 'jig pa med// nyi ma rin chen 'bar ba ltar// rang gsal rnam par rtog dang bral// 'khor ba nyid nas ye sangs rgyas// rang sems rig pa gang yang rung // bsam pa dang bral ye shes nyid// chos dang
193a1(rnying rgyud): sa gdu nachu tu du ma na du rgyus na
193a2(rnying rgyud): narnam
193a3(rnying rgyud): rgya
193a4(rnying rgyud): sa su su su
193b1(rnying rgyud): yaM shas dbu ma mtha' thal la// mthod pa'i mam mang ma sangs rgyas/ sa pa kun thal chom nyid lnga// rang gas pa 'ang la gang gnas la// rim par ma yin mo dgangs// ye shas kun bcang lam chen la/ rma sa rlabs kyis gang 'dun pa
193b2(rnying rgyud): sbyor ldan kun gyi lam dang bral// btsal med rang byung bde chen ni// 'dod pa'i rtsol ba gang 'phags pa'i// rim 'dug rgya 'bras ma lus stong // kun bzang rang rig 'od gsal la// 'dod pa'i sbyor ba gang 'dug na// phyogs bral rang byung don dang bral//
193b3(rnying rgyud): rtsa ba rnam dag mkha' ltar khyab// rnam rtog 'dzin pa'i spyod yul min// bgrod med stong pa'i thig le ni// rnam pa dang med gsang ba'i sems// btags pa sna tshogs jo bo la// mi g.yo rang bzhin dkyil 'khor nas// ye shes nyi ma kun mthong yang //
193b4(rnying rgyud): shin tu sbyor ldan rnal 'byor la// btags pa'i snang ba mthong ba med// bsam gyis mi khyab gang dus na// 'od gsal ye shes don snang yang // gang mthong sna tshogs sems dang bral// rang byung dag pa'i dkyil 'khor la// rang gzhag rig
193b5(rnying rgyud): pa kun rtogs kyang // sbyor 'dod sna tshogs mthong ba med// gsang ba'i 'khor lo rdzogs pa 'di// rgyu rkyen mthar 'gyur rang gnas pa// dri med snying po rang gsal bas// rgyu rkyen 'dod pa'i ngo bos stong // gang zhig rgyu 'bras ngo bo nyid// dper ni ri bong
193b6(rnying rgyud): rwa bzhin no// rgyu med rgyas bskyed de dang 'dra// rang gnas ye shes gdod nas grub// gang dag pa yi 'khor lo la// sbyor 'dod rgyas rtsol gang zhig na// mthun pa nyid na mi mthun pa// thug pa med de gang la 'thad// khyad med pad+ma'i rang bzhin dag/
193b7(rnying rgyud): 'du byed las kyi rdo rje 'chang // 'dul mdzad ting 'dzin 'bum phrag las// bsam bral ting 'dzin 'od gsal sems// thabs 'dug grub pa ma lus yin// mi g.yo thig le byang chub sems// yongs su ston pa'i ngo bo nyid// rang rig
194a1(rnying rgyud): rig pa mchog gi su// byang chub sems la jo bo gcig/ rig pa mchog gi bstan pa ni// brjod med kun la rang bzhin ston// rnam dag rin chen lta bu gsungs// mi g.yo theg pa nyid du gsal// yig thadang kun dang
194a2(rnying rgyud): bral// ma 'gags rang snang don du bshad// sna tshogs snang ba'i rang bzhin dag/ rang rig nges don nyid du bstan// rnam bshad rang byung bstan pa'i mchog/ rang rtsol bral ba'i rang bzhin gyis// de 'khor bsam pa ji bzhin bstan// bstan pa'i
194a3(rnying rgyud): yan lag 'bum phrag yas// rang byung dag pa'i shugs kyis 'byung // 'dod rtsol blo la drang ba dang // thugs kyi dgongs pa nges pa'i don// gdul bya rab 'bring don du bshad// nges pa'i snying po gsang ba nyid// drang ba'i don mi na'ang byung bshad//
194a4(rnying rgyud): chos sku rang byung bstan pa'i mchog/ der 'dus 'khor dang bstan pa dag/ nyid las mi gzhan rang byung nyid// rig pa mchog gi sbyor ba la// so so ma yin brjod bya gcig/ tha snyad du ma'i brjod bya gang // kun bzang rig pa'i gsang don ston//
194a5(rnying rgyud): brjod pa dman pa'i sku yis bstan// rang byung rig pa mchog gi sku// rang byung mchog gi sku gsum rdzogs// ma bcos rang bzhin snying po la// 'dod pa rnam pa gang yang min// bsgrub bya ma lus kun gyi bdag/ ye shes nyi ma sgrib med gsal// snang
194a6(rnying rgyud): pa ma lus rang byung sems// jig mchog ldan pa bde gzhags pastan// rang byung zad ma mngon sum gas pa// 'khor ba'i rtog pa gcong rnyeng dag/ yaM shes rang rig nyid du 'bar// thugs rtsengs pa'i thabs kyis gsal// gsang ba'i don kyi
194a7(rnying rgyud): gsal lung // gzer chen man ngag theb pa'i sgras// rig pa'i brda'ang la tshig dang bral// mngon sum ye shes gsal ba yis// rjes su rang gzhan ye nas dpags// zhes gsungs so// byang chub kyi sems rin chen 'khor lo las/ 'khor ba
194b1(rnying rgyud): ye shes su bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas rig pa'i rgyal bas sems dpa' rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ rang byung rdzogs pa lta ba'i slong // mnyam nyid ye shes rig pa'i sems// snang ba ye shes rdzogs pa nyid// nam mkha'
194b2(rnying rgyud): lta ba'i mchog/ blta med rang byung sems la blta// rtsol med rig pa'i rnal 'byor yin// 'jug pa gnyis med rig pa'i klong // ye shes mkha' mnyam sgra don med// rang gsal yul la mi rtog pas// ye shes tshig le nyi ma shang // snang med pa
194b3(rnying rgyud): 'gags cir mi dgongs// spang ba rig pa'i thig ler bsdus// sdug bsngal bde ba'i ngang drag nas// re 'dod kun bral thob spang med// rang byung bde ba'i sems nyid la// snang ba nyid du grub pa med// 'di chen rig pa mdze ltar zab// ye shes
194b4(rnying rgyud): rig pa mkha' ltar mnyam// dngos grub rin chen 'od ltar 'byung // zhes gsungs so// byang chub kyi sems rin chen 'khor lo las/ lta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas rig pa'i rgyal pos rang bzhin bstan pa'i don du
194b5(rnying rgyud): pa// rig pa'i sems ljid 'du med la// tIng 'dzin mi g.yo 'khrug pa med// rtsol med rig pa bsam dang bral// ye shes rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo la// thig le 'dre chen bsamA mi khyab// rol pa bde chen rgyu rlabs ltar// ye shosA'i bzhin mo
194b6(rnying rgyud): bskyod pa// le nas yin phyir mi me dgos// ye shes gsal ba'i phyag rgya yis// mtshan ma ye zhes 'khor lo bkor// 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin kun dang bral// rang byung snying pog yo med na// dbang bsgyur rgyal ba'i thugs dang mnyam// tipa na
194b7(rnying rgyud): bzhag mkha' dang mnyam// mi 'gyur ye shes mkha' ltar khyab// rtsol thal rig pa'i ye shes la// yengs pa med par rang bzhin bzhag/ dbang po ro la snang ba la// mi rtog rang bzhin rig pa gsal// ye shes kun bzang 'gro 'du med/
195a1(rnying rgyud): sa na dargyu na dumaman
195a2(rnying rgyud): shes rig pa zhes te ra/ ga sa/ na da migs byed pa// 'ad rnam sal dag tor/ rnam mnyam pas/ ca ldan pa gagasapa/
195a3(rnying rgyud): ba ba ba'o// bang bya gi dongs pa bas// dri so// yi na pasheste nga spyod tamad// ku pas nas rgya padag/ kun paras sa
195a4(rnying rgyud): na gtan po brtan me dgos// tshigs myed pa byu rdzogs pa dang/ khyen // lam gyis che sa pas sa rgya// gang pa rnam/ dag pa can mongangasu ma gci// da pa@
195a5(rnying rgyud): ga na pa can // med pa sa grang bdag/ bcwal ma rnal/ na mad
195a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i bya// dus gsum nyid du 'da' ba myed// ces gsungasas/ mas/ ldanas phrag/ pa'i la ste rnam sa// de nas rig pa'i byal ngas yang sems nyid du na du ma rdzogs pa dan gas
195a7(rnying rgyud): par bya batshad pa na kyis gsus // 'ashu sa dag lags / gapa pa // ra rjon pa'i ma/ bzhes rdzogs par rab pabad/ gas la gcid 'ardzogs// rgyal byas
195b1(rnying rgyud): 'angs da ba/ nga satan pa bstan pa bcags/ nas gas na// danas sems dpa dngos don ma thos so// bags kun ya man pa'i thags/ ma // bdacos nan thamasas nga/ na
195b2(rnying rgyud): kyi de ji snyed pa// rang byung gsal ba'i don la 'dus// rnam dag rdzogs pa de nyid kyang // dran bzhin log pa'i rmongs pas bcings// snang med rang byung bde chen la// sna tshogs dngas par rang sems 'phrul// 'd-i 'byams dbyings las ma gamos/
195b3(rnying rgyud): 'khrul rtog sdug bsngam snga chags kyog// rnam dag mig po thugs rjes shing // ces zlas so// de nas rlig pa'i rgyal pos bka' stsal ba// ye shes rang byung chos kyi su// kun bzang ye shes chos kyi s+ho// bstan pa ma lus ji snyed
195b4(rnying rgyud): pa// b+har mad rang byung sems su bshad// de nyid gang la de dag ste// gang la bshad pa shugs kyis pa// snang dang srid pa'i chos rnams can// rang byung sems las ma g.yos pas// rang rig rdzogs pa thugs kyis gsal// gang lag
195b5(rnying rgyud): samang po stan// thugs kyis brgyad nas de mthong ba/ rabahU~Mng nyi ma dzadzad sde mchog/ ma cos pas la bu'i mamar stsal// dzi nA pa'i drim kun gyis dben// man zhal 'di ltar rig pa 'char// den can rig pa'i mtha' mor bzud/ 4
195b6(rnying rgyud): don ma sa thud don da sa// rig pa'i ga dang ldan ma shes klong // gsang ba'i phyogs dgangs pa la// thugs rje men 'ad myu // mig gi dag zil ma shes rdzogs pa 'i// bya sgrolam gyi zhen pa gang bzlog kyang // brda' dang bskad shi ma
195b7(rnying rgyud): da/ nga byung chub ma sras gcig tu ga// gyur ldan lam kyis nyag pamatha' 'bral// dang mthub sa byung dadas gcas pas ma mi // blon mas gsas shin pa na 'dzin du ba shad// ba kril to brog pa /
196a1(rnying rgyud): nyid bzhin te thams cad kun la yin// rang byung bde chen 'khor lo la// ye shes don du rang gsal zhing // 'dzin med rig pa'i mkha' la bzhag/ rgya ba med pa'i ye shes bskyed// rang bzhin gsal don 'od la bzhugs//
196a2(rnying rgyud): sgra gsung gsal ba'i don ldan na// lhun rdzogs ye shes tshig ler bshad// tha snyad sra yi rnam pa kun// ye shes mtshon pas 'dres pa'i brda// don la brjod bral ye shes rdzogs// rig pa'i bar d+mo don gsal ba// rjes med myong ldan blo bzhin no /
196a3(rnying rgyud): chen rig pa'i rgyal po la// 'od gsal rig pa'i 'khor lo bskor// yi ge med pa'i rang gsal la// ye shes sgrog gi phur pa thebs// zhes gsungs so// byang chub kyi sems rin chen 'khor lo las/ gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//
196a4(rnying rgyud): de nas rig pa'i rgyal pos/ rang rig pa'i phun sum tshogs pa 'di bka' stsal to// ye shes khyab bdag rig pa'i sku// rang byung rig pa ma 'gags gsal// brjod med sems kyi de kho na// rang byung ston pa thugs rje'i bdag/ 'gro drug sems can
196a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi// rang sems ston par ma shes na// rang byung mthong bar yongs mi 'gyur// des na ye shes rdzogs pa'i don// rang rig bde bar shes par gyis// rang byung rgyal po ston pa'i mchog/ ye shes ma 'gags cir yang gsal// rig pa klong
196a6(rnying rgyud): gi 'khor du rdzogs// rang sems bde la kun rdzogs pas// bstan pa rgya mtsho rig pa'i glong // rnam dag rang sems skye med pas// 'gyur med 'khor lo rig pa'i gnas// ye shes rtsal med gnas kyi mchog/ rang byung ston pa 'od gsal thugs/
196a7(rnying rgyud): pa med pa'i nyi ma shar// me shel 'od ltar byin rlabs 'khrigs// 'od gsal rig pa'i bstan pa klogs// rang byung rkyen bral gnas kyi mchog/ rang byung bde chen ye shes rol pa'i sku// yi ge brda bral ye shes rig pa'i gsung // tshig gi lam chad
196b1(rnying rgyud): la shas smon ma 'bar// lan med 'dzin med padam chog gsang ba'i lam// ba ye 'jug pas gsang ba'i don ma gsal// ming dang don mad rang byung la shas gsal// rig pa thag le gsal ba gsungs// brjod med ma shas 'khor po 'ang// bsnyad
196b2(rnying rgyud): kun bral brjod bya ba dag/ bdag med rang byung ye shes nyid// rig pa'i 'khor lo dag la 'char// bde chen 'od 'bar thig le'i mtha'// rang byung gzer chen rang la 'debs// rang byung 'khor lo rang la gcod// rig pa'i phyag rgya 'gyur ba med// ces
196b3(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// byang chub kyi sems rin chen 'khor lo las/ phun sum tshogs pa'i de kho na nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas rig pa'i rgyal pos btsal ba med pa'i chos dang chos can mi dmigs pa 'di bka' stsal to// btsal med rang
196b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin ye sangs rgyas// rnam dag rang byung snying po la// thams cad ye shes snying por gsal// ye shes 'khor lo snang ba med// ye shes rin chen rtsol dang bral// rang byung mi 'gyur kun tu bzang // sems nyid byang chub rigs bdag la// lus ngas
196b5(rnying rgyud): sems kyi rtsol med pas// ting 'dzin mi g.yo 'jug dang bral// rang byung 'khor lo rol par rol// ye shes spyod pa pad+ma ltar// spyod bzhin ma chags ye nas dag/ bsam dang bral ba'i chos nyid la// ye shes 'khor lo rang bzhin te// dus gsum
196b6(rnying rgyud): g.yo ba med par gnas// rtog pa'i dngos po snang ba yang // rang byung rig pa'i 'khor los gcod// rig pa rgya mtsho mkha' ltar zab// mngon sum snang ba'i ye shes la// sangs rgyas sems can khyad med kyang // rang dbang sems la mi gnas
196b7(rnying rgyud): na// sems nyid bde bar spyod mi nus// 'dzi ni med dag gi lcags bkrol yang // goms pa'i bag chags bcings dang 'dra// ye shes 'khor lo rab dbang na// ji ltar gnas kyang bya rtsol med// rig pa mtha' bral dkyil 'khor la// lus kyis rtsol
197a1(rnying rgyud): med dkyil 'khor gsal// rang snar rig pa 'od gsal la// ngad ga rtsol med rig pa'i gsung // mi 'gyur kun bzang ye shes la// thugs kyi rtsol med bas ma dang rnal// snang ba gzugs kyi snang ba kun// mnyam
197a2(rnying rgyud): nyid chos kyi sku thim// thag pa d+ma yi snang ba kran// mgyon pa'i ring rtags gsung du'i ma// shes rig ma lus mi stod pa// thugs kyi mtshon pa'i rang rtags te// oM zhes reg pa'i thugs su thim// rig pa 'gyu med rdo rje ltar// dbyer me ye shes
197a3(rnying rgyud): bya btsal thul// zhes gsungs so// de nas rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad lus so// rnam dag ye shes dkyil 'khor na// 'gro drug ye nas sangs rgyas kyang // lam stobs drag pos bdag zhugs te// rang rkyen chog pa'i shugs kyis dkrugs// rang bzhin
197a4(rnying rgyud): rin chen nor bral bas// rigs drug gnas su 'khor bar 'khyams// dus 'dir thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis// rdzogs pa'i sems la mos bskyed pa// de bas rtsol bral 'bras bu yod// rnam rtog g.yo ba ci 'gyu ba// rig pa'i don la gang gis bstan// dus
197a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i gsung mdod gang gis mthog// zhes gsungs so// de nas rig pa'i rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// ye shes rdzogs pa'i sems bskyed bzug/ spros pa'i sems ldan don ma gyur// rang gzhag rig pa ma yin par// badz+ra drag po'i rjes ma 'brang // bde chen
197a6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i 'khor lo la// gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin pas// chos can chos gnyis gang yang min// 'dod pa'i blo yis gang sbyar ba// dman pa'i sems la bstan par zad// bas ma thal ye shes 'khor lo la// chos dang chos nyid gang 'dod pa// ra
197a7(rnying rgyud): byung gsang ba'i sems ma shes// bde mchog 'khor lo'i don ma rnyed// mi 'gyur gsal ba'i sems dang bral// ye shes rin chen 'od kyang nub// 'khor ba'i lcags las thar pa med// sna tshogs 'khor lo'i rang bzhin la// rmongs pa'i blo yis rma
197b1(rnying rgyud): dor med// gnyis med rang 'od gsal ba la// blo dang skyur bas rang sems spong // zhes gsungs so// byang chub kyi sems rin chen 'khor lo las/ rtsol ba med pa chos dang chos can ma grub par bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas yang
197b2(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal pos ye shes rig pa'i spyod pa 'di gsungs so// ye shes bde mchog kun tu bzang // rang byung nam mkha' rdo rje nyid// ci la spyod kyang chags pa med// sgo gsum bag yangs lhag pa nyid// snang med rang byung ye shes gsal// rang gzhag
197b3(rnying rgyud): ye shes spyod pa la// glang dor gnyis med bde chen dang // mkha' mnyam ye shes rang byung la// dus gsum 'da' ba med par gnas// rang 'bar ye shes dkyil 'khor nas// dngos grub rin chen 'od ltar 'byung // ye shes rgya mtsho mu mtha' med//
197b4(rnying rgyud): 'od gsal rig pa'i gdeng ldan la// mtshon pa lam gyi rgyu dang bral// rang byung lung gi don mthong bas// lung chen tshad ma kun gyi bdag/ rig pa'i ye shes brjod bral bas// brjod pa'i lung la sems mi 'jug/ sems nyid rig pa'i sgron ma ni// rin chen mo she la ltar gsal bas//
197b5(rnying rgyud): rin chen man ngag kun gyi bdag/ kun gsal me long mthong thob pas// rna brgyad sgra la rag ma las// chos nyid nam mkha' lta bu la// rang byung gsal ba'i nyi ma shar// bsam sbyor blo yi dri ma dag/ 'dod 'jug rim rtsol kun dang bral// bsam
197b6(rnying rgyud): med rang bzhag spyod par gnas// sku gsum rig pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// thugs rje nyi ma'i zer shar nas// 'gro 'dul spyod pa ci bder rtsod// thabs kyi rig pa rang shar nas// ye shes gsal bar 'gro don mdzad// ye shes rang byung 'dren skur shar/
197b7(rnying rgyud): tshogs sprul sgo rin chen smos// gang dag dman pa'i 'khor dgal// blo dang mthun pa'i bstan pabakod// 'dod pa'i rna mas dpag med byi// thig le gcig las 'das pa med// sbyor ldan gro la theg pa rnams// me shes thugs kyi spyo
198a1(rnying rgyud): nas// rang byung gcig la bstan par zad// ri ma 'dug blo'i thug pa rnams// 'dren pa'i sgra yis drang ngan bstan// ngas pa'i thag gcig steng po la// 'dod pa'i yan lagakun dang bram// bstan pa'i rnam pa ma lus snyan//
198a2(rnying rgyud): ye shes rig pa'i bka' la rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// byang chub kyi sems rin chen 'khor lo las/ spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas rig pa'i rgyal pos/ rang byung rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bka' stsal to//
198a3(rnying rgyud): sems nyid byung dkyil la sa// mabaco cig paskrun sgrub ste// mthu dbas med pa'i gzhal las na// rang dbang pa shes rdzogs sangs d+has// ra byung rig pa 'khor mtha' med// thun bu thang zhen pani// sman drangs ma yin mos sa
198a4(rnying rgyud): rgyas// rang byung gsal ba'i sngags ldan pa'i// lha yi snying po dbul mi dgos// bde chen gsal ba'i don ldan pas// ye shes gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyes// rang byung gsang ba'i sems nyid kun gyi lha// dus gsum 'du 'bral med pa thugs dam
198a5(rnying rgyud): mo// rnam dag rig pa ka dag la// nyes pa'i dri ma dang bral ba'i// ye shes dam tshig rnam par dag/ brjod med rig pa'i don mthong na// rang byung gsal ba'i dam tshig thob// rang bzhag sems las mi 'da' na// mi rtog dam tshig nyid yin pas// rang
198a6(rnying rgyud): byung dam tshig rnam par dag/ mi rtog ye shes 'dzin bral la// bsod nams ye shes lhun gyis grub// rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// 'gyur med rang byung kun tu bzang // ye shes gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// mtha' dbus med pa'i snying po la//
198a7(rnying rgyud): slong len med pa'i sems kyis 'jug/ rang bzhin rnam dag dbye ba med// spyan grub rang bzhin ye sangs rgyas// rang rig 'od gsal rnam par dag/ ye shes gang mtshon mtshan nyid mtshan// lhan grub rang rig kun tu bzang // ye shes rdzogs pa'i
198b1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor blta// gzung 'dzin dang bral dri ma med// ye shes bya mthun tu bzang // rang byung bya mangs bzung med// rnam dag rang byung dkyil 'khor gsum// ma skyes lhun thab thab med// don la gang 'dug sbyor ldan rnams// yi ga bar
198b2(rnying rgyud): med gnyis med gsal// sgyu ma bya bral rig pas rtogs// rang snang rig pa'i 'od la bzhugs// bsam med rang bzhags le ba// ci yang ma yin gyi na ba// rang gsal ye shes nyi ma'i 'od// kun bzang rgyal ba'i thugs dam mo// zhes gsungs
198b3(rnying rgyud): so// de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces zhus so// snang med rang snang bde chen la// brtags pa'i snang bas gnyis su mthong // rang bzhin rnam dag gser bzhin yang // thog med dus nas don ma mthong // dus 'dir sgor 'dug gang dag ni// gas
198b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i dron la chos pas 'drug/ gsal byed rin chen sgron ma gang // 'dzin pa'i drim gang gis dag/ bde chen gsang ba gang gis mnyes// zhes nus so// de nas rig pa'i rgyal byas bka' stsal pa// gas mgyis mi khyab dus gang la//
198b5(rnying rgyud): ldan rig pa'i lde mig gis// rin chen sems nyid khong du chud// ldang ba'i snang ba ci 'gyur yang // yid la mi byed rang bzhag na// 'dzin pa'i dri ma rnam par dag/ ces gsungs so// byang chub kyi sems rin chen 'khor lo las/ dkyil 'tshar
198b6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas rig pa'i rgyal pos sems dpa' rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems nyid gsang bsngags kyi lha// rang bzhin dag pas sbyang mi dgos// ldan pa de nyid tsam du zad// rang rig
198b7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i ye shes la// ngo bor grub pa gang yang med// rtog pa'i mthu yis cir yang mdzang// me long dag pa'i gzugs brnyan ltar// ye shes gsang ba'i gdams pa yis// rig pa'i ye shes kun tu bzang // yi ge med pa'i don du mdza/
199a1(rnying rgyud): rang gsal rjes su rang bzhag na// ye shes rdzogs pa rjes su dpag/ rang rig rdzogs pa nyid na gsal// ye gsal rig pa'i 'khor la la// 'dod pa'i blo yis gang rtsol ba// rang 'dod theg pa'i khyad par ni/
199a2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i don la ma lus stong // 'dod pa'i stobs kyis phongs nas rtsol// rang gsal 'khor lo'i don dang 'gal// 'dod rgyus gsal ba'i ye shes kyang // rtsol ba nyid las 'da' ba med// rdzogs pa'i ye shes bde chen ni// rang bzhin
199a3(rnying rgyud): na'i ma da// rnam dag nga byung 'dags lam// N+Da sgrub pa dugs med// 'a ga ces // rang na dang na zung na na// Ta che pa grums / ridags la rig pa'i ni dang/
199a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rtog pa'i rang bzhin gcig/ gang la srang bya ma yin te// gang gi rnam pa de gang bzhin// de bzhin 'gyur ba de nyid med// sems ni ji bzhin mnyam pa nyid// sangs rgyas thugs kyi rnal 'byor ro// yang dag lam la yi ge me de// snying po nyid
199a5(rnying rgyud): du bdug 'jug byas// nub pa med cing grang ba med// reg pa'i thugs la gsal bas gsung // byang chub sems kyi ma nas ni// rnam shes dmigs pa'i thal las 'das// reg pa gas la gzung 'dzin med// byang chub sting bar bzhugs
199a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshe// ngo bo nyid ni dmigs su med// ye shes kun bzang rnam par dag/ 'bar ba'i ting 'dzin ngo mtshar che// rang gsal rig pa cir mi dgongs// bde gshegs 'khor mdza ba ni// mi 'joms pa yi rdo rje 'chang // kun byung rin chen
199b1(rnying rgyud): dbyung // ngas na gnas pa'i dom ldanan// bde ldan rig pa sangs rgyas la// rtog pa'i rnam pa kun med pas// gang zhag 'bras bur ltar 'dad// sto mdon pa yin pasam dpanarnams cad dag pa // rnam gas
199b2(rnying rgyud): byang chub kyi sems rin chen 'khor lo las/ rig pa rgya dz+nyAn gyis ma bskyed pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / byang chub kyi sems rin tshon 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// #
199b3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che rgyas pa zhes bya ba rtul 'byor ma yi gyur/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag cir/ sgra gas
199b4(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi rang bzhin/ bde ba'i mchog/ btsun mo dam pa de pa'i mchog gi pad+ma la rnam par bzhugs so// de yi byin gyis rlabs las byung ba/ longs spyod rdzogs par mdzad pa'i longs spyod chen po/ btsun mo dam pa'i bad+ma gzhal las khang brtsigs
199b5(rnying rgyud): pa/ dbyibs dang tshad dpag tu med pa/ rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad dang / rdo rje mi bskyod pa dang / rdo rje dkon mchog dpal dang / rdo rje tshe mtha' yas dang / rdo rje grub pa gdon mi za ba dang / btsun mo dam pa yangs pa'i spyan dang / mi bskyod ma dang / de na
199b6(rnying rgyud): rin chen dpal ma dang / tshe dpag med ma dang / grub ma gdon mi za ba dang / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / byams pa dang / 'jam pa'i
199b7(rnying rgyud): dang / sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang / kun tu bzang po dang / btsun mo dam pa sgeg mo dang / phreng tha ma dang / dbyangs ma dang / gang byed ma dang / 'dug spos ma dang / me tog ma dang / mar me ma dang / dri chab ma dang / dam pa'i
200a1(rnying rgyud): srung gshin rtagashad po dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / pad+ma mthar byed dang / bdud rtsi zab byor dang / btsun mo dam pa gshin rje ga shAd mo dang / rnam par rgyal ma dang / pad+ma mthar byed ma dang / bdud rtsizab
200a2(rnying rgyud): sbyor ma dang / de dag la sogs pa 'khor rnams dang gnyis su med par bzhugs so// de yang dper na til 'bru bzhin du gang nas khyab par bzhugs pa ste/ de dag gi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byas/ gang bar byas/ khyab par byas nas/
200a3(rnying rgyud): lhan ne lhang nge ba ji lta ba bzhin du gnas par gyur to// de nas longs spyod par mdzad pa'i longs spyod chen po'i byi nu rlabs las/ thub pa chen po rnams stong gsum gyi stong chen po rnams su 'byung bar gyur te/ de dag gi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
200a4(rnying rgyud): g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu g.yos/ shig shig/ rab tu shig shig/ kun tu shig shig go// chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu chem chem mo// 'ur nyur/ rab tu thur 'ur/ kun tu 'ur 'ur/ de nas mtha' dang
200a5(rnying rgyud): dbus kyang mnyam par gyur nas/ sems can thams cad 'dul bar mdzad do// de yang smon lam gyi dbang gis sku sna tshogs pa dang / gsung sna tshogs pa dang / thugs sna tshogs pas 'dul bar mdzad do// sku'i 'dul ba ni mi'i cha byad du
200a6(rnying rgyud): gyur nas/ bltams pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / dka' thub mdzad pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa dang / gzhan yang seng ge'i cha byad dang / glang po che'i cha byad la sogs pas 'dul bar mdzad do// gsung gi 'dul
200a7(rnying rgyud): ba la ni lha la lha'i skad dang / klu la klu'i skad du 'dul bar mdzad do// thugs kyi 'dul ba la ni ting nge 'dzin gyi 'od zer dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis cho gas 'dul bar mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin/ nam mkha' che rgyas pa'i rgyud
200b1(rnying rgyud): las/ glang gzhi'i le'u ste dang ba'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das longs spyod par mdzad pa'i longs spyod chen po des/ rgyal po sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge'i 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'khor gyi nang du zhal 'dzum par mdzad nas mi sdang
200b2(rnying rgyud): bar mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la/ mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung
200b3(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi bdag po mchog/ thabs mkhas thugs rjes gzung spyad du// sku yi dbyig tu bdag sbyor cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po des/ kun tu bzang po'i gzugs su byung nas/ zhal gsum phyag
200b4(rnying rgyud): pas yang dag par mchod de/ phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ bdag cag rnams gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar mdzad de/ mtshan ma med pa'i chos
200b5(rnying rgyud): kyi 'khor lo bskor du gsol zhes brjod pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po yang mnyes pas khyab par gyur te/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma to ts+tshe 'di rtogs dka' bas/ de dag gi thabs zhwa 'dang
200b6(rnying rgyud): legs so legs so byang chub che// legs so legs so gus par nyon// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rab tu dga' ba'i spyan byas pas yang nas yang du phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol te// oM ma ho sangs rgyas kyi
201a1(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas// e ma ho sangs rgyas gsungs pa lags// a maho byang chub chen po'i mchog/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// oM ma he sems can thams cad ni// byang chub tu ni sgrub pa'i thabs//
201a2(rnying rgyud): shin tu sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin mchog/ gzu bo chen pos bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can byang chub sgrub
201a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i thabs// yang dag shin tu rnal 'byor 'di// myur du bla med 'dod pa'i phyir// nyon cig nga yis bshad par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ zil gyis gnon pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
201a4(rnying rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'khor rnams gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du bcug nas dbang bskur bar mdzad do// de nas gdod chos 'chad do// kun gyi rang bzhin de bzhin nyid// kun gyis bsgrub par bya ba ste// thabs su ye shes bskyed pa la// phyogs
201a5(rnying rgyud): su bltas pas mthong ba med// de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni// sus kyang mthong bar ma thus te// sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gzigs pas// rang byung ye shes gnas med snang // de nyid phyir na rang bzhin med// med las med pa'i 'bras bu
201a6(rnying rgyud): 'byung // yod dang med pa gnyis med pas// rtog med dbu ma zhes bya'o// rang bzhin de nyid kho na la// brjod pa'i rang bzhin ci yang med// dbang po'i yul du gang gyur pa// de dag tshad ma ma yin no// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin ni// skye ba
201a7(rnying rgyud): med cing 'gags pa med// rtag dang chad pa'ang yod min te// tha dad ma yin don gcig min// 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med// spros pa nye bar zhi ba'o// dam pa'i don la dngos med de// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// lus dang yid la sogs pa'i//
201b1(rnying rgyud): dbang po rnams kyis mthong min te// mthong ba blo yis bslad pa yin// yang dag ma rtogs 'khor ba dang // mya ngan 'das par rloms sems yod// yang dag rtogs na 'khor ba dang // mya ngan 'das pa rlom sems med// de bzhin nyid la
201b2(rnying rgyud): gnas bcas na// g.yo dang mi g.yo rnam par dag/ gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam dag nas// phra rgyas 'gags shing skye ba med// brjod med rnam par mi rtog pa// yi ge med pa'i gsung mchog ste// sgra yig rnam par spangs nas ni// sems kyi
201b3(rnying rgyud): ba'ang bkag pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin nam mkha' che rgyas pa'i rgyud las/ rang bzhin gnas pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ 'khor
201b4(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis gong du gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas yang ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// rang bzhin gnas pa'i chos nyid ni// zhi ba blang dor med pa ste// brtag par dka' la bstan par dka'// brjod pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral// rdo rje'i sku de 'dus ma
201b5(rnying rgyud): byas// lce shi med pa'i g.yung drung su// dus gsum 'dus ma byas pa ste// rtag pa chen po kun tu 'od// 'di zhes bstan zhing mtshon du med// ngas kyang mthong bar mi nus so// mngon sum mi gnas kun tu khyab// zad mi shes pa'i gter du
201b6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin ni// stong pa nyid las gzhan min pas// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// bye brag dbye ba gcig kyang med// de dag gnyis kyi khyad par ni// cha shas tsam yang yod min te// phung po khams dang skye
201b7(rnying rgyud): mchod dang // rten cing 'brel 'byung la sogs pa// stong pa nyid las gzhan min te// chos rnams rang bzhin stong pa la// skye bo rnams kyis mthong ba min// de phyir chos rnams rang bzhin ni// de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya bas// chos rnams
202a1(rnying rgyud): bad par gshegs drang dra// gzhan nas btsal bas rnyed pa min// yang dag nyid du gang blta bas// yang dag mthong bar mi nus te// 'ga' yang mthang ba med pa ni// da nyid mdzang brgyan bAH// mya ngan 'das dang sangs rgyas pa// gang gis
202a2(rnying rgyud): mthong bar mi nus te// padz+ra stan gyi ye shes gyis// skad cig gcig la mngon byang chub// rang bzhin gcig gi bdag nyid la// rnam pa tha dad du mar snang // mig par brtags pa'i bdag nyid pas// 'gro ba 'khrul pa rgyang chud 'dra//
202a3(rnying rgyud): rtog med pa'i sems la ni// 'byung ba la sogs bcom ldan 'das// grub par gnas pas bcom ldan 'das// 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas// sangs rgyas kun d+hi N+Di pas// 'gro ba rang byung gzhan las min// debyas sems can
202a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad ni// sangs rgyas skyeng po can rnams las// ma rig rtog pa'i tha rgyas kyis// sdug bsngal ste tshogs myong bar gyur// sems can kun gyi rang bzhin ni// chos kyi dbyings kyi b+hag te// srin la khyab pa'i nam mkha' 'o// de ma mthong
202a5(rnying rgyud): nI// gang nas btsal snang mi rnyed de// rang rig sgrib med dag pa yin// dngos po 'di dag skye med de// yang dag ma yin kun brtags yin// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yang // de nyid log pa'i ngo bo las// khyad par 'ga' yang yod pa
202a6(rnying rgyud): min// de bzhin nyid ni chags med de// ma gyis mi 'gags mi dmigs shing // mi rtog pade dang ldan pa na// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin/ nam mkha' che rgyas pa'i rgyud las/ chos nyid mi 'gyur ba bstan pa'i le
202b1(rnying rgyud): gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po dgyes pa chen pos/ nyid kyi che ba dbyung bar bzhed nas/ sku dang pa shes kyi bdag nyid 'di lta bu gsungs so// kun la khyab pa rang bzhin na// sa
202b2(rnying rgyud): rgyas kyis kyang ma gzigs te// mngon sum mi gnas kun tu khyab// kun tu 'od de 'dus ma byas// rtag pa nyid de rdo rje'i sku// kA ya dag pa'i sku mchog de// chos nyid sku zhes bshad pa yin// de rtogs gsal bar bshad pa ni// rang byung ye shes
202b3(rnying rgyud): chen po ste// kun gzhi la sogs gyur pa las// thabs kyi rim pa byung ba ni// pad+ma sman te 'dus byas so// mi rtog mngon byang chub pa'i sra// gaM Na bsags pa'i sku mchog ste// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes pas// skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs bya
202b4(rnying rgyud): chub// gnyis su med pa chos kyi sgo'o// byin gyis rlabs las byung ba yi// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po ni// kun rdzo'i don du sems bskyed nas// snang ba mi 'gog pa yi thabs// sngags dang phyag rgya rab bstan pas// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil
202b5(rnying rgyud): pa// 'dzes spyo rtan zil brdzun/ man sa // ma tha~M da ba byad ldan par gnas// sbyin gyis rtag pa'i sod nams rba// ye shes rnam dag yang dag ldam// mgrin pa bdag nyid can sa ni/
202b6(rnying rgyud): mo bskor ba na// ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas ni// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed// rig pa'i skyes bu chen po la// smon lam las ni rten 'brel pas// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// sprul pa'i sgra ni snang bar byed// ye shes rnams dang /
202b7(rnying rgyud): yang dag ldan// mi rtag nyid de 'dus byas pas// bltams nas mya ngan 'da' bar ston// log par rtog pa thams cad la// thugs rje'i zhing du 'brel pas na// sku gsung thugs kyi rim pas ni// 'gro ba'i rgyud rnams smin par mdzad//
203a1(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin/ nam mkha' che rgyas pa'i rgyud las/ 'bras bu'i bdag nyid kyu dang ye shes bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
203a2(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ bsgrub par bya ba'i don gyi thangs/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di rnams gsungs so// chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid// pho mo ma yin ma ning min// mtshan med ma yin rigs rgyud min//
203a3(rnying rgyud): kha dog ma yin dbyibs ma yin// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud yin te// med pa ma yin med pa yi// 'bras bu 'byung bas snying po yod// kun tu khyab pa'i dbyings nyid las// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs brjod mi langs// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sku dang //
203a4(rnying rgyud): gsum// theg pa lnga dang bsam mi khyab// theg pa mtha' dag ngas bstan te// dbus mtha' rnam par bkag pa'o// gsung gcig dkyil 'khor yang dag ni// bsam gyis mi khyab kun tu 'phro// thams cad gsung gi dkyil 'khor mchog/ brgyad
203a5(rnying rgyud): khri bzhi stong mtha' yas pa// gsang ba'i dbyings su thi ma mdzad do// zhes brjod pas/ gsung gi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad chos kyi dbyings su thim nas mi gsal bar gyur to// de nas thugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// de bzhin
203b1(rnying rgyud): na nan /
203b2(rnying rgyud): ri smra ban sa da
203b3(rnying rgyud): riram de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brgyan mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gzugs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la/ yang gsum po shor bcus te/ phyag 'tshal bas 'dun pa'i mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces zhes meH// prA ba
203b4(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi 'drag pa mchog/ mtshangs rnams kyi don sa dang// thabs kyi mchog tu gang gyur pa// gzu na chen pos bshad du gsom// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po/ zhal 'dum pa mdza de shin tu sbyar ba'o ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bya
203b5(rnying rgyud): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la// gsang ba dam pa 'di lta bragasungs s+ho/ gang zhig bsgrub par 'ad pa ni// thos pas ma bsgom la rlab gnas shing // zhes rab rgyan du gang gyur pa// snying rje'i maN+Dalas byung ba la// byang chub ma

203b7(rnying rgyud): khanas tu su / gang dag bsku' par 'du gsangs pa su sa ma na sa// ma 'a nyi ma
204a1(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// thug pa'i mchog sna blan myed// mjug tu gyur ba bslab ra / yang dag mthong bas rtags byar nas// rang bzhin med las phyir yang dang // rang da
204a2(rnying rgyud): med pa'i don de ni// blan pa rton ga'i spyod yul min// rang bzhin rang bzhin med mthong na// sgrib pa kun las ngas grol te// ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba las// rang bzhin kun dam lhan gyis grub// dngos po'i dbang gi 'di nas na/
204a3(rnying rgyud): rtse sems dpas ma gsungs te// sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis na// gsang ba rnam pa du ma gsungs// gsang ba dbyings kyi dbus dag tu// nyi zla pad+mar bcas pa'i gdan// bskyed dang rdzogs dang gang ldan pas// dkyil 'khor thams cad bsgom
204a4(rnying rgyud): par bya// mtshon cha rnams kyis drangs nas ni// sa hUM 'khril ba'i bde bar gnas// rim pa rim pa ma yin pa'i// rin chen steng dang 'og gi sgo// rab brtan pa las a dkar te// til 'bru tsam du bsgom par bya// yang na yungs kar tsam du ste// mkhas
204a5(rnying rgyud): pas chog bzhin du bsgom// yang dag nyid de yang dag blta// yang dag mthong na rnam par grol// yang dag ma mthong 'jig rten sems// mi shes blun pas byis pa 'dra// byis pa rnams la brjod pa bshad// rnal 'byor pa la gdams dag go//
204a6(rnying rgyud): shes rab thabs la brten nas ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub pa yin// gsang ba dag la 'jug pa na// 'dod pa'i dga' ba ma yin te// ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa yis// dga' ba dag ni blang bar bya// de ni dga' ba chen po ste// yang dag
204a7(rnying rgyud): bde ba chen po yin// che ba'i ye shes rnyed dka' ba// shes rab thabs la brten nas 'grub// shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya las// bde ba'i rol mo rnam 'gro ba// 'od zer lcags kyus drangs pa rnams// rim pa rim pa ma yin pas// ting ga
204b1(rnying rgyud): pan yang dag gzhug/ yang dan sun dum dgar// canag ya 'bu nam la// 'ad thang chu bad+ma'i gyur ba la// dbang ba la sogs gapa na// dang dngas gyur nas// thags rgyag shes rgyas du tu zhing // yang dang rdza ma mangs / nga dang /
204b2(rnying rgyud): gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la// dri med 'di las gzhan mi mnga'// 'das dang da ltar 'byung ba kun// 'di yis lhun gyis grub par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sngags kyi snying po
204b3(rnying rgyud): gran bzlas pa// oM hU~Mn dang ldanaH// gnas sda ga cu rnams bkod nas// 'ad bar lcags rgyas rdungs nas su// ye shes rnams kyis gzugs su pa/ 8// dkyil na 'i dkyil 'char jim// thams cad rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'tshar pa/

204b5(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// shes rab gsum la sbyangs pa yis// ye shes mya gu bskyed par byed// sa thob 'jigs pa sna dang bral// 'khor ba las ni mya ngan 'das// sgrib pa mtha' dag gcod byed pa'i// sbyi ma med pa'i ye shes kyis// da lta nyid du sangs
204b6(rnying rgyud): rgyus 'gyur// ye nas gnas pa'i de bzhin ni// rgyal bas mdzad pa ma yin la// 'gro bas byas pa ma yin te// ye nas sangs rgyas chen po'o// de bzhin nyid de 'dus ma byas// rang byung yin te kun ngo bo// med pa ma yin med pa yod// yod pa
204b7(rnying rgyud): min te dngos yod min// bya med bya dang rnam par bral// ldan grub bde ba'i ngang du gnas// de bzhin gshegs zhes mi rtog kyang // bzhag tu med pa'i ngangal bzhag/ de yang rnal 'byur rgyud rnams dang // bla ma'i kha nas shes par bya// tha
205a1(rnying rgyud): las su rgya ba // nga mas thab / gam mnAs // dab ra gnang mapa padang // thugs zugs kyi gsang na /
205a2(rnying rgyud): ldan par byas te sngags bsrub pa na// shin tu dben pa'i dkon dang // rnam pa'i mchog rnams ldan pa dang // rnam pa sna tshogs rba grang dang // drug yi 'chab med pa yis// nyams dga'i gnas sra bas ma gtanaH// shin tu spangs shing gos
205a3(rnying rgyud): gyur bas// de kyi nyin ma na ga shes ni// byang chubazlab par gadzin pas// kun du 'o kyis phya ga sa// de bzhi gshegs papas kyi dang dini/ nam mtha sa rgyad 'du/ nam byor na pa la dzin pa //
205a4(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po de yang shin tu gyu ba'i ting T+TA dzin snyongs par zugs te/ bsgrub pa'i thabs ni thig le'i rnal 'byor dra bya ba 'di gsungs so// ri rtse nyams ni dga' ba dang // shin tu gas ba'i thag phrag
205a5(rnying rgyud): bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// gsang ba dam pa 'di sgom mo// gsang ba dbyings kyi dbus dag tu// gzham las brtsegs pa ba sgoms nas ni// rang gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par rtse// yan lag bzhi dang rab ldan zhing // dkyil 'khor bzhin
205a6(rnying rgyud): bskyed bya ste// tsakra bzhi dang gang sbyor bas// phyag rgya bzhi po rnam par bsgom// de nyid gsum dang rab ldan de// shes rab ma yi rjes 'brang nas// sbyor ba'i cho ga mkhas pas bslab// myur ba'i cho ga las byung ba'i// yang dag dri med dbus
205a7(rnying rgyud): bsdu// shin \u0f7fza ba'i dam tshig ste// migs mi gsal ba'i da mchog rkyen// rgyam 'khor kru gyi bdag nyid yin// yon tan kun gyi gter gyur te// ma chog tu gyur pa 'grub par shin/ gsang ba dbyings kyi dbus dag tu// 'byung
205b1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa gang 'dod pas// rang gi dkyil 'khor rnams bsgoms te// thugs ka'i gsung gi phyag rgya las// rngon kyob mang 'phros te// ye shes 'khor lo rab bskul nas// mchod rten rtse mor gsung du 'gyur// rdo rje lam byung yAm gyi
205b2(rnying rgyud): mkha'// chos sku byang chub sems su gnas// de nyid bzung bas gsung dang ni// rin chen 'dzin pa zhes bya'o// bzung ba rdo rje 'dzin pa ste// de la rtog dang dpyod pa dang // dga' dang de bzhin bde ba dang // rtse gcig pa ni rnam ldan pa'o// rin chen rgyun
205b3(rnying rgyud): kyi shes pa ni// mi rtog pa yi shes pa ni// mos las byung ba'i mi dmigs pa'o// shes rab dbang dang rnam ldan pas// shes par gyur pa ye shes so// don dam mthong bar 'dod pa na// 'di la mthong ba de mi mthong // 'di yis ye shes pa bskyed de//
205b4(rnying rgyud): de yi don dam rnam par mthong // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang thabs 'di lta bu gsungs so// nam mkha' dbyings nas byung ba yi// rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa// yung
205b5(rnying rgyud): kar phra mo'i 'bru tsam ste// phyi nang gsum gyi sna rtser ni// rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu bsgom// rang snang ba yi ting 'dzin te// gzugs brnyan lha ma skra snyan dang // smig rgya la sogs rnam pa can// snang dang mi snang dbyer med de// yod dang med dang dbye
205b6(rnying rgyud): med pa'o// snang du 'dra yang tha dad ste// don dang rtags la sogs pa rnams// rnam pa tha dad gnyis su sdang // yang dag yang dag ma yin pas// bsam pa'i dbang gi der 'gyur ro// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa yi// brda zhes rnam par bstan pa yin
205b7(rnying rgyud): gang zhig rtse gcig ma gyur pas// mtha' rnam skyes ting 'dzin bsgom// dngos po 'di rnams ma skyes pas// chos dang chos nyid med pa ste// nam mkha' lta bur bdag med pas// ye nas stong pa'i rang bzhin no// stong pa'i rang bzhin mtshan ma
206a1(rnying rgyud): med// de nas smon pa des 'brel lo// rnam par thar pa gsum dang ldan// chags med bzhi yi lam nas 'dug/ stong pa nyid du rnam rig na// rang byung ye shes dang gis 'char// 'bras bu kun tu 'odas dzab// yon
206a2(rnying rgyud): tananam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// che ba'i che ba zab mo yin// yon tan cir yang bsngags pa med// yon tan chen po'i bsam gtan ni// bsam gtan nyid pas bsam du mod// ma bsam ma sbyangs chos nyid la// ra 'don chen po'i nam mkha'
206a3(rnying rgyud): 'byung // kun tu 'od kyis thob nas// zhing khams rgyu dang bral ba yi// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'bar bas snang // dkyil 'khor de dug thams cad kyang // reg cing gzung du med pa las// 'angang tshon lta bur kun tu sbyang // sna tshogs yon tan
206a4(rnying rgyud): brjod me langs// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'ang bzhin/ nam mkha'i tshe rgyas pa'i rgyud las/ thig mo'i rnal 'byor bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
206a5(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ shin tu rnal 'byor gyi don 'di lta bu gsungs so// ye nas rnam par grol ba'i lam// lhan gyis gnas pa'i bde zhen te// dge dang sdig las rnam par grol// sangs rgyas byang chub snying po 'di// lhag ma
206a6(rnying rgyud): med pas yongs su rdzogs// 'gyur ba ma yin drang por gnas// dpag cing mtshon du med pa'i phyir// byang chub nyid las byang chub med// gang la bsod nams sdig med na// de la byang chub rab tu gsungs// e ma ho shin tu ngo mtshar che'o// gzugs
206a7(rnying rgyud): med gzugs sku 'byung ba rmad// 'di ma mthong bar gzhan mi mthong // snying po 'di la ma lus rdzogs// de phyir rdzogs chen zhes bya ste// rang byung ye shes btsal med pas// grol nas grol ba'i lam yang med// nyon mongs pa nyid byang chub
206b1(rnying rgyud): lam// cir yang mi dmigs gti mug ste// ma rig pa nyid ye shes gsal// rig pa'i ye shes gang ldan pas// yi ge med pa'i don la blta// sdang med don la dpag me langs// sdang med snying ngo mchog gi sku// 'bras bu kun gyi lam gyur
206b2(rnying rgyud): pa// ston pa rdo rje kun gyi thugs// mtshan du med pas rgyal ba'i lam// byur med smos spangs thig le la// mi rtog btang snyoms mnyam par bzhag/ snang ba med pa'i chos nyid la// ma btsal bzhag na bsgom pa yin// gzhan la
206b3(rnying rgyud): bstan du med pa'i phyir// rang rig rang byang rang zhir bzhag/ mi chags mi rtog mi gnas pas// ting 'dzin rol chags mi bya// dngos med ming yang med pas na// yi ges bstan cing mtshon du med// stong nyid spros med gzhi gnas la// 'du shes
206b4(rnying rgyud): med par mnyam bzhag la// zhi gnas lhag mthong 'brel ba'o// mos pa spyod pa'i sa la gnas// mi rtog pa yi shes rab ste// bslab pa gsum dang rnam ldan pa'o// zag pa med pa'i phung por ldan// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni//
206b5(rnying rgyud): mtshon cing dpag tu med pa ste// gsang ba dam pa 'di lta bus// mnyam par bzhag ste bsgrub par bya// rang bzhin nyid ni nam mkha' ste// kun gyi rjes su song ba'o// de ni rdo rje'i sku mchog ste// sems dpa' nyid kyang nam mkha'o// nam mkha'
206b6(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' las byung bas// nam mkha' rtog pa skye med cing // nam mkha' 'di ni nam mkha' bsgom// spyi dang 'jig rten nam mkha' dang // nang dang rtsi yi nam mkha' dang // lus dang shes pa'i nam mkha'o// nam mkha' nyid ni rnam
206b7(rnying rgyud): mkhar bsgom// 'bras bu nam mkha' chen po 'byung // rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che// kun bzang yangs pa chos kyi dbyings// rnam dag lam chen kun sgrol phyir// ma skyes mi 'gags cir mi dgongs// de bzhin gshegs pa
207a1(rnying rgyud): thams cad la// dam pa 'di las gzhan mi mnga'// 'das dang da ltar byung ba kun// 'di nyid brnyes nas lhun gyis grub// thabs dang rnam par bral ba ni// nan gyis mkha' la mdud pa dor// zhes brjod
207a2(rnying rgyud): do// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po des// mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te yang thabs zab mo 'di gsungs so// dngos po med par bsgom byas la// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thugs// ngo bo sems
207a3(rnying rgyud): kyi rang bzhin te// dngos po gang yang yod ma yin// sems dang sems las byung ba rnams// nam mkha' nyid de rang bzhin med// kun la khyab pas kun tu 'od// sems las sems kyis rab tu bsgom// bltas pas mthong ba med
207a4(rnying rgyud): pa ni// de nyid mthong ba chen po ste// shes byed dam par gyur pa'o// sems nyid rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas te// sangs rgyas gzhan du ma tshol cig/ sangs rgyas gzhan nas btsal ba ni// mar 'dod chu la bsrub pa 'dra// de bzhin gshegs
207a5(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad la// gsang ba dam pa 'di med par// gang zhig lam gzhan 'jug pa de// bskal pa dag ni stong du yang // sngags kyi 'bras bu mi thob po// dbang dang dam tshig ldan pa la// thabs mkhas snying rje rab ldan pas// yid gnyis
207a6(rnying rgyud): the tshom med pa na// nges par legs pa'i dgos pa 'grub// 'di la mi bya ci yang med// mi bza' ba ni yang med do// smra bar mi bya cung zad med// bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga dang // bza' btung thams cad ris med bya// dbang po g.yo ba nang du
207a7(rnying rgyud): sbyar// mnyam par bzhag pa brtul nas su// lus sems khong klod kyi nar bzhag/ lus sems tshad mar gang 'jog pa// de la 'dzin pa'i phur pa dam// dngos grub mchog tu gyur pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dkris pa chen po das
207b1(rnying rgyud): nyadu ma nyid chad du 'dzad pa 'di ca nga badzad da// dngam pa'i rang banan bya ma cang // gang brgyad pa rang bzhin las// gan sum da dbyings skad cag ma// 'khar ba la sags 'bras burnams// skang ga las dkyang tu// tan kyang 'bral ba
207b2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// skad cig rgya 'brazas med pa'i dbyings// de mos rgyun du chad mi bya// de bas de bzhin nyid mi nu bzhag/ gal te de bzhin du la sgrib// de ni snying po de bas med// de las de byang mtshar// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// skad cig
207b3(rnying rgyud): ste/
207b4(rnying rgyud): skad cig ma la brtag par gyi// 'di ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi// thabs kyi mchog tu gsungs pa ste// bskam las byung ba'i shes rab ldan// na ljang rtsor can gyis rtag tu bsgom// de dang de ye khyad par las// nam mkha'i dngos pu'i rtsen pa/
207b5(rnying rgyud): skya dang gsung dang thugs kyi mchog/ mnatan mi zad tha par byu// danyid sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// sangs nas kyang chub thams dpa' mis// zas dang thun da ngas par 'gyur// de khams dkyil 'khor bams sa
207b6(rnying rgyud): shes pa'i gte du 'ad+d+ha// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin/ rnamam pa' rna rgyas pa'i nad las/ shin d+han la byor gyi lce ste brgyad pa y-i// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pamin phyi/ nang ga rnam
