231a5(rnying rgyud): rgyas kun gyis la de bzhin gnas// mi rtog byang chub snying po mi rtog mya ngan 'das// sna tshogs mtshan ma 'dzin pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba// rgyal ba'i bcom ldan 'das te bcom ldan 'das/ theg chen snying po nam mi rtog pa'i mchog/ gang
231a6(rnying rgyud): la mig nas mi rtog byang chub po// byang ba dang ni mtshan nyid thams cad ma lus kun// dngos por mya ngan 'da' bar gyur pa yongs mi srid// rnam rtog mtshan 'dzin rnam par shes pa la// ye bzlog mya ngan 'da' ba'i thig la byang chub bo// de bzhin
231a7(rnying rgyud): rnam par mi rtog snying pos don mdzad pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa rnam mi rtog/ rtog pa'i dri ma zad phyir cir yang ston// sems can rnam tog de yis bskang bas na// de bzhin nyid ni don mdzad sems can mgon// bdag
231b1(rnying rgyud): na gag pa rnaman/ gas du / spya smra / smra // dag na /
231b2(rnying rgyud): smra smras
231b3(rnying rgyud): sa sa/
231b4(rnying rgyud): gal par bya la // gas nga sa sa
231b5(rnying rgyud): bya sa / sa / na na 'dagra na/
231b6(rnying rgyud): nga bas pa smras pa / sa sa smras na ga bang cing // de na da / 'dinas ni din 'di 'i ba ga med/ na pa ma tugs/ gas
231b7(rnying rgyud): ma na sa su su sa ma
232a1(rnying rgyud): byang klus kyis smras sa sa b+hag lags las/ zang chub sa mas dang dgangs pa dgas nyal 'ad// kun bzang po 'ang gangs pa bag la zhal gnyis gag slong du bas pa'i la sgragasam pa na/
232a2(rnying rgyud): denas bcom ldan 'das dpal gan te bzang pos/ mi g.yo ba 'dod chags pa'i ti ngang 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ nyid kyis nyidu la bshad pa/ 'du shes thams cad 'dum shes par yang rtog pa// mtshan ma zad phyir ga pa
232a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i 'byur 'jug dag/ rang ga ye shes glang \u0f7f'ang migs labs// mi g.yo thig pa dkrol 'khor ldan pa kyim dzug// ma~M gnas mi sems tshul khrims pa rol sbyin// mi dran mi g.yo ba ni ti 'dzin dmanga'i ba mapa'o// lham N+Da
232a4(rnying rgyud): sems mi 'byung ba shes rab yin// sems ni yid kyi rten te 'byung 'jug med snang na// yang dag yang dag nyid de chos sku mi g.yo'i rtsa// da ltar nga bzhin mnyam pa dkyil 'khor chen po'i lam// g.yo ba rjes dran bsam las yul gzhan dmigs
232a5(rnying rgyud): pa// baN+Dal ba rda ltar byas kyad mi g.yo ba yi 'thung 'dag gsal// ji ska rags pa ba de nyid 'khrum pa'i lathal po yi na// rnam 'tsha la ma byed la marnams mnyam par ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang par gsung /
232a6(rnying rgyud): rtsab ma pa' dngos med sems nyid ni// phra bar sbyangs pas kun gyi spyod yul yis 'das te// 'phags pa'i sprin gyis gzigs shing shas su drang ma yin// cir yang mabyung ba med pas sems kyi ba mthong // ma mthang mthong phyir rnam
232a7(rnying rgyud): par mi rtag mdzong// ming dugadags su nga pa'i ba dgas so// mi shes rgya sa jig grags pa// khalas ga mas / rnams tha med thams cad mardzas // ma nyi ba ngas pas
232b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i de bzhin nyid rig na// ye shes dag pa'i tshogs chan bsgom pa de yin te// lam mchog 'bras bu chos skye de mthong bas// ngo bo nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ngol rnam gnas// de dang dus gsum mi 'bral de la de bzhin gnas// nye lam nyid rdzogs pha rol phyin
232b2(rnying rgyud): 'tshang rgya// ngo bo nyid kyis chos rnams gnas pa'i ngo bo nyid// ngo bo nyid med de yang med reg pas// chos rnams thams cad grags pa med pa yin// grags kun spangs pa chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin nyid// chos sku'i ting 'dzin rin chen la brten nas//
232b3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas chos su dpag tu med pa 'byung bar 'gyur// chos sku'i rnam par mi rtog rtag tshad ma yin pas// yang dag dbu ma'i lam du khyad par bstan pa ni// bla med byang chub lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes skye// mtshan ma rnams dang ye shes de
232b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin nyid de 'dres ma yin// mngon par 'du byed mtshan rnams thams cad kyis// sangs rgyas lhun grub mtshan ldan ma yin no// de dag ma lus 'khor los myur yon tan// des ni sangs rgyas mi mthong nga bzhin nyid dang ldan// nye la mang der
232b5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs yon tan dpag med de// chos rnams ma lus ngo bo gcig gi ngang du gnas pa la// ngo bo de nyid de bzhin rnam rig na// ye shes chen po'i tshogs chen rnam par dag/ lam gyi lam mchog mngon du rnyed pa'o// ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag la
232b6(rnying rgyud): byang chub klang // bsod nams klod chen btsug pa ye shes dag pa'i sku// sbyin pa tshul khrims bslab pa'i gnas 'dzin pa// ye shes chen po tshogs chen skyeng pa'i rgyu yin no// 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul gyis gang spyod pa// 'jig rten
232b7(rnying rgyud): las 'das pha rol phyin pa'i rgyu mchog go// gang yang gtong ba mngon du gyur nas bsags pa mthar phyin pa// ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par byed pa'i lam mchog go// gang gtong bal 'o lo snyoms pa g.yengs pa med gyur na// ngo bo nyid kyi chos
233a1(rnying rgyud): gcig deb nan tan kyang dbras pa 'gyur// 'dus byas bskyod dmas chagasal brtul 'ong na// gadzang las sbyar nul lam danas 'bras thar 'thung // ma shes rdzogs chen 'bras bu'i lam b+har nges byed 'gyur//
233a2(rnying rgyud): gtong la sogs pa bsod nams don du bsgrub bdeb// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad don du gnyer ba'i bya byed byed// bud med snyam ma thu bcos ta pa bzhin du nye bar 'gyur// smin dang tshul khrims brjod dang 'artson 'grus bsam gta
233a3(rnying rgyud): shes rab ldan// lA po shes rab srid kyis dbang ba chos kyi sku la stod// mar me dgongs nas mum khod 'jug cha 'dra bar 'gyur ba yin// bsod nams tshogs kyi don de gro go ma'i thur ba'i tshul du spyod byed pa// shing gnyis gsung ba'i
233a4(rnying rgyud): yis gan bsregs bzhin// ston mongs lus spros pa med par kun sregs nas// ye shes chen po'i la man de gnas de skyes byed// rgyang chub kyi sems ta mo na mnyal las/ ma zin po ma g.yo bar don 'astan pas/
233a5(rnying rgyud): sde'i g.yo ba golas bstan pa dang / ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs pa dang mi ga yo ba mthong du rdung bar bstan pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis mi shes kyi tshog pas gsas de bzhin nyid tho du rung ba'i 'i' bye bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom
233a6(rnying rgyud): dpel san thub dang pos/ chos thams cad bden pa gnyis su 'dus par don dam pa'i bden pa'i bya/ phrin rdzo ni 'bras par ston pa nyid kyis nyid la bshad pa/ gcig la nirim gyis 'dzin partog pa/
233a7(rnying rgyud): rjes 'phrul pa'i bden par rab rtags // thams cad bdag dang gcapang rtag pang na dus bad// dam pa'adi thams cadas par bgyu sa dang bral pa nyid na// de'iphri garnam pa 'dug dang madra pa du/
233b1(rnying rgyud): rgyu rol pa na brtags pas rnam par bya ngan pa gnyis su tshugs// seM sor skabs 'khrul pa nyid du rnam par brtags pa zhu// brtags pas don gnyis 'grub par 'ad dad min// dam par phung po khams dang skye mchad thams cad kun// dzAs+dza
233b2(rnying rgyud): gsum rdzas su 'dod de so sor smra ba'i don dam rang byung ngo // sde ba'i 'khrul pa rtag pa'i don nyid steng du 'dus ma byas dang rig byed ma yin pa// sems dang mi ldan 'du byed bcu bzhi 'dod pa rnams ni 'khrul ba'o// dam par phung po khams dang skye
233b3(rnying rgyud): mchod tsam zhig rdzas su 'dod pa don du blta// rnam shes tsam du sme bas thams cad bden pa gnyis su 'dod de 'khrul pa ni// phyi rol phung po khams dang skye mched sems dang me ldan rig byed ma yin pa// de rnams rdzas su 'dod pa rnams ni 'khrul pa yin te/
233b4(rnying rgyud): don dam nges pa min// dam par mtshan nyid gsum gyi kun brtags pa ni 'khrul pa nyid yin la// gzhan dbang grub pa gnyis ni don dam pa ste 'khrul pa ye nas min// de la ngo bo nyid gsum rdzogs te bden pa bzhi yang tshad med gnas// don dam pa
233b5(rnying rgyud): sku gsum ye shes bzhi yang tshad mar gnas// mtha' gnyis spangs pas thams cad bden pa gnyis su 'dod de 'khrul pa ni// rnam bzhir 'dod do nges tshig mtshan nyid dbye ba dang // 'jog pa'i yul dang rnam bzhir 'khrul par 'dod pa de ni dam pa/
233b6(rnying rgyud): yin// dam pa'i rang bzhin rnam pa bzhi ste nges pa dang ni mi bsgrub// bcos ma ma yin pa dang brtags pa'i don mi na gang yin pa// dam par 'dod de 'khrul pa min la skye med rtag pa med// gzhig nas rang bzhin med par gyur pa 'khrul ba yin gyi
233b7(rnying rgyud): dordo des min// dam par sbyim tsam du yin te de la dngos por snang ba gang yang min// tshig tu dngos por mi bsti gang rim gyis skye bar 'dod de sbrum tsam// e tongs med theg pa'i snying po'i rang bzhin 'di// lus kyang dpag par nus pa ma
234a1(rnying rgyud): man ba den ga sa yo nas med// bden pa gnyi ba ni don gan yod de la nas med pa yin// bdon dang mtshan ma gtatun tshogs rjes su dpag pa yis// ya mtshan rgyud kyi chos 'di rtogs par nus pa dam rang//
234a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba mya ngan 'das med thig le chen po'i klong // byad med klong las 'das pas bya btsal rdzogs pa'i sku// thig le chen por thams cad chub pas rgya mtsho'i tshul// ma skyes dbyings su rdzogs pas yum gyi mkha'// stong pa btsal kyang rten par
234a3(rnying rgyud): gyur pa med pas mkha' ltar dang // rdo rje 'du 'bral med de bde la gnas pas sdug bsngal ye nas ni// phyag rgya'i 'byung 'jug nyid la 'char bas snying por gnas// yon tan swa las 'byung bas gang la'ang bsngags su med// shes rab tshogs kyi
234a4(rnying rgyud): snying rje'i rlan dang ma bral thams cad spangs// thams cad kun gyi rgyud sde 'bras bur gnas pas lta ba'i mig/ thams cad ma lus bsdus kyang dog 'dzer med pas chos rnams kun gyi gzhi// thams cad ma lus bsdus shing brtan par gnas pas
234a5(rnying rgyud): pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs// spang len med pa'i chos 'di sgyu mar gnas pas ming du btags pardzun// yang dag thig ler thams cad bsdus pas bya btsal bya mi dgos// ye bsrungs phyag rgyas kun la btab pas phyag rgyar bsgom pa gol/
234a6(rnying rgyud): gzhan dang ma 'dres rgyal po bzhin pas se la srung mi dgos// 'di 'dra'i don de rab tu shes par gyur pa mang du thos pa'i mchog/ smra ba rnams ni nyams pa'i smras pa dag la de bzhin yod mig nas// bshad du yinas med pas bshad pa 'khrul
234a7(rnying rgyud): pa ste// yang dag nyid la bshad du mngon pa'i yi ge med// 'phung bar rgyu byed rnams ni bshad la mos shing dga' bar 'gyur// yid dag byang chub thob par yo mi 'byung // rnam dag jig le kun la khyab pa'i yab chen po// tshig tu
234b1(rnying rgyud): pas nyid cad pa dag la 'gyur// yo nas bla ma bya mi dgas pa'i lam mchog 'di// rgya rkyen zad pa'i byang chub rtsa pa rnam par dag/ mthong bas don la mkhas pa zas pa'i mchog yin no// rnam pang marta/ tshig gi rjes su mi 'brang chos gtsun
234b2(rnying rgyud): dbang bsgyur na// rjes rnams thams cad thos shing shes pa'i rab tu gsungs// khrus chus rgyas la rig tu tsha ba ji bzhin gnas// mi lce mI 'gag dngos por cir yang dgongs su med// dang srong sdig de'i lam du zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// ying
234b3(rnying rgyud): sgyi dkyil 'khor nyid kyi thig lder thim// thig pa'i dpyi 'kho nyams su len pa thos pa'i mchog/ yid kyi thig le mnyams chos nyid thig ler gsal// yid kyi dkyil 'khor nyid kyi thig le thig le dbris// thig la'i dkyil 'khor nyams su
234b4(rnying rgyud): yin pa thob pa'i mchog/ yid kyi ma nyams thig zu chos nyid thig le 'gas la/ zab mo gting mtha' med pa'i de bzhin de la bskor// de las 'gyur med de bzhin da gnas pa// chos rnams ma lus tshang bas thos pa'i mchog tu khyang par gyur/
234b5(rnying rgyud): mang du thos pa'i mchog ni de bzhin rnags kyi dkyil 'khor du zhu pa'o// chog tu thos pa don dus nyams su byungs shing the tshamagranas// snying po nyid du sems mi g.yo ba lam smi gter// de lce'i lam la gnas pas pha rol phyin drug 'dus// gang
234b6(rnying rgyud): du'ang sems mi g.yo basbyin pa'i mchog/ gang la'ang yid mi gnas pa tshul khrims dag pa yin// sna tshogs bye bral mi mdzad bzod pa dpa'// bzang ngan blang dor mi 'byed brtson 'grus myur// yang dag yang dag dgal ma chags 'angs
234b7(rnying rgyud): sbyin na// gang rdzas mi thamags ngan gas rabags // mig pa ba nang kyi thang bang ci rgya kyi lan/ lam khyen lam gan las pa kyi// mnas pa tshul zhi sa madru bshad// da pa ca nga'i la mnas
235a1(rnying rgyud): nad la gdags// nag pal gron da 'dod nam mas mas rnams med// nabadag pa rgyad 'anams pa bad+ma da// dbya gags na nan kya ga/ chas dbyungams
235a2(rnying rgyud): gas mdu du gyu sa gzhan ma nang / ga 'jugs shing ban du chag gas bsgrags// b.rang mi rdzogs pa nga na // bajug pa dang gas pa ga gags par mabyed/
235a3(rnying rgyud): dal de bzhin du zugs mnyam nyid mya ngan 'angs 'khor med// mya ngan 'das pa brjod pa tsam ste khams gsum pa yang badzad pa tsam// dmigs su me pa'i dbyings pa thams cad mnyas par nam dang // rnam par dag rje sa mya ngan 'das
235a4(rnying rgyud): pa dang du man rgyad// 'khar ba skur byed migatsang pa yang spang bar byed pa 'argyar// dpa'i tshar la mdza da zhugs pa de sa shes pas tsha ba \u0f7f/ yang tshod med cing bar mtshag men pa da nyid// dag na nga rdza
235a5(rnying rgyud): shes dag pa phy-i wab gyur ba dang ma chir byagyur can// sangs nas mtshan dkyis brtan dang phyag d+ha gang gis 'amyong bad// dpa gnyis pa kyil 'dza sa ldan mi gas ba pas mang // ga na gang mang ba yi
235a6(rnying rgyud): med par ka// 'du shes ma g+ha sa ga ba'i mtsha zhing mtshan ma mi rtog pa de cig zung byud// gang du mi 'jog phyag rgyar mi 'dzin yid lachos// rnam pa thun po mdan ma nas zhugs// bsam pas mag ma ma sems pa ni shes rab
235a7(rnying rgyud): rlung // rtag pas btags par byang rtsal nyid du don nu rab mad// bsgom pas dan ni nga grad cad du 'gyur// bgag Na la rjod kyangadapas tshiga' ngab 'i rnyed// ma shes rang thung sal la chags pas thal ma
235b1(rnying rgyud): mthang thas rnaM rdza ba kya dang khor ba 'i blang can yin// sems dang sems las byung ba 'grub pa'i 'khrul pa yan// dmigs pa'i yul 'dzin byed pa sal nyid yanas mnyam// gsang sngags rig sngags cag tu byas pas phyag rgya chen por grags/
235b2(rnying rgyud): spro ba spu phyag kyar byas pas ma bcos thig le bslad// rigs dang ye shes brtags pas yang dag grong chen zhi// sa dang lam la brtags pas pha rol phyin pa khyad par nyams// tsab sbyor 'phro 'dra'i phyag rgyar byas pas su mchog 'phags//
235b3(rnying rgyud): che ba lnga ldan phyag rgyar bsgoms pas sdug bsngal zad// bde ba zang phyir sdug bsngal rgya mtsho nyid pa gnas// thig le'i sgo spangs pas ni bde ba chen po bsgom// ting 'dzin ral chags pas ra med ro dang bral// swa yi phyag rgyar
235b4(rnying rgyud): brtags pas sdug bsngal sku med sku dang bral// btsal med btsal bar byas las byang chub chen po skam// bde ba'i phyag rgyas btab pas bde mchog gting nas 'gags// dkyil 'khor spyod yul brtags pas spyod yul tshun mi chad//
235b5(rnying rgyud): 'dod yon chos su brtags pas byang chub chen po med// snod bcud lha ru brtags pas dmigs med thig le brtul// snang stong zhi khro'i phyag rgyas brtson pa'i phyag rgya bcag/ sbyor sgrol gnas sum chung log skyong bskul// rtsa ba yan lag bsrungs pas dam tshig ces
235b6(rnying rgyud): po'adas// thams cad chos su brtagra pas chos mchog gtid mtha' stohA// sngagla bzlas phyag rgya bcas pas rgyal mchog kyag rgya ba shig/ mchod pa stong spyan drangs byas pas mtshon chen nyid las nyams// spyan drangs gnyis med pa snyim pas gnyis med chos gcig bsad// gnas dang gnas min brtags pas
235b7(rnying rgyud): gnas mchog dam pa spangs// kha zas gtsang rjeng ba tabla pas grol ba dang byang zhig/ mad l+r-ing yong date thabs d+ha ga'i gting che dag gra// ye shes dbyings su mthong bas bde ba'i rtsobla mthang rgya mcho 'dra// gub pa'i mtha' 'am byang chung blong chen nyid la gnas// brtags pas ye shes bye ba 'khrul gnad sel ba yin//
236a1(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor zhe la gnas nas byang chub chen por me mtshungs mtshungs med gnas// bden gnyis mthong zhing byang chub mchog tu brtan par dganas pa// bde chen tshul mchog brtan par gnas pa byang chub lam//
236a2(rnying rgyud): g.yo snying po'i dri bral dri med dag pa'i sku ni dag/ sangs rgyas pa med bya thal lam la mi gnas gnyen po nyid du gnas// mos sku bdag med gzhan la ltos pa'i chos min gang la'ang ltos pa min// rang sems rnam dag dbyings med byang chub
236a3(rnying rgyud): lam chen po// gang nas ma 'ongs gdan med de phyi rol nang rol gnyis ka min// yon tan tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i blo gros thabs chen skya// snying rje chen po'i snying rje rlan dang ma bral thams cad bskums// shes rab dag pa sems kyi ngang nyid kun la
236a4(rnying rgyud): khyab par gnas// log rtog mtshan ma'i 'du shes thams cad de las byung // sbyin pa la sogs pha rol phyin pa bcur yang rang bzhin yi nas rdzogs// lam bsdus rim pa pa dang 'jug blta thams cad khyad par 'grub pa ni// spyad len med
236a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos 'di sgyu mar gnas pas na// chos rnams ma lus de bzhin de bzhin de yang gnas// sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gang du'ang grub pa med par yin pa'i phyir// sgyu mas sgyu ma bslu phyir sgyu mar gnas// med pa'i sgyu mas yod pa'i dngos gsal
236a6(rnying rgyud): 'tshal// 'ja' tshe na 'di bzhin gang du'ang grub mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bya smra 'dra spyi gnas pas// chos rnams ma lus de 'dra de bzhin gnas// sangs rgyas chos laM gus shing rnyed 'dod shes rang 'tshal// gtong ba sems
236a7(rnying rgyud): dpa' shes rab 'khrul pa bying ba med// tshul khrims de ni tshul khrims 'chal pa lam ring 'gyur// bzod pa bsgom pa bzod pa la mi gnas te bzod pa min// gtong dang tshul khrims chos sems phyin bcu de bzhin bsgrub la phyin bcu med//
236b1(rnying rgyud): yid la chos sems dpa' lu med sbyin bya med// dpyad pas yang dag don mernyed de byang chub lam// bsgrub pa'i dbras bye pas brtson 'grus snying po bas la// sbyangs pas sbyangs par 'altas pas byar med blta ba 'jul// rtogs pa'i sa shes
236b2(rnying rgyud): skyes pas rtog mtha' spang mi srid// grub mtha'i 'bras bu btsal bas yang dag las mi d+hid// byang chub kyi sems nya mo bag la nyal las/ theg pa rnams kyi nges pa'i chog dang blta ba mdor bstan pa'i le'u sti lnga pa'o// / de nas/
236b3(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos/ som nyi spangs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas nyid kyis nyid la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// g.yo ba'i 'byung 'jug yid ches dngos med de bzhin nyid du bzhag/ lus kyang ma bcos chags
236b4(rnying rgyud): brgyad brten pa 'ja' tshor tshul// de la mi dmigs tshogs brgyad la rten de nyid med// sems can ming ni sems can sems can med// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sems can yongs kyi dang // gti mug rnam par dag pa ye yin rnam snang
236b5(rnying rgyud): mdzad// 'dod chags 'dod chags ye yin chags mchog yas// zhe sdang rnam par dag pas ma spangs de bzhin snang ba mi 'khrugs pa// nga rgyal khyad par nga rgyal yon tan can de 'byung ldan nyid// phrag dog mi 'dra'i dam tshig don yod grub//
236b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad ma lus lus pa med par dbang du 'dus phyir snang mtha'i dam// 'dod pa the tshom med na dam tshig dam pa gtso// ma'i gdong min rig pa blang med ro gcig phyir na rnam snang som nyi med// 'da' ka'i de 'da' mi byed de la gnas// chos
236b7(rnying rgyud): kyi dbyings las ma g.yos thams cad 'dus pa'i phyir na gyi// dmatshig dam pa de la mi 'da' ba ni mi khrugs bla// dge dang ming ge mnyam pa nyid du gnas pas rig pa phrag dog dim// lnga po yin gzhan pa de de 'in dza zhing ni byed zhwa
237a1(rnying rgyud): lam// gang pas mnyamad pa dal rgyal khris stan na/ rnams pa pas bcom nan nga kyi ma zhu'adas// dgan pa sanam zad pakyang nubacan pakod// gamapa' rtog mthar/ tu ma da pa 'ang
237a2(rnying rgyud): dag mthal// chags med chags pa'i lamyal mi gnas mnyam pa nyid// lce stegs dbyings kyi mu mthong bathang min zin pa mi gting ba bskam pa'i mchog/ bas ma 'das brdad med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// ston pa'i mchog laphyag
237a3(rnying rgyud): 'tshal lo// ban gyis rab bsngags dpa med lam la phyag 'tshal lo// rjes kyi stong bar wAr pa bzhin nyid la rgyag ba// rgyabral mtha lda mang pa zug 'tshal la// ji bzhin la gnas mtshan ldan pal phyag tsha' /
237a4(rnying rgyud): las la khrims la sogs pan/ spyang ba mchos kyang nga gshegs rnams kyi zhus// kun ma tshangs na gal pang+yas ngas na/ na shas dka'adun kyal me ma rtag tug las das// dri med ma 'gyu /
237a5(rnying rgyud): gyi de ni rnam grol mchog gi lam// mi dmigs mi gnas bsam pa gyen dang thal// tshig gis mi'i dres dbyings dang kha dog bzang po'i spyad yul min// bstan cing brtags par dka' la brjod du rdul tsam med// 'di zhes bstan pa'i
237a6(rnying rgyud): pa yin// dpyod pa'i mtha' la don gyi lung med 'khrul pa yin// tshig gi mtha' dpyod lam du 'dod cing nga mthong ba// de nyid rtog pa'i chu 'bris smig rgyu bsnyeg pa 'dra// shes rabazab mos bla meng sangs rgyas tshol bar rab tu sba// gan
237b1(rnying rgyud): nas ma yin de nyid yin te mchog tu 'dod// yang dag lam ni tshig gis mtshon du med// yang dag nyid du mthong na 'khrul pa ste// dgra dang ma dag mthong med mtshungs pa'i lam// rnam par ci yang mi 'byed ye shes gti mug dang // rang
237b2(rnying rgyud): gas mi g.yo mi bskyod ting 'dzin rgyal por gnas// 'di ltar mthong zhes mthong ba'i dmigs med mngon sum mthong ba la la// de phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyan zhes de la bya// mtha' dang dbus med yangs pa'i rang bzhin zhes// mi len
237b3(rnying rgyud): me spang mnyam pa'i rgyal po 'thob// sems dang bag chags gnyis med 'dres shing mtshungs// 'dzin pas spang zhing btags pa'i chos rnams kun la ni// mi 'dor mi spang rang byung de nyid de// rnam pa tir yang mi dgongs thabs
237b4(rnying rgyud): gyis de la rol// kun dang mi mthun yongs kyis spangs pa'i chos// nyon mongs lnga dang mtshams med lnga po yi// rnam dag lam der zhug pas mnyam pa'i rgyal pos 'thob// bud med la sogs kun kyang spang me byed// lo rgyas don nyid
237b5(rnying rgyud): tshang mar blo bzhag nas// ting 'dzin gsum po btags shing grub pa'i mtha' dpyod pa// col bsgrub lung las grol te 'khrul pa yin// bya bral lhun rdzogs bde ba'i yul la gnas// ye shes rang byung chen po ji snying po nyid// me migs
237b6(rnying rgyud): mig yo bsnyad pa kun dang thal// bya bral zin pa'i yul la kun tu ji bzhin gnas// ma skyes mi 'gag nam mkha' lta bu'i ngang // 'di zhes bstan du med de thig le gcig gi skya// spro zhing bsdu ba med de thang lam dam pa yin// ma rtogs
237b7(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa med de shes rab thabs bral bas// mtha' med dbus med snying por gdags pa'ang med// mkha' bzhin ma bcos smrabs ma yul las 'das// tshad mas don gzhig dpe bral rgyal ba'i thugs// yang dag byang chub klong ni 'di zhes
238a1(rnying rgyud): rgyu / na su smra smra
238a2(rnying rgyud): smras sa sa
238a3(rnying rgyud): sa du
238b1(rnying rgyud): g+ha / martags thams can tha dang spyang // zhes gsungs sa// gcig pa dang bladad las grol ba'i 'jus gnyis pa / rgyas kyi sgyu kyi kyi rabatags// dngas spyong sum kya btags// la bd-i d+ha kyi phy-i btags/
238b2(rnying rgyud): yi nges tshig ji ltar lags// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos yang gsungs pa/ kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid de// mi snang ba la mngon du 'byin nus pas// chos kyi
238b3(rnying rgyud): sU ru btags pa yin// 'byung ba lnga dang 'dod yon lnga// dug lha'i ye shes longs spyod pas// longs spyod sbu ru btags pa yin// 'byung ba lnga ru sku sprul nas// thams cad rig pa'i dbang bsrur zhing // gang la gang 'tshams sprul mdzad
238b4(rnying rgyud): pas// sprul pa'i sgra ru btags pa yin// zhes sgra gsum nges tshig gi le'u ste gsum pa'o// // sku gsum gnas lugs ji ltar legs// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ kyai sems
238b5(rnying rgyud): dpa' chen po nyon cig/ rigs drug dbyings na gnas tsam na// chos sgra dri bcas chos kyi sku ru gnas// rtogs ldan dbyings na gnas tsam na// rgyun dang dum bu'i tshul du gnas// rtog med dbyings na gnas tsam na// dri med chos kyi sgra na
238b6(rnying rgyud): gnas// zhes sku gsum rang gnas kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // sku gsum bzhugs tshul ji ltar bzhugs// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan dugs pa// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ chos kyi
238b7(rnying rgyud): sbyin mi snang la rang bzhin yod par bzhugs/ longs su snang la rang bzhin med par bzugs/ sku snang yang srung la rang bzhin yang yod par gsungs/ zhes skra gsum pazhugs tshul rgya ma rje sde lnga nga la/ nan gyi chung 'dagang na
239a1(rnying rgyud): byung // gsang ba bdag pas bstan du gsal// gsang ba bdag pas gsungs pa/ kye sems dpa' chen panyon cig// byang chub sems kyi chos nyad la// rkyen mongs skyon gyis mgos pas// dri mad rnam dag tu
239a2(rnying rgyud): dublang // cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas// stong pa kun 'byung gyung du byung // rig pas thams cad bcad pa yis// 'dzin pa sdug bsngal rgyang du zung // zhes don gyi chung du byung ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / dri med rnam dag ji ltar lags
239a3(rnying rgyud): stong pa kun 'gyung ji ltar lags// 'dzin pa sdug bsngal ji ltar lags// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol/ gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ gzhi la skyon gyis ma gos na// de ni gyi yi dri med yin//
239a4(rnying rgyud): dug lnga sel du mi 'dzin na// de ni nang gi dri med yin// dbyings la skye 'bri mi byed na// de ni gsang ba'i dri med yin// byas pa'i chos la mi ltos na// de ni phyi yi stong nyid yin// mtshan ma'i chos la mi gnas na// de ni nang gi stong nyid yin// chos
239a5(rnying rgyud): nyid do yis mi 'dzin na// de ni gsang ba'i stong nyid yin// 'byung ba lnga la mi 'dzin na// de ni phye yi rig pa yin// sgo ltar 'dzin pa ma zhugs na// de ni nang gi rig pa yin// ye shes rgyun du mi gcod na// de ni gsang ba'i rig pa yin// zhes so//
239a6(rnying rgyud): klung gsum bkrol ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / rgyud kyi ngo bo nges tshig ji ltar lags// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa// kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ byang chub sems kyi chos
239a7(rnying rgyud): nyid de// kun tu 'brel pas rgyud kyang yin// yang dag lam du zhugs pa yi// gzung du rung bas lung yang yin// nyams su blangs pa'i chos nyid du// byang chub sems pas med pa'i phyir// de phyir man ngag dam pa yin/ 'brel dang mtsha
239b1(rnying rgyud): med pa yis// kunas ma tshogs zhes dal bya// gdod nas snying po byung chub sems// de na 'dus bu rgyud du bstan// zhes chud kyi tha ma chog bstan pa badz+ra ste brgyad pa'o// / rgyog rnams thams cad gang nas drang // gas/
239b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'das thos bstan du gsal// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ kye sems dpa' chen pa nyon ce// chos rnams thams cad byed las sbyi// rkyed ni sdang po dngos las byung // snang ba dngos ni yi ge'i gzugs su gyur// zhes
239b3(rnying rgyud): ge byung ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / chos rnams thams cad gang du 'dus// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ kye sems dpa' chen po nyan cig/ chos rnams thams cad ming du 'dug/
239b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad yi ger 'dus// yi ge rnams ni sma ru 'dus// sgra rnams kun bzar gsung du 'jus// zhes chos rnams tshig dang yi ger 'dus pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / kun bzung lha bsgom spyod pa de ltar lags// gsang bang bdag
239b5(rnying rgyud): pos bstan du gsol/ gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ ma 'phangs rgyang gsum lta ba yin// srog gcod gsum po bsgom pa yin// mi 'gog gsum po spyod pa yin// de yi don rnams ji ltar
239b6(rnying rgyud): lags// gsang ba'i bdag po ma stan du gsol// gsung ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ mig gos ma 'phangs kun tu gsal// de ni gyi yi lta ba yin// sems kyis ma 'phangs kun la khyab// de ni nang
239b7(rnying rgyud): gaM lta ba yin// ye shes ma 'phangs kun tu togs// de ni gsang pa'i lta ba yin// snang la zhen pa mngon gyi srog tshad// don gyi yi sgom pa yin// gas pa la 'dzin pa med na nang srog rtsod// de ni nang gi sgom pa yin// ye shes rgyun

240a2(rnying rgyud): gas pa ba dag sa gsungs

240a7(rnying rgyud): 'phru rgya su sa na mas na / na
240b1(rnying rgyud): gas / sa pa na lags nga // dran par mags pa rnams// 'gro ba'i mgan pa'i dang pa gamad// de bzhin ldan pa gachags thas kyis na/ 'gatugs pa lagyis ldanan pa'i 'bagapa mnan
240b2(rnying rgyud): 'gan pa ltar bsdu// gsang ba'i ba dag pas drugamal// gsang ba'i bdag pas gzungs pa/ sems dpa' rgyan pa can ga/ gas dbathas kya 'gas pas nga// nan kun du ba smra gas/
240b3(rnying rgyud): gis thangs/ bas kyis sa// u ma pa na ba stan pa nam rnas pa cwa // man ga ga ga su / gas pa 'dug pas pa gas pa// dag gangasapa//
240b4(rnying rgyud): da na ban / rag pa rmuzhugs nas ni shA bag kyang bcan padas rgyun rnam gnang// snang bsags su 'byin pa gan// shes pa dag sa na 'bras cing gdang/ mas sa
240b5(rnying rgyud): smod par 'jug// zhes man dag gzhing 'dus pa'i 'as sa ba ba la// / 'bras bu'i la dz+wa lang sna gnas// gsang ba'i bdag bsabastan drags pa// gsang pa'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ bsams na
240b6(rnying rgyud): med pa 'a de tha bzhin thams cad 'dang // dkril ma bta nang bzhan dgas dag pa cad/ gang nanA rgal bzhin tu ma dpag na me // nal grwa gsu 'dag pa dan du pa kyis sto ma dug// sa

241a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i dag ngos pan dgas so// gang sa da da/ dag rgyun tu // byu / gas
241a2(rnying rgyud): sa su sa su
241a3(rnying rgyud): pa kun 'byung gi rgyud ces bya bar yang bung zhig/ thams cad gsal bar byed pas ni rin po che sna khyod kyi rgyad ces bya bar yang zung zhing/ chen che 'a lo chus bstan pa'i le'u steng cu dgu pa rdzogs so// / bi ma dang gsu sbas bgyung //
241a4(rnying rgyud): rgyag // da d+ha/ oM dz+nyAHt+tamam+b+ha r+ya b+hI Sh+Tha prab+hU shA lang ra nam/ bod d+ha dang / byang chung kyimams mdu mdi bzhol gyi rgyang las/ 'bras bu blan med pa'i rtag pa/ dab rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di skad bdag gis rjes po'i man/
241a5(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das 'og min gyi gnas snying po byang chub le bzhugs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la gzigs nas/ kye ma/ thugs rje chen po dag gi gdung brgyad 'angon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams lnga 'bras bya bla na med pa'i theg pa ji ltar bstan par bya
241a6(rnying rgyud): zhes zhus pas/ rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod nyon cig/ 'bras bu bla na med pa'i theg pa la sbyi lnga ste/ de yang gzhi 'am 'bras bu rnam gsum gyis don ngas pa byed pa/ de gzhi dngos po'i 'dug tshul gyi le zhes sems can thams cad kyi don mi 'gyur bar
241a7(rnying rgyud): bstan pa dang / de'i don nges par byed pa lam la gnas pa mnyam lanyid kyi drung / ches ji bzhin par bzhag pa bstan pa dang / 'bras bu rig pa'i ye shes ga pa ma du zad pa btsun pa dang / de yang spyadang rnam par dag 'dzin gyi
241b1(rnying rgyud): brtan pa'i 'jam sa/ 'phral byung gnas b+h+yan cas nyid nga bstan pa dang / na na kyi la ma 'gags pa dang / nam mkhar na dang ca ng+gA gyi du brtan pa // gzhan dro mtha byin par nga man pa ma skyed pa'o//
241b2(rnying rgyud): 'das mya ngan med pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// gzhi gyi med pa'i chos nyid byang chub sems// zab cing phra bas dpag pa'i yul las 'das// yangs shing khyadab pas nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// sbom zhing dgas pas snang srid dbang du sdud/
241b3(rnying rgyud): de 'dra'i chos slu bla med byang chub sems// ma byung ma skyes 'od kyi snying po can// 'gro ba yongs kyi dpal mgon byang chub sems// sgra dang tha snyad tshig gi spyod yul min// dpag med bsam 'das mi gnas mya ngan 'das// don gyi snying po tu med//
241b4(rnying rgyud): sa/ ma na dag u/ na sa rnam
241b5(rnying rgyud): byung mi shes sprul sgra byang chub sems// bdag med phyogs bral don dam srun gyis rdzogs// nyag gcig ya gags snying po byang chub sems// mi bskyod dbyings nas rang byung kun la khyab// mkha' ltar dngos med ni ba gcig tu grags/
241b6(rnying rgyud): ma'i byung po dang sa med mya ngan 'das// rang byung dgag/ med skar tshigs grangs ma yang // bdag nyid can po mi ltar bdag nyid kyi// thugs rje thabs mkhas nam mkha' sprin gyi tshul// phan gnod yod med byung po sa ma d+yad//
241b7(rnying rgyud): gas du sa tu bya// doni mdo tshe nyod kyi bu mis 'o// drin pa man pa shega'i mngon 'i myo/ mas dpa brgya sa 'dongo/ phyis ngag / rjemi ma 'ad
242a1(rnying rgyud): zhal khrims nyag gtag ma// dga' rab dz+nyAn mkhas pa'i skyes mchog gas// lus 'phro skal par ldan pa'i thugs rgyud las// bstan 'bri med pa'i rin chen gter 'an tshangs// d+hA/
242a2(rnying rgyud): dran bu dang chung ngan slob ma la// chu srin gri ba bzhin du dam du sgoms// zhes bka' bral to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'tshon pas/ rgyud dag pani rdo rje sems dpa' lazhu bajug zhus pa/
242a3(rnying rgyud): kye thugs rje chen po/ khams gastsal gyi sems can thams cad ni/ nad pa lta bu'o// dug lta bu'o// ngo phyogs kyi 'dam rna ba lta bu'o// mun pa lta bu'o// snro gyi bu'o// tsho ma ltaba'o// zhes byas pas/ rdo rje 'dzin
242a4(rnying rgyud): pa nyon cig/ ngas gdams pa'i cho ga gsum bstan gyis/ legs par yid la zung zhing/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las zag ring rnam par dag pa'i zhing du bsgral ba dang / 'khor ba'i 'dra ma rdzab la rdo rje'i rdzong bca' ba dang /
242a5(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal gyi bye brag nor bu rin po cher bsgyur ba dang gsum las/ rigs kyi bu phyi snod kyi 'jig rten thams cad 'jung ba lngas bsdus pa thams cad sngon phyung gi dus nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa/ ma byas
242a6(rnying rgyud): bris snang ba bde zhing yungs pa/ zug rngu med pa/ rgya yongs su mdzad pa cho ga dang dbang po'i spyod yul med pa/ brjod bya thams cad las 'das pa/ 'das zhes bya ba yang ming gi rnam grangs te/ de ci la yang
242a7(rnying rgyud): mi gnas pa'o// des ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mtha' ring ba rnam par dag pa'i zhing du bsgral ba'o// khams gsum sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi bur chud/ ma rig pa'i rgyar 'dzums nas sdug bsngal bar gnas kyang /
242b1(rnying rgyud): spyod pa byang chub sa sems rang thung gis 'ang gsal ba/ chu rkyen med par ka dag pas/ rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes la gnas su rung gis/ rdos pa can shes rab kyi snying po med pa ni ma yin no// rgyud drug gi sems can
242b2(rnying rgyud): thams cad/ rdo rje lta bu'i sku dri ma med par gnas pas yongs la khyab pa/ gzhan dbang du ma gyur pa/ zad cing bri ba med pas rgyam chad pa/ thabs kyi rgyal po stobs kyi rig pa shar bas/ 'khor ba nyid rang byung gi
242b3(rnying rgyud): ye shes su ka dag/ sdug bsngal gyi 'dam rna ba nyid chos nyid bde ba chen po rang dag pas/ 'khor ba'i 'dam rdzab la rdo rje'i rjod bcang ba'o// rigs kyi bu nyon cig/ sems can thams cad pa lus gsum du shes par bya'o//
242b4(rnying rgyud): ye shes kyi lus sdug bsngal gyi mtha' les grol ba'o// bag chags min pa'i lus sha khrag gi rdos pacan/ gnyis 'brel gyi lus sems bde sdug gnyis 'dzin/ gzhi shes pa chos kyi thu la/ bag chags kyi nang med kyang /
242b5(rnying rgyud): rnam rtog sems kyi yul las bag chags nad du langs kyang / gso byed sman pa'i rgyal pos bzang drug sprin gyis gso zhes byung ste/ ma rig pa 'khor ba'i nad/ rig pa mya ngan las 'das pas gso/ rnam rtog drug
242b6(rnying rgyud): bu'i nad chos ye shes kyi bdud rtsi chen pos gso// sdug bsngal 'dam rdzab chen po'i nang / bde ba chen po'i ye shes kyis gso// gti mug mun pa lta bu'i nad/ shes rab mar me rlung gis ma 'askyod pa lta bus gso//
242b7(rnying rgyud): bag chags sbyor rtsi lta bu'i nad/ rang bzhin med pa man shel lta bus gso// rtog pacing zhis zug rngu tshong ma lta bu'i nad/ mnyam pa nyid mi g.yo ba rgya mtsho lta bus gso/ des ni sdug bsngal gyi bye brag nod bu
243a1(rnying rgyud): ra / rgyun mas / nga du na nga du rgyu // nasan
243a2(rnying rgyud): drapa' sems dpa' chen pos// yang zhus po/ kyil bcom ldan rdo dang tshad// zad med lams rnyeb gnas pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyis// blo dngos gnyis med sbyor ba ni// sangs kyu
243a3(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi dgongs pa ste// thabs la mkhas pas bstan du gsol/ zhes zhul pas/ rdo rje sems dpa' khyod nyon cig/ dI pa dris pa legs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa dpag tu med kyang / sems ca gro
243a4(rnying rgyud): bye brag dang spyad nas/ chos ji bzhin pa la blo de bzhin mi gnas pa'i ched du/ mar me sdong bu bstan pa'i tshul du ma bcos ji bzhin gnas na de bzhin nyag gcig ces bya'o// de yang lung las/ bstan bya ston byed gnyis
243a5(rnying rgyud): yod na// bsgom bya sgom byed ci phyir med// zhes 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi snying po la byang chub kyi snying po bstan te/ snying po bstan par bya ba'i don du/ dus rtag tu snying po la gnas par bya'o// rtog pa'i don shes bya ba ma rig
243a6(rnying rgyud): kyang / bka' lung gi phyi mo dang rgyud lam gsal gyi bar du/ shes bya la gsal gdab cing ting nge 'dzin la gnas par bya'o// byang chub snying po 'gyur med chos kyi sku// gzhan nas ma btsal sems nyid mngon sangs rgyas/
243a7(rnying rgyud): rang la gnas pa'i don de sems kyis sems la ltos// ma byung ma skyes rang lhung chos kyi rgyu// mi g.yo mi 'dir mnyam pa chen por gzhag/ gsal btog med mo shes chos kyi sku// ma bcos bde ba chen po'i dang du gzhag
243b1(rnying rgyud): rtags kun thub da brnyan cu// nga ba ma po na nan/ shA lkug na nas dung zag// ga rgyun su na smras// nga byas pa
243b2(rnying rgyud): ga / ga sa
243b3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs / gas pang ban smrab //
243b4(rnying rgyud): sa rnam/ / sa pa/
243b5(rnying rgyud): da ma / sa /
243b6(rnying rgyud): brnam// snang brid nam drug brjid pa las 'das kyang // zhes brgyas nas deg khyo kyi yi dang du bathos// kye bachu sems la hU~M gi mi mdang yang // 'dra 'thul med pa'i rkyen du theg pa bsgom// snod bdud do yin dade
243b7(rnying rgyud): ma // // rgya pa nga//
244a1(rnying rgyud): kun gzhi'i rnam shes kun la mi 'khor bas// dang byur ye shes bdag med mya ngan 'das// rtag cad tshig las 'das par sun phyung nas// mtho dman klong du kho dang snyams te// mnyam pa chen pos mnyam las 'das par
244a2(rnying rgyud): bsgom// brjod pa'i tha snyad kun las 'das rtogs na// rnam dag byang chub dbyings kyi bsgom pa yin// zhes byang chub kyi sems rma bya ma rdzing bsnom gyi rgyud las/ gzhi lam dang bcas pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas
244a3(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos zhus pa// ston pa thugs rje che mnga' ba// 'gro ba'i mgon po de bzhin gshegs// gzhi lam gnyis su med pa yi// lam gyi 'bras bu bshad du gsol// zhes zhus te/ rigs kyi bya
244a4(rnying rgyud): nyon cig/ dri ba dris pa de legs so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gdams pa rin po che ni/ brjod pas thog tu mi phebs shing bstan par dka' na yang / des re zhig mtshon pa'i cho ga 'ga' tsam smra yis/ legs par
244a5(rnying rgyud): yid la zung zhig/ rigs kyi bu 'bras bu bla na med pa ni gud nas mi 'byung ngo // gzhi lam gnyis su med par mnyam pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan zhes bya ste/ lhag mthong dang ni zhig nas gnyis su med par rad byung gi/
244a6(rnying rgyud): ye shes mar me rlung gis ma bskyod pa ltar/ shes bya nyams su myangs na/ gzhi lam 'bras bu mthar phyin sangs rgyas nyag gcig ma zhes bya ste/ ye shes dbyings na gsal na 'bras bu nyag gcig ma// dbyings nyid rig par shes na 'bras
244a7(rnying rgyud): nyag gcig ma// gzugs kyi 'od du shang ba 'bras bu nyag gcig ma// 'di chen zag pa med pas 'bras bu nya ga gcig ma// sngang srid dbang du 'dus na 'bram bu rtag gcig ma// ting 'dzin ro la ma chaglan 'bras bu zhag gcig ma//
244b1(rnying rgyud): ba rang bzhin me na 'bras thazhag gcigs// mthun ma zil byas gnan na 'azlas chub dan dra// zhes pa na danan// rgyams bya thulas/ 'bras bu gzugs sgra gnyis byung ba dang / zag pa rtsal ma 'gags pa pan/ na/
244b2(rnying rgyud): yang rgyu 'bras dbyer mi phyed pa'i rgyal nyid rtsal du shes pa'i dus na 'bras bu sku gsung thugs mthar phyin pa'o// sku gsum dang byung du shar nas/ ye shes gzugs kyi skur snang la gzugs nyid rang bzhin rnam par dag ste mtshan ma las 'das
244b3(rnying rgyud): na 'bras bu ye shes su grub pa'o// ngo bo nyid kyi snang ba snang tshed dang brag tshod mo long gapa' dag pa ltar bstan kyang / don dam pa spos dang bral ba rang bzhin rnam par dag ni 'bras bu mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen po zhes bya'o// mtshan
244b4(rnying rgyud): ma dang bral ba chos kyi sku khyab thams cad dang bral ni 'bras bu bla na med pa zhes bya'o// phyir mi ldog pa'i lung nges pa bka' lung gi bye mo las/ yi ri bzhin pa'i rdo rje 'chad chen po/ rgyud dag pa'i rdo rje 'chad la snang ba'i dus
244b5(rnying rgyud): rgyu 'bras dbyer mi byed pa'i rang byung gi bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ste/ chu de dag pa'i dbyings nyid nas 'bras bu ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rang snang ba'i dus na/ rgyu 'bras kyi chos thams cad mi phyed pas sangs rgyas mar me mdzad stong gi gtsug pu
244b6(rnying rgyud): rin po che zhes bya bar grags te 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'o// rang gi shes bya mthar phyin pa'i dus su bdud dang mu stegs kyis glags mi rnyed la/ phya dang dbang phyug gis grogs byar med de/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo ltar nub pa med cing / nor bu
244b7(rnying rgyud): rin po che ltar zad mi shes pa/ shes bya rang gi ngo bor shes bya rang gi ngo bos dbang bsgyur ba'i dus na 'phags pa gtsug tor dri ma med pa zhes grags so// byang chub sems la byang chub kyi sems gnas pa'i
245a1(rnying rgyud): dus su rgyam mtshan por chu zan 'dra ba'i tshul te/ sa nyid skye ba med par glang du chos can mtshan par snang ba thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang ba zhes grags/
245a2(rnying rgyud): so// chos thams cad la dbye ba med cing bzang ngan mi bsdu/ bdag gzhan du mi blta ba'i dus na/ nam mkha' dang nyi ma'i tshul te/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa kun nas gzis zhes grags so// chos
245a3(rnying rgyud): thams cad gang yang mi len/ gang yang mi 'dor gang gis kyang mi bsgri ba/ gang gis kyang grogs mi nus/ gang la yang mi brten/ gang du yang mi gol/ rang bzhin rnam par dag pas mtha' med/ shes bya'i
245a4(rnying rgyud): ngo bo la ma bsgribs yongs su gsal bas/ chad pa'i mtha' med pas/ 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po zhes grags so// zhes byang chub sems dpa' ma bya mjing bsnol gyi byed las/ gzhi lam 'bras bu rnam pa
245a5(rnying rgyud): gsum mthong phyin par bstan pa'i le'u so bzhi pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rjen pos yang zhus pa/ 'dum dpal gzhon nu dpa' bo mchog// gzhi lam 'bras bu ma nar phyin pas/
245a6(rnying rgyud): mongs 'khor ba'i rgyud bcad de// dag pa'i zhing du yang dag bsgral// rnam rtog dpa' bo zil gyis nan pa'i phyir// spyod pa'i chu sa khrims bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ rdo rje 'dzin pa ngal nyon//
245a7(rnying rgyud): rnam pa gsum du brtags// glang po che lam du zhugs pa'i spyod pa dang / smyon pa snying stor dran pa med pa'i spyod pa dang / shed la bye'i bu chung lta bu'i spyod pa'o// de'i grogs gsum la/ 'dam gyi pad+ma'i me tog dang /
245b1(rnying rgyud): 'dun dang / ba ga pa das na/ su/ d+ma na na na du sa thas drug du/ nga
245b2(rnying rgyud): nga/ 'di shA na di / na da brtse
245b3(rnying rgyud): sa 'byung ba 'i // bcom ldan 'da'i seM ku sgyum pa// ba 'drugs kyi skad dus byung ba tsu pang / skang
245b4(rnying rgyud): tsal myang ma chags mazhin pa'o// nyams myong spyad la skyes pa'i snying ban+de/ ngan// ma zhugs spyod pa'i tha na / thug sa sa dang pa// zhas gsang sangabathud rnam
245b5(rnying rgyud): dpa sa sang na pa sadu
245b6(rnying rgyud): su ga khyang pa rgyu la klas pa'i dus na/ na pa med pa de napa spyo / bye ga gi pa ngas sa kyis ya
245b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i byed pa gyibar du // sas rgya mi bya gang yongs pa dge pa sal du snre / me na de mi po'i das ga bye drug rje ma na/ ga dang la ma kha sa na cing
246a1(rnying rgyud): mkha' la gzugs / mdzub mnas ma khwa du rjon da// sa rgya sgra'i sprul ba'i rgyuHmas su bskur ba'i dus su/ lus lnga grang dro dang na tsam cing ga ced bu'i spyad pa /
246a2(rnying rgyud): 'byung du 'char te nam mkha ri mo la khungs 'don pa'o// zag pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ro nyams su myong ba'i dus su/ zas kyi 'du shes chung zhing grogs la ma chags par ri dwags rmas ma ltar gcig pur stsal 'am
246a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i spod pa 'tshar ro// sems ye shes kyi dbang du 'dus shing snang ba chos nyid kyi dbang du 'dus pa'i dus ni/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang tshul mi nub par 'gro ba dang / gzhan gyis skye baspyod par 'gyur ra/
246a4(rnying rgyud): rig pa dbyings la shar ba'i dus su/ yul gzhan gyi snang ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// sems las su rung ba'i dus su/ gzhan gyi sems shes shing dngos po thams cad la rdzun du snang bar 'gyur ro// chos nyid stong nge ba nyid pas su ru
246a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i dus su phyi'i 'byung ba dang mi ma yin gyi sgra thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro// spyod pa rnam par dag pa de nams ni byad dag pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la snang ste/ lus ma bor bar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o// namo bu d+hA ya/
246a6(rnying rgyud): tad+ya d+hA d+harmA sa da d+ha r-i/ many+dzu shrI A pra b+ha/ b+ha ga ba ti pa pa ri/ su ka ya/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' mgu l-i dang ste/ bcom ldan 'das la thal mo mnyam par sbyar naswa/ yan lag lnga
246a7(rnying rgyud): la btsugs te/ rtse legs so legs so dpal ldan mgon po che// zhal nas phyung bas bkang stsal de// gsung ba ni nyid don gyi mchog/ bdag rlo'i mun pa kha 'byed pa'i// snang gsal thugs rje 'od kyi me// sems
246b1(rnying rgyud): can kun ldibaskyabs mdzad pas// mgon pa dri med ye shes smra// 'gro ba'i don du skur sprub pa'i// rang byung sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs// byams mgon thugs rjes bskyabs mdzad cing // sangs rgyas log par dad sel la//
246b2(rnying rgyud): gus pa'i tshul gyis skyabs su mchi// zhes brjod nas bstod pa'o// byang chub kyi sems rma bya mdzad bsnol gyi rgyud las/ spyod pa brtag pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dri ba
246b3(rnying rgyud): sa gnas / skye pa da / kyi da / sa dpa na 'ang/
246b4(rnying rgyud): na
246b5(rnying rgyud): tshul bzhin 'byung ste/ thugs rin po che'i dpal be'u nas/ sangs rgyas byams pa mi mnyam mgon po zhes bya ba byung nas/ rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i chos bstan to// dbu yi gtsug tor nas 'jam dpal dri med sring po
246b6(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba byung nas/ sku gdung dang ring babrel gyi chos bstan to// zhal gyi ljags bzang nas sangs rgyas bye ba rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba byung nas/ rdzu 'bras kyi chos ma lus pa bstan to// sangs rgyas stong gi yon tan ni/
247a1(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas gcig pu nyid la 'das// gcig zung rab tu snang ba'i chos// 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas// zhes 'brang ste/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yan tanan bsam
247a2(rnying rgyud): mi khyab pa zhig 'byung ste/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas 'od dpag med chen po'i rtsal snang ngo // sangs rgyas 'od dpag med nyid 'gro ba yongs kyi snying por shar bas/ 'gro ba sems can thams cad la// snying po rnam dag ye shes rdzogs// zhes
247a3(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// sangs bras kun gyi gtsug phud wa// rgyal mtshon rtse mo bzhin du gnas// sangs nas kun gyi che ba la// nam mkha' bzhin du khyab par gnas// rdorje snying po bran med// rer chen gan gtor gyi ma med// nyes pa'i rna
247a4(rnying rgyud): sel bar byed// pabring snying po dra 'bar ba// mtha' la mo gnas phyag rgya che// mgon po dri ma med pa'i sgra// yon tan kun gyi snying por bshad// thabs mkhas thugs rje stobs kyi bdag/ bdud bzhe dul natshang dpa' ba'i mchog/ dag pa
247a5(rnying rgyud): zheng du yang da rlol// thugs rje ma ra ma zang // zhes rab su mos rgol bdang / sbed chen ga gi zeng brtan// na gyi zugs rje bdag/ gleng po bdag med ma maban// rtog pa'i rjes 'brang garjong pa'i brtson// dam ma#
247a6(rnying rgyud): ma'i tshul bzhin du// slang med pa ba'i dbyings nyid nas// 'gag med rang byung ye shes sgra// nam mkha' sbyin gyi tshul bzhin du// pa chur spos med mkha' la drengs// chu 'bras dag pa'i dbyings nyid las 'bras bu ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rang snang
247a7(rnying rgyud): dus su snang brdud thams cad chos nyid kyi klong du gang la/ mi 'byed pa'i blta ba nam mkha' dang mnyam par dogs kyi 'brang bcad/ zag pa med pa'i ye shes rang snang bas bdag dang gzhan gyi don mnang phyir/ shes rab kyi slob pa ma 'gas
247b1(rnying rgyud): pas bdud dang srin po'i mthu byin zil gyis gnon/ kye kye rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon cig/ thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can gyi pha ma yin gyis/ de yang dri ma med pa'i don gyis gnas par bya'o// rtogs pa'i dod la
247b2(rnying rgyud): rtse gcig tu ma yengs par gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan zhes bya ste/ rdo rje'i gdan la rdo rje bzhag pa'o// 'jam dpal dri med snying po ngas/ sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ gsang ba'i rgyud
247b3(rnying rgyud): gsum yang dag thugs kyi rgyud// thugs kyi klong nas byung nas gdams par bzhag/ sangs rgyas lag tu gtad pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas gtsug phud rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i thugs las nor budri ma med pa'i rgud mdzad
247b4(rnying rgyud): do// 'bras bu bla na yod pa dang / bla na med pa'i theg pa shan phye ba'i phyir/ ljags kyi pad+mo las sangs rgyas bye ba rnam par gzigs bya ba byung nas/ byang chub kyi sems rma bya mjing bsnol gyi rgyud mdzad do// sangs rgyas la sprul
247b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i sgra ye shes kyi lus su gnas pa'i phyir mdzod spu'i bu ga nas/ 'od zer lnga 'phros nas/ sangs rgyas 'od ldan mgon po spyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba phung nas/ lha mo 'od zer can gyi rgud mdzad do// las dge sdig mtho dman med pa
247b6(rnying rgyud): la bzla ba'i phyir shangs kyi rlung sbom nas mthu stabs kyis bdag po phyag na rdo rje phyung ste/ bya rtsol med pa ye shes bla ma'i rgyud phung ste/ chas las 'das pa'i sku yongs su rdzogs par bstan to// zhes byang chub kyi sems ma bya mjing bsnol gyi chud las/ rdzogs pa chen
247b7(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu bla na med pa'i theg pa las le'u ste drug pa'o// / byang chub kyi sems rma bya mjid bsnol gyi rgyud ces/ 'jam dpal dri ma med pa'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' ro langs bde ba la gdams pa'o// rdzogs so// dis tha mdi rjo gyi dzi ldan pos gyu badza/
248a1(rnying rgyud): 'dis tshan po ma dang blang ba yin/
248a2(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi dpal kun tu bzang po bde 'a chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das 'og min gyi gnas snying po byang chub na bzhugs pa'i sus/ rje sems dpa' la gzigs nas/ byang chub rgya
248a3(rnying rgyud): sems rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de'i tshe dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa rnams dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa thams cad dang / bde bar gshegs pa thams
248a4(rnying rgyud): cad dang / bde bar gshegs pa thams cad don gcig ste/ bdag nyid byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba las byung zhing / de dag thams cad de las skyes pa dang / de las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rmad du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor yin par thugs su chud pa'i don rdo rje
248a5(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' la rig par bya ba'i phyir/ rdo rje sems dpa' la gzigs te/ yid kyi dkyil khor sgo rgya nas/ rang gi rig pa'i don gsal bar byung ste/ thams cad kyi don ji lta bu yin pa sa sor gsal bar snang bar byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'
248a6(rnying rgyud): nyid dang / bde bar gshegs pa thams cad dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa rnams dang / byang chub sems rmad du byung ba nyid yin pa dang / byang chub rmad du byung ba las dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad
248a7(rnying rgyud): bzung bas rmang du byung ba nyid yin pa dang / yang byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba lus bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor bu zad du byung ba bru'i dkyil 'khor dang / gsung rmad du byung ba gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang / thugs rmad du byung ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
248a8(rnying rgyud): chen pa rmad dbyung ba nyid yin par snang bar byas na pa/ de dag tha mas cad com ldan 'das nyid kyi su dang gsung di thugs su ba de nas rdo rje rjems dpas 'di gyis nas rmi te// 'jig rten mkhas pa rdzogs saras rgyas/
248b1(rnying rgyud): na gapa/ na/ mas su // / du // / // mam /
248b2(rnying rgyud): dusus / da / smra sa
248b3(rnying rgyud): na dag panas/ ba / 'di dun kyang / da la ma 'di na / da
248b4(rnying rgyud): gsu su / su
248b5(rnying rgyud): no// smra du sa

248b7(rnying rgyud): su su su sa na de na du
249a1(rnying rgyud): drag 'dis med// rnams cad ma skyes brag pa med// byung chub mad kyang mngan rtags med// khams cang med cad 'byung ba'ang med// mtshan myed myi 'gyur nam mkha' bzhin// tus med gnyis pa med panags/
249a2(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems 'di rgyas pa'i sman// zhes bka' stsan to// kyi sems dpa' chen po/ bdeb gshegs pa rnams kyi sgra gsung thugs dang / stong gsum gyi ljang chen po 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas ma med pa 'dra ste/ de'i rgya rnams
249a3(rnying rgyud): rmad du byung ba nyid yin no// rig parang las byu na mi chos zin do du du byung banyid minan// nu 'phru mdzin po med du rnye nga nyid yin no// 'phrun chen po rmad du byung ba nyid yin na// sa parma dang byung banyid yin// ngas me dung chud nga byung ba rjid yin
249a4(rnying rgyud): med du byu 'i kyim di can phyi dung byung ba nyid minano// pa rig pal ma chung ni'i tshu brumatshan pa rmang dubyung nying min no// b.rig ming bzang gyu nyid pa do// bdeb gshegs pa na 'as dang / derjes mas dpa nyid sa
249a5(rnying rgyud): dang / gzing de chen po dang / gsadu d-i dzin ny-i dang // skye be gas bu ma dbyung ba rgyud mnan// su mang du byung ba m+bu'i dkyim na tho gsang ba mang dbyung na nyid mdzan// gsung mad du byung ba gsung gi dmyal 'khor gA snang banang du byung ba
249a6(rnying rgyud): pa da du bzug da kyim 'di dge sang ba dadu byang mi na pa mang byubyung las/ byang chu sems mdadu byung brtan de'i ltung pa'o// chos nyid baspyan pa phyid pami mi ba
249a7(rnying rgyud): byang chub rgya da de ma cung chung med// sa dang rnamadza byung drud mtshan ma dzang// sgyu 'dran chos nyid gang gis shes gyur ba// de nyid byang chub sems bdag yin pa rings// byang chub snying por 'dag 'dus pas// thod

249b5(rnying rgyud): dngas mang sa spyod na/ gas sa na padang sems dpas rgyam ldan nas ma / 'i kyi // cang chu bapas med / sa byung nas zhi gsos// rnam

250a1(rnying rgyud): sems dbang zan po/ bskal pa 'bum phrag ldan rol du// nga nyid gcig bya sngon du byung // 'byung ba byas ning sngar byung // sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// nga las byung ba dam phyir// sems dpa' chen po thugs nyid ni//
250a2(rnying rgyud): nga yi byin rlabs chen po bas// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang // rnal 'byor chen po kun 'dus nas// 'od zer mngon sum nyi bzhin shar// sems dpa' chen po skal bzang yin// rnal 'byor gang zhig 'di 'chad pa// sems dpa
250a3(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi sku gsung thugs// de nyid yin par shes par gyis// don 'di rig pa'i rnal 'byor pa// sangs rgyas sa la mi gnas te// thams cad pa nyid nga yi thugs// sems tshan sangs rgyas nga las skyes// zhes gsungs so// chos chen po
250a4(rnying rgyud): mang du byung du las/ che ba bsnyed pa'i lewa ste gsum pa// gsang ba zhal gyis bzhes pa/ sems dpa' chen pa/ dpyad pa po nga nyid/ ngarang bzhin gyi rnam par dang nas sangs rgyas pas/ 'drug byas sa lanas med
250a5(rnying rgyud): do// de'i phyir chos thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid yin no// nga nyid chos kyi sku'i rnal 'byor yin pas/ nga'i chos thams cad rnam par mi rtog pa'o// sangs rgyas kun pas sngar sangs rgyas pa'o// nam mkha' med pa'i sngon rol na//
250a6(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ye nas med// gang la chags med sngon rol na// chags pa'i 'dod chags yongs kyis med// srid pa med par sngon rol na// srid pa'i chos nyid ye nas med// 'byung ba med pa'i sngon rol na// chen po lnga nyid ye nas
250a7(rnying rgyud): med// sangs rgyas med pa'i sngon rol na// sems can ming nyid ye nas med// sngon du 'khor ba'i chos yang med// mya ngan 'das pa'i sngon rol na// 'khor ba'i chos ni yenas med// de phyir 'byung las nga sngar byung // thams cad nga yis
250b1(rnying rgyud): thos pa nga// thams ca dang las byas pa na// rnams da las byung ba'an// zhas ga/ // chos can pam du byung ba nga/ zham sa panas pa gsung brnal man can// ma pa bang na
250b2(rnying rgyud): bkrus pas mi 'dag nam mkha' bzhin// skye dang bral ba'i byang chub la// byang chub rgya 'bras yongs kyis med// mad byung byang chub sems 'di ni// rang gi rig pa chen pos mkhyen nas/ rol pa'i thabs chen rang la rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//
250b3(rnying rgyud): 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog ye nas yod cing mthang gnas pas ye na sa dag ste/ 'dod chags nyid nga'o// zhe sdang ngo // gta khya ga ngo // nga rgyal nga'o// phrag dog dado// de'i dus su sngon byeng ba dang / da ltar gnyis
250b4(rnying rgyud): dbyer med par gnas pa'i phyir lhan cig 'byung ba'i chos 'dod chags rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pas zhe sdang la sogs pa rnam par dag go/ 'dod chags spros pa med pas skye rdzang la sogs pa'i ming med do// sems nyid las byung ba'i chos so//
250b5(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pas so sor dbyer med pa/ btan pa/ mkhregs pa/ ma sgrags pa/ mi chod pa/ rdo rje snying por sbyor ba/ gnyis su med pa/ so so ma yin pa'i chos marnamu pa nyid las chos kyi dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab par rang gi
250b6(rnying rgyud): sems nyid las byung zhing / rigs dang rigs lngar gyur pa'i sangs rgyas yab yum sras dang bcas pa/ 'khor phur sum tshogs pa las byung zhing spyod pa'o// rgyu rkyen rten 'brel gyi nus mabru nyid/ snang mdzad kyi byang chub sems nyid/ lus dang ngag dang /
250b7(rnying rgyud): sems dbyer med par mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/ ngo bor bsam pa dang bral ba'i mthus/ sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs par rang las byung zhing 'byung ba dang / 'od dang mngon par shes pa dang / brag dang / chu dang / nam mtha
251a1(rnying rgyud): la thogs pa med par 'gro ba dang / sbrul pa chags cer yang nang bu dang / zla skad d+ha tshogs 'byung ba dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas su mang ba na srid pa thos dang / maphrad dang /
251a2(rnying rgyud): chos thams cad nga'i lus ngag yid gsum gyi mthu las gyur pa yin no// deng phyir so sor kun du rtogs pa'i ye shes kyis/ sems can ji srid 'khor ba'i chos thams cad dang / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dar / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa
251a3(rnying rgyud): dang / da ltar bzhugs pa dang / srid pa gsum dang khams gsum dang / mchog gsum dang / yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa dang / 'byung ba dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / ma ning dang / byol seng dang / yi dwags dang /
251a4(rnying rgyud): dmyal ba dang / lha dang / mi dang / rgan pa dang / gzhon pa la sogs pa thams cad pa nyid yin pas/ nga nyid kyi thugs las spyir ba yang ma yin no// yid rang bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang / dpag bsam gyi shing / lha'i longs spyod thams
251a5(rnying rgyud): cad dang / rgya mtsho dang / ri rab dang / gleng la sogs pa 'di nga'i byang chub sems yin no// ngag na 'dug pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin no// nga cir yang 'gyur du brngub pa'i dus ngan na yang sangs rgyas so// dbye ba nyid bang
251a6(rnying rgyud): skyes par gyur pa na mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yin no// nga rol pa byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po nyid yin no// sems can thams cad dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa yin pa ni
251a7(rnying rgyud): nganga'i byang chub kyi sems so// mabyung ma gyur pa gcig kyang med do// byang chub kyi sems las byung ba'i mthus sangs rgyas so// byang chub kyi sems la nas sangs rgyas so// byang chub sems ni cir yang snang / cir yang 'brar du btub pa zhin
251b1(rnying rgyud): na yang tsun pa mad pa lanan/ nas bya byung sa da 'a na / 'byu sa sangs rgyas das nas susang bya swA hA/ rang phyugs gas pa byu rdzus/
251b2(rnying rgyud): gzung sa chen pa kyar tan gyi sems yi ga mang du byung ngo // 'jig tan dang 'jig sbyin pas 'das pa chos thams ca ni sangs rgyas las byung bas gsang ba ni ma dag nas // d+hang n+ta 'ok+Shas ma 'phrul chen po bstan na
251b3(rnying rgyud): kyang tub kyi sems 'phrul chen po nga du byung ba dang / byang chub kyi se mas du 'phur chen po mang du byung ba dang / byang chub kyi sem par ma can po ngasas brtan pad+ma pral rdzun mang du byung ba dang / byang chu mas nga
251b4(rnying rgyud): chad du byung ba'i rgyas rjes su bstan pa'i 'phrul chen po meng du drang ba dang / byang chub kyi sa phyugs chen po'i rlung gsang ba'i 'phrul ldan pa mngon pa rabastan pa'i chos mang dubyung ba// rdzamatshan pa ni byung ba las/ 'gyur chen pa'i
251b5(rnying rgyud): 'o// na tubakyis mas gsang ba rbang du byung gA'i 'phrum tshan po 'dzin gyi gsung thugs nyid du byur ba yin te/ ldan sa pas byas rnams kyis bshad pa yin no// rgyas pas dpa' chen po/ skang lam gnas pa rnams
251b6(rnying rgyud): nathugs gsang ba chen po mang du byung ba'o// 'di yang dag pa sangs rgyas kyi laladus nam mkhang chags pa med par gyun tu khyabacing rang la 'dus pa ni byang chud kyi sems cad du zang ba'o// kye sems dpa' chen po/ bzod pa med par mngan pa rna

252a1(rnying rgyud): zhes par na klud nachagasasas nga ra las kyang nagasang nang du byung ba dkyis gang mnan// sgra 'a 'das pa na ga snga gas grus rnyed du byung ba byang chu byasems cang duthang ba nyid panan/

252a3(rnying rgyud): sun sa
252a4(rnying rgyud): med pa rmad du byung ba nyid do// dngas ma de gsal ba'i snying po shin tu brtag dka' ba'i ye shes te thugs nyid du gyur pa'o// kye sems dpa' chen po/ 'byung ba chen po so sor ma bcos ma byas bsam pa med pa las sgra skang sna tshogs 'byung ba ni nga nyid
252a5(rnying rgyud): yin no// kye sems dpa' chen po/ sgra 'di dag ni bdag nyid las byung bas gang gi ngo bor yang ma grub pa ni chos kyi sku ste byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba'o// 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni skye ba 'byung ba dang skye ba rnams kyi rgyu nyid du gyur pas
252a6(rnying rgyud): byang chub kyi sems mad du byung ba nyid do// 'byung ba nyid do// 'byung ba chen po bzhi las byung zhing skye pa dang / skye ba rnam bskor sems can rnams bdag nyid du gyur pas sangs rgyas pa med pa'i sangs rgyas pa yin pas byang chung sems rmad du
252a7(rnying rgyud): byung ba nyid do// kyi sems dpa' chen po/ de las byung ba ni bdag nyid las byung ba'i chos thams cad nyon mongs pa'i dri ma ye nas med pa'o// byang chub ces bya ba ni 'das pa dang / ma byung ba dang / da ltar bzhugs pa dang / stong gsum
252b1(rnying rgyud): rten gyi khams mtha' las su med pa thams cad don gcig ste/ sku gsung thugs las mu gtog pa pa' chos rdul tsam yang med la chos thams cad kyu don dbyar med par thugs su chud pa ni kun tu chub pan// sems na chas thams cad/
252b2(rnying rgyud): gsung rdugs su dbyer med pa'i don las g.yo ba med par bsal pa'i ting ba 'dzin// / rgyas chen po rmad du byung ba las/ byang chub sems nyid bstan pa'i micu ste drug pa'o// / sems dpanga' chen pos zhus pa/ dam
252b3(rnying rgyud): 'das rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas pa rnam par thar pa'i lam du mnga' zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sems dpa' chen bcan cig/ ces bku' stsal to// sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rnam par
252b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i lam mnor pa'i chos rnyed rnam par dag balnga yod de/ 'dod chags ni sdang gti mug baN+Dal phrag dog lnga'o// de la 'dod pa ni bdag nyid las byung ba'i chos pa bdag nyid dus dang rnam pa med par longs spyod par 'dod do// chags pa na
252b5(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i dbang du gyur pa'o// de la bdag nyid las myong ba'i chos ni/ gzugs d+haH/ sgra dang / dri dang / ri dang / reg bya'o// de dag ji ltar 'dod ce na/ thams cad bdag nyid du gyur bar 'dod cing 'dod pa de la chags pa'o// zhe sdang ni bdag
252b6(rnying rgyud): nyid la ye nas gnas pa'i chos thams cad 'byung ba'i dab cheng du gyur pa/ drong gakyang ma~M thang / bzlas kyang mi 'dag chos kyi chos nyid du gyur pa 'dod chags blang ba la zhe sdang ba/ zhe sdang phreng ba la zhe sdang ba/ gti mug spang bal zhe sdang ba/ dmya
252b7(rnying rgyud): spang ba la na ldang ba/ phrag dog spang ba la zhe sdang ba/ gti mug ni bdag nyid las byung ba chos can la/ de lta bas so sor dpyir med par thugs su chud de/ so sor dbye ba mi mnga' bas gti mug dngas pa dang / chos thams cad bde bang
253a1(rnying rgyud): gzugs pa'i thug pa rda'i bdag nyid du gyur pas gsung ba mchog ga dgas pa na thams padag cig tu bzhugs pas/ sA dang sa'i ram par byed pa'i dgongs pa mi mnga' 'as gti mug dang / sug zung thugs kyang btang
253a2(rnying rgyud): gcig ste/ dbyer med du thugs su chud de/ mnyam pa nyid kyi skur bzhugs shing mnyam pa'i don la dgongs pas gti mug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / chos thams cad bdag nyid las byung zhing / gzhan las ma byung
253a3(rnying rgyud): ma skyes pa'i don thugs su chud pas bdag nyid kyi sku la pha ma gtogs par gzhan du gyur pa dang / gzhan du skye ba dang / gzhan du 'byung ba dang / gzhan du 'gog pa dang / gzhan las skyes pa dang / gzhan las byung ba dang / gzhan du thar par
253a4(rnying rgyud): ston pa mi mngar bas gti mug pa dang / bdag nyid las byung ba'i sprul pa'i su rnam pa sna tshogs las rol pa cir yang mdzad cing / lha gcig tu ston pa mi mnga' bras gti mug pa'o// nga rgyal ni bdag nyid las byung ba'i chos thams ca
253a5(rnying rgyud): dang / skye ba thams cad leng dang bdag med par thugs su chud de mkhyen pas/ de'i chos thams cad nga dang bdag med par ston par mdzad pa'i nga rgyal dang / bdag nyid las byung ba'i chos bla na med pa'i che ba thugs su chud de dus gsum du bdag
253a6(rnying rgyud): nyid ston par mdzad cing / bdag nyid kyi che ba ston par mdzad pa'i nga rgyal dang / bdag nyid las byung ba'i chos rnams la bdag nyid dus thams cad du longs spyod par mdzad pa'i dbang gis rol pa'i rku cir yang ston pas nga rgyal ba dang / chos thams
253a7(rnying rgyud): cad dang / srid pa gsum dang / chen po lnga la sogs pa dang / rtse 'gro thams cad ma lus pa thugs su chud de/ de dag thams cad bdag nyid du 'dus shing bdag nyid du gyur par ston par mdzad pa'i che ba'i nga rgyal lo// phrag dong ni chos thams
253b1(rnying rgyud): cad ngo bo nyid gcig pa las tha dad par rtogs pa las phrag dog pa dang / 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams ye nas byang chub kyi sku gsung thugs dbyer med pa las mtshan nyid so sor 'dzin pa la phrag dog pa dang / yang dag pa'i don ma nor ba gtan la phab pa
253b2(rnying rgyud): la/ phyin ci log tu rtogs pa de la phrag dog pa dang / chos thams cad bde bar gshegs pa yin pa las de ltar ma rtogs pa la phrag dog pa dang / che ba'i lam yin pa la rnam par thar pa ma mthong ba la phrag dog pa'o// chos chen po rmad du
253b3(rnying rgyud): byung ba las/ byang chub sems dpas zar pa'i lam bstan pa'i len+da ste bdun pa'o// / rdo rje sems dpa' chen po khyod// yang dag sangs rgyas la ma rig pa// nam mkha' lta bur skye ba med// rnam dag phung po lnga bded//
253b4(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs nges par khyod las byung // khyod las ma byung gcig kyang med// sna tshogs 'byung ba kun gyi rgyu// sangs rgyas kun gyi skul pa'i sku// sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med// rnam par dag pa bdag med chos// yang dag ye
253b5(rnying rgyud): shes thams cad lam// rgyu med chos te sna tshogs don// 'byung ba rnams pas khyod sngar byung // don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don// dam pa'i don te 'jig pa med// khyod las byung ba yi ge med// gsang sngags don du bskyed rnams
253b6(rnying rgyud): la// rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med// yan lag med pa'i rtsis las 'das// sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba// thams cad sangs rgyas nyid kyis mdzad// sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med// rang gi longs spyod dang las skul//
253b7(rnying rgyud): rang las sprul pa'i sgra rnams la// rang gis longs spyod ci yang mdzod// sprul pa sna tshogs cing yang ston// khyod las cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung // rol pa'i skur ni cir yang rol// sangs rgyas rol pa khyod las byung // sems

254b6(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa rnams sangs rgyas nyid kyis mdzad pas/ gsang ba rmad du byung ba'o// sangs rgyas nyid las gsang ba chud du byung ba'o// sangs rgyas nyid ye shes las skyes pas gsang ba rmad du byung ba'o//
254b7(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi reg pa'i ye shes las ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba dang / rang rig pa'i ye shes kyis ma khyab pa'i chos gang yang med pas gsang ba rmad du byung ba'i chos tshon po ste/ sems dpa' chen po nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams
255a1(rnying rgyud): su sgyu su
255a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad nyid du gyur pa'i phum po dang / rnam par grol ba'i tshor ba 'gab pa med pa'i phung po dang / skye ba med pa'i 'du shes chos nyid du thar pa'i phung po dang / len pa med pa'i 'du byed rnam pa thams cad tha dad pa rda ne'i phung ba dang /
255a3(rnying rgyud): rnamapa dadagu 'dil lakhang dang ngadra ba ma shes skye 'byung ba'i phung pos kun gyi bdug nyid du med pa da / kun gyi bdag nyid du byung bas kyu'i rnam po'i snang mdzad ces gsungs pa ni sku la ldan gyis rdzogs pas longs spyod dag da 'dra ti/ rnam
255a4(rnying rgyud): ri del nas pa rje ma nga kyis gzungs pani/ then na ni rnam ring zhin par na gyu gyur ba mi / de gang la munas pa'i rdzogs yang mang bas nang mdzad // de'i nga sa pas dnga'i dzin padu ga dag su na
255a5(rnying rgyud): 'das pa dang / ma'ongs pa dang / dbyar byung ba rnams dang / dus dang ngur gyis sa sor byar pa dang / dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad dang / skye ba thams cad dang / skye bo dang / lce'i rjes dang /
255a6(rnying rgyud): chen po lnga dang/ 'byung ba 'azhi las byung ba'i chos thams cad su lnga rnam par dag pa las mabyung ba gcig kyar med de/ de dag thams cad du lnga las byung bas thams cad nas thams cad chu nyid nga dru dang ga med// de bye
255b1(rnying rgyud): byas su ma gyur pa gcig kyang med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sun phye dang nang dang lus ngag tu yang snad la/ kun du yang khyab par snang bas/ kun la yang snang ngo // kun tu snang bar mdzad do// yang ji skad gsungs she na/ ngange sku rnam par dang /
255b2(rnying rgyud): pa ni cir yang sprul cing cir yang 'gyur zhing kun tu 'gyur ba nyid yin te/ su lnga las gyur pa'i chos teng la/ nga rol pa chen po rdo rje rnam par rol ba mdzad/ rtag par bzhugs shing rtag par rnam pa cing yang rol lo// rdo rje rnam par rol pa
255b3(rnying rgyud): chen po 'ir yang mdzad do// chos nyid la mnga' mdzad pa'i rol pa chen pos skya'i cho 'phrul cing yang snang zhing cir yang ston cho 'phrul chen po cir yang mdzad do// sgra cir yang rol pa'i cho 'phrul gyis/ rtag par longs spyod mdzad pas so// de
255b4(rnying rgyud): phyir sems dpa' chen po phyi'i spyod yul thams cad 'di ltar yin no// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzigs mo'o// yul lo// nga nyid las byung ba'i chos nyid do//
255b5(rnying rgyud): ye nas ma byung ba 'byung bar byed pa'i yul lo// ma byung ba 'byung bar byed pa'i dam tshig gi yul lo// phu gsung thugs mngon par bstan pa nyid do// sku gsung thugs mthar mi zad pa'i mdzod do// ston pa mthar mi zad pa'i don nyid do//
255b6(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs rol pa'i cho 'phrul chen po rol pa nyid do// rdzu 'phrul chen po nyid kyi rang bzhin ni nga'i mthu las byung ba nyid do// nga'i stongs las byung ba'i chos so// su gsung thugs mi zad pa'i rgyan gyi 'khor lo nyid do// gong gsum gyi stong chen
255b7(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad ni nga nyid kyi yul lo// babugs gnas so// gzhal yas khang ngo // 'di dag thams cad ni nga'i sku'o// nga'i gsung ngo // nga'i thugs so// stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams la
256a1(rnying rgyud): ngas rnams cadan/ sangs rgyas byas rdzogs pa can pa ta dad // sangs rgyas cad do// byang chub chen por rdzogs pa nyid do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dang chen pa nyid // byang chub rgyas nyid do// byang chub byas lapa rmad
256a2(rnying rgyud): du 'a ba thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yin no// rmad du byung ba nyid do// gsung dad du stong ba nyid yin no// thugs yad du blang ba nyid yin no// chos rmad du byung ba nyid yin no// gsangab rmed du byung ba nyid yin no// rol band du byung ba
256a3(rnying rgyud): yin no// mdzad pa rmad du byung ba nyid yin no// rdzu 'phrul med du byung ba nyid yin no// byang chub sems phrad du byung ba yang 'di nyid yin no// sangs rgyas kyis chen po rmad du gyur pa yang 'di nyid yin no// sangs rgyas rnams kyi lte ba rmang du
256a4(rnying rgyud): byung ba yang ji di nyid yin no// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yongasu spyod ma thar phyin pa yang 'di nyid yin no// stan po phun sum tshogs pas bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa yang 'di yin no// nyen pa phun sum tshogs pas nyan pa yang 'di
256a5(rnying rgyud): nying ngo // sangs rgyas rnams kyi bde ba chen po yang 'di nyid do// sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'dod pa ma yon tan lnga yang 'di nyid yin no// 'dod yon lnga'i mtshan nyid dbyang meng du byung ba 'di nyid yin no// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs mthar thug
256a6(rnying rgyud): pa yang 'di nyid yin no// sku'i sprul pa'i chos nyid pha rol pa'i cho 'phrul sbyin chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i chos nyid kyi 'khong lo yang chung du zung du 'di nyid yin do// 'dong ba yang chos nyid ma rig pas 'khod shid ces nyid la tshas nyid gnas
256a7(rnying rgyud): pa yang rmad du byung ba 'di nyid yin no// sku gsung thugs las ma gtogs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 'khor ba dang nyon mongs pa'i ming yang med do// sangs rgyas 'byung ba las ma gtogs pa sems cad
256b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i ming yang med do// su snang ba las ma gtogs pa sems can gyi rang bzhin dang / chen po lnga ye nas med do// sangs rgyas kyi bde ba chen po las ma gtogs par sems can dang sdug bsngal ming yang med do// sangs rgyas kyi nges pa'i sa chen
256b2(rnying rgyud): po rdzogs pa gcig pu las ma gtogs par/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gyi yul dang gnas nyid las med bsang las byung ba'i chos las sems can gyi yul drang gnas med do// sku rmad du byang ba dang /
256b3(rnying rgyud): byang chub kyi sems rmad du med pa'i rang bzhin bstan pas nges pa'i gsang ba'i man ngag bstan pa'o// sems dpa' chen po/ rgyal ba rnams kyi su sna tshag bcing yang snad da ni/ kun tu rin chen lta bu ste/ zhes gsungs pa yinan/
256b4(rnying rgyud): bya'i kha dog ji ltar sna tshogs cir yang rol pa ni rin chen dang 'dra ste/ rin po che dkar po yang rin po che'o// dmar po dang ser po dang sngon po dang / ljang gu la sogs pa ni kha dog ci 'dra yang rin po che nyid do// 'di ni rin po che yin la
256b5(rnying rgyud): 'di ni rin po che min pa ni ma yin no// de bzhin du rgyal ba rnams kyi sku yang kha dog thams cad du snang ba dang / dbyibs thams cad ji lta bur 'dug pa dang / dri ci ma nam pa dang / ro ji ltar dro ba dang / gzugs ji ltar sdang ba dang / sgra ji
256b6(rnying rgyud): ltar thos pa dang / reg bya ji ltar tshor ba thams cad nyid kyi sku yin te/ kyal ba'i rgyal ba rnams kyi su yin gyi kha dog dang dbyibs 'di ni rgyal ba'i sgra yin/ 'di ni ma yin pa lta bu ni ma yin no// de'i phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes sku//
256b7(rnying rgyud): tshogs gzugs can yid las kyis/ zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs ni ye shes 'argyad so sor dbyer med pa gang gis mi chod pa'i don rig pa'i ye shes kyi bu dang gnyis su med par shar ba ni thags so// sems
257a1(rnying rgyud): dbang rdzun mA/ sta gsum gyi stong chen po 'dzi rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cadan bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs las byung shang / thugs nyid las dbyar ba med do// de gnan gzugs pa dang du
257a2(rnying rgyud): pad pa'i mtha' med pas/ stong gsun gyi yin po 'jig rten gyi dam pa mthar yin mya dang mang ze nga bar ba'i dus med/ ti gsus kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas tha med bya la na stongs pa'i dus mang ben pa
257a3(rnying rgyud): bad ga shegs pa rnams kyi bu dang ga snang dang thugra shi med te/ thug sang thags na sa pa'i dus med pa nyid dza zung du yid / ra zhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bu dang gsung dang thad sa las pa gtog sa bar snying gsum gzhanan med
257a4(rnying rgyud): du na sa sa nan sus sna da/
257a5(rnying rgyud): nin nyid rje chags cing yang 'byung bdang / sring dang tshig sa pa dubs ma sogs pad+ma/ tha med mang po 'byung brnams pa gtsang dum byung pa na cin kya ma da/ b+hu rang thugapa nyid gsung de// gsang thungs nyid na yin
257a6(rnying rgyud): ga par 'thugs// myong ba'i 'dudu / 'ded nyid me das dag rkye// bdag nyid du gsum s+ho// 'byung du ba'ad sa/ yin ma rdzos pa //
257b1(rnying rgyud): pas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sgra/ bya rtsol med pas snying po byang chub smra'o// chos chen pa rmad du byung ba las/ su gsung thugs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / sems dpa' chen do/ 'dod chags dang na zhe sdang dang /
257b2(rnying rgyud): mug dmyal phrag dog ni// rngan theg pa chen po nyid// snying rje med par gsod pa dang // 'jigs pa med par sbyor ba dang // gtsang sde med par za ba dang // rang gi khu bas dang mchod pa// rdo rje rdeg pa'i chos nyid yin// sems
257b3(rnying rgyud): brtse ba med pa dang // ma byin len dang ma tshangs spyod // gzhan la spong bar mi byed pa// rdo rje theg pa'i dam tshig ste// ji snyed rang byung byang chub sems// bde ba gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor la// rgyal ba bdag nyid rtag par bakhrugs/
257b4(rnying rgyud): rje theg pa gsang ba rmad du byung ba'o// gang zhig byang chub mchog 'dod pa// rtag tu bdag nyid mchod par bya// mchod pa kun gyis rtag tu mchod// yid bzhin rin chen la sogs rnams// sangs rgyas 'dod na bdag nyid mchod// sangs rgyas zhing
257b5(rnying rgyud): khams thams cad du// bdag cag kun gyi lha yin pas// kun gyi mchod pas bdag la mchod// sems can thams cad bsad nas ni// rgyal ba mnyes te sras su skye// 'dod chags 'dod pas rtag tu sbyin// 'di ni gsang ba'i byang
257b6(rnying rgyud): chub sems// sangs rgyas nyid du chud mi za// de ni sangs rgyas dngos grub yin// yos grub bdag la yod pa'i phyir// yid du 'ong ba'i bdag nyid bsgom// mkhas pas mchod pa bdag las byung // bdag las byung ba'i mchod pa
257b7(rnying rgyud): rnams// bdag nyid bdag la mchod par bya// mkhas pas bdag gi khu ba dag/ sbyor 'di don gyi rtag tu dbyung // 'di ni sangs rgyas 'dag nyid yin// spyod pa mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o// 'di ni rdo rje theg pa'i spyod pa rmang dbar
258a1(rnying rgyud): chos chen po thad du byung ba las/ rmad du byung ba bstan pa'i 'du ste bcu gcig pa'o// / bdag las byung ba'i khwa ba yis// bdag gi lus lnga rab bstan nas// sangs rgyas mthong bas yang da'ong // 'jig
258a2(rnying rgyud): rten khams rnams dbang gyur pa// nga g-i zhes nyid sngags kyi lha// rtag par mchod na sangs rgyas 'grub// gang gis mchod pas dngos gru thob// dag dang yid kyang phyag rgya yis// spyod pa ci yang sprul pa'i phra// dad k+tab mchog rnams
258a3(rnying rgyud): bdag las byung // byang chub myur du thob pa yin// lus dang ngag dang gsang ba'i sngags// nam mkha' bzhin du mnyam par gnas// sems la dmigs pa bdag med pa// lha yi ting 'dzin gsang ba'i sngags// ngo bo nyid kyis dmig
258a4(rnying rgyud): su med/ kye sems dpa' chen pa/ nga byang chub kyi snying po na bzhugs pa'i stong pa'i chos la stong pa'i chos med de mi gnas so// byang chub sems la byang chub tu bsgrub pa'i sems med de mi gnas so// srid pa'i chos thams cad la srid pa mi
258a5(rnying rgyud): de mi gnas so// chos pa sems med pas rnam par dag pa la gnyis med do// sems can thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir/ yid la byed par mngon par sangs rgyas so// sems can gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor gyi ye
258a6(rnying rgyud): sa sa ma
258a7(rnying rgyud): pa gsang ba chen po nyid do// sems dpa' chen po/ sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub kyi sems 'di ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi thugs pas byung ba nyid yin no// de'i phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub sems/ sangs rgyas kun bya thags la gnas/
258b1(rnying rgyud): nAshAn du dun/ / dasung dun sa na na pa smra na sasas s+ho// 'dus rnas rdzu // sasus na gas// papa da ga
258b2(rnying rgyud): na sa// / phyi dag/ rnab na ga
258b3(rnying rgyud): lags sa ra pa'i / / nga ba 'ing ga na di dag
258b4(rnying rgyud): du mi da nga
258b5(rnying rgyud): phyigapas sa sgru sa da na sasas
258b6(rnying rgyud): bAdang gsang mo// da' donani bkri don ma yin gyi ngas pa'i don gtan ma paphe dz+dza// dri la drang bar gshegs pa rnams da / rjod bza dam mkha' ba rgyas pa'i 'o// ting gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham sum lus lus pa
258b7(rnying rgyud): me pa thams cad dadag rkyen te gsung zugs pa 'du // sregasang zugs sa do ni 'i 'i ma so ma sogs gang 'i 'o mi ni ma gying di sa 'o// sug sung thog sasu ma byung bami nges par thus pa'i chos gcig
259a1(rnying rgyud): med pas su gsung thugs spyan gyis rdzogs par gtan la phab pa'o// de'i phyir rdo rje'i chos so// rdo rje'i theg pa'o// lung 'dibaskum pa las shes par gyur// bsgom pa ni lha dang bdag tu don gcig pas
259a2(rnying rgyud): gnyis su med pa la bya'o// shes par bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi don ma nor bar shes pa dang / bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin shes par bya ba dang / blta ba ma nor bar shes par bya ba dang / rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs gsang ba'i rgyud ma nong bar
259a3(rnying rgyud): shes par bya ba dang / rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin shes par bya ba dang / rdo rje sems dpa'i yon tan dang / rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam par rol pa chen po ma nor par shes pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / chos nyid la longs spyod chen
259a4(rnying rgyud): pos mnga' mdzad pa'i don ma nor bar shes par bya'o// nges pa'i gsang ba'i man ngag ni rmad du gyung ba'i don no// rmad du byung ba gsang ba ni thams cad bdag nyid las byung zhing bdag nyid kyis mdzad/ bdag nyid las spros shing bdag nyid de la
259a5(rnying rgyud): lo// bdag las sprul zhing bdag nyid yongs su spyad/ bdag nyid las byung ba'i chos la bdag nyid longs spyod mdzad/ bdag nyid kyi yon tan las bdag nyid che ba ston/ bdag nyid las byung ba'i chos rnams la bdag nyid ston par
259a6(rnying rgyud): byed/ slar yang bdag nyid kyi dbyings su 'dus te/ bdag nyid las ma byung ba'am/ bdag nyid du ma gyur pa gcig kyang med do// chos chen po rmad du byung ba las/ gsang ba rmad du byung ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//
259a7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs ni gang // bde gshegs thams cad 'byung gnas so// sems can gyi rnam par shes pa brgyad po ni/ gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor ye shes rang las byung ba ye shes kyi lha nyid do// rnam thar shes pa'i yul brgyad
259b1(rnying rgyud): ni/ mdzang pa'i lham bcad dang / dang sa thub ma rdzas brgya dang // sanas dpa' chen brgal te/ shas rab zab man sgo dang / gsang chud mthur ma 'gog pa lan dang / mas kyang khor lo mthar bskor ba'i wa dang / grwa gsung rdugs nyid du
