283a6(rnying rgyud): rmad du byung ba byang chub kyi sems chos kyi su ye shes kyi 'od ni de tsam mo// de bzhin ye shes kyi 'od kyang bsam gyis mi khrang / sred gsum nam mkha'i khams pas 'od lung gsal/ bskal pa'i zhing rnams rab 'byams ji tsam gyis// sems
283a7(rnying rgyud): can kun la thugs rje'i 'od de tsam// bskyod dang mi bskyod g.yo dang mi g.yo ba'i/ blo dang rig pa'i 'od kyang rmad du byung ngo // zhes bka' stsal to// de snyed sangs rgyas kyi 'od 'byung ba ni mi che'o// rang rig pa'i ye shes kyi 'od ni shin
283b1(rnying rgyud): gsar lo// de'i phyir nam mtha' da nyi/ 'i 'od 'drab ma yin pas/ 'od 'di kun dang thun mong min zhes bka' stsal to// byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba las/ 'od kyi khyad par gyi ba kye+e ni thu bdun pa'o// / le'u 'di las 'khor bang /
283b2(rnying rgyud): lam lnga ston te/ de nas yang rdo rje sems dpas zhus pa/ 'khor ba'i lam ldagang pags/ ston pa kun rig chos kyi rjes bka' stsal pa// 'dod chags kyis ni blang bar bya// lde rnga dgis ni gas par bya// phrag dog gis ni dbye bar bya// dargyal
283b3(rnying rgyud): gyis ni brdeg par bya// gti mug chos su lam bstan to// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal phrag dog 'di rnams kun// ma rig dug gsum chub ste// rig na byang chub lam yin no// rin chen dpal dang chags med grub// rdo rje de bzhin
283b4(rnying rgyud): gshegs par snang // 'khor ba'i lam lngar bstan pa ste/ byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba las/ 'khor ba'i lam lnga ston pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// / le'u 'di las 'khor ba'i lam lnga nyid// rigs lnga yab yum la'i
283b5(rnying rgyud): dbyings su bstan pa ste/ yang rdo rje sems dpas tshig le'u gong ma de brtan te zhus pa las/ kun rig chos kyi rje ston pas bka' stsal pa// ma byin len pa sa yin te// mi tshangs spyod pa chu yin no// rdzun du sla brlung yin te// gsod par byed pa me yin no//
283b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings su bstan/ zhes bka' stsal to// byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba las/ lam lnga nyid rigs lnga yab yum gyi dbyings su bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// / le'u 'dis 'khor ba'i
283b7(rnying rgyud): rgyu 'bras nyid ye nas dag pa'i rgyu ma chags pa'i zhing du gnas par lung bstan pa ste/ dug gsum rtsib bcad pas khams gsum 'khor ba'i chu 'bras med/ srog med gsod par byed pa haM ru/ chags med 'dzin dang 'khor bas 'chi med dur khrod chen po brgyad/
284a1(rnying rgyud): mi 'jug mi 'byung yul med dbang po spyong// phye na / thug med pas rgya ma nang pa nyid// sgyu gsung thugs dang thal bas che ba'i mchog/ sngags dang phyag rgyar bral bas nyams pa med// che ba'i chen mo
284a2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pas rmad du byung / zhes bud+d+ha kun rig chos kyi rjes bka' stsal to// byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba las/ 'khor ba'i chu 'bras nyid dag pa'i le'u ste sum cu ba'o// / le'u 'dis 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das
284a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i dbyings su bstan pa ste/ ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen pos/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i dbyings su gnas par gzigs nas/ gnyis
284a4(rnying rgyud): med pa'i don rtogs te thugs su chud nas/ 'gro ba dang chos nyid/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis su med pa'i don rtogs nas/ la bzlas te mi g.yo ba'i tshul du bzhugs pa las/ byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba'i don dbus mtha'
284a5(rnying rgyud): med par bstan pa'o// byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba las/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan pas 'das pa'i chos thams cad rnams bdag pa'i le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o// / le'u 'dis ye gnas chen po'i rang bzhin du gnas par bstan te/
284a6(rnying rgyud): de yang chos nyid byang chub chen por rang bzhin du gnas paM dang / dbyings dang ye shes 'du 'thal med par gnas pa pas/ cho ga thabs kyi don ni a ti lo bar 'dus par ston la/ a ti yo ga'i don ni byang chub sems cad du byung bar 'dus pa ston to/
284a7(rnying rgyud): chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba las/ chos nyid rang bzhin du gnas pa'i le'u ste sum du gnyis pa'o// / le'u 'dis chos thams cad yenas sangs rgyas dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings na/ mi g.yo ba'i rgyal por
284b1(rnying rgyud): nas sangs rgyas te mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings nas/ mi dmigs pa'i rgyal po la/ tha 'og dang phyogs rma med par bzhugs kyang / ye shes kyi thugs rje chen pas/ sbal pa rnam pa sna tshogs car yang mdzad par ston pa ni thams cad dag par
284b2(rnying rgyud): du skyor zhing / thams cad dag pa'i dbyings su ston cing bzhugs so// de nyid kyang khams gsum las 'das shing / mi 'pho ma 'gyur mi 'khor mi gnas pa'i rin po che kun tu bzang po'i dadi la gnas so// byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba las/
284b3(rnying rgyud): yaM nas mi g.yo ba'i le'u ste sum cu gsum ba'o// / le'u 'dis bde ba chen po'i dbyings kyi grong nas/ sra 'od dang gsung gi zer las ji ltar 'byung ba bstan te/ byang chub kyi sems bde bachen po'i klong nas/ sgo'i 'od dang gsung
284b4(rnying rgyud): gzeng las/ kun dag chos kyi rgyal pos/ yum 'dod pa'i dbang mo la gnyis su med par gnas shing / sdong srid thams cad thugs rje'i dang du gyur te/ yang 'khor ba'i chos dang srid pa kun yang dag pa'i byang chub tu bstan to// byang chub kyi
284b5(rnying rgyud): sa sa sa du sa
284b6(rnying rgyud): gsum ste/ yaM nas sangs rgyas pa'i dbyings nas/ mi dmigs pa'i rgyal po rtog pa'i mnga' bar thugs ye shes su gyur par bzhugs pa dang / srid pa gsum dus gcig tu gsal bar mkhyen pa po shes ma 'gags pa dang / zhing dag par mkhyen pa
284b7(rnying rgyud): dang / thangs cad kyi spyo nga dung dbyung ba // de nyer kun gyi snying por byungs/ spu nga ye shes kyi rgyas nyid do// byang chub kyi sems myed dbyung ba las/ chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i le'u phye sum gyur pa'o// / le'u 'dus

285a2(rnying rgyud): smra sa
285a3(rnying rgyud): sa
285a4(rnying rgyud): pa nga / sa
285a5(rnying rgyud): mdzem da / man nga /

285a7(rnying rgyud): ngas sa
285b1(rnying rgyud): bstan pa dang / phung po khams dang skye mched lha'i / phyag rgya chen por bsgoms pas/ bus gsum du 'dus ma byas pa'i snying po ye shes kyi rig pa tsit+ta'i dkyil du 'char bar bstan pa'o// byang chub sems kyi mthar thug pa med pa lnga yang ngan lca /
285b2(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab tu bsgoms pas/ rigs lnga sangs rgyas kyi sgra mdog dang bzhugs tshul bstan pa'o// dbyings dang ye shes su gsal bas/ suM'i dngos po dang bral bas rigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin spangs pas/ thams cad 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
285b3(rnying rgyud): bstan pa dang / shes pa dang shes bya rtogs pas sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa ma 'dres par don thugs su chud par bstan pa dang / nam mkha' lta bur kun la/ b+hab cing / re dogs dang 'khor ba'i chos med par bstan pa dang / rang gi rig pa'i byang chub kyi
285b4(rnying rgyud): sems rtogs pa'i 'bras bu dus gsum mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'o// byang chub kyi sems khyab gdo la chen po la yang don drug ste/ gsang ba ma tshig gi dkying 'khor gyi don rtogs pas na ngan pa'i dbyed bgrod par bstan pa dang / 'du 'bral med pa
285b5(rnying rgyud): dron bya rol las 'das par bstan pa dang / lung gi sha zang phye nas man ngag gi thog tu 'bebs par bstan pa dang / dam tshig gi sdom pa la gnas shing su gsung thugs kyi 'bras bu thob par bstan pa dang / rgyal ba thams cad kyi gter byang chub
285b6(rnying rgyud): sems rmad du byung ba yin par bstan pa dang / chu 'bras kyi chos thams cad ji ltar bstan kyang sems nyid ma skyes pa las skye ba'i cho 'phrul 'byung bar bstan 'a'o// byang chub kyi sems mya ngan las 'das par bstan pa pa yang do na rnam pa
285b7(rnying rgyud): ste/ ye nas sangs rgyas te mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings na mi dmigs pa'i rgyal po'i phyogs cha med par 'azhugs kyang / thugs rje chen po'i skul ba cing yang mdzad par bstan pa dang / thams cad dag pa'i zhing du grol zhing yum
286a1(rnying rgyud): lhums su byung bas khams gsum lus sa zin stor bstan pa dang / ma 'a mi 'gyur ma 'khor mi gnas pas sems ma nang b.rang bya'i dngalas g.yos pa medangar bstan pa'o//
286a2(rnying rgyud): drub kyi sems stong pa chen por la bzla ba la don rnam pa gnyis te/ bde ba chen po'i klong na mu'i 'od la bzhugs shing gdung gi zer pha rol pa bstan pa dang / kun rig chos kyi rgyal po yum 'dod pa'i dbang mo dang gnyis su med par bstan pa'o//
286a3(rnying rgyud): chub kyi sems ye nas sangs rgyas rtag pa gzhung drung du bstan pa la yang don rnam pa bdun te/ zheng bcu lang sangs rgyas kyi sar bstan pa dang / snang srid rnams cung thugs rje chen po'i dang du bstan pa dang / 'khor ba'i chos thams cad byang chub
286a4(rnying rgyud): sa dun pa dang / slo shing da shing ma gang brtan pa dang / rgyang ba rjes bya ma kham 'du ba snyoms su bden pa dang/ gdang yig spyod sgru phyis 'das par da pa dang / spyong pa la dang bya gang chababad dag/
286a5(rnying rgyud): chu brdzus po'i thig la tes tshad kyi mtha' ngas 'dus byar bstan pad+mo// byang chub kyi snyoms med du byung ba las/ dgos tshad kyi le ste sum cu drug pa'o// / la~M 'dis byang chub sems rmed du gyur ba'i ngas chog bstan te/ de yang byung ba ni/
286a6(rnying rgyud): ni til la mar gyis khyab pa dang 'dra bar/ thams cad kyi bcud du gyur te/ lhun gyis gnas pa'i chos nyid kun gyi snying ngo po/ sru dang ye shes kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pas chub pa/ sems ni rtogs pa'i ye shes su gyur pas/ kun gzhi gsang
286b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbyings na ma bslad pa'i don/ rtsol du med pa'i nor bu rin po che rang bzhin dang kha dog tu 'od gsal ba ni/ sems lcib med pa yin la/ bde ba ni su gsum cig car rdzogs te chos kyi dbyings su dag pas ni/ dgyes pa chen por bzhugs
286b2(rnying rgyud): pas bde ba yin pa/ chen po ni gnyen po gang gis kyang bcos su med pas/ nam mkha' ltung tshul ma ltos ye nas dag/ rkyen dang ma bral ye nas gnas/ rdzas dang mtshan ma la ngag lus te/ gong nas bzlang med pas chen po yin no// thugs
286b3(rnying rgyud): la yang don gsum ste/ kun la 'jug pa dang yid kyi mtshan nyid dang / rig pa'i ye shes so// yu la yang gsum ste/ klong yangs pa'i mkha' dang / kun bde ba'i sku dang / byang chub sems rdo rje ngo // gsung la yang gsum ste/
286b4(rnying rgyud): nges pa'i tshig dang / brjod par bya ba dang / thams cad du spros pa'o// byang chub sems rmad du byung ba 'dis/ khams gsum dbang du sdud de/ thams cad kyi srog 'dzin pa'i phyir kun du bzang mo'i mkha' phyag rgya mtsho'i dbyings su thim pa/
286b5(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs spyan gyis grub ste/ bya stsol las 'das nas/ dgra pa'i rgyal po rang dbang du gyur te/ ye shes kyi snang bzed po rang lang char ba'i phyir/ kun tu bzang po'i mkha' bdang chen po'i klong du bsdus so// de gnyis su med pa pas/
286b6(rnying rgyud): sems rin po che skye ba med pa'i don phyin ci ma log pa tshig dang yi ge'i mchen ma las 'das te/ rang bzhin dang kha dog tsor yang ston cing 'gyur ba med pa'i dbyings bde ba chen po'i klong yangs pa na/ rtag pa chen po g.yung dung gi sku bzhugs so// bya
286b7(rnying rgyud): chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba las/ byang chub sems kyi nges tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste sum du bdun pa'o// / le'u 'di las byang chub sems rmad du byung ba'i yon tan bsten te/ byang chub sems bsgom pa'i don bstan pa/ gzhung nas/
287a1(rnying rgyud): bams gsas pa can rtod pa'i mi zhes 'byung ba// dper nga/ tha cwa bams cad du byung ba'i don rtogs pa na/ mchod dang mchong bu nong tha na cab yang / ba rgya lug shig tum 'on sa/ ridangal dung /
287a2(rnying rgyud): de sro rgyang mdzanan// rnyedang 'dru ba byang chubs pas stong grong la shes mkha' la rol pa 'di de ngadu zhing ba ste/ khams gsumangon po ched mthong ya ldi pagasum yang rin po mer nu dpa la thuH// de bzhin slong ba skyed
287a3(rnying rgyud): pa kyi yang 'byung bgacag/ zhes / bya sa ma byung ba lam/ pa sbyi snyam na brjid pad-i// / di ngas sa dang 'i da / lung
287a4(rnying rgyud): las/ theg pa dmana'i thugs pa dang // ring gis / 'phang dum 'badang // thos pa ltung zhing sa mdang // bskrad pa'i tshig gis 'aN+Dalwa pa dang // slobs zhen dang pa chung ba dang // po theg che la rang phyogs can// bcad kyang dog/ mengs
287a5(rnying rgyud): bcings// dal drang kyang rjo myipa tu// bkangs rgyud ma gro bas// blo me thag rgya rdzogs pa / oMd+d+hi yo ga don ma bstan/ byang rgyab kyi sems rnyed ngadu byung ba las/ snod kyi skyon myed pa'i 'a rgya sum cu sa
287a6(rnying rgyud): ngan la 'das slob ma da bzung la rdzob par bye ba'i ga gsod la sa ma ma yin pa'i brgyad kyis pa da/ zung las// glang pos bawar na// dang thob la dang tibs pa sa /
287a7(rnying rgyud): rtsal grags 'di yang thun meng men// gangs kyis 'i gdangs rgyan// tshigs pa la dang gdangs mi mam// gang mi da 'di yang ba mong min// ma chen po rlabs mthong na// chuca pa la dang rngub ma pa // /
287b1(rnying rgyud): deyang ba mo son dargyal kun pa'i thor phyi na// zan pa la dang 'phrang mi mnyam// rnanal 'di yang bya mang min// mtha' gsul te/ 'damathang na// gzang ska bral dang 'dams nyan// 'dags pa 'di yang mang mon
287b2(rnying rgyud): 'ang ga ma ngan// 'du ba chags papa dang shugs samanyam// rnal grags 'di yang ldan po yin// de zlog pa'i gting mthod // bgagazhan pa ladang gting mamanyam// btid da gi 'di ya na mo dang /
287b3(rnying rgyud): sbyangs pa'i mkhas pa dang // thos pa chung ba'i blo sgram gnyis// 'gro ba'i don la do mimanyam// do pa rlog 'di yang thun mong min// rlud dbyung ba rdzogs so/ ba d+hA / sngag skad du/ t+ta N+ya Ar+tha NaH/ bod skad
287b4(rnying rgyud): byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di srid bdag gis thus pa'i dus gcig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams kyi
287b5(rnying rgyud): dbyer med pa'i bdag nyid/ gzugs can ma yin pa'i spyir ba/ yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas/ shes bya thamahA cad kyi rgyal po de bzhin nyid rnam par dag pa la yongs spyod pa/ longs stod pa'i mngon par byang chub pa'i sku dang / sprul ba
287b6(rnying rgyud): sus sogs pa kun g+hi pa ye shes rnam par dag pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid/ gang yang gnyis su med pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i kun tu bzang po'o// bcom ldan dngas thugs rje chen po'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ chos
287b7(rnying rgyud): thams cad te nge 'dzin la longs spyod chen po ma lus par myong bar mdzad pa'i longs spyod rnam par dag pa'i sgra ste/ mtshan dang po kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'o// mngon par byang chungab ba'i mi spying po las kyil gakhor byin pa'i sgo yi ta/ 'dod pams kyi
288a1(rnying rgyud): d+ha'i rgyal po dang / gzungs khams rtse b+ha'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor na/ don dung na bul sogs pa 'dakyil khong 'dzin pa'o// sprul pa'i spyani thabs mkhas pas gnas thams cad du migs pa pa da rgyunamo
288a2(rnying rgyud): chad byar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ sangs rgyas dang sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa mda' ba/ rtag dang mi rtag pa gnyis kyi gzhi' mdo bor gyur pas/ mtshan deng dpe byed kyis brgyan pa/ sku yongs su rdzogs pa'i zhal gyis/ chos thams
288a3(rnying rgyud): sasu mas
288a4(rnying rgyud): shes kyi dkyil 'khor rung byung gi dran dang rol pA la sogs pa de krigs par ra dbyung ba na gasngal lo// byang chub pa chen po'i sku ni ri ba ri hU~M bor rin po che'i khang pa nA zla brgyas pa m+b+ha 'i rgyal du zhal rab tu rgyas so// thabs mkhas pa spyod pa
288a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni/ g+ha rgo phung po'i rI la sngags kyi bad+mar bkram nas/ khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba'i cha lugs su bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po parjo grub

289a2(rnying rgyud): lapha rol phyin bcu rtogs// sa bcur ma gyis bgrang ba 'di// mnyam nyid rig pa'i ye shes kyis// sa rnams mnyam nyid thrig leng spyod// chos sku ye nas mi dmigs phyir// rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge dzin// kun gyi snying po mi 'dra ba

289a5(rnying rgyud): gzhin med pa'i don gyi mchog/ ces kyang mtshon du med pa srin// sangs rgyas kyis kyang rtogs par dka'// ud kyi rang bzhin zhi ba 'di// bsam zhing ma med lam mchog ste// mabyu mi skyes snying po 'di// mtshun ma nam mkha'
289a6(rnying rgyud): ga donas bya na // na pa bye nga l-i / nga gi ga ti mas// meg masas ba gas pa la // 'ang su kya thod don/ lab rigs zhen meng pa /
289a7(rnying rgyud): lan// togs ma theg tu go'i bang chen po yang // gleng dor med ba chos su dpag med za/ chub kyi sems med du byung ba'i drud las/ gling gi ni'i le'u rtse dang pa ma// / de nas bcom ldan 'das thabs la mkhas pa'i thugs
289b1(rnying rgyud): rje chen po'i bdag nyid kyis// zlab mo zab mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// sangs rgyas phul pa 'byung ba rnyed par dka'// yang dag rmad byung rtogs pa de yi char ma phod// dal ba 'byor pa rnyed pang rab tu dka'//
289b2(rnying rgyud): de bzhin sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// gsang ba rmad byung nyid kyis rab tu bsdus// chos kyi mtshan nyid ye nas rnam par dag/ bdag med ngo bo med pas rtogs par dka'// rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa// byang chub sems
289b3(rnying rgyud): nyid bskyed pa'i sems can ni// de dag shin tu rnyed par dka' ba ste// sems can sangs rgyas sems can ming med pas// sngon rol byung ba'i rmad byung byang chub sems// sems can sangs rgyas gang yin rtogs par dka'// byang chub
289b4(rnying rgyud): chos ni rmed byung rnam ma tog/ mya ngan 'das dang 'bang ba ye nas med// rmang kyang byang chub sems kyi myu gu la// 'byung ba lnga yang 'bras bu'i tshul du byud // sems can nams la snang du rje ba yis// sems can dga' sna par rab tu kA// sems
289b5(rnying rgyud): can gzhi rtsa med pa'i chos nyid 'di// skye dang 'jig thal byang chub sems nyid de// ye nas dgu ste rgyu 'bras yongs kyis med// kun grol rang la rdzogs pa'i lu nyid ni// dug gsum dug lnga'i thig le chen por 'khyilta// zhe sdang la sogs ming med pas//
289b6(rnying rgyud): rmad byung la sogs chos kyi mchog/ khyab cing brdal ba rnyogs par dka'// bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams kyi// sdig sogs bye brag bsam mi khyab// de bzhin rmed gyung sems nyid kyis// dug lnga bsad dar 'khor ba bsad// sangs rgyas la
289b7(rnying rgyud): sogs kun bsad pa'i// sdig pas mchog ni gos mi srid// gos su sdig med sdig kyang bsad// rmad byung byang chub sdig po che// sangs rgyas kun gyi nying sha can// dad pa'i stobs kyis bsod nams cher 'phags pas// don 'di yud tsam
290a1(rnying rgyud): rtags pakhrung bar 'phags// sos pa yo mnyam pa'i stong po la// bsod nams dpagan myed pa kun rtogs // ngalang mdu na la rnam par ngol// rlung byung byang chub sems 'dangangs padag
290a2(rnying rgyud): nas sangs rgyas sems can ming ma grags// cir yang 'phrul chen ston pa'i 'phrul po che// khams gsum kun rdzob khams gsum rin po che// chos 'di brtag par dka' phyir thams cad bdud kyi lus// sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
290a3(rnying rgyud): phra zhing zab mo kun gyi sa bon gyi// dus 'di sgyu ma yin pas gzhig nas de nyid la// brtags nas rang bzhin shes pa byang chub rmad// de phyir lus 'di brtags la rmad byung btsal bar byos/ gcig gi rang bzhin shes na kun gyi rang bzhin shes/
290a4(rnying rgyud): kun gyi rang bzhin rang bzhin nyid du gcig/ so sa ma yin tha dad min te rmad byung yin// byang chub rmad byung de bzhin gshegs pa'i sra// 'od dpag med pa'i chos sgra byang chub sems// che ba lnga yi snying po kha dog rdzogs// chos rnams thams cad
290a5(rnying rgyud): la// chen na rgyu byung // yang dag nga 'i dun sa ga // rdzogs kyis brgya sa brnyan ba bar nga // de rnabs la brten pa rnyed 'gyur// bteg pa dadaga' la bstan par da/ 'byi lta btan/
290a6(rnying rgyud): ye nas thar lam m+ba srung zhi ba'i rmang po che// sangs rgyas kun gyi lte ba'i dngos poste// d+hi mau sa bcu rdzogs pa'i dong byo che// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo bskong ba'i rtsibs dang ldan// nam mkha' sgru bu thams cad 'byung ba'i gzhin
290a7(rnying rgyud): byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba'i rgyud las/ zab mo brtag par dka' ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos/ bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du rjod pa
290b1(rnying rgyud): 'di brjo da // zhi ba zlum dbyang chub 'di sgo srur med// tha skad bral bas tshad mas gnang mi rung // ye nas zhabs de bzhin nyid mi gnas// 'dzin dang rtog pa zhes bya ting nge 'don// kun rdo ba dang ba'in gnas pas gdong nas bral// narlan
290b2(rnying rgyud): zhing brjod du med pa'i dbyings las 'das// mnyam med mi mnyam med pas bde ba'i klung // bya byed nad dang bral bas chos kyi su// der yang gnas med lhan rdzogs yangs pa'i sa// de la de bzhin kun 'byed ye grub 'bras// byang chub pa sngob
290b3(rnying rgyud): med pas byang chub nyid mi 'dod// ye nas rnam par dag pas mtshan mar bsgom dang bral// bya bral lta ba'i klung las ma nyams 'jug sgo med// thig le chen pos btab pa'i mchod pa'i kyang // snying po tshig bral dam pa nyid las 'dang bya
290b4(rnying rgyud): med// dkyil 'khor gsum gyi snying po nyid de bsngo dang bral// 'byung ba lha yi rtsa ba nyid de mtshon du med// sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ba'i chu de sa bon tshul// 'gyung ba nyid nas mkha' las 'ja' byung tshul du dbyer yang med// 'gro rnams
290b5(rnying rgyud): rgya mtsho chu bur kun 'dus dbyer med tshul du gcig/ thig le gcig tu bsdus pa'i zin chags nad dang bral// blang med dong ba med pas mya ngan 'das 'khor med// khams gsum ye sangs rgyas pas rigs med gcig gi dang // yang dag nyid
290b6(rnying rgyud): la yang dag nyid kyang rdzogs pas gti mug nyid// dmigs bya dmigs byed med pas thun pa'i sku// thig le bde chen sku ni thams cad spangs rgyas pas// sems can kun byasad thig le gcig tu zlum// chos zhugasal ba'i klang du kun ga
290b7(rnying rgyud): pas// mtshams med lnga spyad kun bzang yum la rol// sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan med kun sangs rgyas// de bzhin rgyas phyir dmigs spyod zos pa sangs rgyas nyid la rol// rmad byung byang chub nyid ni sangs rgyas zos pa'i lha// rigs
291a1(rnying rgyud): gcig rigs brgya sugasam su la sogs// mkhan pa ti kla gan sgyur rgyal du dang gis 'ar// stong po'i snying po rdorje snying po 'di ya skyes tshogs brgyas// dpyir ma byung 'dun snying po'i mad// rwa
291a2(rnying rgyud): nas dag pa'i klung du dbyer med kun bsdus pas// rmad byung byang chub sems kyi rgya mtsho yin// 'khor ba ming med mya ngan las 'das pas// rmad byung byang chub sems 'di yang dag rmad// bur med de bzhin nyid las ma nyams pas// rmad
291a3(rnying rgyud): byung byang chub sems nas 'das pha rol phyid// bdag dpe med nam ma kha'i rnyog 'das pas// ma byung byang chub sems ni rang bzhin med// phyi da nang med dus gcig rol mdzad pas// rma byung byang chub sems ni kun shing ma//
291a4(rnying rgyud): dgung po med nam mkha'i chog 'das pas// rma byung byang chub sems ni rang bzhin rang bzhin med// stong nyid de bzhin mi dmigs las 'das pas// dge sdig gnyis med byar med nyid kyi dang // gaN+DIg kyang skang gcig dpag tu med pa'i bde ba'i
291a5(rnying rgyud): mchog/ rmad byung byang chub sems de ldan rdzogs pas// dpe med byang chub sems la kun brlan byed// khams gsum ma lus gsod pa rgyal sas mchog/ rmad byung byang chub sems su kun gcig phyir// mchod pa'i sbyin gyis bdag mchod rgyal
291a6(rnying rgyud): ba mnyes// bden gnyis mi 'byed yang dag pa// sems can bas dang kran bzang mkha' la'o pa// mthong dang thos las 'das pa'i 'das pa la// gzhan du mi 'dod / de bzhin de gnas pas// rmad byung byang chub sems ni kun sbyor su// de bzhin kyang
291a7(rnying rgyud): las rgyal dang sems can ma mthong phyir// gling gnyis pasal du med de lam la spangs mi dgos// rmad byang de bzhin ma bcos par rkyen byung // yang dag yang dag nyid kyang ma mthong mang byung ste// 'bras bu'i 'bras de nyi nga 'gres pa nga/
291b1(rnying rgyud): de sbyor ba de brgyan pa'i ting 'don zhes byar// byang chub kyi sems mad du byung ba'i rgyud las/ mang du byung ba'i rang bzhin bde ba'i mchog yin pa'i le'u stegasas pa'o// / de nas bcom spyan 'das drapal rdon sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin pa can
291b2(rnying rgyud): pos// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po' shin tu dgyes pa'i spyan gdangs nas ye shes chen po'i mchod pas dgyes par mchod nas/ bcom ldan 'das yangs pa chen po byang chub ces bgyi ba'i tshig don ni gang lags/ khyod kyi byang chub ni gang
291b3(rnying rgyud): lags/ khyod kyi byang chub gang las thob nas byang chub rnyed lags/ chos rnams gang las nges par rnyed par bgyis na/ ma rtogs pa rnams kyis ji ltar rtog par 'gyur ba bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas yangs pa chen pos zhus pa'i don thugs su
291b4(rnying rgyud): chud nas/ byang chub chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas brjod par bya ba brjod pa// rmad byung byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid 'di// yi ge med pa'i don du grags pa'i phyir// ngo bo nyid med byang chub dang bral ba// lhun rdzogs rnam par
291b5(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i byang chub mchog/ brjod du med pa'i yi ge tshig dang bral// rgyal bas mtshon du med de sngags kyi zud// mi mnyam mnyam las 'das pa mchog gi lam// mnyam nyid 'dod pa grol bar dka'// de nyid rmad byung sgrib pa'i skyon chen yin//
291b6(rnying rgyud): mnyam nyid byang chub 'dod la byang chub bral// phung po skye mched khams bshig byang chub 'dod// byang chub yang dag de la ring ste byang chub nyams// sku gsung thugs bral de bzhin byang chub 'das// phung po rgya sogs dbang shig byang chub tu// grang
291b7(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa de mtshan ma nyid la 'dzin// mtshan med zhi ba de ni snying po ste// chos klu ye shes stong pa'i mtshan 'das pa// 'das pa'i 'das pa nyid de rgyal po'i tshul// ye shes snying po mchog tu gyur pas tshad mo'i lung // dbyer med dam par gcig
292a1(rnying rgyud): ma dun na/ du rdzun chubs sargyas brdzun// 'a na nas // gang ya chags ma dra ban// shA rgya rgya rnams kyi rang zhin 'ad/ ma
292a2(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa'i yu dang bra // bams pas rnyed pa'i yul med bsro myags nang // ye sangs rgyas pa kun gyi rang basbyin yin// de kyi gang yang ma spangs byang chub skyeng po ste// gcig bu 'i zhin dun gyi sna grub pas na// de bzhin ting rgyan
292a3(rnying rgyud): rdo dbyings la sogs pa// gang yang ma yin lhan cig ga rdzogs// rang thung byang chubs pa sa di rtogs te// 'phags pa'i 'as rab kyod pa shes nas rnyeng // gzhan kyis mi brgyad 'digs med na//
292a4(rnying rgyud): skye ngorje byung byang chub sems// nam mkha'i dang snre ba mi bskyod 'dong ba yang / ngo 'jig dbyer med dzu pa oM d+ha sa d+ya tab// byams 'jigs po da dpa' bos med kyis la// nyon mongs rnams kyang rtags pa sems pa dzin
292a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin med skye byang chu sems te di// phun dus theg pa rnam par dag pa'i sra// de bzhin sa yis sa rgya ma minan// rdzogs rten ma yin zin rdugs nang pa bal// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin rjong ngastsal te//
292a6(rnying rgyud): skye bo bi'i la ma pa ma// rtsol ba'i na mi tshangs ga gu mi hU~M// sum lasag dmang gnon pa / kyi bral ban yongs rdzogs snang // de ldan rdzogs rje bya bram ting
292a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i nga dzi bzhin du// chos rnams ming me dzi nyid rdzogs// 'jis gi kyi ma na ngad // sangs rgyas sems cad / ba tadangs yong ba myang gyur/
292b1(rnying rgyud): man// thabs dang thabs mkhas sko chags pa med// tha thal nags thabs la mkhas pa bzhin// rang bzhin kun rdzogs rna ba'i rang bzhin // skyo ma dmigs med thab sa mi thal ba yan+ta// ya sangs rgyas pas bzang pa' lam dang bar
292b2(rnying rgyud): thig le bum pas yang dag nyid du gcig/ ma bsdus de bzhin nyid du bsdus pa thabs kyi mchog/ bsam bdag pas rab tu byung ba'i mchog/ bsam pa sgron khur ba ni rang byang min// de bzhin rmad byung bde chen chos nyid 'di// bsam
292b3(rnying rgyud): dang bral zhing bsam pa las 'das pas// 'khor ba'i rtsa ba dregs pa'i rab mchog yin// zin rtsol nad dang ldan pa ma yin pas// yang dag yang dag rab kyi yang dag yin// 'du ba'i ting 'dzin 'du las 'das pas na// ting 'dzin rgyal
292b4(rnying rgyud): po zhes su rab tu grags// nye lam bder rdzogs lam nang bral ba yin// 'di la 'jug lta mi dgos ye nas zhugs// bsung dang dam tshig mi btsal stong las 'das// rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di// gnyis med sangs rgyas
292b5(rnying rgyud): med pa che ba yin// nyon mongs lnga yi rang bzhin gyis kyang ni// byang chub yongs su mol bar byed pa bzhin/ rdzogs mchog zad byung byang chub sems nyid 'di// rang bzhin nyid kyis rang bzhin nyid kyang tshol// btsal kyang rnyed pa'i dus med rang bzhin
292b6(rnying rgyud): nyid// rang bzhin rang bzhin nyid las ma nyams pas// lha dang sprod pa ting 'dzin dgongs pa'i klung // de la mi dgongs dgongs pa dgongs pa'i nad// gang la blta ba med pa de la lta ba gnas// khyod med ting 'dzin med pa'ang de bzhin no// bsgom
292b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i don ma rnyed pa'i drang srong rnams// bsgom chags nad dang bral ba dgongs pa'i gling // mi 'gyur zhe te'i zad 'arda ba bzhin du gnas// rmang zung byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin 'di// drang srong rgyal ba rnams kyi dgongs pa mchog/ dug gsum rdzogs
293a1(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas la 'di lhag yang/ byang chub kyi sems cad nga byung ba'i rgyud las/ lung gang pes mtshon pa dang lta rlung b+h+ri de 'dzin bstan pa'i ladus bzhi pa la// danas dzin 'dzin pa chen pos/ bam
293a2(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag btsal te/ shin tu 'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pas spyan gadrangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ba dngu 'tsho ba nyid ji lta bu lags/ chos rnam pa du bshad/ chos zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags/ bka'
293a3(rnying rgyud): rje dru gsol de skad ces gsol ba dang / yangs pa chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' snga baM/ skye ni za da pa yin gzhung gcig ste// 'khor ba med par myong du yongs mi 'da'// tsadz+nyAn 'das dang 'khor ba tha ma dang // de bzhin skye shig sa ni
293a4(rnying rgyud): med nyid tha dad kyang // rang bzhin gcig las ming btags tha dang snang // de bzhin snying po sgo phrag mi 'byed pa// theg pa mi tog grangs su tha dad kyang // rang bzhin nyid las ma nyams rang bzhin nyid// skye dang shi dang mya ngan 'das pa yang // ngo bo nyid
293a5(rnying rgyud): du gcig pas 'khor ba nyid// mi spong mi g.yo bag la gnas med de// gnas med pa la gnas pa gnas med gnas// mi mtshungs rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs nyid ni// thams cad ye chus btab pas khams gsum bung // tshig gi mtha' las
293a6(rnying rgyud): 'das pas cang ma mthong // skye ba zhes pa chos rnams 'byung ba'i gzhi// mya ngan 'das 'khor ldan pas med pa yin// mi spod gnas med gnas pa las kyang 'das// spyod las 'das pa'i ye shes rgyal pos 'phags// don dam kun rdzob mi 'gyed/
293a7(rnying rgyud): don dam med// don dam 'dod pas dam pa'i don mi rnyed// don dam med pa de la don yang gnas// sgo dang lung zhing rdo rje sra pa'i mchog/ mig yo mi 'gyur blun po'i tshul du gnas// 'di la gnas pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs// ma dang sring mo'i gzigs
293b1(rnying rgyud): padu zhin dbyings// dbyings dang dbyings rol mnam nyid ldan gnas pas// mya dngadu phreng mor sbyor ba rol ba'i mchog/ dag dang sdig tu ma mthong ma rgyas pas// sdig pa sbyang bas dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor ldan// sangs rgyas rnam pa ni/
293b2(rnying rgyud): yi chos bshad pas// thog med 'du shes mi bden tshor ba bral// sprul pas pha rol phyin drug gsung bar 'gyur// tshig tu bshad pas rmang byung don mi rnyed// yi ge'i mchog nyid yang dgra gsal ba nyid// yi ges thig bzhir brtags pa rmad
293b3(rnying rgyud): byung nyams// ston pas bshad pa don rtogs 'khrul pa'i lam// nad med pa na sman kyang mi dgos na// nad kyi don gyir sman dgos ji bzhin du// theg pa gzhan med pa na bla med 'di// bstan kyang mi dgos de bzhin gzhir gnas na//
293b4(rnying rgyud): bla med theg kyang bla med dag la snang // kun tu bzang po yangs pa'i rgyal pos kyang // ma gsung gsung du brjod du rdul tsam med// don 'di gang la snang ba tshul ba'i rgyal// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa the tshom shin tu chod nas yang gsol ba'i tshig btab
293b5(rnying rgyud): gyi brjod pa 'di brjod do// rmad byung bdag nyid sems can gyi mo'i chos// dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems nyid ni// rmad byung byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin te// nam mkha'i stong pa 'dra ste rtar yang med// ming yang med pas sems la
293b6(rnying rgyud): gnas pas na// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes su rab tu grag/ dka' thub dka' bas lus gdung phyag btsal klog/ 'chang dang 'dzin pas shes shing rnyed min te// rmad byung byang chub sems nyid rnyed pa ni// sems kyi rang bzhin ma nor gsal na go//
294a1(rnying rgyud): dka' thab la sogs byang chub zan pa'i gags// rdza ba tad spyo pazhin ga shugs pa'i tshul// nga// da las spyad \u0f7fyang ma dgos na// de 'drang srud du me pa thob par grags// rmang byung byang chub sems nangs
294a2(rnying rgyud): bskyed// rmad byung 'dzin pa dag shegasu las kya 'das// rgyal bas mi gzigs dang byed chen po'i tshong // ye shes rnyi 'di nordzogs pa'i mang po'i// gzhad nas mi 'byung du bzhi nyid kyis// rnams cad meng pa'i sngon du yi sangs rgya//
294a3(rnying rgyud): dus gsam sangs rgyas spyan gyi mas chen po// dmigs gnas bsgom du dngos po'i nga bdag/ phyag d+ha bsring du rang bzhin yenas te// bsnyen bkur pa/ du rnam dag yon tan myed// mi dmigs dge bya ba thams cad ldab/
294a4(rnying rgyud): mkha' mya dag pas mnyam dang mi mnyam rnams// sra yi sku ste sangs rgyas kun gyi sku// 'dzin pa phram yod pa'i shes pa 'ang che// de grib chen po steng du mi btu ba ltar// gzung 'dzin rtog pa phyag rgya'i srar bsgoms pas// thams cad sangs
294a5(rnying rgyud): rgyas r+b+bade byung ngo bor yang // chos sgyu ma lus bslus pa mthong myi 'gyur// srang srid lhar bsgom pa nyid rmang byung sbyin// rngang thung byang chub sems kyis phan las// gyi nang sdong brgyad 'bras bur rnam par smin// sa bon 'bras thar sming pa /
294a6(rnying rgyud): ser son gnas su dag pa'i gcig tshul ni/ mtsho ri lam ldan kun 'byu // srang 'dus la 'i chung dro ga cig 'dzu'o// byang chub gyis pas pad byu ba'i rgyung las/ dpelas 'dzis pa'i rdzas thams cad myong rje/
294a7(rnying rgyud): na nyid kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang posanyid zad du byung ba la gzigs nas brjod par bya ba brjod pa/ e me he byang chub sems dpa' chen pos kyang // chos gcig ma ga
294b1(rnying rgyud): chos la zad mtha' med// longs spyang rdzogs dang sprul pa'i srang dun// mngon par byang chub sras kyang chos gcig par// ma gzigs gzigs pa med pa rgyun dang ldan// mthun dpes btsun pa yang dag sangs rgyas med// mdza /
294b2(rnying rgyud): de nyid don gyi 'bras bur yang // su 'dod de la yang dag sangs rgyas ring // rmad byung byang chub dag pa yang sangs rgyas// kha dog dbyibs med mtshon pa las 'das te// gzhi med pa yi rtse gzhi kun gyi mchog/ lo ma'i rtsa ba rtsa ba'i lo ma'ang yin//
294b3(rnying rgyud): mkha' ltar mi 'dod de yang 'das pa nyid// rmad byung byang chub sems kyi chos gcig po// rnam par dag pa'i chos smra de nyid las// gzhan gyis reg cing myong ba ma yin phyir// sangs rgyas sras brdasu mtshan ma'i mtshan dpes brgyad//
294b4(rnying rgyud): mngon sum gnyis su de nyid su rnal ba// de la rmad byung 'di mi gnas te zin cha gra dang // snang stong ngo bo stong pa'ang 'di yi ston// rgyal ba'i rgyal ba zhes bya brjod du med// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis kyi tshig kyang zad// mtha' dang dbus
294b5(rnying rgyud): la mi gnas bde ba'i klung // khyab gdal byang chub mtha' lter dpag tu med// 'di nyid srur 'dong sgo srung 'khor lo bskor// 'di la gza' gtad rtog pa'i 'du mtshon can// thog mar 'dod pa 'khrul pa 'jig rten pa// su gsum sra
294b6(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs las shin tu ring // de nyid rmad byung 'di yi sgrib shing yin// chos kyi snying por gyur pa 'bras bu'i chos// snod bdung byang chub khams gsum ye rgyas btab// phyag rgya'i 'byung 'jug nyid kyi lto bar bstim// sgra yi bya byed rtsa nas bcang
294b7(rnying rgyud): de btang // 'khor ba dong spug sangs rgyas hub kyis rngubs// dge dang sdig par mi byed rnam par dag/ nga dang bdag med zhib chen po'i su// rigs dang ye shes kun gyi dur khrod brdal// khams gsum srid gsum nyid kyi sku la rdzog// bsod nams lhur rdzogs pa/

295b1(rnying rgyud): rtog pa yis// theg pa chen po chos kyi 'jug lam nyid// chos lam dam pa mi 'dzin rnam par spyod// byang chub nyid kyang mi 'dod blta ba'i mchog/ sangs rgyas sems can mi mthong bad ba'i shul// ye bsrungs/
295b2(rnying rgyud): rnam par dag pa'am phyal ba dang // blang dor 'du 'bral med par spyod pa dang // blta ba'i yul med stong pa dam pa dang // de bzhin nyid du'ang ma mthong bsgom pa'i mchog/ rmad byung rdzogs chen ngo bo nyid du gsungs// ye shes rgyal po mkha'
295b3(rnying rgyud): 'dra mtha' las 'das// drang srong de 'dzin pa la bsgom zhes bya// dmigs pas don la 'jug pas dgos pa gol// dmigs pas gza' gtad 'cha' ba gtan nas nyams// stong nyid de bzhin nyid blta lta ba lkugs// bde ba'i
295b4(rnying rgyud): shul lam 'dod pa lam thag ring // bsrung dang mi bsrung gnyis kyi dam tshig nyams// spyad dang mi skyed 'dzin pas thar lam 'gags// blta dang mi bkar mthong ba'i dam pa brlag/ bsgo ma dang mi bsgom gnyis kyi rtog mtha' med// rmad byung 'di
295b5(rnying rgyud): la 'di rnams spyir gyur pas// rmad byung mdzod chen ngo bo nyid las nyams// rmad byung byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// chos lam mi 'dzin yod me/ mtha' las 'das// 'das pa nyid kyang ye shes nyid yin pas// 'das dang ma 'ongs kun las
295b6(rnying rgyud): ye nas 'das// ston pa'i bstan pa 'di yi don mi rnyed// gzhan las rna ba'i thos su dngos po dag/ lce yi dbang pos brjod du tha skad bral// sngon da'i gsungs pa chos lam 'phrul pa ste// ji ltar bshad kyang rmad phyung don mi rnyed// zla ba chos gcig
295b7(rnying rgyud): mkha' la shar ba la// mdzub mos mtshon pas mthong tshul tsam du 'dzin// drang srong chen po rnams kyis ngan spyad pa// chog tu brjod pas ngo bo nyid gas nyams// yid la bsams pas chad pa'i mthar yang 'gro// med pa'i snying ba las ni yod pa'i
296a1(rnying rgyud): ldan/ sa rgya ga tu bajugs/ nga chub kyis mas rmad byung ba'i byu las// das pa
296a2(rnying rgyud): dang / mang ma ma nga dang / theg kyi pa'i dang/ galas gad pa da / kyang bgang bstan pa'i ba cu // dedas bcom ldan 'das da la tubazang bas/ skyon kyim ma
296a3(rnying rgyud): da kyis brjod par dbyas pa/ rlung byung byung masams lha nyam 'a ga ha~M// sras sems sangs nas yin par bye gas sh-i// d+hi la nig mi rtog sangs rgyas nyid// mtshan pas brgyan pa sa yin dmam kha'i tshug// de 'dus dbang pa'i slang/
296a4(rnying rgyud): yul gang yid min// dbang po'i rnam gas de lta de bzhin du// dbang po rnam par shes pa de gsum po// lce dang m-i'i byed de ba zhid lha'i bar bzhag// gsam po yul la yin pa mi lung byung // gleng yang min po'i rang bzhin du tsams/
296a5(rnying rgyud): lus sems mi bcos grod der dang bzhin pa zhag/ de 'dra'i slong la ma byung ti gnas pas// mtha' gnyis sbyin gyis gas par yongs 'gyur// swA gyi'i rgyal ba sams can sras gnas tshe// 'chi ba'i dus chu bag chags 'dri ldan pas/
296a6(rnying rgyud): dmathus sems can steng po rgyal bar gyur// rlung byung byang chub sepas dang bdag ldan // dgas drug nyi thos dag tu mi mthong bas// rigs drug tan thos dag tu bas pa med// sems nyan thos dag tu sras mthong ba// dri la skyon gis rlig
296a7(rnying rgyud): da pa gsu // dab kyilam nam ngas // bas pa chen pa'ig ma // mang bya rgyang chu sams kyid dgasun/ don pa dag la sbed par gyur // lang ba 'ang gang sa mas
296b1(rnying rgyud): byung byang chub sems kyi mthur ldan na// ma dang sring mo bu mo la sogs rnams// rma pung nyid las gzhan du mthong ba min// de 'dra sbyar ba dam pa nyid la sbar// ma sring bu mor mthong ba 'ching ba'i rgya// dper na rmi la man nem sring sgur byas pas//
296b2(rnying rgyud): sad pa'i tshe na lan gyis mi 'jigs so// yang dag don shes rmi lam sa da 'dra ste// yul du skyon gyis gos par 'gyur mi srid// rmad byung byang chub sems kyi don ldan na// dkyil 'khor phyag rgya bzhi ldan mthong mi 'gyur// dkyil 'khor
296b3(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor sus mthong ba// de la phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor ldan pas na// rmad byung de la mtshungs par yongs ma gsungs// dper na rmi lam nA ni de bzhin gshegs su mthong // sad pas bdag tu snang las gzhan mdo de// de bzhin
296b4(rnying rgyud): 'a nga drug / 'od pa yin byung ba rnag na rkye gyis mi gyu/ ma nga byung chubs myi gled sbya // dus pa
296b5(rnying rgyud): dge bar mthong mi 'gyur// dge rtsar mthong ba de la skyon yod 'gyur// dge rtsar ma mthong ba nyid byang chub mchog/ rmi lam na ni dgra dang 'bogs pa mthong // sad pa'i dus na de dang 'grogs mi 'gyur// dge rdzas 'jig rten 'di yi snyan dag thob/
296b6(rnying rgyud): rmad byung byang chub sems kyis ma zin na// sdug bsngal skye gzhi 'bras bu rmi lam 'dra// sems can rnams la snying rje brtse med cing // mtshams med lnga spyod nye lnga mi tshangs spyod// 'dod yon lnga rol gzhan lnga spong mi byed// rtag tu bdag mchod
296b7(rnying rgyud): gzhan du mi rigs pa// rmad byung byang chub zag chen dam tshig yin// dug lngas 'khor ba'i rgyun spyod byed pa yang // rmad byung byang chub nyid du yang dag gsungs// 'dod cing chags pa'ang rmad byung byang chub de// gzhan la sdang ba'i zhe sdang rmad
297a1(rnying rgyud): da ga gtos pargyad // bdag spyod zung // da na nang// su nga 'ad dang pa nga// ra
297a2(rnying rgyud): margyags pas dus mthang mang thos kyang // ru skang phral gang yang byin pa med// sa sa ng+yas can gyi da buni med rdzogs// nga sems kyi rtags pagings// bal ba brim gyi mas kyang bsreg tu med // sreng pa
297a3(rnying rgyud): kyi dus sang ba med// 'di gas bstan du gagag sa na mas pa med// srid pa 'a sa na dus sanas te// thams rgyad du byed chus ny-id / na ga zhagado na sadam par dag/ byung chu kyi sems rmad du snang ba
297a4(rnying rgyud): rgyung las/ skyon gad nas rnam pa dag pa'i len ste brgyad po'o// / de nas sems dpa' chen po ji rje theg pa la ga/ skabs/ yangs brgyad la ba tsam ldan mdzus mtshan ma nyid gsal ba bzhag nas// mtshan ma rnam par/
297a5(rnying rgyud): grol ba'i thabs bkang phul du gso// zhes gsol pas/ don mnyes te brjod pa/ mtshan can mtshan dpes btsun pa bsgom pa yi// yang dgra bde ba'i dkyil 'khor snying po nyid// mthong ba nyid du de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/
297a6(rnying rgyud): rmang byung nyid kyi sbrul blta 'do pas// snod man byang chung sems dpas pas drung // mtshan ma mtshan ma med pa'i rdzogangs 'das// nyid kyis brjod par bya ba brjod pa med// 'bras dang gas ba'i chos gnyis bsgos dgos te// gas/
297a7(rnying rgyud): badze gas mchog byang chub sems nyid de// rang srung dag pa'i dkyil 'khor dzin pa ni// grul pa'i 'byung lug ti la tshul du du// rang byung mchog ga rgyag // slod pa rgyas pa rnangs kyis slab tu dang // 'bras grags rdzag
297b1(rnying rgyud): bsgom pa'i chog rnams las// chad kyang ya rgyas sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di// lce med sangs rgyas kun gyi mes chen po// bslas pa'i ma bzhin gcig tu gnas pa las// chos rnams ma lus chos so rdzog pa rngur// thams cad rdzun par shes na 'jigs/
297b2(rnying rgyud): dang bral// ngo bo nyid kyi chos rnams mi lus stong // gal te ngo bo nyid kyi chos spangs na// sbyin la sogs pas mtho ris skye srid kyang // mthar zad 'bras bu brlag pa nyid du 'gyur// ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos nyid la// mi chags me gnas
297b3(rnying rgyud): nyid mya ngan 'das// rmad byung byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// ngo bo nyid 'das lam rdzogs rnam par dag/ sangs rgyas mi 'dod sangs rgyas sa las 'das// sangs rgyas sgos las dga' la phyag rgya gsum// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin gnyis
297b4(rnying rgyud): su med// chos kyi rang bzhin gcig tu zad pa yin// rang bzhin gcig pa nyid kyang yod mon te// rang bzhin nyid kyis gnas shing chags pa med// mtshan ma can gyi chos ni 'jig rten gyi// lam dang 'bras bu yin te zad yod phyir// bla na med
297b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur// rmad byung 'dzin chos kyi rang bzhin dang // gcig pa nyid kyang mi 'dod dbyings las 'das// sangs rgyas phyag rgya mi 'dod ye rgyas btab// khams gsum ye nas sangs rgyas chos sgrar zhi// mya ngan 'das pa 'das
297b6(rnying rgyud): pa nyid kyang 'das// yon tan nyid kyi phung po rdo rje'i sku// ci yang 'du 'bral med pa'i brtson 'grus can// ngo bo nyid khru zag med rang bzhin bral// gzhal yas me 'od 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor can// nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi ltar 'phro ba'i bdag/ chos
297b7(rnying rgyud): kyi lam la 'jug pa'i mi zhig gis// lus dang sems la bslab pa cher byas te// phyi rol sangs rgyas mi btsal rnyed mi 'gyur// sems can nyid ni kun tu bzang por gsungs// nang gi nang la de bzhin blta bar bya'o// byang chub kyi sems med du
298a1(rnying rgyud): byung ba'i rgyud las// mtshan ma med pa grub pa dang // theg pa chen po la khyad par 'phags pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos nyid la nyid brjod par byas pa/
298a2(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang po bde ba chen po'i sku// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen por ni// 'khor ba chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// byang chub sems la sbyor ba ma yin par// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba rdul yang med// yang dag ye sangs rgyas pa ma
298a3(rnying rgyud): gtogs par// dmyal ba'i ming med ma rig pa'ang med// dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa thams cad dang // rigs drug 'jig rten 'byung ba lha sogs rnams// byang chub sems kyi rin chen sbom du zug/ dog 'tsher mi mnga' thigs/
298a4(rnying rgyud): pas snod bkang tshul// e ma re mdzes bdag nyid bstan pa'i chos// byang chub sems kyi chos gcig ma gtogs par// chos dang chos gzhan med pa ngo mtshar che// sems kyi rang bzhin gnas med yul med par// dus gsum sangs
298a5(rnying rgyud): rgyas chags pa ngo mtshar che// rang rig byang chub sems las ma gtogs pa'i// kun bzang gzhan nas rnyed par mi 'gyur bas// sngon chad ma rig ma mthong ngo mtshar che// bden gnyis rgyu 'bras yongs kyi sa med pa// bslu ba'i rmi lam bzhin gyi
298a6(rnying rgyud): kun rdzob spyod// don dam bden pa ma rtogs ngo mtshar che// 'ching byed dmyal rgyu dug lnga gzhan rtogs pas// byang chub chen po'i byang chub chen po ru// dug lnga rgyas par gyur pa ngo mtshar che// sdug bsngal sdig pa mi dge ci spyod kyang // rnam
298a7(rnying rgyud): grol blo mod sangs rgyas nyid yin pas// pad bzhin skyon gyis mgos ngo mtshar che// dmyal hU~M mi dge sna tshogs spyod pa dang // mi gtsang zas zos bshad ba kun sbyar yang // kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa bdag nyid pas// rgyu yi 'bras bur mi
298b1(rnying rgyud): skyedadu mnang bya// nyamang man med dmyal ba'i gnas rnams kyad // ts+tsha bzang ba ga ma las// dmyal pa gnas byong rgyang chubs mas rgyal la// 'du na byang gdas das // gan mun sun pa la gas
298b2(rnying rgyud): 'bum gyis kyang / snyed byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin la// bcung gang rims dang thob par mi 'gyur gyi// ma bsdus rang bzhin bsdus pa mtshang // ma ma rab tu gsung bar chos rkyen po// de bzhin gshegs pas sa sa pa gang yang ma
298b3(rnying rgyud): thig le yongs kyi theg pa mi man mA he// gzhan dang thun mong ma yin ngo mtshur che// sngags kyi phreng ba lug rgyud tshul du// bskyed dang spyi dang bsku dang spyan drangs dang // mchod dang 'dod gdong don gyi phyir bzhag na// re sngon thab chod rtsol ba la
298b4(rnying rgyud): lus 'das pa dri// theg pa'i rgyal po chu 'bras yi rig pas// de bzhin bzhin de la mnyam gan song // phreng bar gyur pa ngo mtshar gyi// ming gzugs mnyam zhig ye sa sngags chogs// mi 'gags skye dang bral ba'i byang chub
298b5(rnying rgyud): skyems// ye shes dge ba yongs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// byang chub rgya 'bras yongs kyi 'dod min pas// rma dbyung byang chub bdag nyid chen po na// dus gsum gshegs pa kun gyi bdag nyid dang // sems can rnams kyi sems yin
298b6(rnying rgyud): no// yenas ma skyes rgyu 'bras zag pa med// rang bzhin rnam par dag po 'di ma'ang med// rdo rje sems dpa'i gdan chen gdon chen la// mtshan mod mi 'gyur nam mkha' bzhin du d+has/ rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi nga yi ro pa/
298b7(rnying rgyud): chos kyi mtshan nyid thams cad rnam par dag/ thugs kyid kyi 'khor thugs kya dathipang khong mchog/ sku la cu chu la la mdzad su// ni bangs ma shing na che/ sbom rnams las// mongs spyod sna tshogs 'byung ba sa pan ta/
299a1(rnying rgyud): rdzu 'phrul ma rnams ca 'phrul pa ma // slobazod pas byam da smras s+ho// sa pa yang 'gagapas// rtag bstan pa'i spya byas 'phru b+h+yaH//
299a2(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid sbal ngo mtshar che// oM mdzor myangs theg mchog khyad par can// b+ha med gyul byung chos dang tha'// de stor gas kyang rdzogs bzhin po'i dang // de'i dkyil 'khor lus dang mthun pa yin// dngos medad pa rnyed ga
299a3(rnying rgyud): las// sku lnga'i dkyil 'khor gsal ba ngo mtshar che// yanas rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin las// ye shes 'od du 'ab ba ngo mtshar che// bskal pa'i me bzhin thams cad bsreg pa la// thams cad ma lhas 'dus pa ngo mtshar che/
299a4(rnying rgyud): ral gri bzhin du thams cad gcod pa la// thams cad ma lus 'dul ba ngo mtshur che// 'khor lo 'khor ba bzhin du ci ying ma bskor bar// thams cad la lus bsgyung ba ngo mtshar che// thams cad ma lus kun bzang nyid kyi dang // byang chub kyi sems
299a5(rnying rgyud): rmang du byung ba'i rgyud las/ rlung kyi bdag po nyid kyis rgyung bshad pa la ngoms pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams kyis phyag bcol bstod pa// bslab bya thams cad rnam par
299a6(rnying rgyud): 'jig mdzad pa// mgon po mchog 'dzin mi g.yo bde chen su// ngo mtshar thabs chen ston pa'i dpa' bo la// dus gsum rtag par 'dud pa'i bzhin phyag 'tshal// che ba lnga rdzogs sangs rgyas snying po la// sangs rgyas ma lus thams cad
299a7(rnying rgyud): 'dus par bkye// bskab ma srung skul ngoms par blta// 'du bral med pa'i spyod pa ldog par 'dzin// 'dil mos pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad pa// srub bstod pa bzhin du phyag kyang 'tshal// byang chub sems dpa' 'di la sums
299b1(rnying rgyud): so na pa gsus ga// ngabargyad pang na tsun pa smra/ kha saganas sa sa grongs kyi tshul ba / yungs smang du du tha byung dang// gas pa sa da/
299b2(rnying rgyud): dab sa sa // pa sa yang du/ thub y-i sa // thal ba rgya / sa sa ba pa
299b3(rnying rgyud): rgyu 'as mi 'byed rnam par dag pa'i chos// rnam thar la ma da mi mthun rnam grol chos// bub mo zab mo dam pa 'bras bu'i chos// 'di' chang klog dang bus dang sems pa dang // dang mos lags bra ma yin na la ma'// nga
299b4(rnying rgyud): da drug ci'i ba bgyi// sa r+b+ba dang rtswa bdag kyil stod paso// rnapa tu 'i rnamams dpang nyid gcinas te// rdzun bathang bshed mi nas sa su rjod pas rtag sa ste// byang brnyed /
299b5(rnying rgyud): ma gsusasangs rgyas rnangs kyis rtogs ge'i dog/ gnyis med nga bskyen pa ces 'dis// 'di'i sasang+yas rgyas bya ni yod ma yin// dgra tshul da do na y-i sbyin te// meg ga nga ba'i peng ngos /
299b6(rnying rgyud): songs rnaMs sems don ma lus rnams da kyang // mthos ma ldan ma dag tshul ba'i lci// rlung thung byung chub sems ni gad dog // thums ma ye shes nyis // 'khong la nyid las 'od kyi zad spyod kyi// sa kyi kyi
299b7(rnying rgyud): bye pa'i 'ami la 'dod// song po mtho ba rnam par dag pa'i rgyu// grob gyi molas chung tudam ra byed// bag sa dag par blos du mas bya// byang chub kyisams mad byung rgyad las su po bad das tu /
300a1(rnying rgyud): ba dang // bdag pos rgyud gtad pa dang / gdams dgu la bzla ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / rgyud kyi rgyal po chos thams cad kyi rgyung du byung ba rdzogs so// / byang chub kyi sems chad du byung ba cu gnyis ma nyid
300a2(rnying rgyud): dang gsum bzhugs pa las/ zab myo pu ri'i lha khang du bu gnyis lus so// slob dban gur+d+ha gu g+has bsnam par bzhed nas/ lan gcig gzigs pas/ gnod sbyin kha cal gyis 'gram du thal lcag gcig 'argyab nas brgyal bar gyur to// brgyal
300a3(rnying rgyud): sangs pa dang / srin po lta bu'i tshul du'i dug pas smras pa// gnas khangs rgyal bar gyur pa 'di nyid kyi// rgyal po me 'ong khyod kyi me khyer ro// gal te khyer na khyod nyid gsod par bya/ zhes smras pas bred cing dngangs nas/ ma ni gong du spyan gzhan
300a4(rnying rgyud): zhig tu drangs/ bu gnyis dang mus so// gong du de nyid rnam par 'grel pa la// dgos 'dod gsal tshad don la 'char ba ni// mabu gsum nas drangs te gtan la phaT// phyi nas blo yi zer lo bskyod nas bya bzod na// 'phags thugs 'og pa dang
300a5(rnying rgyud): 'phral du gnod sbyin mos// bar chad byed phyir blo yi zer la bskyod// la stong mkhas pa mgon po la// nyang snod lce nag bdud rtsis zhus// / rgya gar skad du/ swasti shrI bid+yA ko ke la/ bod skad du/ bkra shes pa
300a6(rnying rgyud): dpal rig pa'i khru byug/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gi sa zos pa'i dus gcig na// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi thugs// bcom ldan 'das chen po'i/
300a7(rnying rgyud): ye shes dang yang mi mnyam pa'i gsang sdigs theg pa chen po'i yang zag pa chen po/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje ltar dbyer me phyed pa'i bdag nyid/ gzhi rtsa med pa'i snying po chos thams cad rgya yod pa dang med pa
300b1(rnying rgyud): gnang ba// sad parjes pan ma grangs par zad su dgapa// dzA ga nga phyobs dang mtshan ma med par phyogs cad da phrul ba/ gang ga gnas su mthar cing thams cad kyi kun thung ba/ med dang thog gis rnam par dag spyong/ rnam pa tsu hA/
300b2(rnying rgyud): thams cad dngas shing bden pa gnyis ma go mnyam du dril ba/ lugs snying po che ba thams cad kyiH/ chos thams ca drini tshub bzhin gnas pa/ rjes thams cad tshul bzhin du mi gnas pa'i mchog/ gang bas ma dri med pa'i ngas nyid med pa la/
300b3(rnying rgyud): sems par sems ga mdun med byar ldan pa/ ni dang nang gi kyi rol med cing me ldan pa med par tha dad pa/ rdo rje chen pod dkyis pang kun sde cing 'dus nas grub pa/ bde bachen po'i tshul myi brjod par byams cad thams cad dang gnyis sa med pa
300b4(rnying rgyud): gyu ba/ chos kyi thani 'du byed kyi chos ma yin pa/ mtshan ma tha dad pa gang yang ma yin pa/ chos tham sa rgyad kyi rang bzhin da ga shing byung ba snyed dpamapa 'di lta ba bzhin pas de rtag pa bzhin noH/ chom kyar bzhin da dang / ye gas kyi
300b5(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid dganyis kyid pa nyid myi gcig pa 'dam yin/ tha da pa'adra ma yin pas/ dbyibs dang 'dog pas dngas pa'i rjes kyi sbe ni ye shes rnam par dag pa dang / srang ba bya ba gnyis kyi byung / sarbA rtsig sman pa'i chos kyi phun/ rnam
300b6(rnying rgyud): par dag pa zhin du mchogs pazhes pa'o// dus bskyam kyi ba'in nyid cing mi nyi du/ chos nyam sa byed pa dri shing da badzin nyi sa pa med pade gcig pa'i phyi dang / theg pa sgrad da kyang ba dang / ngan btu kyad med pa stsal bdag
300b7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad pa dgangs pa'o// dpa brtog par // chernam thams thangs sa dzin na rnams migs pazod med pas// rnam par mnyag ces kyi so// rtag pa'angam yin chad pa'ang men//
301a1(rnying rgyud): byar// thugs ma sun du bde bzhin pas// sangs rgyas tshad 'dra grangs med pa'aM// rgyam dang mgon rnams mang byung gyur// yang dag par rdzogs pa rdzogs par yongs spyod pa'o tha/ thugs rdzun/
301a2(rnying rgyud): podr-i ni/ rtag pa dang mi rtag pa ga nyis 'dzin pa'i rgyud na/ rtag pa dang mi rtag pa chen po zhes b+haH/ de ni sbyangs pas thob par bstan no// yang dag pa d+ha ni te mngon par snang // sangs rgyas rnams dang dgongs pa mthun// gcig gnas
301a3(rnying rgyud): la spyod cing ka n+d+heg/ de ni longs spyod mtshan dang ldan// smon lam ldan pa'i skal chen la// rgya chen 'dus las gsal bar snang / stsal pa'i sgra ni mdzud pa'i don la sprul byer mdzad cing / khro ba dang 'dzum pa dang / stan can dang / kun med
301a4(rnying rgyud): par 'jal ba'i phyir sprul pa'i lha'i// mi rti rte pa sngal ldan cing / sbyangs pa'i mchog gyur kun gsung 'gyur// mtshungs par spyod dang ston mang po// theg pa bzhini ston par 'gyur// rang bzhin ye shes ting nge 'dzin// dag pas
301a5(rnying rgyud): gsum po zung tshul// de gsum rnam par dag pa ni// de bzhin de bzhin de bzhin phyir// snyings rgyas rnam kyin tha me dang // de myong sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shos chen por dbags 'bas// yang dag dbyings la mnyam thang bas
301a6(rnying rgyud): chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyi zhing // mi lce mi 'geg ma dgongs phyir// de la rtag cing mthar mi chags// ye shes reg pas don rig pas// rnams su blang med dang ngag nyid// ye shes rang dag 'di 'dra zhes// rdorje sems dpas ba can
301a7(rnying rgyud): med// gang babarjid yod martogs so// yang dag ngan pa nyid na// 'byung ba byung na 'dus // nga bzhi med pas menas so// bcig pas ma 'du // gsangs pa nyid rdzogs tha bas// dadag ba
301b1(rnying rgyud): dmigs byung // thams cad de bzhan nyid du bzhag/ rang byung dang zhes nyam bzhas pas// mtshan ma 'phrog par ltung ma med// da ljang don pa ga kyar na// cil gnas shing gad pa chags// gang zhag 'gag cing ni dang kyang // ma spangs
301b2(rnying rgyud): ldan grub chub cang // sregs ma ldan pas kyi byung ma'o// rgyun grub rgya yid dkyings 'dral// ni dgas tshol sa tshogs 'di// gcan tha~Md ri dregs sems can rnams// thams cad tha dad pas ma gyis mA~M khyab gnas//
301b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo'i don sogs kyi// bla me gnas sogs las kyi pa maung // rtogs rnaMs rang / la ldan pa'i chos// saM si dge ba bsam mi khyab/ den skye pal rdo rje sems dpas/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzung ro la dul shin 'dzum pa
301b4(rnying rgyud): bltas nas// e ma ho rab tu gsang ba'i mchog/ gang las byung nas ci zhig byed// gang du 'gro ba sul 'tshal// yangs pa chen pos bshad du gsol// zhes ched du gleng ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'dos chen po dang la kun du bzang pos bka /
301b5(rnying rgyud): skal pa/ rnam dag pa dang mya ngan 'das// chos su dngos yod nam dgra nyid// gzhan la su ma byung rang la gnas// skurtogs rang bzhin mi gnyis te// cha shas nyid du khros dang bral// theg pa sna tshogs yin par bshad// mchog gi dam
301b6(rnying rgyud): pa snying po ni// lung gi dam pa byang chub sems// 'gro bkun la rang bzhin gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa'al kun tu bcing pos ched du gleng ba// so so skye bos mi shes pas// shes pa gsum po ma srings phyir// sku gsum las ni ring du 'gyur//
301b7(rnying rgyud): srogs ma le gas rkyerten 'byung // zin pa tshal ba'i nid sangs te// rgan gyis gnas pas padag pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzung bas/ rab tugs pa'i chos bsam par byab la rab tu zang po// bsam pa
302a1(rnying rgyud): par mi bya ste// mi bsam pa'ang mi bsam mo// gang du'ang rnam par mi sems pa// de ni de bzhin mnyam nyid // rnam mi rtog tu kun 'dus gyir// tshor bar bsgoman ci zhig gnas// ji bzhin pa zhes bstan pa
302a2(rnying rgyud): nyid// rang gi rig pa tshangs pa yin// bkra shis pa'i rig pa khwa byug pas dngos po gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas mchod pa rnam gnyis mchod de/ phyag bcal
302a3(rnying rgyud): du la dang pas pa gags bcom lda pa sa che po bdang gshegs pabyed pa/ ji lta lags/ sa pa
302a4(rnying rgyud): lnga ye shes sngar bstan pa ji ltar lags/ gsang ljags rig sngags zhes bya ba ni gang / rdo rje theg pa chen po'i sgo nas 'jug pa dang / mdo sde'i sgo nas 'jug pa gnyis sems mnyam par 'jog pa'i dus na tshul ji ltar 'jog/ de nas bcom
302a5(rnying rgyud): 'dis dpal kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa/ mtha' spang dbus rtogs pa la shes yul dgye// 'gro ba'i yid du kun gcig rdo rje sems dpa'i dang // ye shes dbyingasu gsal skye med thabs chen gyis// byin brlabs khyad 'phags rgyal
302a6(rnying rgyud): ba rigs ltar snang // dond dam gsang ba gsang sngags rgyal po che// rnam grol dag pa rig sngags bla med gsung // 'jug ldog mthar zad bla med smasnyun grub lam// stong smon mtshan 'dzin lam mchog bde ba sgrub// zhi dra gnas dang
302a7(rnying rgyud): lhag mthong dag dang ni// kun ga zhi rnam shes yod pa'i dngos nyid dang // 'jig rten blta rnam bzhi 'das pa'i blta// khams gsum las 'das nor du don po che// phung po lnga po mi g.yo byad chub lam// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug phrag
302b1(rnying rgyud): kyang // bde ba byed la gnas pa'i bad ba mchog/ rta ljang byang tsA ba rgyar 'jug pa'i lam 'di ni// 'dug pad mi dung zhes ni skur 'debs pa// dbang po rtul po mya rab su zamal pa// gnas ngan phyin pa'i bgazugs spyang rung ste// gnyis
302b2(rnying rgyud): med don dam kun rdzob bden gnyis gcig/ gnyis su mi blta snying po byang chub nyid// zhi gnas lhag mthong stong pas brgyab bying la sogs bral// dben pa'i grong dang grong khyer ri sul dang // dgon pa dben pa'i nags gsuMb dur khrod rnams//
302b3(rnying rgyud): brten par byed cing bdag bstod gzhan spod cing // brnyed dang bskur sti dag la gang chabyas pa// mkhas pa ma yin shin tu dadran pa nyams// chos lnga ldan pa'i byang chub thob par gsungs// skye ba dag la mos pa'i nyon mongs 'di// sems
302b4(rnying rgyud): tshul khrims nyams te zhig pa yin/ de nas bcom ldan 'das da pa laM kun tu bzung po la/ rdo rje sems dpas zhus pa/ bac+doMm ldan 'das rdzogs rje rjen pa'i bdag nyid dang ldan pa/ the tshom g+hi sgrib pa dag par bgyi ba'i slad du/ wang
302b5(rnying rgyud): thob 'bra bgyid pa'o// gzugs brnyan rang bzhin ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gsum// gcigag mngon te tha dad bstan pa dang // lha yi dkyil 'khor nye bar bsgrub pa'i tshe// las gzhan phra mo brtsam pas bsgrib mi baspring // zhi khrod dkyil 'khor so sor mchis ma mchis//
302b6(rnying rgyud): lha gcig bsgoms pas gzhan dbang 'gyur ram ci// rnal 'byor mi rtog ting 'dzin gsal gyur na// ting 'dzin gzhan la sgoms par 'jug mi 'jug/ sngags la 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis// mdo sde bsgoms nas gtan tshigs bcal na
302b7(rnying rgyud): 'phags pa dag dang po mnyam gyon ci lags// bsgom du med pa gzhag mi drung // da slob dpon mkhas pas sems pa cosan// sngags kyi 'gro 'du med par don thoba'am// dge gnyen gyi rnam smin gyi mang 'byung // @
303a1(rnying rgyud): 'das sa tu/ ngas sa sa da/ sa su sa gan / // na du
303a2(rnying rgyud): brnyad bye ga drung za meng// rnams cad sdugs bugasas da// rtos na du myong nges paskye rnaMs// chos cig gro mnyamaste// mos pa stongs sa nyid dugasu// ma shes dkyis phyag ba ga ga rdza/
303a3(rnying rgyud): mas na du
303a4(rnying rgyud): nus pas// sang+yas rgyas sems can byung ba srid pa'iH// don ma kyi ma dngos pa zhud brjid pas// bsgyel du med par 'dog byang ma pa nyid // yang dag mno gang chen nangs ga // waM mi gting dun tu mas byas nas//
303a5(rnying rgyud): byas pa'i da sbyin pani// dge ga nyis kyi 'bras dus su sto/ ga ga pa gas so kyin stsogs sang rgyud byung ga 'i de 'bras thob pa nyid 'ang// phyo gdu mthul pa'i bayang sa
303a6(rnying rgyud): byung // byin nam bstan na ma mthong bar ma gsan/ rdo rje rgyal po yon tan dbang meng // rdong brirgya la sang bgos pa ji bzhin du// dab sa su dbyas pas bad gzhan drug par bstod/ bkrashes pa rig pog byus pas/ mdor bsdus pa
303a7(rnying rgyud): mi 'i dgas pa da dus pa'i yan sa pa / 'dus so la byu sa nga kyi dzin mnyams par zug sa/ nga dus dpa // dngasapa da
303b1(rnying rgyud): bkod sbyang ba ma lus du dbang bsgyur// rdo rje 'du bral mdang bde ba la gnas rdo rdo'i dbang // rdo rje de ni skye dang 'gag pa med de yangs shing zab// de phyi rdo rje zab mo yangs shing zab pa'i gtid ni s+yA bdo ldan// dzong nam mkha' lta bu ngan thams cad skyeng pa'i rgyu stos/
303b2(rnying rgyud): ma yin pas che// de phyir rdo rje kun 'byung snying po ma btsal bzhag nas bsgom// sems kyi dang nyid kha dog dngos med ji bzhin te// gang nas ma byon phyi rol nang rol gnyis ka min// shes rab tshogs kyi snying rje'i brlan dang ma bral thams cad slengs// log rtog mtshan
303b3(rnying rgyud): mra'i 'du shes thams cad de las 'byung // sbyin pa la sogs pha rol phyin pa bcu yang rang bzhin rdzogs// lam 'dus rim pas dang 'jug lta thams cad 'grub pa yin// sbrang lan med par chos 'di snya mar gnas pas na// lus dag yid gsum yang dag pa nyid lenapa shes pa
303b4(rnying rgyud): yin// sangs rgyas chos lagus shing spyod 'dod na pa shes rab yin// gtong ba tshul khrims chos sems pa la byang chub ri smrig rnams bzhin// thams ca kun tu bzang po'i dang dugacig pa shes par bya// mtha' las rab tu mtha' yas pa yi sems can thams cad kun// rang byung
303b5(rnying rgyud): rnam dag sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// sangs rgyas la sogs phyag rgya 'bar ba nyid du don 'di snang bas min// snang srid lhun gyis rdzogs par shes pas thabs kyi thabs// med pa'i rgyu las yod pa'i dngos po 'od gsal ba// gdod nas dag pa'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa yi cho gas// snang
303b6(rnying rgyud): yang dngos po med pa'i tshul yin na// de la ji ltar brtags kyang dngos po ci zhig yod// dpe dang tshad ma gtan tshogs rjes su dpag pa yis// ya mtshan rmad kyi chos 'di rtogs par nus pa ma yin te// rtag par kun rdzob rnam par snang mdzad smra// yid bzhin nor ltar
303b7(rnying rgyud): dgos dgu 'byung ba'i gzhi// de bas gsang sngags bdag nyid chen po 'di// dngos grub byi rlabs gtams pa'i thabs shes can// bsam yas gting dpag dka' brgyal po 'ad// khams gsum las 'das byang chub rin po che// stor bas bcol kyang rnyed par gal 'gyur//
304a1(rnying rgyud): sgyu sa sru pa'o// // ma nanan nga bad/ sngags rgya pa s+ho gas pad nasu/ nan nags pa rtagatugs pa'o// / thangs da sangs sa pa ga can de/
304a2(rnying rgyud): bkag ci bder gnas pa'i thabs poH// mi bsgri ba gsal bar gnas pas bya can// gnyis med cig leng 'dus shing bad+mod las dus/ pasashes pa rig pa'i bzug gi chung las/ thangs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / des
304a3(rnying rgyud): bzhugs// mthong thos pa rnams dang myangs pa dag pa'i dbang // mthong ma nyin bya bsdam bya myang du rnams// mthong bye thos byed sdom byed kyong byed dang // 'dus dang de ste byung dang mabyon tshogs// gnyis med 'khril ba rgyal ba yab yum dz+wal// mthar byed deg dang reg
304a4(rnying rgyud): byed reg shes dang // rtag rmed bdag dang mtshan mang ma yin rnams// gdod nus dag pa yang yum kyil 'amo rdzogs// yang dag bden pa'i 'bras bu kun rdzob tu// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das pa'i zhing / dkyil 'khor spyod yul dkyil 'khor gsum du
304a5(rnying rgyud): marnam par spang // che ba'i yang tshe mtsho steng zab pa'i phyir/ ji bzhin mi bskyod bya med rnam par grol// rang byung ye shes 'byung ba 'byung ba'i mchog/ gzhan nas ma yin 'gro bkun la gnas// thun mong bde ba byang chub rnyed dkang ba// zhing dang spyod yul yongs su
304b1(rnying rgyud): 'phrul pa min// blang med nam mkha' lta bur rab 'byor pas// de la mi bca' de bzhin rnam par gzhag mchog gi mchog tu gyur pa'i theg pa'i mchog/ thig le gcig tu zlum kyang brjod du med// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po'i snying po 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i ting /
304b2(rnying rgyud): de 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rigs lnga sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las bton to// bton nas ye shes chen po 'od 'brang ba'i sku lngar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das bdag po mnyes par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
304b3(rnying rgyud): btsun mo'i tshogs 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las/ d+hA tI shwa ri/ dwe Shar ti/ mo ha ra ti/ rA gar ti/ badz+ra ra ti rnams phyung nas mnyes pa chen po'i btsun mo lngar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
304b4(rnying rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ta krung bzhi su dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // de phyung ma thag tu sgo ba 'bar ba bzhir gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de nyid mi snang bar bya ba'i phyir/ bla med ye nas khyab pas mi 'dzin gtor/
304b5(rnying rgyud): thig le rtsa la thag chad pas las rnams rdzogs// mi rtog mnyam las 'das pas bgegs rnams zhi// mnyam rdogs brjod du med pa snying po'i gtso// mkha' ltar mi g.yo rang bzhin btab pa'i rgya// cis kyang khyod nyid ye shes gsalnga ba'i dang /
304b6(rnying rgyud): mi 'dor tshig bral ldan rdzogs mnyam ma nyid// dkyil 'khor chen por rang bzhin gnas pa'i rgya// thams cad ye nas dge ba'i lhag ma med// mi 'gyur snying por gyur pas drang po'i mchog/ mtha' las mkha' bzhin gnas pas mi mnyam
304b7(rnying rgyud): med// btsal ba med pas gzhan la ltos ma yin// lhan gnas bde chen mtshungs pa'i rgyal po 'di// ming tsam tshig tu 'di zhes btags nas ni// bstan du rdo rje sems dpa' ngas ma bstan// thabs dang shes rab rnam pa ldan byas
305a1(rnying rgyud): nas// skyong ma phyag tu 'dzin 'do ga // dal 'dzin pa yang phrer sngon yin te// snying po'i rang bzhin gcags mangs pas// kar drod pa dbyung pa dgas byar sna // sna drug kyar rtsol bas dan /
305a2(rnying rgyud): pa// bla myed theg pa'i sgrib shing sbron can yon// yig 'brus bskyed pa'i phyag rgya bzhi ldan su// cha lugs gsul bar chu zla bzhin snang ste// sngar stong ngo bo nyid du bsgoms gyur gyung// bsgom pa nyid kyis sde maung skyed yul 'dra//
305a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor chen po rnam gsum 'od 'bar bas// dbang po mngon du gsal bar gyur na yang // theg mchog 'di la reg pa yod ma yin// bkra shis pa rig pa'i khu drug gi rgyung las/ ma hA yo ga rdo rje theg pa chen po'i gol sa yin par bstan pa'i len+da sti
305a4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos// ched du brjod pa 'di chud du brjod do// tshogs sbyor bsgom pa mthong ba mthar phyin pam// tshad med pa'is ni kun kyar byi bar nus pa yin// su gsung thugs las b+hal bas tshogs rdza
305a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i mchog/ lam med pas na se me la me btsal bde ba'i lhan// rgyu 'bras mi phyed 'dus pa'i rdo rje yin// ma gris ye nas gnas pas 'jig pa med// gdod nas byang chub snying po'i rang bzhin la// btsal ba'i bsam pa yod pas don mi rnyed kun bu dbyu
305a6(rnying rgyud): pas rtag pabyams pa'i sku// phyag rgya'i 'gyur 'jug med kyang nyams pa med// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sems kyi 'byung 'jug yin// zlos su ye khyab kun khyab rnam par rol// bskyod med nam mkha'i dbyings ltar mnyam par gnas// khyad par cing yad ma tshungs
305a7(rnying rgyud): pa byams pa'i mchog/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la// bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' spel ba// spang du med pare lam rdza po// de bzhin gshegs ba kun gyi thar pa'i mdzod// spyod par bya ba rnam thar lnga nyid kyang // de bzhin gshegs bkun gyi bu yi ngong//
305b1(rnying rgyud): da ma nam ldang bsko gshegs pa'i rkyen// sangs rgyas dang na thob pon phyag tu skyugs// am dral tshul du blta rnams yan lagapas sa// 'di yang byang nu thob pa'i lam byo// yogs kyin tshigs can bsgom pa ston// lam rlob 'am
305b2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs lami// bsod nams tshogs kyang mi spyod mi drang chen// ye shes dam po tho ba de'i tshogs kyang drung // bas mi gtan rab tu gnas pa'i sangs rgyas nyid dang mtshungs// mang du thos pas byang chub la rag kyang // med dregs ma gnas tshad med stong pa nyid//
305b3(rnying rgyud): byin drug lam gyi gter du gsungs// gdod 'dug dim skyes spyong ba don thob ldan// dug bcu sdud med chos nyid dbyings kyi rgyun// bsdu shes pa dge pa'i sa gag gi rgyud las/ byang chub kyi lam mngon du bstan pa'i le'u ste lbu ba'o// // de sa bcom ldan 'das
305b4(rnying rgyud): dpal ku tu bzang pos/ nyid kyi dargyab 'i spyod pa'i da// da du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o// yinas rnam par rgyal ba'i ye shes dbyings las dus// ye shes rnam bur dag pas gcig pa'i phying// grol bu'i las kyi mtshan nyid med de me
305b5(rnying rgyud): gtsug dang du ma'i mtha' las 'das pan// chos kyi dbyings kyi ma man mdam par snang // gzugs kyi mtshan dag pa y-in spangs rgyas pa// thos pasam smon lam btu ba pas drin pa nyid// chos su gcig pa'i dam pa ma mthong na// 'da'atshon snyam nga phags
305b6(rnying rgyud): 'i mi byed pas// mas rnams pa'i sa rgyas ma rtson// ma da med pa nyid can / khyed ky-i sa las ma ma / sa kyi ma pa ga rjes byung // N+Da 'gyul ba'i lam+ba ng+ya ma /
305b7(rnying rgyud): ni chos spe med las 'das pa// dbu mang du med don dang bral// spri ma'i nga bzhin spyang babral ba // mkhar bzhin mtha kun mi da kyogs nga dru // zhi nga ni ma rnaMms med// dang rdzogs maud mnyam pa'i rgyam pa tshe// mtsha
306a1(rnying rgyud): pa byas rlom gos// kyang myo sa mAlas 'das pa'i lam mthol// rmad kyang bramacho nyid las slar bsgom// dgas kun pal zhogs sa d+hab pas// rdzu tu shu sum cho nyi // sdug mardzogs pa kyang da na pa //
306a2(rnying rgyud): rang byung ye nas ldan pa'i chos kyi ste// 'gyur med lhun gyis rdzogs pas bsod nams pa// 'byung 'jug cer yang snang bas sprul pa'i sku// byed spyod kun rdzogs longs spyod rdzogs pa'i lha// btsal mdo snying po byang chung rdzogs pa'i dri// thams cad ldan gyi bdag nyid yin pas na/
306a3(rnying rgyud): ngi rtsol dral bas byad drub mchog tshol ba// rnyed pa'i dus med srin las bal skyes dzung // rgyal bar rtag par bzhugs pa nyid pas// rtag tu bde gro thar pa'i lam 'dod na// grol ba'i lam rjen pal lalta bar smos// rgol ba'i lam zhugs drang por 'bongs med// mkhyen
306a4(rnying rgyud): 'gro sang daphyin pa nye la ma mchog/ rtag tu rgyal nyid mchod ni rgyal ba mnyes// sangs rgyas zhing skyod mi dgos thams cad rgyas// khyab skra ye nas brdal ba kun gyi lam// ye shes sna tshogs kun pa kram sbyin btang ngas// 'khor lo'i 'gyur rgyal nong ltar ma mo thigs 'dra// ye shAs
306a5(rnying rgyud): cho dbyings brgyan pa'i sbyin pa ni// zad pa'i dus med nam mkha' chen po'i tshul// nor btong gling gcig byur byung btang gyur nas// rgyal la sogs pa kun la phul byas pa ring // chu thigs lhur gyis blangs bzhin zad par 'gyur// khu b+hag dus bcu gzhan gyis mi #
306a6(rnying rgyud): wAr// dang phyag mnga' ba rnyes gzhan la rag mi lus// khwa byug gis ni gzhan gyi yid lung ltar// kun rdzogs mchog gi sgra yis thams cad smad// sangs rdzas kun gyi bdag nyid mas chen po// rna~M khams dag pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi lha// dkrol 'khor chen po gsong gas
306a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i ste// rgyal kun mchod par 'dod na bdag nyid mchod// kon mchog gsum mcho 'du zhes med pa bdag la gnas pa dbang lnga thog// rdo rje zag pa'i dmachog mi 'dong ba// nyon mongs lnga po'i las kun spyod pa dang // sems can kun pa snying brtse med pa dang // mgyid chen
306b1(rnying rgyud): dang mi tshangs spyod pa dang // phyag rgyang ma rtsol gzhan la mtshol ba// rtag par rgyal ba mi 'da'i dmachog mchog/ rdo rje theg pa'i ting 'dzin bstan pa ni// de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin dam pa nyid// nam mkha'i khams bzhin rang bzhin mnyam gnas // sems pa dmigs pa'i 'dag
306b2(rnying rgyud): med par bsam// lha yi phyag rgya gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin// ngo bo nyid kyis dmigs su med pa yin// rdo rje theg pa'i spyod pa dag pa ni// dka' thub mi mnga' gtsang spang mi rtog cing // brtul zhugrwa gsum ldan sems can thams cad gsod// zas mchog bshad gci za zhing rnal 'byor don la brtson
306b3(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs lde spyod byang chub chen po 'chang // mtshams med lnga spyod ye shes rol par rtogs// rdo rje theg pa'i lta ba'i ngo bo la blta ba// shes rab 'bar ba'i me chen 'od gsal bas// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis kyang me 'od bsregs// dkyil 'khor gsum du mi blta de bzhin nyid
306b4(rnying rgyud): mi gdab// snang steng phyag rgyar mi 'dod mnyam nyid ting 'dzin 'das// gang la mi brten gang la'ang grub pa med// gdod nas mtha' dag de bzhin de bzhin nyid// de yi chog 'das sangs rgyas ya sangs rgyas// rdo rje theg pa chen po'i 'bras bu bstan pa'o// ma bcom ma sgrubs dang ba
306b5(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i sa// sa rdzog pad+ma can dang kun tu 'od las 'das// 'bras bu lhun grub ye nas dag pa'i sa// rdo rje theg pa'i lta ba dang / dam tshig dang / spyod pa dang / bsgom pa dang / rang bzhin dang / 'bras bu kun gcig yin par bstan// lha spyod ting 'dzin rgyu 'bras gcig gi dang // ga
306b6(rnying rgyud): la srung kyang 'dug lta 'bras bu rdzog// rdo rje thag pa'i 'bras bu thob nas yon tan ci 'byung ba bstan pa/ gab tsho'i nor ltar thams cad kun 'dus shing / nam mkha' bzhin du ma g.yos rang gis 'char/ bkra shis pa rig pa'i kha khrug gi rgyad las/ rdo rje theg pa'i nga rgyal bstan pa dang /
306b7(rnying rgyud): rdorje theg pa'i dbye ba bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' rdo rje sems dpas/ rgyud kyi bdag po la bstod pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das/ chen po'i chen po/ mchog tu gyur pas/ chen po khyod ni che ba'o// bzang po'i bzang
307a1(rnying rgyud): da dos ba nga zus ga slo ba ga nyidas mas ca gyugasaso// pa rdugs grus pa zod pa thal/ rgya // sa khyod sa pa/
307a2(rnying rgyud): dag mad gzug tshob// gsang gigasung rgyags das padegs gsas rgyag ci thag rtsod pang gsug tsal/ pas kyi gas mchog sa dres pa pa ni nyid de yang na gcang dang phu tshal// me'ad dang pa'i ming dadu mchog
307a3(rnying rgyud): pa'ang rtag phyag 'tshal// kun byas dbang thag kun gyi sna tshogs kun gyi dpal// mgon khyod la'ang rtag tu bdag / phyag 'tshal// dkyil 'khong zhing po dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po khyod la mchod pa 'bral// khyod kyi rang bzhin sbubs kyis ma g.yogs gang yang med pas spyod ni/
307a4(rnying rgyud): byams pa'i mchog/ yangs pa chen po khyod kyi sgo nas 'jug pa'i dbang po 'jug mkhan de la'ang rtag phyag 'tshal// snying po'i snying por blta ba'i rta nying can de la'ang gzhan phyag 'tshal// kyai bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das/ re mdzes dbang chug thod ni gnang mi gtong bar 'dod//
307a5(rnying rgyud): cho rtson bdagagis gdan mga' tsha// deng ni nasems byang rnams kyang rtag rgyal rtog/ yang ngas myong la phyag 'tshal na sa sa mchog tu / zhes gyi bdag pa la thong sa bson padagasum phyag 'tshang das/ nga ba sto dang / nga kyibral po ci mchog pa
307a6(rnying rgyud): du thal mo zung sbyar nas phyag 'tshal te// sems dpa' dag pas rtsod la phrag tshal bskyod// bstod pa'i rgyal pa rab tu 'astod pas bstod// da ltar bstod pas mchog khyo gsunas ni// sangs rgyas su gyi bstod pa de ldan shog/ ces rgyud kyi rgyal po la bstod pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rkun /
307a7(rnying rgyud): nga sa rje na pa thungs dang / kyi ngasams dpa du bya gi da kyi thag bye kyi yang banyid pa mi med pa// thug kyi ga can bad 'di cig pa tha pa rang byung ba// na byed do
307b1(rnying rgyud): da// darje 'don par khyod ni bsngags pa'i phyid// spyad ma cag rgyal ba'i bstan pa gzung du gso// sgyus thathabs la mkhas pa'o bum ldan pa// b+hal bsgreba'i gsang zlog/ ga ta/ khyos rdo 'dzin pa sa dag/ rmad kyi rtul pa chen po tad do// dan rjo 'dzin pa can ngos dras
307b2(rnying rgyud): mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la bcu gnas/ gdong du thal mi dazung nas// kye bcom ldan 'das 'gro sol ga so// bde ba gshegs pa le ga so leg+sa so// yongs su gtad pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal pa 'di// rgyang mthos par gsang bang gta pas na// le ga bang gzung la brten par bye ba yis// do la ba dzinan
307b3(rnying rgyud): gsang bar bgyi ba'am/ rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa 'di su la gtad ces bcom ldan 'das chen po la zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khyod bzhin 'dzin ci gsang ba'i rdo rjes 'gra don 'dod la/ khyod la gtad pa ji bzhin du// de bzhin de bzhin gtad par bya// rdo rje 'dzin pa ma yin yang/
307b4(rnying rgyud): nga mas / ma sa kyid bye pa myed nga/ na smrag pa / theg pa sa sa na ldang / dmam na ma na /
307b5(rnying rgyud): dmyal sogs mkhan// 'dis ni dngos grung nges mi thob// de la 'di yi dbang yang med// bdud kyis de sbas pa'i ming ni// khags gas g.yo sgyus 'di bzung bas// rdo rje 'dzin mi ni bdud kyi bu// 'di la 'dod pa'i bar chad nas// tshe 'di'i ngasam pa kun yal te// 'di yi bag tshogs
307b6(rnying rgyud): ci byas kyang // sgra mkhan li dwags gnas su ste// de phyir rgyud mchog 'di gtad na// nga yis khyod la gtad pa bzhin// ris gyis de bzhin tad par bya'o// dus ngan sbyin par gyur pa'ang // 'phral du no dbyig mi steng na// ma rabs de la 'dri snod med// gting dang 'dzin pa gnyis ka ni/
307b7(rnying rgyud): rul myag chog nas dmyal bar 'gro// bkra shes pa rig pa'i khu byug gi rgyud las/ rgyud kyi rgyal po labastod pa dang / srud gta pa dang / phyis ji ltar gta pang bstan pa li ru ste bdun pa'o// / bkra shis pa'i rgyud rdzog so// phyag kyigyi mkhan mo nIsi d+hi dang / bod kyi'o ts+tsha po tsa nas byung ba //
308a1(rnying rgyud): rtag da du/ r+b+ba sa / sgyu / rdzog sa rgya sgrub sa gsug dogs / rdzus / sa la na rdzo phyug // dan /
308a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i dus gcig na/ b.lan 'as kyil can dag tshul na/ sems mang nyid m+b+ha/ nyid rjes smra pa/ chen pa su mchog rjes sa/ med par mangs ning 'odags la du //
308a3(rnying rgyud): na gyis sa bAshAn b+hag/ yangs dag nga po'i dugal phyas bdan bzlugs// bang ba ma cwos nyid nga bzhi / rang gi sems nyid 'arjod na// na ma mi nga / gas sa kyis /
308a4(rnying rgyud): sag sa gsu gdon med pa dus phyi sems pa 'byo gyur ba / dam da sa gyi myi mad// ba sems pas byu ma mi ni / 'dus nyid lasamig 'a kyi la 'khong/ gangs dus pas
308a5(rnying rgyud): sa pa da// bcos sno pa 'byo tho nga na ladang / ting na pa 'a sa ma 'byung/ khyo na su bas mag sbyin ga pa gastel bla bathabs nas 'ag sa kyisems dpas gas
308a6(rnying rgyud): nam med gnas lpags smrig par bya// snod babyung na laldan dang gos gzung ba Te// ston pa kun de rgyam pas pashad dunaso ma// des dgasol ba'i thugags na thams kyi ni// 'das pa'i phyogasul na gaston pas bka' stsal pa/ nam
308a7(rnying rgyud): med sbya gnas sregs ngas pa gang du// sangs rgyas bu byed ngas shing thug pa'i phyir// gnod sbyin srin po me dag slol thung tshogs// 'dig rten na sernams kyang rdzings 'byung bas// rgyud 'di ni la/ la sems sdig can rnams// dkyum
308b1(rnying rgyud): ba ngas 'brogatan du sti \u0f7f// dper na zlu com lus kun pan la yang // yid bzhin nor bu spyod par dka' ba bzhin// snod ldan stob ma dang ldan shin tu dkon// de phreng shin tugasrung bu'i gtang bzhag/ rdzogs brjen pa lta ba la na gtan nga rgya/
308b2(rnying rgyud): rgyud las/ don rtsigs ba dgasangs pa'i gleng gzhi'i phreb skyed bya'o// / de skad ces bka' stsal pasu 'khor gyis don go nas/ gdung ba brten nas yid kyis don gsol pa// ma rig las kyi sdug bsngag 'khyams pa'i sems/
308b3(rnying rgyud): nim rtog dra ba gangags gnod pa'i thabs// thugs sngon sa pa 'dzin pa chung // sgrib pa'i na pas 'gris pa skye nga// 'drug ga bsngal ma grol ma ga// rang sems sa 'khor dag las ma bcu rjo // sems can las la thugs ma
308b4(rnying rgyud): tshad kyang // snying rjes 'gro don thugs dam mi mdzad dam// sems can lha mi rnams ni shes pa cing // dbang po yul la yengs pa'i sems 'dzin gyis// 'tsho ba dkon zhing tshe zung nad mang bas// thar lam mi thong skye shi 'che la rtag/ de phyed lus ngag 'dus
308b5(rnying rgyud): brus rjes spyod byung // khong me mtha' deng babyung bar dka' bu'i phying // spying ma na gtogs par dra ba'i byed// bsgom du med pa'i chos nyid bugs rjes gsungs/ rdzogs pachen po sgrub ma shes gti rdzogs kyispyad las/ gang bton ra
