308b6(rnying rgyud): sku gnyis pa'o// / do nas 'dus pa'i tshogs kyin nas rdo rje sems dpa' la thugs kyis gzigs nasangs par bka' stsal // bsgom du med pa mi 'bras gradam sa ngab d+hAn// rdo rje sems dpas thogs nas brgyad pa yis// dmi
308b7(rnying rgyud): shings pa spangs pal/ sa/ dedapas ni/ 'byas pas// sa ngas gyung chug pa mi ge da 'i chags kyi cugo// de shA shun kyi tu
309a1(rnying rgyud): sem na med pas rdzum dag bya thal// de yang 'dras pa'i sems dpa'adi gon// rdzas kyi badzin 'grus rje la dam ga na// gan shes nang ci ni gsu ngab// rdul shrIs dang bzang rnams sa dang
309a2(rnying rgyud): dgayon tan ba kya ldan rdzob ma pa// dbe rtags dgadon nyid smyon pa yi// g+ha ma / khas pa mtha' ba rjo rtogs pa la// mkhyen zhing da la lazugs rje bzhan ni // snyid pa chos rnams su cung zad med pa'i// dam pa'i mdzad kyi gter ldan sngon la mkhas// dper na
309a3(rnying rgyud): seng ges 'ji grub tud dgacod bzhin// blo ngos gcig par ston la gus pas nus// de nas 'dus pa'i sems dpa'adzi rje nyon// yang dag don gyi lta ba gsang ba ldad// gang zag byin ci log dang blta mun pa// thos pachu dang blo rdul shes rab med// nor phangs
309a4(rnying rgyud): ral la sogs snod med la// 'di bstan gnyis ka bsreg phyir rab tu gas// de skad gsungs ma thag tu yid dga' nas// 'khor rnams snod kyi don dadu ldan par ni// khas blangs dang dam bcas nas yid bsdus te// mgrin gcig lcags nas 'khor gyur to//
309a5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi rgyud las/ snod bcud bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan kuni rig rgyal po yis// ched du brjod pa'i don 'di bka' stsal to// 'gro drug sems can med pa'i gang rol du// sangs rgyas
309a6(rnying rgyud): med pas ye shes ming yang med// sun bzang nyid kyang glo bur sangs rgyas te// ma bcos gdod nas mi rtog zlos bsgoms pas// sangs rgyas nyid kyang gded med gol ba'i lam// 'og ma'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor saM tswi dgos// de skad gsungs pa'i don gsungs
309a7(rnying rgyud): mthag tu/ 'khor rnams sems 'drog ste yid ma rangs te sems kyi don pa the tshem du gyur na/
309a8(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la med byung bar gyur to// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi rgud pas/ ched du brjod pa'i be'u ste bzhi pa'o//
309b1(rnying rgyud): susus dbyung dngas 'khor rnams kyi bsam thugs su dang mas mas byug bas pa pa'i phyir don sa so// na gyisangs byas pa shes ga dang sa rtswang // napa snang ba 'gyur med pa ba ba gang // sbyar ba ra kyang tshogs sa las zu / ma 'dangs/
309b2(rnying rgyud): bar mgo pa theb kyi lags/ spyod ngas gcig rtogs pa'i tshang nigang // deny-id maud kyis gsal pa'i danasasan sa// ston pa su rgyal bas rnams// drugs kyi snol 'a khor na can rjenas// sa cas dpa ste ba nas sa
309b3(rnying rgyud): sbal pa// 'khor 'das gzhan rab nyid kyis// don ci sngangs rgyas dang sems don rtogs na// kun tu bzang po dang zung bcom ldan 'das// ye shes rab tu che mchog chos kyis// mI m+bi 'gag nam mkha'i drang bzhin no// 'khrul rtog nyid kyang ye shes ra
309b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i klong // dper na khyung dzin gshog rdzogs mkha' la rdzing ba ni// chu klung ri ba rjen bung nyam ming // byar sna nams kha'i khams kun lamadu de// gang du dmigs pa'i sa phyogs phyin par byed// de bzhin ye nas sems sbyangs rnal dpyor thugs/
309b5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas snying por rtogs pa'i// pa ldan rnams// chos sbo ma dron dugrub pa'i gdams dag can// sems rtog/ ye shes yon tan de las byung // rdzogs pa chen po'i nya ba ye shes gter rdzogs kyi gyur las+ya/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'byung bar bstan pa'i
309b6(rnying rgyud): nyel ba'o// / de nis rnon byasan dag rgyal po shes gsang bya'i don pa srungs pa dang 'a khor rnams rtog pa snangs na sa zas pa'i bsam pa thun par gyung cing pa dag nas/ bcom ldan 'das pan rtul po la rjod pa/ na
309b7(rnying rgyud): ngas rgyas kun pang byos kyis// 'a'ar bad rmugs pa shes slong sbyin pa// rang sa tshul byang chub pa shes bya// 'khor ba'i ming med sangs rgyas la ma ston pa// thugs med thos kyi sbrul yi kyis brjod// dasbe rjod pa'i don gas na med kyi
310a1(rnying rgyud): kun rig rgyal po ston pathos rje yis// 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs la bku' stsal pa// de nyid gdung dugo gyur rnal 'byor pas// mi bsgo mched du mi bAny+dza dang yin te// sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/
310a2(rnying rgyud): bsgoms dbang po dang yan btad las byung // skye bo mu stegs rtsi nang 'brel chod phyir// go las dag tu mi 'gyur don nyid yin// de ltar shin tu rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// skye ba 'di las mi len sangs rgyas nyid// don la the tshom mi za sangs rgyas chos nyid de//
310a3(rnying rgyud): rang bud rgyal po byang chub sems nyid kyang // ma btsal rang la yod pas bsgrub mi dgos// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi byur las/ 'khod rnams kyi rtog pa'i gdung ba bsal ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i ba
310a4(rnying rgyud): la phan gdags pa'i phyir kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas rgyal po chos kyi sku mchog kyang // 'khor 'das reg pa med par sems pa rdzogs// don la 'gyur ba med pas blta ba'i lam// yul la mi ltos dang sems chos kyi sku// nam ma
310a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin du ye shes mtha' mnyam pas// gzhi la 'gur med dang rig byang chub sems// skyon gyis mgos sems kyi dran pa la// 'pho dkrung med pas chos nyid brdal bya'i sra// mi kye mi 'gag lta ba rang gyur la// bsgoms pas mi rnyed rang sems 'grur
310a6(rnying rgyud): don// mang bsgoms 'bral med da ltang yi sems// bskal par 'khyams kyang sems la rtse shi med// shi med nor mchog rig pa lta ba // cho ga/ don pa ma bsgoms ye shes mthar gyi nul ma// sangs kyis re ba med pas nyur mi srid// gdong nas
310a7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur med byang chub chen po yin// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi klung las/ don la 'pho 'gyur med par bstan pa'i le'u ste bdud pa'o// / de nas kung rig zos rjes don gsungs pa// dad pas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams yid
310b1(rnying rgyud): sa // dakhong 'das pa bzhan gcig tu mnges pas// dbang po sral rnams deng bltas par bden// don la mya bdun gzung 'dzin mad+ha bAtas pas// ni rta gro smras pa brtas pas sa dbyed// dngas pa sa btags pa sman yod min to// yod/
310b2(rnying rgyud): na sems can kun la mthun snar rigs// gdod nas rang khrul bsgribs pa'i lus nyid kyis// 'gro drug mthor rtog so so sna tshogs pa// de phyir sems can dang sems so sor snang // ngo bo nyid kyi su la 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir// blo yis brtags pas
310b3(rnying rgyud): gcig yul gzig min pas// drang sems ma 'khrul snang ba the tshom med// des na gzhan yul rnams ni gdod nas med// 'khrul pa'i rtog sems 'gro ba so so'i sems// gcig na dge sdig rnam smin 'bras bu yang // sems can ma spyad kun gyis
310b4(rnying rgyud): myong par rigs// las kyi rnam smin thun mong mI ra gyu byer// bag chags brtas pa'i 'khrul pa'i sdug bsngal yin/ rdzogs pa chen po d+hU ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi chud las/ snang ba 'pho 'gyur du tshogs don las mi 'gal bar bstan pa'i leng
310b5(rnying rgyud): ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas kun rig ston du snang mdzad kyis// 'dus pa'i dad ldan 'khor la bka' stsal pa// ma bsgoms dbang po rang yin bzhag gyur kyang // phyi rolnga yul gyi rnga spyad gdags pa la// 'khrul pa yin par shes phyir zhe na
310b6(rnying rgyud): pa med// chos brgyad rang sar grol bas mnyam pa'i phyir// skye bo nyid kyang ma spangs chos kyi sku// dper na a shu kA nyid bdud rtsir shes bya ltar// de bzhin skye bo rang sems 'di nyid ni// bla ma'i don bstan tha mal byang chub sems// bdag nyid snying po
310b7(rnying rgyud): ye shes don nyid yin// de yang 'dus pa'i sems dpa' rdo nyid// nyid kyi don ma rtogs pas so so'i hUM bo ste// de nyid lung dang mnang ga don rtogs kyis// rang sems rtogs pas skye bo med pa'i phyir// ma bsgoms golas med par mkhas pas
311a1(rnying rgyud): gsungs// ngo bo nyid la rtag chad med pa'i phyir// sems der dang gsal don zin mi brjod pas// phyal ba lung ma bstan du gol sa med// dper na gsur 'gyur rtsis gang thebs pa rnams// thams cad gser las gzha
311a2(rnying rgyud): du mi 'gyur bzhin// de bzhin mu stegs skye bo'i sems nyid kyang // man dgra gser gyis thebs pa'i sems// mya stegs rnams kyang ye shes bde ba'i ngang // yul la mi zhen sbyin na bsgom du med// rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i don nyid kyis/
311a3(rnying rgyud): tshogs zhan las grol phyir bsgom me dgos/ rdzogs pa chen po'i lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi rgyud las/ ma bsgoms kyang skye bo dang mu stegs kyi golas med par bstan pa'i le'u skye dgu pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i snying po 'khor rnams la
311a4(rnying rgyud): kun rigaton pa chos rjes bka' stsal pa// sems can ma 'khrul spangs rgyas med pa'i gor// ngo bo nyid kyi sbrul rang byung sems// de nyid yi nas gnas lpags yin pa'i phyir// de rtogs chos sgyu mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// kun tu bzang po rang byung ye shes zugs
311a5(rnying rgyud): pa sems rang gis rig pas chos kyi re// rang sems dang 'khrul dgyo drug sems can te// kun gaN+DI'i gzhi rje zos sku ye shes la// gsum ldan 'khor ba'i sgrib pa'i sras nyid yin// dus tshod bla ma'i gdams dag don bstan pa// gzhi na chos sgra rang byung
311a6(rnying rgyud): nyid dang // dang po'i sems nyid rdo da kyisra// tra skyis ma bsdu zos skur gcig pa'i phyir// blo dngos gcig pa'i don la bsgom mi dgos// de yang 'dus pa'i 'khod rnams yid kyis nyon// sangs rgyas ye shes thugs dang sems can sems//
311a7(rnying rgyud): srid so par snang ba ma yin te// btsal mo nga sems tsho spar gcig pa'i phyir// glong ngos gcig par sems nyid mi ches yin// 'khor pa'i yun 'di sdug bsngal sgrib ga yogs dang // sangs rgyas spu dang ye shes pade bde// 'khor 'das gnyis
311b1(rnying rgyud): gcig pa'i phyir// ldan gyis thub pa dag du dngos gcig/ 'khor pa'i mang bya nyid rnapang rtso rgyags nyi byung // ga tud las ma das don yin myor// tha mal 'di nyid yin togs chos sgral// shA do med pa dun ma mig so// dper nu na sbyir chang
311b2(rnying rgyud): gyis bcud// de bzhin par de'i rang sems 'di nyid la// pra mA rkyen gyis rtogs pas bsgom mi dgos// mi bskom gyir nogol me sto ngos gcig/ de yang 'dus pa'i 'kho rnams yi kyis s+ho// ye shes gad+hanas panyam pa na rgya// !
311b3(rnying rgyud): du ma brjed rig pa gas 'jeb na// bgrazugs nyon mongs tog pa'i sgron gyis kyang // de 'jal po ma mi bsgrib ye shes gsal// dper na byas bu grags kyi byad ldanapas// drag ma bsal bas drug nyid lnga du 'gyur ba bzhin// rdzu phye maso
311b4(rnying rgyud): shes ni// snga phyir ma spangs glo bur rang stod phyir// glo dngos dbyer med rtogs pa'i tshad yin no// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting rdzog kyi rgyud las/ blo dngos gcig par bstan pa'i leng ste bcu pa'o// / de nas sems dpa' rdo rje snying po
311b5(rnying rgyud): yis// dad pas 'dus pa'i 'khor la phan ga dgas phyir// bden pa'i don gyis 'di skad yid kyis gsol// rang sems snying po don rtogs wA ba la// ma bsgoms 'bral med don ni ltar 'grub// ye shes don ni mtshon du'i lhur med// spyod pa ching
311b6(rnying rgyud): grol med pa'i don ni gang // sa la sbyang du med pa'i don ni ci// rtogs nas dam tshig bsrung nya mas ji ltar med// bsgoms na gol sna'i skyon ni de ltar lags// la bzla'i don gyi ye shes gang la bgyi// de skad gsol pa'i yid kyi don gsan nas// kun rig
311b7(rnying rgyud): ston pa chos rjes bka' stsal pa// rang sems snying po'i don rtogs chos sku las// bsgom bya'i ye shes chos spu gung na med// snga phyi sems kyi ye shes mtha' bral ba// ma nor sgom pa po yang gal yod// de la sgom mkhan sems la dngos med na/
312a1(rnying rgyud): mi gnas/ mi rtog 'jog pa rnal 'byor min// sems dpa' rdo rje snying po nyon cig/ a ti rdzogs chen chos sku bden gnyis brul// ngo bo nyid kyi rang shar ye shes ni// yod med dbus hUM ye shes mtha' gsum bral// pra
312a2(rnying rgyud): la sdang sdang gnyis po gdod nas med// dper na nam mkha' rang du shes pa bzhin// ji bzhin ma nor rang sems rtogs pa yis// lus ngag ma skyes rtog pa'i gzhi med pas// skyil krung drang 'dug smra bcad kha na med// de bzhin sems dang rtag chad spros bral bas/
312a3(rnying rgyud): ga sgom pa'i khar mi 'ong // ye shes lta ba'i thugs las byung bas na// rnal 'byor dmigs pa'i shes pas mi bsgom ste// rtogs pas rang sems ma skyes ye shes phyir// rdul 'gyor ched du bsgom pa bstan mi dgos// sems dpa' 'dus pa'i
312a4(rnying rgyud): dpor nyon cig/ yul gyi snang ba spyod yul ma grub phyir// nam mkha' lta bur ye shes rang gsal bas// rang sems chos sku dang gis de rtogs pas// rnal 'byor ci yang yid la mi bsgom na// yang dag lta ba'i don dang mthun par 'grub// sems
312a5(rnying rgyud): pa' rdo rje snying po de nyon cig/ rdzogs chen go las gcad phyir bsgom med de// ye shes bsgom med dag tu rab rtogs na// bsgoms kyang skyen med chos dbyings nam mkha' 'dra// bsgom med de ni kun gyi re bskongs// kun la/ khyab cing ma rdzogs med mod kyi// kun
312a6(rnying rgyud): sa gdams ngag ma 'phrod rtogs par dka'/ rdzogs pa chen po lnga ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi rgyud las/ ma bsgoms/ bral ba med pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas kun rig rgyal po chos rjes bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa'i
312a7(rnying rgyud): tshogs rnams yid kyis de nyon cig/ rang sems ngo bo nyid kyi chos sku ni// dbang po mngon sum mi gnas kun la khyab// chos sku tshig tu 'di zhes bstan par ni// rdo rje sems dpas kyang ni mtshon du med// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' yid kyis nyon// 'khor
312b1(rnying rgyud): 'das cag las 'das pa'i ye shes te// dbyibs dpa' dag dbang po'i spyod yul du// sangs rgyas nyid kyis bstan cing mam du med// mthon cing bstan par dka' ba'i rang sems de// yod byed kun las la das pas byang chub sems// dngos pang ba
312b2(rnying rgyud): da'i gags so// nga du nyi sa gzigs pas pa btsug/ gang la 'thub ta parda rtsi zlas 'di sa/ dab ci phra rnams pa da byed de// dod la pa 'dral sa pa 'i sa/ dpe gabyung bar da pa 'as
312b3(rnying rgyud): mi nga med dam pa pa phyin pa man/ de bzhin cogacigam nam ngon bcoms pa/ shes dang shA med pa'i dus pa // thamab caganam sa 'a rje khyo nis bya ba zhen// lus pa la nga sems nyid dang/ de nyid dag pas gas la btab ba des
312b4(rnying rgyud): pa bang bas byasanyid kyisprul ba sa rdzogs pacan rdzo sgrub ma sa ting ngog kyinasas so/ sas ba dong su mtsho du pang par basbyin pa'i skye ge 'du nyis ni/ ngan pad
312b5(rnying rgyud): ba// 'a gtsur pa sa te// 'am ba// sa mas kyi dgas pa sa// shing ti pa sa na / sa thu mi nogasu na mang ba gags nas pa /
312b6(rnying rgyud): sa kyilams sa sa ma sa ngas
312b7(rnying rgyud): kyis su gas pa 'a// sru sogs myos lam mgasos kya/ nga la go // ga nga tu sa spyod/ brtsub pa ba /
313a1(rnying rgyud): med dam gyis gos pa med// chos nyid blang dor med par rtags gyur na// ye shes rtag med nyams rdul tsam med// thun mtshams mi bsgo brgyan gyi rnal 'byor la// 'chang grol spyod pa med TI dgos pa med/ rdzogs pa chen
313a2(rnying rgyud): po lta ba ye shes gtor rdzogs kyi rgyud las/ spyod pa 'aming grol med par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas kun rig ston pa chos mes bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams yid kyis da nyon cig/ sa med chos sku rdzogs
313a3(rnying rgyud): chen ye shes la// gang yang mi 'gros mchog spyi btsangs pa// bgrod med sems nyid ye shes mchog gi lam// ye shes chos sku mda' phyin chos nyid sa// sems dpa' rdo rje snying por nyon cig/ sa ni dang po 'khor bar mi ldog par// snying po byang chub
313a4(rnying rgyud): mchog ni yin zhes na// bza' zhing bgrod pa'i yul nig la yod// byar med rdzogs pa'i dang du rab rtogs na// lam la bza' zhings spyad yul las 'das// dgrong med snying po lam gyi don ston pa// gzhan nas btsal bas rnyed par mi 'gyur te// ye shes
313a5(rnying rgyud): chen po'i kun tu khyab gnas pas// rang byung ye nas rang rig 'od gsal bas// sa lam btsal du med pa snying po 'dron// rnam par snang mdzad che mchog kun tu bzang // de yang sems dpa' rdo rje snying pa nyon// dper na rgyal po gzhan du mi 'gro bzhin// dang
313a6(rnying rgyud): sems yul la mi bakhyod don la gnas// de tsam nyid na chos smra bde ba'i klong // lam lam bgrod chos nyid ye shes sgra// sa dang lam la bgrod na byang chub gegs/ rdzogs pa chen por lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi rgyud las/ sa la spyang du med pa'i
313a7(rnying rgyud): le'u steng cu bzhi pa'o// de nas dad pas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// sun rig ston pa chos kang stsal pa// dam tshig bsrang nyams med pa'i ye shes ni// 'og ma bzhin du ngamadum lam las// nyams pa med phyir ye bcwa chen po chen
313b1(rnying rgyud): gder ldan pa lta ba'i dam tshig rkun du dran// ched du ma yin nga gis don gsal bas// ye bsrungs chen po 'dam tshig lta ba yin// ye nas 'das pa'i 'khor rnams yid kyis nyon// theg pa'i khyad par ji snyed grags pa dang // tshul khrims sdom dang phyi nang dmatshig
313b2(rnying rgyud): kyar// 'gro ba gdul bya ji ltar 'di la bstan// tha skad tsam du gdul bya zhes brjod kyang // dam du bca' bar bya ba rdul tsam med// dam bca' med pa'i don gyi dang rtogs na// dam du bcas kyang skyon med nam mkha' 'dra// 'dus pa'i snying po rdo rje sems dpa' nyan// chos
313b3(rnying rgyud): sku mig yo thugs kyi dam tshig ste// blang dor med par spyod pa dam tshig chen po yin// rang sems mi spang ye shes chen por gnas// dus gsum don dam ma bral nyams pa med// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gnyid rdzogs kyi rgyud las/ dam tshig bsrung nyams
313b4(rnying rgyud): med par bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// bsgoms na go la sar gyur pa 'khrul pa'i phyir// rang gi sems nyid ma rtogs rtsol ba ste// phyi yi yul gyi rtsol bas sems bsdus nas// 'og ma'i ltab
313b5(rnying rgyud): 'dod lugs rnam bzhi la// gnyis med ljang stong khas mi len pa rnams// so sor rtog pa'i rig pas gzhal byas nas// gsal ba spyod pa'i mnyam gzhag don bsgoms pas// drug la sgom pa'i gang zag la// bying nod mtha' dag shes bzhin byur byed// de nyid
313b6(rnying rgyud): blta ba ma shes gti mug ste// gsal la mi rtog bsgom dang 'dod chags bsgom pa rnams// bde la mi rtog zhen pa'i nga rgyal can// 'khor ba med dang lung du dogs pa'i zhe sdang gis// mi dmigs don la gza' gtad byas nas bsgom// rtsol bas bsgoms
313b7(rnying rgyud): kyang yul la 'gyur med phyir// mi rtog 'dod phyir rtson par dod la/ ga pa nyid du// dgag tu med pa tsam du thos bzung nas// gsal ba de mi dmigs ched du bsgoms pas nor// yul la gtan tshigs gzhig pas smos ci dges//
314a1(rnying rgyud): nadapapa su sag sa su ga na sa// sgrudas pa ga mas pa rnams sa/ ma masal 'a mags mam pazlas gang sasas pa sa byas sa// rnam
314a2(rnying rgyud): thung phyir gnas lugs chosas yin// de byed pa sgoms na 'khor ba'i nang byin min/ rdzog sa bachen po bsti pa ma shes ny-i rdzogs kyi rgyu las/ bsgoms go lasang bskrun pa'i le'u ste jug pa'o// / de nas yang 'ang ga ston pa thun
314a3(rnying rgyud): bzang gis// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// ngag 'dang gus pa'i sems kyis rtse gcig nyon// la bzla' ba yi ye shes don chen // kun gzhi ga zhi mamapal la ny+tsi shAr bzhin// thams cad kun 'das ye shes rang snang gsal// le nas bcal med
314a4(rnying rgyud): sa/ la su sa sa pa sa sa
314a5(rnying rgyud): la spyod du med pas rang la rdzogs// chos su 'di zhes gzhan nas mi rnyi pas// rtogs par 'dod na rang gi sems la tshol// sems la don rnyed rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa// 'phrul pa med kying sems can 'khor ba med// rang sems rtogs pa'i don las
314a6(rnying rgyud): gtogs pa// bde zhing skyid pa'i sangs rgyasna logs na med// de phyir rgyal mi rtog 'bras bu med// med la rtsolnga brgya mtsho'i chu bor nas// sdig rgyu ri dwags chung mthong ba snyeg pa bzhin// bsgom med don nyid por nas sus bsgom pa// byang chub med pa
314a7(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal ba sngo/ de sang sems dpa' rdo rje yid kyis nyon// yonas de nga zla ba'i rnab 'byor ba// ye shes tu ti ngos kyi gter du srin/ ma ma pa ga 'das 'byung ba'i ba mdu de nogs pa'i gsangasas byas pa mang de/ mas ni dag sa 'gro ba
314b1(rnying rgyud): di// dus gsum 'gyur med dang rig lta ba'i dbyings// 'dod dgu rang la yon tan tshang ba'i phyir// chu 'bras rang la rag ma lus pas zab// dper na ma dros mcho dkyil me 'bar ba// nam mkha'i dkyil nas babs pa'i chu yis ni// bskal par de la gnod pa mi nus
314b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin// rang sems chos nyid rang byung ye shes la// 'khor bar 'khyams kyang sgrib pas gos pa med// rin chen me 'od nam mkhar 'thon pa'i tshe// rgya mtsho nyid kyang bdud rtsir gyur pa bzhin// rang gis byang chub sems nyid rtogs tsam na// dug lnga nyid kyang ye
314b3(rnying rgyud): shes chen por 'char/ rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gnyid rdzogs kyi rgyud las// ye shes kyi don la bzla'i pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje sems dpa' yis// 'dus pa'i tshogs la nges don phran gdags
314b4(rnying rgyud): phyir// ston pa kun rig sems kyi rgyal po la// bden pa'i yid kyis 'di skad gsol// dug lnga ma spangs rang grol ji ltar byung // che ba'i yon tan mi 'byung gang gis bsgribs// tshogs ma bsags pa'i gzugs sku gang las 'byung // gong 'og the tshom gegs ni gang ltar
314b5(rnying rgyud): gcad// the tshomachod pa'i nyams myong rtags ni gang // mnyam pa'i rgyal pos thugs kyis bstan du gsol// de skad gsol pa'i don gsan thugs kyis bka' stsal pa// dug lha ma spangs dang grol ye shes ni// rin chen 'od kyis mun pa med pa ltar// 'khor sa thog
314b6(rnying rgyud): martsad rgod don gyi phyir// ngo bo nyid kyi sku ni rang rtogs pas// gdod nas ma rig dag pas gti mug bral// de yang 'dus pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// ma rig med phyir zhe sdang yul mi dmigs// de phyir rang sems snying po chos sku la// snga phyi zhen pa'i dbang gis zhe
314b7(rnying rgyud): sdang na// kha dog yul la man sems byed pa'i phyir// ba mo la ni nyi ma shar ba bzhin// phyi 'brel bcad pa'i man ngag dran par bya// de yang dang ldan 'khor rnams i sa nyon// 'dod rags che ba'i yal ri so ma 'brang ba'i sems// phyi rol zang zing nor la
315a1(rnying rgyud): pan ma chags nas// brang bas me tog gzhibs na yi zhen ltar// chags pa nyid nas zhen mad rang gi sems// sems la byed pa med phyir sems nyid don du shes// sems can po mo las kyi chags pa yang // rang sems chos nyid
315a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i rnal 'byor pas// mi sdug gnyen po bsgom pa mi dgos par// yul la pho mo yod phyir chags pa spyod gyur kyang // sems la pho mo med pas nyes pa med/ de nyid dus nas rig pas gsal thebs pas// dus gsum pho mor spyar kyang nyams pa med// de yang
315a3(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i dang ldan yid kyis nyon// nga rgyal chen po rang sems rtogs par 'char// de phyir khams kyi rab tu byed pa yin// gnyen po mi dgos rang grol byang chub sems// dper na smra ma mkhan gyi sprul ba yang // sems can yin zhes mkhas pas sgo mi 'dogs//
315a4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin blo dngos gcig par rtogs pa yis// bsgom du yod sogs par ni nga rgyal med// 'dus pa'i snying po 'khor rnams nyon cig/ blta ba nam mkha' lta bur 'phang chod rnal 'byor pas// mthol phrag dog mnyam la srad gyur kyang / mi len mi spang mnyam
315a5(rnying rgyud): chen po ste// ma ki ta yes thams cad sman du 'gyur ba bzhin// don dran ma nor man ngag gdeng gis 'phangs// bla ma'i bka' nod ye shes rnal 'byor la// dug lnga ma spangs rang grol ye shes thugs/ rdzogs pa chen po blta ba yi shes gting rdzogs kyi rgyad la
315a6(rnying rgyud): na rmongapa ma spangs rang grol du bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas yon tan mtshan dang des byud de// stobs dang mi 'jigs chos ni bco brjid dang // dus ni da ltar byung ba
315a7(rnying rgyud): sa bsgribs// dper na drung chen sgo nga'i nang nag shog rgyas kyang // rgong ma chag 'phur mi nus pa bzhin// rang sems chos skur rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor kyang // lus 'di che ba'i yon tani ba byung phyir// thun mong sman gyi sbyor ba'i thabs kyis ni/ sbyor A
315b1(rnying rgyud): bipra bzang lon gyis// rang lus 'di nyid gsos grur lus rgyas na// drag dang mtshon sogs mi chog bung gyur nas// mkha' la bya bzhin 'phur ba byung nas te// sems kyi mngon shes mi las mngon gyur te// lus 'di yul yin phyir na sems min pas// gnas/
315b2(rnying rgyud): skabs 'brel pa yod phyir rtags byung yang // sha khrag lus 'di ma bor bar du ni// sangs rgyas che ba'i yon tan 'thung mi srid// de yang sems dpa' rdo rje tron// rang don grub pa thob pa rnams kyang ni// thabs kyis sbyor ba yin phyir lus kyis bsgribs/ dper
315b3(rnying rgyud): namo yod du ba 'byung ba bzhin// rang sems ma bcos de dag gsal gyur na// che ba'i yon tan ma lus thugs kyis byung // sangs rgyas nyid kyang bla mchog grong khyer du// rung lus 'bor phyir sems can smos ci dgos// de phyir bcom ldan 'das kyang rdo rnga'i gdan thog //
315b4(rnying rgyud): yang sangs rgyas pas mtshan dang dpe byad ldam// rje ba'i yon tan ma lus span gyis jog// rdzogs pa chen po sgru ba ste shes gting rdzogs kyi spyadang las/ dul 'dir sangs rgyas ni yon tan mi 'byung bar bsdad pa'i la du skye bcu dbu pa'o// / de nas yang sa
315b5(rnying rgyud): 'i 'khor la bka' stsal ba// rang sems ra ba nyid dugs pa zlar na// ye shes tshogs ca rdzogs nas chos kyi bya// dper na rgyam tsho rnyog ma de dngas blang // nam mkha'i gzugs brtan 'byung ba'i 'gag bzhin// chos nyid dang bas longs spyod rig pa'i rgyur/
315b6(rnying rgyud): yi sprul pa sna tshogs sprul pa'i sku// de yang sems dpa' rdo rje yid kyis nyon// chu nyid tshogs kyis btsags kyang gzugs brnyan med// med bzhin sems kyi ngo bo nyid la ni// kun bzang sangs rgyas nyid kyis gzugs btsal kyang // 'dod pas lus las sangs rgyas rnyed
315b7(rnying rgyud): srid// bsod nams tshogs kyis gzugs su 'byung ba med// rimad du ston pa sangs rgyas gzugs kyi sra// mos pa so sor 'dul phyir sdang pod kyang // brgyad nas chos su rtogs pa'i thabs su bstan// smon lam dbang gis 'gro ba'i don byed pa// 'og ma'i blos
316a1(rnying rgyud): gzhagasangs rdzas chos su men// dat+ta du sems ma rtogs dag 'jus// da bras bu'i byung dbye bzhinan// bskal pa snang du tshugs na bsags byas kyang // 'bras tha gzugs sgra'i sa sa rgyas 'gyu ma 'gyur// de
316a2(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i dang ldan 'khor rnams nyon// gser sbrul mig gis 'dod pa lo yon tan la// dus gcig nyams myong dpe bzhinan la 'byor pas// ngo bo nyid kyi chu rtogs chos kyi mu// de la rig pas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// sna tshogs nyid nabs la rdebs sprul pa'i
316a3(rnying rgyud): las med rtog par dka' phyir gsang ba'i sku// blo dngos gcig phyir mngon par byang chub ste// de rnams gcig gi yon tan lnga 'byung bas// sangs rgyas 'gro don btsal me dgos pa'i phyir// sems can rnams la rang sems chos kyi // rdzogs pa chen po ye shes gting
316a4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs kyi rgyan las/ chos su rtogs ni gzugs su 'byung bar bstan pa'o khe wa ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas kun dag ston pas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// the tshom gegs ni bsal thabs bka' stsal pa// 'khor 'das spyi yi mtshan nyid sems yin te//
316a5(rnying rgyud): na kun kyang yin phyir ma rtogs min// a ti thig chen snying po rdzogs pa'i phyir// yod med gang nges rtag chad skyon yin phyir// ma des rgyu 'bras log pa'i kha ze ba// sangs rgyas 'bras bu mthob snying rje'i gnas// de yang 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs yid kyis nyon// 'jig
316a6(rnying rgyud): den pa dang 'das pa'i chos rnams kun// gnyis ka'i gzhi ni ngo bo chos skur nges// yul gyi snang ba ma des sna tshogs pa// blang dor med phyir chos rnams lhun gyis grub// 'dus pa'i snying po'i gtso bos don gsol pa// yul nyid sems las sems nyid yul yin la
316a7(rnying rgyud): yul nyid yin phyir yul la jug bsngal rigs// sems nyid yul na rang rig bems por thal// srang sdud mi shes zhen pa skye ba'i sgo// de phyir rdzogs chen chos su bla med gang // de yang 'khor gyi snying po yid kyis nyon// yul nyid ldang spur zhen pa rnam
316b1(rnying rgyud): nga dang me nga gnyen pos btsal mi dgos// decom na na pas ma gtan mchog gi lam// de la gnyen po med phyir tham dathos kyis// de yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams tsun cig/ bsgom du yod meng sgo srung mthar gyung phyir// bsgom pa'i ni gnas mtha' 'a zhen pa
316b2(rnying rgyud): matogs pasgom med don gyi ga dang bral// de phyir mtha' yi ba lta ba mod pa'i lam// de yang dang ldan 'khor rnams yid kyis nyon// a ti man dag chos su'i snying po'i// bsgoms kyang rig le med ring sems nam mkha' 'dra// mu bsgoms pas kyang rgyas
316b3(rnying rgyud): rtag bral med/ byang chub lam du sems nyid rtogs pa che// sems dpa' rdo rjes yid ge/ don zhus pa// sangs cas sems can gcig gas za da lam// tha dad 'brel med thugs rjes pana'i nus// gcig na 'gro drag sems can gyi phyir byung // kun drag ston
316b4(rnying rgyud): pas bka' stsal yid kyis nyon// de gnyis so sor snang ba ma yin te// rtogs nor po gcig phyi dathugs rje 'byung // rang sems ma rig nus tog sdug bsngal yin// don la dbyer med sems nyid ldan gyis grub// 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis sems don yid kyis
316b5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas sems can rgyu 'bras yin gyur na// sangs rgyas las byung rnam gsum don med 'gyur// sems can las byung tshogs gnyis 'das mi rtog/ kun rig ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas sems can chu 'bras ro gcig phyir// ltos pas gcig
316b6(rnying rgyud): la gcig byung ma yin te// gnyis ka'i ngo bo rang sems chos srur gcig/ sangs rgyas sems can skyon yon rnam gnyis kyis// chos nyid 'khrul pa gang yang gzhi bzhag nas// gnyis ka ltar yang rtsod na mi 'gal phyir// mi rig ye shes gang rung phyogs bzung na/
316b7(rnying rgyud): sran mang yin la thams cad min pa'i phyir// rgya yo dang ni n+ya medapa/ ra gyura'o// gzhi bzhag mnor shin tu gces par gsungs// sems dpa' rdo rdzas 'khor gyi ga lus pa// rang la yod pa mkhas pas de na nyon// ye nas yod naman ngag bstan pa dgos/
317a1(rnying rgyud): bzhin na mad pags// ston sa lang la bku 'ang// 'anas ma gang ba mthun/ thams ma pa mang na bstan pas/ mchogasung shag lngas// lags sa ma
317a2(rnying rgyud): ma yin no// dang ldan 'byor kyis do rten yid kyis nus// zhem pa dang g.yul la'i rtog pa// tsam bu nyams myong zhi ga nas skyon yin bying // togs nang tud yin byed bad dag min// mdun 'du shes med pa nyid du thal// de yang sems dpa'adzad nyid
317a3(rnying rgyud): pa tog de nyid bsam gtan ti/ sgyog dang ming na gnyis 'breg ni nyid // rgyo/ mna' tshod pas chos nyid byang chub sems// de yang ra sh+tha ye shes don togasun// yul nyid mi rtog zla bzhi mngon la gnas// de yang mnangag gis rje ngon dang gal// ma myom sas
317a4(rnying rgyud): ngag bka' la dgos med 'gyur// de yang 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs yid kyis nyon// bla ma mkhas pa'i mnang gdon zab sos// kun gzhig zhi chos su 'ong bo nyid// bcos su med la rang sems nam mkha' 'dra// grol yul nyid 'khrul phyir 'brel bachod/
317a5(rnying rgyud): yid la blta ba bstan pas nyon mongs grol// de phyir bka' don shin tu gces par gsungs/ rdzogs pa chen ro sa lte ba ma shes gti rdzogs kyi rgyal po'i chud las/ rgyas kyi ge/ sa bsal ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa ga cig pa'o// / de nas 'du
317a6(rnying rgyud): tshigs la bka' stsal pa// d+mo dngos gzhi la gnyis med pa rtogs na// ming gi tha skad rnam grangs 'dzin med gyir// yul la gyi zhen sa 'i ngas dgrol// btsal med pasam gtan nyams s+ho pa'i rtags// phan gnod de lta bu dang ya? kya nas// thams snga
317a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyi sems ni skyes pabam// mnyam nyid rig pas gsal rdebs rnal 'byor de// blo dngos gnyis med nyams su myong ba'i rtags// de yang sems dpa 'do de nyon cig/ kun tu bzung po 'od dang bcas nas ni// dbang por mngon sung byon nas chos pasta /
317b1(rnying rgyud): bzang po yin pa'i sems kyis dang rgyu dang // ga shin rje'i 'jigs pa byung yang nyam ming // gnyis pa 'khrul bar rtogs phyir srang lan meng // lta ba gdang ldan nyams stong yin pa'i rtags// zag pa'i bye brag chos rnams ca gsungs kyang // don la bzang dran mad
317b2(rnying rgyud): rtogs phyir na spro srur bral// chos la bzod pa thob pa'i nyams myong rtags// lus ngag yid gsum sdug bde ci byung yang // skyon yon mi blta rang sems 'khrul pa'i phyir// snga phyi med par lta ba'i gdong ldanan// chos nyid rang gsal nyams su myong ba'i rtags//
317b3(rnying rgyud): lus dang mi mthun pa yin dang bgegs// byung yang bag chags dang ni nyon mongs pa// rtog pa brtas pa nyid las ma gtogs pa// zhen pa med phyir chos sgra dang pa yis// mi gtong dran par byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa// dngos grub rtsol med dgongs pa nyams myong rtags /
317b4(rnying rgyud): de yang 'dus pa'i snying po de nyon cig/ byang chub sems la snga phyi med pa'i phyir// 'jig rten mthon dmar gar skyes lus nyid kyang // skye 'gag med pa'i sems la sems gnas na// 'du 'bral med pa'i dgongs pa nyams myong rtags// rtags chen de ldan rnal
317b5(rnying rgyud): 'byor rnams kyis ni// ci spyod thams cad ye shes sangs rgyas thugs// mi li lus la sgrib g.yogs 'di nyid la// lha mi rnams kyis phyag 'tshal mchod par 'gyur/ rdzogs pa chen po blta ba ye shes gting rdzogs rgyal po'i thud las/ rtags bstan pa'i la
317b6(rnying rgyud): ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas sems dpa' rdo rje snying po yis// dad ldan 'khor la phan gdags phyir// mnyam pa'i rgyal po kun bzang la// yid kyi dran pas 'di skad don gsol pa/ blta ba nyams pa'i rnal 'byor skyon ni gang // de la sgor
317b7(rnying rgyud): pas je skar bstan par bkye/ bskangs pa'i 'bras bu ji ltar 'byung // 'khor 'das sa mtshams bag chags gang gis gzung // de yi gdams dag rnal 'byor gang la gad// mnyam pa'i ye shes rgyal pos lung bstan gsol// de skad zhus pa'i don gsan nyid
318a1(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ don med dmyal dregs pas mkhas 'dod pas// rang gi blta bas ya rabs mtho bzhed nas// rtsig la mnyam stor mkhas pa'i bla med kyang // dmachog phyal por byang chub sems spangs nas// log 'phyem bong gsog
318a2(rnying rgyud): bden tshig ci smras kyang // 'khrul pa'i sems nyid log 'dren dbang du 'gyur// gnam ljags mkha' las 'dam du bying ba bzhin// dmyal bar nges 'gro gtan du snying po rje// de yang 'dus pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// gsang sngags gsang ba'i lba ba'i sgor zhugs nas//
318a3(rnying rgyud): yang dag rang sems don la ma 'dud par// mi chos zang zing lus ngag las byed pas// ri bos srog chags 'og tu mnan pa ltar// mi shes rang gi nga rgyal bsnyem byed pa// nam yang sangs rgyas byang chub thob mi srid// de yang sems dpa'i snying po de nyon cig/ rgya mtsho'i
318a4(rnying rgyud): dbyings kyi pha bong dkyil skams ltar// theg pa 'og ma'i sde snod chos mnyan kyang // yang dag don gyi lta ba'i gdeng med par// tshig tsam lung las chos kyi khungs phyung nas// byar med chos la nga rgyal blo brtan nas// lus ngag rtsing chos phad hra la spyod byed pas// rang sems
318a5(rnying rgyud): bkag kyang 'khor bar mi skyobs te// sdug bsngal yanga'i 'bras bu'i tshom med// blta ba nyams pa'i skyon du bshad pa'i phyir// shin tu rnal 'byor don nyid rtogs pag ces/ rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs rgyal po'i rgyud las// rnal 'byor pa'i blta ba
318a6(rnying rgyud): nyams pa'i skyon bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas yang kun rig rnam par snang mdzad kyis// rnal 'byor blta ba nyams na skong ba'i thabs// 'dus pa'i tshogs la ched du bka' stsal pa// rang gi byang chub sems nyid ma rtogs na// ma hA'i
318a7(rnying rgyud): yo ga'i chos kyi tshogs mchod phyir// rgong bshags phrin las gzhung du byas gyur kyang // rnal 'byor lta ba nyams pa bskang mi 'gyur// de yang sems dpa' rdo rje yid kyis nyon// bla ma brgyad pa'i gdams nga gdon ldan la// rang sems dbang du 'atsugs nas don kus nas
318b1(rnying rgyud): tad lta dra byas nas// spyod tho cog gisangs rgya chog tu g+sa// 'di can thugs lagasal ba'i mchog ste// yan lag dam chog nyams kyang bsgrib ma nus// rdzun d+ham gtong nyi 'dzin don bstan// mamams mngal dgas byas kya sa/
318b2(rnying rgyud): tsho dang drag po med byas brta ba ni// mi brjed gzungs su don la gus pa'i chos// sems la gsal bas rnamatog ming yang med// skyabs dang mgon du lta ba mchog tu gsungs/ rdzogs pa chen po lta ba le shas gzhing rdzogs rgyal po'i hud las/ rnal
318b3(rnying rgyud): 'askong ba'i thabs bstan pa'i leng ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i snying po 'khor rnams la// kun bzang ston pa chos rjes bka' stsal pa// lta ba nyams pa bslangs pa'i 'bras buni// rang sems sangs rgyas ye shes snying po 'byung /
318b4(rnying rgyud): rto ces kyis sangs rgyas sel gnas// 'bras bu gzhan du btsal mi dgos pas mchog/ rang byung gdod nas dag pa'i ngo bo nyid// chos sku 'gyur ba med pa rang sems don// 'bras bu dus la mi ltos da'an nyid// ye shes dbang thob sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/
318b5(rnying rgyud): narnam smin lus 'di bral bas kun bzang thugs// byang chub chos nyid rang byung mthar phyin pas// mi tshe 'di yis byang chub mchog thob nas// chu la mi ltos 'bras bu ye shes tshogs// da lta nyid du sems 'di kun tu bzang // lus 'di bral bas sangs rgyas chos kyi
318b6(rnying rgyud): su// skye ba mi len 'bras bu btsal mi dgos// dngas po lus med snying po byang chub sems// sprin med nam mkhar gza' skar 'char ba bzhin// rang sems rtogs pas 'gro don btsal mi dgos/ rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs rgyal po'i rgyud
318b7(rnying rgyud): las// ba nyams pa bskangs pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas kun rig rgyal pos 'khor rnams la// 'khor 'das sa mtshams bka' stsal pa// thog mar 'khrul pa'i gzhi gnas bag chags de// gnye
319a1(rnying rgyud): 'ad chags rigs dang gas pa rnams// ra thom dus kyi sa pa g.yogs pa gtugs patug// rnam sa pa ma dmamasal tu/ rnab pa snyoms martogs pa don// dpagasbyin phyoganags
319a2(rnying rgyud): nams mi mthong bsgribs pa'i mun pa bzhin// ma rig dbang gis bsgribs pa'i bag chags kyis// rang la yod pa'i chos su don chen bsgribs// dan sngon gyi rdzas rnams rjes dran nas// gos dang gnyen 'dun dran pa byung nas kyang // nga nyid nges par shingam gang
319a3(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba'i// srib g.yogs lus kyi chu bur dmigs pa'i phyir// dper na mig phyung bzhin du bag chags zlos// dug lnga las la kun spyod yid dran 'gyur// shes rab lta ba'i mig med gti mug blos// mi shes byed pa med phyir 'dus byas kyi// dge ba lus ngag
319a4(rnying rgyud): yid kyis ci smad kyang // phan brdul tsam mi nus don med la byams// de tshe gzugs bral yid kyi dbang po ni// bran tshang thogs med 'gro ba'i phyir na 'khrul// dper na dab chags mkha' la 'gro yang ni// 'dod pa'i dbang gis sa khung rtsi yis 'dzin// de bzhin
319a5(rnying rgyud): gzung 'dzin dbang gis lus su 'dug/ de co gcig gis tha dad gang len pa// char sogs sdug bsngal nyed gyur skabs tshol bas// gzhal yas nA yi spyil skyibs nang dag tu// rang dbang med par thugs kyis chud pa snyam// po mo 'du 'grod rkyen gyis mngal du
319a6(rnying rgyud): 'jug/ nam bzhi gang rung las kyis bye ba'i phyir// mtho na dman las la 'dam pa'i dbang med pa// de yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams da nyon cig/ mtha' ma'i rnal 'byor blta ba rtogs pa yi// gdams ngag skal med bsam gtam ni gnas kyis// ye shes
319a7(rnying rgyud): bag chags mnyam nyid ting 'dzin cis// rdzogs par mnyams su myong ba'i phyir// 'dod chags lha migar skyes rang dbang yod// rtogs pa 'bring gi rnal 'byor blta ba ni// dran pa ma yengs tsam du don gsal na// nam rtog chags pa de nyid dazil gyis gnon// dper
319b1(rnying rgyud): nami gang rtsal ldan de shugs kyis// rtsal med non bzhin rjes su gsal bas na// dper na khyung spong nang nas bya ba ton bzhin// rnam smin lus dang bral nas don dran te// gtsang ma ris kyi lhar ni skyes nas kyang // mngon par 'bras bu sangs rgyas ye shes 'byung // de yang sems
319b2(rnying rgyud): dpa' rdo rje snying po nyen// rtogs par bgyi blo dngos gcig pa'i phyir// lta ba'i rgyun la yengs pa mi 'byung phyir// lus kyi sgrib g.yogs bral ba'i skad cig la// 'bras bu sangs rgyas rgyal po chos kyi sku// dpe med kun bzang ye shes thugs kyi thugs// nam mkha'i mtha/
319b3(rnying rgyud): su nyi shar mun pa med// de bzhin rnal 'byor lus bral sems nyid la// ma rig med par chos nyid gsal ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas ye shes thugs la 'char nub med// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi rgyud las/ 'khor 'das gnyis kyis
319b4(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa 'o rje snying po nyan// spyod pa tshul 'chos byed cing slob dpon slongad// nor phangs chos 'dod thabs kyis 'drid pa la// ye shes gting rtags rgyud cen lha ba ni// spyod ngan rnams la nam yang bstan par ma gsungs so// bka' bzhin ma byas don gyi snying po chos/
319b5(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten nor phye don ston rnal 'byor la// sangs rgyas dkon mchog bka' chad 'byung nges phyir// 'jig rten mkha' 'gro dam can smos ci dgos// gnod sbyin srin pas srog bcid mnang med srung // da yang 'khor gyi sems dpa' yid kyis nyon// bstan pa/
319b6(rnying rgyud): 'jig pa'i dus 'di tshos rnams bye// snying bsngags chen danang di drung 'gyur bas// khyod ldanarnal 'byor 'ga' la gtad pa lang// da me gang dgra rnams kyi spyod sru med// 'khor rnams can kyang nges par deng zhig/ lan cigardul 'byor las
320a1(rnying rgyud): chas pa can// dang ma pa mkhas nyams sa len pa med// 'dus byas chos spangs denas mi 'dud par // bsad napas 'ad cing gong dungs dzad byung // dayang darjes mas dpa' byeng brnyan// rnal 'byor gang zhig tu /
320a2(rnying rgyud): chos// gsung bzhi don las mi 'da' dang btsun// dka' dgu bsngos nas pan gtud 'di com// do rdorna la 'byor las can don gyi phyir// sra bsgril me bu skad 'di bsta par byis// yul to nod ldan ma phreng dus nyan// chos rlung yod pa'i gtsug lag khang chen
320a3(rnying rgyud): namA// dregs pa'i rtsa rten gnas pa'i blag dkyiladu// sa phyogs brtags ladu ldan byer bas la// par skyed rmo lam bta la N+Di bzhag/ rdzogs pa rje la ma gas ti rdzogs kyi rdzas/ li nga la chud gtad pa'i leng hU~M thAHbtsum
320a4(rnying rgyud): pa/ rdzogs pa ltab ma zhes shi ti rdzogs kyi chung po rkyen gyi phral bya la gsung drung nas/ seng tha ma'i brib po d+ha ga pa mdzan kyi slong pa sa la bas du da pa'i mashes pa shang / des thong pa 'du
320a5(rnying rgyud): sa khyo pa chos gsung tho la zhi 'ardzogs so// / gang dang// 'dus thug pa thal ba ga tu/ ga/ ma pa sa po mdon da/ dngal mams dpa' la phyag
320a6(rnying rgyud): 'tshal lo// 'di na bdag gis bshad pa'i dus gcigan/ bcom ldan 'das ring ba'i rdzogs pa da do// oM kris sman ces drab pa/ rang zung ga pa'i tshul po// 'odags pa sbyin sa kyang pani/ rig pa 'od 'byung med pa'i gas la yas khang po
320a7(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi sangs thas dang / khams gsum gyi sems can dang / lam la rjes su sta rnams 'byed pa mi mnga' ba thabs cig cu thugs so// den pa de bzhin gshegs pa gang brgyal po la// rig pa'i rdo rjes 'di skad ces zhus so// e mdo dgongs pan ma
320b1(rnying rgyud): gas ga nga na nas / rdzogs pa da di legs par gangan/ zhasags sa// sa dpa na tu gnan na sus podas// brgyas ba blan na na sa /
320b2(rnying rgyud): gsang batheg pa'i dang // chos kun 'dus pa smras pa med/ 'grong med rtsol bral sbyin gyis grub/ lhungs thob ma yin rtogs pa'i stong // dag pa'i rgyal po kun gsal ba// dod pa'i don kun rdzogs pa'i bdag/ ye shes ci rtson mthol la ma//
320b3(rnying rgyud): theg pa kun rdzogs mkha' ltar yangs// rang galegs pa'i seng ponyid// kun gying nga bzhin chos kyi dbyings// sgra 'dogs sbyar 'debs pa na kyis stong nga// gcig ste rnam pa yongs kyis rung // zlog pa gcig la ku rdzogs pas// ye shes
320b4(rnying rgyud): dzin ni lor lo bstan ma dgos// rang byung dgongs par kun rdzogs pas// ma btsal ldan bub dang las byung // phyag tu chen po bdag gnas skyed// mu bsgoms 'da' ba myed pa'i nga // dngos thal rig pa'i phyag rgya 'di// ye shes snying po
320b5(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba// bran kyi nga thong bdag gnas pas// 'di nyi bzhin ga nyid dpag // thegagacig sbyong rdzogs pa'o// chos kyi tshogs kya ngaganas// don thun yang ma rdzogs cig lel// rang bzhin gnas pas rim pa med/
321a1(rnying rgyud): po dag padon gyi rgyud// dathA theg pa'i yang snying 'di// ye shes thug mardzogs pa stug/ mi'ang 'a nyid man don// 'du shes spyod ba ma lus zad// rnga med sems la khyen thal bas// lha'i rig 'byung bag la yod// yanas/
321a2(rnying rgyud): zin pas bya ba med// lhun gyis rdzogs pas bsal pa med// rad la rdzogs pas bslab tu med// dmigs med don la bsgo ma du med// dus gcig rdzogs pas bgrod du med// ye shes rig pa'i phyaka rgyal// nam mo la 'bras bu kra rdzogs ldan// gsang bang
321a3(rnying rgyud): byung rig pa'i sgra// brjod pa ma yin don gyis shes// 'di ltar gcig tu gnas pa la// tha dad mthong ba 'khrul pa'i lam// snying po sems nyid rdzogs pa la// dran dang dbang po yid byed med// lus dang ngag sems rtsal gnas med// ci 'dir gnas pa
321a4(rnying rgyud): dgag bsgrub med// ces gsungs so// snying po rnal mngon gyi rgyud las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtsol med rig pa'i rgyal pos/ ldan gyis grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
321a5(rnying rgyud): nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// ma btsal lhun grub ma bcos chos kyi dbyings// mtshol ma byas ye nas ji bzhin nyid// rang byung gsang ba'i dbyings 'di brjod bral te// mtshon dang brtags shing dpyad pa'i yul las 'das// dus gsum rnam dag rig pa dbyar
321a6(rnying rgyud): med pas// rig pa dbyer med gcig tu lhun gyis rdzogs// ma bsags ma sbyangs ye sangs rgyas pa'i klong // mtha' bral rig pa'i klong la bsam zhing brjod du med// ye nas/ kun rdzogs bdag nyid lhun rdzogs pa// sa la mi bgrod lam la mi sbyang zhing // ma rtogs
321a7(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin spyad pa sgyu ma'i nad// ma btsal rang bzhin bzhag pas grub pa yin// ma yengs klod du zhugs na bsgom pa yin// rig pa gcig la rdzogs pas 'dus pa yin// rang bzhin 'da' ba med pas dam tshig yin// macol ldan gyis grub pa 'bras bu yin//
321b1(rnying rgyud): tu mang ngam gnyis bzung rdeg pa bathabs// theg panacig la gnyis na sa// da pa kyag shang pa lung gas gas/ ma na cags pa nga bab bsam// byags// bkar med nas
321b2(rnying rgyud): log mthong stobs kyis bltas// bgrod med la ma la nam tog zhen pas bzod// gzung med mnyam nyid byin ci log tu brgyang // ma dag dag par bkas pas dag pa rtog sa langs// lkog phyag rgyas bcings pas ye shes phyag rgya shig/ sa brjod ye shes gsung
321b3(rnying rgyud): mchog brjod pas nyams// mtshan pa'i sgril 'khor bsgoms pas ye shes dkyil 'khor spangs// btad spyoms nyid nyid bsgom sa pas pa de sachog phyag cadral// mtshan chog la sben pas mtha' yi lta bar ldang // gang yang mi 'byed pa mchog dbying sa la ba/
321b4(rnying rgyud): snying po'i snying po dag pa'i ye shes nyid// don mi don te kun don sems la thug/ ud kyi chung ded kun 'brel dang bzhin rdzogs// b+ha bral rdzogs lung bde tsog phyag rgyas gdab// yenas mi 'ad 'a lhad kyis grub par gsal// rang byung gcig la bskas dkur rang blangs/
321b5(rnying rgyud): rnam pa ldan grub rol pa ngom // rang bzhin gcig la yon tan kun cheng bas// ma bcol bzhag pas yon tan dang na rdzogs// ma bsags sun thub rgyad 'bras dral// ngag las ma yin gdod nas lhan rdzogs yin// sbyang mthob ma yin da// pa ba
321b6(rnying rgyud): yin// dmigs bral 'di nyid mkha'i ltar khyab par gnas// bsam med brjod bral chos dbyings su// brjod pas rig pa'i ye shes rnyed mi 'gyur// ma btsa rang bzhag pade chen rgyas thebs na// thams cad ye shes pade mchog phyag rgya rags la// stong mi
321b7(rnying rgyud): nga po yin dbu payin// gang men de yin pa dag gzhan gang yang min// bsam padun nad byung ba'i 'dre shes med// gong ning radags la rang ga de mchod dbyings// gsum byings la thebs pas 'ad mi srid// phragasum dpyongs la ba 'brang khril du //
322a1(rnying rgyud): ma rnyogs dngos mar gsal bas ste/ ba pa med// ma yengs rang bzhin gsal bas sangs rgyas yin// yangs med 'khor los slob pa rnam par gcod// rnyog dang martog rtog pas ma rtog ste// martog rtog dus bzhi yis mi phye la// du
322a2(rnying rgyud): cod des 'dzin pade mchog gdams ngag bzhin// rtog dang ma rtog gnyis ka bsal gyur na// dam pa'i dgongs pa lhun gyis grub nges pas// rtog ma bsal zhing dngas ma blang du med// sdig gsum bde bar gcig pas 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa med// ldan sgrub nyams su
322a3(rnying rgyud): myong bas 'bras bu ngogs med// rig pa'i mo phrul nyid la chol bsrug bya mi dgos// zhes gsungs so// gling po don gyi spyad las/ ma btsal ldan gyis grub pa'i lung phog pa'i le'u ste/ gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das reg pa'i
322a4(rnying rgyud): po des/ thams cad gtan la phebs pa'i ting nge 'don la gnas pa'i di skad gsungs so// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// rang sems rdzogs pas rang bzhin gsal// sra dang tshad ma gtan tshigs kyis// brjod bral gtan la phebs pa med// ma bcos rig
322a5(rnying rgyud): cigatan tshigs pas/ ma brjod don phung po mtshon// rba yi rang bzhin gsher ba star// rig pa nya las su zhes par bya// ji bzhin rtogs pa'i nyams med na// tshig gi bad 'phrog gang brjod kyang // 'da'amartog pa'i rjes su 'brangs// bded thal nam tog lag
322a6(rnying rgyud): sa bsdams// rang zung rig pa'i thig ra yis// mkhyab pa yi chos med pas// spro bsnga rnal lo dbyings la rdzogs// bde min rig pa ji dzi'i lung // ma bcos rang gas la dbying 'jogs// de la der gzhag dang bzhag// 'badang med pa lhan bris bub
322a7(rnying rgyud): bcal spun gyis thub pa'i phyir// dbang na nyi ma'i 'od dang mtshungs// me bcos sems kyi rang bzhin dang // ci bzhin dag pa'i gtan tshigs cis// de nyid ma yin gzhan min te/ gnyis med rig pa dus gcig rdzogs// kun rdzogs pa chen yangs dag pang // nga
322b1(rnying rgyud): sems lhun grub snying po ni// nyams myong rig pa dpe bzhin ltar // 'od gsal 'du shes rnam bral bas// rang gsal rig pa dbyings la rdzogs// brgyud pa thabs kyi 'phrul tshig gis// rang byung 'od gsal bde chen la// gnyis med don las me g.yo yang //
322b2(rnying rgyud): ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa'i mtshon// thams cad rtogs pa'i thabs yin pas// gang ltar bde ba'i don la 'dzud// mthun 'dug spyod pa rgya mtsho ni// 'dul ba'i thabs la bstan pa yin// rim pa 'am dus gcig khyad par ni// rtogs pa'i khyad par che chung
322b3(rnying rgyud): gis// dngos po gcig la dbye ba min// gnyis med don du gsal bar gcig/ 'dul thabs theg pa byas ma yas pa// rang byung theg pa'i snying por gcig/ rang byung rig pa mthun pa med// btan pa rgya mtsho thugs la rdzogs// dngos de thabs kyis ma
322b4(rnying rgyud): mtshon na// rang byung gcig gis khyab gnas kyang // rgyal po'i phrug gu 'khyams pa ltar// rang gi mtshan nyid ma rtogs so// 'di ltar rang bzhin gcig pa la// bsam pa'i stobs kyis so sor phye// don dang 'brel ba'i phra khrid kyis// brjod bral sems kyi phyag
322b5(rnying rgyud): rgya rtogs// nges pa'i don la de ma thag/ skal ldan 'bad pa med par grol// bde mchog don las ma 'das pas// ma btsal mthar phyin sems kyi lam// rim pa med par dus gcig 'jug/ rig pa sems kyi rtsal rdzogs pas// ma btsal lhun grub phyogs ris
322b6(rnying rgyud): med// gang la phyogs ris rtsol med pas// rang byung phyogs med rang gsal la// rgyu med rkyen med byang chub sems// ma bsags lhun rdzogs dus gcig rdzogs// rang byung 'od kyis khyab par gad la// thugs rje'i byin rlabs 'gro 'ong med// theg gcig sems
322b7(rnying rgyud): nyid rdzogs lung la// ma lus dri med rnam dag la// ma lus bya rtin mun gyis grub// ma bcos ma btsal lhun gyis grub// 'jug stong mi gnas bsam pas stongs// ma zhi rang bzhag grol ba'i lung // gang bslad rnam rtog rtsol bas bcings// rgyu ba rab
323a1(rnying rgyud): sems dang bral// ma btsal ma bsrubs thabs kyi gnas// yangs pa mdad ci dag pa zhog/ ma mi bsdu yan du b+ha// ma bsgoms yal bar bzhag pas rtogs// mi bsam mi spyod yul mtshol// rgya'o chags bral byung
323a2(rnying rgyud): lung gsum 'dus pa'i snying po 'di// rtsa gsum kun 'dus gsang ba'i gter// rang byung sems nyid klong gdal bas// rnam par dbye ba'i chos med pas// rol pa'i yon tan khyad par gyis// klong dgu sems nyid bstan par 'chad// lta ba rang byung rdzogs pa'i lung //
323a3(rnying rgyud): ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag/ thig le gcig tu kun rdzogs pas// dang byung snying po gcig la rol// gsang ba'i thig le kun gyi dbyings// mu mtha' med par rang bzhin gnas// thams cad gsang ba rang byung sems// rang rig ma rig rnam par dag/ rtog 'phrugs
323a4(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i 'du shes spangs// rig pa ting 'dzin gter gyi lung // ri dogs med pa'i dbyings la rol// rang rig yul dbyings la mi gos// kun bzang skyong nyid ma bcos pas// kun bzang thabs kyi khyang bar dran// ma 'dres gsal bar rdzogs pa'i phyir// 648
323b1(rnying rgyud): la gzu'agang bkram pa'adra// theg leg cig tu rdzogs pas// bya btsal mang pa'i 'dang can paT// rang bzhan bdul tshus med pas// 'khor lo bskur rgyalas 'dzin ltar// yang brtul sras / la ldan la// thabs kyis patar pas ga payin/ sa/
323b2(rnying rgyud): thabs kyi ga deng gsum gyis// ye shes gas la bAr mtshams sna / bran cang de nyid gsum 'dus pas// 'dis kyang bar don 'grol ba yin// thams cad sems nyid wA 'byung bcad// rol pa'i ltung byar cing dbyug// martogs log pa'i gro phyir ba/
323b3(rnying rgyud): nga rdzogs pa'i yon tan te// col bsgrub med pa'i thabs chen gyis// yings pa med pa'i dgongs pa gzugs// rig gsum mtshon pa'i tshul sbyor bas// mu bcos rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid// dze sa rtog patu y-i bar// di srid bas ma gyis mi khyab pa// bang/
