323b6(rnying rgyud): yongs su med// rang byung gcig la rnam pa bgrang du med// gnyis med theg lar gnas pas bgrod du med// rngo don sems sugs la bas byas pa zin// ma lus ldan gyi sardzogs pas 'bras ni bsgrub// ma skyes rnam par dag pas sgrib mi sbyang // mabyas
323b7(rnying rgyud): me bas/ ma las su la rdzog pa sa/ ga pamams ci cid sa ci gas/ sasasu/ kyi da gis pa zub gags byan
324a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rang byung rig pa'i rgyal po des// bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// bde 'a chen po dang gis gsal ba'i thugs// gnyis
324a2(rnying rgyud): me dang ngal ma lus kun rdzogs pas// snying po'i snying po rang bzhin stong pa'i lam// bde chen nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam pa yi ro// snying po mchog ste don la rdzogs par gnas// ma skyes 'od gsal bde ba nyid rtogs na// bde mchog nam mkha'i khams su mi shong
324a3(rnying rgyud): ngo// yangs so che'o thig le gcig gi dang // snying po gcig la rtogs tshul mtha' yas pas// 'bras bu khyad par grangs las 'das par gsungs// ma skyes snying po sgo spar med pa'i dbyings// sangs rgyas sems can ma skyes snying por mthong // snying po ma mthong
324a4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sems nyid mthong // mthar thug med cing dbyings la bri ba med// rang byung ba de chen don 'di khyad par 'phags// sgra brjod tshig la dga' bas don mi tog/ snying po'i snying po bsam brjod cing mi dmigs// ma bsams bsam pa gnyis med gcig gi mtha'//
324a5(rnying rgyud): mtha' dang dbus la mi gnas mngon rtogs bral// me tog mi bsam de bzhin nyid la gnas// bde chen rang rig cir yang mi rtog pa// rtsol bral rig pa'i dbyings la gnas// bde mchog gsang ba'i thig le nyid// nam mkha' khyab pa'i tshul du gnas// ma skyes snying po byang
324a6(rnying rgyud): chub sems// 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang la bzhugs// rang byung byang chub snying po la// ma btsal ma bsgrubs rang bzhin bzhag/ gang dag ye shes dang yin yang // bsam pa'i ngo la phyin ci log/ smyig rgyu la ni chu blo bzhag/ don la bzhag blang med na yang //
324a7(rnying rgyud): bdags pa 'du shes pas ma byab// byang du sems kyi da // bland ga dus pa tam pang// gang dag rig pa med par ga sa// 'di dag 'de ga mchog yin// seMn tso nyid pomatshan ni dang// ma kyil byung mchog ga gas//
324b1(rnying rgyud): 'bar btsal med rig pa'i sems// gsal ba'i mar me'i 'du shes med// rgyu ba med pa'i tshul gyis dbye// phyag rgya chen pos kun thebs pas// mtshan ma'i rtog pa g.yo mi 'gyur// rang bzhin 'khor lor ye brten pas// rig pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed du med//
324b2(rnying rgyud): ye shes 'bar ba'i bzhugs gnas la// rang byung sgrib med gsal bas brgyan// dus gsum rgyal ba'i rang bzhin pas// gnyis med dang la don kun rdzogs// rang byung rig pa'i rgyal po la// dran 'byung rig pa'i 'du shes med// sngags dang phyag rgya mchod pa
324b3(rnying rgyud): dang // dka' spyad cher byas ma lus pa// btsal med ldog pa'i ri bo 'dis// bdag nyid 'ching 'gyur ci zhig bya// bya ba ma lus kun btang la// ma byas ma btsal ci ro mi 'dzin// 'du shes med par rang bzhin zhog/ rang byung ba der bzhag grol bar 'gyur//
324b4(rnying rgyud): stong nyid ma bcos gsang ba'i klung // ma btsal rang bzhin bzhag pas go// goms pa rig pa'i don la 'dug/ bde med btang snyoms tha ma la sems// 'dod chags bde mchog ro dang ldan// ye shes 'od gsal bde chen po// ma lus sems nyid dri ma med//
324b5(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin dag pa'i sems nyid la// ma btsal de bzhin cha snyoms na// rang byung bde mchog rgya yis btab// don la mi g.yo reg pa gsal// theg chen sems nyid rdzogs pa la// sa bgrod lam la ltos mi 'cha'// rtsol du med de lhun gyis grub// bsgrub
324b6(rnying rgyud): ta med do ye sangs rgyas// zhes gsungs so// snying po don gyi rgyud las/ rang byung rdzogs pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa rang byung rig pa'i rgyal pos/ nyid kyi rang bzhin kun tu gsal bar mdzad de/ 'di skad ces gsungs
324b7(rnying rgyud): so// dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi yang mes pa// rig pa'i rgyal po rang byung byang chub sems// lhun rdzogs bde chen sems nyid rdzogs pa nyid// dus gsum rgyal ba nga nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas// ma bcos byang chub sems la bzhugs pas// ma mthong mi zar 'khor
325a1(rnying rgyud): ba'i 'dam byin// ma brdalnga ldan gyis grub par rang bzhag pa// skal ldan rtsal sras mi mi phyogs su 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rig pa'i rdo rjes zhus pa// kye dus gsum rgyal ba'i rang bzhin
325a2(rnying rgyud): drag sung thabs// rang byung rig pa'i rnam brtson paspyod// nyi m-i thugs gcigang byung la shes // dgongs pa 'dod di nyid kyis ga togs/ maso// rig pa'i rnam po can byos lan gsus pa// kyi bzhin pa da cog phyag tu 'di
325a3(rnying rgyud): lus dgongs pa'i ngang la kun 'dus pas// bsam zhing dpyad pa'i 'du shes mi gnas te// rang byung 'od kyis kun la khyab par gsal// kun gyi rang bzhin snying po kun 'dus pa// gsang ba chen po ma bcos sgo sbar zhi// rang bzhin ma yin tshad ma kun dang bya la// bdag
325a4(rnying rgyud): nyid ma yin lhun rdzogs kun gyi snying po 'di// gang yang ma yin med pa'i snying po yod// ma byas rang bzhin rdzogs pa'i yon tan gyis// thugs rje rtsol med nyi ma'i 'od ltar 'char// rang byung gcig la theg pa kun rdzogs pas// tshig gcig rtogs pas don kun rdzogs pa'i
325a5(rnying rgyud): bdag/ ma sbyangs mi gnas bde mchog ji bzhin gnas// ma btsal rang bzhin bzhag na bsam pa zad// yengs med thabs kyis gnas na bcings pa grol// mtha' dbus phyi nang med pa chos kyi dbyings// rang bzhin dag pa'i don la bsgom du med// ma yengs
325a6(rnying rgyud): yal bar bzhag pas rang bzhin go mas// rol pa'i phyag rgya gcig pas dgag tu med// nyon mongs ye shes rang gsal spang bsgrub med// lam la mi bgrod sa la mi sbyang zhing // lhun grub ye shes ngang las 'da' mi srid// mkha' mnyam rgyal po kun gyi re ba bskang //
325a7(rnying rgyud): ma lus thig le gcig pas dbyings la rdzogs// mi skye mi 'gag mi col de bzhin nyid// theg mchog snying po 'di la kun rdzogs pas// byas pa med par rang bzhin lhun gyis rdzogs// rtog dpyod 'das pa kun gyi yul la rol// brda' dang tha snyad rjes 'brang rig pa
325b1(rnying rgyud): yis// ma bcos snying po byang chub sems mi rtogs// gang la zhen cing brtag pa de btang la// gnyis med gnyis 'dzin rtog pas ma 'ching zhig/ ma bsams rang bzhin bzhag pas sgrib pa 'byung // mun pa ye nas dag pas bsal mi dgos// lhan gyis grub pas
325b2(rnying rgyud): gzhan la gsol mi 'de bas// rang la rdzogs pas mi bsnyeg mi bgrod de// ma byas rang bzhin gnas pas 'di nyid rdzogs// bya ba mi dgos mi btsal mi bsgrub cing // dge sdig mi 'byed ye nas gos pa med// ma chags thabs kyi spyod pa kun sbyar nas// nyes med
325b3(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba'i zhing khams rmad du byung // rang byung gsal ba'i snying po thams cad rdzogs// gang yang ma bkag 'gro ba 'dul mdzad pa'i// gang ltar yin pa'i rang bzhin de ltar gnas/ 'od gsal rang byung sems la gnyis med pas// dpyad dang bsgom rtsol ma
325b4(rnying rgyud): lus 'khrul pa yin// ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa'i mdzad spyod do// rang byung rdzogs pa'i snying po 'di rig na// sgrib dang mi sgrib cis ni yongs ma gsungs/ snying po don gyi rgyud las/ bde mchog phyag rgya la spyad pa'i le 'u ste drug pa'o//
325b5(rnying rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po des/ ma byas rang bzhin rdzogs pa zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// sems nyid rang byung legs par nyid dbang sgyur// rang byung klong gang la kun la dbang thob pas// legs pa'i rgyal po lhun rdzogs bde chen dbang /
325b6(rnying rgyud): bskur thob rag ma las pa dbang gi klong // rang sems rdzogs pa yongs rdzogs gsal 'gyur bas// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dbang la rag ma las// ma brjod snying po'i ngang la kun rdzogs pas// sngags tshig bde ba'i dbang la ltos pa med // mtshan ma kun bral
325b7(rnying rgyud): rang sems rdzogs pa la// rdzas dang ting 'dzin don la rtsol ba med// rgyal thabs spyi blugs tshangs pa'i dbang chen gyis// ma bskur rang bzhin rdzogs pa 'di rtogs pas// dbang mchog lhun grub pade la gnas par 'gyur// rig pa'i rgyal po kun la dbang 'phru
326a1(rnying rgyud): byas/ sa tshus 'dod da/ ngas na gas / nga gyu yon kyi ma
326a2(rnying rgyud): gci 'ardzogs pa'i dbang // rtog pas bslab mi dgos te rang ba'i ngogs// so nga bzhi cig sa 'ardzogs pa'i don// 'dod thal mtshon pas dga' bu yi shas yin// 'jig med dang ba'i dra ngastsal ba'i ye te// dang gas bral ma
326a3(rnying rgyud): dpa 'i shes ba yin// ma lus sman grub mi 'dar phyag tus gdab// pra bcos ldan cis rogs pa'i dbang bzhi pa// rig pa rtsal gyi dbang lag drer nos zhig/ reg brtsal gyi mtho ba dang gdams dgangs kyi thob// skal byed bzung ba thob pa'i thabs nyid
326a4(rnying rgyud): rdzas// rigs nga byung dang la thabs kyis bdan/ rin can sa gyithamam sa yang gyes// rlubazu narnams gamigs par snang la sa // nadags gang gal na du legs par ba / sna ngan na
326a5(rnying rgyud): rig pa rgyal gyi dbang gi phre'u ste bdun pa'o// / da das bcom ldan 'das tsa la thal rig pa rgyal po des/ thabs chen bslab ba'i ba' 'di gsungs so// ye shes zung du zhugs pa'i rdu 'byor byas// bka' rtags bya ga sa sa
326a6(rnying rgyud): po pa// nga nang rig pa padi mchog sems byed la// rin chen rje mig brtson pas stod sde bstan// bgrang bral rig pa'i dmachog rig pa gas ma// legs par phog la sa 'da' nan // da sbyin rdzogs pa de mchog dbang ban 'bra // rta
326a7(rnying rgyud): pas spyan gru ba rdzogs pas bsrungs pa yin// de nas srang gdu 'arig pa gtar yod kyi// tso ma dang po rtsol drang phreng ngas lung shes// rnas tog sems nyid krung nga rtags par 'drung // dang zung gas la ba 'dan mam pa yongs shar// gli sa
326b1(rnying rgyud): yang bde mchog nyid du gsal// lam la ma bgrongs la mi spyad te// snying po rang byung rdzogs pa spyan gyis gnas// chos kun snying po byang chub sems gcig la// rnam grangs tha skad dbye ba mi gnas te// de dag legs par rtog pa'i thabs nyid byer// rna pa dag dmang /
326b2(rnying rgyud): ngagadon gyis legs par dgrol// rtsam gcig dril la mnyam par brtags// rnam par phye bas don nyid rtogs par bya// legs par rtogs pa'i don la gcig tu gnas// zhes gsungs so// snying po don gyi chud las/ thabs chen bsgrub pa'i brgyad
326b3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rang byung rig pa'i rgyal pos chos thams cad gnyis su med pa las/ 'dadra' ba med pa 'di gsungs so// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi// rang bzhin rig pa'i dam tshig gsum// rang 'ang rdzogs pa'i
326b4(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin la// ye nas rdzogs te ngo bong gnas// rdzogs pa'i ngan med na// mtshan ma'i dam tshig gol ba'i lam// mi 'da' rdzogs pa'i dam tshig gsum// yengs pa med par ci dgar zhog/ dus gsum rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sgo// 'gro 'dul
326b5(rnying rgyud): dang tshig mtha' yas pa// rtogs pa'i don la gcig las med// 'di yang ma bcos rang bzhin lung // rang bzhin gsum dang thig ler gcig/ rgyas mthebs pa'i chos med pas// sras kyang 'dra 'bar yod pa min// mnor snying po'i dmachog la// ma
326b6(rnying rgyud): yangs gsal bar dran pa yis// gsal ba mthar phyin sems dkyil 'khor// bde mchog mnyam pa'i sems kyis bstan// kun 'byung rig pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// yongs rdzogs mi 'gyur dam pa'i don// mi 'drar legs par bstan par bya// dus gsum
326b7(rnying rgyud): mi 'gyur sems kyis bzung // dmachog rdo rje brda yi lung // 'dems pa'i tshig gis gsal bar shes// spun rdzogs pade mchog dam tshig la// 'dar med don rtogs rang bzhin bzhugs// don dang rang bzhin mtshon pa nyid// ma bcos pa dang goms pad
327a1(rnying rgyud): mtshon pa'i sgra yi dam tshig gis// rang gi don la 'da' mi srid// dam pa rnams kyi snying po nyid// dgongs pa rang byung rig pa rdzogs// chu dang rgya mtsho'i rang bzhin ltar// dbyer med ye 'byams rmad du grags// dus gcig
327a2(rnying rgyud): snying po rdzogs pa'i lung // rang byung gcig pas khyad par med// lhag ma med pas yongs su rdzogs// ma btsal lhan rdzogs dam tshig yin// ye shes phyag d+ha'i rgyas btab pas// rim med rang byung ye sangs rgyas// zhes gsungs so// snying po don rje rgyud
327a3(rnying rgyud): las/ 'dar med rig pa mchog gi le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rig pa'i rgyal po des/ sbyang zhing bgrod du med pa'i don 'di gsungs so// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin la// rgyu rkyen 'jug pa'i rim
327a4(rnying rgyud): med pas// log par rtog pas btab/ sa dbang gis// bcung med don la grangs su bgrang // bgrod med gcig la rtsol bar bgrod// rim med don la rim par bltas// snying po gcig la mthong tshul gyis// bgrod pa'i lam tshul bsam mi khyab// snying
327a5(rnying rgyud): po gcig la cing bgrod kyang // bgrod bral rdzogs pa'i don mi rnyed// kun rdzogs gdal ba chos kyi dbyings// mu mtha' med par dus gcig rdzogs// bgrod med rig pa lhun rdzogs pa// lam lngas bcu rtog pa'i grangs// ma btsal rang bzhin ldan grub pas//
327a6(rnying rgyud): rtsol ba'i theg pa log pa'i chos// dus gcig rdzogs pa rim par med// rang gsal 'od la rtag tu bzhug// ting 'dzin rnam par bsgom du med// 'bras bu'i bdag tu lhun grub pas// sangs rgyas sems can dbye bas stongs// kun kyang rang byung snying po'i lam//
327a7(rnying rgyud): ma bgrod dus gcig rdzogs pa'i gnas// mkha' la bgrod med kun khyab ltar// theg chen sems nyid rdzogs pa'i lam// ma khyab ma lus chos med pas// ma bgrod 'bras bu dang bzhin rdzogs// lam med rim med sems kyi lam// 'du shes med
327b1(rnying rgyud): bas gsal ba'i yid// bsam dpyad med pas krung du 'dug/ rnam pa rang bzhin mtshan nyid gsum// srug sum dus gcig rdzogs pa'i phyir// tshogs pasag sgrib byung bsgralan med// ye nas rdzogs chen byang chub sems// klan gyis grub pa'i nga /
327b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin pa// bya bral rig pa'i sems nyid 'drag/ ri tu mi g.yo ba yi yid// dri med nam dag sngams kyi la ma// bgrod du me do ye sangs rgyas// zhes gsungs so// snying po na kyi rgyud las/ brjod med pader bzhag gi le'u ste bcun do//
327b3(rnying rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dang byung rig pa'i rgyal po des/ spun grub rdo rje rig pa gsang ba'i don 'di gsungs so// chos kun byang chub sems su gcig/ sems nyid 'od gsal mnyam pa nyid// lhun gyis grub pa'i zhing khams la// me yengs de ltar bzhag
327b4(rnying rgyud): pas chog/ rang byed rdzogs pa'i don spad pa// rig pa ni don la de ma zag/ ma bcos rang bzhin bzhag pas gnas// rang bzhag rig pa yengs med blang // goms padzin pa nyid kyis gsal// rang rig mnyam pa'i snying po la// bcos pa med kyis
327b5(rnying rgyud): dgar zhog/ rtog bral dang sa ma gsal ba'i blo// nubs shes shing gsal bas mngon// dbyings su bim zheng 'od du 'bar// dngas snyigs ye shes snying po 'dzes// thig le rang bzhin med par thim// rig pa ye shes gsal ba'i sems// ma btsam
327b6(rnying rgyud): sbyin gyis grub par gnas// sems kyis bsgrib par mi bya zhing // lus dang ngag kyang yal bar bzhag/ btang ngo bzhag go byang chub sems// / dmigs dang bral ba rang bzhin gnas// dus gsum 'gyur ba med pa'i sgo// rig pag deng gsum rnam par
327b7(rnying rgyud): dge/ rdzogs pa'i ye shes klong du 'dug/ ji bzhin pa bcos gsang ba'i sems// 'du 'bral med pa dbyings lags la// dAn 'byung rigapa dbyings la rdzogs// zhen mad snang ba rang gi sems// ci dgar bzhag pas g.yo ba pad// rang rig /
328a1(rnying rgyud): shes bsam mi khyab// 'du shes med pa'i dbyings la 'jug/ blang dor med par kun rdzogs pa// mtshan 'dzin che chung yongs kyi med// dus gsum gcig tu bzhag pa'i blos// me bcol sems kyi rang bzhin gnas/
328a2(rnying rgyud): bde mchog mnyam pa'i sems kyis bltas// zhes gsungs so// snying po don gyi rgyud las/ rig pa bder bzhag gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas rang byung rig pa'i rgyal po des theg pa'i rgyal po gdams pa 'di gsungs so// e
328a3(rnying rgyud): ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi snying po 'di// dad dang dam tshig mi ldan zhing // shes rab snying rje byang chub sems// dam pa'i yo byad lngas dbul zhing // zos pa chung zhing dregs pa dang // gus chung ser sna che ba dang // phyogs dang dam
328a4(rnying rgyud): med yal ba dang // 'dod dang le lo phyogs 'dzin can// 'jig rten grags pa gtsor bzhag nas// yun gyi don srid spang ba dang // grags shing 'jig par byed pa la// rna brgyad gdams ngag ma thob par// gsang ba log par 'chad pa yi// ye shes
328a5(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i gdeng med pa// 'jig rten log pa'i gang zag la// khe dang grags pa gtsor bzhag nas// nyams pa'i sems kyis 'phel 'gyur na// mthong yun 'di la brlag pa dang // de ma zag par lhung gyur nas// thar pa'i rigs dang bral ba yin// dad
328a6(rnying rgyud): dang dam tshig ldan pa kun// skyon med yon tan ldan pa dang // theg chen don la goms pa dang // lus dang srog la mi blta zhing // chos dang bla ma bkur bdang // rdo rje bla ma mnyes gyur na// rin chen bdun gyis bsten pa dang // rdzas la chags chung phongs pa med//
328a7(rnying rgyud): theg pa chen po'i rigs su nges// 'di la gsang sgo dbye bar bya// 'phral du rin chen mi gtong zhing // dam pa bkur ba'i sems med na// dam pa rnams kyi dgra yin pas// 'di la gsang ba'i don gtanan// nyams 'do rjes ma nyid// rdo rje dmyal 'khon
328b1(rnying rgyud): ngas 'dam dgas pa thams ga na / mams 'a gas
328b2(rnying rgyud): da / gas/ dang/ tha sa sa nam pa/ tsa ldan 'das dpa la dra nas // ma pa du gsaras de ba nag shigis rdul dag
328b3(rnying rgyud): spangs ces 'artsos pa das bstan gshegs pasams cad kyi bdan pad nga du sung ba byang pa nyid / gram mangs lam pa dad pa dang kyang 'da'o// la ba dag pa'i gzhil gathong sngo tan kyi pa'o 'ang/ gang gi pa can pa
328b4(rnying rgyud): ma// ngan snang ba di kyi thugs chen pa'i mthal sa/ mangs spyod na par byud ma na nga shAng 'i skal mags pabasamams pa nga byung ba blags po// na gagags pa thams cad bye bzhin dag nyid ca gli mang sri
328b5(rnying rgyud): du 'dub nyi gnyis su me par btags pas/ nganas banyis spang da ba'i bdag nyid de pob nyid kyi nyid la da rjod pa rdzi du badzadado// bar bye nga bzhin zhi pa dilabs la ga da med par bachog / da 'das dang bor ba gnyis pang ya dag nyid
328b6(rnying rgyud): cudang ma dus pa phyin// bdag gis pan ni sum byar gas badzi byamazhu // de na 'a kyi du kyi tshan nyisad kyispyon pa'adang// mi phyi po
328b7(rnying rgyud): 'ab gag thong ba ga mi dngakyi su'o// byang gros pas sgom pa'i rgyad // dadang pa pa'i gzhi byed pa'o/ de sa nga byed ni nga nga na dus 'a sa de
329a1(rnying rgyud): na e ma ho// ngo mtshar gsang brgyad du byung ba'i chos chen po// sras kyang ma bcos ma gsungs ma byas dang gis gsal// skye ba med pas thams cad skyes kyang skye ba med// ming dang tha snyad 'dzin pa thams cad ya nas sangs rgyas yin/
329a2(rnying rgyud): sa yangang bca pa'i skyes stsal ma ba sbyi du mi dag ga kyis// 'ad li gags brel ba nyis pa ba/ da las 'bags nga badzi ti na mthu ba mid// ban
329a3(rnying rgyud): gnyis med bden pa ma mthong bas// sgyu ma la sogs dngos por 'dzin pas yang dag nyams// thun po gang zhig mkha' la mdud pa 'dor ba 'dra// de nas bdag nyid chen po gzhi dang rtsa ba med pa nyid la nyid kyis brjod pa// chu 'bras mi 'byed gzhi dang rtsa ba med pa'i
329a4(rnying rgyud): chos chen po// mi dmigs dmigs pa med las dmigs pa rna tshogs 'byung // bsgrub tu med cing grub par bya ba 'di la ci yang med// ji bzhin nyid kyi ngang nyid yin pas btsun sar gnas pa ste// dmigs dang mi dmigs rtsol ba'i nad dang bral bas na// gnyen
329a5(rnying rgyud): pos bcos su rdul tsam med pa yin// shin tu brtag dka' gting dpag bsam yas pa// rgyu dang 'bras bur 'dogs pa'i spyod yul min// byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i rgyud las/ rdzogs pa chen po la ngo mtshar ba'i tshig bstan pa dang / de ma rtogs pa la
329a6(rnying rgyud): ngo mtshar ba dang don dam pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas don dam pa'i rang bzhin de rtogs shing shes par bya ba/ gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen po des nyid kyis nyid la brjod pa// sems kyi rang bzhin kun gyi mchog
329a7(rnying rgyud): glang dor med pa'i rgyal po yum// mi ldogs la sogs pa dbang bcu rgyal ba kun dang gcig brnyes pa// gnas gsum mnyam nyid de la mtshan med yid kyis rab tu de la dad pas mos// ston pa 'jig rten sgron mar gyur gyis mtshungs par rang bsngags
329b1(rnying rgyud): nga sag ma sa na na na
329b2(rnying rgyud): ga/ ga sa nga
329b3(rnying rgyud): nyid ga shes 'arjid da sa kus pa'i na chos bzhin pa du bya bye// byung chub ma su rnyed dogs ma 'i gdu'asu byug/ 'gas pa'i gas byed byeng chu srid
329b4(rnying rgyud): dag thams dkyang // dbang sde byung phyeng don na mgrol mchog gi lA mnyid do// bla med dang bzhin mchog se mchog nyid 'di ni kun gyi mchog/ gzhin med pa'i sems nyid ri cin nor 'dril// mcho du med pa rigs chud med de gang yang yod pa khrid// ma
329b5(rnying rgyud): snang gzhes tu med pa dadri da // mi'agyu bde ba'i lung na de bzhin gnas pa'i// byung dub sti 'chos 'di med dmigs pang chub sems mi migs// 'di ni yang dag byed de drang stong dmas kyi lam gyim cog/ sems kyis byamam
329b6(rnying rgyud): nyid de ltar mthong na 'ad ba'i mgarang bzhin me pa'i sems lnga dang rig de bzhin bzhag ma bsams napas bAgani gnas pa bsgos pa yin byin rje sems dpa' ci 'dra bsgom pa nus par 'gyur/ sa
329b7(rnying rgyud): 'dru nung can po'i las drim to tog las 'das/ rtog par dag 'a dir brtan pa dga' ba brjod pa'i bskad rnams da thal/ chog gis ril bas gzhan kyis bdun gyi spyod dril ma yin yang // ston pa ngas pa'i srang dang tha pa rnams kyim
330a1(rnying rgyud): de nyid don 'dir blta// mngon sum la sogs d+ma yis dngos po 'jig cing grub pa'i mtha' dpyod pa// de nyid rtog pa'i rgyun 'brangs spyod yul tshad mar bzhag nas blo yis 'jig byed de// rtog mtha' med phyir dpon mtha' ma
330a2(rnying rgyud): mdan rtsod pa dkang // de phyir 'jig rten tha skad btags 'dil 'byor lam 'dir mi dgos so// phyogs dus mnyam nyid rnam par dag pa ye nas yin pa san// sna tshogs chos rnams kun la ji ltar 'dod dbang bsgyur// 'jig tan 'das dang 'jig rten ma 'das
330a3(rnying rgyud): thams cad kun// yang dag shes pas rab tu brtags pas rtogs 'gyur na// rang bzhin mnyam pa med las cing yang snang zhing 'byung // ji ltar snang ba nyid na'ang dbyings kyi rang bzhin de bzhin nyid yin / te// de ltar rtog par gyur pa'i rang byung ye shes ting
330a4(rnying rgyud): ni// sna tso gas chos rnams kun la dbang yang bsgyung bas mi nyams te// de phyir tshad bzhi na 'bras 'dod pa'i tha snyad pa ni tshang 'ar 'jog mod kye// rgya yi 'bras bu dam pa'i yul 'di tshad mas gzhi gtug la yod do med// dpe dang tshang mas rnyed min gsang sngags rgya
330a5(rnying rgyud): chen po 'di// yongs bsrubs kun bskyed snying por gnas te 'bras bu'ang yin// byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i rgyud las/ don dam pa'i rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i thabs bstan pa dang // tshad mas gzhig tu med par bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// /
330a6(rnying rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po chen po des/ nyid la nyid kyis bsgom du med pa'i don brjod pa// yangs so che'o// nyin tu phra ba'i chos nyid 'di// chu 'bras mi 'byed dang gis btsan pas de bzhin nyid// rang bzhin gnas pas bya med pa
330a7(rnying rgyud): klung chen po// rnabs gzhan nam thos par mi rung cog las 'das/ lces kyang brjod du sa rung sdod bcud 'i zhes rnam par dang // blang dor bod pa'i di de'i lug rdzogs pa'i sgo// drang srong bden par bzhugs pa rnams kyis brtag ri // don 'dis
330b1(rnying rgyud): brtags pas brtag klung las nyams/ rgyas rgya tang po 'di la bsgom du ci yang grub pa med// gang yang ngadami gran mtshan med mtshan ma 'dra ga rtogs// mi rtog pa nyid/ zla ba'i byung rtal shes su// gang yang dang pa med pa'i chos nyid la ma mchog la// ma bcam
330b2(rnying rgyud): pas ma dang bral na bsgom pa'i thang // btsal zhing brtags na lam mchog de las gal// de las de bzhin bde ba me 'byung chu 'bras can// bsgom du med bzhin dmigs par byed pa smig rgyun byed 'dra// byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i rgyud las/
330b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen pos theg pa chen po'i don dang mtshan nyid nyid la nyid kyis brjod pa/ sems ni rje zhing 'ang ste dge dang mi dge'i las mi spyod padam po'i sems yin
330b4(rnying rgyud): ro// don dam nyid la ming dang mtshan ma med de sems kyis dmigs par nus pa ma yin dag gis bshad par nus ma yin// sems g.yos pa na mtshan ma nyid de mtshan ma'i rgyu la ming btags pa de ming dang mtshan ma zhes bya'o// rnam par rtog pa gang yang len zhi
330b5(rnying rgyud): rgyags na de ming sgyu ma mi dade ba yi 'du shes yin// ming dang mtshan ma gang na'ang med par rtogs shing shes na de med yang dag pa yi ye shes so// ming dang mtshan ma ci yang rang reg yid las ma gyes pa ni de bzhin nyid ces bshad// theg pa chen po gang na
330b6(rnying rgyud): bden pa bzhin du rnam par shes pa mi ga yo nang ni sems kyi sa nyid sdeb med pa'o// rnam par rtog pa med pa gang nad ltar ci nirnam par shes pa mi skye'o// sangs rgyas spyod pa ji lta bun sems med par shes chos la gos med par shes pa'o// sems gzug
330b7(rnying rgyud): med la shes pa yod pa gang na sems pa chos la gzugs med pa de shes dang mi shes pa'o// pho mo khyim pa rab tu byung ba sems can mdas rgyas la sogs mthong ba de dag ma g.yos pa na yang dag pa bzhi chos la ma spyod pa yin// sems de shes par bya ba'i phyir
331a1(rnying rgyud): na ba rnam pa'i' mes ni su la 'ang brtan par mi rigs te// brten pa'i mi rnams mi rgod sems dang chas shing 'i grogs ci thob tshol ba yin pas bsgom la gnod byung ro// sems rtogs bsgom pa mas ni 'grus par gsang
331a2(rnying rgyud): rten mtshan le lo mi byed pa'o// chos rnams thams cad brtags pa yod phyir brdzun te bden med nges pa med par 'chi tshe 'jigs med la// bag chags de mthus dmyal ba'i bag tsha med de sangs rgyas nyid las dmyal sogs ming yang med// chos rnams
331a3(rnying rgyud): thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang dag pa yi lam yin no// de ltar rtogs nus de thob pa la de nyid sangs rgyas yin par sangs rgyas gsungaste// de 'dra'i chos 'di rtogs nas gzhan la 'chad pa de ni 'khor pa'i sems can sgrol la
331a4(rnying rgyud): mkhas pa yin// dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis kyang 'di bzhin rtogs shing thob las byung nas mtshan dpe dod// ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa 'di ma rtogs par gzhan na chos dbyings med cing 'bras bu sangs rgyas med// ngo bo nyid stong spyod pa stong pa'i ngo bo nyid la ma chags
331a5(rnying rgyud): par na de nyid mya ngan 'das pa'o// yang dgadon 'di cho ga gis bshad du mi rung tshig dang bshad pas sleb par nus ma yin// byang chub sems spros pa'i klud las/ theg pa chen po mdo sde'i don dang mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u sde lnga pa'o// / de
331a6(rnying rgyud): nas gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen pos gnyis su med pa'i don nyid// nyid kyis nyid la ched du brjod pa zed du brjod do// byang chub sems ni yon tan thams cad 'byin pa'i nor bu nyid de theg pa'i mchog/ khyad par mchog tu blang cing kun gyis rab tu bsngags pa
331a7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs chen yin// kun gyi rang bzhin bya bral yangs pa'i snying po 'di ni bsgom du rdul tsam med// de ni skye med byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin dngos med dmigs su med pas so// byang chub sems ni de bzhin nyid las dang gis 'da' mi byed// de
331b1(rnying rgyud): debazhin gnas pa 'di la dbanan gshegs pa na nas 'di la dgangs// da dag shegs pa'i thugs nyid pazhin byed do da pa gan nyi dul su dmi 'thung / dr-in ma gces surnam dang dgas la bde can kun byabs yang na// ma ba dbyings gzhadu
331b2(rnying rgyud): las kun tu 'od kyis las 'das pa'i bla mad theg chen 'di// theg pa kun gyi nad gso mdzad pa'i spyan pa'i rgyal po ste// 'di las zab pa'i chos ni gang na'ang med pa yin te shin tu phra// 'di ma mthong bar gang gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas mthong yang yang dag byang chub mo/
331b3(rnying rgyud): theg gzhan blo mi gting du snang zhing ye shes chen po'i lam sbyangs byas kyang rtog pa'i klung // blo yi rim pas yun ring yun du bskyabs na grub mtha' mthar 'dzin kho na de nyid do// theg gzhan grub mtha' 'di ni cir yang dmigs su med de kun gyi rang bzhin yin// 'di
331b4(rnying rgyud): las ya mtshan 'phrul gyi ye shes 'od 'bar de ni kun la khyab par gsal// 'dir ma 'khyil pa'i chos ni gang na'ang med de thig le dag pa'i sku// 'di ni dmigs shing bsgom du med de bsgom pa'i tha snyad 'das// lam du bgrod du med de la ma mchog lam gyi
331b5(rnying rgyud): phul te de bzhin lam phugs nyid// 'di la rtogs par byar med kun sangs rgyas pa ye nas yin// 'khor pa mya ngan 'das pa gnyis med mnyam pa'i rgyal po blang dor med// de bzhin nyid ma gtogs pa'i chos rnams gud na yod ma yin// chos 'di skang
331b6(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad 'du byed rgyun dang bcas pa'i mthu nyid snang ba ste// rgyan rtogs bag chags rgyun mchud par snang ba yin pas sdang ba'i dngos po brtag mi bya// de dag sems kyi 'byung 'jug rgyan bcad phyir na ye sangs rgyas pa las// gzhan du mi bas ma de nyid de bzhin
331b7(rnying rgyud): yi nang de bzhin nyid// sems kyi phur ba de bzhin gting du btab nas bzhag pa de las dbyung mi bya// 'gral zhing g.yo ba'i tshon bcing zhing 'byung du gzhug par yongs mi bya// byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i chud las/ don gyi snying po rang bzhin yon tan da
332a1(rnying rgyud): tham pa'i yang madrug pa sa nga na das sa rjod pa// dang pa ma sa pacus das mas ma
332a2(rnying rgyud): bdug par // bo kun gyi sems pa dod pang byed grags pa'i nas 'dzid// 'did 'dzin ning 'i ring tu gas pastozhi pa'i myos pa bzhin brgyang ba tid bdanathangs/ dadani ngas pa matobs
332a3(rnying rgyud): 'dra ba nga byu ba dag dubs skye sa dung thugs sa nyin pa sa dpa 'al ba na pa bya/ 'du rgyas kyi nig tshang gi mi nyid byed ma rjor pas dgas pa'i bso sa papa dag
332a4(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// lam med dam grol lam dru bsnyen cing dbang po'i gas pas ma zang te// dgra bas la shang yang 'i 'di la sa 'i na sa/ thos mthong 'di dag 'a bral par mngon da rnal bas gsungs// del
332a5(rnying rgyud): 'khrul pa'i dbang gis de ltar spang bar gyur// bas rlo can yang dag pa yin du 'gyi tog pas col med nya sa/ rlogs tu thur ning ba gabyen byedang maung bas// sem dang sems las byung ba da lus gas na nga ba
332a6(rnying rgyud): 'du byedang tshogs dag gis bag tshigs bsags las gang goms mthub tas tshe// sems nyid yul dang lus 'dar srung ba dras pas gang ba bzhin du snang // ba gachags byasags pa'i stan la dmigs skyes yid las btags pa'i bdag ni med//
332a7(rnying rgyud): byeng man mos bsgribs shing prab ma mthong de las napa ga bya// da da bcas pa'i sems kyi 'i ston pa'i rjes grang das// de sa zag bcas pa bzhi rtogs bdag chos rnam rgya par byed/ na par 'ju ba da
332b1(rnying rgyud): mthong las// bdag tu blta ba sogs pa mu stegs blta ba sna tshogs skye zhing thar par rtog/ sems 'di las rnams sna tshogs gnas 'gyur bag chags mtha' med nges pa med// bag chags brtas shing sad par byed pa'i rkyen yang rnam pa sna tshogs te/
332b2(rnying rgyud): na 'a/ sa bag chags 'ga' zhig smin nas mi ye gyad kyi lus sdang la// rkyen gzhan dag gis bag chags gzhan sad byas tshe 'gru ba'i mthu mthong nas// dbang phyug la sogs byed par 'dod de la ma des mi ni grol mi 'gyur// rnal 'byor lam bsla
332b3(rnying rgyud): the tshom rgyu yang rgyun 'di phra ba ma rtogs skye// bdag tu brtags pas bsgribs te 'phags pa'i rigs dang rnam par bral// chos su btags pas sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'byung zhingangan song srid par 'gyur// rnam shes de yang 'du byed rgyun las mtshan ma
332b4(rnying rgyud): tha dad 'dzin pas na// las kyi khyad par dag gis brgyad du snang gis rigs la du ma med// shes shing rig pa'i rigs su gcig ste rigs la du ma med// dri phyir sems kyi skad cig dang po'i de la lus dang chos kun gnas// de la bsam bzhen
332b5(rnying rgyud): phyir phyi ma des 'byung de la snang / rang sems rgyun la 'phags pa skye bo'i chos ni gzhan na yod pa min// rgyud drug rigs lam de la'ang sna tshogs de dag rang gi ting 'dzin no// sems rgyan de ni phyogs kyang cung zad med pas gcig la brten pa med pa'o//
332b6(rnying rgyud): de stsogs pa med phyir na mtha' yas zhing rnams bdag gi lus// bdag gi lus ni mtha' yas zhing dang rtse ba'i lus su rab sdang yang // sems dang bag chags tha dad ma yin gcig min brtag par rab tu dka'// 'di kun rten cing 'brel par 'byung
332b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshul te skye dang 'gag 'gyur zhes// tshig pa'i sa bon bzhin du med las med pa mi 'byung rgyu 'bras med// dngos por zhen cing rgyu dang 'bras bur ston pa'i sems nyid ni// mu dang rkyen du snang de de gnyis med phyir skye dang 'jig pa med// skye 'chi med phyir
333a1(rnying rgyud): bdag gzhan med de 'chi 'pho med phyir rtag chad med// des na 'khrul 'khor med cing mya ngan 'das pa'ang med par mngon// gnas kyi skad cig rnams kyang mi 'bral de cho mnyam 'gyur de med med// yang dag ma yin rtog pas
333a2(rnying rgyud): bskyed phyir bag chags yod pa ma yin dang // spyod yul med phyir kun gzhi med cing rnam rig de yang med pa yin// phyogs rnams med phyir dmigs dang gnas med rnam shes rig pa ji ltar skye// de phyir sems 'di yod med mtha' las 'das shing gcig
333a3(rnying rgyud): dang du ma bral// sems ni nang na mi gnas phyi rol mi gnas par na gnas ma yin// thams cad kun la mnyam gnas de nyid dang nas g.yos pa med// nam dag lam chen sems nyid rdo rje 'di ni shes bya nyid de thams cad skye// cir yang mi dmigs kun tu 'od
333a4(rnying rgyud): gsal snying po'i tshul te yan lag rgyas// ye nas gnas pa'i de bzhin nyid ni rang rig rnam par dag pa ste// de nyid yum gyi mkha' ste mi 'gyur gnas pas de bzhin sems zhes bya// sems ni mtshan mar ma yin thams cad 'byung bas dbyings kyang yin//
333a5(rnying rgyud): mtha' dang dbus med mi rtog rtog las 'das pas chos skur bshad// de nyid 'phags pa'i tshogs su ye nas gsal bas ye shes tshogs chen po// cis kyang mi bsgrib mi shigs mi snang ba las thams cad snang bas kun gzhi yin// sems kyi
333a6(rnying rgyud): gting 'di mthong na sems las ma gtogs chos rnams gang yang med// mchog tu rmad byung ngo mtshar khyad par yul 'di kun gyi sman chen yin// shes bya de bzhin nyid la rang rig reg byed rang zhing 'gro ru gzhug/ rang sdig de yang de las byung nas de la gnas pas gnas
333a7(rnying rgyud): pa de kar bzhag/ lam gzhan ji ltar bgrod kyang grub mtha' de nyid yin// de phyir kun gyi 'thung khungs de ni grub mtha' 'bras bu yin// thams cad rang gis 'char bas nam mkha'i tshul du'ang ga nas// 'di ni kun gyi dmigs kyi yin te gzhan lo
333b1(rnying rgyud): byed// rnams cad mnyam pa'i rgyal po bya ba yin byas snod las 'dus pa yin// da ltar yenas gnas pa la su zhig ma 'chom zad nyid de bzhin 'jog pa byang chub rje// de lo su rdzogs rang bzhin na bya spang ba lta slad rdzogs pa yin/ @
333b2(rnying rgyud): po 'di la lta sprod de nyid 'grub par byed pa de la snying po ring // de yis snying po mi mthong sprod dang bcas pas snying po nyams// 'di ni rtsol dang ye nas bral bas btsal du le nas med phyir snying po'i mchog/ dus gsum rtul bas kyang ni ma bskyabs ma spangs ma
333b3(rnying rgyud): bco la bzhag las mthong // mthong ma thag tu sbyang btsal 'gyod de sbyangs ma dgos par rtogs// rtogs pa'i ngang de la ni dus gsum rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas rdul snyed gnas// sangs rgyas 'gro dpyir rtsol ba'i lam kun bor nas gdod sangs rgyas// rtso
333b4(rnying rgyud): bgrod lam la gnas tshe 'phags pa'i sar tshud tsam// dpyir nye lam padi rdzogs skragasu mo rdo rje 'chad pa'i sa zhes snying po 'di la bya// ma bgrod gnas su phyin pa rang chud dag pas phyin pa'i sa yang yin// phyi nang sems kyi spyod yul bag chags rgyun dang bcas
333b5(rnying rgyud): par blta ba sems tsam yin// sems rkun bag chags rtog pa de la snying po 'di nyid med// de phyir yul dang lus su blta ba de nyid rtogs pa'i rgyun nyid do// mi bsgom mi bsgrub mi bsrung de bzhin nyid la rang blo de bzhin bzhag/ de la bzhags 'gos
333b6(rnying rgyud): 'dugs kun gyis bgrod sar phyin pa yin pas nye lam mo// byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i rgyud las/ sems tsam gyi lta ba 'bras bu yon tan dang bcas pa a tir la bzla ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das gnyis su
333b7(rnying rgyud): med pa'i bde ba chen pos yang dag pa ma grub pas de'i rdzu 'phrul 'khrul pa rnams la snang bar bstan pa 'di nyid la nyid kyis ched du brjod do// bde gshegs byang chub med phyir de yi rdzu 'phrul spyi 'dra 'khrul la snang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de nyid shin
334a1(rnying rgyud): bu dge ba'i rlung nyid dang // rdzas kyi dbyings nyid la nr-id dag dmigs shing sde bar brtags pa yang // rdo rje gnas med phyir namanyam gnas rang bzhin 'drar krung dang // chos dbying sa mo de dag phyogs gi nyis med pas skad cig
334a2(rnying rgyud): min// dag pa'i dge ca gzugs brtan med pas 'jig rten yod mi 'gyur// de phyir byang chub mtha dra mtshan nyid med par gcig pas thad dor med// don de'i tshul gyis don dam rnam grangs phye 'ag/ med dang mnyam nyid dang // gnyis med bsam
334a3(rnying rgyud): 'das stong nyid chos dbyings brjod dang bral la sogs// bstan pa de kun tha snyad yin te don dam med cing kun grib med// don dam tshul gyis lam nyid 'di 'dra zhes pa kun sgrib yin// the tshom yod med chos ni gang la'ang spangs shing gnas par mi byed do//
334a4(rnying rgyud): bsgom pa dang ni chos dbyings med phyir sdom nyi med la rnam par blta ba 'ang med// de ltar dngos po'i mtha' rnams brtags dang de bzhin sgyu ma med 'gyur phyir// yod la ltos pa'i med pa'ang med de yod pa'ang med// mtha' rnams med phyir dbus med dbus la'ang/
334a5(rnying rgyud): gnas par mi byed do// gang la'ang 'jig rten dbang phyug pad+mo kun kyang mi spang 'drar mnyam gnas// chos la 'khrul par mthong ba de nyid 'khrul pa yin par rab rtogs te// drug gis bstan pa'i bdud kyi las kyang mi 'dor ngan du mi rtog go// shes rab babs//
334a6(rnying rgyud): kyi spyod pa la'ang mi gnas phyir na bdud rtsi 'dra bar spyod// rang gi shes pa dam par byas shing kun las rgyal te des bsnyems na// 'dod chags zhe sdang skyes nas rtsod 'byung gti mug yin te don mi mthong // ji srid yid kyi g.yo ba de sred bdud kyi yul te phra ba'i
334a7(rnying rgyud): la mo// g.yo dang mi g.yo tha snyad mi gnas gnas la'ang gnas pa'ang med// slang med dbu ma'i lam ste byang chub sems zhes bde gshegs gsungs// de phyir gang yang mi/ kye dngag med de bzhin nyid kyi thig ler thams cad gcig pa yin// 'di la
334b1(rnying rgyud): gzhan med du yan 'bras pa nyid dkang po'ang yin// 'di ma mthong na gang la bskad pa rtog pa'i klung la gnas// gzugs dang mtshan ma smin par 'dzin par baspangs nas// rnam par thar ba gsums bsgom pa'ang bdud kyi las yin gzugs nyid stong
334b2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// 'khor ba'i lam gsum spong zhing mya ngan 'das lam bsgom pa'ang bdud nyid de// de nyid rang bzhin ma ni rang bzhin rtsal spang gar mi gnas// 'phags pa kun gyi yul dang gnas kyang 'das sogs lam nyid gzhan na med// byang chub kyi sems
334b3(rnying rgyud): bsgom pa'i rgyud las// mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam mthar gtugs pa bsten pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen pos/ yang dag pa'i don mdzub tshugs su dgongs pa sangs rgyas nyid kyis nyid lached
334b4(rnying rgyud): du brjod pa 'di chad du brjod do// ljang dang mi ldang med du mi spang sems rten mi 'cha' mngon du min// 'jam dpal ma yin rdul tsam g.yo ba de nyid de yin der mi gnas// bsgom pa'i sa mi rnyed phyir bsgoms pa sa rnyed par myi 'gyur te// rnam bral gang la'ang
334b5(rnying rgyud): mchog dang tha ma med pa pa sa mchog 'di bsgo mche// bye byed bya bral ye nas de bzhin nyid 'di de bzhin rang bzhin gnas// de la 'khor ba myang na 'das med gang la'ang med min thams cad ldan// byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i rgyud las/ rdzogs pa ched
334b6(rnying rgyud): po mdor bsdus te sgom pa'i lam gyi mchog gi le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas yang bde ba chen pos/ rang bzhin gyis nyid la nyid gyes ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'du byed ma skyes chos kun 'byung med shin tu chos rnams mya ngan 'das/
334b7(rnying rgyud): dngos med de ci kun kyang chos kyi dbyings zhes dgra bcom rab 'byor yin// nam mkha' mi dmigs ming tsam dge dang mi dger dbye ba med// rtsol bar yid la mi byed gang la sems med shes dang mi shes bral// dran dang 'byed med spang len gang la'ang dga'
335a1(rnying rgyud): daHma bu su med mo migs shing// 5nyam gnas gnyis su / nga bral bya dang po mang du sogs bri med// med col bar med pa mabyud ces lda 'khrugs mnyam shes dang // gang la dugs/
335a2(rnying rgyud): yul gyis myos skrag med de mi 'bral mi gnas shing // mi 'phrog mnyam shes bzhi po phyogs dang pha rol phyin rnams der shes te// sems kyis dbyings su bsgoms pas lam gyi phugs na 'dug pa ye yin gyis// gzhan du bsgoms pas 'od gas la don nyid
335a3(rnying rgyud):
335a4(rnying rgyud): sa kyi phyag rgya chen por sems nyid bskyed de snying po brjod cing bsgom// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms pas lam kun ma nor bsgom pa yin// kun tu bzang mo'i spyod pas ma zin dge ba'i chos ni gang yang rung // kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa rang bdud kyi las te zad cing
335a5(rnying rgyud): ga// po # ga byed pa 'a/ mi yod pa byed na b+ha 'a mas 'as
335a6(rnying rgyud): chod gnas nyan thos bdud kyi sde rnams zil gyis gnon par sangs rgyas gsungs// thabs chen byang chub sems dpa' gsang ba'i spyod pa rang 'di nyid do// 'di med rgyal ba rnam par sdang mdzad theg pa gsum ston mi srid do// skad cig tsam du dad pa'i thugs
335a7(rnying rgyud): skyes de yang myung du'ang ma dpal gzhon nur 'gyur// dkyil 'khor gsang bar zhugs shing theg chen byang chub mchog kyang gsungs pa yin// tshul khrims sdom pa kun kyang bsrung mi shing sbyi gnas dam par rab tu brjenas// de phying byang chub sems
335b1(rnying rgyud): sa bzhugs med// rlung sa rlu nas sbrul bus parungs par smras sa// yang dab de gshegs lus thu nabs sasu nas// byung dubasams dang sadulas rgyas gang da// la sa
335b2(rnying rgyud): ngos pa sa bathong bas byas// bad dang ngas zin zil gyis gnon po de yang dbyings kyi dang // 'di la rtse dang 'gag pa med de 'dra 'bral ci yang med// ye shes dbyings med kyang na 'das pa'ang yin// zos zhes mi 'dug dgras su dgos 'brel
335b3(rnying rgyud): sa ba ngo// btsa ma dran mayin mi med pamad pa'ang med// bzhi mad pa'i med pa'ang med las 'das pa ste/ zhan la spyod pas 'das papa 'das las smrags// ni mi dmigs rang bzhid pa da nga ga de nyi// gdags
335b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i byed pa'i lapa ste dug pa'i gnas// 'di lde 'jug dang zugs dang mthugs len+ya rgya pas theg pa'i rgyu// snod med rtsog las 'das pas ldan la khyu kying d+ha mchog nyi// ming tshig bzlas pa rnam thal gsang sngags mchog can ldam/ 9
335b5(rnying rgyud): ma khyer rdul bu ba zhid du rung baben par rang byung nyid// 'di lta rtogs nas 'di sa blo gros gnas pa thathos s+ho/ dan pa ma dpel dpal rdzun pa ston nyid rjesaH// dus gsum sangs kyis can pang de gtsug bu shrI d+ye// 'i yon tan
335b6(rnying rgyud): da madrong / lta don tan mtha'i las sa btsa la'i bsgoms radang bzhin gnas pas byung ba'i phyir/ rdos gzhan mi dgos yon tanam la pa'i thig rkyed 'di las chos gzhan byed/ dpyir chos lam 'jug dang lpags nasu'i bras thob 'dod pa khron sna
335b7(rnying rgyud): bying du ngas sgrib pa rjed pas/ rdzogs pa ba'i rang bzhin rgya'i dang btsas pa'i yo khyabasdu to// / denas paco ldan 'das pade brtson pos ngo mdor bsdun pa nyid byes ted latshad du bdod pa 'di brjod do// ba sa
336a1(rnying rgyud): grus sa gle byung na gyi pa song ga// / gsapa bags nag pas bzlas nga rtog pa'i rtan grangs bral bar rtagal srog pa gyu // sum m+bu shes dag gas sgra ma thang /
336a2(rnying rgyud): sgyu mas rmongs pa'i sbrum rnams// mi la ma rmi ba bzhin du mi yis bden pa nyams shid rmi lam dbang du song ba'i rmi lam pa// lam 'di spangs shing mtha' dang lam gzhan lam du bltas pas ma nor lam du ston pa de// de dag rdo la gser bzhin thugs rje'i thugs
336a3(rnying rgyud): rjes kyem ta thogs pa yid// bcog tu shes rabaspangs pa rnams kyi spyod yul 'di yin gyi// sal med shes rab basbyangs pa la gsung gi nyid bu 'di mi spyad// rgyal ba rnams kyis bskyed pa bdud rtsi'i lam mchog 'di// rgyal bas rnyed pa do rje na pa
336a4(rnying rgyud): ga mags ga ngas des byas pa 'i d+mo/ gas pa da na
336a5(rnying rgyud): rtogs nas 'di la spyod pa la lta smos ci dgos te sangs rgyas yin// sems can las kyis 'di la mi 'phrogs shing // 'phags pa'i thugs rjes 'di la gzung du med// don gyi don te bsgom rtsol med pa'i don dam rgyal po yin// sangs rgyas thugs kyi nyid
336a6(rnying rgyud): khu sbas pa zab mo'i gsung // dri med rgya mtsho'i snying po byang chub rgya chen po// theg pa'i rtsa ba 'bras bu'i theg pa yongs kyi mchog/ ye nas gnas pa de nyid de ltar shes pa sgoms dang sangs rgyas yin// lta bas zin pa'i ye shes zang thal de bzhin dkyil po//
336a7(rnying rgyud): che// chos su 'od dpag med pas don 'di bshad pa las// rgyal ba'i gsung gis bsgrags la 'di 'drar snang ngam zhes// de bzhin gshegs pa chos su dpag med khyod la 'dun par gyis// chos sku'i gsung mchog rgya mtsho 'di la 'ang de bzhin
336b1(rnying rgyud): bsta// sa bcupa la 'di gnas myer na del 'di yang gtad// 'di smosu la gnas pa byang chubasams dpa' sa rnams grub pa'i mchog/ sa yang don 'dri thol skad cig gnas pa de la rdzogs par chos skus gsungs// de la byin rlabs rgyal ba can kyang ga
336b2(rnying rgyud): bar 'gyur te de sang gsungs// don 'di gzugs sgra mtshan dpe 'dod pas bstan pas rtogs mi rung // gtogs kyi A bsnyes bshad pa yin phyir chos sras gsungs// chos swa bya bra la 'ang ltar ljang ba kun la snang phyir gsung zhes rgyal bas gsungs//
336b3(rnying rgyud): byang chub kyi sems sgrol pa'i rgyud las/ theg pa'i mchog nyid dang de nyid la de nyid kyis bstod pa dang gdams pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i rgyud theg pa'i skyeng po rdzogs so//
336b4(rnying rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ ma hA san+ti sa man+ta b+ha drA dz+nyAn pak+sha shani ni snga man+ta su pa thas mud ya tan+ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdzogs pa chen po kun tu bzang po ye shes gsal bar ston pa// gsang sngags kyi lam mchog 'dus pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal
336b5(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang po su dbyer med dang la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'chang gi sangs rgyas dpal kun tu bzang po skra dang ye shes dbyer med pa nyid/ chos nyid yum gyi b+ha ga la bzhugs te/ rig
336b6(rnying rgyud): lnga sangasaHsa la sogs te/ 'khor rnams dang thabs cig tu/ rig pa stong gsal bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// rdzogs pa chen po ye shes gsal bar ston pa gsang sngags lam mchog 'dus pa'i rgyud las gleng gzhi'i
336b7(rnying rgyud): le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa// kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // sku dang ye shes thams cad mkhyen// gsang sngags rdzogs chen don nyid de// bdag cag rnams la bshad du
337a1(rnying rgyud): gsol// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa/ rdzogs pa chen po'i don nyid ni// blta ba phul byung ngo mtshar che// theg pa kun gyi dngos gzhir shar// theg brgyad blta ba ma
337a2(rnying rgyud): spangs na// kun kyang mtha' la lhung ba nyid// theg pa kun gyi la bzla' yin// khyad par ma hA yo ga dang // a nu yo gur gsungs pa yi// rdzogs pa'i rim par bstan pa yin// zhes gsungs so// rdzogs pa chen po kun tu bzung po ye shes
337a3(rnying rgyud): gsul ba skyon gas thags sa pa 'dus pa byud las rtogs pa 'ji rnyed pa 'i shAg+sa gac+doMs pa'o// sa yang dbu la rnamams du bsnun so smra'o// bye ban pa nga ba sathun ngas// rdzogs pa na
337a4(rnying rgyud): ba nal 'byor pas// lam gyi khyad par ci lta bus/ 'bras bu thob tshul bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ dpal kun tu bzang po nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// sde snod gsum gyis bskal pa ni// grangs med 'bad kyang rte dka' ba// bzhi
337a5(rnying rgyud): brdo rje'i tho snod 'dis// bgrod pa med par sangs rgyas thob// gsang sngag so rdo rje'i 'bras bu lam// lam 'bras dbyer med 'bras bu'i lam// khre ya yo ga u pa yang // lta ba spyod pa phyir gyur te// mtshan nyid gang las 'phags ma nus//
337a6(rnying rgyud): dang sdigras kyi re zhig 'phags// ste spyod nang du gyur pas na// rta rlung thig le dbang la rdzogs// gsang sngags nang pa khyad par // ma hA ya ga bskyed pa'i tshul// arba yo ga rdog pa'i rtsal// a tI yog le ba zla'i tshul// tshul gsum dbyer med gcig gi dang //
337a7(rnying rgyud): bskyed deng rdzogs bzung 'jug nyid// brgyad ring bsod nams tshogs nyid las// 'bras bu gzugs sku 'brun par 'gyur// de med sku dang zhing khems su// gdul bya'i snang ba 'byung mi 'gyur// rdzogs rim ye shes tshogs las ni// 'bras pa
337b1(rnying rgyud): dra 'thung bar 'gyur// de med sangs rgyas dngos 'dzin 'gyur// de ltar zung 'jug lam mad na// mthar thug 'bras bu 'brung mi 'gyur// 'byung na mo srid gzhung dang 'grel// gzhan du re zhig phyogs ral// sangs kyis zhes su brtags par
337b2(rnying rgyud): zad// gsang sngags mtha' drug ldan byas nas// yo byad gnyis la longs spyod pas// rnal 'byor dbang phyug dam pade// rdo rje sems dpa'i gral du byin// tshe 'di nyid dam par mdor// sru dang ye shes 'thob par 'gyur// gal te rtsol zhen ma
337b3(rnying rgyud): nyams na// skye ba lan grangs 'ga' yis 'thob// rdzogs pa chen po kun tu bzang po ye shes gsal bar ston pa/ gsang sngags lam mchog 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ rdo rje theg pa'i lam gyi khyad par gyi 'bras bu thob pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //
337b4(rnying rgyud): de nas yang dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsol pa/ kye ma bcom ldan kun bzang po// rdzogs pa chen po'i rol pa la// gsang sngags mtha' drug gsungs pa de// don nyid rim par bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ kun tu bzang po rgyal bas
337b5(rnying rgyud): pad stsal pa// gsang sngags mtha' drug gsungs pa ni// dad+ma por bskyed pa'i tshul dbang bskur// de nas rig pa'i rtsal dbang bskur// dbang nyid chags par byed pa la// gzhi nyid dam tshig gzung bar bya// thams cad mnyam pa chen por bsku //
337b6(rnying rgyud): dri stabs zug bcad pas// rang srung ye shes rtsol bral ba// rig pa stong gsal don la brtags// nyams su ting 'dzin blang ba ni// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i tshul bzung nas// mtshan bcas lha yi 'khor lo 'di// yab yum dpa' bo gcig par bsgoms//
337b7(rnying rgyud): rigs 'dus/ tso bo rdzogs rim brten// lha dang stong pa zung 'dug nyid// der brten lus sems bsgrims byas la// sems bzung lam nu blang ba'am// phreng na lus sems glod pa'am// sems bzung stong gsal dang du bzhag/ byir nod rmugs na skyon gsum
338a1(rnying rgyud): bcas// la nyid spyod pas dor ba ni// rang gi nyams rtogs don dang b+har// de ltar rim par blangs pa yis// gdams dag rim pa la gol bas// don gyi 'bras bu bsgrub pa ste// 'asreb zabs gsum na/ nyid gtad// regs
338a2(rnying rgyud): gong gsal bde chen nyid// gdags gzhi gang dum thob la// gdags bya gang yang ma 'gags shar// rtogs pa'i ye shes rnas 'phrul las// thams ca rdol par shes par bya// gzhan yang lam du blang ban/ be lta ba gdeng dang bcas pa dang // la
338a3(rnying rgyud): la mdang bcas pa nyid// spyod pa grogs dang bcas pa las// 'bras bu yon tan bcas pa byung // zhes so// rdzogs pa chen po kun tu bzang po ye shes gsal bar ston pa'i gsang sngags lam mchog 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud las/ gsang sngags mtha' drug la zhes
338a4(rnying rgyud): rol par bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsol pa/ sde bcom gan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po/ mahA yo ga dang / a ru yo ga dang / a ti yog gsum dbyer med pa gcig tu gsungs pa'i rgyud pa de nyid
338a5(rnying rgyud): rnams ni/ dpal rdo rje 'chang gis bdag cag rnams la gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar che'o// des na rgyud 'di gnas shing sprod pa'i don bshad du gsol/ zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po ngo bo nyid kyi sku des bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje sems
338a6(rnying rgyud): dpa' la sogs pa rnams nyon cig/ a ti yo ga'i rgyud 'di nyid la sogs pa rnams ni/ 'og min gyi gnas yum gyi mkha' nyid du/ da nyid kyis khyed 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la bshad de/ srud pa po ni 'jam dpal dang / spyan ras gzigs dang / phyag na
338a7(rnying rgyud): rdo rjes bsdus te/ lha gnas gsum du grags te/ de nas gser gyi glegs pam la/ bai DUn+ya zhun mas rang nan du bris te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du lho phyogs su sprul pa'i sangs rgyas 'byon pa'i gnas/ rdo rje gdan du babs nas spyod par 'gyur ro// de yang
338b1(rnying rgyud): hA yo ga'i byud thams cad na/ rgyal ba zhes thub po la jog babs par 'gyur la/ yan log nu thams cad ni mngag pa'i nags rdal du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ a ti yod rdzogs partson po'i rgyud 'di nyid la tshogs pa thams cad ni/ d+han ga
338b2(rnying rgyud): 'byung zhing der nas byas shing smod par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gsang sngags kyi rgyud rnams dpal phrug no rdo rje sogs pas/ ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma la gtud nas/ slad nas kyang 'byung zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro// de nyid kyi dus su slar byung ba'i rgyud/
338b3(rnying rgyud): chen pags min/ byang phyogs 'angam bu'i gleng shi dbus yin pas/ der byang byung dri bar 'gyur ba'o/ rdo rje gdan gyi drang dra mi spyod par byang chub kyi shing drung du gter dramed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir der/ 'dul ba'i spyod du ma byur ba'i phyir ro// de
338b4(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi dus su s+kha nas 'byung ba rnams dang / byung phyogs kyi gnas su ni sngar byung ba'i rgyud sde rnam pa gsum dang / sbeng nas 'byung ba'i rgyud rnams dang / gnyis ka da ra zhing rgyas par 'gyur te/ gzhung bzhin du lud pa rnams na rje 'chang gis thob par 'gyur
338b5(rnying rgyud): la// de log par spyad cing dam nyams pa rnams nid las gzhan du'ang yin no// de yang chud 'di nyid ni rtags tsam 'dzin pa'i dusa'i byung du nye ban// rnal 'byor bskal pa dang ldan khring tshogs bsags pa rnams kyi spyod cing drir nas/ rig so
338b6(rnying rgyud): gsal rtogs te/ sangs rgyas kyis la gnas par 'gyur ro// zhes bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzhing po derje 'chang la 'khor rnams kyis bstod pani// ye shes pra yis stong gsum zil gyis gnon// 'gas
338b7(rnying rgyud): yang gsung gis bstan pa rgya mtsho balpags/ rdzogs kyis thams cad pa la brjod// kun pa dang rdo rje'abang chen byed pa bstod// ces pas bstod par gyur // de nas dpel kun du babang pos yang bka' stsal pa/
339a1(rnying rgyud): ngasams bya'i tshogs/ gas grags las kyi da 'das kyad// zan gyi napa ma yin// / tugs dpa gzung bar bya'o// zhes bshA rgyal ba dang / 'kho thams cadang / gnas kyis lhaganas pa dang/
339a2(rnying rgyud): rnye rtsibs pa la sangs rgyas par gyur to// rdzogs pa chen po kun tu parang po ye shas gsal ba zhin pa gsang sngags rnams cad kyil ma mchog 'dus pa'i gyad las+ya/ gsang sngags ji ltar 'byung ba lung bdun pa dang / skyed mongasasu bzang zhing gtad
