339a4(rnying rgyud): sa te gtan la phab pa'o// bar grangang/ ma la sul d+yaH/ bdag dang / thung ngu'i sems stsol ba rdo lags than/ bcom ldan 'das dbying sngags rnam par dag pa'i dang la phrag
339a5(rnying rgyud): lo// bdag med gnyis nyid bde gshegs mi rtog ye shes chos dbyings du brnyes pa// bud kyi rang bzhin zhib 'di la bsal zhing tha med las mchog ste// mi ldog pa la sogs te dbyung ba tu rgyal ba kun dang gcig brnyes pas// gnas gsum mnyam rnyed de la
339a6(rnying rgyud): mtshan med yid kyis rab tu dad pas mos// stong pa 'jig rten smon mar gyur pa kun gyis mtshungs par rab bsngags pa// chos la chos kyi snying por gyur pa'ang mdapal gdon du'i snying po nyid// bde gshegs ma lus yum du gyur pa'i rgyal ba kun gyi las
339a7(rnying rgyud): cig pu// tshul khrims la sogs pha rol phyin lam spyod pa rgya mtsho'i gzhir gyur pa// rnam dag byang chub sems kyi ngang tshul bsgom dang yon tan khyad par ni// blo ldan nam zhig sems kyi dam pa de ni mngon du gyur pas na// de la spu gsum mcho
339b1(rnying rgyud): gyur bas rjod kyi rgyu zhes N+Dal bas gsungs// shan byed dam par gyur bas shes rab stan zhes kyang nidi la b+ha// rdo rjen mo mchog nyid mi rtog ye shes de yang ni nyid na// dri skyed 'phags pa'i rnam grol chos su bsnyad pa de dag kyang // byang drang bas rtan
339b2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs las da yin tan da las 'byung / 'phags pa'i rigs chen mi med byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang // de me mi 'byung dbyar de'i rnam grol mchog gi lam nyid do// de dbya rdo rjem pame pa'i ci 'drar brkos par bya bar 'dra'o/
339b3(rnying rgyud): dri zhing shes dka'i drang srong chen po'i lam 'di mi rtog rtog las 'das/ brtag par dka' zhing bstan par dka' la brjod pa'i thasnyad rnams dang dril// tshig gis mi zla bas gzhan dang byis ba kun gyi spyod spel ba yin yang / do panges par lung da/
339b4(rnying rgyud): mi rnams kyi mnang gdon 'dir ba lta/ mngon sus la sogs chu yi dngos po 'jig cing grub pa'i 'tha' dpyod pa// de nyid rtog pa'i rgyun 'brings spyod yul tshad mar bzhag nas blo yis 'jig byed de/ tog ma'i med phyir dpyod mtha' bred de snying ngo mad na ca pagapa
339b5(rnying rgyud): dbyu 'jig tan partazhes pa'i brka du lta 'grodul mo 'dir mi dgus s+ho// dngas pa mtha 'i d+hAni lo zhus dag las lam 'dir btags / blo btsun gyisems la mngon dang bye dang grags pa'i chos din// 'dzin brdzogagis ji ltar mthong zhi sa sa
339b6(rnying rgyud): ltar ma yin 'khrul// rang gi rtog pas myong zhing gzung ba de bzhin bden gyur na// de dge dngos po med rtog dgra bcom 'dra bar grol bar rigs// de dag dus dgus 'joms dang sdug bsngal nyen pas nges 'khrul mngon par 'gyur// gzhan
339b7(rnying rgyud): pazed sgon ma rig pa de dag tshang mar gyur na ni// de dag tshad mar gyur bas 'phags pa'i lam su me'ang dag pa mi 'gyur// lam de nam grol lam du bstan ci dbang po'i shes pas mi bar to// drug par la ga' rang 'i 'dzi na 'dziganas natan pos byung
340a1(rnying rgyud): nga byob dag 'phrul ba gnas thal bas gasmras/ du didag sa nga na gyu/ sa nga da su gas da nyams//
340a2(rnying rgyud): gyu cing mjig rkyen gyi dbang song bas// sems dang sems las byung ba de nyid las gas mngon du nAr 'asnyen// 'di rnyed na rdzogs dag gis phragatsigs pasags la ga goms mthu bta // sems cad yul dang phral 'drar ldang
340a3(rnying rgyud): ngas pas gang ba bzhin du byung // bgachags bsags pa'i kun las dmigs skyes yid la btags pas bdag ni med// 'ad byeng mis bzlob shing thabs rjod de las pa na te// rgyu dang 'dus pa'i sa sus kyi mdzan matog rtog pa sa
340a4(rnying rgyud): nas// de la bag bcis rang bzhi rtogs pas bdag dang chos dmas rgyas par rnye// ldan pa 'thung ba shin mu chub ma ma thong bas// bdag tu bskal ngogs pa rgya steg sa lta ba tshogs d+he bang rtog/ sems 'dilas nam sum
340a5(rnying rgyud): yas gnas gyur bag chags mtha' med nges pa med// bag chags brnyas shing sad par byed pa'i rkyen yang rnam pa sna tshogs te// gyen 'gas bkra chags 'ga' zhig spen nas rmi 'i cud kyi lus snang lI// rkyed gzhan da ga gis bag chags gzhanas dbus tshe ladu
340a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i mthu mthong nas// dbang phyug la sogs byed par 'dod pa'i lam des mi ni grol mi 'gyur// rgal 'byor lam basmad na tso maN+Da yang kun 'di zag ma rtogs skye// dedag tu btegs pas bsgribs te jigs pa'i rigs dang rnam par bral// chosas
340a7(rnying rgyud): btag pa'i sdug bsngal rna tshogs 'byung gang nasang srid par 'gyur// rnamags yang 'a byed du lasam can pa pa de drun/ las byung bar dgags nga ga rigs pa su med/ na du phyin cig la lang
340b1(rnying rgyud): chos kun gnas// dal bsam pa na tu phyim ngas zud de la dang // rlung sems kun las 'phags pa rgya ba chos ni gzhan na mang ma yin// klad da rigs las yang blatshogs de dag rang gi deng ben // sems blan den phyogs pang dung zad med pa
340b2(rnying rgyud): de la'ang zhen med de// de la rdzogs med kyir na mtha' yas ning rnams bdag gi lus// bdag gi lus ni mtha' yas zhing dang skye bo'i lus sbyar ba snang yang // sems dang bgu chags gcig yin tha dang ma min btags par rab tu dkar// 'di kun rten cing
340b3(rnying rgyud): 'brel 'byung tshul te skye dang 'gag par 'gyur zhes pa// chog pa'i sa bon bzhin du med las med pa mi 'byung rgya 'bras med// dngos por zhen cing rgyu dang 'bras bur rtog pa'i sems nyid ni// r+g+ha dang rten du snang ste de gnyis med gli skyed nga 'dzin pa med/
340b4(rnying rgyud): 'jig med phyir bdag gzhan med de 'chi 'pho bod phyir rtag chad med// des na 'khrul 'khor med cing mya ngan 'das pa'ang med pa nyid du mngon// gnas kyi skad cig nams kyang mi 'bral de tshe mnyam 'gyur ro med med// yang dag ma yin rtog pas bskyed phyir bas/
340b5(rnying rgyud): chags yod pa ma yin dang // spyod yul med phyir kun gzhi med cing rnam rig de yang med pa yin// phyogs rnams med phyir dmigs dang gnas med rnam shes rig pa ji ltar skyes// de phyir sems 'di yod med mtha' las 'das shing gcig dang du ma bral//
340b6(rnying rgyud): bde gshegs byang chub med phyir de y-i rdza 'phrul sgyu 'drang 'khrul la snang // de bzhin dag pa'i ye shes de dag dge ba'i rgyu nyid dang // chos kyi dbyings nyid la ni de dag dmigs shing skye b.ra'i brtags pa yang // rdo rje'i gnas med phyir na mnyam gnas rang
340b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin 'drar 'gyur dang // chos dbyer sa rdo rje rtsa mo de dag phyogs nyid med pas skad cig min// dag pa'i dge rtsa gzugs brtan med pas 'jog rten ye shes yod mi 'gyung // de phyir byang chub ma chub mtshan nyid med par gcig pas blang dor med//
341a1(rnying rgyud): bya/ dasung chum dang du padam grangs ga khyod dusu nga/ gnyis thod pas da du nadzad ma byangs bad ud rnal la sugs// bstan padeban pang ga tu na pa myed na pam/
341a2(rnying rgyud): dam tshul gyis lam nyid 'di 'dra zhes pa de nyid san sgrib len// the tshom yod med chos ni gang la'ang spangs shing gnas par mi rnyed do// bsgom pa dang ni chos dbyings med phyir som nyi med la dam par blta ba'ang med// de ltar dngos po'i mtha' rnams btag
341a3(rnying rgyud): pas rang bzhin sbrum med 'gyur phyir// yod la ltos pa'i med pa med de med pa'ang med// mtha' rnams med bying dbus mad dpras la'ang gnas par mi byed do// gang la'ang 'jig rten dbang phyug pad+ma kun kyang mi srod 'dra mnyam gnas// chos la 'khrul bar
341a4(rnying rgyud): mthong ba de nyid 'khrul pa yin par rab rtogs te// drug gis bstan pa'i bdud kyi las kyang mi 'dod ngan du mi rtog go// shes rab thabs kyi spyod pa la yang mi gnas phyir na bdud rtsi 'dra bar spyod// rang gi shes pa dam par byas te kun las rgyal te nges bsnyems na/
341a5(rnying rgyud): 'dod chags zhe sdang skyes nas rtsod 'byung gti mug yin te don mi mthong // ji srid yid kyi g.yo ba de sred bdud kyi yul te phra ba'i lam// g.yo dang mig yo tha snyad mi gnas gnas la'ang gnas par mi byed de// snang med dbu ma'i lam de byang chub sems zhes
341a6(rnying rgyud): de gshegs gsungs// gzugs dang mtshan ma smon par 'dzin pa rab tu spangs nas su// rnamathar gsum po sgom pa yang bdud kyi las te gzugs nyid stong pa'o// 'khor ba'i lam gsum spangs shing mya ngan 'das la ma bsgom byed pa'ang bdud nyid de//
341a7(rnying rgyud): de nyid rang bzhin ma zhi rang bzhin rtsal spangs gar mi gnas// 'phags pa kun gyi yul dang gnas kyang 'das sogs lam 'di gzhan na med// ldang dang mi ldang ched du mi spong sems rten mi 'cha' mngon du min// 'jam dpal ma yin rdul tsam g.yo ba de nyid de
341b1(rnying rgyud): yin der mi gnas// bsgom pa lis mi rnyed phyir bsgoms pas rnyed par mi 'gyur te// sems kyi spyod yul shes pa de dag chos rnams kyi ni chos nyid yin// rnam bral gang la'ang mchog dang tha ma med par lam mchog 'di bsgom mo// 'du byed ma skyes chos
341b2(rnying rgyud): kun 'byung med shin tu chos rnams mya ngan 'das// dngos med de tshe kun kyang chos kyi dbyings shes dgra bcom rab 'byor yin// nam mkha' mi dmigs ming tsam dag dang mi dge 'byed med skye ba'ang med// rtsol ba yid la mi byed gang la lang sems med shes
341b3(rnying rgyud): dang mi shes bral// dran dang 'byed med gang la'ang spang len dga' dang mtshungs med mi dmigs shing // mnyam gnas gnyis su brtags med brjod bral bya dang mi bya med de sogs bri med// ched du rtsol bar yid la mi byed cis kyang mi 'khrugs mnyam shes
341b4(rnying rgyud): dang // gang la'ang chags dang yul gyi myos skrag med de mi 'bral mi gnas shing // mi 'phrog mnyam shes bzhi po phyogs drang pha rol phyin rnams der shes te// sems kyi dbyings su bsgoms pas lam gyi phugs na 'dug pa de yin gyis// gzhan du bsos
341b5(rnying rgyud): pas 'od gsal don nyid rig par mi 'gyur ro// brda' can yang dag len pa'ang byang chub chen po yin zhes ston pas rab gsungs phyir// de la 'di ni byang chub sems nyid bskyed cing bsgom pa'i gnas yin te// ting 'dzin gsum po brtan par byas nas rtags
341b6(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma phyag rgya gsum bcings nas// chos kyi phyag rgya chen por sems nyid bskyed de snying po brjod cing bsgom pa'i gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms pas la mthun ma nor bsgom pa yin// kun tu 'azang mo'i spyod pas ma zin dge ba'i chos ni gang yang rung /
341b7(rnying rgyud): nata bzang po'i spyod pa'ang bdud kyi las te zad cing mthar thug 'gyur// de dang ldan pa'i las ni bdud kyi las kyang byang chub spyod par gsungs// don 'dir smos pa de yang byang chub chen po yin zhes tshul bas rab tu bsngags// gnas 'dir bskyed pa tsam gyis
342a1(rnying rgyud): 'drig tu gsum po rnamar bcas pa yi// mchod gnas nyan thos bdud kyi sde rnams zil gyis gnon zhes rgyal bas gsungs// thabs chen byang chub sems dpa' bsdang ba'i spyod pa'ang 'di nyid de// 'daman rgyal
342a2(rnying rgyud): 'i dang ma dathag pa gsum tan / skad cig cam du da pa'i thugs bskyed de yang ltur du'ajam dpel gzhon ra 'gyur// dkyil 'khor gsang bar grags shing dam tshig mchog kyang ba srung ba yin/ tshul khrims sdom pa kun kyang bsrungs
342a3(rnying rgyud): shi rkyen gi nus dam par rab tu bsngags// de phyir byang chub sems kyi bsod nams de la gzugs yod na// nam mkha' bar snang 'di yang snong du chung zhes rgyal bas mtshungs par gsungan// sde 'i bye ba sna tshogs dag las skyes shing skye dang skye 'gyur skye ba'i
342a4(rnying rgyud): pang song bas// rtog mazad mi shes rtog pas bslus shing rtog pa'i rgyun 'brangs 'khrul pa'i rtog las phyir ldog med gyur pa// sgyu ma'i sgra shes dag gis sgyu ma'i glang po 'dra bar sgyu mas rmongs pa'i sgyum rnams// rmi lam gyis bslang bzhin
342a5(rnying rgyud): 'is bden pa 'ang nyams shing rmil mu dang du song ba'i drilam pa/ lam bye'i spangs shing mtha' dang lam gzhan lam du ba zlas nas mnor la mi zhes ston pade// de dag rdo la gsang bzhin zlogs rtse rung zhing shugs rje'i thugs rjes kyi ma'o phyogs pa yin/
342a6(rnying rgyud): tu ma rkyangs dus kyis mnar ba'i rdo rje ba N+Di za pa la// gsung ra ba dri medo rtogs dka' dgal sde bzhin spyod dang tshul bzhin min// rang gi blagros stobs bzhin 'dug la sogs pa lcib sna tshogs dang / me na sa rba bos g.ye zhing gsung gi nying
342a7(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsin la 'byor bral// de pyor rtsa le bas gsungs pa'i thugs kyi gas bdam pa 'di// kun tu rgyal ba rnams kyi spyod // thun mong ma yen yaH// goms pa 'o mthu mas shi gal tshul du cing mngag las rab ba sgrubs te// 'gro ba'i don du ma ga
342b1(rnying rgyud): lam mchog 'a ni ba' byes pa// n+yabo ste gnas thams cad du yang skad ci du// mimathun phyogs kyis mi nyams rgyal ba kun ste zhugs 'dir rab rgyas zhog/ byangasams sgom 'ardo lags lun rdzogs su/ nga sa su ra na
342b2(rnying rgyud): gar skad du/ oMd+ha tA d+hA ratra ku dz+wa laM kA ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ thugs kyi chung rin po che srungs pa'i rkyen zhes bya ba/ ye shes kyi sku bde ba chen po na bzhugs pa/ bya rtsol mi mnga' ba/ gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor dang 'du 'bral med par bzhugs
342b3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa na/ ye shes kyi snang ba mi 'gag par 'od gsal ba/ thugs rin po che klong na 'dra 'bral med pa/ stong pa chen po ye shes kyi snying por gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig
342b4(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'og min gyi gnas snying po byang chub na bzhugs pa'i skus/ rdo rje sems dpa' la gzigs nas/ chos kyi sku bde ba chen po lnga bzhugs te/ de'i tshe dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa rnams dang gnyis su med par bzhugs nas/ kye
342b5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'dus pa'i ye shes su// tshig bcig marton pas don chen spangs// rnam par dag pa'i lam chen po// sangs rgyas nyid kyis yongs ma gsungs// bgrod med lam la rab gnas pa// ye shes sku gcig dri ma med// ma bskyed gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor
342b6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// rnam dag la ma la rab tu gnas// mgon po shes ring pha rol phyin// shes rab mtshon mngon po meng// snying rje meng par thams cad sgrol// gzung 'dzin gnyis med ye shes sa// mya ngan 'das med 'khod ba med// mgon po mi ye shes bya// sangs
342b7(rnying rgyud): chen po// thugs kyi smon las don bstan pa// 'jig / rdo rje'i gangan pa yang dag brten/ chos kyis bde ba chen po'i don 'di ni// kun gyis rig
343a1(rnying rgyud): ru ru / pa la yin te// lhal sogs te 'gro ba rnams// byang chub sems dpa' mi rig ste// chos pa rnams kyi na 'i rnyed// sangs rgyas lam la mi gnas te// la ma la bgrod bcol ba'i nad// sangs rgyas nyid la 'bras bu med/
343a2(rnying rgyud): bu grus par 'dod pa yi// byang chub sems dpas don mi rnyed// de phyir mgon po de med ngas// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dang byung ba// ye shes lha rdo rdzogs me long bzhin// ni dus gsum rtag par bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun DI ye shes su// ri med rang byung 'od
343a3(rnying rgyud): gsal ba// dus gsum gci ga ste rtag par bzhugs// rang las 'byung ba'i ye shes lnga// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thugs kyi mchog/ mtshan nyid me chu sa spru lnga// rang las byung ba'i chos nyid de// las la marmongs thabs kyi zhing // byed pa po nyid rdo rje lta/
343a4(rnying rgyud): 'gag med pa'i ye shes 'di// rang bzhin nam mkhar 'od gsal ba// gzhi las nyung ba'i ye shes te// dang po rgyu med dbyings las shang// tha mkhyen med bde ba'i ngang // 'byung ba sa chu me rlud kyang // bdag nyid chen po'i de bzhin nyid// 'gro ba'i rgyung drug spang ba
343a5(rnying rgyud): yang // dag pa'i ye shes rgyu yi nga // phyi nang snod bcud ma lus kun// dang po rgyu med dbyings las byung// tha ma rku med dbyings su ni ma// po rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon cig/ nyon mongs lnga dang mtshams med lnga// lam gyi dgra ste lam gyi mchog/ da ni sa
343a6(rnying rgyud): kun gyi sku// nga ni sems can kun gyi dur// nga ni nad rnams kun gyi sman// shel ltar dri med ye shes su// gzhi la dngos med nam mkha' 'dra// 'gag med ye shes 'od kyi sku// chu zla lta bur rang bzhin med// rang byung ye shes 'gag med gsung
343a7(rnying rgyud): cha lta bur rang bzhin med// mi 'gyur rdo rje lta bu'i thugs// nyi ma lta bur sgrib pa med// ces pa rin mo tshe spangs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba/ thugs kyi chud dam pa las/ gzhi'i 'dug tshul bstan pa'i le'u snye po po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das
343b1(rnying rgyud): 'dun da nga na byas pazhes nas/ rgyags mi gnas pa'i rdzogs/ gsang nga kyis mthong can gzhal rgyanas/ nyid las yogazhan pa ma mo dmas pag 'phrul pa/ gas rnams cacad//
343b2(rnying rgyud): ye gsu kyi 'khor nga byung la// gdod sa mabyas byu/ b.len rdzog san pa'i brnyan ma brjod pa tsu 'das// thA gnas nas / la ga ba/
343b3(rnying rgyud): ra snang ga/ mtshan babang dpe byang chub shes rnam// yang mig cig lasag nyi snang bzhin// bdag mid shes ba sa bya// can dun lugs tshul shes pa// bye bden me dgra gdan ngas
343b4(rnying rgyud): gas pa'i tshul du bstan par gnas// rang byung sgrib pa'i tha rdzang gar// bye ba med las skye tshul// skyes pa nyid nas 'dra 'bral myed// gcig pung dang ba'i sna lnga'o// don jung shes bka' stsal pa// ni pa dag smi mi thon/
343b5(rnying rgyud): sa lus can dri yod// ngadzin pa zhesu gi mchog/ zhabs ma yul las 'das pa yin// ngadi na ma da ga zugs kyim / rtog pa'i mtha' las 'das pa yin// ci'i the nas la ga// sams 'i bdag ta
343b6(rnying rgyud): lnga'i yon tan mthung byin pa// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i gsung // gsung med gsung gi dkyil 'khod du// chos me kyis kyi don brjod pa// mngon pos bdag pa bgang dugasol// zhes bka' phral to// ng+yangs pa sbyor ba nyid kyi srung nga drug
343b7(rnying rgyud): sa mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen po dang drug/ yul wa bdag tu med pa'i slong dang drug gis smras pa/ kyai byed com phra rdo rje 'chang // dbyed pa pa nyid rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag das/ sangs rgyas sa rgyas rba chos y-i gdo ma nas med do/
344a1(rnying rgyud): gas dang 'a dag pa yon pas/ mang mngangabatsun pa sadam/ de nas dung nga gi rigs kyi la po rnams dang na rtog tuladod nas/ za mo nyam par sbyar te gsol pa/ ngan nyid kyis sbas pa/ mato// 'ang
344a2(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das// sangs cus kun gyi ye shes bya// rtogs par dka' ba'i snying po'i don// rab tu mi rtog gnas med pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdorje mi bskyod pas/ e maho gzung 'dzin na ma spangs pa/ bya dang
344a3(rnying rgyud): sa
344a4(rnying rgyud): ba sa sa na
344a5(rnying rgyud): du da pa sa// ma ma / rkyen dag na pas// mang ngab 'dug pa rnams dpa jug/ sa na blangs/ sa kya rnam par drung ma dathoms dpas no myos nganagong pa'i bad
344a6(rnying rgyud): sa/ ces da /
344a7(rnying rgyud): sa ci/ sa mig / das sa
344b1(rnying rgyud): pa kar mong/ a drug su 'od dpag med// thams cad smin par byed pa'i rang bzhin ye shes tshod kyi me/ de nas yum dam chog gi sgrol mas/ e maho thugs rje'i shugs kyis stsol/ ma bskyod rlabs kyis gcod pas gang yang rdzogs
344b2(rnying rgyud): la/ de nas yum bdag tu med pa'i klong gis/ e ma ho// mi ga nas ye shes dngos rtog mtha' dang bral// sku dang ye shes rol pa mdzad stod kun// gdod nas rang bzhin med de dngos tog mtha' dang bral// zhes gsungs so// de nas ye
344b3(rnying rgyud): smras pa/ rig pa 'ag/ pa med pas me long ye shes yin// de la 'pho 'gyur med pas mnyam pa nyid// de nyid rgya mchad pas sor tog ye shes yin// ma btsal lhun gyis grub pas bya ba grub pa yin// skye med dbyings las ye shes
344b4(rnying rgyud): chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes gdod nas dag/ ye shes rgyal po chog las 'das pa ste// mi gnas tshig las 'das pa'i ye shes yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang // dga' zhing mgu nas mi dang ste// lags
344b5(rnying rgyud): mkhegs so rigs kyi bu// sems can kun gyi ngon pa phyir// khyed kyis smras pa de legs so// cigadon rab tu gsal ba yis// sgra ma lta bri'i ye shes la// l+h+wa mAH/ bu'o chog brjod paste// dngos po ldeg yo brtan par bzhugs// de bzhin
344b6(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa'i sku lnga yang // ye shes lnga ru mngon sangs rgyas// ye shes lnga yi ngo bo yang // mi gnas ye shes chen por rdzogs// ma bskyed dang byung dbyings su rdzogs// rdzogs pa'i yang rdzogs a ti la// mthong man bzung ngan che chung
344b7(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin rnam par dge ba'i phra mnga' bas// rang byung bcol med pa na ldan gyis rdzogs// dam mkha'i rang bzhin mnang dadang bus med pas// phyi nang sdong bcud nam mkha'i dang rdzogs// rang byung bde nan ye ba na la khyab par
345a1(rnying rgyud): gnas// mnyam dang mi mnyam kyi med klong rdzogs// rdzogs pa'i don la bcal du lde nas rang bzhin med// ces gsungs so// thugs kyi rgyud dam pa las/ byugs rje 'thung ba'i tshul brtan pa'i la sa gnyis pa'o//
345a2(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdorje 'chang // rang gang ba brjod du med// mi gnas myangan 'das sus// rtogs pa'i grong dusus dris pa// ye shes rjem med pa yin// lung du bstan pa sa de gnas bu// krol grib ga dang gcod pa yin// chom la migs/
345a3(rnying rgyud): rtagan cig lus 'das pa yim// legs sra ma ldang ba'i mngasacas dang / sa rtog su ma da ba'i sems na drug tis// rdzu la yin myi rang ba'i din pa ma dani/ sabyung mthos 'od kyang sdel 'dul// bkod pa nya ma kyil dza
345a4(rnying rgyud): dgos// rang bzhin rnam par dgra pa'i chos sbal// khyis dang gcang sbra me tog drug mi dgas// mkha' la nyi ma'i snying po 'dal bu'o// 'od dang snang btsun du btsal mi dgos// shes rab rig pa gzhi las shar ba la// nangs mnyan cing ldog
345a5(rnying rgyud): phyir 'thang med nas// nor 'dri med dang la yod pa shis/ gzhan la ba dus pa nil bas chos nyi spyod pa rnyed/ rtog pa med pa'i chos rdul// bkres pa 'i ci 'dag rnamamapa' 'dra// sre dang bral ba'i ma sod/ blang chu ba'i bras pa yongs
345a6(rnying rgyud): med// rdo rnamams dpa byang chu'i// dgang gi btsun pas mnyes/ rang gdu yar mi ldang bas// mo myong brtan nga gcig ga nga// bde ga shegs carnams dum gang // ye shes rnga long dga'i dadang / khyis spring ba ji bzhi na sa
345a7(rnying rgyud): do// snang la mi gnas pa rnams ni// so zhes kyi rna med pa // bkod pa med par mngon par rna ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mudrim me sa rgyan khring snang ba'o// ma bgod pa ma tha dang rjo// phyogs pa sa / 'god sa na dang
345b1(rnying rgyud): nan ma dpa dang na sangs dung tu dang mangs su dag pa'o// 'dod pa mapa thams cad dang bral ngan ting 'dzin cigacig pa'i zas so// la ga g+sa ma sa myed pa dang sangs kya kyi gang mangs su dgu pa gnyis dus gsum du'adu 'thab med par bzhugs pan/
345b2(rnying rgyud): grogs khyad par can no// tshig dang yi ge'i don la mi gnas par gzhi'i 'dug tshul shes bya gtan la phebs nas/ dgongs pa'i la dor/ dron klong du 'dril/ ri dogs kyi 'phrang bcad/ bdag nyid chen po de kho na nyid do// zhes thugs kyi rgyud dam pa las/
345b3(rnying rgyud): togs bcud la bzhag pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po// chos nyid gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas/ pra mi gnas pa'i spyong chen por bstims te/ kye 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams nga la tro na/
345b4(rnying rgyud): de ye nas nam mkha' 'dra// nam mkha'i rang bzhin dngos po med// sgrib g.yogs rab tu mi gnas pa'o// dA ni ye nas rgya mtsho 'dra// srid pa'i g.yo 'gul ye nas med// nga ni ye nas ri bo 'dra// dus gsum 'pho 'gyur med par gnas// nga ni nyi ma'i
345b5(rnying rgyud): snying po 'dra// su gsum 'bras bu ldan gyis drab// nga ni ye nas seng gi 'dra// rdul gsum lus la rdzogs pa yin// nga ni byaN+Da la khrung chen 'dra// lha ba s+thi rgya rlabs kyis gcod// kyi don 'dzin pa zhon cig/ khyod ni drung 'khor ba'i rgyu'o// sa lags
345b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lharnams la sogs pa nya ci spos/ kyig rtogs pa'i don lam dul khyer ba'i phyir ro// nga rig cos sde sru nga byung zhes shes chen po rtogs pa mngon du gyur ba/ spu btsal thams cad dang bral ba/ l+r-ing las 'das pa
345b7(rnying rgyud): zab cing ca srabs gzhan gyis brtags par dka' ba/ phra zhing zag pa med pa/ sa bon dang bral ba/ rdul med ba dul dang bral ba/ dri ma med pa dang ma 'dres par gnas pa/ rang rig pa'i ye shes la bdag med pas/ byab thams cad dang bral pa'o//
346a1(rnying rgyud): na du na tu tu na dargyun tu sa
346a2(rnying rgyud): pa pa dus
346a3(rnying rgyud): ngas su smra/
346a4(rnying rgyud): sdugs rnams// maci nyid bya chub las gags sa byed kyi da yul nani/ rje bya chu kyi ga pol danas pa/ rnam pab ga' zhin ngo/
346b1(rnying rgyud): da gsu ngas na sa mdun ma su da mas du sas nas
346b2(rnying rgyud): las 'das chos/ ma marnams par sangs byis pa sa sa/ spyod barba parnams med pa lnga'i spyod pa thad pa byed pa/ mamanyan par bag shes byam/ nan ngas/ gsangags dngas phying ba ga stsoto//
346b3(rnying rgyud): dang pa las/ bya dz+wal d+ham rgya las 'das phyir ban pa'i skye bzhi pa'o// / de sa bco spyod pa gyigs to// sas gyu pa zhig pa yi/ dpa'i thu ngas med dang / sngon
346b4(rnying rgyud): la khyen/ ga pa ma skye/ tshus pa rte su rdzo// mi brjod dacings nas dang smra // skyes sa pa/ ga nga byung ba yang chog la dga' ga ci gag
346b5(rnying rgyud): ga na bcos la brten pa yis yang dgados rdzog med pa zhimed bdun ces pa bye ston pa bzhin// sems cad rnamal yang dag cig dang migs pa'on// sems can nam gathog parnaMs sa bya sa/ yong
346b6(rnying rgyud): gnasus// lung brnyan ni thog ma ma kyis nyid thong / ma g.yong su ma pa yadu dganadas spangs/ khyim na da nga smram sa 'a/ dbye bas pa nyi du pa nyam panas byed cing myi shes nyal khyod byed pa/
346b7(rnying rgyud): sa mthas sa byin pa 'a' nas/ da 'a mamyong po sas sa // rkyen pa thog / srog pa ma ba na la nga rudu tus 'asrangag/ sa pa
347a1(rnying rgyud): bcas// stong pa btsas la tong bang legs pa de ladu/ dmal pa'i bdu dpa yang mdag mas gzugs su pa 'byung bas dag / dang gargyal pon pas bya pa'adang nyam gag ma
347a2(rnying rgyud): bag chags rje bsags kyang // byang chub sems la rang bzhin yongs kyis med// dper nan pa mkha'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs zer snang yang// nam mkha'i rang bzhin gdod nas rnam par dag/ rtsordorje 'dzin pa ton cig/ bka' lung gi phyi bo las kyang /
347a3(rnying rgyud): shes rgyal po cheg las 'das pa de// sba ba'i khrum chog gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog/ rang rig rgyal po cho ga las 'das rtogs na// phyi nang snod bsu dngabadag nyid chen por ldog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi mchog/ sangs rgyas nyid kyi thugs la gnas// sems
347a4(rnying rgyud): can kun gyi byang chub sems// mgon po dri mang shes rab gyis// rnam par dag pa'i zhing khams sa// dus gsum gcig ste mnyam par gnas// rdo rje 'chang gi ye shes ni// bde gshegs rnams kyi thugs laganas// thams can rnams la de bzhin
347a5(rnying rgyud): na tshad ma rgya ma yang / da mamags dang pad / dkyil ga pa / nas dzin gyisas/ ji rig ga sogs // mnas 'thung /
347a6(rnying rgyud): nga med pani spong ba yin// 'phags pa rnams kyis mi gzigs// bdu dang ma shegs pa 'i byung // nga la dang bzhin byed pasan// bdud bzhinam par grol ba med// don mo 'gyur de rje // dag pa med pa la ga/ med/
347a7(rnying rgyud): bton cig/ dadri ma med pa ye shes kyi sbal/ dge ba dang sdig pa gnyis med do// dpe na pa mkha' lanam mkha' gnas pa'i tshul // nga gdod ma ni'i byed po byang dru cu gnas pa la/ 'bras bupo ba dang tho ba gnyis su med do//
347b1(rnying rgyud): rgang nga btsa gas byabya/ bdab rnam pathabs shi nga / ga pa pabags pas na nab na susabs pa dang 'bab med par 'jugs pa/ gas da da yodag na tun ma dngas
347b2(rnying rgyud): mtsho ma ba' ring bang/ nyon mongs sems can thol me nas// thugs rje chen po'i thugs pang nas// 'ad pa' ba 'i zhig las su rung // khams gsum sems can pas dpan// sang ste rgyas 'byung ba'i lam tshan yin// srugasung thab
347b3(rnying rgyud): rje'i bdag/ sems can rnam thar pa'i lam// de bsnyen gshegs pa'i thags rnga yis// ngan mod zhing du yang dag bskal// sangs nas 'byung ba'i byang chub sems// mthes pa yiHla la kyinas// khye na 'dzin pa/ 'dig rten 'angs
347b4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs spangs rgyas// gang zhig thob pa bran med// ting po byang chub sems la bzhugs// zhes gsungs te/ rang reg pa la shes kyis marig pa pas nas/ rig pa gang thos rig pa'i rang 'azlos// ye shes lngas drug thabs nas/
347b5(rnying rgyud): lhag blos/ shes dang thos/ skye ba'i rgya brjod pa khor ba'i la pa dang bral/ na bad pa bul ni byang das// rang b+hAng yi shes nyid cang cig gi mthu' nga la// kun ga zhi'i dam thus spel ba 'khring zhi/
347b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i byang sems khon// nan 'dzin pa la nyid// nga ni sang+yas rgyas pa/ waM// ye shes phrag rje 'ardi ba med// 'dis ng+yas rgyas kun gyi gsung // 'gag pa med pas ye shes gsung // nga rje sangs zlas can ci thugs// ma bya/
347b7(rnying rgyud): ga bu'i thugs// 'gro ba rigs drugang misras// mthun pa med mi shesangs// mabyung cigacos nyid las// rjod ci zhigatan lasaspyod// brgyad pa jigarten pas spyong // dab pa pa dun min// da ba bzhan
348a1(rnying rgyud): dang // dan rang byung ba shes te// pAl ni rnam par dag pa'o// rabyung drim med pa'i ye shas la// 'dod chags bya ba'i ming yang med// 'dod chags med pa'i sngon ma na// yi dwags 'khor ba'i rgyun yang bcang // 6nga
348a2(rnying rgyud): nyam nyid chen po yin// mi le 'khor ba'i rgyun yang brjod// khe khro rang byung ye shes len// lha min khor bdenan yang bcad// phrag dog bya ba grub pa'i ye shes yin// lha yi 'khor ba'i rgyun yang bcad// klu dang ma pog shin rje dang // bdud
348a3(rnying rgyud): du gnod ste srin po da / lnga ma yin pa'i chogasan pas skyes// nga pag gzhon mi tshom te// dang po rang shi dang las s+ho// tha sa rang gi dang du shes// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs spyi 'asol// ngan song gsum la nyam meng // ye shes mnya
348a4(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi sa// me gnas pa'i ye shes rten pa'i slong du khod stob// rang byung gi ye shes chen po'i tshig gi mtha' dang thal bar sa bka'/ chu 'bras na chos thams cad rdzogs pa chen po'i grong du bstims so// zhes smon pa rdo rje sems dpas bsun/ phung
348a5(rnying rgyud): po dga' re rdo na sa lus te/ sdud pa po 'jam dpal nyid kyis bsdus nas byang chub zhing drub du sbas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyas btas po// thugs kyi gud chen po chen che blangs pa'i kun zhes bya ba/ rtog pa med pa'i drung du gsungs nas/ chos snga
348a6(rnying rgyud): brgyad nga mtshams med lnga/ rtogs par grol rang bzhin mnyam/ zhes chos la gan san mong sa nas kyi las kyi sgrib par 'byung bar bstan pa'i len nye thaba'o// gas so// min dang par 'thar// rgyugar gad nga/ graH
348a7(rnying rgyud): tan rjen ma/ tho gang du/ gsang ba ste spyod ces rgya nyisas pan da sred pa na / bcom ldad 'das shes bad gi kyil phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad tho pa'i ngas nang bezhin nga snang ba'i gnas na/ rang byu gson pa gsang ba garten pa
348b1(rnying rgyud): 'kho gsum gyis bskor te/ bstan pa gsam rgyadon la bkod do// de nas ston pa gsang bdag chen pos// ched du brjod pa 'di ched du 'arjod do// gang yang thub pa med pa'i ngang // ming gi tha snyad grub pa med// snang ba gsum gyi rang bzhin las// ston pa gsum
348b2(rnying rgyud): kyi ngo bor shar// gdul bya'i zhing la so ser snang // sru dang gsung thugs rim pa yis// rang rang mos pa so sor shar// yi ge med snang gsung tshig gis// gang 'dod 'bras bu so sor snang // khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can rnams// chu dang log gcod
348b3(rnying rgyud): thabs bral bas// rgyud drug 'khor ba'i nang du 'khyams// ma ngag ma rtogs ma shes pas// yun ring sdug bsngal so sor spyod// ces gsungs so// de skad brjod pa'i mthus 'khor gyi nang nas sems dpa' rdo rje des ston pa la zhu ba'i don zhus pa// bdag la
348b4(rnying rgyud): sogs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// ston pa'i rang bzhin ji ltar rtogs// rgyud drug sems can thams cad kyis// dang po ma rtogs ji ltar 'khrul// de las grol thabs yod dam med// zhus pas/ gsang bdag chen pos lan gsungs pa// mnyam nyid dang /
348b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin lhan grub lus// ye shes mkha' la 'degs pa'i rlung // rang gsal rin po che yi sbubs// zer rtsal ma 'gags so sor shar// rtogs lugs snang ba bdun du snang // rang bzhin snang dang gdul bya ste// mthar thug 'bras bu gsum gyis mu// thugs
348b6(rnying rgyud): las 'byung ba bcud kyis su// dran sems 'gru ba kun dang bral// bde ba rang snang 'dzin sems med// theg pa kun gyi bla med mchog/ dbang po kun rkyen mi snang na// mi 'dzin mi snang rkyen dang bral// gtso ma bzhin te bcos bslad med// snying po 'dod pa
348b7(rnying rgyud): med na gsal// dri ma 'khrul rtog ngang gis med// ye shes rang lugs rang gis bde// ston pa gsum gyi ngo bo dang // dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad la// dgongs pa de las yongs mi mnga'// yang zhus pa/ ston pa'i dgongs pa de lta na// 'gro
349a1(rnying rgyud): 'thu/ drug mos pa drang ba'i thabs// ban+d+ha khyen khyod kyis gsung drugasol// zhes gsol bas/ gsang bdag can pos gsungs pa/ 'gro d+hag sems can byams cad ces// phyogs med dras nas don mags la// 'grub/
349a2(rnying rgyud): rig pa so sor shar// de la brtas shing zhen pa'i sems// kun 'chol nges 'jog gtan la 'bebs// zhen btas sdug bsngal so sor myong // sdug bsngal de las thar pa'i thabs// snod brgyad gnyis 'dom man ngag gis/ de don grol ba'i thabs
349a3(rnying rgyud): su bstan// 'khrul pa rtsad nas gcad pa dang // man ngag gnad la dbab pa dang // mtshon bya dpe yis ngo bstan dang // dbye ba gnyis su bstan pa dang // sra lnga ngo yis bzung ba dang // brda 'don khyad par bstan pa dang // rang chud bstan pa'i rim pa yis//
349a4(rnying rgyud): rgol rtsod rim pa'i dbye ba dang // man ngag don dang sbyar ba dang // bshad thabs rim par bstan pa dang // rna ba rgyud bstan pa'i rim pa yis// de nyid thob pa'i thabs su bstan// dgos 'brel gnyis kyi khyad par dang // yon tan rgyud kyi che ba dang // khyad par
349a5(rnying rgyud): mtshan gyi che tshul lo// zhe 'dod med pa'i rtogs pa dang // dngos po ci yang ma yin pas// ye shes rang lus gsal 'grib med// rkyen la ltos pa'i 'khrul sems bral// lus ngag 'khrul pa rang bzhin zhig/ rgyu yi chos la blo mi ste// theg pa che la
349a6(rnying rgyud): blo mi 'gyur// rtogs pas bya ba dang gis gtang // dge sdig sems dang bral ba'o// ngo bo thub pa ci yang med// stong pa ye shes snying po nyid// bcos bslang med pa'i rang bzhin nyid// 'gyu med 'dzin med rtog pa bral// snang stong mtha' gnyis tha
349a7(rnying rgyud): nyid// 'khrul pa'i myong rig gang yang med// 'gyur med gyen dang bral ba'o// sangs rgyas sems can mnyam pa nyid// mtha' dang dbus med klong chen po// mtshan nyid rig pa bsam mi khyab// lus kyang de bzhin gnas pa ste// rang rang 'dod pa
349b1(rnying rgyud): bzhin du 'bral// zo chu'i rgyun bzhin gnas pa bzhin// de rtsad gcad cing gtan la dbab// kun gyi gzhi ma mnyam pa nyid// rgyud gcig ldog dang bcas pa'o// snga phyi med par dbyings su gcig/ ma bcos snying po kun gyi gzhi// rin chen gter gyi mdzod chen po//
349b2(rnying rgyud): rgyu las ma rdung rkyen dang bral// 'di 'drar bstan med byang chub sems// 'grub med na dran mi skye// stong pa'i ngang la rtsis gdab med// nam mkha' bzhin du mtha' dbus med// snying po nyid la sor gnas pa// nyi zla bzhin du gsal 'grib med// phyogs bral theg pa
349b3(rnying rgyud): kun ci rtse// thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas chen po// rgyud rnams ma lus bdag po yin// 'dod dgu 'byung ba'i rin po che// ston pa rnam gsum thugs kyi bcud// mkhyen pa'i ye shes bsam mi khyab// dus gsum sangs rgyas dgongs pa'i mchog/ dbang po'i
349b4(rnying rgyud): bsam pa 'di nyid ni// 'tha ba med na de nyid yin// rig pa brjed med bsgom mi dgos// dran pa'i phyogs la rjes mi gnod// mkha' dang 'anga' tshon dkyil 'khor la// zhen med tshul 'drug dang gis bde// rang dbang rgyal po rtogs pa ni// don las mi 'da'
349b5(rnying rgyud): nyams pa med// sangs rgyas thugs nyid bsgrub pa'i mchog/ 'dod bral rtogs pa'i don chen po// ma bcos bya gtang don dang mthun// 'dzin bral 'di la gnas pa ni// rnal 'byor chen po skal ba bzang // lus ngag 'khrul pa ngang gis ni// rkyen snang 'khrul
349b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i mtha' mi 'dzin// mi phyed ma phyed mnyam pa nyid// rang gnas rang lugs don chen po// dngos gzhi med pas myong dang bral// de bzhin lce yi dbang pos kyang // yang dag don la brjod du med// snang ba'i ngo bo med pa ni// ma btsal bzhag pa nyid du bde// snang
349b7(rnying rgyud): dang stong pa'i phyogs chabral// rtag dang chad pa'i mtha' mi gnas// 'gro drug 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin dang // rgyal ba'i dgongs pa yang dag gnyis// mnyam nyid dus na bzang ngan med// tha ma la sems kyi snang ba dang // rtogs ldan dang snang shes pa gnyis// gcig
350a1(rnying rgyud): sleb gcig ste gnyis mi mngal// gser dang ser po'i dpe bzhin no// mi kye tog me byu ba bral// 'byung meda' gro 'ong med pa'i mchog/ ces gsungs so// gsang bste r+g+had las/ byang bzhi'i le'u ste dang pa'o//
350a2(rnying rgyud): de nang sems dpa' rdo rjes/ gsang bdag chen po la gsol pa/ ston pa'i gleng gzhi de ltar gsungs pa la/ sba dang yi ge gang las byung ba lags gsol pas/ ston pa gsang bdag chen pos gsungs pa/ yi ge'i gtso bo bye ba med// de nas yan
350a3(rnying rgyud): lag rgyu yi yi ge byung // de las gtso bo'i yi ge byung // de las grogs kyi yi ge byung // yi ge 'bru gcig lus po la// dgos pa'i yan lag bdun tshang ste// mgo ni mngon par lam 'dren la// tshag mig rta po zhi shang rta zhon// yan lag shugs kyis 'gro
350a4(rnying rgyud): par byed// yan lag shugs kyis 'gros bslang nas// mgo ni don gyi lam du zhugs// tshig ni shes rab ming du sbas// shad kyi sde pa tshogs su gcod// yi ge'i don dang rang bzhin ston// chog par 'bru yi tshe gdon ni// ston pa'i gsung du nges par
350a5(rnying rgyud): gsungs// lhag par shar ba sil bur rnams// 'dres pa gang zag mi yi tshig/ nga yis gsungs pa'i don la swA// zhes gsungs so// gsang ba spyi rgyud las/ spra dang yi ge'i drung tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes/
350a6(rnying rgyud): pa gsang bdag chen po la zhus pa// yi ge'i rang bzhin de ltar byung ba la// 'grel dang bshad thabs ji ltar lags// sten pa gsang bdag chen pos gsungs pa// ji ltar gnas pa'i gnas lugs te// tshig gis mtshon du med pa la// rjes 'jug la sogs nying bas la/
350a7(rnying rgyud): shes shing rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// don gyi 'grel pa lnga 'di bshad// khyed la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams nyoni// dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang // don gyi 'grel pa lnga po 'di// rtogs nas kye de dasal gshegs// don gyi 'grel pa lnga po 'dis// nga yi
350b1(rnying rgyud): god du rta bzhi 'thung
350b2(rnying rgyud): d+yu ngadartog sa nas// dgongs pa 'di la gnas par byed// 'grel lnga gang dang gangazhen// chog par 'dra yi 'grel pa dang // dpodon nu 'bras 'grel pa dang // gtun chags don gyi 'brel ba dang // 'byung bar byed pa'i 'grel pa dang // bud par byung ba'o bral ba/
350b3(rnying rgyud): tshig pa sha pra yi 'grel pa ni// yi ga 'don dang rang bzhin dang // chog dang yig thugs yan lag bdug/ de yang rig bu zhe na// yig 'brug cig lus pol// dgos pa'i yan lag bdun cing ste// mgo dang yan lag tsag shad bdun// pragon mnor lam be
350b4(rnying rgyud): chog rig ste bzhid shang rtan no// yan lagazugs kyis 'gro bar byed// yan lag thugs kyis 'gros bsgyung nus// mgo na ma nor lam du zhugs// chog ni shes rab ming du sa// shad kyis sde btsugs su gtod// chog par 'bral 'brel ba'i// ston pa'i gdung
350b5(rnying rgyud): pad+ma gsungs// tshig par 'brul 'brel bar bshad// dab don nu 'bras 'grel bani// non gyi chag dang yi ni'i chog/ d+hal tshig dang 'bras bu'i ga/ gang yin 'phral bag bya ste// gang yin cig gis son par byed// de 'dra de bzhin de ltar gsum// dpe
350b6(rnying rgyud): 'a /
350b7(rnying rgyud): ded ltar yod pas na// de bzhin yan lag kun la brtag/ dab don tu 'bras 'grel bang bshad// gtan cigs don gyi 'grel ba ni// yan la ga dag gis don dbyung ba// cig 'bral ba ni don dbyung bya// d+hu pi cig gam 'bras bu'i tshig/ dpe'i ciklag don gyi chog
350b8(rnying rgyud): rtogasas me gtan tshogs gang mi nachog/ brtags rten byung bar bya// gtan chags dag gi grel par bshad// dbyed pa byed pa'i 'phrul ban// ma sa dag gang bstan da// 'a nga chen da sas kyi// byed par byed pa'i 'brel ba yin// tsas rba da
351a1(rnying rgyud): bsdus nas// spros pa med pa'i don bstan na// sdud par byed pa'i 'grel pa yin// rnyog dang 'bru yi don 'di ni// chog par 'bru yi 'grel par bshad// 'dra dang yin min don 'di ni// dab don tu 'bras 'grel bar bshad// brtags te gtan
351a2(rnying rgyud): tshegs 'byin pa na// gtan tshigs dag gi 'grel par bshad// so so'i sde tshon ris 'byed na// sa gcod pa yi 'grel par bshad// rtsa ba gcig tu don ston na// sdud par byed pa'i 'grel par bshad// cho ga par 'bru yi 'grel pa yis// tshig dang 'bru yang
351a3(rnying rgyud): gcig mi las// 'bru la lhag ma mi lngas te// 'bru 'joms pa yi 'grel par bshad// dpe don chu 'bras 'grel pa 'dis// 'dra dang yin min don bstan nas// chos de la ni ming du 'dogs// ngo bstan pa yi 'grel par bshad// gtan tshig sa don gyi 'brel pa ni//
351a4(rnying rgyud): mnor pa yi snying po 'byin// don 'byin pa yi 'grel par bshad// don gyi 'grel pa lnga po la// ma bshad skyon yang yod pa ste// chog par 'bru yi 'grel med na// tshig par 'bru yi tshig mi sdebs// 'bru ma choms pa'i skyon du 'gyur// dpe don tu 'bras 'grel
351a5(rnying rgyud): med na// chos la ming gis mi thogs te// mtshon du med pa'i skyon du 'gyur// gtan tshigs dag gi 'grel med na// don gyi rtsa ba mi rnyed de// don mi rtogs pa'i skyon du 'gyur// 'byed par byed pa'i 'grel med na// so so'i bye bag mi phyed de// sa mi chod pa'i sngon
351a6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// sdud par byed pa'i 'grel med na// rtsa ba gcig tu mgyur te// mtha' yas pa yi skyon du 'gyur// des na 'grel pa lnga po 'di// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsung gi tshig tu ngas smras pa// 'khor gsum khyed la sogs pa kun//
351a7(rnying rgyud): gsang bdag chen po nga ye lung // byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin 'di// rtogs par bya phyir 'brel lnga 'di// nga yis khyed la bstan pa yin// zhes gsungs so// gsang ba spyi rgyud las/ yi ge'i don bshad pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas gas
351b1(rnying rgyud): bdag chen po la/ sems dpa' rdo rjes zhus pa// yi ge'i bye brag de dag la// rgud du 'gro ba ji ltar lags// gsang bdag chen pos gsungs pa// spa dang tshig dang glegs bam dang // ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba dang // dgongs gzhi mthun dpe ldang tshad dang // mdzad
351b2(rnying rgyud): dang che tshul khyad par ro// snang ba gsum la rgyud gsum dang // dkar shad dag dang rang bzhin dag/ ye shes dag la mu gsum mo// kun kyang chud kyi rang bzhin te// rgyud ma yin pa gcig kyang med// bdun dang dgu dang bcu gcig ni// de ltar rgyud las 'byung ba'o/
351b3(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// gsang ba spyi rgyud las/ rgyud kyi byung tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes/ gsang bdag chen po la gsol ba// rgyud kyi byang tshul de ltar byung ba la// de yi bshad thabs ji ltar lags// gsang 'ad
351b4(rnying rgyud): chen pos gsungs pa// bshad pa nyes pa'i skyon dang ni// bshad thabs bcu yi yon tan ni// rim par phye ste so sor bshad// mdo sngags khyad par ma phyen// chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa 'dra// gsang sngags phyi nang ma phyed na// mang po khrom du 'chol ba 'dra// dgongs pa'i go
351b5(rnying rgyud): rim maphyeng na// mar dang sprin gnyis bsres pa 'dra// rgyud kyi 'khrugs bsdeb ma shes na// lung pa gsum gyi mdor phyin 'dra// 'brel tshul ngo sprod ma shes na// smyon pa chu cor sba ba 'dra// bstan pa'i dgos ched ma shes na// don med brdzun tshig sgrub 'dra// mi mthun 'gal
351b6(rnying rgyud): bsgreb ma shes na// ngal bdon med lam zhugs 'dra// rgol rtso dgags sel ma shes na// rkun mo gtang khung btsud pa 'dra// yon tan bshad thabs rnam pa bcu// khrung chen nam mkhar lding ba'i blos// don gyi spyi khog phub ste bshad// seng ge gangs la
351b7(rnying rgyud): mchongs 'dra yis// theg dman zil gyis mnan la bshad// stag mo mchongs pa lta bu yis// dkyus kyis bcang byas te bshad// rus sbal chur 'gros lta bu yis// tshig gi 'bru rnams gnyer te bshad// ngang pa gshibs 'gros lta bu yis// snga tshig phyi tshig
352a1(rnying rgyud): don 'grel bshad// sang phrug rtsal spong lta bu yis// tshig gi bskol mtshams phye la bshad// rig pa sumathun lta bu yis// gang yin dmig nas bzung la bshad// tshad ma gsum gyi gtan tshigs kyis// rdzas kyi 'brag dang thar la
352a2(rnying rgyud): bshad// glag mo gzan la 'dums 'dra yis// gol sgrib gdar sha bcad la bshad// ces gsungs so// gsang ba spyi rgyud las/ bshad thabs kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes gsang bdag chen po la gsol pa// ji ltar
352a3(rnying rgyud): gnas lugs ji ltar lags/ gsang bdag chen pos gsungs pa// ston pa sems nyid rdzogs chen la// ye nas gnyis med mnyam pa'i phyir// gcig la gnyis su dbye ru med// dbye ru med pa'i gtan tshigs ni// gcig med spros pa med pa yin// spang
352a4(rnying rgyud): 'geg sbyong zhing bgrod pa dang // gzung 'dzin blang dor bya ba dang // lta spyod rtsol bsgrub byar med de// lam dang gnyen pos bcos med par// byang sems mnyam pa'i rang bzhin du// nga yis bstan pa'i don 'di ni// byang chub sems dpa'i lung chen yin// ma g.yos
352a5(rnying rgyud): thig le mnyam pa nyid// ming dang don dang dpe dang ni// rang bzhin mtshan nyid sel lugs so// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med pas// sems la bla dor bya ru med// sems nyid rdzogs pa chen po la// thams cad ldan gyis grub pa'i phyir// bde dang sdug
352a6(rnying rgyud): gcig phyir// snying po byang chub sems rtogs na// dus la lnga rgya med par gcig/ 'di yin 'di min dang gis med// sems la gzung rkyen med pas na// don la bsgom du ma mchis te/ des na 'di yin nges pa med// snying po byang chub sems 'di la// /
352a7(rnying rgyud): bsam pa'i don las 'das// brjod du med pa'i rang la gnas// de lta'i snying po byang chub sems// bstan pa'i snying por gyur pas na/ sangs kyis kun gyis rab tu bsngags// bya byed rtsol bsgrub mi mnga' bas// bde chen klong du ji bzhin gnas// yang dag 'di 'dra
352b1(rnying rgyud): sems dpang da khyod bye 'phral/ da 'di 'drung bsgom 'dad pas// bskom nags lam srid kyis byi// ston pa'i lung gi ga rnams pa// l+h+wam ma dzod 'dug pa // 'khrul ba'i lam grags kyig ra ba rtag/ yang dag las 'du
352b2(rnying rgyud): yin te// tshig dang yigs mtshan du med// dang gis mig yo 'bru ba bral// rang bzhin chos kyi gzhal yas na// srog zad ston pa 'ad bor bzhugs// rang bzhin 'khor gyi dpos bskor// gsung med bstan pa rgya ma rgyo sngags// thabral chos su rang bzhin
352b3(rnying rgyud): bkod// mnyam pa'i rgyal po rang bzhin thob// ye nas rtsol bsgrub nang bral la// bras zir rtsol pa'i nad dang bral/ rang gnas ldan la ngang gis kanas// ma ba cos mabus rang lugs kanas// mnyam nyid snying po kun gyi gzhi// ngo bo dngos po dang bral
352b4(rnying rgyud): phyogs gcig 'di 'drar bzung du med// ji bzhin mnyam pa'i snying pa la// kha dog 'od lnga so so rags la// zer rtsal yan lag lnga 'byung bas// snang ba'i tshul la rim gyis 'byung // de las 'char skoso sor shar// sras kyang ma byas shugs las byung // bka ma
352b5(rnying rgyud): tog 'khrul sna tshogs skyes// ye shes rang snang 'di nyid la// ma btsal ma bsgoms ngang gis shar// zhes gsungs so// gsang ba spyi dud las/ gnas lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes/ gsang bdag chen po la
352b6(rnying rgyud): bus pa// gnas lugs de ltar gnas pa na// gsang bdag chen pos ji ltar rtogs// nga la sogs pas rtogs thabs yod dam med// ces gsol bas/ gsang bdag chen pos gsungs pa// yaM nas rang bzhin ldan grub las// 'od lnga'i sdang ba rang shar bas/
352b7(rnying rgyud): sa rab mkha' la 'degs pa'i rlung // 'od gsal sems nyid ngo bor shar// gzhan lam ltos shugs las byung // rang dbang ye shes rgyal po shar// zhing khams ma lus bde bar spyod// mkhyen pa'i ye shes rang bzhin shar// mos pa'i bsam pa mkhyen
353a1(rnying rgyud): tu su smra nag tu/ su na na mas ga
353a2(rnying rgyud): chos chen po// mtshon du med pas dmigs dang bral// ngos gzung med pas 'dzin sems med// 'dzin thal stong pa'i ye shes nyid// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thugs las 'char// brgyad khri'i sgo yang so sor phye// ma bcos sems kyi ngo bor 'dus// byang chub
353a3(rnying rgyud): sems ni kun gyi ga'i// sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin// phyogs sum bzung des med pa// 'dod pa'i phyogs la 'dzin pa med// gsal 'greb med pa'i ye shes ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du gsal// sbyinang mi mnga' man shel gzugs// de las dbyung ngom
353a4(rnying rgyud): klan// phyogs ris med pa'i 'od kyi bya// mdun thapa med par thal lab// gsal ba'i dang las rin po rje// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'byung ba'i mchog/ dpag pas ma shing bzhin lhan gyis thub// gzhan las 'byung ba'i chos ma yin// blang ba lnga yi dkyil 'khor nas// sta
353a5(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu dang las byung // zhes gsungs so// gsang ba sti rgyud las/ yang gyi togs tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes gsang bdag chen po la zhus pa/ yang gri rtogs tshul de ltar rtogs pa lnga// 'gro drug sems can matogs ji ltar
353a6(rnying rgyud): 'khrul// gsang bdag chen pos gsungs pa// tho// med dus na don mi gsal// rgyu dang log gcod thabs dang bral// sprin dang mun pa'i ling tog gis// rdzas gang mi mthong bsgribs pa bzhin// chu rkyen ngo bo tshul dus kyis// blta bya'i snying po mthong ba med// ma mang 'gro 'dod
353a7(rnying rgyud): dbang rgya ba yis// sa khung sti thus zin pa bzhin// gzhig 'dod pa'i nyis zin no// med snang log par mthong ba yis// mkha' la skra shad 'khor lo dang // gangs la ser por mthong dang 'dra// dngas ma'i 'od las zer lnga shang // med las yod gzung lnga po las// @
353b1(rnying rgyud): chags rgyud lnga so sor 'khrul// phyi 'khrul nang 'khrul gsang 'khrul gyis// yun ring 'khor ba'i nang du 'khyams// dbul mo'i gter dang gyang nor 'dra// bla med byang chub ngo ma shes// thog med dus na don mi gsal// sdug bsngal gsum la yun ring spyod// 'khrul 'khor
353b2(rnying rgyud): mun pas de mi mthong // 'dod pa drug gis de mi mthong // log rtog 'khrul pas de mi mthong // bag chags gsar rnying 'khrul pas bsgribs// skyes bu'i lus dang byad 'grogs 'dra// zhes gsungs so// gsang ba skye rgyud las/ 'khrul ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//
353b3(rnying rgyud): de nas gsang bdag chen po la sems dpa' rdo rjes zhus pa// 'gro dug sems can thams cad kyis// thog med dus nas don ma rtogs// yun ring 'khor ba'i nang na sdug/ dus 'dir ston pas thugs rjes gzigs// zhus pas/ de nas gsang bdag chen po thug
353b4(rnying rgyud): skyes// 'gro ba'i don du thugs rjes don mdzad pa// 'gro ba mos pa tha dad la// dang po sru yis 'dul ba yin// bar du gasrang gis 'dul ba yin// tha ma thugs kyis 'dul ba yin// thugs kyis 'dul ba rnam pa gsum// byin rlabs thugs kyis 'dul ba dang //
353b5(rnying rgyud): rig pa thugs kyis 'dul ba dang // yang sprul thugs kyis 'dul ba'o// de yi dus kyi gang zag rnams// skal ldan rigs can 'byung bar 'gyur// dgongs pa don gyi bcud 'dzin zhing // rna bcud gdams ngag nod par bya// 'od gsal 'dzin bral bde ba'i mchog/
353b6(rnying rgyud): te rnam par rtog pa med// rig pa rjes med bya lam 'dra// 'dzin med nam mkha' bzhin du gnas// sgrib med nyi ma'i snying po nyid// gting zab rgya mtsho'i 'jing dang 'dra// kun 'byung sa gzhi'i rin chen gter// dgos 'dod 'byung bas rin po che// zhes gsungs so// gas
353b7(rnying rgyud): ba spyi rgyud las/ thugs rje mdzad pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas gsang bdag chen po la sems dpa' rdo rjes zhus pa/ yang dag pa'i don ji lta bu/ gsang bdag chen pos gsungs pa// dmigs med kha dog yul dang bral// spos bral bsam du med pa
354a1(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems la mtshon du med// gzung 'dzin bral bas 'khrul pa med// bsam ma tho ba yul dang bral// mtha' dbus med par snang po gsal// gsal ba'i dang la cis gdab med// skyon dang bral ba'i chos nyi dang // rdzogs
354a2(rnying rgyud): pa med pa'i byang chub sems// gsal 'grib med pa'i ye shes te// 'gag pa med pa'o chos nyid do// ma nor pa mo chos nyid de// rang las byung ba mngon sangs rgyas// skye rashAn med pa'i byang chud sems// me nor me 'acos dbyings na med // slob med pa
354a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin ni// tshogs drug mtshan ma'i yul dang bral// chos sku gcig pa'i rang bzhin gyis// dus gsum rim par phye ba med// chos nyid lhan grub bde ba che// mo bskyod mi g.yo rang bzhin bde// mnyam pa'i 'de bar byung nyid// gzhan nas btsal ba'i 'dod pa med// ma gyes
354a4(rnying rgyud): rang byung rang bzhin ni// rmad du byung ba'i chos nyid do// mngon du gyur pa'i mthu rig pa// bde men chos kyi gzhal yas su// sems dpa' rdo rje rig pa'i mchog/ sprul pa tha ma'i don du 'byung // a ti'i snying po don 'di 'byung // zhes gsungs so// gsang ba ste thad las/ yang dag pa
354a5(rnying rgyud): don bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas gsang bdag chen po la rdo rje sems dpas zhus pa// 'gro ba sems can thams cad kyis// yang dag don nyid ma rtogs pa// de yi nyes sgo na gang gis byas// zhes zhus pas/ gsang bdag chen pos gsungs
354a6(rnying rgyud): pa// srid gsum las lnga 'khrul pa yis// lam sgo lnga ru zhugs byinan// mi bde sdug bsngal la yang sprod// zhe sdang lam gyi spyod zhugs pas// dmyal ba'i gnas dang tsha grang sprod// lnga myi dran pa'i chos spyod kyang // rdo dang grang ba'i nyams myong gis// yang dag don/
354a7(rnying rgyud): dang phrad par dka'// 'dod chags lam gyi sgor zhugs pas// yi dwags gnas su bkres skom spyod// bsngos pas tshim pa'i chos spyod kyang // snga phyi'i las kyi rnam smin gyis// bkres dang skom pa'i nyams myangs te// yang dag don dang phrad par dka' // gti
354b1(rnying rgyud): mrag las gri snor zhugs pas// rgyal song gnas su thun lpags rtsod// rig padz+ra mo ces partsod// snga mang las sbyin pa sbyin gyis// blan zhing lpags pa'i nyams kyang te// yang dag don dang phrad par dkar// thag dog las gyi sgor zhugs pas// mim
354b2(rnying rgyud): gnas su dge sdig spod// dge sdig las kyi chos spyod kyang // 'dir dge shas chung rnam smin gyis// mi rtag 'gyur ba'i chos la spyod// yang dag don dang phrad par dka'// dkyil la mgyi sgor zhugs pas// A yi gnas dang longs spyod kyis// ma rig ltung ba'i
354b3(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal spyod// bsam pas grub pa'i chos la skrod// ma rig le lo'i rnam smin gyis// ltung ba'i sdug bsngal nyams myangs te// yang dag don dang phrad par dka'// khams gsum gnas kyang de 'dra ste// 'dod pa'i khams ni ma rig pa// gzugs kyi khams ni
354b4(rnying rgyud): chags pa ste// gzugs med khams ni dngos mgrub// yid yul chos lam bdi ba'i// rang dang myong bajigs pa te// mdzan bram pa thong khrul ba yid// rtogs med pa'i brag chags dang // bla ma'i gdams ngagarten med pas// rton mang rnying ba ma
354b5(rnying rgyud): shes// rgyas pa'i lus dang byang 'grogs 'dra// zhes gsungs so// gsung ba ste rgyud las// khams gsus sems can kyi la thum pa'i satshan nyid baspyan pa'i medu sa bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas gsang bdag chen grol sems dpa' do ngas zhus pa/
354b6(rnying rgyud): gsum mams can mtshan nyid de 'dra bas// de nas thon pa'i thab sa ni gang gis bkra/ gus pas/ gsang bdag chen pos gsungs pa// 'tha thams pa tha dad pas// theg pa'i sgo mang po sor bstan// gnyis ni rnam pa'i bye zag te// theg pa rnam pa gnyis
354b7(rnying rgyud): bstan// 'jig rten pa mi theg pa dang // 'jig rten 'das pa log pa'o// 'jig tan pa latheg pa // rgyang drugaganas pa 'i sems can cad// khams pa la 'khor ba'i gnas bzang nas// ban ma chags la le zhen pa las// khams gsum ma
355a1(rnying rgyud): sogs te// bde ba'i don med stong par 'gyur// de la don 'di bstan par bya// mu stegs rtag dang chad rnam gnyis// dge sdig las kyi chos rnams la// 'bras bu yod par martogs te// chad pa'i mtha' dra lung ba'o// rtag par lta
355a2(rnying rgyud): sems can gyis// yod pa rnam pa bzhi mthong ste// nga gtsang skyid rtag bzhi mthong nas// blang dor med pa'i chos ma shes// skye ba med pa'i don ma mthong // rtag pa'i mtha' ru ltung ba'o// zhes gsungs so// gsang ba spyi rgyud las/ 'jig rten pa'i theg pa'i le'u
355a3(rnying rgyud): ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas gsang bdag chen po la sems dpa' rdorje sa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i theg pa zhus pa// gsang bdag chen pos gsungs pa// 'jig rten 'das pa'i theg pa la// rnam pa gnyis su phye nas bstan// mtshan nyid rgyal
355a4(rnying rgyud): theg pa dang // 'bras bu rdo rje'i theg pa'o// mtshan nyid rgyu la rnam pa gsum// sdug bsngal spong ba'i nyan thos dang // shes pa 'geg pa'i rang rgyal dang // rnam rtog sbyong ba'i mdo sde gsum// sdug bsngal spong ba'i nyan thos ni// brtul zhugs dag gis spong bar byed// shes
355a5(rnying rgyud): pa 'geg pa'i rang rgyal ni// ma rig rten 'brel bcu gnyis 'geg/ rnam rtog sbyong ba'i sde ba ni// chos nyid stong pa nam mkha' ste// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin grub pa// sgyu ma'i dpe brgyad lta bur 'dod// 'bras bu'i theg pa la yang gsum// bya ba'i sde dang gnyi ga dang / rnal
355a6(rnying rgyud): 'byor rgyud dang rnam pa gsum// bya ba byed pa kre ya ni// yan lag bcu gcig cho ga yis// kyal ba'i sku gsung ye shes 'dod// gnyis ka spyod pa'i u pa ya// pri yar spyod cing yo gang bsrung // 'brel med sgo nas bsgrub par 'dod// rnal 'byor pa la rnam pa gnyis//
355a7(rnying rgyud): byi ba thub pa'i yo ga ni// byang chub lnga dang cho 'phrul bzhi// chu zla bzhin du 'grub par 'dod// nang pa'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum// spyod dang rdzogs dang rdzogs chen gsum// bskyed pa ma ha yo ga ni// rnam pa gsum ni rim bskyed de// yo byad ma nyams 'jug btson na/
355b1(rnying rgyud): gsas pags nga // gas pa // da da / rnas pa na stsag/ gas gas// / gas shAs sa// 'duganas pa byu/
355b2(rnying rgyud): da ga pa 'angam brten 'das// dam par bzang ba'i chos dmas pa// yongs sa kyid kyis rmob par byed// ngadabyas pa ba slong byed pas// yongs su phyin kyi don par byed// risags sa so// gsang ba rgyud las/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ga
355b3(rnying rgyud): bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas gas bdagu can po lasems dpa' do rjes sbas pa/ sa nyid ma yi rang bzhin rje sa zla/ zhus pas/ gsang bdag chen pos gsangs pa// mnyam nyid ma yi rang bzhin no// mtha' yas 'gro ba can la gnas// gang yang
355b4(rnying rgyud): yin nangos gzhi med// shes pa rang lugs so ma nyid// dras gsum g.yo bzad par gnas// rang bzhin sems ni brjod pa med// mig yo ma bcom mnyam pa nyid// rang gnas la shos 'od gsal ba// yid la 'bru med ye shes gsal// mkha' 'dra la
355b5(rnying rgyud): shes ldan gyis grub// grub med ye nas rang bzhin gnas// mnyam nyid gsal ba rin po che// nam mkha' bzhin du mtha' dbus med// dbyibs dang kha dog gang sdang ba// dbye bas la med na bde ba'i mchog/ brjod med pasam med don po che// de bzhin 'gyur med de bzhin
355b6(rnying rgyud): da// bya bcos rang thung snying po nyid// chos su rang byung ston pa'i mchog/ yi ge brjod bya kun dang bral// zang ce sa som brjod tha med// zhi dod rnam pa gang yang med// ma bcos dang byung nyid du bang// phyi ro la gang srung rang bzhin med// ma btags ma bzung dbye bas la
355b7(rnying rgyud): me// stong nyid ma bcom nyid du bde// bal ba 'a ba 'dod pa thal// gro las byas pa ma yin pa// chags dang bral bas zhen pa med// 'dzin dang bral bas snang chen po// dang po'i dus su shes pa // mabyung ma sbas mnyam pa'i dang // ye dag ye grol yi gnas sa//
356a1(rnying rgyud): na pa gnasas// mas gas/ sa da shang da/ dag su da pa// // gsun sa / klus tsun pas/ sa tam/
356a2(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin bstan pa'i lel ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes gsang bdag can po la zhus pa/ yan lag bu yi rang bzhin ji lta za// gsang bdag chen pos gsungs pa// stong pa las thes rig pa ni// sna tshogs snang ba nyid
356a3(rnying rgyud): 'jar// rang rig gsal pa nyid drug // rig pa don gyi dpon// so so ma yin patha~Md byugacig/ bskang las sgron pa'i mchog/ rig sa dgongs pa gtan la 'babs// srang bam lus sems lags la// rig pa chog ldan sangs kyis bka'// reg pa
356a4(rnying rgyud): ngas med pas 'du thal// un sa gnasapa matan papas grags nas nyid nga nyid drugs la/ ni pa du ma nga pa gzhas khyab kyigs smra/ rnam
356a5(rnying rgyud): pas bsgrub tu med// ting 'dzin phyogs la tho mi gtod// 'dod pa'i re ba kun dang bral// tha snyad phyogs la bro mi gnas// brjod pa'i bltad gdags gzhi bral// rang bzhin gsal ba'i don la 'jug/ 'od gsal sems la sgrib phyogs bral// ma bcos
356a6(rnying rgyud): byu ba dngags btang // dal bar bzhag nas rang gis bde// rgyu da ngas khro ga tum kund bral// nyon mongs skye ba'i sgra mi gnas// bdag yod mthal du ltung mi 'gyur// med pa ma yin dang gis gsal// med pa bde ba'i yul ma mthong // mtha' gnyis mgos
356a7(rnying rgyud): skyon dang bral// thams cad grol ba'i byang chub sems// lus kyang byang chub sems su 'dus// sems la rig pa bci gdab med// ces gsungs so// gsang ba spyi rgyud las/ bu'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas
356b1(rnying rgyud): gsang bdag chen po la sems dpa' rdo rjes zhus pa// dbyer med rang bzhin ji lta bu// 'bras bu ye shes dkyil 'khor ji lta bu// gsang bdag chen pos gsungs pa// snang ba'i chos kyang de las byung // dngos dang dngos med gnyis su med// gsal dang stong pa'i mtha' mi
356b2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin// gnyis med sems kyi ngang du bde// des na gnyis med byang chub sems// chos rnams ye nas gnyis su med// chos kun de la gang mi 'grub// rtog dpyod 'das pa'i byang chub sems// ma phye ma bkol mi gnas pa// rtsol bral bsgrub med don po che//
356b3(rnying rgyud): rin chen nor bu'i dgongs pa bzhin// blta ba bsgom du med pa yin// dam tshig bsrung du med pa yin// phrin las btsal du med pa yin// shes rab rang byung sgrib med yin// sa la spyang du med pa yin// lam la bgrod du med pa yin// phra ba gzung 'dzin med pa
356b4(rnying rgyud): yin// rgyud kyi rang bzhin 'brel pa yin// lung chen thog tu 'bebs pa yin// man ngag dag gi la yang zlo// chu ni dag pa'i dbyings su blta// 'bras bu ye shes dkyil 'khor blta// med pa byal pa gcig tu lhun grub bo// gang 'thad dbang po'i yul dang
356b5(rnying rgyud): bstan// gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin yin// rim med cig char 'jug pa'o// ma bu gnyis su med pa'i lam// zab la gting dpag dka' ba'o// ma dang bu gnyis gnyis med 'brel// ma ni gzhi yi lung gis so// bu ni ye shes lung du bstan// ma ni
356b6(rnying rgyud): dbyings su dag par bzla'// bu ni ye shes la yang bzla'/ zhes gsungs so// gsang ba spyi rgyud las/ dbyer med bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas gsang bdag chen po la sems dpa' rdo rjes blta ba'i rang bzhin ji lta bu zhus par/ gsang
356b7(rnying rgyud): bdag chen pos gsungs pa// dri med rang byung blta ba'i mchog/ skyon med pad+ma'i rang bzhin te// gang gi rnam pa'i 'dod pa brel// 'dzin pa thams cad ngang gis med// nam mkha'i mthong sa ltar ci yang med// rang byung ba de chen chos nyid do// bya btang 'dzin sems med/
357a1(rnying rgyud): pas bde// 'dzin dang bral ba'i rang bzhin ni// chags dang bral ba'i bde ba mchog/ 'od gsal sgrib phyogs kun dang bral// sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes gsal// theg gcig snying po'i blta ba la// bzang ngan blang dor ma mchis pas// bde dang
357a2(rnying rgyud): bsngal gnyis mi mnga'// dgag dang bsgrub pa bya mi dgos// thams cad 'di las 'byung ba'i phyir// yid bzhin nor bu'i rang bzhin no// ye nas yin pas bya mi dgos// 'bad dang rtsol bas mthar phyung med// thag chod nyam nga med pa'i mchog/ byang chub sems
357a3(rnying rgyud): nga bsnyen te/ gzhan bas bya'i bral pa marjes// bkra bathoms byas pa'i// hrI ts+tsha tshangs pa'i dbang gis so// bya gachags patshan pa zil stosan ci 'odags la zim sa// do labang 'i gyigad ma / sa me
357a4(rnying rgyud): lta ba'i klong // 'dug pa'i sgo yangs lam gyi mchog/ sdug bsngal 'khrul par dgrol 'gyur// rang blta yul med rtogs pas na// mtshan ma'i dngos po'i yul ma mchis/ snang med ma 'gags gnyis su med// sems la blta med don po che// bya ba bral
357a5(rnying rgyud): yang ldan pa da// byung ba // shA pa ma las thab brjod// 'odags ma dzad pa ma myur ga/ de ca ta yang mjug/ gdang na du kyipa // rang ba sa ma byas /
357a6(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi gtan tshigs kyis// de nyid rtogs pa'i thabs su bshad// ces gsungs so// gsang ba spyi rgyud las// blta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas gsang bdag chen po la/ sems dpa' rdo rjes ting nge 'dzin sgom thabs ji lta bu
357a7(rnying rgyud): thas pas/ gas bdan can pas gsung pa// rgopa pa rgya nyid do// yang kyis bshag pa dang thas sa/ ma sa med par shes pa// tshogs pa tha'angs shid med mams// 'gru ba sangs pas gzhag tu ya // ma napa 'dapas pa
357b1(rnying rgyud): med// kha dog bral bas dbyibs dang bral// bsgom med yengs med ngang gis bde// mi bsgom rang lugs bcos su med// bying dang rmugs med skyon dang bral// mi 'gro yul la 'dzin pa med// rtsol sems med pas bya mi dgos// gang snang dang lugs som nyid//
357b2(rnying rgyud): bsgom mi 'dzin 'dod pa bral// yul la mi 'jug ngang gis gnas// gsal bsgrib phyogs kun dang bral// 'khrul pa'i skye ba dang gis med// mtshan ma'i phyogs su 'dzin pa med// snang med ngos gzung bral bar gnas// gang la mi 'gu mi 'dzin te// skrag gi mun rum
357b3(rnying rgyud): sems lta bu// mi rtog rang bzhin ngang gis gsal// bde ba rtog med dang la gnas// 'dzin sems med pa'i don gyi mchog/ mtshan ma'i yul du dmigs pa med// ma bsgrubs ye shes rang la gsal// zhen pa'i rtog pa dang gis dag/ mi 'gyu mi 'dzin dgongs
357b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i mchog/ ma bcos rang gsal bde ba'i mchog/ 'gro nyal 'dug sdod thams cad du// rgyun chad med par rtsol sems bral// 'khrul pa'i snying po bsten mi dgos// gang snang rnam pa cir shar kyang // de yi rjes su 'gro mi 'gyur// 'dzin pa'i skabs med gang 'gyur
357b5(rnying rgyud): dus gas pan du med par gangs/ da don la thub gting// bsgos maud do la slob bzhag pa// rang shesamasams panams pas// snying po'i lcags la brjin me gos// le k+Shas nas la ba'i dag pa ma/ ga shinan thal rgyal ma
357b6(rnying rgyud): 'dra// rig pa gang gi rjes mi gcod// sgron ma'i dpe bzhin mun pa sangs// de nyid yin te btsal mi dgos// rang byung bde ba shugs las 'char// 'od gsal sems la sgrib pa med// 'bar ba'i ye shes rol pa'i rgyan// ji bzhin ma bcos dang la
357b7(rnying rgyud): gnas// lus la btsal med 'dod pa med// sems la rang dbang ma thob na// rigs drug 'khor ba'i gnas mi chod// rang dbang rgyal po mngon gyur na// bde ba'i dngos grub rang las 'byung // mi 'gyur 'dzin pa'i sems dang bral// las stobs drags
358a1(rnying rgyud): smra// smo/ ga/ na na / na na pa nga sun na na
358a2(rnying rgyud): gnas na// gang dod 'bras bu 'byung ba'o// bsam gtan rang gnas g.yo ba med// sa bcos ma bzung mo ma nyid// rang bzhin bcos med snying po thal// gang la dag las med pas brtse// zhes gsungs so// gsang ba rtsi byud pas/ ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i

358a6(rnying rgyud): pa da // / nga sa da sas da/

358b1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa chen po'i spyod pa ni// rang byung bklag pa ma yin to// rang byung rtsol bas bslab pa min// rang snang ma bcas sems kyi rgan// zhes gsungs so// gsang ba rgyargyud las/ stong pa bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad tha pa'o// / ded/
358b2(rnying rgyud): gsang bdag chen po la/ sems dpa' rdo rjes rig pa rang dbang ji lta khri zhus pas/ gsang bdag chen pas gsungs pa// rang dbang sems la thob pa ni// dbang nam ma thun gyi mchog yin ta// gzhinas dbang thob bskur mi dgos// shes rig
358b3(rnying rgyud): rgyal po dbang gi mchog/ dpung rnams kun gyi snying po yin// bya thal dam pa'i sems la gnas// tshichog gis rtog pa'i yul las 'das// rang dbang dam pa sems la gnas// yo byad dag la rag ma las// rig pa sti blag tshangs pa'i dbang // 6/
358b4(rnying rgyud): thabs lci blugs bskur thabs so// gnyis kyi mtha' rum lhung ba// dbyer med rig pa tshig rdzogs so// pa yi dbang la bu yi nyams// dbyer med dbang bskur thob pa'o// bya btang 'dzin med dang du bde// dbang mchog 'od gsal rgyal ba'i dbang /
358b5(rnying rgyud): gang zag gcig la ltos pa med// klong chen 'od gsal bde ba'i mchog/ dbyings nyid rnam dag thig le che// ma bcos pa yi rang bzhin ni// ye nas gnas pas jig le che// yang dag don lo nor pa med// des na rig pa rang gi dbang // de 'dri'i don ni
358b6(rnying rgyud): mi shes na// thun mong gzhan la mos pa med// rim gyis nod pa thabs yin no// gsang sngags brda' sgo dbang gis dbye// gang yang med pa'i gang zag ni// rigs las 'gal bas bstan mi bya// bstan na bdag gzhan gnas su bsreng/ ces
358b7(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// gsang ba spyi rgyud las/ dbang gi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas gsang bdag chen po la/ sems dpa' rdo rjes dkyil 'khor de lta bu zhus pas/ gsang bdag chen pos gsungs pa/ dkyil 'khor dkyil
359a1(rnying rgyud): rdzuna'agro nas / gnasu// byang ma'adud da du byabs nam / don pa dacos la na sulakho// mnyam nyid byol la dang sa mam dzad// bamamangs bya
359a2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khod ni// mtshon du med pa'i rang ba'i rno// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i dkyil 'khor te// bas ma rtog 'das pa'i rang bzhin no// rang byung banyam pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// ma bcos rig pa 'dzin po che// mtha' dang dgras me dgas lca las ni// rang byazhin rdzogs
359a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas \u0f7f// rang bzhin dkyil 'khyod sa pa pa myed// se nas sman thab ba rjiH// spyan drang bzugs byag me sa phyung // n+d+ha ston pa ma nasangs cas// le shes dang gas la sags ldan pas// snying po mthong pa bral mi dgos/
359a4(rnying rgyud): chen gsal brgyad ldan pas// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor grwa mnyes pa// dus gsu pa 'i 'dra 'brags dpa mchog/ rang byung yong sardzogs m+b+ha la~M rbe// sgron kyi dri ma dang bral bas// shes med rig pa'i don mthong ngo // 'dzin thal lo shes ngang gi sngags pa/

359b1(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur/ dus gsus 'ad ba das pa// gas na chab / ga la khrul pa gang byas kyang // rgyun padus sangs byung pas pas gas/ spya u sa pa nga pa// nga nang ba sa pa // nga shAd dag da/
359b2(rnying rgyud): gsal stong dbyer med don ma rtogs// bsrung sdom rtsa pa yan lag rnams// theg pa gzhan gyi bsrung mtshams yin// rnam tog g.yo ba med pa ni// rang byung dmachog chen po yin// glo srur gnyis dang bral ba'o// rig pa sgron ma'i sems kyis ni// ye shes
359b3(rnying rgyud): ra ba ston par byed// grangs dang rnam pa yongs kyis med// ma bcos ma 'thad nga mchog yin// ma skyes pa ya thas nyid ni// mi 'gag mi skyed mchog yin// 'khor byabye 'bras buzad par 'thar// zhes gsungs so// gsang ba kri rnyed las/ dam tshig btad pa'i
359b4(rnying rgyud): ge nyer gnyis pa'o// / da nas gsang bdag can po la sems dpa' drinas nus pa// mabar zug 'bras bu tho pa lugs gang / khrus pas/ gsang bdag chen pos gsungs pa/ krol bslun dogs gang dang tham// mun gos thub pa'i 'bras bu yin// sa na
359b5(rnying rgyud): bral ba'i sems nyid ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po ste// ma bsgribs ye shes chos kyi sra// 'gag med dbyings kyi byang chub gsungs// me ste mi 'gug ye shes grags// bu dang 'bras bu gnyis ma mchis// sa pa gcig pa'i byang chub sems// rtswa nyi nga thung med pa
359b6(rnying rgyud): ming tsam mtshon pa'i 'bras bur gcig/ 'bras bu zhes ni btags pa med// btags pa de ni 'tshon pa ste// mtshon pa'i don gyis btags pa mchon// ma sbas pa mi mos nyid ni// skye 'gag med pa'i 'bras bu yi// sku gsum byin rlabs thog pa dgra/ sems
359b7(rnying rgyud): nyid phra gsung drugs yin pas// sgra gcig phrag sung thugs yin pas// sbal papra yi rang bzhin dang // phul pa gsung gi rang bzhin dang // spel ba thugs kyi rang brjin pa// longs spyod rtsa yi rang bzhin dang // mings spo gsung gi rang bzhin dang //

361b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i kun tshogs lnga dang // zeng nyid sems su gnas pa'i phun sum tshogs pa dang // zer nyid zer du shar ba'i phun sum tshogs pa'o// dus dang gnas dang ston pa 'khor nyid dang // bstan ba kun dang dbyer med gang gnas pa// byur dang 'byung nas gnas pa kun la khyab//

361b3(rnying rgyud): ldan kun tu bzang po'i gnas lugs dang // kun tu bzang po'i ngo bo dang // kun tu bzang po nyid kyi snang tshul dang // kun tu bzang po dpe yis mtshon byed dang // kun tu bzang po'i rigs rnams dbye ba dang // kun tu bzang po'i sgra yi snang rtsol dang // kun tu bzang po'i

361b6(rnying rgyud): las dang smon lam dag gis rkyen ma byas// rang byung dang zhi 'dus ma byas pa yis// zag med phung po rang byung ye shes lnga// yod pa ma yin de ni med pa min// snang ba ma yin de ni stong ma yin// nga nyid gang du ma grub pas// sna tshogs thams cad de nyid nga yi dang // kun 'byung/
361b7(rnying rgyud): yon tan rin chen phra// dbu ma gnyis su yod ma yin// yod de ye shes chen po'i sku// med de nam mkha' dag pa'i ngang // dngos dang dngos po ma yin pas// rang bzhin sku ma lta bu'i sku// bltas na snang ste brtags na stong // sgyu mas rgyu ma'i don yang byed// ma g.yos rang sngar
362a1(rnying rgyud): da kho na// stong pa snang po'i don nyid mtshon// sul dngos su ma grub pas// med pas 'gags pa dngos ma yin// mi tog ye shes chen po des// zag med sgyu ma'i skul brtan// yon tan ma 'gags mtshan dper sdang // chags pa med cing thogs

362a3(rnying rgyud): mthong // gang dgang sgrar 'dzin par na// dngos po rjes su 'dod pa rnams// log par rtog pa'i spyod yul te// dam pa'i don la de nyid med// mthong ngo zhes ni 'khrul pa'i sku// dran no zhes ni rtog pa'i thugs// sgyu ma'i sku ni med pas stong // snying po'i sku ni cir yang 'char//

362a5(rnying rgyud): tshig yul las 'das pas mtshon du med pas na// brda' tsam dag gis phyogs gcig mtshon pas na// 'dus ma byas pa'i nam mkha' chen po de// thogs par byed pa'i reg bya kun dang bral// nam mkha' de la gnas kyang thams cad gnas// nam mkha' de las byung

362a7(rnying rgyud): bzang po ni// lhun grub snying po de nyid do// sems nyid kun tu bzang po ni// gsal la rtog pa med pa'o// yid kyi kun tu bzang po ni// thams cad byab byed pa'o// kun tu bzang po'i sku yi rang bzhin ni// gyur pa med pa snying po nges pa'i klong // gos pa med pa bde ba chen po'i dang //

362b2(rnying rgyud): yisku// de bzhin thogs pa med pas gang ltar brtags par snang // dngos po sgyu mar med pas thams cad kun bzang nyid// gong ltar mthong ba rtags de nyid dag pa la// de las gzhan zhig snang ba yod ma yin// skye med rnam dag chos kyi dbyings nyid las// skye ba'i cho 'phrul
362b3(rnying rgyud): sa cir yang snang // thugs rje thabs mkhas rol ba cir yang 'char// stod dang skye bar snang ba dbyer med pas// mtha' rnams kun las 'das pas 'di zhes brjod du med// ye nas nga ni dag pa'i sgra// kun tu bzang zhes rtse ba ni// thams cad kun gyi sgra smin pas// ye nas ngan+de rtsa
362b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i sku// yi nas nga ni byang sems sku// ye nas nga ni 'phags pa'i sku// ye nas de ni dgra bcom sku// kun tu bzang po mnyam pa'i ngang // mi 'gyur bde ba g.yud drung sku// thig le nyag gcig spos med sku// thabs mkhas cir yang 'char ba'i sku// sna tshogs rang snang chen po yis//

363a1(rnying rgyud): kun las 'das// sgra las rgyal ba'i gsung mchog ste// ngag tu brjod pa gsung ma yin// tshig tu snang ba dngos ma yin// brjod ces gsungs pa don ma yin// 'khor rnams so so'i snang ba las// brjod pa'i rgyu dang brjod pa'i yul// Ta dang
363a2(rnying rgyud): nga yis ma brjod kyang // rgyal ba'i sras po cang mi gsung // ma gsungs pas ni rgya cher bshad// smras pa'i don rnams yod ma mthang // rang byung rang zhi'i gsung nyid do// snying po spos bral gsung nyid kyis// thams cad de bzhin nyid du gsal// gdal khyab rig pa'i

363a4(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi snang tshul ni// rang byung gad nas dag pa yi// ye shes ye shes las byung bas// dus gsum 'bral ba med pa'i ngang // mi ske mi 'bral nam mkha'i thugs// thugs rjem g.yos 'gro ba'i dpal// ye shes dbyings las ma g.yos par// so so'i ting 'dzin sna tshogs
