384b5(rnying rgyud): a ti yo gaM'i lta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste so dgra pa'o// / sdang ba'i gsang dab rdo rje sems dpa' yis// smyon pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po lnga// chos sgra chen po kun la khyab pa la// 'gro drug rnams kyis chos nyid mi snang bar// sdug pa sgra
384b6(rnying rgyud): ji lta bu// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang ba des// smad pa'i gsang dbang rdo rje sems dpa' la// rang byung chos sku chen po de nyid ni// dbyer med gcig yid dathe gang med par chags// gcig las mthong stengs ze dang byung bas na// chos sgra rang byu 'odags
384b7(rnying rgyud): 'od gsal mi ru mthong bas dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi// ma g.yos chu ru mthong bas grang ba'i sdug bsngal rgya// sprul pa gshin rjer mthong bas sdug bsngal chen po'i klu// don byed 'dren pa spang la srog gnad mthong // gsung gi chos ston dag pa'i sgra nyid 'byung // gtogs
385a1(rnying rgyud): sod chod la sogs pa'i sgra ru zos// gdul bya phyag mtshan spu gri la sogs mthong // gcig las med kyang log pa'i snang ba yin// chos sgra spos bral chen po dang // rig pa'i ye shes dbyer med pas// de gnyis chags par mthong ste 'dod
385a2(rnying rgyud): chags dag tu mthong // mthong ba'i bag chags zhen cing chags pa yis// de yi rgyu mthun las kyi 'bras bu yin// phyiyi sdang ba sgrib pas rnag khrag dag tu mthong // nang gi snang ba sgrib pas zas las me nyid 'byung // sku nyid snang bas kha 'bar ma ru mthong // 'dod chags
385a3(rnying rgyud): dbang gis snang ba sdug bsngal chu// rigs mthun sprul pa sdug bsngal sna tshogs myang // chos nyid rig pa g.yo ba med pa des// ma 'gags yon tan cir yang snang // rig pa g.yo ba med pa de nyid las// rig pa ma rig pa yi rgyu de nyid// 'gag pa med pa'i yan
385a4(rnying rgyud): lag snang ba la// snang ba mun par snang ba des// byol song rnams kyis snang ba mun par mthong // nyi ma 'bum ltar gsal yang mun pa nyid du snang // blang mgo nyid kyis don byas kyang // sprul pa nyid la brten nas sdug bsngal 'byung // byol song rnams kyi mthong stangs
385a5(rnying rgyud): de bzhin no// chos sku ma 'gags rtsal nyid snang ba las// rnal rnams so so'i snang bshang ba las// gling bzhi mi yi tshogs drug snang bar mthong // snang ba de la brten nas bde dang sdug bsngal rgyu// 'du byed dag gi sdug bsngal snang ba yis// yan lag de rtsal snang ba so so las//
385a6(rnying rgyud): lha yi snang ba rin chen sna tshogs la// 'dod pa'i bde ba bcu'i lta bu nyid// 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal rang nyid snang ba las// mthong stangs so so dag gi yul yin pas// rang rang bag chags so so'i ris mu grub// med kyang snang bas 'khrul pa'i snang ba ni// log rtogs
385a7(rnying rgyud): 'khrul pas chos nyid gsal ba min// chos sku'i rtsa ba nyid snang ba las// so so'i rigs kyi snang ba byung ba yin// rig pa mi rig rig par shar ba las// gang zag rigs rnams so sor byung ba yin// dper na gzhi gcig dag las snang tshul tha dad pa// chu yi rang bzhin po
385b1(rnying rgyud): gcig pardzas// dbul bas me gar me yi phung por ma dzang // pi drugs nag lhag dag tu mthong ba yar// rgyal yang dag gis gnas sra mthong ba dang // mra yis kyang mthong sgra yis bdud cir mthong // gcig las med deng dang ldang ba yin// chos nyid ma
385b2(rnying rgyud): zod rtsal nyid mthong ba yin/ bag chams dbang gis tha dad 'byung ba'o// rin po che rgyas pa chen po'i rgyud las/ rigs drug bag chags snang ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// / sdud pa'i gsang dbang rdo rje sems dpa' des// ston pa'i
385b3(rnying rgyud): ston pa kun na bzang po la// srid papar do 'phrul pa'i mthong stangs dang // ngo bo snang tshul ji ltar snang ba ljags// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po des// sdud pa'i gsang dbang rdo rje sems dpa' la// chos spu rang gi byin rlabs rtsal lngar shar ba las// rig pa
385b4(rnying rgyud): rkyang ba de yi kha dog lnga ru thong // mthong ba nyid kyis reg pas dpa las// kha dog lnga ru mthong bas byung ba yin// byung ba rang gi 'khrul ba'i rgyu nyid byas// 'od la kha ro rnam lngar mthong ba yis// 'dra mthun rigs mthun 'dra ba 'dus pa yis// pad do 'khrul pa
385b5(rnying rgyud): dag gi 'ad gzhi byas// gsal ba'i yon tan rnam pa gsum dag las// gtir gsal dag gi rig pa'i ye shes gsal// dngas gsal dag gi dbyer med gnas pa yin// 'od gsal dag gi phyi yi yon tan 'char// yon tan lngar snang 'byung ba lnga ru 'char// 'byung
385b6(rnying rgyud): brnam lnga kha dog ljang shar bas// dkar dang dmar ba ser ba'i kha dog dang // nag dang ldang bar snang ba'i kha dog la// yul du snang bas nyon mongs dug lngar snang // nang du snang bas rig pa kha dog lnga// dbyer med spyad pas 'dod snyed rnam lnga'o// srid pa'i rlung lngas
385b7(rnying rgyud): brjod pas yid kyi rgyang rgyu// phye me 'id gsum rul la rtog 'jal dpyod// nang gi yid gsum bag chags dran rtog snang // gsang ba'i yid gsum sems la rtog/ sems dpyod// srid pa bar do'i dus na las dang bag chags snang // bag chags gang dang ldan
386a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i snang ba shar// chos nyid dngos su snang yang yul dang bdag gsal// ye shes mchog tu gsal bas bag chags sdug bsngal bskyed// 'dun pa'i 'dod chags 'od la shes pa 'jug/ mchog tha gas lang
386a2(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal bskyed pa'i chu// chos sku yan lag sdug bsngal dag tu shar// rin po che rgyas pa chen po'i spyad las/ bar do 'khrul snang gi le'u ste zhe gcig pa'o// / spyad pa'i gsang dbang rdo rje sems dpa' des// ston pa'i
386a3(rnying rgyud): ston pa kun tu bzang po la// 'od gsal lha yi snang ba dang // gzugs med lha yi snang ba gang // ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po des// sdud pa'i gsang dbang rdo rje sems dpa' la// chos sku 'gag med rig gsal 'ang du shar// 'od du sdang
386a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i yan lag rang la gsal// rang dod rang shar gnyis su snang ba yis// nam mkha' dag pa brten pas bag chags de ltar snang // rang gi snang ba 'od du shar ba las// gsal 'bri ba dag gi snang ba sdug bsngal rgyu// 'dod pa'i yon tan bral nas
386a5(rnying rgyud): su// phung po 'od lus chen po des// 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dag pas na// gzugs med lha yi snang ba ni// chos rnams nam mkha' lta bur mthong // chos rnams ci yang med par mthong // yod pa nam mkha' lta bu la// med pa ci yang mi dmigs
386a6(rnying rgyud): ba// chos rnams rnam par shes par mthong // med bzhi'i phung po dag tu grub// snang ba gzugs su mi dmigs pa'o// rin po che rgyas pa chen po'i rgyud las/ lhang khrul snang gi ke'u ste zhe gnyis pa'o// / sdud pa'i gsang dbang
386a7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' des// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po la// yid kyi rgyu ba rnam pa dgur byung bas// blta bsgom 'bras bu gol ba ji lta bu// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po des// sdud pa'i gsang dbang rdo rje sems dpa' la// chos sku 'gag
386b1(rnying rgyud): med rig gas la 'od du shang // 'od du snang ba'i yan lag rang lags pa// rgyas chub rnam gsum yul la gzhal// nang gi rtsub rnam gsum sems la 'dal// gsang ba'i rgyu ba rnam gsum blta bsgom dag la 'jal// nye po chos sgra chen po // ma
386b2(rnying rgyud): bcos so mar rang snang bas// dang po rang rig ye shes des// rig ma skyes pa ye shes yin// rig pa skyes pa yid yin te// rig pa rig pa skyes pa yin// dang po ci yin snyam pa dang // bar du yin min snyam pa dang // thog ma do yin gdeng shes pa
386b3(rnying rgyud): yis// so ma'i chos nyid de yis bsgribs// ma bcos pa yi snying po la// byas pa'i blo yi snang bar byung // 'dus byas chos nyid chen po yin// nang gi byang chub sems nyid de// gsal la mi rtog 'dzin med pas// byang chub sems su bzung nas ni/
386b4(rnying rgyud): sems la yin min rnam gsum 'byung // gzung ba rang gi sems nyid bsgribs// gsang ba'i chos sgra chen po des// rang bzhin rnam dag 'gag pa med// ma bcos pa yi snying po la// bltar med pa ltas na yid kyi yul// bsgom med bsgom na rtog
386b5(rnying rgyud): pa yin// gsang ba'i chu bas bsgribs pa yin// de ltar bsgribs lugs rnam gsum pa// snang ba rnam pa gsum du byung // chos sgra reg pa mi gnas pas// spang nyid lta bur snang ba byung // rig pa de nyid ma g.yos pas// bder gshegs
386b6(rnying rgyud): ye shes sems su byung // reg pa de nyid g.yos pa yis// 'gro drug bag chags sems su byung // bri yi sgrib pa rnam gsum dang // nang gi sgrib pa rnam gsum dang // gsang ba'i sgrib pa rnam gsum gyis// chos spu yid bzhin nor bu de// long
386b7(rnying rgyud): pa ma mthong stong 'a tshor// stor bar tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis// de tshe dbu ma nyid du gnas// thar pa'i lam stor nyid du gnas// mun pas 'thibs pa nyid du gnas// skyabs med mgon dang bral bar gnas// 'khor ba'i chu bos khyer bar gnas//
387a1(rnying rgyud): nyam thag sdug bsngal dag gis zin// rang gsang thabs kyis rtsod pa'o// rin pornga rgyas pa chen po'i rgyud las/ chos sku rang sgrib kyi le'u ste zhe gsum par// sdud pa'i gsang dbang rdo rje sems dpa'
387a2(rnying rgyud): des// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang ba mo// rang byung ye shes chen po la// chos ni phul po bsdad khri dang // bzhi stong byung ba ji waM za// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po dris// spyad pa'i gas dbang rdo rje sems dpa' la// chos sru las byung ye shes
387a3(rnying rgyud): rig pa de// rig pa gdangs gsal de yi byin rlabs las// chos skra longs su sprul pa'i skur byung ste// chos rtswa nyid las ngas pa'i don byung ngo // longs sde dag las drang ba'i don thung ngo // srul sru dag yas 'bri ba'i nan nyung ngo // rang byed chos su chen po
387a4(rnying rgyud): las// rang byung ye shes rig skyes pas// rig pa'i byin rlabs chen po las// bder gshegs skrag stam ngo bor byung // de yi thugs rje'i shugs skyes pas// chos su sgo mo mang por gsungs// nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong la// de yi gdul bya
387a5(rnying rgyud): brgyad khri dang // bzhi stong mang por byung ba yin// snang tshul gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis phyung // bkri dang drang dang nges pa'i don// rnam pa gsum du 'dus pa yin// rim par bstan pa kun tu rol// rdzogs chen das pa gcig tu bstan// don la gcig
387a6(rnying rgyud): las med pa las// tha dad du mar byung bde// rang byung chos spu'i byin rlabs so// rin po che rgyas pa chen po'i rgyud las// bstan pa ji ltar byung ba'i le'u ste zhe bzhi pa'o// / sdud pa'i gsang dbang rdo rje sems dpa' des// ston pa'i
387a7(rnying rgyud): ston pa kun tu bzang po la// lus gang 'khrul pa rim gyis bzlog pas na// sems de'i gnas lugs ji ltar gnas pa la// sems de gzhag pa'i thabs dang sems de bcos pa'i thabs// sems de zin pa'i rtags dang sems de'i sgrib pa dag pa ji lta
387b1(rnying rgyud): sems cad shes rig pa spyod pa de/ yang
387b2(rnying rgyud): sad paston pakung tu zang banas// rjud pa gas dbang du rnamams dpa'ang// sas nyid kyin gastong par gnas pal// sangs ng+yangs m+b+hany-ing bar gnas pa dang / ngas kyi sa dran du da cad can zang
387b3(rnying rgyud): byung bas na// reg pa de dang sdong pa gnyis me pas// stong pa de yi ngang la gzhag par bya'o// sems kyis ye shes dag pa se mas 'dzin na// rang rig rang med med pa la// skad cig rig parang gsapa de// skad cig gnyis par mi gtang bar// sod la
387b4(rnying rgyud): ro gzung bar bya'o// sems kyis sems la sems 'dzin ni// skad cig dang po'i rig pa stong byung de// yul la shes pa had kyis snang ba de// rig pa 'dzin pa med pa des// yul la 'dzin pa med par gzhag/ rgod na shes pa bsgrims la gzhag/ kying
387b5(rnying rgyud): na shes basmod la gzhag/ sdang na rang bzhin med par gzhag/ stong na 'dzin pa med par gzhag/ sems de zin pa'i rtags de ni// g+ho yul la mi spyod cing // rtog med tud de gnas pas na// sems kyis sems ni zin pa yin// de yis sleb pa
387b6(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i nags// snang ba ming dang bral ba'i snang ba yis// bag chags sgrib pa dag pa yis// yul la nyon mongs mi skye bas// nyon mongs sgrib pa dag pa yin// sems kyis chos sgra spyod pa la// sems kyi ye shes 'dzin med pas// shes bya'i thab pa
387b7(rnying rgyud): dag pa yin// de la mnyam gzhag rjes thob gnyis// gnyis su med pas dbyer med pas// mnyam na sems kyi 'bras bu yin// de yi brtan pa thob pa na// lus kyi 'khrul pa bslob pa'o// rin po che nus pa chen po'irgyud las/ sems sems la bzung
387b8(rnying rgyud): ba'i le'u ste zhe lnga pa'o// / sdud pa'i gsar dbang rdo rje sems dpa' des// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po la// dbang po 'bring po'i 'khrul pa bzlog byas pa// phyi yi ye shes dag la sems gzhag dang // nang gi ye shes dag la gzhag
388a1(rnying rgyud): byadang // gsang ba'i yi nas dag la gzhag pa dang // des zin rtags sgrib pa d+ha/ pag tu/ ldan pa'i na pa ga da// spyad pa dag sa dbang da skams dang snga gan ta pa kyis bsnyasam sa nga/
388a2(rnying rgyud): 'di nyid la// sgo lnga so ma bcos pas 'dzin par med par gzhag par bya'o// de tshe nyid na 'bras bu chos sgra 'thob// chos blan ma mkha'i snying po la// tshogs jug ri ni ltar rim gyis thug/ tshogs drug ris kyis sangs rgyas pas// sangs rgyas pa
388a3(rnying rgyud): sa ces yin// chos smanam pa'i snying pode// dmam pa'i ming dang bral ba tir// bsam med pasim gyis mi thub ngas// bsam kyis mi khyab bas pa med pa'o// rang byung rdzas spyi'i snying byol// baH zhing shin tu brtan pa ni// rang blang chos bu'i ting
388a4(rnying rgyud): po de// rang byung ye shes yan lagatses kyi // tshogs grangs med snang ba'i sgra// snang ba ma bcos pa dga'// shes pa ma bcos padag gzhag/ ma btsas pa ni bcos pa'i mchog/ byung ba'i sgra gsub chen po'o// blang ba'i ye shes rnam gsum
388a5(rnying rgyud): gzhag/ 'byung ba dag gi sku gsum la// 'byung ba dag gi ye shes gzhag// byung nas gnas pa'i skrag smras la// byung nas gnas pa'i ye shes gzhag// nam mkhar ming la btags pa yis// nam mkhar snying po bsdus byas na// ngo tshe sangs rgyas nyid du
388a6(rnying rgyud): rlo da mdzums nga // baib+bar bad sanas lta pa'i mchog/ bzlas med pa rlom na slob ba'i mchog/ de mi sgrib pa rnam gas ma n-i// rje da nga gas dang 'i yid medapapa// sri par nga byung dag pa'in// gnas grags ltar gangs pa //
388a7(rnying rgyud): yin grags de ltar yin zhen// bsgrib med yi nas dag pa yin// rin po rgya rgyas pa chen po'i spyad las/ spu dang ye shes la sems gzhag pa'i thabs kyi le'u me ga drug pa'o// ldud pa'i gsang dbang rdo rje sems dpa' das// sman pa ton
388b1(rnying rgyud): pa kun tu bzang po la// bar do rnam pa gsum dag tu// lus gsum gang dang ldan pa yin// spyan gsum ji ltar gsal ba yin// sku gsum ji ltar ldan pa yin// ye shes ji ltar skyes pa yin// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po des// sdud pa'i
388b2(rnying rgyud): gsang dbang rdo rje sems dpa' la// rang bzhin bar do'i dus dag tu// zag dang bcas pa'i lus nyid de// phung po thogs dang bcas pa la// sha khrag bcas pa'i lus nyid la// phung po khams dang skye mched la// sem+ba las sems byung brten pa'i lus//
388b3(rnying rgyud): sems kyi chos sku stong pa dang // sems kyi ye shes rtog pa med// mig la brten nas gsal bas na// nyin mo nam mkha' stong la blta// nub mo kun gzhi dang la blta// nyin mo sems kyi ye shes rtog med byung // nub mo sems kyi ye shes stong pa byung // nyin mo
388b4(rnying rgyud): chu bung meg la brten// nub mo yid kyi mig la brten// de la gnas shing goms byas nas// sems kyis sku dang ye shes thob// spel ma bar do'i lus de ni// theg pa med pa'i khrus yin te// tshul khrims chen po'i phung po dang // ting nge 'dzin sde phyung
388b5(rnying rgyud): dang // shes rab kyis ni phung po dang // rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang // rnam grol ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po dang // de lta bu yi phung po la// rten med spyan dang ldan pa yis// lha yi spyan dang ldan gasngal bas// mthong med sangs rgyas chos sku
388b6(rnying rgyud): mthong // rang byung ye shes bde gsal skyes// nyin mtshan med pa'i snang ba las// dbyer med sku dang ye shes thob// srid pa bar do'i lus de ni// ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs// ye shes lnga yi phung po la// rigs lnga de bzhin gshegs
388b7(rnying rgyud): par snang // phye deng nang gi sgrib med par// ye shes spyan dang ldan pa 'byung // de lta'i sman dang ldan pa des// dbyer med sangs rgyas chos sku mthong // rang byung ye shes snying po bskyed// dbyer med lhun grub gol med pas// gang ltar byas kyang sangs rgyas
389a1(rnying rgyud): zla// yid pazhan nor bulta pa nyid// dga' 'arlab gang yang cang par gnas/ nga bya de star rang shA / 'khor ba nyid kya 'bras bya'o// rin po mas pacan pa'i rgyud las/ bar darnam gsus las legs der bye
389a2(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i le'u ste zhe bdun pa'o// / srud pa'i gsang dbang rdo rje sems dpa' des// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po la// sangs rgyas longs sku chen po la// sems gzhag de nyid brtan pa gang // ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po nges//
389a3(rnying rgyud): sdud pa'i gsang dbang rdo rje sems dpa' la// sku yi longs su dag la sems de gzhag pa ni// sna tshogs cir yang snang skya'i longs sprul// tshogs drug 'dzin pa med par bsre bar bya// phyi dang nang gi longs sgyu bsres nas ni// kha dog rnam lnga ye shes rnam ldar bsre/
389a4(rnying rgyud): lnga 'dzin pa med pa drang sor gnas// sgo lnga yul lnga shes pa rnam lnga yis// gzung 'dzin med par shes pa rang sor gzhag/ gsol pa'i longs sku gnyis med bsres pa na// s+ya yi longs sku chen po thob pa yin// longs su longs su dag la gzhag pa
389a5(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i ngo bo gsal lam 'dres pas// chos sku gsal la ma 'dres dag la gzhag/ snang la rang bzhin med pa dang // gsal la rang bzhin med pa gnyis// dbyer med gcig tu gzhag pas na// de yi brtan pa thob pa dang // rmi lam dus su
389a6(rnying rgyud): de nyid snang // bar do'i dus su dngos su snang // rigs lnga so so'i snang ba las// zhing khams yongs su dag par sgang // 'khrul pa'i lus la brted nas ni// ma 'khrul pa yi sku nyid byung // 'khrul pa'i sgra la brten nas ni// ma 'khrul pa yi ye shes
389a7(rnying rgyud): 'byung // 'khrul ba'i snang ba la brten nas// ma 'khrul pa yi snang ba 'byung // sU ru yin pas sku nyid 'byung // na las byung ra ma yin no// ri pob rten pa'i byad na// yongs su ye sems bzhag pa'i leT ste zhe 'chad pa'o//
389b1(rnying rgyud): srud pa'i gsang dbang rdo rje sems dpa' des// smyon pa'i skyon pa kun tu bzang po la// thams cad chos sgra yin pa las// sa lam bgrod du med pa la// bgrod par mthong ba ji lta bu// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po des// srud pa'i gsang dpung rdo rje sems/
389b2(rnying rgyud): dpa' la// chos su nyid las dang lam// log par rtog pa'i snang ba ste// chos kyi sgra dang ye shes gnyis// 'og ma ri lam nyid 'byings pa dang // gang ma'i sa nyid thob pa na// sku dang ye shes thob pa yin// rlung gi spyi dang ye shes gnyis// thog
389b3(rnying rgyud): ma med nas rang la byung // rang nyid spangs pa'i pha rol na// sru dang ye shes yod pa min// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes de// rang la gnas te gzhan na med// dmyal ba'i gnas der gnas gyur kyang // spa gri la sogs sdug bsngal rnams/
389b4(rnying rgyud): ye shes nyid du snang ba las// sdug bsngal 'byung ba ga la srid// sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de// sangs rgyas gnas su gnas na yang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes de// sdug bsngal nyid du sdang ba las// ye shes snang ba ga la srid//
389b5(rnying rgyud): rang la gnas pa ji ye shes de// rang nyid rang la ma shwar na// gong ma'i sA yi yon tan de// rnam grangs yin te don ma yin// rang byung ye shes ma~M shar na// sa dang la ma la sbyang du med// thob bya thob rgyu med pa na// sa dang lam zhes bya ba med// phyinang
389b6(rnying rgyud): chos sru ma shar na// sgrib dang bsgribs pa 'gog pa'i lam// yang dag nyid du bgrub pas// gang ltar byas kyang 'dus byas chos// chos kyi sra tid martogs shing // rig pa'i ye shes ma shar na// mi rtog pa nyid byung gyur kyang // snyoms par 'jug pa
389b7(rnying rgyud): rlab gnyi ban// dge de pa la zhes skyes zlu nga // bam pagatad gnyis pa'i thaban na// sa rnams rnam pang shes tha bang // dgas sul la spyod pal// rnamama'a' ba' yas skye pazh-i// snyi papa gnas stong ba
390a1(rnying rgyud): sbed pa'i ma zhin// thams can rnam pa shes bzung // / rnam shes bathang lus zla ma chung ba na// snang ba ngas par bzung ban// sa sa gru ba bsgru ba ston// dbyings kyi dang bzhan shes pa na// snang bkang dam dang
390a2(rnying rgyud): slong pa de nyid bgrub tu med// dbyings kyi snang ba cir yang 'cha// po shes snang bar yang bas pa// dpyi med blang ba'i yang ro'o// ma bkag sa bsrubs bde ba'i nga// mab tsa ma snying po de nyid don// ma bsgrubs man 'dams kun las 'das/ pa
390a3(rnying rgyud): gol ba'i sa lam med// 'bras bur dogs med pa yis// 'byed pa med pa kun tu bzang // rdo rje theg pa chen po di// phyi nang du snang ba yang // thabs dang zhes dbu 'brel ba'i bda'// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes smra// 'di las ma rtogs gar yang med// na pa/
390a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pa da// mya bcos pa las byung ba ste// bcos rnathams cad pabyen pa me// snang bya ba rgyas kyis ny-i mun gajig papa bcom ye nas nyid// dbyer med shes na ye shes thams cad mkhyen// sa lam sbyang nagol ba'i lam// rdo rje sems dpa
390a5(rnying rgyud): zhes d+ha nI// rang bzhin ma bcog pa las Sh+TaH/ sa dang la nga du 'dzin pa kun// log par rton pa'i spyod yul lo// rin po che rgyas pa chen po'i rgyud las/ sgra dang ye shes pas la ma bgrod du med pa'i le'u che zhe dgu pa'o// / sdud pa'i gsang
390a6(rnying rgyud): dbang rdo rje sems dpanga' des// smon pa'i byon pa kun tu dbang po sa// dus gsum sangs rgyas nyams da kyi// sgra dang pe shes rang la gnas pa mas// byin dbang des bzung ba sa hA// ston pakyi ston pagran tu pan po des// su nga'i gas pa cing rdo rje sems
390a7(rnying rgyud): dpa' po// dus gsum 'du 'bral med pa'i rtags// skra dang ye shes rang las byung // de nyid mtshon par byed pa'i rtags// bda' ma brten nas don nyid mtshon// snang ba thams cad dbang gi brda// phye 'i ba~M rda la brten nas ni// rnam par mi rtog ye shes skyes// nang gi reg
390b1(rnying rgyud): pa lta sbyin nas// tsi yi snang nga chos nyid 'char// dbyang med rtogs pa dbang mchog thab// rang byung chas mu rtogs tsam na// ngang nyid rang la s+tha lnga 'byung // ya shwes lnga yi snang ba shang // dbang zhes bya ba rang bzhin no// thabs la brten nas don mtshon pas// rang na
390b2(rnying rgyud): ye shes dbang du gyur// sku yi rtogs lugs bsam mi khyab// ye shes skye lugs pasam mi khyab// bsam gyis mi khyab brjod du med// snang ba la brten chos nyid skye ba dang // rig pa la brten ye shes skyes pas na// ye shes gang ltar byung yang dbang yin no// thabs
390b3(rnying rgyud): dang thabs las byung ba'i dbang mchog des// thabs ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas// ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab skye// 'gag med chos skur gang ltar bltas pa shar// de dang ldan pa thams cad dbang yin no// rin po che rgyas pa chen po'i rgyud las/ dbang nges pa bstan
390b4(rnying rgyud): na na na
390b5(rnying rgyud): bya'i dgu pa'i tshus byims te// zhing gis gos pa med pa rgyam gyings par tsun// rdzo ti ngang bzhin gdong nas zhi ba'as/ rlung bzhin pong rid pa 'thod pa te// dbye med ga tis su med pa par mi phyin pa'o// rgya maud gdong dus du bzhi kya 'byug
390b6(rnying rgyud): pa 'i lo med pa bcon pa ste// bum byab dbyar meng gnas pa pa rol byed pa'o// / sa nyid gad na mang bzhinanam dag pas// tog med mnyam nyid gnas pabasam gan te// rang bzhin yengs pa med pas pa rol byon// chos kyi su 'i rang ba zhini de nyid
391a1(rnying rgyud): thams cad de bzhin nyid na gnas pas shes rabyaste// rang bzhin de ltar rtogs paphya ba rdol byin// chos kyi sku yi rang bzhin don rtogs na// pha rol phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ste// rdzogs pa chen po'i 'od la gang gnas pa/
391a2(rnying rgyud): 'di bsgom thams cad yongs su bsgom pa'o// rin po che rgyas pa chen po'i rgyud las/ dka' thub sgo nas pha rol phyin pa drug spyad du med pas/ pha rol phyin pa rang la rdzogs pa'i le'u ste nga gcig pa'o// / skud pa'i gsang dbang rdo rje sems dpa' des/
391a3(rnying rgyud): ston pa'i skyon pa kun tu bzang bal// 'dras byas blo la nam mkha' la// 'dus ma byas pa bye ba nyid// sems kyi gzhag thabs de lta bu// rnon pa'i stod nga kun tu bzang po rjes// drud pa'i gas dbyung rngo sems dpa' la// chos nyid 'dus ma byas pa de// nus
391a4(rnying rgyud): mkha'i ngo bo rang bzhin yin// gang du ma grub smos bral ba// de la 'dus byas blo nyid bzhag/ ma byas pa yi shes pa de// de la ha da dpyod de bzhag/ yul gyi snang ba ming pyod cing // sems kyi rtog pas blta ba ma dpyad na// mi dmigs pa ru snang bas nA// rig
391a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i stong pa chen po dang // nam mkha' stong pa 'dres pa yin// gang du ma grub smos bral ba// de ltar rtogs pa blta ba yin// de la gnas pa bsgom pa yin// gang ltar spyod pa spyod pa yin// snang ba 'dzin med rtog med pas// bag chags sgrib pa nub pa yis//
391a6(rnying rgyud): tshogs drug mkha' la grub pa yis// yul la mi spyod ye shes yin// yul dang yul can gnyis med pas// nyon mongs sgrib pa dag pa yin// skr-i lA rang sar dag pa yos// longs spyong rdzogs sgra thob pa yin// ye shes rgyan du gnas pa yis// rtog pa kun la'adas
391a7(rnying rgyud): pa yin// rang byung ye shes rdzogs pas na// rdzogs pa chen po'i sangs rgyas yin// ting 'dzin dod la ma chags pas// shes pa'i sgrib pa dag pa yin// rang byung ye shes chen po no// sangs rgyas chos sgra mthong zhes bya// mthong med mthong ba mthong ba'i mchog
391b1(rnying rgyud): mthong las 'das pa ye shes mchog/ 'dus rgyas blo yi nam mkha' la// 'dus ma byas pa'i chos nyid byung // rang byung snying po sku yi gnas// de togs sangs rgyas btsal du med// srang thob med pa'i ye shes so// rin po che rgyas pa chen po'i rgyud las/ 'dus
391b2(rnying rgyud): ma byas sems la 'dus ma byas byung ba'i le'u steng gnyis pa'o// / sdud pa'i gsangang bar rdo rje sems dpa' des// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po la// 'khrul pa'i lus nas sems nyid don pa dang // sems nyid mkha' la bzhag
391b3(rnying rgyud): bcug pa dang // lus la brtags te nang du bsdu ba gang // ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po des// sdud pa'i gsang dbang rdo rje sems dpa' la// lus ni mi dmigs pa yi phyir// nam mkha' dag la rig pa gzhag/ lus por mkha' la bzhag nas ni// ting
391b4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin lus dang ldan pa de// rang bzhin med par seng de bzhag/ ye shes gting gsal chen po 'byung // rang lus nam mkha' stong pa lta bu la// snang ba nam mkha' lta bur snang // nam mkha' mi dmigs lus kyang mi dmigs pas// rig pa dag yang dmigs
391b5(rnying rgyud): pa yod pa min// dmigs pa gsum las 'das pas ting 'dzin lus// rig pa mkha' la bton nas ni// lus la brtag pa gsum bya ste// mi dmigs pa du brtags nas ni// sdug bsngal kun yang mi 'byung ngo // rgyal ba du mar brtags nas ni//
391b6(rnying rgyud): yon tan thams cad kun 'byung ngo // du mthod lci bur brtags nas ni// chags med ye shes bde bar 'char// rig pa nang du bsdu ba ni// gti mug byed pa med pa yis// rig pa mi g.yo mo rtog pas// snying po de la tshogs drug bsdu// rang byung sa
391b7(rnying rgyud): bcos de bzhin no// rin po che rgyas pa chen po'i rgyud las/ rig pa phyi nang gi le'u steng gsum pa'o// / sdung pa'i gsang dbang rdo rje sems dpa' des// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po la// chos sku'i rang bzhin dbyer med gcig
392a1(rnying rgyud): pa las// glags tshol ba dang bar du gcod pa dang // bdud kyi sde 'byung ba ji lta bu// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po des// sdud pa'i gsang dbang rdo rje sems dpa' la// yang dag lam du zhugs la bdud 'byung bas// bdud kyi
392a2(rnying rgyud): sde la gnas pas brdung mi 'byung // phyi yi bdud ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa ste// nang gi bdud ni log par rtogs pa nyid// gsang ba'i bdud ni ye shes ngos ma zin// bar gcod bdud ni don las log par khrid// don dang mi ldan bdud kyi sde ba yin// sgo lnga yul la
392a3(rnying rgyud): chags pa phung po'i bdud// yid g.yos yul la spyod pa nyon mongs bdud// bltar med log par blta ba lha yi bu yi bdud// lam thob bar du gcod pa 'chi bar byed pa'i bdud// bdud kyi rigs ni nyon mongs du ma ste// de yi 'bras bu log par blta ba rnams// dga'
392a4(rnying rgyud): rab dbang phyug rigs la sogs pa'o// mchod legs bsten na dngos grub 'byung bar byed// de las log na 'jig rten phyag bsngal bskyed// glags tshol glags rnyed par du gcod pa'i bdud// bar du gcod na thams cad 'dud yin no// rtogs na mos nyid ma rtogs btud
392a5(rnying rgyud): yin no// 'dzin na ye shes nyid la 'dzin kyang bdud yin no// bsam gtan nyid la chags kyang bdud yin pas// yang dag lam la gnas pa'i bdud de ni// rdo rje slob dpon bdud du snang ba 'gyur// mthong na log lha skye zhing dregs pa zhe sdang skyes// gzugs mi sdug cing yid mi
392a6(rnying rgyud): chags pa 'byung // phyi dang nang du ldang ba thams cad kun// yid kyis dpyad cing gzung 'dzin blta ba'i bdud// yid 'phrog bying dang the tshom bsgom pa'i bdud// don med bka' bzhin mthu 'argya lan spyod pa'i bdud// bdud dang ye shes gnyis ni dbyer med pas// yid
392a7(rnying rgyud): kyis dpyad cing bzung na bdud yin no// ma dpyad rang sor bzhag na ye shes yin// dpyod dang mi dpyod gnyis las ma 'das so// rin po che rgyas pa chen po'i rgyud las/ bdud 'byung ba bstan pa'i le'u steng bzhi pa'o// / spad pa'i gsang dang
392b1(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' des// ston pa'i sngon pa kun tu bzang po'o// 'bras bu'i theg pa can pa 'di// dgus ni gang la srung ba lags// dus ci srid cig na 'byung // snang lags te// snang ba lags// skyon pa'i ston pa kun tu babang po des// smad pa'i gsang dbang
392b2(rnying rgyud): rjong sems dpa' la// tshe rabs thog ma med pa nas// bla ma mchod cing bsnyen pa dang // dkon mchog yid ma mchod pa dang // dam pa'i don la blo sbyangs pas// theg pa chen po la mos pas// de yi smon lam dbang gis su// rin chen 'angam bya gleng nyid du/
392b3(rnying rgyud): rigs rgyud mi lus dag 'dzin// dbang brnam shes yan la 'ardzogs// zhes rab mig dang ldan pa yis// skyigs ma lA li dus de ru// bde ga shegs thugs kyi bstan pa shar// mkha' 'gro zhing stong gan thog// brdam ldan 'das kyi bstan pa ni//
392b4(rnying rgyud): gasrung ba skam sag sa.us ci du gadrug cig bdagangs/ dgi ba ga phyi 'a'i rgyum // brtan bdan 'a ba tu /
392b5(rnying rgyud): 'gro yis// las dag de la snang bar byed// de nas de yi sprul pa'i sgras// thugs kyi bstan pa nyi bzhin shar// las dag rnams la snang bar byed// theg pa 'di don mthong ba na// skad cig gcig gis rdzogs sangs rgyas// snod dang mi ldan gang zag la// theg pa
392b6(rnying rgyud): 'di nyid snang gyung kyang // rdo rje demyal ba chen po'i rgya// 'tshong ba'i slob pa ldan pa pa// theg pa 'di nyid snang mi sred// theg pa 'di yi don rtogs na// rdo rje sems dpa' khong nas 'chang // de bzhin pa yis lung bstan to// theg pa chen po 'di nyid ni/ gang zag de
392b7(rnying rgyud): la snang bar nges// srid papar dang 'bras bu ga// dad pos rgyas pa chen po'i byud las/ theg pa chen po'i gang gal lung bstan pa'i le'u steng lngab la// spyad pa'i gsang dab rnamams dpa' das// son pa'i ston pa thar tu bzang po'o//
393a1(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' chen po ni// mya ngan 'das pa'i tshig bcu gang // ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po des// skud pa'i gsang dbang rdo rje sems dpa' la// rdo rje sems dpa' bltas byas na// phyogs lhung med pa'i sems dpa' des// sems
393a2(rnying rgyud): dpa' de yi don rtogs na// sgrib pa med pa ye shes sgra// skye 'gag med pa ye shes klong // mtha' dbus med pa'i zhing khams na// rdul 'gag med pa'i sangs rgyas gnas// shes dang ye shes bdag po'i mchog/ thams cad mabyon pa'i ye shes sgra// bsgrib dang sgrib
393a3(rnying rgyud): pa ga la yod// rin po che rgyas pa chen po'i rgyud las/ rdo rje'i tshig bcu bstan pa'i le'u lte nga drug pa'o// / sdud pa'i gsang dbang rdo rje sems dpa' des// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po la// 'di nyid lha sgom sbyong pa yis// drod dang rtags dang
393a4(rnying rgyud): 'phrul dang // ye shes mngon shes dbyung ba gang // ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po des// sdud pa'i gsang dbang rdo rje sems dpa' la// blta bsgom theg pa 'di dang ldan pa na// drod ni 'di rnams 'byung ba ste// byang chub sems ni snying rje chen po 'byung // chags pa med//
393a5(rnying rgyud): cing sbyin la dga' ba dang // nga rgyal med cing nyon mongs chung pa dang // gtsang btsog med cing 'dod pa chung ba dang // khong nas shes rab chen po gsal ldan zhing // rtags ni 'di rnams byung ba ste// gnyid med nyin mtshan med par gsal ba dang // phyi dang nang gi srin bu med pa
393a6(rnying rgyud): dang // lus ni yang zhing bkrag mdangs gsal ba dang // gzhon nu'i lus ldan yan lag grims pas 'byung // 'bring la rmi lam ye shes skye ba dang // tha ma rmi lam 'khrul par shes pa'o// cho 'phrul dag ni 'di rnams 'byung ba ste// 'byung ba dpa la dbang nyid thob pa'i rtags
393a7(rnying rgyud): sa la 'dul zhing rgyal 'byong ba med// mkha' la 'phur zhing rlung la zhon pa ste// lus las ma 'byung me yis mi 'tshig go// sems nyid dag la dbang ni thob pa'i rtags// mang po khyad cing shi ba slong nus so// cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyed kyang nus// ye shes mngon shes
393b1(rnying rgyud): drug kyang 'byung // ye shes mngon shes ma lus bcu gzigs// lha yi stan gyis stong gsum spyi phrad zos// rigs drug sems ni ma lus pa ru shes// 'chi 'pho dag dang khyab ma lus shes// rdzu 'phrul sprul pa'i gdul bu ma lu shas// zad par bil gyis gnon pa ma lus pa/
393b2(rnying rgyud): ru shes// gzhi la rig shes rdzogs pa yis// mngon par shes pa ma lus shar// bsgoms pa las byung shes rab khong nas skye// drod rtags gsam gyis mi zab 'byung ba ste// de la chags zhing zhin na bdud yin no// rang bzhin med par bzhug na yon tan no// rin
393b3(rnying rgyud): pa chen po'i rgyur las/ drod rtags kyi le'u steng bdun pa'o// / sdud pa'i gsang dbang rdo rje sems dpa' des// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po la// theg pa chen po 'di nyid la// mos sa mthi 'as klog pa dang // 'chang ngam yid la byed pa dang // nyan dang
393b4(rnying rgyud): bshad dang bsgom pa dang // 'di la rtag tu mchod pa rnams// de gnas 'bras bu ji lta bu// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po des// sdud pa'i gsang dbang rdo rje sems dpa' la// theg pa 'di la mos pa kun// mno dam pa'i lam zhugs nas// sems bskyed pa yi
393b5(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu rdzogs// sred pa gar 'byung gdabyes yang // bar do rnam pa gsum nyid du// theg pa 'di dang mi 'bral zhing // bla ma lta bur lung yang ston// 'di nyid bris pa dri ma gyis su// ngan song rnams las rab rgyal zhing // bde gshegs kun cis byin gyis brlab/
393b6(rnying rgyud): sras kyi dam pa sangs rgyas sras// mkha' 'gro rnams kyi lung yang 'thob// 'di nyid bklags pa tsam gyis su// khams gsum rnams las rab 'das shing // 'che ka'i rna bug brjod pa na// ngan song las ni thar bar byed// mi min gnon la sogs pa yis// gang/
393b7(rnying rgyud): pa zhi nas yang dag 'thob// lha dang mkha' 'gro thams cad kyis// jo bor mthong nas nges par bkur// yang dag nges pa'i lung yang ston// 'di nyid bcang ba rtsomagyis su// ngan song gsum las rab thar zhing // 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol ci// don rnams thams
394a1(rnying rgyud): cad 'grub par byed// 'di nyid yod la byed pa yis// bder gshegs rnams cad bkur bas na// yang dag las na gnas pa na// byang chub sems dbus byin gyis rlobs// 'ad nyid nyan pa tsam gyis su// theg pa thams cad mnyan pas hA/
394a2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas dgongs pa kun 'grub pas// mthun pa'i ye shes rang snang bas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras su mthong // byang sems kun gyi sman du gzigs// mkha' 'gro rnams kyis byin gyis brlab// gar 'byung de ni gar skyes yang // theg pa 'di la rtag tu myod// 'di
394a3(rnying rgyud): nyid bshad pa tsam gyis su// dus gsum rkun mi 'chad pa ru// rtag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// bang do rnam pa gsum du yang // bder gshegs thugs kyis dam par gzigs// rdo rje semasnad pa'i dngos su snang // de yi lung nyid bstan nas ni// yang dag nges
394a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'bras bu thob// de nyid bsdoms pa tsam gyis su// tshe gcig yang dag 'bras bu ster// sku gsum snang bar lhan gyis grub// de yi yon tan bsam mi khyab// 'di nyid mchod bstod byas pa yis// dkon mchog gsum po kun mchod dang // nye ba'i sras kyi dam
394a5(rnying rgyud): par 'dzin// sdug bsngal rnams ni mi 'byung zhig/ dbul ba thams cad sel ba'o// stong gsum rdul ni bsams nus te// 'di yi bsod nams bsam mi nas// rin po che rgyas pa chen po'i rgyud las/ theg pa 'di'i bsod nams bstan pa'i le'u lte nga brgyad pa'o// //
394a6(rnying rgyud): smad pa'i gsang dbang rdo rje sems dpa' des// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po la// tha dad gnyis su snang ba la// gcig ces bya ba ji lta bu// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po des// spyad pa'i gsang dbang rdo rje sems dpa' la// thams cad rang bzhin rnam par dag
394a7(rnying rgyud): pas na// snod ces bya ba sangs rgyas snod// bcud ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcud// sna tshogs snang ba ye shes nyid// rigs drug sems can sangs rgyas nyid// sangs rgyas nyid las ma gtogs pa// rdul tsam dag kyang yod ma yin// thams cad rang bzhin dag pas
394b1(rnying rgyud): na// bstar med bltas na 'khrul pa yin// 'asgom med bsgom na 'khrul pa yin// ma'i spyod na la byung ba yin// thob mad thob na 'khrul pa yin// yang dag nyid na btsal du med// 'khor ba ka dag rin chen gling // rang byung kun tu bzang por gnas// thams cad
394b2(rnying rgyud): dbyer med gcig pas na// yang dag rdzogs pa de kho na'o// rin po che rgyas pa chen po'i rgya las/ 'khor bdong smug gi le'u steng dgu pa'o// / sdud pa'i gsang dbang rdo rje sems dpa' des// ston pa'i sprin pa kun tu bzang po la// chos kyi su yi rang
394b3(rnying rgyud): bzhin de// skye 'gag med pa'i mtshan nyid gang // ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po des// sdud pa'i gsang dbang rdo rje sems dpa' la// rang bzhin skye ba med pa yis// yon tan 'gag pa med par shar// snying po yul la mi dmigs pas// gnas par bya ba'i rang
394b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin med// 'gro 'ong yon tAn rang shar bas// bde ba ye shes rang gsal 'od// de la yon tan 'od lngar shar// rang gsal 'od ni lha bzhin gsal// lha dang 'od ni rang bzhin gcig/ de dang de yi 'brel pa las// snang ba gnyis su shar ba'o// nyi ma'i snying po
394b5(rnying rgyud): zer dang chas// man shel snying po 'di dang chus// gser gyi rang bzhin ser dang chas// me long rang bzhin gsal dang chas// gsal ba'i rang bzhin 'od dang chas// sems can rang bzhin yid dang chas// stong pa ye shes gsal dang chas// thams cad sku gsum
394b6(rnying rgyud): rang chas pas// byas pa ma yin byung ba yin// rang rang so so'i mtshan nyid kyang // chos kyi sku las byung bas na// spangs pas de nyid spangs pa min// rang bzhin shes na yongs kyis spangs// snang ba chos su dang las byung // snang ba spangs pas chos su med//
394b7(rnying rgyud): dug lnga ye shes rang las byung // mi rtog mi 'dzin gti mug la// gsal bar snang ba zhe sdang la// bde bar snang ba 'dod chags la// stong par snang ba phrag dog la// gos pa med pa nga rgyal nyid// de yang ye shes yod ma yin// thams cad rang las byung bas na/
395a1(rnying rgyud): rang las shar ba'i snang ba las// gang ltar ldan kyang gos pa med// rang byung rang shwar ma shes na// gang ltar spyad kyang 'khrul pa'o// rin pa che rgyas pa chen po'i byung las/ chos thams cad rang las byung bar bstan pa'i la na/
395a2(rnying rgyud): drug cupa'o// / da pa gsang de bang de rnamams dang 'dis// ston pa'i so pa kun tu bzang po'o// thad 'di gang las byung bang gang lagatad pa dang // rjes sam dang yongs su gas pa gang // snyan pa'i sngon pa kun tu babang ba das// spad pa
395a3(rnying rgyud): gsang dbang rdo rje sems dpa' la// gzhi 'gags med pa'i snying po de nyid las// chos rnams thams cad rang byung ra shar byas// de las byung zhing de la spyod pa las// byung ba ma rtogs shar ba mthong ba yis// theg pa rnam pa gsum gyis mi khyab pas// thung dang byung
395a4(rnying rgyud): nas gnas pa'i theg pa 'di// kun tu bzang po'i dgongs pa de bzhin bstan// ji ltar byung zhing shar bar snang ba 'di// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid langs bstan to// sems dpa' che zhes snang ba'i theg pa 'di// kun la yod da rang gsang thabs kyis rjod// chod pa'i mun pas
395a5(rnying rgyud): rna
395a6(rnying rgyud): kyi 'i kyi 'i tshu rlo
